23b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du oM dkar po bsams te/ skor mar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad ba'i steng du A dmar po bsam snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM sngon po bsams la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM /rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA /zhes bya bas gsungs te /bdud rtsi 'am/ ba'i
23b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam lnga la sogs pa la oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bzlas la/ oM badzra re kha hUM/ zhes zlos shing /maN+Dal byug par bya'o/ /de nas lag pa bshal te thal mo sbyar te phan yon brjod par bya'o/ /chu bcos lci ba sbyin pa yin/ /bskyang nul byas pa tshul khrms yin/ /grogs
23b4(rgyud 'grel): mo sogs bsal? bzod pa yin/ /bya ba rtsas pa brtson 'grus yin/ /skad cig rtse gcig bsam gtan yin/ /ri mo snyoms pa shes rab yin/ /thub pa'i maN+Dal byas pas pha rol phyin drug de dag rnyed? bar 'gyur/ /lha mi khyad par can ste skye zla ltar
23b5(rgyud 'grel): gzi 'phags shing /nang kun las grol gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor pa ldan par skye/ /de nas 'di gshegs mchog gi khyim du lus las bya zhes brjod de/ /de nas lag pa g.yon pas ?
23b6(rgyud 'grel): la reg par byas la oM badzra me dA ni badzra b+ha ba badzra ? hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis sa gzhi de sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur bar bsam mo/ /de nas me tog gi chos bu dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya ste/ dbus su oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de me tog dor bo/ /shar du gi
23b7(rgyud 'grel): gau rI nam(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas me tog dor ro/ /lhor tse tsau? ?  zheS sbya bas me tog dor bo/ /nub tu baM bet+tA lI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas me tog dor ro/ /byang du g+hi g+hasma rI ma ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dor?/ /dbang ldan du paM pu+k+ka sI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dor ro/ /me'i mtshams su semS? wa
24a1(rgyud 'grel): rI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dor ro/ /bden bral du laM tsaN+Da lI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /rlung mtshams su ni Ti Tom+b+hi? ni nam(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas so/ /de dag ni me tog gi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogS
24a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ? bug g.yon pa nas zhugs te thugs ka'i pad+ma la bsnun pa tsam gyis/ thugs bskul nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes pa rdo rje'i lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du sprul te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsamS
24a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i 'od zer gyi sna la 'jus? te 'ongs ba'i bgegs thams cad tshar bcad pa'i bsam pas hUM bzhis bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra gau rI A karSha? ya dza/ oM badzra ?  pra ba sha ya hUM oM badzra g+hasma lI ? ya baM/ oM badzra g+hasma rI ba shi ku ru
24a4(rgyud 'grel): ho/ /zhes brjod pa ye shes kyi lha dbu me tog gi chom bu'i dkyil 'khor la dkug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ste/ yi ge brgya bas kyang brtan par bya'o/ /de nas phyag bya ste/ gti mug gis mnan 'gro ba ltas te /'gro ba gti mug
24a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis go ? mdzad/ /de bas gau rI bstod phyag 'tshal/ /zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro bltas nas /'gro ba zhe sdang zhi bya'i phyir/ /rdo re can gyis tsau rIr? mdzad/ /de bas tsa rI bstod phyag 'tshal/ /nga rgyal gyis mnan 'gro bltas nas//
24a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba nga rgyal zhi bya'i phyir/ /gtso bos bat+tu? lI gzugs mdzad/ /de bas bet+ta bstod phyag 'tshal/ /'dod chags kyis dkrugs 'gro bltas nas/ /'gro ba 'dod chags zhi bya'i phyir/ /gtso bos g+hasma? rI gzugs mdzad/ /de bas g+hasma ri bstod 'dud/ /
24a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag med ma dang gnyis med gzugs /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum bdag rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal/ /de nas yang /oM de ba bi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bcom ldan 'das la mchod la/
24b1(rgyud 'grel): /oM a A i a'i u a'u ri rI li lI e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa/ yang mo aSh+Ta nanA? yan ma(rgyud 'grel): oM bai gorta ke sha brt+ta? ne sha na ma(rgyud 'grel): e tsatu ? sha ha nai trA an? ma(rgyud 'grel): oM tsatu? sha ta nai t+trA? yan ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ShiSh+Na? dzam+bu ta wa bu She na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ka phA la
24b2(rgyud 'grel): mA lnga ne kad+ha ri Ni na ma oM ad+he? ta grUr tsit+ta ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ard+hen du raSh+TI Ne na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad kyis mchod do/ /de nas nang dang phyi dang de kho na nyid kyis mchod pas kyang yang dag par mchod de/ phyi rol gyi bya ba'i mchod pas kyang mchod la/ oM A? hUM zhes bzlas pa'i me
24b3(rgyud 'grel): togs mchog rdzas thams cad la bsnun pas/ byin gyis ? la/ oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni hUM phaT swA hA zhes bya bas dri chab kyis bsangs te/ oM badzra ni ri tI hUM zhes bya bas zhabs bsil phul la/ oM h+ri bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA/ sarba b+hA paM ni saM sho d+ha ? a nga na ya hUM
24b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas zhabs bsil phul/ dza:hUM baM ho/ khaM? zhes bya bas ard+ha? phul la/ oM badzra? d+hu pa A? oM badzra ? oM badzra A lo ke A? hUM oM badzra shabda A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra nai bi hye? ?/ oM badzra shabda A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ phaT swAhA zhes bya bas go rims bzhin du ma rtog dang /spos dang /mar med
24b5(rgyud 'grel): nas? sdig pa bshags par bya ste/ ji srid thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar phyin ci log gi rtog bas bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las bda gis bgyis pa dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar bshags shing phyis
24b6(rgyud 'grel): sdom par bgyid do/ /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rdo rje snyed pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid do/ /bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du thugS
25a1(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po dang ldan pa'i khams gsum bde ba chen por rnam la ? gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dgyes mdzad rdo rje dang/ des gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang thag pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang /dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i chos dang/
25a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun dang /de'i 'khor lo la 'khor bar gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs la bdag skyabs su mchi'o/ /bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /sems can thams
25a3(rgyud 'grel): cad las na pa dang /bde ba bsgrubs pa dang/ 'di dag ji srid mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la
25a4(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'phro ba'i dge la yi rang ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di kyis gzung/ /zhes sems bskyed la/ de nas bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i lam 'di nyid la brten par bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas
25a5(rgyud 'grel): par byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la lus 'bul lags kyis thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis bzhes su gsol nas lus 'bul ti/ de nas smon lam gdab par bya ste /rigs skyes rjes su ma nyams shing/ /sems can kun
25a6(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i ldan zhing bla mar gus/ /skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig/ lag ni rdo rje dril bu 'khrol/ /zab mo'i chos ni 'don pa dang /btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can/ /skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig /he ru ka dpal bdag gyur nas /sems can kun
25a7(rgyud 'grel): ? don yang byed/ /he ru ka'i yi go 'phang mchog ? nas/ /sems can ma lus 'di la 'dod cing 'jog par shog /de ltar bstod pa'i mchod sbyin las ni rdo rje rigs mchog tu ni bdag myur skye gyur cig /sems can phan phyir yang dag thabs kyi yon
25b1(rgyud 'grel): tan dang ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhin bdag gyur cig/ /rnal 'byor ma kun la ni dpe med bde sder rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du bdag byung cig /phyag rgya drug gis bdag brgyan dur khred gnas su changs par spyod dang ldan par bdag gyur cing/ /de'i 'og tu yi ge
25b2(rgyud 'grel): brgya pas cho ga kha bskang zhing bshags pa bya ste/ oM badzra he ru ka sa ma ya /ma nu pA la ya /he ru ka twe no pa tiShta/ dri Dho? mi b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo? me b+ha ba/ a nu ? me b+ha gsung Sh+yo? me b+ha ba?/ sarba sid+d+himme? pra yats+tsha sarba karmA su tsam/ tsita ti sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru haM ha ha ha ha ha/
25b3(rgyud 'grel): lhag than sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me ? badzra? b+ha ba /mahA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas bshags la /ye shes lha oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo/ /dam tshig lte bdag gis thugs kar bsdus la /me tog gi ? bu dbus su
25b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ? la gzhag gi/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i maN+Dal gyi tshig /slob dpon mtsho skyes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //thabs dang dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog/ gdong nas thams cad dang bzhin gnas /gnyis med ?
25b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag nyid can/ /kyi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sngon po chos nyid mi 'gyur ba/ /? po thugs rje rgyun mi 'chang/ gyen rje 'gro ba 'dren ? te du kal phyag 'tshal ?/ /spyan gsum rnam par thar pa gsum/ /dmar ba chos nyid chags pa'i don/ hUM sgrogs skye ba med pa ste
25b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gcod? ba 'tshal ? g.yas na gdug 'joms rdo rje ste g.yon na bde sbyong ka pA la/ shes rab mtshon pa ? longs spyod rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thod pa ye shes lnga yi dngos phyag rgya lnga ni rigs lnga ste/ /do shal phreng ba 'du byed spangs/ /sprul
25b7(rgyud 'grel): sku khyod la ? ma gos ? ba'i gdan/ rnam rtog mi ? tshangs pa'i ro/ ma rig bsreg pa'i nyi ma ste/ /gos med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdzogs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ ho? mi bi Dhi?/ bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi chog?
26a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dbyes ba'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang/ /bdag med ma gus phyag byas ces rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya/ /bdag gzhan phan bar 'dod pa yis/ /rnam rtog nga rgyal sogs spangs te/ /
26a2(rgyud 'grel): tshal phyir 'brang ba'i blo yis ni/ /sbyin sreg rim pa mnyan par gyis/ /bla med nang dang phyi rol te/ /sbyin sreg dbye ba rnam pa gsum/ /ye shes me lha phung po sogs/ /bung shing bsreg ba bla med yin/ /phyi rol sbyin sreg gis bsgres te/ /kha zas bza' sogs nang gi?
26a3(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /dkyil 'khor ? ni lha gnas dang/ /sgrub pa'i dus su sbyin sreg bya/ /sbyin sreg las rnams med ba las/ /dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /mkhas pas sbyin sreg las rnams brtsams/ /sdig pa 'jig phyir
26a4(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba ste/ /bsod nams yongs 'dzin rgyas pa yin/ /chags pa bsgom phyir dbang 'gyur te/ /rtog bzad phyir gsod pa yin/ /nyon mongs ser bzhi byed dang/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas byed phyir/ /rang gi lha li sbyor bas bdag /ji lta bar ni sems kyis byas/ /de nas phyi
26a5(rgyud 'grel): yi bshad bya ste/ /thabs dang rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang/ /sgrub pa po dang lha dag dang/ /sgrub pa'i thab dang rnam ldar 'gyur/ /de la thab khur bshad ba ni/ sems can dbye bas mdza' yas te/ /las kyi dbye bas bzhi du 'gyur/ /rigs kyi dbye bas lnga ru 'gyur/ /zhi ba la ni zlu? ba
26a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rgyas pa yin grub bzhi'o/ /dbang la gzhu yi dbyibs su'o/ /mngon sbyang la ni gru gsum mo/ /bskrad dang dgug la'ang de bzhin no/ /rgya? ru khru gang zabs su ni/ /mtho gang ba ni zhi ba yin// rgya? ru khru ro thabs su ni/ /khru gang pa ni rgyas bar bzheng? brgya ru khru gang zabs ni/ /mthob gang ?
26a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang log? rgya ru sor mo nyi shu ? thabs su song bcu mngon sbyong la/ /bskrad dang dgug la'ang de bzhin zhi la kha dog dkar bor bya?/ /rgyas pa la ni ser po'o?/ /dbang la dmar por bya ba'o/ /mngon spyod la ni nag po'o/ /dbug? pa la ni dmar bor bya /bskrad pa la ni nag por bya'o /zhi ba kha khyer song bzhig?
26b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /nang duAng? sor bzhi dor bor bya/ /rgyas pa la ni song brgyad de/ /nang duAng de bzhin dor ba bya/ /? sngo bzhis bskor/ /nang duAng sor bzhi dor bar bya/ /mngon spyod la ni sor gsum ste/ /nang duAng sor gsum dor la bya/ /dgug dang bskrad la'ang de bzhin no/ /zhi ba'i thab?
26b2(rgyud 'grel): khung dbus su ni/ /rdo rje dang ni bri gug bri/ /kha khyer la ni rdo rjes bskor/ /rgyas la dbus su rin po che'o/ /kha khyer la dang rin po che'o/ /kha khyer la'ang rin po che'o/ /dbang la dbus su pad+ma sa mtshan/ /kha khyer de dang 'dra bas bskor/ /mngon spyod la ni ral gri'o/ /kha khyer la'ang ral gris bskor/ /dgug la
26b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus su lcags kyus bzhag/ kha khyer ba dang 'dra ba la bskor/ /bsgrad la dbus su rdo rje ni /rtse gsum ba ni bzhag par bya/ /kha khyer la'ang rtse gsum bri /dbus su bri gug thun la mthun/ /thab khung nang gi phyogs bzhir ni/ /kha TwAM ga dang bde gshegs kyis/ /phyag
26b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gyi ma rim bzhin bzhag/ thab khung kun la kha dog dang/ /mthun ba'i dri yis byug par bya/ /zhi ba phal cher srod la bya/ /rgyas ba snga dro bya ba yin/ /dbang ni rgongs ka'i dus su bya/ /dgug pa la'ang de dang 'dra/ /mngon spyod nam byed nyin phyed bya/ /bskrad pa'ang de
26b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba yin/ /zhi la shar du bya bar bshad/ /rgyas pa lho yi phyogs su bya/ /dbang gi las ni nub tu bya/ /dgug la'ang nub tu bya ba yin/ /mngon spyod byang du brtsam bar bya/ /bskrad pa'i las kyang de dang 'dra/ /tshon gyis rjes mthun bri ba'am/ /yang ni me tog dag
26b6(rgyud 'grel): ? kyang ?/ /bdag ni de ltar bya/ /rdzas ni 'di ltar shes par byed/ /zhi ba la ni til gyis so/ /rgyas pa la ni zho zan no/ /dbang dang dgug la utpal/ /mngon sbyong pa'i tshor mas so/ /bskrad ba la'ang tsher ma'o/ /kun la mthun pa 'di dag ste/ /mchod yon dang
26b7(rgyud 'grel): ni zhabs bsil dang/ /bsang gtor dri dang byug pa dang/ /me tog mar ma me til dang ni/ /yam shing dmar dang zho zin dang/ /ku sha dur ba'i myu gu nas/ /gro dang 'bru dang ma sha dang/ /ma grugs 'bras dang sta rka dang/ /pA gor zho sha dza ti phal/ /gzhan yang?
27a1(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba'i rdzas rnams dang/ /bdud brtsi me dang gung shing ngo/ /mngon spyod la ni bsgrub bya yi/ /gzugs brnyan ske tshe lan cha dang/ /khrag dang mi rus phye ma dang/ /dug dang dpa' bo lnga rnams so// u dum+bu ra la sogs pa'i/ /yal ga rtse mo'i cha las byung/ /srid
27a2(rgyud 'grel): du mdzub gang sgogs? mthe bo'i/ /dbang? tsam sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang/ /tsan dang dkar po'i tshul spangs/ /rtse gcig zhi la ro tus ni/ /yal ga dbus kyi cha las byung/ /srid du khyu gang sdoms su ni/ /mthe'o mdza' u chung par khongs pa/ /zho dang mar dang ser po dre/ /de la
27a3(rgyud 'grel): spangs te rtse gcig pas/ /dbul bya mkhas pas dbang la ni/ /tsan dan dmar dang yungs mar la/ /spangs pa tshang ni zhi dang mthun/ /drag po la ni tsher ma'i shing/ /rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba ni/ /srid du sor bcu sboms su ni/ /phra dang sbom pa 'od? dbul bar bya/ /khrag ? dug
27a4(rgyud 'grel): dang las tshwa dang/ /tsha ba'i dril spangs pa'o/ /bskrad dang dgug ba 'ang de bzhin no/ /ring dang thung dang kas dang phra/ /srog chags bcas sogs spang bar bya/ /u dum+ba ra la sogs pa'i/ /mngar ba'i ro dang 'o mar bcas/ bud shing zhi ba'i las la bya/ /sgyur ba'i ror ldan rgyas pa
27a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /dag la dmar zhing tsher ma ni/ /lcags kyu lta bu yod pa'o/ /dkug pa la'ang de bzhin no/ /drag po la ni kha ba dang/ /tsha ba'i rong ldan tsher ma bcas/ /bskrad pa la'ang de bzhin no/ /ring thung kha dog la sogs pa/ /ci rigs pas ni bud shing bya/ /mchod yon la
27a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs snod rnams ni/ /zhi ba la sogs las rim? bzhin/ /dngul dang gser dang zangs ma dang/ /lcags la sogs pas byas pa yin/ /dgang? gzar thags? gzar yul ?/ 'og tu rdo rje rin chen bya/ /de steng rgyar ni sor bzhi la/ /zabs su sor gnyis nang rdo rje//
27a7(rgyud 'grel): sor bzhi'i mthar ni rdo rje ste/ /bar du pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs/ /blugs bzar pad+ma'i dbyibs sor gnyis /zabs su sor gcig nang rdo rje/ /'o ma can las byung me las/ /rgyun bzhag ma 'am bram ze ni/ /tha mal me ni zhi ba la'o/ /rgyas pa la ni rgyal po dang/
27b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal rigs dang blon po yis/ /yang na dgon pa nas byung me'o/ /dbang dang dgag la smad 'tshang dam/ /rje rigs khyim nas byad mes bya/ /dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang/ /rol mo pa las byung ba 'am/ /lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni rdo ba dang/ /? pa'i khyim ?
27b2(rgyud 'grel): byung bas bya/ /bskrad pa la'ang de bzhin no/ /kun la'ang dur khrod me dang ni/ /thol bar ldan bas bya ba'o/ /sbyin sreg yo byed thams cad ni/ /bdag gi g.yas su dgod par bya/ /rdo rje de bzhin dril bu dang/ /mchod yon snod ni g.yon du bzhag/ /dgang ? ni blugs gnas dang//
27b3(rgyud 'grel): mar ni mdun du ? par bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni go bzlog pa'o/ /thams cad khyad ni bsangs nas bzhag/ slob dpon dag gam sgrub pa po /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan/ /sbyin sreg las la mkhas pa yi/ /brtson pas sbyin sreg las bya'o/ /'dir? ni lha ni rnam gsuM
27b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /sreg bya len dang las byed dang/ /mchod pa bya ba'i me lha ste/ /'di rnams mtshan nyid gzhan nas gsungs/ /thabs kyi rim pa bshad par bya /de nas slob dpon de yis ni/ /sbyin sreg khang pa legs 'dug nas/ /khrus sogs bya ba sngon byas te/ /sgrub thabs las byung
27b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga yis/ /las kyi rjes su mthun pa yi/ /lha yi nga rgyal bskyed nas ni/ /rdzas rnams yang dag sbyin gyis brlabs/ /dang por bsang gtor snod la ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas byas to/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT /de yis kun la bsang gtor bya/ /de nas mchod yon la sogs
27b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rang rang gsang sngags bzlas? pa 'am/ /yang na gsang sngags 'di bzlas te/ /oM A:hUM thams cad dag par bsam bya ste/ /gong nas 'byung ba'i me blangs la/ /de la rak+Sha sa bsang gtor bya/ /thab tuAng bsang zhing me bcug la/ /gsang sngags 'di dang bcas pa yi//
27b7(rgyud 'grel): rlung yar? kyi ni sgrar bar bya/ /oM? ha ru ka mahA badzra dza la hUM hUM hUM/ de nas bgegs ni bcad bya'i phyir/ /ku sha drungs byung sngo ba la/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas nas kyang/ /oM badzra satwa A yu She swA hA/ shar dang lho dang nub dang byang/ /dbul suAng legs par dgram? bar bya//
28a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas legs sbyangs gnas dar ni/ /yi ge hUM las byung ba yi/ /zhe? sogs las kyi rjes mthun pa'i/ /thab gyur dag ni bsam par bya'o/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab brgyad pa ni legs dmigs la/ /mngon par byang chub lnga yis ni/ /rdo rje sems
28a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bskyed par bya/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yong ma gyur las ri? las 'byung ba'i me lha bsam /zhi ba'i me lha ba bka' o/ /rgyas ba la ni ye shes mi/ /dbang dang dbug la 'dod pa'i me/ /mngon sbyong? las dang bskrad pa la/ /rlung gi min
28a3(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas bsam/ /zhal gsum phyag dug kha dog dkar/ /mchod phyir thogs la sogs la sogs pas brgyan/ /dang pos rig ma yang dag 'khyud/ /g.yas gnyis dbyug to mi 'jigs pa/ /g.yon gnyis bgrang phreng spyi lugs 'dzin/ /rgyas pa de las kha dog sel/ /dbang
28a4(rgyud 'grel): dang dgug la dmar po la/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi bar pa na/ /lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bsang dang bskrad dang nag po la/ /dbu skra gyen rjes za byed lta bu yi/ /g.yas na ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba yi/ /ye shes me lha spyad dang bya/ /
28a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya yi/ /mthe bong srin lag mtshams bkug pa'o/ /oM agne mahA haM dza sarba kA mArtha sA d+ha ka karu? tsutbi twa satwa?/ asminsan+ni? haM tob+ha ba/ mo lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /bgegs bskad bsang gtor la sogs bya/ /dza:hUM baM ho/
28a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brtod pas/ /dbug dang de bzhin gzhug pa dang/ /bcing dang rjes su dgye par bya/ /sa ti hAM gats+tsha? ha bya bu k'mi? sha si dza ta ka le sarba sid+d+hi? ku ru sha ma/ me dga' ba'i sngags so/ /de nas gnyis med me lha la/ /thugs pa'i sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /de bzhin
28a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs rnams bskul byas te/ /bdud rtsi bum pa'i chu yis ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni bya ba'o/ /zhi ba'i me la rnam snang mdzad/ /dbu rgyan du ni bya ba yin/ /rgyas la rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /dbang dang dbug la tshe dpag med / /gsod sogs las la mi
28b1(rgyud 'grel): bskod pa'i bde nas rang rang sngags kyis ni/ /bsang gtor mdzod yon zhabs bsil dbul/ /de nas e lha'i kha dang ni/ /dgang? gzar blugs gzar nang du ni/ /yi ger ni legs bkod de/ /mar gyis yongs su bkang ba yi/ /dgang blugs bdun nam gsum 'am gcig/ me lha'i sngags
28b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi ? bar bya/ /mo he ru ka agna? ye a mo ka sya shAn+ti? ku ru swA hA/ /gzhan yang rang rang sngags dang sbyar/ /de nas 'bar ba'i mtshan ma brtag/ ngan na bsrung bar bya ba'o/ /de nas legs par med de la/ /mchod pa kun gyi rab tu mchod/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT(rgyud 'grel): bsang gtor sbyin pa'i
28b3(rgyud 'grel): oM pa'i? khA ha swAhA/ /mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /oM ni ri ti hUM /zhabs bsil gyi sngags so/ /oM badzra ? hUM/ /dri'i sngags so/ /oM badzra du Shpe? hUM /me tog gi sngags so/ /oM badzra d+hU be hUM/ /bdug spos kyi sngags so/ /oM badzra dI pe hUM /mar ma'i sngags so/ /oM badzra nai bi bya hUM/ lha
28b4(rgyud 'grel): bshos kyi sngags so/ /de nas sna dang rol mo rnams/ /phul la rdzas rnams rim bzhin du/ /bsang gtor mchod yon la sogs pa/ /so so'i sngags kyi dbul bar bya/ /dril bu rol mo'i sbra rnams dang/ /bstod pa'ang snga ma bzhin du bya/ /bdud rtsi myang ba'ang byas nas ni/ /ye
28b5(rgyud 'grel): shes me la gshegs? gsol/ /oM agna ye ya hi yi ta swa sarba tse kA pa rArthaM tsas ti taM gats+tshi ha bya bu ka /spyan drang pa yi cho ga las kA mthe bong phyir bskyed slar gshegs pa'o/ /slar gshegs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de nas dam tshig me lha ni/ /me yi gzugs su gyur par rtag
28b6(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bya ste/ /ci bde bar ni gnas bar bya'o/ /mkhas las char ba bab pa yis/ /rdo rje'i steng nas rtsa skyes ltar/ /slob dpon dag gis byin gyis rlabs/ /rtog gi bdag gis byas pa'o/ /sbyin sreg gis cho ga slob dpon mtshos skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
28b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar srad du ? ma a pany+tsa/ bod skad du/ dam tshig lnga pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' thugs brtsa ba la phyag 'tshal nas/ /yang dag bde ba ma lus dngos grub rab ster mdzad pa yi/ dpal ldan gsang ba'i rgyud sogs
29a1(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs shin tu sbas ba nyid/ /mdor bsdus mdzes pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i tshig bshad bar bya/ /sngags pas nub mo khyad pas nub mo khyad par can dus nyi ma re re yi ni ji snyed bar/ /zla ba re re 'ang ni 'khor los 'das nyams par 'gyur ba yin//
29a2(rgyud 'grel): nye bar 'che ba med pa'i dur khrod dgon pa'i rdzing bu'i 'bram 'am skyed mes tshal/ /mtsho ngogs chu klung ri sul rang gi khyim sogs 'bras bu ster ba'i 'khor lo bya/ /yang dag brgyud pa thob 'gyur ba/ /dpal ldan chog shes snying rje ldan/ /'jig rten chos la mi chags?
29a3(rgyud 'grel): sred dang rgyud sogs rnam par spangs/ /snyan par smra zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ /bzod can brtan dang brtson 'grus ldan/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bo ru /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /'khor lo yang dag de nyid kyis/ /slob ma sreg sogs rnam par spangs/ /dbang
29a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur thob cing blo ldan bzod/ /brtson dang dran pa la sogs ldan/ /dam tshig spyad bya spyod pa rnams/ /rgan pa'i rim pa bzhin du 'dod/ /dbang ma thob pas mi rigs bar/ /sgrub pos 'khor lo de bya'o/ /me tog bdug ba byug pa mar me ldan/ /sna tshogs ston so? btung bas rnam
29a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cing/ /mal stan dang ni yon tan bcas pa yis/ /'phags pa'i skye ba mang po 'am ni tshogs pa la'o/ /de nas tshogs kyi gtso bo'i gdan/ /ro 'am stag rags ra shun la bya'o/ /rgyan ni 'dam pag gis dang bya ba'o/ /phyi rol med pa'i phyag rgyas 'khyud/ /rang gi slob
29a6(rgyud 'grel): ma longs su bskor/ /des kyang rang rig ma la 'khyud/ /mi nas bsam gtan dag gis bya/ /slob mchog shes shing dran/ /brtson 'grus bzod dang ldan pa dang/ /bla ma la gus blo mthun pa/ /las kyi rdo rje rab tu bya/ /dbang bskur yang ni gdug can dang/ /thob dang rgyun can dag dang
29a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dbang ma thob par 'khor lo gang/ /ring ba nas kyang bstan mi bya/ /bla mas bde chen bsgom byas nas/ /'byung po kun la gtor ma sbyin/ /stongs la sogs pa sbyang byas la/ /me tog gis ni rang lus mchog// /snod ni re re kun la sbyin/ /bla ma la ni snod gnyis dbul//
29b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nas mtshan bza' btung ba sogs gnyis 'gyur ro/ /de nas rang zhal thab khung du/ /rnam rig sA li'i mchod yon bya/ /lag pa dag ni dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis/ /yid kyi me la stobs sogs bsreg/ /nad gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis/ /rang 'dod lta ni tshim bar bya/ /glu sogs
29b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni mnyes bya zhing/ /yang dang yang du brda tshig smra/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sgon ma lnga/ /rig ma rigs bzang brgyad la ni/ /cho ga bzhin du brten shes bya/ /ko la la sogs kyi shes dang/ /he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gang/ /dran pa rjes med rtsal 'byor bya/ /sgom la chags pa'i sems kyis
29b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /brtag tu sems kyis goms bar bya/ /rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas kyis/ /rnal 'byor ma dang mtshogs kyang/ /glu dang gar la goms bya zhing/ /mchog tu glu dang gar bya'o/ /'di nyid tshogs kyi srung ba ste/ /bdag nyid kyang ni de bzhin bsrung/ /'di yis 'jig rten dbang du byed/ /sngags kyi
29b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas ba'i de nyid yin/ /rgyu tu glu ni len ba dang/ /gang du rtag tu gar byed pa/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo mdun byas nas/ /de nas dri ni mtshon par bya/ /ldog? pa'i dri ni dang po ste/ /de nas bya rgod dri yang ngo/ /de nas ga pur tsan dan dri/ /glu yi dbyangs su mtshon bya ba? sgra ni dang ba? bung ba'i
29b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra/ /sgra yi mdza' du thos pa dang/ /lce spyad dag gi spra yang ni/ /phyi rol skyed mos tshal du mtshon/ /gang yang dag ni mi rnyed pa 'am/ /snod ma yin pas 'jigs ba spangs/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga sogs/ /bsam gtan gyis yongs su brtag /'khor lo'i gtso bos byin brlabs
29b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /snod skyon rjes su gzung bya'i phyir/ /bdud dang bcas pas snod de ni/ /ha cang myur min phul ba min/ /bgegs sogs brnyas ba spang ba'i phyir/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blang bar bya/ /hub sgra med cing ma g.yengs pas/ cung zad 'thungs nas legs bkang ste/ /phyag 'tshal ba
29b7(rgyud 'grel): yi khyad par gyis/ /gong gi phyag rgyas dbul bar bya/ /sgrub pa po yis yang dang yang/ /de dag kun la phyag bya'o/ /snod ni sa la bzhag pa 'am/ /gzhan la byin par gyur pa ma/ lag nas bon chad pas bcad/ /rang gis thams cad btung ngo/ /bza' dang btud ba rang
30a1(rgyud 'grel): gis ni/ /shin tu rtogs kyang blang mi bya/ /rtsod pa la sogs gang byed pa/ /de nas de ni gdon par bya/ /yang na gdan par mi nus na/ /de tshe sdig pa la btags pas/ /rang nyid gzhan du 'gro ba 'am/ /mi smra ba la brten par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje btung sogs la?
30a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gis blangs kyang nyes pa med/ /spyod lam shugs kyis phyir 'gro na/ /de ni dgag par mi bya'o/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal zhe sdang gis/ /gzhan smod dam pa ma yin pa'i/ /tshig gis smra kyang ? pa'i gtam/ /mi dga' ba yang spang bar bya/ /bzhag pa yang ni spyod gyur na/ /rtsa ba'i
30a3(rgyud 'grel): ltung dang sbom po ni/ /myur du gso pa'i cho ga bya/ /de ni ldang ba'i cho ga grags/ /rdo rje slob dpon tshim gyur pas/ /bar du gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /glu dang gar la sogs rgyun ni/ /de yi bka' yis gnang bar bya/ /tshogs kyis 'dus ba la bya ba/ /lag pa rkang sogs bag ldan bya/ shin?
30a4(rgyud 'grel): tu bag med ? rgyu yi phyir/ /btung ba mang po spyad mi bya/ /yang dag gis ni g.yengs par 'gyur/ /g.yengs pa rnal 'byor 'khrugs 'gyur zhing/ /rnal 'byor nyams pas dngos grub med/ /bdud kyi las ni bzlog par dka' / /gang yang sems ni bsrung nus pas/ /dang dam gzhan
30a5(rgyud 'grel): yang mchod par bya/ /gzugs sogs sna tshogs dag pa yis/ /de yis 'di ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /skad cig tsam yang gzhan gzugs kyis/ /ma rig gdug can gyi ni sems/ /grub 'dod dngos grub don gnyer ba'i/ /'bad pas mkhas pas gnas mi bya/ /ji snyed lus
30a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi ? 'bul dang/ /dag gi brjod pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed sngags dang phag rgya ste/ /he ru ka dpa' go 'phangs gnas/ /gang gis dug gis dum bu yis/ /skye bo rnams ni 'chi 'gyur ba/ /dug gi de nyid shes pa yis/ /dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed/ /kha cig brel
30a7(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan yod pas/ /yun ring 'dug par mi nus na/ /de yis phyag 'tshal mkhyen gsol te/ /bzod gsol nas ni 'gro bar bya/ /'di dang gzhan gyis rgyud gsungs pa'i/ /bya ba rnams ni brdal la bya/ /gang phyir myur du byas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor ba yi dga' nyams byed
30b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar tshogs 'khor lo cher/ /rang gi slob ma dbang bskur phyir/ /sgom pa la sogs stobs nyid kyis/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur/ /sgom pa la sogs de bzhin 'dir/ /yang ni bka' gsal byed pas kyang/ /gal te ltung ba med 'gyur na/ /skye ba bcu drug dags 'grub//
30b2(rgyud 'grel): bla mas tha ma'i gtar ma sbyin/ /de bzhin phyi rol lha gnyer ma/ /sgrub pa po yis phyag 'tshal zhing/ /smon lam dag ni ji ltar bdag/ /ma lus rtog pa las 'das srid dang zhib mnyam mthong rtag tu mi 'gyur ba/ /dpe med bde bar ro yas dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i
30b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje yan lag ma dang sbyar ba'i rtog pa'i phung po yongs su bcom gyur pa/ /bdag gis dag gis dge ba 'di yis de yi thabs ni myur ba nyid du ston par byed par shog /dngos po kun gyis phyag byas nas/ /dpal ldan tshegs kyi 'khor lo bsdus/ /ci
30b4(rgyud 'grel): bde bas ni gnas bar bya/ /'di ni bla ma'i rim thob pa'i/ /bdag nyid dran bar bya ba'i phyir/ /chog cung zad brjod pa la/ /mkhas pa rnams ni bzod bor mdzod/ /dngos grub kun gyi rten gyur yon tan 'gro tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi/ /cho ga gsal por bris pa'i bsod
30b5(rgyud 'grel): nams bdag gis gang thob des/ /myur du dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang yul skal bzang la chags shing/ /srid pa las grol zhi ba'i phyag rgya chen po thob par shog/ //dam tshig lnga pa zhes bya ba slob dpon pad+ma 'byung nas zhabs kyis mdzad ba rdzogs
30b6(rgyud 'grel): so// //dpal rig pa'i gnas gri ka ma la shi la'i gtsug lag khang du/ khams pa lo tsA bA ri d+harmA kI rtis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ha badzra b+ha Da rA ga sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du /rje btsun dpal gyi rdo rje'i b+ha Da
30b7(rgyud 'grel): rA ga'i bstod ba zhes bya ba/ dpal gyi rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog 'dod? nas thams cad bdag nyid gnas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /kye rdo rje bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bdag med ma yi mgul nas 'khyud/ /dbus
31a1(rgyud 'grel): skra ser po gyen du 'bar/ /zhal brgyad po la spyan gsum pa/ /mgon po de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /spyi bo dang steng nag po mdzes/ /dkar dang dmar po g.yas dang g.yon/ /gang gi lhag ma'i zhal rnams ni/ /nag po de la bdag phyag 'tshal glang po
31a2(rgyud 'grel): rta bor glang rnga mo/ /mi dang seng ge de byi la/ /g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad la gnas pa'i/ /thod pa brgyad dang ldan pa po/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /? nyi gshin rje gsang ba pa/ /g.yon pa'i phyag brgyad la gnas pa'i/ /thod par 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhabs
31a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yis? ni bdud bzhi po/ /mnyam par mnan cing gcer bu nyid ? g.yas brgyad dad sngo/ /gar mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid 'jigs/ /'dzag pa'i mgo pos rnam par brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i/ /phyag rgya
31a4(rgyud 'grel): drung gis rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor mtshan/ /dpral bar rigs kyi bdag po nyid/ /dam pa'i dga' ba yang dag thog /bde chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /baM las skyes pa'i gau rI shar/ /yan lag gnag cing g.yon na ha/ /g.yas pa na ni phra gug
31a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /tshangs pa mnan la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /ci las skyes pa'i chom rkun ma/ /bcod kyi mdog can lho phyogs su/ /phyag na phag dang cad te'u bsnams/ /dbang po mnan la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /paM las skyes pa'i sor mo nub/ /ro langs ma ni nye dbang mnan
31a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon lhung pa med g.yas pa yis/ /du spal bsnams la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /g+ha sma dI ni byang gi sgor/ /ljang gu g+haM las byung ba yi/ /phyag gnyis sgril dang thod pas brel/ /drag po mnan? la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gshin rje mnan cing paM las byung/ /g.yon na dag
31a7(rgyud 'grel): sta seng? ge gsal?/ /dbang ? ni 'jigs gzugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal puksha rI sngo la'o/ /ri khrod ma dkar shaM las byung/ /me ru nor bdag steng na gnas/ /g.yon na gsil byed g.yas pa na/ /dge slong 'dzin la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gtum mo nam mkha' i sngo bas?/
31b1(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /srin por ? las byung ba yi/ /g.yon na thod pa 'khor lo g.yas/ /phyag 'tshal srin po nyid la'o/ /Di las 'khrungs pa'i g.yung mo ni/ /rlung mtshams thags zangs ris steng gnas/ /phyag g.yon sdig mdzub rdo rje g.yas/ /sna tshogs mdog la bdag phyag 'tshal//
31b2(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung phyed pa'i gyis bzhugs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gtsar bu spyan gsum thams cad la/ /bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po khams na rnam dag pa/ /byang chub sems las byung ba yi/ /bde rab ster 'di thams cad
31b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dngos po kun gyi phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyid kyi g.yas pa'i phyag bzung ba'i/ /phyag mtshan sa bon las byung ba'i/ /bde chen 'dod pa thams cad la/ /rtag tu yang dag phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig nyi zla kha sbyar gnas sa bon/ /gnyis las skyes pa'i gtso bo
31b4(rgyud 'grel): rig mar bcas/ /nyid kyis nyid kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las ni/ /'jig rten gsum po sprul par mdzad dang ldan/ /nyid las 'di dag thams cad ma lus par/ /zhi pa'i bde stsol rig ma dang bcas te/ /shes rang chags pa bdud rtsi'i ro nyid kyi/ /gnaS
31b5(rgyud 'grel): su zhi bden phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i gtso kyi rdo rje/ /lha mo'i 'khor lo bces bstod pas/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa/ /des ni 'jig rten de mtshungs shog/ rje btsun dpal kye rdo rje'i b+ha Da rA ga'i bstod pa nyi shu pa zhes bya ba
31b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub brten? pa'i slob dpon ? po mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi la tsab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// //kyi'i rdo rje'i dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs
31b7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /rgya gar skad du ? ka rI ra sA d+ha naM na ma/ ? du/ dpal dpa' bo gcig pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub ba'i thabs/ /kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje shes rab gnyis med bdag /he ru ka dang bdag med dang/ /rdo rje slob dpon zhabs pad+ma/ //?
32a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal dpa' ? bo gcig pa bri/ /bya ming rgan po blo dman pas/ /dngos grub thob phyir rab tu bsdus/ /dang po kho nang rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo slob dpon yang dag pa la kye rdo rje las gsungs pa'i rim pas sems legs par sbyangs las ji
32a2(rgyud 'grel): skad gsungs pa'i gsungs nyams dga' bar legs par sbyangs pa'i shes rab dang/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /de nas phyi nang gi khrus dang mchod pa dang gtor ma tshogs pa dang/ rang gi snying gar nyi ma la hUM dkar po 'od
32a3(rgyud 'grel): zer lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi snang bas nam mkha' la bla ma dang sangs rgyas yang dag par gsal ba ya/ /lha mo brgyad kyi phyag na bdud rtsi lnga dang/ /ro'i bcud dang/ cang te'u dang/ 'byung pas mchod pa dang/ de'i mdun na sdig pa bshags pa dang/ byed pa sdom pa dang/ rjes su
32a4(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ba dang/ bsngo ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ sems bskyed pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas snang bcud thams cad snying ka'i 'od zer gyis bsregs la oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba AnykohaM/ zhes brjod
32a5(rgyud 'grel): pas mi dmigs par bsgom de nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis nam mkha' pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus hUM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur/ de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las rdo rjer ba dang/ gur dang/ sa bzhi la sogs ba rgyas par bsgo
32a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbus su? lo'i dbyibs 'dra ba bsgom mo/ /der yi/ baM gi/ laM/ rnams las/ rlung dang/ me dag chu dang/ sa'i dkyil 'khor zla kham dang/ gru gsum dang/ zlum po dang/ gru bzhi rnams dang/ bdag nyid gcig tu gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi rta babS
32a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ ka ba brgyad pa/ dra ba dra phyed dang/ nyi zla dang sna tshogs pa'i dar dang/ me tog la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas brgyan ba dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su bsgom mo/ /de'i dbus su pad+ma dmar po dang/ nyi ma'i dbus su tshangs pa dang dbang po khyab 'jug
32b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ drug po'i snying gar dbyangs dang gsal byed gnyis yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba dang nyi ma/ de'i dbus su aM dang hUM las bri gug dang thod pa/ aM hUM gis mtshan pa spro ba dang bsdu pa'i mtshan nyid can bsam mo/ /thams cad gcig tu gyur pa las/ bdag nyid dpal kye rdo rje
32b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa ma dang bde ba sdom pa/ zhal brgyad pa/ phyag bcu drug pa zhabs bzhi pa/ sku mdog zla ba dang shel lta bu dang/ rtsa ba'i zhal sku lta bu g.yas sngon po/ g.yon dmar po gzhan bung ba lta bu gtsigs pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad na/ rim par glang po dang/ rta dang/ bung bu
32b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ glang dang/ ? mo dang/ mi dang/ seng ge dang/ byi la bsnams pa/ de bzhin du g.yon pa brgyad na/ sa dang/ chu dang/ rlung? dang me dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ gshin rje dang/ gnod sbyin bsnams ba/ thod ba'i dbu rgyan dang/ do shal dang/ phyag rgya lnga dang/ stag lpags kyi sham
32b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang /thal ba dang/ tshangs skud dang ldan pa/ sku ser po gyen du 'bang pal?/ sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis byug pa/ phyed krung bcas pas bdud kyi steng na ? pa/ bdag med ma nag mo zhal cig phyag gnyis ma/ /skra ser po gyen du 'bang pa/ 'khor lo
32b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rna cha dang/ mgul rgyan dang/ lag bdud ba dang bska rags kyis brgyan pa/ sta? lpags kyi sham thabs can/ dri phub dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gis gtso bo'i mgu gnas? 'khyud pa/ gnyis su med pa'i man ngag gis gnas par bya'o/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las
32b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer lcags gyu'i gzugs kyiS ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dang/ bstod pa byas la/ gnyis su med par bstim par bya'o/ /oM hUM traM triM khaM hUM/ mig dang rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa/ dkar po
32b7(rgyud 'grel): sngon po/ /ser po/ dmar po/ ljang gu nag po dang/ gri gug dang/ thir pa dang/ kha TAM ga bsnams par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la mchod pa bya ste/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mi sarba ta thA ga ta zhes
33a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba btab pas bde dag he ru ka'i gzugs su gyur pas/ bdud rtsi'i bum pas dbang bskur pas/ /rigs kyi bdag pos spyi bor mtshan par bsam mo/ /de nas gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bla ma'i man ngag gis bsgoms pas/ brtags pa'i
33a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rim pas dngos grub thob bo/ /bskyed pa'i rim la dga' ba yis/ /rtsa sogs gsang sngags btu bzlas nas/ /'byung po che la gtor ma byin/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs paS rnams bya/ /ko la ri gU? blang 'dod longs spyod//
33a3(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub mi spyan bde bas bslug? /bdud rtsi lnga bo rtag tu bza' / /zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad/ /bcu drug phyag ni stong pa ste/ /zhabs bzhi bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi/ /spyan gsum po ni sku gsum yin/ /snying rje spyan ni dmar po ste/ /yan lag nag
33a4(rgyud 'grel): po byams? pa'i sems/ /gug gyen rnam dag sangs rgyas lnga/ /khro bo gdug pa 'dul ba po/ /phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na/ /rdo rje ma sogs lha mo lnga/ /khams bzhi? dag pas lha mo bzhi/ /mig sogs gti mug rdo rje sogs/ /yul sogs dag
33a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sngo? ? yang dag par ni rang bzhin med/ /dag pas dug med byas nas ni/ /bsten bya 'di dag bsten par bya/ /spyod lam dag ni ci spyang dang/ rtag tu de nyid dran byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshim med/ shes rab rgyan kyi ? po kye rdo rje rgya
33a6(rgyud 'grel): chen? ? nyid bsdus pa dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /gsal par byas pa'i dge ba gang yin des so/ /'gro ba ma lus dngos grub thob par shog/ dpal dpa' bo gcig pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon rdo rje dril
33a7(rgyud 'grel): bu ? rdzogs so/ //rgya gar kyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he badzra nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal kye rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgrub
33b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs/ dgyes ba'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e baM nyid bzhugs rje bo mgon po bzhi/ /dang po tha ma dbus las rnam par grol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rgan pa rnams kyi rkang pa la/ /dad pa spyod pas
33b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag btsal nas bris/ dang por gnas bstan par bya ba ni/ shing gcig gam ni dur khrod du/ /de bzhin ma mo khyiM bdag gam/ /yang na dben pa 'am bas mdza' ru/ /der ni bsgom pa bzang bar gsungs/ /zhes 'byung bas na gnas der ram?/ /? nyamS
33b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i gnas su bdug nas/ sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor mnyes pa nyid du byas nas/ nub mo rang gi snying gar 'dug nas/ daM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du thabs dang shes rab can yi ge hUM/ nam mkha' la bla ma dang sangs
33b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthod nas/ lha mo brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa spros nas mchod ba/ gau rI zla ba'i snod can/ /tso rI nyi ma'i snod can/ ? sI dri chu'i snod can/ /g+ha sma rI sman gyi snod can/ puk+ka sI rdo rje 'dzin pa/ sa ba rI bdud rtsi'i snod can/ tsanda? lI rde'u
33b5(rgyud 'grel): chung 'dzin ma/ de rnams kyi mchod pa/ Dom+bi ni reg bya dbyer med pa'i chags pa chen po dang rjes su chags par byed/ de nas ? mchod pa dang/ /sdig pa bshags pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas dang po byams
33b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gnyis pa snying rje dang/ gsum pa dga' ba dang/ bzhi pa btang snyoms su bya'o/ /de nas sems stong pa nyid du byed pa 'khor pa bdag tu 'dzin pa med par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas yi ge raM las sngon du nyi mI
33b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de'i ? yi ge tI lam rdo rje de'i lte ba la hUM/ de las 'od zer 'phros pas bla re dang/ sa gzhi dang rtsig par gyur/ de'i dbus su nam mkha' i dbyings kyi 'byung gnas su bsgom pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ma'i dkyil 'khor/ chu'i
34a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ sa'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du ? las 'khor lo lte ba b+hUM b+hUM dang 'khor lo gnyis dbyer med pa las rnam par snang mdzad de dang 'gyur bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dres nas/ chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su gzhal
34a2(rgyud 'grel): yas khang du gyur/ gzhal yas khang thog gcig pa/ sgo bzhi ? na bzhis mdzes pa/ me tog sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can/ de'i dbus su A li la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ kA li las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bzla ba me long lta bu'i ye shes nyi ma
34a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes dbus su hUM las rdo rje so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ gcig tu 'dres ba'i ngo bo bya ba grub pa'i ye shes/ rdo rje sems dpe'i gzugs su gyur pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te/ 'bres pa yi nye hUM las rdo rje sems
34a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' de mngon par byang chub pa lngas sku bskyed pa'o/ /zhal dang phyag mtshan ya ba dang spras sku mthun nag rdo rje sems dpa' rin chen zla ba'i gzugs can/ phyag bcu drug zhal brgyad zhabs ba ni/ dga' bar byed pa phyag dang po gnyis kyis bdag med pa la 'khyud
34a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems zla ba/ gau rI brgya byin phyogs su gnas/ tsaM rI yi dags phyogs su gnas/ ded+d+hA? chu bdag phyogs sdu? gnas/ /g+hasna rI gnod sbyin phyogs su gnas/ /bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i tshul du so/ /gtsigs
34a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs can sgong? gnas pa'o/ /puk+ka sI 'joms pa'i gzugs can/ dbang grwar ru gnas/ sa ba rI me'i grwar du gnas/ tsaN+Da lI bden bral gyi ? gnas /Tom bi rlung gi ? gnas pa'o/ /gaM tsaM/ gaM b+haM?/ yaM/ saM/ laM/ DaM sa bon las sku ? nas dbyung
34a7(rgyud 'grel): par? gau ? phyag g.yas na? gri g.yon na nya/ tso rI g.yas na rde'u chung g.yon na? ? lha sma rI gyas na sngal/ g.yon na pad+ma'i snod/ puk+ka lI g.yas seng ge g.yon dgra sta/ sa ba rI g.yas na dge slong g.yon na gseg shang/ tsaN+Da lI g.yas ?
34b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na thong ba/ Dom+bi ni g.yas rdo rje g.yon sdig mdzub?/ gau rI kha dog nag mo/ tso rI mdog dmar /bet+tA li mdog ser/ g+hasma rI mdog ljang/ buk+ka sI mdog bsngo/ sa pa rI mdog dkar/ tsaN+Da lI nam mkha' i mdog/ Tom+biM? ni kha dog sna tshogs thams cad spyan gsum pa/ skra grol pa/
34b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa thams cad bzhengs nas/ brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ thams cad kyang phyag gnyis pa/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ drag po dang/ gshin rje dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lha ma yan rnams/ gau rI la sogs pa rnams kyi gdan no//
34b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum dang bcas pa 'dod chags chen po zhus nas/ de nas lha mo bzhis bsrul pa/ sna tshogs glu yis mchod/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i thugs rje yis/ /puk+ko si 'di bdag la skyobs/ /bde ba chen po spong 'dod pas/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin
34b4(rgyud 'grel): bsal te bzhengs/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal nas ni/ /sa ba rI la dngos grub gsol/ /gal te gson par mchi bzheng na/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje bzhengs su gsol/ /tsaN+Da lI ni bdag gis su/ /mthong ba med nas gsol ba yis/ /ci'i phyir na stong par bzhugs/ /sngon smon?
34b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du dpa' bo rol?/ /bdag ni rom+bi'i? mchan ma med/ /khyod kyis sems ni shes pa ste/ /thugs rje med pa de mi rung/ /sgyu 'phrul lta bur bzhengs su gsol/ /dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis pa las ni sa bon 'gyur/ /gsum pa la ni gzugs rdzogs te//
34b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgong/ /bdag po dga' ma sa bon gnyis/ /bar ma 'jigs ba sngon po gnyis/ A:hUM gnyis kyi 'od zer las/ /rdo rje chen po bzhengs ba'o/ /lha yi gzugs su 'phros nas ni/ /nam mkha' i khams ni yongs gang ba'o/ /snying gar A:hUM? la
34b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas/ /rnal 'byor ? d+ha ra zhes/ /zhe sdang chen po'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /zhabs bzhi sa la mnan pa yis/ /lha dang lha min 'jigs par byed/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed/ /bdag med ma la bde ba ster/ rtog pa med pa'i bde ba rnyed/ /rtog pa med pa'i
35a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gzugs/ /bdud bzhi rim par zhabs kyis mnan/ /'jigs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba rtogs par bya/ /nye ma'i gdan la gar thabs byed/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor gnas/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed/ /dang po zhal
35a2(rgyud 'grel): ni nag po che/ /g.yas kyi zhal ni zla ltar dkar/ /g.yon gyi zhal ni dmar po 'jigs/ /steng gi sngon po gcigs pa'i zhal/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi spyan dang ldan/ /zhal rnams gzhan ni nag po'o/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra ba byin cing/ /thal bas lus kyang byugs pa'o/ /smin ma skra
35a3(rgyud 'grel): yangs ser po yin/ /phyag rgya lnga yis sku la brgyan/ /spyan ni lta stangs khro bor blta/ /lo ni brdau drug tsam gyi tshad/ /klang po rta dang pong bu dang/ /ba lang rnga mo mi dag dang/ /byi a dang ni seng ge dang/ /g.yas kyi phyag na thod pa brgyad/ /de rnams rim pa bzhin du gzhag/ sa
35a4(rgyud 'grel): yi lha dang chu yi lha/ /me yi lha dang rlung gi lha/ /zla ba'i lha dang nyi ma'i lha/ /gshin rje lha dang nor sbyin no/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na banda brgyad/ /de rnams rim par dgod pa'o/ /sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung ba dang/ /rgod dang gshed dang 'jigs par byed pa dang
35a5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje rngam dang ni ba la sogs pa/ /'bar ba'i bar dgu ro dang ldan/ /sh+rI ni ye shes mi gnyis pa/ /ha ni rgyu sogs rnams spangs/ /ru ni tshogs dang bral ba ste/ /ka ni gad duAng mi gnas pa'o/ oM d+harmA? d+hA hU swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ mig gnyis pa ni gti mug rdo
35a6(rgyud 'grel): rje lo/ /rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sna la ser sna rdo rje'o/ /khal 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /reg byas phrag dog rdo rje'i/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o/ /sa la spyod ma lus rdo rje ma/ /mkha' la spyod ma gsung rdo rje ma/ /snying gi dbus na gnas pa ni bdag med ma'o/ /rang gi snying/
35a7(rgyud 'grel): ga'i sa bon las/ 'od nag po lcags kyu 'dra ba 'phros pas/ khams gsum gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/ mchod pa lha mo brgyad dag gis bya'o/ /de nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba badzra ta thA ga ta/ rdzogs nas thams cad he ru ka/
35b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun kyi dbang bskur mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin chu/ /bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas me tog gi char dang/ ras dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ gur gum chad du phab pa yis/ nam mkha' i khams sna tshogs pa'i sgra yis gang nas/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugS
35b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod pa byas nas/ lo tsan la sogs pa yis/ /rdo rje'i glus kyang bstod par byed/ de ltang dbang bskur zin nas/ mi bskyod pa 'khor lo'i gzugs can/ rna ba snang ba mdza' yas kyi bdag nyid/ mgul du rin chen 'byung ldan/ /ska rags don yod grub pa/ gdu bu rnam par snang
35b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi rang bzhin du dran par bya'o/ /phyag rgya lnga rnams par dag pa rigs lnga'o/ /snying rje rnam par dag pos spyan dmar po/ byams pa rnam par dag pa mdog nag po/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa lpags pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par dag pa rus pa/
35b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas lnga'o/ /gdug pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/ khro bo'i gzugs so/ /sha rnam par dag pa puk+ka sI'o/ /khrag rnam par dag pa sa ba lI'o?/ /byang chub rnam par dag pa tsaN+Da lI'o/ /rkang rnam par dag pa Dom+bi'o/ /rnam par thar pa
35b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rnam par dag pa zhal brgyad lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag pa spyan gsum/ stong pa bcu drug rnam par dag pa phyag bcu drug/ bdud bzhi rnam par dag ba zhabs bzhi/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung
35b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ gau rI la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi'o/ /sa rnam par dag pas puk+ka sI'o/ /chu rnam par dag pas pa rI'o/ /me rnam par dag pa tsaN+Da lI'o/ /rlung rnam par dag pa Dom+bi ru gsungs so/ /dus gsum du gnas pa las langs nas lha'i
35b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa med na sngags kyis bzlas ba byas te/ oM de ba bi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ bya ba thams cad he ru ka'i gzugs su bya ste/ dngos grub gang 'dod kyang rung ste/ he ru ka'i gzugs su bya'o/ /zla ba drug tu 'dug na dngos grub 'byung ste/ 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa'i bsam pa med na/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur ro/ /bsgul? bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/ /brjod pa thams cad sngags yin te/ /he ru ka ni gnas pa ni/ /rnam shes yang dag shes pa yin/ /rgyud las sgrub
36a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs bsdus pa'o/ /shes dang mi shes mi dgongs pas/ /zab mo tshul ni gsal byed pa/ /shes rab 'o ma'i rgya mtsho las/ /skad cig man ngag srubs shing gis/ /slob dpon bde ba'i man ngag gis/ /bsdus par bdud rtsi za ba ltar/ /de yis blo
36a3(rgyud 'grel): yes shes pa yin/ /he ru ka yi sgrub thabs 'di/ /legs par gsal bar byas pa ni/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud las brtsams/ /de bzhin gsungs pa'i rim pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams 'di dang ni/ /dpal gyi sngags kyis rim brjod pas/ /yin
36a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub man dge bas/ /myur bar sems can grol gyur cig /bla ma dang ni/ /pha ma dang/ /'khor mi rnams kyi thos dga' ba/ /byang chub snying por byas pa 'di/ /sngon du dran pa'i ye shes kyis/ /de nyid brjod pa byas pa 'dis/ /dpal gyi yid ni
36a5(rgyud 'grel): rnyed par shog/ /he badzra'i sgrub thabs slob dpon byang chub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI baM ka ra tsan+d+ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba lha btsan po mu ni rA dzas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad
36a6(rgyud 'grel): du/ shI he badzra ho ma b+hi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal kyi rdo rje las sbyin sreg gi ce ba/ /kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan mkha' 'gro 'gro ba'i ? na/ /lha mo dang bcas 'khor lo la/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni sbyin sreg gis/ /rim pa yang dag bshad par bya//
36a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bas bya ba'i ? las ni/ /las ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa/ /ni dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod/ /de yi rim pa ma nor bar/ /mdor bsdus rim pa bshad par bya/ /zhal bsro chog bya ba la/ /rgyas pa'i las ni mchog yin te/ /rgyas nas
36b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te las rnams kyi/ /rim pa rab tu bshad par bya/ /me thab rim pa bshad bya ste/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi pa/ /zhi ba la ni zlum por 'dod/ /dbang la gzhu yi dbyibs can te/ /gsod pa la ni gru gsum shis/ /yang na las kun byed pa'i mchog/ khru gang dang
36b2(rgyud 'grel): ni khru do nyid/ /rgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu 'dod/ /khru gang dang ni de yi phyed/ /zhi pa'i steng dang 'og tu 'dod/ /gzhu la bzhi bcu nyi shu kho/ /zabs su sor bcu dbang gi yin/ /ngos gsum sor ni nyi shu la// zabs su de phyed bsad la 'dod/ /rgyas pa kha dog ser
36b3(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ /zhi ba dkar por shes par bya/ /dbang la dmar por rab tu grags/ /de bzhin gsod la nag por 'dod/ /dgug pa'i las ni dbang du bya/ /mngon spyod du ni zhe sdang sogs/ /rgyas pa dbus su rin chen he/ /shar du rdo rje stor 'khor lo/ /nub tu pad+ma ral gri byad//
36b4(rgyud 'grel): ser bzhi 'gyed par byas pa'i phyi / /kha khyer sor bzhi rdo rjes bskor/ /phyi rol sor bzhi bor la yang/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba gtang bar bya/ /zhi ba'i phyag mtshan rim pa yang/ /dbus su 'khor lo shar rdo rje/ /lho ru rin chen nub pad+ma/ /byang du ral gri shes par bya/ /tsan dan
36b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po byugs pa'o/ /dbang gi phyag mtshan rim bshad bya/ /kha khyer spyi dang mthun pa ste/ /dbus la rdo rje rab dang/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bya/ /phyi ma spyir mthun dmang pos byugs/ /mngon spyad mtshan nyid bshad bya ste/ /kha khyer sor gsum rdo rjes bskor
36b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su ral gri phyi ma ni/ /bla ma'i zhal shes nag pos byug /rgyas pa sher du bltas la bya/ /zhi ba la ni byang du 'dod/ dbang dang bskrad pa nub tu 'dod/ /drag bo'i las la lho ru'o/ /rgyas pa la ni nang par bya/ /zhi ba nyi ma phyed na'o/ /dbang ni nyi nub nas phyed drag/ zhes gang
36b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa ni me thabs kyi rim pa'o/ /mchod rdzas sreg rdzas rim zhes bya/ /sngags mkhan g.yon du dri me tog/ /dung phor bkang ba bzhag par bya/ yon chab snod ni gser la sogs/ /chu dang me tog gis bkang bzhag/ med nas las byas pa'ang rlung/ /shing ni mi shes spang?
37a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /dgang gzar blugs gzar mar mdun du/ /g.yas su dri bkang bsnod du ni/ /ku sha bcug la bzhag par bya/ /las kun byed pa'i bum pa yang/ /tshul bzhin du ni gzhag par bya/ /'byung po'i gtor ma mchog kyang gzhag/ til sogs
37a2(rgyud 'grel): sregs rdzas rim bzhin bzhag rgyal la no dang zhil til/ /dbang dang dgug la utpal dmar/ /drag po la sogs tsher can shing/ /phyi ma 'og nas bshad pa bzhin/ /thog mar mar dang tha mar mar/ /mchod rdzas dang sregs rdzas kyi rim pa'o/ /de rnams byin gyis brlabs?
37a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /rdo rje reg pa de nyid ni/ /brjod pas dri ma dag nas ni/ /nyi ma'i shes ltar dag par bsam/ rdzas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa'o/ /rlon shing 'dab bcas rtse las byung/ /srid du mdzub gang sbom chag gang/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni mar gyis byug /tsan dan dmar po'i chu?
37a4(rgyud 'grel): la spang/ /rtse gcig ni ba'i las la dbul/ /srid du khru gang sboms su ni/ /chag gang pa ni rab tu bzang/ /yal ga dbus kyi cha las byung/ /zhe dang mar dang ser po'i dris/ /spangs pa'i rtse gcig rgyas pa la'o/ /ser lnga 'dab bcas sdom chag gang/ /yungs
37a5(rgyud 'grel): mar bdud rtsi lnga la sogs/ spangs ba dbang gi las la shis/ /srid du sor bzhi tshor ma can/ /mi rus dur khrod phal chen dang/ /dug la sogs pa'i chus sbang ba'o/ /mngon spyod dag la dbul bar rigs/ /yams shing gi rim pa'o/ /de nas bung shing rim pa
37a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /pa la sha dang n+ya gro sogs?/ /las kyi rjes su mthun par bya/ /yang na 'o ma can shing mchog/ de yang las dang rjes mthun bya/ /bung shing rim pa mdor bstan pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pas/ bla ma mchod pa nas brtsams te/ ti de 'dzin
37a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa dang/ bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la ku shas bsang gtor bya/ /zhal bshal dang/ arg+ha dang/ zhal bsil dang/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod/ phyag phyir mchod pa dang/ phyag btsal bar bya'o/ /bdag gzi byin bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas rdzas rnams
37b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la/ /bsang gtor lan gsum byas nas su/ /las dang rjes mthun me blangs nas/ /rlung yab kyis ni sngar bar bya/ /sngar ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM dza la dz+nyA la hUM phag?/ mang brjod legs par sbar nas ni/ /thab khung bud shing brdzangs pa la/ /gzhung bzhin du ni mi gzhug go/
37b2(rgyud 'grel): mar gyis gzi byin bskyed byas la/ /dge dang mi dge'i mtshan brtag go/ /me sbar ba yi rim pa'o/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ 'dis ni ku sha byin brlabs nas// shar du rtse bstan dang po yin/ lho dang nub byang de bzhin rtse/ /bstan to bkram pa'i rim pa'o/ /ku sha dgram pa'i rim pa mdor
37b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o/ /sngon bsgoms pa'i rim pa'o/ /nam mkha' i khams su b+ha ga bsam/ /dbus su hUM bskyed mchod rten bsam/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa yi/ /de yi dbus su thab khung bsam/ /dbus su baM bskyed pad+ma la/ /de dbus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de steng mngon par byang chub
37b4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bsgom/ /'dod chags stobs kyis bod du zhu/ /'od las hUM dang raM du gyur/ /de gyur me lha yab yum bsam/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa'i mdog zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ga/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab 'khyud/ /g.yas na gund+he mchod sbyin bsnams
37b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na se'u 'bru bgrang phreng mdza' / /gsung ldir ral pa'i dbu brgyan can/ /rigs bdag cod pan mchod phyir thogs/ /de yi thugs kar ba'am pa ni/ /sna tshogs pad steng gru gsum me/ /de yi steng du hUM dang dza:lce la yaM ge raM bsam mo/ /bsang gtor nas brtsams phyag 'tshal
37b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /de la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /dam tshig sems dga' i mi lha'i rim pa'o/ /oM agne? mahA te dza sarba kA mANpa? sA d+ha ka/ ka ru Na kri twa sarba/ asmi nes? n+ni nyi twa b+ha pa/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa'i/ /rang gi mdun du bltas nas ni/ /bsang gtor nas brtsams phyag 'tshal
37b7(rgyud 'grel): mdza' / /phyag nas rab tu ? par bya/ /sngags 'dis dgyes par bzhugs su gsol/ /sarbA n+yai pa ra thany+tsa si ti haM ga tsa ha bya bu ka/ a ka mu ye tha ka la/ sarba sid+d+hi ku ru sha me dza:hUM baM ho/ /bka' lung gis gar dang ldan par bskul bar bya/ gau rI lcags kyus bkug nas ni rtso rI?
38a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i zhags las bzhug/ lcags sgrog gis bsdams bet+tA ?/ /dril bus mnyes byed g+hasma rI/ /gnyis su med par pa stems nas ni/ /bsang gtor nas brtsams mchodpa 'bul/ /dam tshig gi me lha la ye shes kyi me lha gzhug pa'i rim pa'o
38a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgrub pa pos rgyud rnams bsgom nas ni/ /gzar bu gnyis kyis nang du ni/ /yi dam lha yis ban bsam/ /gru mo gnyis sprad gzar bu bdun/ /so so'i las dang mthun par dbul/ /rgyas dang zhib duSh+Ti dang/ /shAn+tiM ku ru zhes pas dbul/ /dbang
38a3(rgyud 'grel): drag gnyis pa bshad dang/ /shatrI mA ras dbul bar bya/ /da ni dbul ba'i rim pa bshad par bya ste/ oM na ma:sa manda bud+d+ha mAM agna ye swAhA/ pur+Na ha man+d+ra agni ye puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA zhes pas so/ gzhan ni bUgs gzar gyis dbul bar bya'o// oM sarba saM ba de swA hA//
38a4(rgyud 'grel): zho zan gyi 'o/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha badzra a a mu ka bya sarba pA pa na hA swA hA/ /til gyi'o/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ ma phrugs pa'i dur bI 'o/ /oM badzrA yu Sha ya swA hA 'bras ma chag pa'i'o/ /oM badzra pra ti ha ta badzra ye swAhA/ ku sha'i'/ /oM badzra badzri ye swA hA/ lag pan
38a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o?/ /oM badzra mahA be ka ye swAhA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM mahA pa la ya swAhA/ bran can gyi'o/ /oM badzra b+hasma rI swAhA/ bro'i 'o/ yams shing dbul ba'i rim pa ni/ /oM adz+nyA ye swAhA/ u bum+ba ra'i 'o/ /oM bo d+hi prikshA ya swA hA/ byang chub kyi shing gi'o/ /oM badzra na da? ya swA hA/
38a6(rgyud 'grel): n+ya gro d+hi'o/ /oM badzra ha sa ga rA ya swAhA/ /a mra'i'/ /de nas ? g.ye puSh+Ti? ku ru zhes pas mar dgang gzar khebs pas stong yan chad dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas bsang gtor nas brtsams te/ /mchod nas ma lha la bstod ba byas/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' pheM? yis//
38a7(rgyud 'grel): sring ba'i rang bzhin tshig bshad brjod/ /de yan chad ni me lha ma cod pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas las kun byed pa'i chus/ /me lha bsang gtor thugs ka ru dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsang bar bya/ /las rang rjes mthun me zhal thag/ bsang nas de ru dbul bar bya/ /dza:hUM baM ho'i
38b1(rgyud 'grel): bka' lung 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor lha ni dkyil 'khor bstim/ /bsang gtor nas brtsams mchod pa dbul/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi mthar thug bya/ de nas mar gzar nyi shu rtsa gcig yan chad dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas zhol sogs pa'i rdzas rnams phuul la/ mar kyi sbyin
38b2(rgyud 'grel): sreg brgya 'am steng la brgyad kyis btags pa dbul bar bya'o/ /bsang gtor nas brtsams mar gyis mchod/ /bstod de phyag 'tshal gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin? dpa' bo yis/ /rang bzhin dag gis tshig bshad brjod/ /yi ge brgya pas bzod par gsol/ /mthar?
38b3(rgyud 'grel): mu btags snying gar bsdus? lha yi sbyin sreg gi rim pa'o/ /de nas blugs gzar 'ba' shig gis/ /lhag nas me lha'i mchod pa bya/ /oM agna ye swAhA/ /zhes pas so/ /de nas rdzas kun/ phul ba dang/ /dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni/ /de nas slob mos me tog bor/ /las dang
38b4(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i lebs pa brjod/ /oM agna ye swAhA/ zhes pas dbul/ /shAn+ti ku ru zhi ba la/ /rgyas pa puSh+TiM bshad dbang/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i dus su rnal 'byor bas bya ba'i rim pa ni 'di dag yin te/ /dang por thab khung gi bye brag bya ba dang/ tshad dang kha dog dang/ mtshan ma bri
38b5(rgyud 'grel): ? dus dang/ phyogs dang/ rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang/ rdzas byin gyis brlab pa dang/ rnal 'byor bskyed pa dang/ yams shing gi mtshan nyid dang/ bud shing gi mtshan nyid dang/ me sbar ba'i mtshan nyid dang/ /ku sha dgram pa dang/ thab khung gi byin gyis brlab pa dang/ ded dam tshig
38b6(rgyud 'grel): gi me ? bskyed pa dang/ de la ye shes kyi ma lha ? drang ba dang/ bsang gtor dang/ yang der bdag nyid kyi lha'i 'khor lo bskyed pa dang/ de la ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug gzhug bya ba dang/ der dgang blugs la sogs pa dbul ba dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa phul la/ /ye shes
38b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi ? gshegs su gsol te/ daM tshig gi 'khor lo bsdu ba dang/ /yang me lha la mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste/ ye shes kyi lha bskul ba dang/ dam tshig gis me lha bsdus la/ /rdzas lhag mas sbyin sreg bya ste/ bdag nyid ci bder gnas par bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni mA ra ?
39a1(rgyud 'grel): mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad/ /me lha'i mchod pa byas nas ni/ /mchod ba'i zhal bsil gong ma bzhin/ /so rtsi na bza' la sogs pas/ /me lha mnyes par byas nas ni/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i tshig bcad brjod/ me lha nam mkhar gshegs su gsol//
39a2(rgyud 'grel): me lha'i mchod pa'i rim pa'o/ /zab mo'i don ni man ngag yin pas 'dir ma bstan kyi yi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /sbyin sreg rim pa gsal byed pas/ /dge ba thob ba gang yin des/ /myur bar sems can grel gyur cig/ sbyin sreg gis cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon po ?
39a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ma la shI dang/ dge slong shes rab skyabs gyis bsgyur// //rgya gar skad du/ da sha tat+ta/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid bcu pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'byung ba la phyag
39a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan he ru ka dang bla ma la/ /gus pas phyag byas dkyes? pa'i rdo rje las/ /gsungs pa'i de kho na nyid bcu ba las/ /rnam pa nges pa mdor bsdus nas bshad bya/ bsrung ba dang bskur gtor ma bzlas dgar dang/ /phyir zlog pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub
39a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /bsdigs sbyor ba dang gshegs su gsol pa ste/ /de nyid bcu zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /de la don ni 'di yin te/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni yi ge baM? ser po'i sa bon las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma la/ yi ga'i las skyes pa'i nyi ma la gnas
39a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa bon hUM las? ba de yongs su gyur pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'o/ /de'i dbus kyi lta ba la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM sngon po de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/ cho ga bzhin du sa bon gyi yi ge hUM bcu rtsibs bcu la gnas pa de las skyes pa'i khro bo bcu
39a7(rgyud 'grel): bo yin no/ /de? bshar gyi rtsibs la gshi/ rje gshed sngon po'i bab snams pa'o/ /lho'i rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po be con dkar po 'chad pa'o/ /nub kyi ? bas la pad+ma mthar byed dmar po pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa'i/ /byang gi rtsibs la bgegs
39b1(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed rdo rje nag po 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la bded pa'i rgyal po nag po lcags kyu 'chang ba'o/ /mo'i rtsibs la dbyug ba sngon bo phyag na dbyug pa nag po 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral gyi rtsibs la stobs po che phyag na rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o/ /rlung gi rtsibs
39b2(rgyud 'grel): la mi g.yo ba ral gri nag po 'chang ba'o/ /steng gi rtsibs la gtsug tor 'khor los ba sbyar ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi cod pan can 'khor lo ser po bsnams pa'o/ /'og gi rtsibs la gnod mdzes rgyal po mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can phyag na rdo rje nag po ?
39b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje hUM mdzad dbu mi bskyod pas gnon pa rdo rje nag po 'chang ba'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i khro bo bzhi po gshin rje gshed dang/ shes rab mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed dang ni mi bskyod pa dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang 'od dpag med ?
39b4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i cod pan dag yin no/ /rim pa de bzhin du dbang ldan la sogs ba na bzhugs pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyig pa sngon po dang stobs po che dang/ mi gso ba dag ni mi bskyed pa dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ don yod grub pa'i cod
39b5(rgyud 'grel): par dag yin ?/ /khro bo thams cad zhal cig phyag gnyis pa ste/ g.yon gyi mdzub mo dag ni sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa/ g.yas rnams ni rang gi phyag mtshan 'char ba khro bo dang bcas pa'i zhal gdong zlum la dmar ba skra ser po gyan du brdzes pa/ gzugs ?
39b6(rgyud 'grel): pas bdud rnams bsdigs par mdzad pa/ nyi ma la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od can dag go/ gshin rje mthar byed dang/ shes rab mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed pa dag ni sdom la gsum pa 'phyang ba sprul gyis
39b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ smin ma ser dgyen du brjes? pa yin la/ gzhan rnams rol pa'i sku can yin no zhes bya ni de kho na nyid dang bo'o/ /da ni dbang bskur ba brjod par bya'o/ /go rims bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su dkyil 'khor byas la/ dkyil 'khor la bcu?
40a1(rgyud 'grel): */ pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor la bcug pa/ rgyags pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa chung zad med pa/ shin tu dad pas blta ba/ /chu dang/ cod pan dang/ rdo rje dang/ bdag po la sogs pa bdun pos dbang bskur ba'i slob ma la cho ga bzhin du gsang ba'i
40a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur gyi cho ga dang ldan pa bdun pa dang/ gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pa shes rab ye shes la sems rab tu dga' ba/ shes rab dang sbyor ba bde ba'i brdas bstan pa la shes rang yang dag par gtad
40a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs lung las gsungs pa bzhin shes rab gtad par bya'o/ /shes rab yang dag par gtad ba blangs pa'i bde ba'i brda gang yin pa de ni shes rab ye shes kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas kyang 'og tu bla ma dam pas bstan pas reg par bya ba de ni dbang bskur ba
40a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /de kho na nyid gnyis pa'o/ /da ni gtor ma bshad par bya ste/ gsang sngags hUM brjod nas bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i rnam par gyur pa dang/ thams cad bsrungs pa de'i gnas dang/ dkyil 'khor mdun da bsam mo/ /gong ma gong ma'i rim pas chos
40a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung sum brgyud? kyi dbus su chud pa pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bltas la/ /de las steng du gau rI la sogs pas dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten na gnas pa'i khyab 'jug dang/ lha chen po dang dbang phyug chen po dang/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba la sogs pa'i lha'i
40a6(rgyud 'grel): skye gnas la 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad drangs la/ sa bon gyi yi ge oM yongs su gyur pa las gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa/ sku mdog dkar po rang gi shes rab kyis 'khyud pa'i lus can/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ yan lag bzhis byin gyis
40a7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi cod pan can arg+ha dang/ btung ba la sogs pa bstabs pa/ zas la chags pa med pa'i sems kyis bsgom par bya'o/ /dbus su phyogs skyong rang rang gi phyogs su gyur pa'i 'dab mar chud pa rnams sa bon gyi yi ge hUM yongs su?
40b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las nag po chen po mi bskyod pa'i cod ban can no/ /'og tu stobs kyi rgyu dang/ mdza' med dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ 'jog po dang/ rigs sbyin dang/ dur dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po rang gi phyogs kyi 'dab mar chud pa/ lha ma yin dang bcas pa sa bon gyi yi
40b2(rgyud 'grel): ge a yongs su gyur pa las mdog dmar po snang ba mdza' yas kyi cod pan can yin la phyi ma snga ma bzhin no/ /de'i 'og tu bza' ba dang/ btud pa dang/ bdud rtsi la sogs pa bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ yaM las gyur pa'i rlung gi
40b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du ba'i mdog can gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu dang/ de'i steng du raM las gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor mdog dmar po/ de'i steng du yi ge a yongs su gyur pa'i pad+ma'i snod bza' ba la sogs pas bkang ba/ sa bon sbas byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'bar ba dang
40b4(rgyud 'grel): dros pa dag gis zhu bar gyur pa/ de'i steng du sa bon gyi yi ge oM yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba zhu ba bdud rtsir byas la dri dang me tog dang sbos dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang/ gos la soD pa dang btung ba la soD pa dang bcas ba slob dpon dril bu bdud pa la phyoD pa/ oM
40b5(rgyud 'grel): inda ya man+dza? la yak+Sha zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtorma sbyin par bya zhing/ de nas rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i sa bon las byung ba'i gau rI la sogs pa'i phyag na mchod pa sna tshogs thogs pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya zhing/ de'i
40b6(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bstod par bya/ /bstod ma thag tu/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa/ twe no pa tiSh+Tha /dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su te Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha/ sarba
40b7(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi d+haM/ me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM sh+re ya:ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho b+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+dza mahA sa ma ya satwa A:mu:zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ gtor ma rgyas pa'o/ /da ni gtor ma mdor bsdus pa 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya ste/ lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ba dril bu brdung ba la gzhol bas chos 'byung gsum gyi dbus? kyis pad+ma dmar po la gong du smos pa'i lha'i de nyid go rims bzhin gau rI la sogs pas bkug la ? tsam gyis
41a2(rgyud 'grel): sngar bsgrubs pa'i gtor ma dang dbang po la sogs pa'i sngags gyis? tshim par byas pa yin te/ phyi ma snga ma bzhin no/ /mdor bsdus pa'i gtor ma ste de kho na nyid gsum pa'o// //da ni bzlas pa bstan par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon
41a3(rgyud 'grel): du sob? pa'i rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa'i de ma thag rang gi lha nyid kyi gsang sngags bzlas pa byas shing mchod pa la sogs pa byas shing ldang bar bya'o// gsang sngags bzlas? pa ste/ de kho na nyid rin pa'o/ /dgar
41a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yang brjod par bya ste/ bstan pa la gnod par byed pa dang/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas bslus pa dang/ pa dang ma bsod pa la 'chel ba mthong na gzhan gyi las dge ba dang mi dge ba mngon par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yod pa'i rnal 'byor pas snying brtse ba dang
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa dang gus la sogs pas don du gnyer ba na bdag nyid ngan ba mi byed na yang de bzhin du las byed na yang dang yang du gnyer bar bya'o// gal te tshig mi nyan na /de'i tshe brtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las
41a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i chog drag po'i las bya ste/ de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ dus mtshams su ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros bas sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa spyan drangs te de rnams kyi spyan
41a7(rgyud 'grel): sngar de lta bu'i las byed pa'i bsgrub bya la bltas nas sangs rgyas rnamS la bsgrags par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang bar byas nas ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i sa bon kyis
41b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od gzer gyis rang gi 'khor lo'i gtso bo spyan drangs la/ rdo rje lam las pad+mar zhu bar gyur pa las zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang ? thogs pa'i gau rI gzugs su 'byung bar blta'o/ /gau rI de rang gi 'od zer rdo rje'i gzugs su spros pas bsgrub bya de'i sngags dang
41b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya la sogs pa gsal nas zhags pas bcings shing lcags kyus drangs nas 'khor lo'i mdun du bkug la/ rnal 'byor pa des ye shes sems dpa' de la /bdag ni ? ? dbang dang ni/ /mi bskyod? ngo bo la chags pas/ /smad pa'i las rnams kun 'byung
41b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /lus 'di khyod kyi spang bya zhes/ /don du gnyer ba? byas nas ni/ gau rI'i lcags kyu zhags pa yis/ /ye shes sems dpa' des 'phung nas/ /gau rI'i lag pa'i lcags kyu yis/ /bsgrub bya'i lha ba'i rtsa ba nas/ /rgyu ma ma lus drangs nas ni/ /dka' thub
41b4(rgyud 'grel): can gyi de ma thag /drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /yang na dud 'gro'i gzugs su bltas nas ni/ /spyi 'greng kha nas khrag skyug pa/ /'dar ba skyabs med pa gtil mar gyis byugs ba/ /gos med pa/ skra ? du brdzes pa de'i lam la khab mi'i gzugs
41b5(rgyud 'grel): can rab tu zhugs par bsams la/ snying gar ma'i sa bon bsams nas de thag tu bsgral bar bya'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' yang mi bskyod par bsgrubs la cho ga'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas mi bskyed?
41b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du blta bar bya'o/ /dgar ba'i de kho na nyid de lnga pa'o// //da ni bsgom ba'i phyir bzlog pa bstan par bya ste/? gtso bo gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i 'khor lo phyag gnyis rang gi phyag mtshan dang/ sdigs
41b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzub can/ /khro bo dang bcas pa nyi ma'i gdan la g.yas brkyang baS bzhugs pa/ ? ba'i gzugs can dbang ? ba la sogs pa ? la/ dgra bo'i tshogs la bsdigs pa/ g.yon du 'khor bas g.yo ba rnam par bsams la/ ma na sa man+ta bud+d+hA
42a1(rgyud 'grel): nAM? na ma sa man+ta d+ha rSha? nAM na ma sa man+ta saM g+ha nAM/ oM si tA ta pa tre oM bi ma la o shi gar/ oM pra tyaM gi ra a ? Sha/ tsakra brti sarba yan+t+ra mahA tanA mu la karma band+ha nAM/ tA rdza nI kI la naM bla ma ma kri taM ye na ke na/ tsi t+thaM taM ta ta sarba nU/ tshinda tshinda/ b+hinda b+hinda/ tsi ri
42a2(rgyud 'grel): tsi'i?/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT ? nyal ba'i dus su lan bdun bzlas nas bsgom par bya'o/ /bsgom pa'i phyir bzlog pa'i de kho na nyid sde drug pa'o// //grong la sogs pa'i rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo
42a3(rgyud 'grel): bris la/ tsibs? dang po la/ nam(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha b+hyo/ /na mo badzra mud+da ra hasta ya/ tsaN+Da maN+Da lA k+She pa ka r? ya/ che ge mo rak+ShaM ku ru hUM phaT/ lho'i rtsibs la?/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+he b+hyo/ na ma mahA raN+Da d+ha ra bi bi d+ha/ su rA su ra/ ma ?/ b+hA han+ni rmma tha/ che ge mo rakNa ku ru hUM phaT/
42a4(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi rtsibs la na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+he b+hyo/ mahA pad+ma a mri taM ku ru pi ShaM che ge mo rak+Sha ku ru hUM phaT/ byang gi rtsibs la na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+he ? mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA di ? Ta b+he ra bA ya/ badzra sando ha ? la/ oM a mri ta kunda li/ tshig ma rak+Sha ku ru hUM phaT/ dbang ldan la
42a5(rgyud 'grel): na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+he? b+hyo/ oM ya ma daN+Da ya/ nI ya daN? ya/ tu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sarba duSh+Tan/ mA ra ya/ mA ra la/ che ge mo rak+Sha ku ru hUM ? me la na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+he ?/ na mo mahA ba lA ya/ u tshuSh+ma kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ sarba mA gA nA/ h+ri nga ya a/ che ge mo rak+ShA ku ru hUM phaT/ bden bral lan ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+he b+hyo/ na mo a tsa la ka ShA ?/ tseTTa tseTTa/ moTTa moTTa/ tuTT tuTTa/ g+ha g+ha/ ?
42a6(rgyud 'grel): ta ya b+hA ta ya/ che ge mo rak+Sha ku ru hUM phaT/ rlung gi phyogs la na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+he b+he/ oM Tak+ki rA dza che ge mo da ? ru hUM phaT/ 'khor lo'i lte ba la/ oM su b+ha ni suM b+ha ra hUM
42a7(rgyud 'grel): a nA ma? ho/ ? ga tA na ? rA dza/ che ge mo rak+Sha ku ru hUM phaT swAhA/ 'khor lo'i mo 'khyud la sngags 'di bri bar bya ste/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na ma sa man+ta d+harmA nAM/ na ma sa man+ta so g+hA nAM/ oM sa tA ta pa tre/ oM bi ma la/ oM shaM ka ra/ oM bra tyaM gir/ oM uts? la?
42b1(rgyud 'grel): tsakra ? sarba yaN+tA? man+ta/ mu la karma/ band+ha nAM tA rA hAM/ kA la hAM ? ma kri ta/ ye na ke na/ tsot+taM taM ta sananda ?? tsam b+hI ??/ tsi ra tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swa?/ bsung ba'i sbyor ba 'dis 'khrul 'kho dang sngags la sogs pa 'jig par byed pa yin te/
42b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phyung ba'i 'khor lo byis pa dpung la btags na khams gsum pos zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur khris pa'i phyir bzlog pa ste/ de kho na nyid bdun pa'i/ /de ma thag tu dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa brjod par bya ste/ sngags ba nub tu kha bltas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa brtsams bar
42b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i sa bon kyi 'od zer gyis nam mkha' la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor drangs nas rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma la zhugs par gyur par bsam mo/ /zhu ba de las rang gi sa bon gyi mtshon gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor lo'i gtso bo la sogs pa go rims bzhin du
42b4(rgyud 'grel): spro bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa ste/ de kho na nyid brgyad pa'o// //da ni sdig pa'i sbyor ba brjod par bya ste/ rnal 'byor pa'i sems bsgom pa
42b5(rgyud 'grel): la cung? zhig /brtan por gyur cing mtshan ma cung zhib rnyed par gyur pas zla ba drug gi bar du bsgom bar bya'o/ /de ltar na yang gal ten grub na de'i tshe rang gi 'dod pa'i lha nyid kyi rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro ba can gyi ji skad brjod pa'i cho ga dam tshig la sogs pa sngon du
42b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas zla ba bco brgyad bsgom par bya'o/ /de lta na yang grub par ma gyur to zhe na/ de'i tshe thun mtshams rnams su bsdigs pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya ste/ de la rim pa ni 'di yin no/ /mi bskyod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa/ dkyil
42b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor pa nag po yongs su bskor ba/ gzhal yas khang spyan nag por bsgrubs pa bsgom mo/ /de'i 'og tu mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi ? ba byas naS ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo drangs te
43a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du ltung bar gyur ba me'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'jigs shing skrag la rab tu 'dar bar gyur pa bltas la/ de'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chogs shes rab chags pas zhu bar gyur ba rdo rje'i
43a2(rgyud 'grel): lam nas byung ba yongs su gyur ba las/ gshin rje gshed phyag gnyis pas phyogs brgyad nas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra rA dza ak+Sho b+hyaM kI la ya hUM phaT/ zhes bya bas phur bu gdab par bya'o/ 'di ni mi bskyod ba'i chog yin no/ /de dag thams cad la gdab bar bya ba dang/ 'debs
43a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed dog 'debs par byed par mngon par zhen pa med pas byas na/ 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /bsdigs pa'i sgrub pa ste de kho na nyid d? ba'o/ /de'i 'og tu gshegs su gsol ba bstan par bya ste/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin no/ /dkyil 'khor
43a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi khang pa? las byung la zhi ba'i sbyin? bsregs byas nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang bar zhugs nas mchod pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa byas nas sngos dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkrol la/ oM khyed kyi 'gro ba'i don mdzad kun/ rdzas su mthun par dngos grub stsol
43a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yul du g+hsegs nas ni/ slar yang 'byon bar mdzad du gsol/ /mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod la/ /de'i 'og tu sa tshon phyi dkyil 'khor las bskyod de/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par bsam mo/ /yi
43a6(rgyud 'grel): ge gsum ? mdza' can gyis dkyil 'khor gyis tshon phyag la dri zhim po'i snod du bcug la/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo la ngor bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyis ba byung gis byugs shing yi ge ?(rgyud 'grel): yi mdza' can gyis chogs gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /gshegs su
43a7(rgyud 'grel): gsol pa'i de ? nyid du bcu ba'i/ /de nyid bcu pa nges byas las/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags pa/ /des ni 'gro ba mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rnams ni zhi 'gyur shog/ /slob dpon Dobb+hI bas mdzad pa'i de nyid bu pa rdzogs so//
43b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ yo ga yo gI ni nAmA sa? nA lo ba de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor ba
43b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rnal 'byor ma rnams la thun mong ma yin pa'i don la gdams pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ dur khrod ha ha sgrogs pa zhes bya ba ru/ rgyal po sa munda ya zhes bya bas yon bdag byas te/ slob dpon Dom+be he ru ka la sogs pa rnal 'byor ba'i tshogs
43b3(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa 'dus te tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las/ bram ze mu pa khang? zhes pas slob dpon la ma zhus par stan las langs nas phyir song ba las/ rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi bag dang mi ldan bar rtogs nas phyir 'byung pa'i las byas te/ tshogs khang du ma bcud do/
43b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob dpon Dempi? he ru kas rnal 'byor pa rnams la gdams pa/ kye theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i lam 'di la zhugs nas dam tshig dang brtul zhugs dang 'gal bar mi bya ste/ de skad du yang rnal 'byor kun tu spyod pa'i rgyud las/ dbang thob nas ni dam tshig nyams
43b5(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo mthun byas gnas su bskor/ /bya ba thams cad he ru ka yi bdag/ tshul ma yin pa byed pa tshar bcad do zhes 'byung bas so// e ma ho rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtsod pa'i dus su kyung? na yang tshe gcig gi phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob bar byed
