129a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bla ma'i zhal las rigs par bya'o/ /de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ stong pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /khyab bdag dpe byang brgyad cu ra ldan/ /de ltar yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis/ /me long 'dri ma med pa don?//
129a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan gsal bar blta bya bzhin/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam pral? ba/ /shin tu bkra ba'i rdo rje sems/ /slob ma bzang la bstan bya ste/ /bdag byin brlabs su de brjod bya/ /de ltar ni 'phags pa ? zhabs kyis kyang gsungs la/
129a3(rgyud 'grel): de yang dzA landa ri ba'i zhabs kyis gzugs? 'gral rdo rje sgron mar bris pa 'di lta ste/ ji ltar shin tu dang pa'i me long la/ /gzugs brnyan yan lag kun ldan gzugs su snang/ /de bzhin mtshon dang dpe byang brgyad cu yis/ /phyug pa'i rdo rje 'char sku
129a4(rgyud 'grel): rtags pa nyid zhes pa bdag byin gyis brlab pa ste rim pa gsum pa'o// //da ni rnam par dag pa'i rim pa brjod par bya ste slar yang phreng ba dang chu la sogs pa'i dbang gi go rims kyis/ /mthe bong srin lag ngang gis de/ /slob ma'i kha tsa na ?
129a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /zhes pa 'dis gsang ba'i sogs pa'i dbang bskur 'byin nas gsum la khyad par gyi dga' pas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i dga' ba'i rnam pa rtog par byas te/ bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes pa'i des de'i rnam par dag pa ni med par
129a6(rgyud 'grel): dgag pa'i 'jug pas de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par rtog par bya'o/ /de la rnam par dag? ni rnam pa gnyis te gzugs dang gzugs ma yin pa'i phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi lha'i rnam par dag pa dang/ gzhan ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs la
129a7(rgyud 'grel): rang rig pa'i bdag nyid can bcu du byed sogs? pa'i gnyen po dga' ba gsum po bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa gang gi rnam par dag pa ste de bzhin nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin ngo/ /de bcom ldan 'das kyis
129b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ dngos po grags pa thams cad kyi/ /rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod/ /phyi na re re'i dbye bas de/ /lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya/ /gang gsungs pa/ phung po lnga dang dbang po drug/ /snye mched drug dang 'byung chen snga'i/ /mtshan nyid rang
129b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis rnam dag/ mi shes nyon mongs sgrib sbyang bya/ /rang rig bdag nyid dag pa ste/ /dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min/ /yul rnams dag pa'i dngos nyid phyir/ /bde ba mchog gi na rang rig pa'o/ /'dis de gsungs pa yin te bskyed pa'i rim pa
129b3(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas lha mo rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams rnam par gsungs so/ /bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'i dga' ba gsum po/ rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni rang rig pa'i bdag nyid can de bzhin nyid
129b4(rgyud 'grel): de der son zhing de la rab tu zhugs pa zhes pa'i don te 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad sdong por gsungs so/ /de kho na nyid kyi le'u yang gsungs pa/ dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing/ zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /slar yang/ /ngo bos gzugs
129b5(rgyud 'grel): med mthong po med/ /sgra med thos pa po yang med/ /dri med snam pa po yang med/ /ro med myong ba po yang med/ /sems med sems las byung ba med/ /dbang gi le'ur yang gsungs pa/ mchog dgar bsgom pa med cing bsgom pa po yang med/ /lus kyang
129b6(rgyud 'grel): med cing bzung ba med cing 'dzin pa'ang med/ /sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshad dang lce ba'ang med/ /skyug bro rnongs med gtsang sA? mtshang phyir thogs med dang/ /chags med sdang ba med dang rmongs med phrag dog med/ ser sna med dang nga rgyal med cing
129b7(rgyud 'grel): mthong bya med/ /bsgom dang sgom po med cing bshes dang dgra med cing/ /khrem gnyer med pa'i lhan cig gis skyes pa sna tshogs nyid 'di yang ci ltar shes par bya zhe na/ 'di nyid du yang gsungs pa/ gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes/ /gang
130a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyang ni mi rnyed de/ /bla ma brgyud pa nyer bsnyen dang/ /rang la bsod nams las shes bya/ /de lta na yang lhan cig skyes pa la gang du yid ches/ /brjod par bya ste/ snyoms par zhugs pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma'i
130a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes su byed pa nyid kyi phyir bla ma'i man ngag las lhan cig skyes pa shes par bya'o/ /de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de la de nyid bstan par bya/ /mchog mdza' dga' bral dang po can/ /zhes pa ste/ gang gi dang po dga' bral yin pa
130a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni dga' bral dang po ste/ lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /mdza' byed de zhes pa mdza' can no/ mchog ni rab kyi mdza' pa ste de ni de lta bu yin no/ /dga' bral dang po yang yin la mchog mdza' can gang yin pa de ni dga' bral dang po mchog mdza' can no/
130a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud rnams kun tu spas pa ste/ /mdza' yis mthar ni rab tu gsal/ /rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas/ /de la lha mo de zhus pa/ /lha de'i skad cig ji ltar lags/ /gtso bo chen po bshad du gsol/ /der ni thog ma dbus mdza' med/ /srid med mya
130a5(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das pa med/ /bdag ned gzhan ni med pa ste/ /'dir de bde ba chen po'o/ /'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ /ji ltar dbang bskur gsol gdab pa'i/ /slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya/ /bla ma phyag rgya ldan mthod nas/ /brtul
130a6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs can gyis bstod mchod bya/ /bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig tu brtson/ /sgrub po phyag rgya tha mi dad/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba/ /ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che/ /khyab bdag bdag la'ang de mdzod cig/
130a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba 'dam gyi chogs cang du/ /bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs/ /zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang/ ba la tsha mchog ma de la/ /bdug ba lha bshos phreng ba dang/ /dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa ste/ /slob ma dam pas rdo rje
130b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /mchod pa 'di rnams kyis mchod do/ /mchod pa'i bar med ston pa pos/ /'dis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba khong du chud par bya ste/ gang phyir yid kyi mi bsgom par/ /'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya/ /thams cad chos ni yongs shes na//
130b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa nyid ni bsgom pa min/ /'di dang 'di ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba rnams kyi yang de kho na nyid do/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad thams cad stong pa zhes bya'o/ /de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang/ /? lcug
130b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khri shing la sogs rnams/ /bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las/ /dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya/ /de rnams gcig pu gzhan yod min/ /bde ba chen po'i rang rig pa'o/ /mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob/ /sna sogs skyangs pa'i skad tsa ba la
130b4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa skras pa sems dpa' che/ /bde ba chen por zung bar gyis/ /de ltar yang 'phags pa lha'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ dga' ba la sogs rim pas phra mo la/ /dmigs pa la ni brten nas skad cig ma/ /zad par 'gyur ba bzhi pa'i dus su ni//
130b5(rgyud 'grel): e ma dmigs pa zhes bya ni zhig yin/ /gang gis rang dang gyi char/ /rnam dbyer med pa'i skad cig go/ 'dis 'di gsungs par gyur pa yin te/ gsum po dga' bral gyi dga' po'i dpe las/ bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i bde ba 'byung ba nyid du rtog
130b6(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas de nyid rnam par dag pa las de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pas lhan cig skyes par rtogs par bya ba yin no/ /'di ni bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes pa 'di'i don to/ /snyoms par 'jug pa yod na ye shes gang yin pa thog mar gsungS
131a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ de bzhin du 'dir yang lhan cig skyes pa rtogs pa las de ni de yang bzhi pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ba des na ldan cig skyes ba byang chub kyi sems kyi dpe las bde ba gang yin pa dang ye shes pa/ nga yin pa la yid ches
131a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyi phyir de ni de ga nyid du bshad pa ma yin kyi? 'byung ba chen po pa'o/ /gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ gang phyir 'byung pa che bde ba/ /de phyir bde ba de nyid min/ zhes gsungs so/ /'di
131a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid slob ma'i bri ba'i tshig go/ dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa/ /byang chub sems ni ltung gyur na/ /phung po rnam shes brgyal 'gyur pas/ /ma smad dngos grub pa la yod/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje yang dag sbyor/ /reg las smad 'byung chen
131a4(rgyud 'grel): po yi/ /bde bskye ba gang yin pa/ /de ni mchog dga' i byed po'o/ /zhes pa la/ ma sbrad? dngos grub gal yod/ /ces pa ni de nyid mchog tu dga' bar bshad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba las phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos grub po//
131a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa thams cad nye ba bzhi? ba'i phyir na ma smad pa ste de'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa khong du chung pa'o/ /phung po la sogs pa brgyal ba de yod na ye shes gang rjes su myong pa yin/ /des na bdag phyin gyis brlab pa ma dag par byas so/ /de bsgom pa rab
131a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi mthar son ban? ste ji srid phung po la sogs pa med par gyur pa de srid du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub mngon sum du byed par mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa/ mchog tu bde ba phung po med ces so/ /'di nyid kyang rnal 'byor
131a7(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyis 'chi par mngon par brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das ki kyang gsungs pa/ ji ltar pha las bde thob pa/ /de yi bde ba rang gi bza' / /bde ba gang gis 'chi ba ste/ /de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod/ /'chi pa zhes bya'i rnam rtog ni/
131b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs ba rgyas par ro/ /mang du smra? bas ci zhig bya/ /rdo rje theg pa'i de nyid las/ /rdzas kyi dngos por yod ces pa'ang/ /rang bzhin brten nas de nyid do/ /brtags pa'i dngos po med pa ste/ /gzhan gyi dbang ni yod
131b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /zhes pa ste la sogs pa'i sgras gzhan phyi dbang bzung ngo/ /rgyu gzhan la rten pas na gzhan gyi dbang dang grub pa yin no/ /gzhan gyi dbang ni 'gro ba'i bdag phyin? gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de dag gi dngos po med pa ni yongs su grub pa'i
131b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs lhan cig skyes par bshad pa mya ngan las 'das par yang gsungs te thams cad kyis thams cad du thams cad stong pa ni mu stegs pa rnams kyi cha shas yin no/ /de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed bar mdzad ma'o//
131b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa rnam par dag pa ste rim pa bzhi pa'o// //da ni rnam par dag pa las ldang ba'i rim pa rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de la smras pa/ ldang ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid med pa yin pa'i phyir ci
131b5(rgyud 'grel): ldang ba de ni su zhig gi yin par 'gyur zhen brjod par bya ste/ bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid med pa ni skyes pa ma yin gyi gang zhig bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam par shes pa de'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bsgom pa las ji srid
131b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed pa de srid du lngar ba ste skyed par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /'dir yang gsungs pa/ phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad/ /rnam dag ye shes rang bzhin can/ zhes ba'o/ /phyi nas zhes pa ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i de ma thag tu rang rig
131b7(rgyud 'grel): pa las skyes pa ni dngos grub po/ /ji skad du gsungs so pa/ rang rig las ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /rang rig phyir na bsgom pa'o/ /zhes ba'o/ /slar yang gsungs pa/ phyag rgya rgyu dang sbyor bral las/ /rnal 'byor snying rje thabs su 'gyur/ /stong
132a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems su brjod pa yin/ /'di nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zung du 'jug pa ni lam dang gyur du 'jug pa ni 'bras bur gsungs pa yin no/ /de gsungs pa/ rang rig ye shes de nyid 'gyur/ /rang
132a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres/ /de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /de nyid
132a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur dam pa yin/ /de nyid thams cad khyab pa po/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /'di nyid du gsungs pa/ dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing/ /de bzhin slar yang byon pa nyid/ /'dis ni shes rab rig pa yis/ /de bzhin
132a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs par mngon brjod bya/ /de la rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ /thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bgyi pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sogs thabs dang/ /bdag phyin
132a5(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'i rim pas kyang/ /kun rdzob don dam gzugs can gyi/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed/ /kun rdzob kun la lta bu ste/ don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no/ /bud med k+ko la bde ba can/ /e waM yi ge'i rang bzhin du/ /bde ba
132a6(rgyud 'grel): ba srung ba nyid kyi phyir/ bde ba can zhes brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas/ /'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste/ /'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni/
132a7(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das pa'i? rtog mi 'gyur/ /'khor ca? gzugs dang sgra la sogs/ /'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa/ /'khor ba dbang po rnams nyid de/ /'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa/ 'di rnams chos ni mya ngan 'das/ /rmong phyir 'khor
132b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs can nyid/ /rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /'dis chos 'di rnams kyi rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mkhyen pa las rgyal ba mchog rnams kyiS bdag nyid kyi skye ba gsungs pa yin no//
132b2(rgyud 'grel): gal te gzhan rnams kyis bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas rang bzhin yongs su shes par 'gyur zhing so so'i skye bo rnams kyi yin pa de'i che de rnams kyi bdag nyid 'ba' zhig pa yang ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa/ ma lus pa yi sems can
132b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /skye ba gang la brjod bya ba/ /gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir/ /de la sprul pa'i sku nyid yin/ zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par te/ sde pa sde ba zhes bshad pa/ /lto ba gnas su brjod par bya/ /skye gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur/ /mngal gyi khru ma
132b4(rgyud 'grel): chos gos yin/ /de bzhin ma ni mkhan po'o/ /mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba bslab pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin sngags bzlas a dang haM/ /skye gnas 'khor lo'i yi ge a/ /bde chen gyi yang yi ge haM/ /gcer du? skra dang kha spu breg/ sngags
132b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas kyang ni dge slong skyes/ /chogs pa 'di rnams kyis sems can/ /sangs rgyas nyid du tha? tshom med/ /zla ba bcu yangs rnams yin/ /sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/ 'di nyid ye shes chen po ste/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /gnyis dang gnyis
132b6(rgyud 'grel): su med pa'i tshul/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso/ /brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas gnas/ /sg+ha? ma'i gzugs can nyid du snang/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sogs thabs kyis/ /rtag tu nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /lus la ye shes chen po gnas
132b7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rtog pa thams cad sdangs?/ /dngos po kun la khyab byed pa/ /lus la bcas kyang lus skyes min?/ /de'i phyir bdag byin gyis brlab? pa'i de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu skye ba'i rim pa shes par bya ste rnam pa gzhan dun? 'khor bzad pa
133a1(rgyud 'grel): tsam kho nar 'gyur ro/ /'khor bar gnas pa'i bar du yang dam pa'i don yang dag par rdzogs pa'i thabs dang/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid
133a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis thob par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de gsungs pa/ bskyed ba'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa bsgom/ /spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas/ /spros pa nyid ni spros med bya/ /sgyu ma ji bzhin gyi lam
133a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /ji ltar bar ma'i srid ji bzhin/ /rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las/ /de lta nyid du dkyil 'khor snang/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur bar/ /ji ltar shes pa'i bde 'di chen po/ /de nyid de myong ba las te/ /gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med/ /
133a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar yang/ /phung po rnams nyid dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ /thams cad lha mo mang por rnam par des shing rtogs/ /de la dpa' bo he ru ka yang yin pa ste/ /'dzag med sku ste de bzhin nyid kyi ro yin no/ /kye? rdo rje'i rgyud du rang gsungs pa/ bde
133a5(rgyud 'grel): ba nag po bde ba ser/ /bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar/ /bde ba sngon po bde ba ljang/ /bde ba nag po rgyu mi rgyu/ /bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs/ /de bzhin kun tu du skyes bde/ /bde ba dngos dang dngos med ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod/ /
133a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /de yi bde ba bde chen 'dod/ /rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa yis/ /bskyed pas dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ e ma byang chub sems
133a7(rgyud 'grel): chen 'di/ /dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams/ lus kyi dngos med gang las bde/ /bde bar smra bar mi nus so/ /bya ba bya khyab byed tshul gyis ni/ /bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa yin/ /ji ltar me tog la gnas dri/ /me tog med
133b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir shes mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs la sogs med pas/ /bde ba dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /dngos ? dngos po med pa nga/ /dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa/ /gang zhig le los nyer 'tshe dang/ /rmongs pa gang gis bdag mi shes/ /rje btsun
133b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i b+ha gar ni/ /e yi rnam ba'i cha byang gzugs/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ bde ba can du rtag tu rgyu/ /'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga/ /rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa dang/ /sgrub bya 'gro ba'i ston pa nga/ /'jig rten 'jig rten pa yang nga/ /lhan
133b3(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes dga' i rang bzhin nga/ /mchog mdza' dga' rnal dang po can/ /mun pa la ni mar me ltar/ /de bzhin bus kyang yid ches kyis/ /ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mchan/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du/ /khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas/ /gsungs pa'i rim
133b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di nyid kyis/ /sngags rgyud sogs dang rnal 'byor la/ /gang gis he ru ka mi shes/ /de yis log par dal ba'o/ /de med pas na bde med 'gyur/ /bde ba med na de med 'gyur/ /nus med nyid phyir ltos bcas te/ /lha yi rnal 'byor las bde'o/ /gang
133b5(rgyud 'grel): ? lus las byung bsan/ /? zhes brjod par bya ba min/ /de phyir sangs rgyas dngos 'gyur min/ /dngos med tshul duAng 'gyur nyid min/ /zhal phyag rnam pa gzugs can te/ /mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa/ /de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes//
133b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin lhan cig skyes brjod bya/ /rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rang bzhin nyid ni mya ngan 'das/ /bzhin lag kha dog dbyibs las ni/ /lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs su ni/ /skye ba tsam gyis rnam par gnas/ /'on kyang tha mal bag chags las/ de'i
133b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lus med pas grol ba ma yin te/ de ni gang du yang 'dod par bya ba ma yin no/ /thams cad du stong pa nyid las lhan cig skyes par bshad pa na dngos pos grol ba de yang ma yin no/ /de'i phyir yang de dag ge rnam par
134a1(rgyud 'grel): grol bzhi stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i thar ba'i gzugs byang chub kyi sems ma yin no zhes bya bar nges so/ /de ltar yang kru ? zhabs kyis/ dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol bya/ /dngos po med pas 'gyur ba min/
134a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos po'i bdag nyid rnam grol te/ /dngos dang dngos ? yongs shes pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rgyud du gsungs pa/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing/ /dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur//
134a3(rgyud 'grel): de yongs shes pas grol ba yin/ /dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas /dang po bsgom 'gyur shes rab can/ /dngos po med pa 'ang yongs shes pas/ /te ru ka dpal de ltar bskom/ /yang gsungs pa/ sh+rI yig gnyis med ya
134a4(rgyud 'grel): shes te/ /rten du sogs stong pa nyid/ /ru yig bkod pa dang dral ba/ /ka ni gang duAng mi gnas ba'o/ /de ltar shes rnas rnal 'byor pa/ /gang zhig mnyam bzhag sgom byed pa/ /bsod nams zhan pas mi yis kyang/ /the tshom med par
134a5(rgyud 'grel): de 'grub bo/ /mnyam por bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor yang rnal 'byor par? ma'i 'o/ /bza' dang btung dang khrus byed dang/ /sad dam nyams yang bsam par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod bas/ /de las rtag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ zhes pa
134a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bzhag pa 'di ni rnal 'byor pa 'bring po'i yin no/ / chen po'i spyad pa spyod ba rnams kyis/ /bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang/ /bgrod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste/ /grong gi chos ni spang mi bya/ /
134a7(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan sngags bzla ba nyid min/ /bsal gtan dmigs nas par bya nyid yin/ /gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste/ /dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go/ pa la thams cad bza' bar bya/ /rigs pa la ni mnyam par spyad/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems
134b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni/ /btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya/ /grogs pa dga' bar mi bya zhing/ /de bzhin bdug la zhe sdang min/ rdo shings las byung ba yi/ /lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya/ /zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro/ /de ltar yang/ sngags kyi bzlas med
134b2(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med/ dkyil 'khor ba med dkyil 'khor yang ni med pa ste/ /de ni sngags bzlas dka' thub de yin sbyin sreg de/ /de ni dkyil 'khor pa ste dkyil 'khor yang ni de/ /mdor bsdus nas ni sems su 'dus pa'i gzugs can mo?
134b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du yang gsungs ba ji ltar dpa' bo rtog med pas/ /'jig rten pa'i gnas bcom nas/ /spyod pa thams cad spyad bar bya/ /de tshed yi sangs rgyas mthong/ zhes pa'o/ /dpal ldan te ru ka yis rgyud kyi rgyal por gsungs pa'i bla med rim pa lnga/ /dpal ldan
134b4(rgyud 'grel): dzA land+ha? ri ba? rang pa'i zhabs kyis bkod dang bla ma'i gsang ba'i bzhed/ /de thob skal pa bzang la yang dag gzhung byas ?? mchog gang thob de las/ /ma lus sems can phung po'i 'gro bas bla med rim lhangs? bar thob par shog/ //dpal kye rdo
134b5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i sgrib pa'i shes rab tu gsal bzhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dbon dpal grA can gsang ba'i ? kyis mdzad rdzogs so// //'di ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi dpal la brten nas/ 'dzam bus mtshan pa'i gling gi byang phyogs
134b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po 'srid la mang ? sbyar? zhing/ bstan pa rin po che la sred zhu dang/ bya ba lhag par bsgrub pa'i khur gyis mi ngal ba'i chos kyi rgyal po chen po/ grags pa 'byung gnas rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos lud stsal zhing/ bdag rkyen mdzad nas/ rgya
134b7(rgyud 'grel): gar shar phyogs? kyi ? cen po sh+rI? ba na rA? skabs kyi zhal ? nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsang 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis phyogs las rnam bar rgyal ba'i pho brang chen po sne gdod rtse'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //? rdo rje phan ??
135a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Sha DAM ga sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ /bod skad du/ yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor sgyu ma la bzhugs chu zla dang mtshungs lha mo brgyad kyi bdag/ kye rdo rje rnam thar bsdu
135a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos de bzhin nyid kyi zhal dang zhabs phyag sprul/ /bdud kyi snying ga nyams dga' ba yi gnas su sems can don mdzad dgyes/ /gang mkhan nam mkha' lta bus dregs par mdzad cing 'gro ba bsrung ba dang/ /dang po sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku 'dra ba/ /skyis?
135a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chu bo sgrol ba'i theg gcig pa/ /bla? ma la gus phyag 'tshal rtog pa yin/ /kye yi rdo rje'i rgyud chen rgya mtsho lta bu las/ /Domgi'i zhal snga nas kyi rim rnyed pas/ /kye rdo rje'i sh+rI yi sgrub thabs ni/ /mi shes sgril g.yogs mun 'dra ba'i/ /thur ma
135a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni brtsam par bya/ /dngos grub kyi ni sems 'di yis/ /mtshan mo'i dul su? rang khyim? dang/ /dur khyod chu 'gram de dag tu/ /'jigs pa med bar bsam gtan bya/ /snying gar chu skyes nyi ma re'o/ /gzugs brnyan hUM las khyad par bsgom/ /bla
135a5(rgyud 'grel): ma rdo rje mkhod? nas na/ /bdan po yongs su ga par ni/ /gau dI la sogs lha mo brgyad/ /mchod pa yongs su spro bar bya/ /sdig pa byas pa shags pa dang/ /byed pa yang ni sdom pa dang/ /bsod nams dag rjes yi rang dang/ /re dag yongs
135a6(rgyud 'grel): su bsngo bar bgyi/ /dkon mchog gsum skyabs 'gro ba dang/ /byang chub mchog skyabs 'phro ba dang/ /kham la gnas shing bdag kyang ni/ /gzhan kyi don du dbul ba dang/ /gnang ba nod dang tshangs pa yi/ /gnas ni bzhi po'i bsam gtan
135a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dang po byams pa bsgom bya zhing/ /gnyis pa snying rje'i bye brag bsgom/ /gsum pa dga' ba bsgom ba ste/ /thams cad tha ma btang sgoms so/ /yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ni/ /bsgom zhing 'di ni brjod bar bya/ /oM shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba
135b1(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM/ /stong bad raM skyes hUM dngos la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i bsam gtan bya/ /'gro ba'i bdud rnams sel byed pa'i/ /hUM las gsal bar spro bar bya/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /yi ge 'di brjod do/ /'di las rdo rje bskor ba'i gur/ /bla re yang
135b2(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje'i sa la nam mkha' i dbyings/ /yaM raM baM laM byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /b+h+ruM las 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag par ma'i skyes pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /'di na 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi/ /'khor lo 'di ni lnga pa'o/ /gcig 'gyur
135b3(rgyud 'grel): de las sangs rgyas kyi/ /gzhal yas khang du gyur ba ste/ /ngos bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis shin tu spras/ /lha mo brgyud kyis 'od rnams ni/ /gsal ba yin ni snam bu yin/
135b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni chu skyes 'dab ma ni/ /brgyad ba ? zhing phreng ba gcig/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /bdud bzhi yis ni rnam pa brgyan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA la ya badzra swad+ha ba At+tsa kohaM/ /sangs rgyas pho brang bye brag rdzogs/ /rnam pa lnga po bsgom pa ni//
135b5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba me long ye shes te/ /rta bdun pa ni mnyam pa nyid/ /lha yi sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /so sor rtog pa yin zhes zer/ /thams cad gcig 'gyur byan na tan/ /gzugs brnyan rdzogs ba de chos dbyings/ /A li bsgom pa zla ba ste/ /kA li rta bdun
135b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin no/ /gnyis kyi ba na i dang ?/ /de gnyis rdo rje gri gug gyur/ /zla nyi sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /'di dag thams cad gcig gyur pa/ /chu dang 'o ma tha dad med/ /de 'dra'i rdo rje bsam gtan ni/ /zhal brgyad phyag ni bcu drug pa/ /'jigs byed
135b7(rgyud 'grel): zhabs ni bzhi pa'o/ /dpa' bo thod pa'o byed pa can/ /bdag med ma yis phrag nas 'khyud/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa'i lha/ /zla ba'i nor bu kha dog 'od/ /rtsa ba'i lus mdog g.yon gyi ni/ /zhal ni dmar dang dkar dang gzhan/ /glang po rta bong glang
136a1(rgyud 'grel): rnga mo/ /mi dang seng ge de byi la/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad ba ni/ /dang po glang po rim shes bya/ /gzhi dang chu gnas rlung dang ni/ /me zla de nas snang byed dang/ /byin mthar byed dang nor sbyin ni/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/
136a2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /gnag cing gyen du bsgreng ba ser/ /gri gug thod pa kha TwAM ga/ 'dzin cing stag lpags sham thabs can/ /oM pad+ma su kha d+hA ra ma hA rig su khaM dat+ta tsa tur/ /A nanda b+ha ga bi sha hUM hUM hUM/ karyaM ku ru shwa me/
136a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ma hA dA ba tsa tur/ /A nanda dA ya ka kha ga mu khe ka rA so nA tha hUM hUM hUM/ karyaM ku tu Sha me/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa bta ba At+ma ko haM/ dang po'i skyes bu bsam de nas/ /mkha' 'gro ma de'i 'khor lo spro/ /rdo rje rjes su chags byed bas/ /
136a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i khu ba rjes su 'gyur/ /sa bon brgyad du gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig le de/ /gaM tsaM baM glaM paM saM laM DaM/ lha ma'o? sa bon dbyad pa'o/ /gau ? dbang shin chom rkun ma/ /ro langs ma ni chu bdag gnas/ /g+hasma rI ? gsus po che/ /de
136a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin puk+ka sI dbang ldan/ /ri long? ma ni byin ? grwa/ gtum mo bden bral la gnas te/ /g.yung mo 'di ni rlung gnas na/ /lha mo 'khor lo rdzogs ba'o/ /ho gnyis dbus su gnas pa ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ste/ /'di ni bar ma'i sems
136a6(rgyud 'grel): can ming/ /lha mo'i pad+mar bsam gtan bya/ /bar ma mnyam par 'jug pa ni/ /khu ba'i ngo bos rjes su dran/ /mtshams kyis lha mo bskul ba ste/ /de nas dbyangs kyi bskul bar bya/ /snying rje'i yid kyi bla med bzhengs/ /puk+ka sI ni bdag la
136a7(rgyud 'grel): skyobs/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni/ /bdag la 'dod pa'i bde chen sbyor/ /khyed mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /ri khrod ma 'bras grub par ni/ /kye rdo rje khyed bzhengs shig/ 'jig rten phyin
136b1(rgyud 'grel): smon 'dod ba'i gtso/ /ci phyir stong ba'i ngang las bzhugs /khyod mi bzhugs na phyogs mi khums/ /gtum mo bdag ni gsol ba 'debs/ /g.yung mo bdag ni yid rmongs pas/ /snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad par/ /bdag gis khyod kyis thugs
136b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal gyis/ /khyod ni mig 'phrul lta bur bzhengs/ /bskul ba'i glu'o/ /bskul bas sngon gyi byang chub kyi/ /smon lam rjes su dran pa'o/ /khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs pa ni/ /aM dang hUM gnyis rdo rje che/ /zhal brgyad zhabs ni bzhi pa ste/
136b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste/ /phyed bcas pa yi gar mkhan? ni mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che/ /g.yas pa ku mu ta dang mtshungs/ /g.yon
136b4(rgyud 'grel): par mar po chen po 'jigs/ /phyi ma'i zhal ni bu dang mtshungs/ /spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyug/ /bdag med ma la bde ba ster/ /glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/ /mi dang seng ge de byi la/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad bo ni/ /dang po glang po rim shes bya/ /gzhi
136b5(rgyud 'grel): dang chu gnas rlung dang ni/ /me zla de nas swa dbyed dang/ /gyi mthar byed dang nor sbyin ni/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/ /gau rI kha dog nag po'o/ /chom rkun ma ni btsod dang mtshungs/ /ro langs ma ni gser bsreg mdog/ g+hasma rI ni mA rkata mtshungs//
136b6(rgyud 'grel): puk+ka sI ni dbang sngon mo/ /ri khrod ma ni ? nor 'od/ /gtum mo nam mkha' i ljang gu ste/ /g.yung mo sna tshogs pa ru 'dod/ /gau rI g.yas na gri gug ste/ /g.yon na nya ni de bzhin no/ /tshom rkun ma g.yas cang te'u ste/ /g.yon na phag pa de bzhin no//
136b7(rgyud 'grel): ro langs ma g.yas ru spal te/ /g.yon ba'i lag pa thod pa'o/ /za phod ma yi g.yas ni sprul/ /g.yon ba'i lag na thod pa'o/ /puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na dgra sta 'dzin/ /ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste/ /g.yon pa na ni
137a1(rgyud 'grel): gsil byed shes/ /gtum mo g.yas ni 'khor lo ste/ /g.yon na thod pa de bzhin no/ /g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje ste/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gang gyis gnas/ /gau rI la sogs phyag gnyis?
137a2(rgyud 'grel): shes/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du yin/ /phyag rgya lnga yis shin tu mdzes/ /tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag/ gshin rje nor gyi bdag po dang/ /bden bral dang ni thag bzangs rigs/ /kau ? la sogs pa yi gdan/ /thams cad rdo rje 'di yis
137a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rang sngags yi ge rdzogs pa dang/ /phyag rgya phyag mtshan gyur pa las/ /snying gar ye shes bsam gtan bya/ /rang snying ? nyir hUM rdo rje/ /hUM ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i snying/ /pad nyir gnas pa'i hUM rdo rje/ hUM ye shes
137a4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su bsam pa'o/ /dam tshig 'khor lo la mnyam thim/ /ye shes 'khor lo chen po 'bar/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /bsgrubs te gzhan yang dam yin/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): bka' lud 'das/ /gau rI la sogs bzhi po 'dis/
137a5(rgyud 'grel): dgug dang 'di ni gzhug pa dang/ /bcing dang rjes su dgyes par bya/ /mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs/ rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum gsum/ /mig gnyis rdo rje gti mug ma/ /rna gnyis zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ /s? ni ser sna rdo rje ma//
137a6(rgyud 'grel): kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed/ /phyag gnyis zhal gcig bzang po yi/ /gra gug thod pa lag na bcas/ /sna tshogs mdog can re yi gdan//
137a7(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su ni/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ni 'di yi sngags/ /'di las mkha' spyod sa spyod ma/ /zhabs 'og gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rigs gsum dngos/ /rang snying sa bon
137b1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par spro/ /lcags kya'i gzugs kyi 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas spyan drangs yang dag mchod/ /dbang bskur pa ni blang ba'o/ /mgon po de bzhin gshegs thams cad/ /khyed kyis bdag la dbang bskur cig/ de nas de ba'i gshegs 'di dag/ he
137b2(rgyud 'grel): ru ka gzugs byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis chus gang ba'i/ /bum pa nyed kyi phyag gis bsnams/ /blugs te dbad bskur mthad ru 'di'i/ /rtsa ba'i mi bskyod phyag rgya'o/ /de ni yang ni gau rI? dang/ /? sI 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas rin chen
137b3(rgyud 'grel): dpag med yang/ /phyi ma drug la gnyis gnyis rim/ /oM sarba ta thA ge ta a b+hi Sha ka ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ 'bud pa dang/ 'dar ba dang/ thod pa dang/ lcags kyu lnga dang/ sa bon ldar gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i ro myod bad? byed pa la/ /rdo rje nas kyi 'bru? tsam
137b4(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ dpal kye rdo rje brtag pa'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mri ta sa badzra swa b+ha ba Arma ko haM/ ye shes mchod pa sna tshogs sogs/ /lha mo 'di brgyad mchod pa ni/ /sgro zhing 'khor lo'i bdag po ni/ /'khor lo'i bdag nyid pas sngon mchod/ /oM sarba
137b5(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra sA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rnal 'byor ma ni de dag gis/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo la bstod pa/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor/ /nyid kyi thugs kyis khyod dgongs grub/ /khyod ni rgyu dang mi rgyu 'khor ba kun sgrub pa/ /snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can
137b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu/ kun rje ? sa byang chub sn? pI yid/ /dgyes pa'i sh+rI he ru ka rdo rje bstod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta stu sti badzra swa d+hA ra At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje rjes su chags pa byed dang/ /sangs rgyas gzhal med bye brag bsgom/ /dbang bskur bdud rtsi myod ba dang/ /mchod
137b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bstod pa yan lag drug ? lag drug ? ? gnas na rgyur du dngos grub thob/ /pho brang sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /dbang ni mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs/ /bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med/ /bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan dpal/ /mchod pa don
138a1(rgyud 'grel): yod man ngag mchod/ /rjes chags rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /dngos grub 'di ni nye ba yi/ /yan lag drug gis bskyed ba ni/ /dang po sprin dang 'dra ba mthong/ /gnyis pa dul 'dra ba ste/ /gsum pa glog gi rnam pa'o/ /bzhi pa
138a2(rgyud 'grel): mar me 'bar ba dang/ /snga pa thams cad snang ba ste/ /sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba'o/ /phyis ni ? ma'i rnam pa mtshungs/ /rmi lam snang ba skad cig go/ lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan la sogs
138a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yang bsregs pa/ /bsregs pas haM las ri bong 'byung/ /bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor gang/ /don ni dag pa rjes su dran/ /snying rje can ni dmar po ste/ /yan lag nag po byams pa'i thugs/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/ /zhabs
138a4(rgyud 'grel): ne rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod/ /zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa yin/ /bcu drug phyag ni stong ba ste/ /phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas yin/ /kho bo gdug pa 'dul ba po/ /spyan gsum po ni sku gsum mo/ /rus pa bden pa bzhi po'o/ /gzugs ni rdo
138a5(rgyud 'grel): rje ma yin te/ /tshor ba gsang ba'i gau rI ma/ /de bzhin chum 'du shes phung/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam shes 'di ni bdag med ma/ /don dam la ni phung po med/ /de ni yan lag drug tu 'gyur/ /skye mched drug ni dag pa
138a6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rdo rje ma/ /rdo rje rim 'bar ri yin/ /phrag dog rdo rje ma de bzhin/ /gnyi mug rdo rje ma yang ni/ /yin te rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser sna gsang ba'i gau rI ma/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /sa ni puk+ka sI ru brjod/ /chu rnamS
138a7(rgyud 'grel): ri khrod ma zhes zer/ /dod? ni gtum por shes par bya/ /rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu brjod/ /gzugs ni gau rIr yang dag bshad/ /sgra ni chom rkun ma rab bshad/ /so so'i dri ni ro langs ma/ /ro yi tshul ni za bod ma/ /reg bya sa spyod ma
138b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod/ /chos kyi khams ni mkha' spyod ma/ /sa ni dang por nor sbyin mdza' / /phyug po thams cad sa 'grub pa'o/ /glang bo la sogs 'dzin pa ni/ /nang ni nye bar zhi ba'o/ /glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin smyo/ /khrag skyags mdze nad bi rdzi ka/ mched
138b2(rgyud 'grel): pa mchin pa rang gzugs ni/ /glang po la sogs rab tu brjod/ /ni rang su 'am gzhan las ni/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa bya/ /oM aSh+TA nA ya baM ga ud+d+ha ke sha lnga rtam ne tsa tu rbaM sha ti/ ne trA ya sha b+ha dzA ya/ /kA Shar+Na dzI mI twa wa pa She ka
138b3(rgyud 'grel): bla la mA lnga ne kaM d+ha ri Ne A d+ha ma ta kra ra tsitNA ya ard+hen+tu dzaSh+Ni Ne/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gardza pa bardzra ya/ taDA? ye ha ? ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ /sa pta ? ga tA na/ band+ha band+ha/ hA sha aSh+Ta k'na/ grih+na grih+na sha trA/ ha hA hi hA hU haM ha ha ha haM/ haM ha:
138b4(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ bar chad thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir/ /gtor ma rgyan tu sbyin par bya/ /oM inda dza ma dza la dzakba stu ta bah+ni ba u rak+kha tsanda sudzdza ma ta bapba? ta la aSh+TA sabba i de ba laM b+huM dzaM dzaM d+ha pul+la d+hA ba mAM sa piM ga am+b+ha kedzdza sI da/ /khandi khu Ni/ phe Ta
138b5(rgyud 'grel): ga da/? /oM a shA do mu khaM sarba d+harma NaM/ A tya nu tran+na twa ta oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ /lha mo'i rgyud kyi pad+ma mar po ni/ /bla ma zhabs kyi ma'i 'od kyis phye/ /mi thub zla bas sbrang rtsi bzhib 'thungs bas/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni sbrad rtsi skyags pa'o/ /dpal gyi
138b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i stongs kyis sgrub thams phyis/ /'di las ngal bar gyur pa'i bsod nams gang/ /des thob skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i/ /theg pa 'gre bsdol ba'i rgyur gyur cig/ yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs shes bya ba/ /slob dpon mi thub zla
138b7(rgyud 'grel): bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma dam pas bka' sal pa/ /dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis/ /yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs 'di/ /shAkya dkon mchog bdag med la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad phyir/ /nus pas bsgyur ba
139a1(rgyud 'grel): gang yod ba/ /kye rdo rje'i sgrub thob shog/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ratna sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// //dpal dgyes mdzed rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor kyi cho ga dbugs/
139a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ su pa ri gra ha nA ma maN+Da lo pi ka bi d+hi/ /bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bzang po yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba 'jigs pa'i me 'byung nad dang ?
139a3(rgyud 'grel): ngan phreng ba'i 'od 'phro bar/ /lhung ba chu bur nad 'gyur bzlog dags 'gro ba nyam thag zhi bya'i phyir/ /snying rje bdud rtsi'i char gyis chus gang 'grol byams pa'i chu bo ni/ /gang 'di kun tu rab 'bab sangs rgyas bcom ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo//
139a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kun don gyi cho ga ni/ /rgyas par rig pa yong min te/ /rgyud kun don gyi cho ga ni/ /bsgrub bar nus ba ma yin no/ /de phyir tha snyad tsam gyi ni/ /rjes 'jug spros pa ma yin no/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bdag giS ni/ legs par bsdu ba 'di brtsam mo/
139a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon rnyed dang bkur ma phyogs/ /bya ba mkhas shing dkyil 'khor mthong/ /sgrub sprul legs par bsngags pa yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang rab gnas sogs/ /'dod pa'i don ni byed nus pa'i/ /
139a6(rgyud 'grel): slob mas gnyis sam gsum gyi bar/ /dkyil 'khor bri phyir gsol ba gdab/ /tshogs 'phel ba dang bgegs zhi'i phyir/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam shis pa'i/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba yin/ /bsnyen pa med na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /
139a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi bye brag rig pa yis/ /'bras du dben bar 'dug nas ni/ /lha yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /dub na de yis gsang sngags bzlas/ /'khor lo can gyi sngags 'bum bzlas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha yis 'bum/ /gzhan
139b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ni khri nyid de/ /dngos grub mtshan ma mchog thob nas/ /rang gi lus la dkyil 'khor bsdu/ /'di ni sngon du bsnyen par brjod/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /bsnyen pas bgegs kyi tshogs bcom ste/ /sa ni yongs su bzung bar bya/ /ri bo gros?
139b2(rgyud 'grel): dang grong khyer dang/ /sa phyogs yid ni dga' ba ru/ /rus ba thal ba zug rdu rdo/ /bshad bsam dag gzhan du bkrod?/ /u dum+ba da n+ya gro a shwat+tha/ /pa la sha dang ba ku lA rdzu na/ /ldan pa ru sbal rgyab dang 'dra ba yi/ /sa ni drug po rnam par
139b3(rgyud 'grel): spang bar bya/ /chu ni g.yas su 'khor pa dang/ /shar dang byang du gzhol ba'i sa/ /zur ni bzhi ste dkar 'dra ba/ /brkos naS des bkang lhag gyur pa'o/ /sngags ba rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /snying rjes gang ba'i yid dang bcas/ /g.yon brkyang
139b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsam par bya/ /khru phyed brkos nas chu yis bkang/ /gom pa brgyad ru 'gro bar bya/ /myur du 'ongs nas blta bya ste/ /de bzhin gdug na lhag par sngags/ /der nisa bdag zhing skyod ba/ /

140a1(rgyud 'grel): zur gyis nyal ba yin/ /'di yi lto ba shes nas ?/ /mgo bo rgyab sogs nas brkos pa'i/ /skyon ne rgyas pa las shes bya/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sa ? ba'i cho ga'o/ /phub ma rdo dang gseg ma dang/ /sol?
140a2(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs ngor byas te/ /rin chen 'bru sman nang du gzhug/ shin tu mthas bar brdung bar bya/ /zug thu'i nyes ba thams cad ni/ /gal te bsal bar ma nus na/ /lag pas mnan te gsang sngags bzla'o/ /de nyid stongs ldan dag par
140a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /oM ha na ha na kro d+ha hUM phaT/ sa sbyangs pa'i sngags so/ /dri chus gtor cing dag pa yis/ /sa 'di yongs su gzung bar bya/ /mtshan mo lnga ni mchad par/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /nu ma gnyis
140a4(rgyud 'grel): ni mdun gzhag nas/ /thams cad gnir? bskrad byas te/ /de rjes sar ni 'jug bar bya/ /oM a pa sa ran+tu b+ha ban+to ye ge tsetshtha na swa min/ de ba nA ga/ yak+Sha gand+ha ba b+hU tA/ b+hA ti ni/ DA ki ni/ sa ha? kri yA ba raM ba ga tsa h+raM si graM me banda/ oM hUM phaT/

140b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis/ /'bar pa'i me yis phyi rol tu/ /khro bo'i rnam pa'i phur bu ni/ /lugs su 'byung dang lugs min bas/ /bgegs rnams kyi ni spyi bor gdab/ /phur po la sogs cho ga'o/ /rdo rje dril bu la sogs kyi/ /de nyid rnams dang mchod yon

140b7(rgyud 'grel): yin de bzhin rim chen lhor/ /nub dang byang gi ? dag la/ /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dag? pa/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dab ma la/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad yin te/ /mtshan ma gsal bar?
141a1(rgyud 'grel): blta bar bya/ /phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang/ /nam mkha' i mdzod dang bzang po'i gsungs/ /gnod sbyin bdag po 'jam pa'i dpal/ /sgrib pa sel ? dngas? snying nyid/ /dbu ma kun gyi gzhir gnas te/ /sangs rgyas snying

141a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /cung zad chu skyes kha bye ba'i/ /khar thur? yang ni ba lang mchu/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni dril bu'i mtshan nyid do/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du blta bya ba/ /lha rnams sa bon rnam par bsgom/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste/ /gos dkar mo ni byang
141a7(rgyud 'grel): du yin/ /nub tu ? ma kshir? shes bya/ /lho ru sangs rgyas spyan ma'o/ /mdog bzangs dmar dang 'od can ma/ /rdo rje phreng ma mtshams nyid do/ /nang na gnas pa'i nam mkha' ni/ /gzugs med ba'i khams dag pa'o/ /gzugs khams
141b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam bar dag pa 'di'i/ /utpal rtsa ba kha bye ba /shes rab bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bzhi/ /steng gi chu skyes rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje lta bur rnam par bsam/ /dbus kyi dbyug pa ye shes te/ /thams cad sdud cing spro bar byed
141b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i bskor ba rnam pa lngas/ /gnas brgyad rnams su dkrol bar bya/ zhes bya ba 'di ni dril bu'i de kho na nyid do/ /gser sogs rdzas dang mchod sbyin shing/ /yang ni nam pa'i shing las ni/ /dgang gzar ring tshad khru do pa/ /de yi dbye ba bshad par
141b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /chu zheng sor mo brgyad pa la/ /khung bu de phyed mnyam ba bdo/ /brkos pa dang mnyam rdo rje bruM/ /kha ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma mtshungs/ /mu khyud kyang ni gru bzhi? ste/ /kun tu sor mo bzhi yin no/ /sor gnyis brkos pa de tshad la/ /rdo rje rtse gsum pa nang du//
141b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di yi khu bcud 'dzag pa yi/ /dug? mthe'u chud tshang tsam yin/ /ske rags 'og tu de yi ched/ /mdzes pa 'dab ma dag gi gnas/ /smyo byed me tog dang mtshungs pa/ /yu ba'i mgo bo dag tu bya/ /yu 'og sor gnyis rin po che/ /tha mar rdo rje sor
141b5(rgyud 'grel): drug pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ /dgang gzar gyi mtshan nyid do/ /phyed bcas khru gang blugs gzar du/ /shes bya 'di yi kha sor drug/ chu skyes 'dab ma'i rnam ba mtshungs/ /de yi dbus su zheng zabs su/ /sor gsum 'bru bya de tshad tsam/ /lci lnga pa
141b6(rgyud 'grel): yi rdo rje mdzes/ /sor gnyis mdzes par byed pa'i gnas/ /drin chen sor cig shes par bya/ /dgang gzang yu ba chad pa yas/ /gzung par 'dod ba'i tshad tsam yan/ /cung zad pra ba blugs gzar gyis/ /rdo rje sor gsum bya ba'o/ /'di ni
141b7(rgyud 'grel): blugs ? gyi mtshan nyid do/ /gser dad dbul dang byis dung/ /rdo dang shing dang zangs ma'i snod/ /'di dag mchod yon snod yin te/ /mthar yang 'dab ma'i snod sbyar bya/ /mchod yon gyi snod bstan ba yin no/ /dri yi chu dang 'o ma mngar/ /chu
142a1(rgyud 'grel): gtsang me tog dkar po rnams/ /ji ltar rnyed ? nang gzhag ste/ /spos bcug gsang sngags mngon bar bzlas/ /'di ni mchod yon sgrub pa'i mo ga'o/ /dkar po ser po dmar po ljang/ /zhe dang rgyas sogs sgrub? pa la//?
142a2(rgyud 'grel): las dang rjes su mthun pa'i dri/ /chu la sogs pa de bzhin sbyar/ /mchod yon gyi dbye ba'i cho ga'o/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang/ /dri yi dung sogs g.yas su bzhag/ g.yon du sngags kyis mchod yon snod/ /mdun du yang ni snod bzhag
142a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /mchod yon gyi snod la sogs pa dgod ba'o/ /yi ge gsum mam yi ge lnga/ /ji ltar rgyud du bstan pa'i sngags/ /ji ltar las kyi rjes mthun bar/ /mchod yon la sogs sngags su bya/ /zhi la mdza' du lta ? ste/ /rgyas la mdza' ma
142a4(rgyud 'grel): ba Sha Ta? ste/ /gsang? la hUM phaT mdza' mer te/ /dbu dang dbang la dza:dang h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mtshon yon la sogs pa'i sdigs yin no/ /dang por dri chu sbyin bar bya/ /gnyis ba la ni 'o ma ma dar/ /gsum pa nyid la chu gtsang ste/ /bzhi bar me tog sbyar bar bya
142a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum du kha yis dri yi chu/ /zhabs rtsa dag la dbul bar bya/ /oM ni ra te hUM ? zhabs bsil gyi sngags so/ /'thor 'thung la ni 'o ma dang/ /mngar pa yin no bsang gtor ni/ /chu gtsang 'ba' zhig dku shes yi/ /chun po mchod yon sngags bzlas
142a6(rgyud 'grel): oM sari shod+ha ni hUM phaT/ zhel sil rang bsang gtor gyi sngags so/ /ye shes dkar pos me tog ni/ /bangs nas mdza' sogs rim gyis dbe /zhabs bsil zhel bsil bzad zhal ni/ chol zangs ma ni lcags kyi snod/ /gser dang dngul

146b7(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de ltar glob ma la gdams nas/ /bshags dang yi rang sogs bya zhing/ /dang por gsum la skyabs su btang/ /de nas
147a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems bskyed bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad? ba'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni
147a2(rgyud 'grel): sdud ba dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum /bdag gis ? par gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas ches dang dge 'dun to/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor la bskyed byor/ /'di nas bar zhas te dang bor gzugs
147a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang/ /de nyid yang dag gzung par bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar dgyi/ /rin po che yi rigs sbyor ba'i/ /dam tshig yid tu 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang
147a4(rgyud 'grel): chub chen po las byung? ba'i/ /pad+ma rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba ? pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni so sor gzung/ /las kyi rig mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod ba'i las kyang ci nus
147a5(rgyud 'grel): ? /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed dgris nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung/ /ma brgal pa rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /mgrol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs ?
147a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyung zhing?/ /sems can? mya ngan 'das la dgod ces lan gsum gyis sdom pa gzung ngo/ /de nas slob ma mdun du bdar/ /dri yis gtor nas snying ga ru/ /rtse mo lnga ba'i rdo rje gzung/ /sna tshogs dag gis rnam 'byed pa'i/ /rdo rje spyi bor rnam par bsam/ /mgrin
147a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas ? nyid/ /de nas me tog spos sogs kyis/ /mchod ba byas nas mdun du gzhag /so shing sor mo bcu gnyis pa/ /dri yi chu dang 'o mas bkru/ /rtse mo me tog gis bcings la/ /lan bdun bzlas pa dri chu yang/ /kha dag bya phyir sbyin
147b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /oM a dzi hwa saM bar ta ni hUM phaT/ so shing las bzlas ba'i sngags so/ /oM h+rI:bi shud+d+ha d+harmma sarbba pA ba ni ? saM sho d+ha ya sarbba ba ? a pa na ya hUM/ chu sbyin pa'i sngags so/ /slob ma byang du mngon bltas bas/ /so shing ma gas bar? gnas
147b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /ba lang lpags pa'i tshad tsam phyis/ /sa yi phyogs su rab tu dor/ /steng 'phred kha tshur bltas lhung na/ /shin tu skal pa bzang por 'gyur/ /phyi'i ma kha phar bltas pa ru/ /lhung na skal pa med par 'gyur/ /bsrung ba'i don du srad bu la/ /bdud
147b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bzla/ /de nas mdud pa gsum byas te/ /slob ma'i dbung pa g.yas bar bcings/ /de nas phyir mi ldog bya'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams la spro ba bskyed/ /theg pa gzhan las ldog bya'i phyir/ /theg pa chen po che ba brjod/ /bdag
147b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med di ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /srang? ni rab
147b5(rgyud 'grel): tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /rang 'byung skal ba chen po ba/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshogs ba rnams su 'gyur/ /yang dang
147b6(rgyud 'grel): med las rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyi/ /rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa/ /spros pa kun dar bral ba ste/ /spras pa rnams kyis rnam par spros/ /lan dang bya ba la sogs bral/ /bden pa gnyis
147b7(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa yi/ /theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni/ /tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur/ /bu kye nang par dkyil 'khor ni/ /'bri bar 'gyur ro nyol cig ces/ /smras nas rab zhugs yang dag mchod/ /dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar bya
148a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod ba'i lha yi sbyor byin sa?/ /de nas gzhal yas khang nang na slob ma bcug la yang dag bsrung/ /seng ge'i nyal bstangs rab tu brtag/ ku sha'i myug rtsem nyams/ /d+hi las byung ba bsam par bya/ /dang po gcig ni sdus su bzhag/ gzhan

149b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tsham dam gtor/ /lta stobs? phyag rgyas dgra las rgyal /sngags dang bcas pa'i stangs stabs kyiS/ /shar gyi gnas ni mnan par bya/ /rim pa 'di nyid kyis ni gzhan/ /sgo nas dag gis kyang ni mnan/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon dag gis/ /rol dang bcas pas mdza'

149b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /rdo rje 'chad ba'i rnal 'byor ba'o/ /gtso bo'i slob dpon gyi'o? pus stabs tsog pu'i rkang stabs dang/ /bskor ba'i stabs dang bzlog pa'i stabs/ /oM hUM phaT/ shar sgo ba'i 'o/ /pus reg stabs dang g.yon 'degs stabs/ /bskor stabs seng ge'i mchod stabs so//
149b4(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM A(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ lho'i sgo'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang/ g.yon brkyang dang/ /sa ga zlum po'i rkang stabs so/ /oM hUM AM AM AM phaT/ nu bsgo'i 'o/ /mthun pa'i stabs dang mi mthun stabs/ /gcig bsdus g.yon bcad rkang stabs mchod/ /oM tan mA ra duSh+Ta? na/ g+ha ta ya g+hA Ta
149b5(rgyud 'grel): ya a a hUM h+ri:phaT/ byang sgo'i slob dpon gyi stang stabs dang rtags so/ /'dod pa'i don grub bya ba dang/ /bgegs kyi bar chad zhi bya'i phyir/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas lha la sogs/ /g.yas brkyang bkug la gtor ma sbyin/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /rgyab dang rgyab
149b6(rgyud 'grel): du sbyar bar bya/ /sa gdugs dang ni pad+ma sprel/ /do tsa na dang dkar po brkyang/ /dkar po bkug nas 'dren pa ni/ /lha dang lha min grub pa dgug /oM A:bA ha ni mahA bA hA ni pre ha ga hA ni sUdya tsa n+d+ra/ /sid+d+ha mu bi dza yarA dzi so ma rI dzi/ /u ma de bi gadma/ su ? pi tar ya/
149b7(rgyud 'grel): sa g+ha gra han sarbe/ ga Na? pa ti/ kA? ra ti ya sh+rI sa si de bi/ ag lo pa ga la/ a su rA su rA dza yo/ /puk+ka sI mahA puk+ka sI hUM to ho A karSha ya A karSha ya/ sa ma yA d+he pa hUM hUM hUM phaT dza:swA hA/ /spyan drang pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM ba ta li mahA ba ta li hUM hUM hUM/
150a1(rgyud 'grel): b+hak+Sha yak+Sha kA? ya/ sa ma ya tiSh+Ta dza? dzu phruM phaT swAhA? sngags 'dis rgyan drangs phyag rgya las/ /mdzub bcings se gol gsum brdabs gtang/ /mnyes par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya?/ /dri yi dkyil 'khor dru? phyir par/ /me te ? ?
150a2(rgyud 'grel): dgram par bya/ /bA la'i bza' ba rgya chen po/ /bu ram zho dang 'bras can dmar/ /mar me sogs mchod rol stabs gyis/ /shar sgo ba yi gter ma sbyin/ /oM e ka b+hI ? ta sh+rI pa/ /sarba te kan? ji gro he kra ma pA rshe pa kre ra te shu n+ya gre pi shu Sha Ta/ ?
150a3(rgyud 'grel): ga te/ mA ta d+hu ning shi Sha ta/ ko la tra(rgyud 'grel): hA du ta re bad? t+ta/ sa sA sh+rI tra kriSh? A? ka dA la b+hi b+hatsa nan tri tri ta bi na ya ka/ tsa muN+Da? tri ta/ /bi nA ya ka/ tsa mu ni gau rI bi b+hatsatsha/ u ma de bI tsa mu mA ta/ dza yAn tsa/ ba dza yA mi ci ba/ a dze ta/ a pa ra dzi ta/ /d+ha dra gA li mahA ka'i pa?
150a4(rgyud 'grel): la ga li tu dza gi nIrI?/ tsan+d+ri gau rI/ du hUM li bke/ tri ta shi shwa ri kaM bo ci dI pA tsu ba n+yA grA sma ? ta yo gi ni/ gau rI rA pi mahA ? pa/ daSh+Ta rU pa ka pA li ni/ ka pA li mA ? mA li n+ya kha Ding+ga? na/ /mahA d+hI ka/ kha Dga? par sha ha ta ya/ badzra ha sta/ d+ha nu sta thA/ ma hu su kha mahA badzra?
150a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba karma mA ? d+ha ka/ yi ga ma ? mahA ra dzA/ badzra d+hi ba ti bra b+hU? ThA/ ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya ni rany+tsa lo gi driSh+Ta kA/ i da mahA su kha ye dz+nyai nA/ a ba ha naM sarbba sarbi Na/ oM kak+ka Dha na/ ? d+ha na/ /? na/ sarbba duShtaM tAM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swa b+hA rdo rje'i stabs dang
150a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon phyag rgya'i?/ /bcas pa'i? ? byang spyan drang ste/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal bcings nas ni/ /mdzub gnyis lu gu rgyud byas la/ /oM driSh+TI hUM hA b+ha g+ha phaT swAhA/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis mnyis bya/ /so gol gsum gyis 'dis mnyes bya
150a7(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan d? ? chu yis ni/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya/ /der ni me tog dmar po dgram/ /nya skam sha skam sgog pa khrag/ til phye bag phye 'bras su ni can/ /khyad par bdud rtsi lnga sogs dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba rnamS
150b1(rgyud 'grel): lho sgo ba yi gtong ma yin/ /oM ma Ni lha dra/ burn+na b+ha dra/ su b+ha dra/ dA ya b+ha da?/ nanda kI la mahA/ kI la/ su kI la/ pad+ma shi kha/ shaM kha shi kha na Ta/ mahA na Ta/ mahA na Ta/ d+he da nI tsong nI pu bu ra nI/ d+ha nA d+ha su d+has su nu pa/ ke li mahAm su nu pa/ ke li mahA ke li/ ha si te/ kri Ti ta bak+She pa/ su sh+rI ya dub san+ti/
150b2(rgyud 'grel): i de badzro sh+ra rA ge nA wa naM/ yak+Shi yak+Shi ni/ hUM a ba ta ra a ba ta ra ba ta li be ta li/ b+hak+Sha pri ye yo gO ni/ /hUM hUM hUM phruM swAhA/ khu tshur gnyis sbyar dam bcings te/ /snying ga'i gnas su mnan par bya/ /spyan drang pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings bskor snying
150b3(rgyud 'grel): gar bzhag/ sngags 'dis mnyes par byas la gtang/ /oM du nA d+hi ba ting de 'phruM swAhA/ dkyil 'khor dmar po mngon byas te/ /me tog dmar dang se po mchod/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i zas/ /sde tshogs kyis bkang snod gzhag ste/ /zlum pa'i stabs kyis
150b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas te/ nub sgor gnas pa'i gtor ma yin/ /oM a nan+ta/ ba su ki/ ta ku ha/ karko Ta/ pad+ma/ mahA pad+ma/ shaM kha pA ta la/ ku li ka pA la/ de ba ti/ ma hA de ba te/ so ma shi khI/ mahA shi khI/ daN+Da d+ha ra/ mahA baN+Da d+ha ra/ a pA la la hu lum+b+ha ? ? na snga?
150b5(rgyud 'grel): ga ra/ mahA sA ga ra/ tapta/ mahA tapta/ sh+rI kAn+ti/ mahA kAn+ti/ ratna kAn+ti/ su rU pa/ mahA su rU pa/ b+ha dra hi kaM/ ma ho dA ga/ shi li/ mahA shi li/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ mahA nA gA/ a d+hi pa ti sarba/ b+hur b+ha pa phru phu swAhA/ zla ba khu tshur nyid bcis te/ /sa
