150b7(rgyud 'grel): me tog dkar po dang ldan par/ /'o ma dang ni mngar gsum gyis/ /gang ba'i snod ni bzhag par bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs kyis ni bya/ /byang sgol yi gtor ma yin/ /'byung 'jug la ni rdul 'tshon dang/ /thig 'goms nyes pas 'jigs pa'i phyir// 
151a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje shugs kyis tshon dang thig/ yid kyis rdo rje gdeg par bya/ /oM badzra be gA kram hUM/ nam mkha' la rdul tshon dang thig gdegs pa'i sngags so/ /dri yi mu yi dkyil 'khor du/ /lha yi gnas rdo? so so bar/ /de gdan yang dag gnas pa la/
151a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag mtshan ma yang dag bri/ /gang dag 'khor lo yongs rdzogs pa/ /mchod pas rdzogs ba bya ? du/ /bde gshegs ji ltar gsungs pa yi/ /rtsis rnams phyogs su nges par dbul/ /tsan dan dang ni gur gum nyid/ /drag? zhun? bzhin 'dod ma yin/
151a3(rgyud 'grel): ? 'di dag gi bdug spos che/ /mi skyong pa la rab tu dbul/ /gsum pa dza ti ko sha ste/ /dngos grub bskyer ba'i sngos ? dag/ phan pa la ni sbyar? bar bya/ /kundu du dang po las/ ri dags lte ba sen mo ni/ /dngos grub rab tu sgrub pa yi/ sdos? ni rin
151a4(rgyud 'grel): chen rgyal po yin/ /a ru ra dang bur mo dang/ /sha ? dra dang sha thi nyid/ /sha li ka dong ? ka/ 'jig rten mgon gyi bdag pa 'di/ /gsungs dag na? gsungs pa yi dri/ /dri yi bstan pa cos las shes ma/ /spos 'di rta? yi rgyal po ste/ /de dag
151a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i sgrub? pa yin/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil bzlas pa'i/ /dri chung dkyil 'khor gtor nas ni/ /bsrung ba byas ta phyir byung nas/ /bum pa la sogs ste bon bya/ /nag po rtsa la sogs kun spangs/ mgrin pa ring pa lte ba che/ /rdo rje sangs?
151a6(rgyud 'grel): so btags po yi/ /chus bya? gang la legs brgyan pa/ /mgul du mdzes pa'i gos kyis dkri/ /rin chen 'bar? ? snying por ldan /rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa ste/ /rgyal ba bzhi yi mtshan ma yis/ /stong pa'i logs bzhi ldan byas pa/ rnam
151a7(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ba'i? bca' ? ba bya/ /gzhan yang de 'dra 'on byang chung/ rigs kyi mtshan pa re re yin/ /bla re rgyal mtshan me tog sogs/ /mchod gtor rgya chen sta gon bya/ /de nas lus gtsang dri zhim bsgo/ /dkyil 'khor las rig yang dag bcas
151b1(rgyud 'grel): de shar? pu brgyan dang rgyan dang/ /rna ba'i rgyan dang gdu gu dang/ /sor gdungs ? rags la sogs pa'i/ /rgyan rnams kun gyi brkyen? byas pa bcod pan dmar po mdzad pa la/ /lan bdun bzlas pas mgo por bcings/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dril 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje
151b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang mtshungs las/ /bskor zhing bltos? nas chad pa bskang/ /lhag pa dbyi zhing sgo dbye ba/ /de nas 'bra re 'og gis/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol gyis byugs? ba'i/ /dbang ldan ? yi steng gnas la/ /bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /oM hUM
151b3(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ sngags ? kha ?? rgyan gzhag par bya/ /dzA bdun bzlas pa'i swa dbu dkar/ /me tog phreng pa lhag par bcings/ /tsan dan dkar po'i dri chung ba cug phreng ba'i mgo bo lag gzung nas/ /rdo rje'i dbus bcings steng bzhog la//
151b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas bdag po bsnod? yan? te/ /gsang sngags brgya ? brgyad babs pas/ /lhag par gnas nas mdun du bya/ /cig bos bum pa brgyad po rnams/ /g.yas su bskor zhing bskor ba yis/ de mtshan bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis/ /brgya las brgya?
151b5(rgyud 'grel): ni lhag par bzlas/ /de nas slong ma la sogs pa/ /bsang phyir 'khyil pa'i bum pa la/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs byas te/ /de yi gsang sngags mkha' zhig la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzus byas nas/ /shar gyi sgo dang nye bar gzhag/ shar gyi gnas
151b6(rgyud 'grel): su gnas nas ni/ /lha yi rnal 'byor shin tu ldan/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i lha mchod? phyir/ /'di ni mchod pa'i bsgrub pa bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon bsam ji bzhin/ /'jig rten spyod pa'i rjes zhugs nas/ /mchod yon snod la sogs pa rnams/ /gnas ji ltar
151b7(rgyud 'grel): ? bzhag par bya/ /dang por bad ? gsang sngags kyis/ /yo nas chod la sogs bsang gtor bya/ /oM sarba ni/ sho d+ha ni hUM ?/ /'bras bu me tog la sogs pa/ /dngos po sna tshogs bsad pa'i sngags/ /oM a:sti hA/ dung phor snod ni gnas pa yi/ /bdud
152a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi lnga sbyangs gsang sngags so/ /oM A:hUM a mA hA/ dam tshig gi chu bsang ba'i sngags so/ /oM shi hUM ? dzraM swAhA/ rnam shes 'jigs bsdad pa yis/ /lcags kyu lnga spyad gsang sngags so/ /de nas rang gtso'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /sangs
152a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku/ /ye shes phyag rgya snyoms zhugs te/ /ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par bya/ /ting nge 'dzin sgros sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang rang mtshan mar dgod par bya/ /byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs dbang/ /dbang bskur bar du yong? rdzogs? bya de?
152a3(rgyud 'grel): nas gos zung dang bcas pa'i/ /snod rnams ji bzhin gnas pa las/ /gos dbul ba yi sngags kyis ni/ /so sor lha la dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra wA sa se swA hA/ sngar ba sangs? byas pa gtsang ma yi/ /mchod yon la sogs mched pa bya/ /de nas bston pa nges
152a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod de/ /bdud rtsi myang ? dgyes par bya/ /ma tog 'di ni bzang zhing dge/ dag pa'i skye gnas las dag ba/ /bdag gi dang bas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /nags tshal las byung ro yi mchog/ gang zhig
152a5(rgyud 'grel): dri yi bdug spos mchog/ bdag ni dad pas 'bul lags ma kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /srin po 'joms shing dag byed pa/ /dge zhing mun pa rnams sel pa/ /bdag gi dang bas? 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes bar
152a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i dri/ /shangs la tshim byed dag pa 'di/ /bdag gi dad pas 'phul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /lha bshos gtsang ma thams cad ni/ /bza' dang bca' ba'i bye brag bcas/ /kha dog
152a7(rgyud 'grel): dri dang ror ldan ba/ /'bul gyis so sor bzhes su gsol oM ku ru ku ru ma hA b+hak+Sha sh+rIM sh+rIM swA hA/ /lha bshos 'bul ba'i spags so/ /oM dzaM swA hA/ 'bras bu thams cad dbul ba'i sngags so/ oM sh+ri hUM g+h+ruM dzraM swA hA/ lcags kyu lnga dbul ba'i sngags so//
152b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub ba/ /mchod ba nyi shu bya ba ni/ /hUM gi dam tshig las byung ba/ /rang gi phyag rgyas thams cad dbul/ /sgeg pa'i lag pas sgeg par bya/ /phreng ba phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /glu ni hUM gi dam tshig gis/ /gar? ni rdo rje dang bas bya?/ /de
152b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar bi baM gling bu sogs/ /mchod pa blo dang ldan pas bya'o/ /de bzhin me tog mar ma dang/ /spos sogs dngos mang tshogs rnams gos/ /sna tshogs gos dang bla re dang/ /dril bu rnga yab mdzes pa dang/ /bran po bran so pa bzhin dang/ /rta dang grang po la?
152b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs dbul/ /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i dga' ston che/ /dkyil 'khor snying bo'i nang phul bas/ /de nyid don las ma 'das shing/ /don shes pa'i 'khor lo dgyes/ /rdo rje dril bu ma stangs par/ /bstod bya bkra shis glu blang bya/ /hUM hUM hUM/ de ha d+ha? bu?
152b4(rgyud 'grel): saM sar/ d+ha ru d+hanb+ha? li ga na/ /dzau d+ha ru he badzra tu hUM/ he natAM/ te na hUM/ te na te ta hUM/ su ra na ra baN+Ti? ta tsa ra Na d+ha ru ku su ma'i mana? tha ro Sha ka ru he badzra hu hUM/ he na hUM/ te na te te hUM/ b+ha ba bi mud hi/ be she sho gu hya ni du dzi/ a er ma ra ma he badzra tu hAM/ g+ha ho ne pa Ti i? ga
152b5(rgyud 'grel): dzu tu hUM/ rlung me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ oM gyi byin rlabs bdud rtsi lnga/ /rab spar rjes su ye shes kyi/ /bdud rtsir bsam zhing yig gsum bzla/ /nang zhugs thub dbang dpag med pa/ /hUM byung rdo rje bcas pa'i lces/ /snying ge'i zla bar rgyal ba yi/
152b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ma lus tshim par bya/ /dran pa ma nyams rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad byang chub rab bsgrub phyir/ /bshad dang ma bshad pa yi gar/ /rdo rje'i gom par bya ba yin/ /mchod dang bstod pa nyer spyod sogs/ /phul nas lha rnams mnyes par byas//
152b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i grags mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /bzhag nas phyir byung chos spyod la/ /'bras dang nyi dang sha la sogs/ /chad dang bcas pa'i gtor mas mchod/ /slar yang nang zhugs rnal 'byor ldan/ /mdag nyes pa ni? bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu
153a1(rgyud 'grel): bskor byas te/ /de ru mtshan mo rdzogs par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdag pos snga dro ni/ /phyi rol sgrar yang byang nas ni/ /rgyal pa'i sbyin sreg byas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor lo rab tu mchod/ /rgyas par bya ba'i don kyi phyir/ /'chang pa'i?
153a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i chog yi/ /yan lag la mkhas yan lag bcas/ /rgyal ba'i sreg rdzas bsreg par bya/ /dkyil 'khor sgo yi phyi rol tu/ /slob ma bzhag nas de gzhug phyir/ /nang zhugs mchod pa cher byas nas/ /'khor bdag dbang blangs bden pa brjod//
153a3(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni//
153a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ dkyil 'khor bdag po'i zhal byung ba'i/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bskul/ /lag gnyis rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /'khor lo can la glu yis bstod/ /nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma
153a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /mi bskyod rdo rje bdag 'grub mdzod/ /kun? mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin ba kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' 
153a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa'ang khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzed/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdong nas grol bde bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang
153a7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyings? bdag bdag grub mdzod/ /sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi snying la bzhugs
153b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid/ /'dod mchog dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o/ /bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog/ shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag la/ /khyod kyiS 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod/ /de ltar bstod cing
153b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas pas/ /'di ltar yang ni gsol ba gdab/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo dkyil 'khor du/ /slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi/ /sems can don du bdag gsol 'debs/ /bzod pa mdzad de dgongs su gsol/ /de ltar de tshe gnad thob nas//
153b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma der ni gzhug par bya/ /de nas dbang bskur ldan pa'i/ /slob mas slob dpon zhabs dag la/ /btud nas me tog snyim bkang ste/ /'di skad ces ni brjod par bya/ /dga' chen khyod dga' ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub
153b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i tshul brtan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid gsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/
153b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /skal pa chen po bdag la gsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing/ /dpe byad rnams
153b6(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'od pa/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas slob ma'i 'dod pa
153b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /'khor lo can la gsol ba gdab/ /rnam dag che ge mo zhes pa/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs nas/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa 'tshal/ /de nas slob dpon gnang thob pas slob ma la ni dri bar bya
154a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /de nas bla ma rdor 'dzin gyis/ /slob ma sdom pa dang ldan pa/ /gos
154a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar gyon la ram dmar gyis?/ /mig dag dgab par byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa'i chus/ /bsrung pa'i phyir ni bsang gtor bya/ /me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa'i/ /phreng ba lag pas gzung ba la/ /sku gsum rnam par sbyang ba'i
154a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /yi ge gsum po rnam par dgod/ /gsang sngags zlos shing lag bzung nas/ /slob ma gzhug par bya ba yin/ /oM ki li ki lim li g+hur ni ta badzra tsa le yuM yuM yuM swA hA/ /slob ma gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /sdug pa khyod nas su
154a4(rgyud 'grel): zhig ces/ /bla ma'i slob ma la ni dri/ /sdug pa skal chen bdag yin zhes/ /'di yis 'jug phyir smra bar bya/ /de nas nang na bcug nas ni/ /rnam par snang mdzod brgya byin la/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs byas te/ /da nas dam tshig
154a5(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bya/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha bU dzau ? nA ya/ at+ma ? nirya tA ya mi/ /oM a tsarya pU dzau pas+tha na ya At+ma nI ni rya hA ya mi/ oM sa ka le satwa? pa ri tra nA?/ At+ma nI ni ryatA ya mi/ de nas rdo rje dril 'chang ba'i/ /bla mas slob ma'i snying ga ru/ /rdo rje bkod
154a6(rgyud 'grel): de der gtad nas/ /dam tshig mchog ni lan gsum brjod/ sa ma yastaM/ sa ma yA ?/ 'di ni dam tshig gzung ba'o/ /de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ dang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ nges khyod la
154a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du grub pa yang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams kyis mdun du ma smra zhig /dam tshig
154b1(rgyud 'grel): nyams par gyur ta re/ /rdo rje sems dpa' der khyod kyis/ /snying la yang dge zhugs par gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas sngon du sgrub pa yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga la bdun bzlas te/ /dung gis slob ma'i kha
154b2(rgyud 'grel): ru ni/ /sngags 'di brjod la sbyin par bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pas/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung shig/ oM a:swA hA/ bdud rtsi lnga yi chu blud? pa'i sngags so//
154b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gi ni chu 'thungs te/ /dad pa nye bar gnas pa la/ /ci ste 'dir ni me brtan par/ /dogs phyir bla mas brtan par bya/ /deng phyin chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/ /nges 'di byos shig/ ces bsko ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so//
154b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis de la brnyas par ma bya/ cig mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod par bya'o/ /sems ni rab tu dga' bya'i phyir/ /gal te 'bebs par byed pa na/ /snying gar rlung gi dkyil 'khor
154b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rlung gi sa bon rnam par bsgom/ /rkang pa'i mthil nas rlung gis gdags/ /de yi snying gar bskul bar bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi/ /nga rgyal ldan pas gsang sngags bzlas/ /sngags ni oM le lo le lo hUM A:sngags pas nga rgyal bskyed
154b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol byas te/ /de yi sngags kyi rdo rje glu/ /'jigs su rung bas gar bya'o/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzras ma ya pra te be laM ta hUM hUM hUM ho ho ho swa hA/ ye shes phab pa las bskyod pa'i sngags so/ /de nas so gol brdab bya ste/ /me tog
154b7(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba ? 'dis/ /oM pra tI tsa badzra ho zhes brjod/ /dkyil 'khor snying po rab tu dor/ /gal te bzang por ma lhung na/ /lan gnyis bar du dar bar bya /de nas de'i mgor bcings te/ /phreng ba'i ? ba sbyin par bya/ /'di yis gdang g.yogs?
155a1(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba ste/ /bla mas tshigs bcad 'di ltar brjod/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM dz+nya ma tsaka ? hA/ /'di
155a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar brjod rjes mig phye ste/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /de nas bla mas slob ma la/ /'di ltar yang na brjod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la da lta nyid/ /dad pa'i shugs kyis blta bar bya/ /khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs las skyes/ /sngags dang
155a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /sngon ma byung ba mthong ba yis/ /slob ma 'dod dang ldan pa yis/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te/ /de nas 'di ltar brjod par bya/ /oM rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so/ /oM
155a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor bdag gis de ring mthong/ /oM gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur/ /de nas dam tshig kyang brjod par bya ste/ /sa ma ya haM haM haM/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
155a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bstan/ /rigs rgyal lha mo'i mtshan ma dang/ /'dab spyan pad+mar bcas pa dang/ /lha yi gnas rnams bstan par bya/ /'di dag ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob mas slob dpon gyi/ /zhabs la gus par phyag
155a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal te/ /chibs bcad 'di yis bla ma la/ /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /khyod ni he ru ka dpal te/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis bde gsol mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi/ /yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa/ /ji
155a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar de nyid bdud rtsi ?/ dbang gi mchog ni bskur ba yin/ /de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yi/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni gsal bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog/ /ma rig nyes pa rab rib 'joms/ /gang gi byang chub bla
155b1(rgyud 'grel): med pe/ /de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod/ /dkyil 'khor shar du khru nyid dor/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor phyed tsam gyis/ /dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis par slob ma gzhag/ mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs sin?/ /
155b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyang pa'i cho ga byas nas ni/ /slob ma shis par 'dod pa'i phyir/ /bla mas bkra shis glu blang bya/ /phun sum tshogs 'dzin gser gyi ri ba lta bu'i mdog/ 'jig rten gsum mgon bri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs/ /sangs rgyas chu skyes 'dab rgyas lta bu'i ?
155b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la bde byed shog/ de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ga /'jig rten gsum ma grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /dam chos rab mchog skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /'jig rten bkra shis gnyis po dang
155b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir khyod la shog/ dam pa'i chos dang ldan zhing thos pa'i bkra shis phyog go/ dge 'dun lha dang lha ma yin dang mis mchod pa/ /ngo tsha dpal gnas tshigs kyi nang na rab kyi mchog 'jig rten bkra shis gsum pa ding 'dir khyod la shog/ dga' ldan lha
155b5(rgyud 'grel): yi gzhal med khang gi snying po nas/ /'gro la phan phyir bde gshegs dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /rjes su 'brang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis nge sni ded 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ 'dabs sar 'tshar ba me tog char 'bab lum?
155b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshal/ /mang po lha yis bsten par mgon po bstam pa na/ /srid pa mthar gyur pa yi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ sna tshogs skyon rnams rnam par gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ /dgyes pas dka' thub
155b7(rgyud 'grel): ? du nam phyed mngon? par gyur/ /dbang bcas lha rnams rjes 'brengs gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des kyang ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ chu bo'i 'gram du mchod yon phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /zhi phyir ngo mtshar gyur pa
156a1(rgyud 'grel): srid? bdag byed pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos legs par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod bzhi byed shog/ grong khyer mchog gyur ser sgyu zhes ni bya ba der/ /rmad du grags pa chen po'i lha yis mngon pa
156a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa/ /bsam yas dge bsgrubs de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ sems can thams cad la ni phan phyir byang chub pa/ /dam chos rin chen tshogs ni thub pa las byung ba/ /sems
156a3(rgyud 'grel): can don bsgrub rab rgyas brtson pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ rab tu 'od 'bar gsang lta bu yi sku mnga' ba/ /bai DUrya mdog 'dra ba'i rtsa gdan steng du bzhugs/ /skyil krung phyed bcas mi g.yo skus pa'i bkra shis?
156a4(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la gi byed bshog /shing gi rgyal po'i rtsa bar bcom ldan byams stobs kyis/ /bdud phyogs kun las rnam par rgyal chos dang mkhar/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ngo mtshar gyur pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni ding
156a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /par ? bzhugs nas bde bar gshegs ston pas/ /sa dang mnga' la shin tu ngo mtshar gsung byung ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor ba'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis nges ni deng 'dir khyod la ni byed shog/ bkra
156a6(rgyud 'grel): shis gang ni ? phan bde dam pa mchog phyir thogs/ /bsod nams bya byed pa phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan thub pa shAkya seng ges kun gsungs pa'i/ /bkra shis nges ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ dril bu bskyod cing rdo rje gsor
156a7(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis glu dang ldan pas so/ /gser la sogs pI lhan gnas pa/ /der ni de la dbang bskur bya/ /de ltar de lta'i dbang la ni/ /lha yi skyo bar gang yin pa/ de yi phyag rgyas mgul nas 'khyud/ /slob ma nges par byed du gzhug /dang po chu yi dbang gi dang
156b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa cod pan dbang yin no/ /gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin no/ /bzhi pa rang bdag dbang yin no/ /lnga pa ming gi dbang bskur bya/ /drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/ /bdun pa bum pa'i dbang yin te/ /brgyad pa gsang ba'i dbang nyid do/ /dgu pa shes
156b2(rgyud 'grel): rab dbang gis te/ /de nyid rdo rje rab sbyor bas/ /brtul zhugs dang ni lung bstan nyid/ /'di dag ji bzhin rim pas sbyin/ /bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bus chu/ /thugs rdo rje ru rab bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje 'chang bsams dbang/ bskur
156b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma rnam bsgoms pas/ /de la dbu rgyan sbyin par bya/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin bsgoms la/ /rdo rje tshigs bcad rab sbyor las/ /rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /snying gar rang gi lag bas gzung/ /slob ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgoms/ /rdo rje sems
156b4(rgyud 'grel): dpas dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni/ /diM? rang khyod la dbang bskur bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /shin tu grub phyir rdo rje zung/ /slob ma rta mchog bsgom byas la/ /lha mo sgrol mas yang dag 'khyud/ /rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur te
156b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu dgrol du gzug/ oM badzra a b+hi pa ti twaM amri? Shiny+tsa mi taMShtha? badzra sa ma yastwaM/ slob ma rnam par snang mdzad bsgom/ /ming gi dbang ni bskur par bya/ /oM badzras twa staM a b+hiShiny+tsa? mi badzra nA ma a b+hi Sheka ta/ /kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /dbang
156b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gang dang gang snang ba/ gtso de rang gi lhag pa'i lha/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rnyog med pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes blta bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung/ /rdo rje snying po'i/
156b7(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sind+hu badzras ma ma ya tiSh+Ta badzras ma ya stwaM d+ha rA ya mi hi hi hUM/ /bdag gis bde bar gshegs bcas ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsdu bar bya/ /bde ba can na bcom ldan 'das/ /nyid kyis gang cha chos bstan pa//
157a1(rgyud 'grel): de tshe gang ba'i dbang pos zhus/ /mi rnams ji ltar dbang bskur gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rgod pa dag la slob dpon te/ /blta ba gsang ba'i de bzhin/ /lag pas reg bshes rab nyid/ /de nyid gnyis
157a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'khyud pa'o/ /dbang bskur ma 'ongs pa yin te/ /bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar 'gyur/ /'di dag ni dbang bskur ba drug pa yin no/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mdun gnas te/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs bcad 'diS
157a3(rgyud 'grel): slob mas bla ma la gsol gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji lta ba chen po'i che gsal ba/ /bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje dang bdag gsol/ /de ltar slob mas gsol btab nas/ /bla mas skad cig ting 'dzin la//
157a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas de dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog spro bya/ /nye 'khor ba dan rgyal mtshan sogs/ /glu dang rda sogs sa ru ni/ /gdugs dang bla re bres nas su/ /'dug ste slob ma la 'di brjod/ /dbang bskur rin chen
157a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang yin no/ /gsum ba shes rab ye shes te/ /bzhi pa
157a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /thams cad thabs kyis cho ga yis/ /thams cad bla med mchod pas mchod/ /phyi nas lag nas lag tu ni/ /slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/
157a7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu 'chad? po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems? bdag po'i bdag/ /hA? las byung ba'i shes rab gzugs/ /dril bu yang ni de la sbyin/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rdo rje dril bu ming nyid do/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes
157b1(rgyud 'grel): rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /'di nyid kyi don ni/ /rdo rje cha dang dril bu che/ /zung zhig rdo rje rab gnas pa/ /de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur/ /slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis/ /mkha' 'gro
157b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /dam tshig lnga yis yongs gdab/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs dang ldan/ /slob ma rdo rje 'chang dbang bskur/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma zhes su gsungs/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid/ /gzhal med khang zhes bshad pa ste//
157b3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni gzhal yas khang brtsegs nyid/ /de la phyi rol gru bzhi pa'i/ /tshad ni mnyam par gyur pa'o/ /gang zhig byams pa la sogs sems/ /thig skur bzhir ni brjod pa'o/ /thig gang yang dag bshad pa yin/ /sbyor bas chos kyi rjes dran
157b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /lta ba kun las rnam grol ba/ /ye shes yig tu brjod pa yin/ /rkyan gang yang dag bshad pa nyid/ /tshul khrims sogs kyi sdom pa mchog/ dbang po gnyis la sogs pa'i sems/ /rab lngar ni byung ba nyid/ /gang zhig sgo zhes
157b5(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa ni/ /rnam par thar pa rnam pa bzhi/ /rta babs ka ba bzhi po ni/ /yang dge spong ba bzhi zhes brjod/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /kha khyer bzhir ni brjod pa nyid/ /sgo gang bzhin ni gang yin pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnam pa bzhi/ /de
157b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin me tog phreng rgyan pa/ /byang chub yan lag bdun po yin/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni/ /kab brgyad po zhes brjod do/ /lam gyi ye shes khyad par ni/ /rnga yab du ni yongs su grags/ gang zhig do shal bshad pa ni/ /nyon
157b7(rgyud 'grel): mongs thams cad bsod? pa ste/ /kun tu bcad pa'i ngo bo yis/ /nyon mongs 'phrog pa dra ba nyid/ /tshogs gnyis dag gi sbyor? pa las/ /'khor lo bskor ba gang yin pas/ /nyon mongs phyed ni gcod pas na/ /do shal phyed pa nyid du brjod
158a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do/ /phung po lnga ni mdor bsdu na/ /sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags/ /rdo rje skye mched nyid dag ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor mchog/ saM ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad/ /
158a2(rgyud 'grel): chu'i khams ni mA ma kI/ /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ni/ /me dang rlung du rab tu grags/ /gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas/ /gti mug zad pa shin rje mthar deS ni phung po'i mthar byed de/ /nges ni shes bya mthar byed pa'o/ /zhe sdang zad par ma Tar byed pas nyes
158a3(rgyud 'grel): zad pas shes rab mthar/ /des na sems kyi mthar byed de/ /des ni nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur/ /'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas/ /'dod chags zad pa pad mthar byed/ /nges na ngag gi mthar byed 'gyur/ /de bzhin snyoms
158a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug mthar byed do/ /nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang/ /de bzhin las kun zad pa nyid/ /sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni/ /bgegs ni mthar byed ces byar bshad/ /'di ni lha yi de kho na nyid do/ /phyir mi ldog pa slob dpon gyi dbang ngo/ /ni
158a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod sbyar ba btang byas? te/ /rtag pa'i sbyor ba rjes dran bya/ /slob ma drung du bzhag byas la/ /de yi rjes su bla ma yis/ /gos la sogs pas mig bkab nas/ /brtags pa'i stan la bzhag par bya/ /shes rab bcas par rab bzhagS
158a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rdo rje skyor? pa yang dag brtsam/ /rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /rdo rje sa bon sbyor pas ni/ /slob ma brtag par bsams pa la/ /'dzag pa'i rigs zhes bya byas ni/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /byang chub sras rnams dbang
158a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur ?/ /bdag gis gsad pa'i dbang gis ni/ /sems kyi rgyun gyi dbang bskur 'o/ /de chud za dogs mi za'i phyir/ /nya phyis sogs kyis blangs bya/ /dag pa'i lce yi mchog gi ni/ /gnyi ga las byung blang bar bya/ /'di ni de nyid bla na med
158b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med yi ges brjod mi nus/ /chos dbyings rnam pa lta bu yi/ /dam pa'i bde ba yang dag myang/ /bla ma rdo rje 'chang ba yis/ /g.yas pas mchog sbyin snying gar ni/ /khu tshur chos gos gla nas gzung/ /lag pas de yi dril bu gtad/ /
158b2(rgyud 'grel): dbugs 'byin thams cad byin nas ni/ /shAkya thub par gyur pas/ /slob ma chen po lung bstan te/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /skye rgas na dang 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'jigs dang mya ngan nad mi 'byung/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /bu
158b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod nga yi lung bstan bya/ /'di ltar du yis lung bstan khyod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sring pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha yi ming/ /de bzhin gshegs par sar 'og dang/ /
158b4(rgyud 'grel): mi yul mtho ris nyid du 'grub/ /'di ni gsang ba'i dbang dang lung bstan pa'o// //snga ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung/ /rgyud du gsungs pa'i rim pa yis/ /phyag rgya bzang mo rab brtags pas/ /'od dpag med sbyor ldan la sbyin/ /lha
158b5(rgyud 'grel): mo thar byed dga' ster ma/ /sna tshogs gzugs can brtser ldan ma/ /zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che/ /gzung bar byas nas mchod par bgyiS/ /rdo rje bcings ba'i sbyor bas ni/ /rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /rdo rje sems ni nges byung bas/ /rdo rje lce yis
158b6(rgyud 'grel): bza' bar bya/ /mnyam par byed pa'i cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste/ /bsam gtan las byung sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas dpugs dbyung sbyin par bya/ /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor mthong dang rab bzhugs pas/ /sdig pa
158b7(rgyud 'grel): kun las nges grol pas/ /khyad rnams deng nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slar yang 'chi bar 'gyur ma yin/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi 'chi bas/ /gang la'ang 'jigs med rol par gyur/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir
159a1(rgyud 'grel): sring pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'dag/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthung pa'i gsungs
159a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu brtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya zhing/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /rdo rje spun la smad pa ru/ /nam yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /sems can thams la byams dman min/ /skal med de nyid gtas? mi rgya?/ /
159a3(rgyud 'grel): skal sman? sems can spang mi bya/ /bdag gis lus la nges mi smad/ /dam pa'i chos la tshad mi gzung/ /gzhan kyi chos la'ang brnyas mi bya/ /byang chub snying po'i mthar thug par/ /dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar

159a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyung ba rgyas par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi ni dbang bskur nas/ /der rjes bzhi ba brjod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu de dbyangs kyi/ /gnyis kyis mig ni rgyas btab pa/ /rtogs shing rab tu rtogs med pa/ /bzhi pa gsal bar 'ongs pa yin//
159a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing/ /rdo rje snying po mkha' dang mtshungs/ /rdul bral thar ster zhib nyid/ /khyod rang yang ni de yi ge?/ bla ma dam pa'i zhal las ni/ /bzhi pa shes par bya ba yin/ /slob ma'i bya ba rdzogs rjes su/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol
159a7(rgyud 'grel): byung nas ni/ /chog? rdzogs phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /zhugs te rgyal rnams la bzod gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni/ /g.yon pas dril bu dgrol bar bya/ /g.yas pas bskyod cing spos dbul te/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i tshigs

159b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gshags nas ni/ /sngags kyi rdul mtshon bsdu byas te/ /gtsang ma'i snod du gzhag byas la/ /de nas chu bor dor bar bya/ /oM gi li gi li hUM dza:swAhA/ /rdul tshon bsdu ba dang dor ba'i sngags so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor nad gnas pa'i/ /sa
159b3(rgyud 'grel): ni bdud rtsis nyer byugs te/ /phyogs skyed pa yi gtor ma 'am/ /'byung po kun la gtor ma btang/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyi gtor ma ni/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i sngon? du bstan/ /sngon dang mthun pa ma yin pa'i/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma
159b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /nam mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya/ /shar kyi 'dab mar dbang po bsam/ /lho ru thar byed dgod par bya/ /nub kyi'i dbange? mar chu bdag ste/ /byang du gnod sbyin de bzhin no/ /me yi mtshams la me chen po/ /
159b5(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du ni srin po'i bdag/ /rlung du gnas med bsam par bya/ /dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i bdag/ nyi zla tshangs pa la sogs dang/ /tshangs pa'i rigs ni dam pa dang/ /tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa dang/ /dga' bral mdza' bral gnas pa dang/ /yang
159b6(rgyud 'grel): dag par byung rgyal chen dang/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed nyid dang ni/ /'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang/ /gnas gtsang man gnas pa dang/ /bde ba can na gnas pa dang/ /'og min tu ni gnas pa dang/ /'od zer can gyi 'jig rten khams//
159b7(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa rnams /de dag thams cad steng du 'god/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas ngan song pa /stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyod dang/ /de bzhin mdza' yas nor rgyas bu/ /'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang/ /pang chen pad+ma bzang po dang/ /lha
160a1(rgyud 'grel): min sems can dmyal ba rnams/ /chos 'byung smad du bsam par bya/ /oM las? tshangs pa la sogs lha/ /hUM las brgya byin la sogs pa/ /A(rgyud 'grel): las stobs kyi rgyu la sogs/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa'o/ /steng gi lha
160a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dkar po che/ /dbang po la sogs nag po ste/ /stobs? kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che/ /rang mtshungs rigs mas yan lag 'khyud/ /lag na rdo rje dril bu bcas/ /g.yas brgyang ba yis stan la gnas/ /tshangs sogs brtag pas phyag rgyas ?
160a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis/ /stobs kyi rgyu sogs gar? dbang gis/ /thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa'o/ /dkar mos dgug par byas nas ni/ /chom rkun ma yi zhags pas bcings/ /ro langs ma yi lcags ? bsdam/ /za
160a4(rgyud 'grel): por ma yi dril bus dgyes/ /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil sbyin/ /chogs gtor ma pa sgrub par bya/ /rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor la/ /A las byung ba'i par snod bsam/ /'bar ba dang ni spros pa yis/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bsgrib par bya/ /cha
160a5(rgyud 'grel): yi 'gyur ba 'di bsgoms nas/ /oM gyis byin gyis brlabs la btang/ /oM a kA ro mu kha sarbbaM? d+harmANAM? AdyanhAnan? twAta?/ oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas mnyes par byas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ oM badzra satwa saM ma yo ma nu pA
160a6(rgyud 'grel): la ya/ /badzra sa shwa twa no pa tiSh+Tha? DhaM? Dho meb+ha ba/ su tyo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rAk+to me b+ha ba/ /sarba si drti? mma? pra yats+tsha?/ sarba karma su tsa mo/ tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho b+ha ga wan/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsar dzri? g+ha ba mahA a me ye
160a7(rgyud 'grel): satwa? A(rgyud 'grel): mu(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //rab tu gnas dang sbyin sreg dag/ dkyil 'khor yan lag nyid kyi phyir/ /dkyil 'khor rjes su rab gnas dang/ /sbyin sreg gnyi ga bstan par bya/ /skye bzang blo
160b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'jig rten dang/ /mi 'gal bar ni las kun byed/ /de nyid bcu shes slob dpon ni/ /rab gnas byed par 'os pa yin/ /legs 'thas sa ni rnaM lnga yis/ /byug pa me tog gis brgyan pa/ /bla re gdugs dkar ba ngan dang/ /mang? po rnams kyis ?
160b2(rgyud 'grel): dag mdzes/ /bdug spos btul ba dri zhis pa'i/ /yid 'phrog pa yi rab gnas sar/ /gza' skar bzang sogs zhag la 'am/ /slob dpon tshul bzhin gos bgos bgrod/ /do shal rkang rgyan dpung rgyan dang/ /rna ba'i rgyun dang gdub bu rnams/ bya?
160b3(rgyud 'grel): ste med na sor gdub tsam/ /ma shal sa mi chung ba bya/ /sku gzugs ras ris glegs bam rnams/ /de ru ji snyed rgyan gyis brgyan/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /mdun du byas nas lhag gnas bya/ /dang po re zhig rigs 'dzin pas/ /dril bu
160b4(rgyud 'grel): dkrol la brtson byed cing/ /g.yas pa rdo rje gsor byed la/ /ji bzhin cho gas gtor ma sbyin/ /ba yi lnga dang shun pags lnga/ /dri lnga dag ni khyad par gyis/ /sku dang ldan pa bkru byas nas/ /mchod yan la sogs sngon bzhin sbyin/ /slar yang rnal
160b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor de nyid kyis/ /bkrus la 'di ni phyin gyis brlabs/ /yul dang dus dang shes pa yis/ /dgongs mo lhag par gnas par bya/ /rung gi chu yis bsad gtor? bya/ /thog phub chag chag btab pa'i char/ /sku gzugs la sogs bzhugs pa la//
160b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag drug gi bsgrub byas sku/ /ji bzhin lha ru der migs te/ /tshigs bcad dag gis lha rnams sku/ /nam mkhar spyan drangs yang dag mchod/ /de ltar 'di ni lhag gnas bya/ /ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dga' ldan du ni rab tu
160b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /lha mo sbyar 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar/ /de bzhin sku 'dir bzhugs par mdzod/ /rtag tu 'dir gnas mgon po rnams/ /me tog spos la sogs pa 'di/ /byang chub sems ne rab 'phel phyir/ /rjes su brtse bas gzung du gsol//
161a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag mchod la de nas bstod/ /de yi rjes su sbyang bya zhing/ /de nas rab tu bsrung bya ba/ /'di ni lhag par gnas pa yin/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor
161a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /rdo rje dbyang+gs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba che/ /rdo rje zhiba dga' chen po/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchod gyi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu ?/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha' /
161a3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dag pa dgos pa med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' i rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyas/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa
161a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /g.yas pa rdo rje gsor byed cing/ /g.yon pas dril bu gzung bya ? te/ /ji bzhin don ni rab shes bas/ /tshigs bcad 'di lnga'i glu
161a5(rgyud 'grel): yis bstod/ /'di dag ni lha lhag par gnas pa'o/ /nag po rtsab sogs spangs pa/ /mgrin pa ring la lto ba che/ /rngo rgyus dkar btags chu yis byugs/ /kha ru yal ga bzang pos brgyan/ /rin chen 'brus sman nang du gzhag/ rigs kyis mtshan
161a6(rgyud 'grel): mas mtshan pa ste/ /rgyal ba bzhi yi mtshan ma yis/ /gdong pa'i log bzhi ldan par bya/ /mdzes pa'i gos kyis mgul dkris pa/ /rnam par rgyal ba'ibum par bzhed/ /gzhan yan de dang 'dra mod kyi/ /chud ba rigs mtshan re re yin/ /hUM
161a7(rgyud 'grel): bdun bzlas pa'i snal ma bdun/ /bsgril ba'i grad bu dkar po ni/ /me tog phreng ba mgul du mdud/ /tsan dan dkar dri'i chur bcug la/ /dam por lhag par gnas par bya/ /lag pas phred ba'i sna gzung la/ /rdo rje'i dbus bcings steng du gzhag/
161b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag po bsgom la 'di yis ni/ /gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /bum pa brgyad po gzhan rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor ltar bskor bskor byas la/ /de mtshan bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis/ /brgya las brgyad lhag par ru bzla/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil
161b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /bum pa bcu par 'ba' shig bzla/ /gang phyir bdag po nges med pa/ /gzhan rnams kyis ni gsang sngags brjod/ /oM d+har d+har d+har ya d+har ra ya man+ta man+ta/ badzra d+hwi ka a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM shwa shwa ta pa ra ma shwa shwA ta e hye dzi na dzi//
161b3(rgyud 'grel): ka a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra sUrya ta mo b+hi d+ha ma na sa ma ya staM haM ratna d+h+rik a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra d+harmA sa ma ya stwaM hu lu hu lu A ro li ga a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM pu pu pu/ hi hi hi pradz+nyA? dz+nya d+h+rik a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM mo ha re ti a d+hi taSh+Tha/ oM dwe Sha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+ThA?/ oM rA ga ra ti
161b4(rgyud 'grel): a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sangs rgyas lhag par gnas pa'i sar/ /bum pa 'di rnams mchod byas nas/ /mkhas pa rdo rje dri la 'dzin pas/ /gtor ma byin la bsdu bya/ /zhes bya ba ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas lhag
161b5(rgyud 'grel): par khang pa las/ /shin tu ring ba ma yin par/ /gru bzhi khru bzhi'i tshad tsam la/ /dbangs su khru de'i tshad du bya/ /sa rdo 'am so bag las bsgrubs pa/ /bkra shis yan lag gis nyer mdzes/ /shin tu 'thas par brdungs pa yis//
161b6(rgyud 'grel): stegs bu bzang po mkhas pas bya/ /'dir ni lha ni shar bltas bzhag/ de la mngon phyogs 'jug nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bu 'chad gyur bas/ /gtor ma sbyin byed rjes su/ /rang snying sa bon bsgom byas te/ /mkha' bzhugs sangs rgyas nang du
161b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis/ /mchod pa'i lha mo rim bzhin spros/ /dza hUM/ baM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag las/ /sgo srung bzhi ni spro bar bya/ /de yis dgug gzhug la sogs pa'i/ /las rnams bzhi po bya ba yin/ /gos ser g.yogS?
162a1(rgyud 'grel): la shar mdun bstan/ /bdag nyid mngon phyogs de rjes su/ /stegs bu'i gdan la bzhugs pa yi/ /sku gzugs rim pas khrus gsol ba/ /? sku glegs dam lder so sogs/ /lha rnams chog gi? pa yis
162a2(rgyud 'grel): me long la ni gzugs brgyan 'gru/ /de pas gzhan? ba gzugs nyid yin/ /dag phyir khor ba'i snod gzhag po'i/ /ba yi lnga yis dang po du/ /kha nas gsang sngags bzlas bzhin du/ /lta la khrus gsol bya ba yin/ /oM sarba rta TA ga ta ? ya
162a3(rgyud 'grel): bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ dur ba'i chun bcings che mo yi/ /pir gyis khar ba'i snod bzhag pa'i /dri zhim par khu byug bya zhing/ /sngags pas de yis gsang sngags brjod/ /oM hUM tri ha? gaM de nas mar khu bsal ba'i phyir/ shun bag lnga btags pas
162a4(rgyud 'grel): rab phyug/ lha la lha yi bdag nyid kyis/ /yar ni khrus gsol bya ba yin/ /khar ba'i snod na gnas pa yi/ /sngon bstan dri zhim lnga rnams kyis/ /byugs la gong gi gsang sngags ni/ /zlos bzhin pa yis sku khrus gsol/ /bkra shis glu dang
162a5(rgyud 'grel): rol mo dang/ /gar sogs mdzes pa du ma bya/ /rgyal ba dbang bskur phun tshogs ltar/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni/ /spyan ma la sogs pas bya zhing/ /de bzhin gshegs kun phyag bsnams pI/ /bum pa bdud rtsi'i chus gang ba'i//
162a6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin mchog gis mkhas bas bkru/ /ji ltar bltam pa rim gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Sha ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye?
162a7(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ sku khrus gsol ba'i sdang ? so /ma sha ka las ma chung ba'i/ /gser gyi thur mas rdul chon las/ /mig sman mi mang ba blangs te/ /'di dag gis ni spyan dbye bya/ /oM tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsakshu? bi she d+ha ni swAhA/ gos kyi ? ci phyi bas te/ /
162b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas gang yin pa dang rtan bzhugs la/ /lha yi 'khor lor ti la'ang/ /gos ni zung zung dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra thA sa se swA hA/ /gos dbul ba'i sngags so/ /zhabs pas gzhal bsil 'thor 'thung dang/ /mchod yon phul nas de rjes su//
162b2(rgyud 'grel): spyad pa byas ba'i mdza' ma ru/ /mchod pa rgya chen bya ba yin/ /? ma pu? shu pa dra bya/ /shu tsa yaM shu tsa yo nA ma/ ya ma ne ba to/ bab+hya pra ti griTNa pra sid+d+hi me/ ba na snga ti sa ra h+ri do gand+ha d+hA pa mu d+ha ma/ ya ma ne bi di To bak? /pra ti drih+Na pra sadma/
162b3(rgyud 'grel): dA? lha shtsa ? ta ?/ ta mo b+hi d+ha ma na su b+ha/ ma ya ni bi d+hi tob+hak+Sha pra te grah+Na pri sidmA/ sa ha dza saM shog ki shud+he ba nd+ho yaM g+hA Na ? rpu Na yaM ma yi ni bi de tyo bAg+hya pra ti grih+Na pra sa da me nai bi dya sarba si yu g+haM/ khang b+haM dza sa man+ni ?/ kha? ? mo bi ti da
162b4(rgyud 'grel): ? mi pra ti prih+Na TaM/ oM dzo sa swAhA/ 'bras bu thams cad dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM bra tAM ? ka ma rg+hi? hUM swAhA/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje dril bu gsor byed pa/ /phyag na rdo rje mtshungs nyid kyis/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad klu blangs nas
162b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la gtor ma dbul/ /Na ma hUM kA ra na bu ru/ se dzi ba sad+d+ha ut+ta ru/ te na hUM ten hUM ti ne te te hUM lta ba la su saM khaM te ha d+ha ru/ sa ra ya su so b+ha tsand+ha mu hUM/ te mi hUM te na hUM/ ta na hUM te na hI/ /ta na te te hUM/ don d+hi la ka ma yo u d+ha ru gaN+Da badzra mut+ta d+ha ru/ te
162b6(rgyud 'grel): na h+rI? te na te te hUM yA ya bI d+hi hi na dza gra/ so a'oM a ka ra na rU bi/ te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ glu dkyugs lnga ba bsreg pa bla mar bya'o/ /'di dag ni rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /rab gnas la sogs rjes la ni/ /ma dran pa dang ma nus pa/
162b7(rgyud 'grel): tshig? ma mdzes? gyur pa rnams/ /sbyin sreg gis ni ? par bya/ /bsgrub bya med? po'i dbye ba yis/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa mang por 'gyur/ /gzhung mangs pa yis 'jigs pa'i phyir/ /mdor bsdus tsam zhig 'dir bstan bya/ /sngags
163a1(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgyar bcas pa yis/ /dang por sa ni sbyang bar bya/ /lag par g.yas pa brgyad byas la/ /rdo rjer bsgom las la gdab/ oM ha na ha na kro d+ha hUM phags spang? pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /thab khung ? khri ? tsam/ /?
163a2(rgyud 'grel): yi byed tsam zabs su bya/ de nas gzhi dang kha khyer te/ /phyi ru rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /gzhin ge ser bcas pa ste/ /kha khyer chu skyes me tog can/ /re re la ni sor bzhi bzhi'o/ /zhing? dang dbengs? dag kun tu mnyam/ /'khor lor ? chen pa ?
163a3(rgyud 'grel): gri/ /thab khung dbus su rdo rje ste /dbus kyi zheng la sor gcig la/ /mchu ru sor brgyad bri bar bya/ /zhi la rdul tshon dkar po ste/ /rgyas la rdul tshon ser pos byas/ /dbang la dmar ba gzhan dag la/ /nag po 'am rnam pa lnga nyid do/ /las
163a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbye pas phyogs dbye ste/ /dus dbye ba'ang rtag pa yin/ /de yi phyogs dang de yi dus/ /de 'dra'i las la mkhas pas dpyad/ /sngags bas byang du mngon bltas la/ /zhi ba'i las ni yang dag brtsam/ /rgyas la rtag tu shar du yin/ /mngon
163a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod la ni lho ru ste/ /dbang la nub tu bshad pa yin/ /de yi phyogs dang de yi dum/ /de 'dra'i las la mkhas pas dpyad/ /sngags bas byang du mngon bltas la/ /zhi ba'i las ni yang dag brtsam/ /rgyas la rtag tu shar du yin/ /mngon
163a6(rgyud 'grel): gi lcug ma yin/ /rtse mo'i chan ma nyams pa/ /bzang po lo ma gnyis ldan pa/ /las kyi dbye bas dbye bar bya/ /rgyas pa la ni sor bcu bzhi/ /zhi ba sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /dbang la sor bcu sdang ba dang/ /bskrad pa la yang sor mo
163a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ /'bru? dang yam shing la sogs nyid/ /bsangs nas g.yas pa'i zung du ni/ /ji lta bar ni bzhag bya ste /de kun sngags kyi mngon par bzla/ /lag gnyis khu tshur sbyar byas te/ /phung mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang/ /rdzas
163b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyang ba'i phyag rgya yin no/ /oM sh+ri swAhA/ mar sbrang ba'i sngags so/ /oM swAhA/ rdzas bkru ba'i sngags so/ /oM dzriM swAhA/ 'bru sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ rdzas gzhan sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a swAhA/ yam

163b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan a ga ru shing ngam/ /gzhan yang dri yi shing dag gis/ /sbyin sreg bya phyir rlung yam kyis/ /me ni sbar ba byas nas kyang/ /gzi brjid bskyed cing mtshan ma brtag /me yi dbus su pad+ma dang/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsgoms la/ /de nas yang ni

163b6(rgyud 'grel): oM hye hi mahA b+hU ta de ba ri Shi draM dzaM satwa pA hUM ti/ mahA rA smin san+ni hi to b+ha ba/ spyan drang ba'i tshigs bcad do/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul byas la/ /spos khang yongs su gzung byas te/ /'dod don dngos grub rtogs bya'i phyir/ /dam tshig yang dag
163b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya/ /oM badzra an la mahA b+hU ta dzwa la ya sarba d+ha smin ku ru sarba ? hUM phaT/ dri Sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma yastAM/ sa ma ya ho(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sbyin ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /dgang gzar ? gzar bzang po yi/ /rdo rjes mtshan par sa bon bsgom//
164a1(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yas pas gzung byas te/ /pus mo'i bar du gnas byas nas/ /sku gsung byin kyis brlabs byas pa/ /rang rig lha yi cod pan? can/ /rtse gsum rdo rjer ldan pa'i lce/ /me yi lta la bsreg blugs dbul/ /oM agna
164a2(rgyud 'grel): ye swAhA/ mar gyi'o/ /oM sarba bA baM da ha na badzra yang dzra? sa twa sya ?? daM da hana swAhA ? nag po'i gongs badzra budTa ye swA ? sras mchag pa'i lo/ /oM sarba saM ba de swAhA/ /zho dang zas mchog gi'o/ /oM badzra bi dza ? swAhA/ 'bras mo ba'i ?/ /e mahA ? gA ya swA hA/

164a7(rgyud 'grel): oM pad+ma rA ga agme ma pri Na ya/ a nu ka sya shAM ti ku ru swAhA/ mar dang lhan cig pad+ma'i 'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya te dzo rA dzA ? Na shAn+ta? ku ru swAhA/ 'o ma dn lhan cig utpa la'i 'o/ /oM bu buSh? ku le ba le dza la ni shAnhaM ku ru swAhA/ gur gum dang lhan
164b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig ku mu ta'i 'o/ /oM d+hme d+harmA rA dza/ da ha da ha sarba big+ha shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ tsan ngag dang ni lhan cig si? 'o/ /oM ki li su ki li ka la ni sarba bA baM da ha a mu kasya shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ dri zhim pa'i til mar dang lhan cig ka ra pi? ra'i 'o/ /rgyas la a mra?
164b2(rgyud 'grel): arka dang/ /kaN+Da pa la bi lba dang/ /u dum+ba ra rdzas lnga rnams/ /sngags pas sngags 'dis sbyin sreg bya/ /oM ga ga ni ga ga ni ba lo ki he hUM phaT/ te dzaM rA dza a mu ka sya puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ /kha dog dri dang me yi lce/ /gzugs dang sgra la sogs
164b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /yon bdag dge dang mi dge ba/ /sreg blugs bsregs pas me pra brtag /zhi la kha dog dkar 'bar ba/ /rgyas la ser po'i rnam pa ste/ /dbang la mngon spyod dag la ni/ /dmar dang gnag pa'i mi sngags so/ /dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bzang po
164b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /g.yas su 'khyil pa mchog yin no/ /rdza rnga'i sgra ltar zab pa dang/ /me lce snum zhing rtse gcig sngags/ /me stag rnam 'phro du ba mang/ /rim gyis ldang zhing khang kyis 'bar/ /mdza' mar rang 'bar gzi brjid can/ /tsha zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang/

164b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshang ba rab tu dgyes/ /rtag pa yin ni rgyal ba dgyes/ /gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dgyes rta? mchog rgyal po dgyes par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che/ /khyab 'jug rlung lta stobs po che/
165a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod ba'i lha dang bshol mda''dzin/ /zla ba nyi ma gdon gzhan dang/ /sa bdag zhagS pa 'dzin pa dang/ /ku bar dang bden bral dang/ /chos kyi rgyal po dang ni klu/ /dri za lha mi/ mi'am ci?/ /sum cu rtsa gsum

165a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /legs pa'i blo gros la gnas dang/ /gang zhig chos sprin rjes son ba/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po rnams/ /de dag thams cad dgyes par 'gyur/ /'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad bo dang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos nyid//
165a6(rgyud 'grel): bse ru dA ni tshogs gnas dang/ /dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang/ /lha dng lha ma yin dang mi/ /de ltar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ /de dag thams cad sbyin sreg gi/ chog 'dis ni tshim par 'gyur/ /zhi ba la ni'o mas mchod/ /rgyal la ser
165a7(rgyud 'grel): po chu yis bsgrub?/ dbang dang mngon spyod dag la ni/ /dmar dang nag po'i cha blugs so/ /zhes bya ba ni de zhi bar bya ba'o/ /sna tshogs rgyud shing las skyes me tog ni/ /dri med sngags dan phyag rgyal sogs te/ /thub dka' zla ba dag gis
165b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di byas pas/ /'od mangs 'gro ba'i me tog phreng ltar sho ka/ mkhas pa chen po dpal thub dka' zla bas mdzad pa/ /bzang po yongs su gzung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //legs sbyar rgya mtshor bdag
165b2(rgyud 'grel): blo goms chung yang/ /'gro ba mig med ye shes mig thob phyir/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga sngags dang phyag rgya sogs/ /legs bsgyur des ni rigs 'dzin rgyal por shog/ gzhung 'dir dad dang gzhan phan blos/ /bcos bsgyur btan la phab bgyis
165b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /'phags pa'i lam ma thob pa'i phyir/ /nongs gyur mkha' 'gro mas bzod mdzod/ /'di bris dge bas sems can phan phyir shog/ //*/ dbyung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i chog bcugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ ba li sarbba d+hA ta/
165b4(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma/ dpal gyi rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e baM rnam par des bzhugs ba'i/ /rdo rje sems dpar phyag 'tshal nas/ /bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs las/ dgod bar bya/ /chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la'o/ /de bzhin byang ldan ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom bya ba/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du ni/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad gsum rtseg tu/ /dkar gnag dmar ba oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /rim par lha chen brgyad dang ni/ /phyogs skyong brgyad dang klu chen
165b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ /pad+ma'i mdog bzhin bskyed bya ste/ /shar du dbang phyug chen po bskyed/ /lhor ni dbang po bsam par bya/ /nub tu tshangs pa bskyed ba ste/ /byang phyogs su ni khyab 'jug go/ shar ltor 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ste/ /lho nub tshogs kyi bdag po
165b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /b+ha gi'i ti nub byan du/ /byang shar gzhon nu karti ka'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar brgya byin bsam/ /lhor ni mthar byed dgod bar bya/ /chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la'o/ /de bzhin byang du gnod sbyin dgod/ /me yi mtshams su me chen po/ /bden
166a1(rgyud 'grel): bral du ni srin po'o/ /nub byang mtshams su rlung lha ste/ /byang shar du ni 'byung po'i bdag/ stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang/ /mdza' yas nor rgyas de bzhin te/ /'jog po dang ni rig ldan dang/ /bde chen shin tu pad+ma'o/ /kun kyang
166a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag na bcas/ /rang mdog rig mas yang dag 'khyud/ /gdan la g.yas brkyang pa yis bzhugs/ /rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'od zer lcags kyu ltar spros nas/ /lha brgyad dag la gzugs khams dan?
166a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs med pa yi lha bsdu'o/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi/ /phyogs skyong brgyad la rab tu bsdu/ /ngan song gsum dang lha ma yin/ /klu chen brgyad la bsdu bar bya'o/ /rang bzhin gnas na bzhugs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bya ba'i phyir/ /ge rI
166a4(rgyud 'grel): yis ni dgug byas la/ /chom rkun min zhags bas 'ching/ /ro langs mas ni lcags sgrog sdom/ /dril bus mnyes byed zad phod ma'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis thugs ka nas/ /'od zer lcags kyu ltar spros pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dgar?/
166a5(rgyud 'grel): de la phyi nang gsang bas mchod/ /de dag gis ni dbang bskur mthar/ /rang rig bdag pos dbu rgyan pa/ /lha chen brgyad la brtag pa yis/ /rdo rje yi ni phyogs skyong brgyad/ /gar dbang gis ni klu brgyad do/ /de nas cho gas gtor ma bsgrub/ /rlung dang me yi dkyil
166a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la/ /a las byung ba'i pad snod bsam/ /buM aM dzriM khaM hUM/ go ku da ha na las yin/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang sems can lnga/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su bsam/ /nyi dbus hUM bsam rdo rje ste/ /'bar ba dang ni spro ba yis/ /bdud rtsi rab tu bsgrub? par bya/ /chu
166a7(rgyud 'grel): yi rang bzhin 'di bsgoms pas/ /oM A:hUM gis byin rlabs dbul/ /de la gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM inda dza ma dza la dzak+kha? b+hA ta bah+ni/ bA u rak+Sha tsandaM sU dzdza/ mA da bAbba/ ta la/ ba tA la/ aTTha sap+pa swA hA/ de ni gtor ma'i mgon no/
166b1(rgyud 'grel): id ba li b+huny+dza dziM g+ha/ phul+la? d+hu pda?/ mAM sa piM g+ha/ de ni bzhes par zhu ba'o/ /aM b+ha sarba kadzdza sA d+ha/ khAn+ti khU Ni/ phe Ta gla da/ de ni khu ba'o/ /oM A ka ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NI/ Adya nutpan+na twA ta/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni byin gyis brlab ba'o/ /de nas dgyes bar byas
166b2(rgyud 'grel): nas gshegs su gsol ba'i yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su ba Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi mme pra yats+tsha/ sarbba karma su tsa me tsit+taM/ sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha
166b3(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ho b+ha ga wan sarbba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzri d+ha ba/ mahA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma 'di sbyin zhing rab tu mchod? par byed na/ rnal 'byor pa la 'byung po thams cad legs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe la bde ba rnyog pa med pa nyid dang/ /'khor legS
166b4(rgyud 'grel): par byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'byung po'i tshogs 'di la gtor ma byin na/ dbang dang/ mngon spyod dang/ dgra'i sde 'jig pa dang/ bskrad pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde ba dang/ rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga
166b5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mi thub rlabs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi bsgyur ba'o// //de kho na nyid kyi man ngag bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ tat+ta tsa tu ru ba de sha pra saM na dI paM
166b6(rgyud 'grel): nA ma/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid bzhi pa'i man ngag bsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba de nyid bzhi ni mkhas pas mi rtog dbyibs la mos ba rtogs/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dngos grub ring ste lus dub
166b7(rgyud 'grel): smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra/ /de bas bla ma'i rab mchog lung bstan o Dya Na mkhan po'i gzhung/ /de nyid zhi ba mdo tsam shin tu mos pa dman la bshad par bya/ /de la bla ma'i rab mchog oDyaN gyi mkhan po'i gzhung gis dgyes pa rdo rje'i dngos grub thob
167a1(rgyud 'grel): yang 'dod pas/ /de kho na nyid bzhi la brten nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bshad par bya'o/ /de la de kho na nyid bzhi ni phyag mtshan dbyibs kyi de kho na nyid dang/ gnas pa 'khor lo bzhi'i de kho na nyid dang/ bkod pa byang chub kyi sems
167a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bzhi'i de kho na nyid dang/ mthar thug pa bzhi ba'i de kho na nyid dang bzhi'o/ /de la dman pa phyag mtshan dbyibs gyi de kho na nyid ni gtso bo dang 'khor kyi sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ yum gyi gsum ste sum cu rtsa lnga'o/ /nang rtags ni phyi yin la/ /phyi'i
167a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan bas? nang mtshon par byed pa'o/ /de yang thabs dang shes rab bo/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i cha so sor bye bas shes rab dang thabs sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de ye shes rab ni shes par byed/ rtog par byed/ mtshon bar byed pas na rig pa bcu drug go/
167a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi snying rjes bskyed par byed/ 'don par byed pas ni phan par byed pa bcu drug go/ de la yang gtso bo'i g.yon kyi thod pa brgyad ni yul dang yul can te/ chos nyid gnas pa dang/ ye shes gsal ba'i rtags so/ /chos nyid gnas pa ni thod pa'o/
167a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gsal ba'i rtags ni lha brgyad kyis gsal bar byed/ rtogs par byed do/ /ci zhig ce na/ yul de nyid gsal bar byed pas na gsal bar byed pa'o/ /de gang la brten nas gsal bar byed ce na/ /sa'i lha mo la brten par byed pa'o/ /de ni
167a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o/ /de yang rnam pa lnga ste/ dam tshig dang/ ye shes dbang sngags dang/ las dang/ phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de dag dang rtag tu mi 'bral bas gzungs so/ /de las na lha mo yang de dang de'i rtags so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya lnga la
167a7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas/ /shes bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs so/ /de ltar na sngags kyi phyag rgyal brten nas/ gol ba'i lam tshol bar byed pas na/ /phyag rgya ni tsaN+Da ?/ /de ni me lha'o/ /ma'i lhas yongs su grub par byed pa ni gso ? rlung yin la
167b1(rgyud 'grel): de ni rlung gi lta'o/ /des yongs su bskul bas gnas pa'i mtshan ma thams cad bsregs pas zla ba'i rang bzhin zhu bar gyur la/ zhu bas yongs su snang ba de ni zla ba'i lha yin la/ lus sems snying rjes brlan pa ni chu'i lha ste/ gang gi tshe chus yongs su tshim
167b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas skabs na dro ba'i rtags shin tu gsal ba'i 'od snang ba ni nyi ma'i lha zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu des dgos ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rnyed par gyur na gshin rjes phyi mthar byed ces pa las de las thar te spro bar bya /de mthar phyin nas dgos pa yongs su
167b3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i nor 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te yang dang yang du bsgrims kyang 'dod pa'i don ma rnyed na steng gi sgos mi 'grub pas 'og gi sgo la bslab par bya ba yin no/ /de yang tshul ji ltar bya zhe na/ lte ba'i gnas su rgyun gyis 'bab pas zla ba dang nyi ma'i
167b4(rgyud 'grel): lha las bsgrubs pa'i sampu Ti bsams la/ de'i dbus su byin du shin tu phra ba bzhag la/ /de yang yi ge'i mtshan nyid kyis ba thag las su bkra shis zhing/ shin tu phra ba'i bu gnas ba thag tshul du dbang phyug ma la gdab par bya'o/ /de lta bu de la rnal
167b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis chung ba dang che bar snang ba dang/ bzlos par shes par byas la/ rtsol bas ji srid 'dod ba'i don ma rnyed kyi bar du bslab bar bya ba ni nyi mar ? zla ba'i las so/ /des kyang ma grub na de bzhin du gnas bzhi kar gong ma nyid ltar bslab bar bya ba ni
167b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'o/ /des kyang 'dod pa dang ma phrad na rtse mo'i reg pa la bslab par bya ste/ de ni me dang chu'i las shes bya'o/ /de lta bu'i thabs rnam pa brgyad kyis 'byung dum btub na bdag la brten pa ste grol ba'i lam gyis ma rnyed pas
167b7(rgyud 'grel): chags pa'i lam ste/ gzhan la brten pa la bslab par bya'o/ /des na lam gyi phyag rgya la brtan par bya'o/ /'di ni gshin rje'i las ?/ /tshad dang ldan pa'i phyag rgyal dam tshig gnas par byas te de dang mi rtog pa'i ngo bo'i cha can nyams su myong
168a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i de la bslab par bya ste/ de skad du ? rim pa gsum pa las/ zhabs phyag sor mos mnan byas pa/ /bu ga yod kyang 'dzag mi 'gyur/ /ji srid sor mo btab ban?/ /dgos pa chung yang 'byung ba bzhin/ /bla ma'i man ngag rgan po
168a2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /nyi ma zla ba gzas zin tshe/ /bu ga yod kyang 'dzag mi 'gyur/ /gza' las mthar na thig le 'gog/ ro bzhi shes pas ro bzhi bya/ /'di ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o/ /zhes 'byung bas na/ ro bzhi la bslabs pas kyang dgos brnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te des
168a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang ma rnyed na grol ba dang smin pa la skal ba med pas 'gro bcad la/ rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam la bslab par bya'o/ /rang lhag par gnas pa ni bdag dang/ gzhan gyis gnas las na ye shes gsal ba'i ngo bor gyur la/ sems can gyi don gyi gnas
168a4(rgyud 'grel): skabs kyis shes rab zab mor 'gyur ba las lhag pa'i sam de la bslab par bya ba yin te/ de ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di yang gshin rje ste/ ci'i phyir na 'chi bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor rdzogs nas thugs ka'i 'od kyis thams cad bsdus te/ thugs nyid? la
168a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid kyang snying la zhugs pa dang/ hUM du gyur to/ /hUM yang rim gyis thim nas thig le la'o/ /de yang mo'i rtse mo lta bu la gnas par bya'o/ /de skad du mar me rgyun tu 'bar ba dang/ chu bo'i rgyun bzhin gnas par bya zhes gsungS
168a6(rgyud 'grel): pas so/ /de'i dus su ji lta bur gnas par bya zhe na/ zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa yang ma yin/ /ma zin pa yang ma yin/ zhabs chags kyang ma bo la/ thig le yang 'gog pa ma yin la/ shin tu cha mnyam la shes pa rang snang du blta bar bya ba yin no//
168a7(rgyud 'grel): de lta bu la gnas na 'dod pa'i don rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /den rnyed par gyur na mi rtog pa 'ba' zhig la bslab par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i ? pas dgos pa yongs su grub pa ni bzhi pa'i yig 'bru yang dag par 'phel ba ste/ nor sbyin grub pa lha bu'o/ /gzhan
168b1(rgyud 'grel): yang sems can kyi lus la yang gnas te/ rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro/ /ji skad du/ lus la ye shes chen po gnas zhes pas na /lus ni thod pa ste/ rus pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo/ /de la gnas pa'i chos ni lha brgyad do/ /de bas nas ni
168b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa rtsa'o/ /brjod pa las 'das pa de'i dangs ma dar dkar gyi skud ba lta bu/ rnga 'bru ma brgyar gshegs pa lta bu'i mdo ni a ba d+hU tI la ste g.yas pa sa'i lha'o/ /de la khrag gi dangs ma mtshal cog la ma lta bu nges sdud par byed pas chu'i lha mo?
168b3(rgyud 'grel): de la dbugs kyi dang sa ma gser gyi rlangs pa tsam gnas pa ni g.yo zhing skyong bar byed pas rang gi lha'o/ /de la drod kyi dangs ma me long gi 'od bzhin gsal bar gnas pa ni smin cing brtag par byed pas me'i lta'o/ /de la kun gzhi rnam par shes
168b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngos gzhi chu ? lta buAm/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil lta bur gsal lam bsgribs par gnas pa ni nyi ma dang/ zla ba'i lha zhes bya ste/ de rtogS pa'i dus na rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum mo/ /tha mal pa'i dus na kun gzhi rnam par shes par snang ngo/ /de
168b5(rgyud 'grel): nas yang de mi gsal zhing gsal bar gyur pa'i dus su /sems kyi snang ba thob pa'am rnam par shes pa dang dbang po rnams 'gags pa'i dus su srid pa bar ma do'i shes pa de nam rang lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de ni gshin rje'i las lta bu'o/ /de nas
168b6(rgyud 'grel): yang sku gsum gyi dus su skye ba'i rim pas mngon par byang chub pa ni mthar thug pa'i chos so/ /de lta bu ri nor sprin?  lta bu zhes bya'o/ /ji skad bshad pa'i rgyud las/ /rang gi lus la sangs rgyas gnas/ /gzhan du gang yang yong ma yin/ /lus las
168b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du sangs rgyas ?/ /mi shes sgrib pas g.yog tshul lo/ /'di yis phyogs gcig spangs phyir smro/ zhes gsungs pas na tha mal pa'i lus la de ltar gnas pas na tha mal pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de
169a1(rgyud 'grel): la g.yas? pa'i thod pa brgyad ni byams pa chen po ste/ byams pa'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur la/ gzhir gyur bas thod par snang la/ gnyis 'thub la sogs pa ni ye shes gong ma lta bu stobs su gyur pa'i dus na/ sdug bsngal rnam
169a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum gyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams skyob par mdzad pas na/ thabs kyi mdzad spyod dang/ rol pa'i phrin las su shes par bya'o/ /de yang 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du 'gro ba'i don mdzad par bzhad do/ /gtso bo'i phyag mtshan bshad zir kyi?
169a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'khor gyi bshad par bya ste/ de yang bdag dang gzhan gyi man ngag dang/ las rnam pa gsum la brten par bya ba yin te/ de rnams kyang thabs dang shes rab la brten par bya ba yin pas thabs dang shes rab kyi la sbyor yin la/ kha sbyor de cis
169a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon par byed ce na/ phyag rgyas mtshon par byed do/ /rtag dang mtshan ma gang zhe na/ ru sbal lo/ /de nas phyag rgyal brten nas 'thob par byed do/ /de ni dam tshig la sogs pa'o/ /bdag la brten pa ste grol ba'i skabs su/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
169a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgyad ni sngags kyi'o/ /de la ji ltar shes pa dbye zhe na/ 'khor lo ni bzhi'o/ /de la 'dod ba'i don ma rnyed kyi bar du bsam par bya ba ni steng gi sgo'o/ /des 'dod pa'i don rnyed par gyur na rtags 'di rnams 'byung ngo/ /g.yo ba dang 'phar ba dang
169a6(rgyud 'grel): dbugs par ?? rdul bas dmyos pa dang sgra 'byung ba dang/ mtshan ma du ba lta bu yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i rtogs pa skyes pa de'i tshe/ phyi'i tsaN+Da lI'i mthar phyin pa yin te/ rtog pa snga ma nyid phyi ma'i dgra yin pas/ de'i tshe dgra
169a7(rgyud 'grel): de gri gug gis gsang ? bya? dgra gang la gnas na rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la gnas so/ /de nas 'og gi sgo'i gnas nor bu rin po che la gnas pa'i/ /thig lo la zhabs tshogs kyi gdams ngag gis blta bar bya ba yin te/ de'i tshe Da ma ru
169b1(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i spras sam/ kha sbyor gyis spro bar bya'o/ /spros pa slar 'ongs te steng gi sgo la zhugs nas 'od kyi gong bu gang du bsam par bya zhe na/ yang god gi de nyid du nyi zla yang gzas zin zhabs btsagS kyang ma bo bar/ /kun nas sprul nyal ba bzhin du rgyas pa dang
169b2(rgyud 'grel): reg bya 'gags pa snyam byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gyur na gang du 'gro ba de ru drang zhing bslab pa mthar byin par bya'o/ /de ltar mthar phyin pa dang rlung 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi 'gags pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rim pa gsum las shes par
169b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de lta bu'i man ngag des 'dod pa'i don ma rnyed na chags pa'i lam ste/ las kyi phyag rgyal brten te bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir na/ dge slong ste sa bon mi gzhol bar yongs su bde ba de la bslab bar bya'o/ /de nas stobs su gyur te/ /bag
169b4(rgyud 'grel): tshab med par gyur na gdod ser ge lta bu yin pas mi rtog pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jugpa'i sgo nas kyang dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu'i bsgom pas mngon par
169b5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa rin gyis skye'o/ /de ni dang por shes rab zag bcas skyes pa yin la/ de la bsted te phyis mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs na ye shes lnga mngon sum du gyur pas rdo rje'o/ /de mngon sum du gyur pa'i tshe bdud btul bar gyur pas bsdigs pa'i mdzub
169b6(rgyud 'grel): mo'o/ /de nas grol ba dang chags pa gnyi gas 'byung du ma btub ste 'dod pa ma rnyed na/ /rang lhag par gnas pa la bslab bar bya'o/ /rtags cis sha na/ brtags pa'i ngo bo sdom pa'i gzugs lta bu'i mar me 'bar ba lta bu ste/ shin tu bag tsha ba med
169b7(rgyud 'grel): pas seng ge lta bu'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'thor rlung gi tshogs kyis mi sod pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu'i lam gyis kyang bsgom pa'i lam rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthar phyin nas sems can gyi don yongs su smin pa dang sna tshogs pa'i skus don mdzad
170a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yang ro hi ta thta? bu dang/ gsil byed lta bu dang phag lta bu da stir lta bu dod? pa lta bu dang/ sdigs mdzub lta bu'o/ /de ltar sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad kyang skyon gyiS kyang mgoS? la thugS mi rtogs pa las ma g.yos pas bod
170a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis so/ /de la yum gyi gsum ni dgos pa yongs su grub pa'i dus na gri gung ni dmigs pa med pa'i yum mo//thod pa khrag gis bkad ba ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i yum mo/ /de gnyis kyis dbugs 'byin te/ chos kyi ? mngon sum du grub na?//
170a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ sku nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pas ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru b+hugs pa ni bsgrub bar bya ba'i yan lag bdun dang ldan pa 'dod kha TaM ga'o/ /de lta bu'i phyag mtshan dman pa'i dbyibs de khon nyid bshad nas/ da ni lus la
170a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes chen po'i gnas zhes pas/ lus med na 'khor lo mi dmigs pas 'kho lo bzhi'i de kho n nyid bshad par bya ste/ 'khor lo ni rtsa'i 'kho lo'i 'khor lo'o/ /de yang rgya med par lus la rang rgyud kyi gnas bzhen/ rten dang rten can gyi tshul du
170a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas so/ /de la rten gang zhe na/ rtsa'o/ /de yang grangs du zhe na gtso bo stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de las brgya drug cu'o/ /de las brgya nyi shu'o/ /de las sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de las gsum mo/ /de ni gtso bo'o/ /de la brgya nyi shu ni 'khor lo
170a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'o ? gang dang gang zhe na/ lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bo la'o/ /grangs ji ltar gnas zhe na/ lte ba la drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /snying ga la brgyad do/ /mgrin pa la bcu drug go/ /spyi bo la sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na/ pad+ma'i 'dab
170a7(rgyud 'grel): ma nyi ma'i ? dang 'phrod ba lta bu rgyas pa bkrad dang ldan pa'o/ /kha dog ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i rgyu las byung bas zla ba'i nor bu lta bu la bzhon mar gyi zol song ba lta bu'o/ /tshul ji ltar zhen/ thabs dang shes rab sbyar bas ?kha sbyor gyi gnas pas so/ /de
170b1(rgyud 'grel): la brten ? gyi mngon par byang chub pa las byung bas 'bras bu mtshan dang dpe byad kyi yi ges brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ grangs su ji ltar bzhag na sprul pa las A li kA li yis so/ /chos la mtshon bya'i yi ge'irim pa yab yum dgu'o/ /longs spyod la
170b2(rgyud 'grel): oM dang/ ya ra wa la lnga'o/ /bde ba chen po la A li nyis 'gyur ro/ /bzhi po de la grangs kyi nges pa ji ltar bzhag ce na/ 'jig rten pa'i dus kyi cha'i grangs kyis 'khor lo'i grangs su bzhag go/ dus kyi cha ni gang zhe na/ thun tshod dang 'gro? ba dang/ chu tshod dang
170b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyu gu'i grangs dang mthun no/ /de la thun ni ? do/ /'pho ba ni bcu drug go/ chu tshod ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /dbyu gu ni drug cu'o/ /de bas de lta bu de yang 'khor lo nyid do/ /'o na 'khor lo bzhi po de la sprul pa dang/ chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po zhes
170b4(rgyud 'grel): ci'i phyir bya zhe na/ lte ba gsang ba ni thams cad kyi 'byung gnaS yin pas ? pa 'byung ba'i gnaS bas so/ /snying ga ni shes pa'i gnas pas chos kyi sku'o/ /mgrin pa ni ro drug myong zhing longs spyod pas so/ /spyi bo ni bde ba chen po'i gnas sam rgyur gyur pas so/ /skad cig mas kyang rim par
170b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go/ rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ rnam par smin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i rim pas so/ /bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang lam lo/ /de kho na nyid bzhi ni bdag gi de kho na dang/ sngags
170b6(rgyud 'grel): dang lha dang/ ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do/ /dga' ba bzhi ni dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang/ chad pa'i dga' ba dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /sde pa bzhi ni gnas brtan pa dang/ thams cad yong par smra ba dang/ mang pos bkur ba dang/ 
170b7(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun phal chen no/ /de lta bu'i rim pas na sprul pa la sogs pa'i ming du grags so/ /'o na 'khor lo bzhi po de gang gi ngo bo yin zhe na/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo'o/ /e bi mA ya yin te/ e ni lha mo spyan no/ /baM ni mA ma kIr brjod do//
171a1(rgyud 'grel): sA? ni gos dkar mo zhes bya ba/ yin sgrol mang? brjod pas so/ /de la tshul ji ltar bzhugs shen?/ sprul pa ni shes rab ste chos kyi 'byung gnas so/ /snying gi pad+ma ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ rtag tu chos gyi dbyings ma la
171a2(rgyud 'grel): bltas pas na kha sbyor ro/ /'o na chos kyi dbyings ma tshul ci 'dra ba zhe na/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i longs spyod du gyur pa longs spyod do/ /de ji ltar rdzogs she na/ lo bcu drug gi rnam pa lta bus gzhon nu'i mdangs dang ldan pa gdu bu gsum
171a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan bas sgog pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i yi ges lngas brgyan pas b+ha gshin tu rgyas pa'o/ /ji ltar rgyas shen rtsa lnga ni ro bzhi'i gnas so/ /ro ba'i ni bde ba'i re'o/ /de'i gnas su gyur pas rgyas pa'o/ /longs spyod
171a4(rgyud 'grel): du ji ltar 'gyur na/ bde ba nam mkha' lta bu'i gnas su gyur pas longs sbyod rdzogs pa'o/ /de la rtag tu dmigs shing 'jig pas na bde ba chen po'o/ /ji lta bu'i bde ba chen po zhe na/ lus dang yid las khyad par du byus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung
171a5(rgyud 'grel): ba khyad par lnga dang ldan pa'i bde ba chen pa'o/ /las gang zhen dril bu las rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pas na 'bras bu yang bde ba chen por gyur ba'o/ /de yang kha sbyor gyi ngo bo bas thabs dang shes rab bo/ /de lta bu'i 'khor lo las ye shes bde
171a6(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po ji ltar thob par bya zhe na/ /yongs su bskor bas rnyed par 'gyur/ /bsgyor ba ni ji ltar bskor zhe na/ bla ma'i man ngag las/ /rlung mdar/ gnyid ma gnyis gtso bo sprad par bya'o/ /nges rlung bskyed ngo/ /des tsanda lI rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes
171a7(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa rab tu 'bar/ /des dam tshig gi ? dbang? tu bsregs gso/ /de naS na chung dang? rab tu bsngo? nas g.yas nas phyung nas phyir mchod pa'i don byas ? g.yen du zhugs so/ /de nas bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor la g.yon du bskor te gnad kyi sgo phyi?
171b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs? kar zhugs nas/ ye shes kyis bdud rtsir gyur te/ slar bdud rtsi khyer nas dzA band+har zhes bya bar thim par gyur to/ /des longs spyod kyang khengs/ g.yon gyiS rtsa nas zhugs te sprul pa yang gsos/ de nas
171b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su zhugs te/ phyir longs spyod la thim nas gdod dam tshig gis dkyil 'khor yongs su gsos so/ /de nas yang sprul pa la thim par cher 'bar te/ bco? sngon bzhin du bskor ba yang skra'i rtse mo brgyad gshags pa'i tshad tsam du
171b3(rgyud 'grel): yar 'gro ba dang/ mar 'gro ba yang mi mthong ngo/ /de ltar byas pas 'dod pa'i don rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yang dang yang byas kyang ma rnyed na 'khor lo bzhi la thig le bzhi byas te ? ? bslab par bya'o/ /des kyang ma rnyed na/ AM hi gnyis
171b4(rgyud 'grel): las bslab par bya'o/ /des kyang ma rnyed na AM dang hUM las bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar byas pas 'dod pa'i don rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rnyed ba de'i tshe ro? brgyad skyel/ sgyes pa de'i tshe gri gug gis lha'i bdud bsang ngo/ /de nas yongs su thim par bya
171b5(rgyud 'grel): ba min la/ de ni sbrul 'khyil pa dang 'dra'o/ /de ltar gyur pas seng ge phrug gu gso'o/ /de lta bu'i ngo bo de la 'khor lo bzhi las mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba bshad zin to/ /de nas ci bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa bya ba la 'khor lo kho ni yan
171b6(rgyud 'grel): nam snyam pa la/ sdom pa bshad pa yin pas so/ /byang chub kyi sems dga' ba bzhi la bslab par bya'o/ /de la dga' ba bzhi ni rgyun cha la dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o
171b7(rgyud 'grel): ji lta bu'i dga' pa la dga' ba bzhi zhe na/ tshogs pa dang tshogs can las skyes pa'i 'bras bu myong ba'i rnam grangs la ni dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de yang ji ltar myong zhe na/ dam tshig gis dus su myang ba'i dga' ba de bshad par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir
172a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun cha'i dga' ba zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi bstan bcos las skyes pa bad dang/ rdo rje kun nas reg pa la ni rnam pa sna tshogs ba'i skad cig ma zhes bya ste/ de la yul du byas pa'i shes rab kyi ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de nas bskyed
172a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rkyen gyis yongs su smin par gyur pa'i rdo rje'i rked pa la gnas pa la ni mchog tu dga' bzhis bya'o/ /de nas shes rab kyi mdzod khaM ga mu kha dang/ nor bu kan re ka pa ra gyur te/ rnam par nyed pa'i dus su rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa min?
172a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' bral gyi dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la gnas su thob? pa'i shes rab ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu'i reg bya las skyes pa'i dga' bas bdag po'i rkyen byas nas/ skad cig ma phyi ma la nor bu'i rtse mor mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i ngo bo mi
172a4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs cha can dmigs pa thams cad dang bral bskyes pa de la lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba zhes bya ste/ de la nyams su myong ba'i shes rab ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu'i dga' ba bzhi la rnam pa gnyis te/ shu lo ga'i dga' ba dang/ byung rims
172a5(rgyud 'grel): ? so/ /de la ci'i phyi shu lo ka zhen/ zhes rab dang ye shes te/ shes rab ni mya ngan las 'das par bzhed la/ ye shes ni 'khor ba'o/ /gnyis ba mi gnas pa ni dbu ma bas ni mchog go /de las 'das bse sa ha dza'o/ /de ni dgyes ba'i
172a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'o/ /de byas na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nab? bar bzhed do/ /sku gsung thugs sku 'dod ba dag ni/ chang ba ni song ba la 'dzin par 'dod do/ /de skad du ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis/ /dang bo bud med
172a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab yin/ /thugs ni skyes du brjod? pa yin/ /de nas 'di dag rnam pa gnyis/ /don dam kun rdzob de dbye ba'o/ /dang po skyes bu rnam gnyis te/ /khu ba'am na de bde ba'o/ /skyes bu ji ltar shes rab kyang/ /khu ba 'am de yi bde
172b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /de yi phyir na dga' ba ni/ /bzhir ni rab tu dbye ba'o/ /gang phyir lhan cig skyes rnams bzhi/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa yi ni phyogs/ /mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma dga' pra ?  dga' ba thad ni de bde thabS kyi thams cad rig/ /bde ba cung zad dga' ba ste/ /
172b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag /dga' bas dga' ba chags bral yin/ /lhan cig skyes dga' tha ma'o/ /dang por reg par 'dod ba ste/ /gnyis pa bde bar 'dod ba'o/ /gsum pa 'dod chags 'dzin pa yin/ /de phyir bzhi pa bsgom par bya//
172b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dga' ba srid bar 'dod/ /'dod chags bral phyir mya ngan 'das/ /dman pa dga' ba tsam nyid do/ /de dag rnam spangs sa ha dza/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs la/ /'di la thabs dang shes rab
172b4(rgyud 'grel): med/ /yang dag de nyid rtogs pa'o/ /gzhan gyis mi bskyed lhan cig skyes/ /gang nas kyang ni mi rnyed de/ /bla ma'i dus thabs bsten ba dang/ /bsod nams kyis ni bdag giS shes zhes gsungs so/ /de la dga' ba de lta bu la bslab pa
172b5(rgyud 'grel): ni nor bu'i dkyil du bde ba phab la 'khor lo re re la cha bo ni bzhir brtsis bas/ /de lta bu'i dga' ba re re la bzhi bzhir brtsis pas rnal 'byor gyi 'pho ba bcu drug go/ byang chub kyi sems dge ba bzhi'i de kho na nyid bshad nas/ de nas
172b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ba'i de kho na nyid bshad par bya ste/ ji lta bu'i bzhi ba zhe na/ gsum pa la bltas te bsgoms nas thob pa de la bzhi pa zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu'i ngo bo yang ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur grangs na/ yul du mtshon pa'i bzhi pa dang 'dra bar mtshon
172b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bzhi pa ni/ bzhi pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mthar thug pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /chos ni yang dag pa'i mdza' o/ /mthar thug ba ni zab mo'o/ /de yang ji lta bu'i ming can zhe na/ chos nyid gnas pa'i ngo bo dang/ ye shes gsal ba'i ngo bo 'o//
173a1(rgyud 'grel): de ni chos nyid ji bzhin pa dang/ sems nyid ji bzhin? pa'i ngo bo'o/ /de tha mi dad pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste de nyid ga pa'i sku'o/ /de la sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal san? gsang sngags kyi do kho na nyid ?/ /de
173a2(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i yul don dam pa'i bden pa de ni/ yul du mtshen pa'i bzhi ba ste/ de ni mthar thug pa'i zhes bya'o/ /'o na ci 'dra bar mtshan zhe na/ shes rab ye shes rtag pa'i dga' ba des mtshan te/ bsgom pas brtan la ? nas mngon sum du
173a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i yan lag bdun dang ldan par gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba mthar thug pa de thog ma'i chos nyid yul du byas ba dang/ rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes gsal ba'i ngo bo de dang dbyer med par gyur pa la ni
173a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar mtshan pa'i bzhi bzhes bya'o/ /de lta bu'i bzhi ba de yang dga' ba'i ngo bo des mtshon par bde shes bar byed pas na mtshon byed do/ /des ji ltar mtshon bar byed cen/ rgyud las/ dman pa 'bring bo mchog dang ni/ gzhan yang gang
173a5(rgyud 'grel): dang de yang ni/ /de dag thams cad mnyam cing du/ de nyid bsgoms pas blta bar bya/ /dman pa dngos bo phra ba'i don/ /mchog gi dngos por brjod pa ste/ /dbu mas gnyis ni spangs pa'o/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /de skad du /bshad
173a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyud las kyang/ stong pa bsgom par mi bya ste/ /mi steng ba yang mi bsgom mo/ /rnal 'byor stong ba spang mi bya/ /stong ba min yang mi spang do/ /stong dang mi stong gnyis gzung na/ /rtog pa mang bo rab tu skye/ /yongs su spangs na yang dag
173a7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs/ /de phyir de gnyis spang bar bya/ /gnyis por gzhan pa yongs spangs nas/ /rnam bar grol bar nges par gnas/ /bdag tu yang dag rtogs pa 'di/ /de phyir de yang dngos spang bya/ /zhes gsungs bas/ de mdza' gsum la mi
173b1(rgyud 'grel): reg pa ni de kho na nyid bsgom par bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar bstan te/ de skad du yang/ gang la sgom ba po med cing/ /mi bsgom pa yang yod ma yin/ /bsgom pa yang ni nges pa med/ /de ni de nyid bsgom par brjod/ /'di ltangs ha dza'i de kho
173b2(rgyud 'grel): na nyid khong du chud cing rnam bar rtogs nas/ /dngos bo tha dad pa med bar mthong ba rang rang gi rang bzhin du chos thams cad rnam par bsgom par brjod do/ /de skad du /'gro ba thams cad bsgom pa ni/ /gang phyir yid kyis ma bsgoms pa'o/ /thams
