218a3(rgyud 'grel): legs bsgoms phyag 'tshal la sogs bya/ rang nyid hUM gi spro bsdu kyi dang nang/ /gsang ba'i lha mo rnams kyis rim par mchod/ /gau rI? dkar mo ri dags mtshan ma 'dzin/ /so? rA dmar ? rang 'byung me tog thogs/ /pet+ta khI ni ser mo chu phyag ma/ /g+hasma rI k? de
218a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i sman yang 'dzin/ /pu? sI sngo phyag na sha sna tshogs/ /sha ba rI dkar sna tshogs ro yi phyag tsaDa ? lji dmar sgra dang rin chen tshogs/ /nang gi sku gsum bde ba chen pos mchod/ /DoM bi phyag rgya rang gi sku la 'khyud/ /de kho na nyid mchod pa gnyis su med
218a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig bshags yi ? bsngo dang gus dbul? dang/ /lam bsten pa dang gsol ba gdab pa dang/ /tshad med bzhi bsgom lha gshegs de rjes la/ /chos rnams sgyu ma rang sems rdul dang bral/ /oM shU n+ya dA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod la sngags kyi
218a6(rgyud 'grel): don de dran pa las dag gi de kho na nyid gnas par bya'o/ /tshes nyid de las ram dang hUM/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dra gur gang/ /de nas e las chos 'byung bsgom/ /de nas yaM raM baM laM dag/ sngo dmar dkar por sa ? dag/ gyur nas 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bzhi//
218a7(rgyud 'grel): ? sems kyis bsgyur zhal yas khang/ /thar ba'i grong mchog rnam par snang/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi lha mos mchod/ /dra ba dbyed ? na/ /? brgyad dang rta thabs bzhi/ /rgyan dang chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs/ /sangs rgyas zhing rgyas mchod pa yis/ /tshogs kyi dur khrod
218b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad na shing brgyad sogs/ /? tsu ta a shwa ka/ a ? arny+dza/ /dza la ti dang ba rti par/ /he te b+hA tra phyogs dang mtshams/ /zhi skyong phyogs sbyong lha dang klu/ /zhing sbyor brgyad kyi zhal dang mdag/ phyogs skyong brgyad dang mdo de bzhin/ /gri gug thod pa g.yas dang g.yon/ /gtor len
218b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing dag legs par skyong/ /brgya phyin dkar po glang po'i bdag/ /rdo rje dril bu g.yas dang g.yon/ /gshin rje thig nag ma he zhen/ /dbyug? pa thod pa de bzhin no/ chu lha dkar po chu srin mnan/ /sbrul zhags g.yas dang pad+ma gson/ /gnod sbyin ser po rta la zhon/ /dpal 'bras ne'u?
218b3(rgyud 'grel): le g.yas dang g.yon/ /'byung pa'o bdag po dkar po ni/ /khyu mchog dkar po mdud thod 'dzin/ /me lha dmar por la zhen/ /spyi ? dbyug gu rtse gsum bsnams/ /srin po kham nag mi re'i khri/ /gri dang thod pa g.yas dang g.yom/ rlung lha dud kha sha bzhin/ /g.yas
218b4(rgyud 'grel): na bdan zhags pa g.yon/ /thams cad rin chen rgyan ldan te/ /srin po rus pas brgyan pa po/ /chung ma bu 'khor phyogs mdog bcas/ /mdog rnams zhi byed chos legs skyong/ /steng gi mkha' la lha chen brgyad/ /shar du brgya byin mngon dang 'dra/ /lho ? tshangs yag
218b5(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi ?/ spyi blugs dbyug gu rtse gsum 'dzin/ /mu? khyab 'jug dmar po ste 'khor lo ba yas dang g.yon na dung/ /byang du lha chen thal ba'i mdog/ rtse gsum thod pa g.yas dang g.yon/ /dbang ldan gzhon nu drug gi bu/ /dkar po mda' dan gzhus ? pa/ /shar
218b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs bdag dkar po ni/ /g.yas g.yon la phug la du 'dzin/ /bden bral b+h+ri gi ri tipmu? ga /ral gri g.yas na grub na g.yon/ /rlung du legs ldan nag po ni/ /g.yas par dbyug pa dan g.yon/ /thams cad lha rgyan dag dang ldan/ /'dod pa'i lha rnams kyi bskor
218b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla bza' / /'og nas klu brgyad phyogs dang mtshams/ /'jog po dud skyong rigs ldan dang/ /mdza' yas pad chen dga' bo dang/ /nor rgyas bu dang pad+ma rnams/ /phyogs skyong mdag? dang sprul nags g.yas/ /gdengs ka dang ldan pad+ma g.yon/ /sprin brgyad chu brgyud
219a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten brgyad/ /bya dang can zan ro yi tshogs/ /sgrub pa'i mchog thob rnal 'byor bzhugs/ gzhal yas nang du pad+ma brgyad/ /rdo rje phreng ba nag pos bskor/ /dkar ser rA ga dmar dang gnag/ phyogs dang rtsig pa rim par gnas/ /dbus su bdud bzhi nyi
219a2(rgyud 'grel): mas mnan/ /'dab ma lha brgyad zla bas mnan/ /nyi steng hUM dang i nag bsgom/ /de 'og A la nyis 'gyur las/ /me long zla bar shes rab gzugs/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis 'byung ba la/ /steng du kA li nyis 'gyur las/ /Da d+ha dad+ha la ya gnyis/ /mnyam ?? ma
219a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi gzugs/ /dpe khyad brgyad cu grub par byed/ /thod dkar dri sngon ? dang/ /sa bon mtshan pa so sor rtog/ ? sbyang gcig nan tan yin/ /gcig gyur sku ni chos kyi dbyings/ /sku ni mthid nag chen po nyid/ /zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi phyag bcu drug/ dbu?
219a4(rgyud 'grel): skyar mar? ser gyin du 'khyil/ /sted zhal dud mdon mche ba gtsigs/ /rus pa'i 'khor lo spyan gsum dmar/ /'og mi g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar/ /dbus zhal gzhan rnams sku yi mdog /spyan dmar gsum gsum mche ba gtsigs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje
219a5(rgyud 'grel): thod ba'i thod/ /rna cha mgul brgyan bdud pa'i spyan/ /phyag gdub zhabs gdub rus bas brgyan/ /khrag 'dzag lnga bcu'i phred ba 'phyang/ /stag gi sham thab thal bas byugs/ /rdo rje dril bu dang po'i phyag/ /yum la legs par 'gyur pa'o/ /g.yas kyi gnyis
219a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ral gri 'dzin/ /de nas mda' dang 'khor lo sho?/ /dbyug brtse gsum lcags rgyu rim/ /g.yon ni rim bzhin pad+ma gzhu/ /kha TwAM thod pa rin po che/ /sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /yum gyi sku mdog yab dang mnyam/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi
219a7(rgyud 'grel): dang po gnyis/ /rdo rje dril bu ? la 'khyud/ /gnyis ni mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /thod snam bco lnga'i phreng bas brgyan/ /rgyan rnams rus blta ba dang mnyam/ /gtso bo zhabs bzhig bas brgyar nag brgya byin tsha? pa nyed bar drag/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
219b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mnan pa'i/ /steng nas 'jigs dang sgeg pa gshe/ bzhad drag snying rje rnga ma dang zhi/ /gar dgus rnam par gyur bsgom/ /pad+ma rdo rje byin gyis brlabs/ /oM pad+ma su kha d+ha ra mA rA ga su khaM daTTa ? Tu rAn+nba wa gi wa sha hUM hUM hUM ka ryaM ku ru Sha? me/ oM badzra ma hA dwe Sha tsa tu rA nanda da ya ka kha
219b2(rgyud 'grel): ga mu khe ka ra so nA Tha/ hUM hUM hUM kaM rya ku ru Shwa me/ de ni sbyar ba dang po yin dkyil 'khor sprul pa de ma thag/ lha rnams zhal zhuD snying gar gnas/ /a nu rA ga brjod nas 'byung/ /gaM tsaM baM g+haM baM shaM laM DaM/ brgyad po phyogs dang mtshams rnams su/ /lha yi gdan sted du 'phros
219b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /mngon byar lnga las lha mo bskyed/ /gaM dang gri gug las byung pa'i/ /gau rI dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' gzhu gri gug thod khrag bsnams/ /shar gyi 'dab mar tshangs pa mnan/ /tso dang Da ma rus bskyed pa'i/ /tsau rI dmar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /'khor lo lcags ?
219b4(rgyud 'grel): Da ma? lho yi 'dab ? brgya phyin mnan/ /baM dang rus sngal las grub pa'i/ /peN+Da li dkar phyag bzhi ni/ /chad chu ral gri thod pa bsnams/ /nub kyi pad+mar nye dbar mnan/ /? dang sbrul las yang dag bskyed/ /b+ha sma rI ? phyag bzhi ste mtha? ?
219b5(rgyud 'grel): ? bsdams ?/ /de dang seng ge dag las gyur/ /du ? sI sar phyag bzhi me/ /dpag bsam lcug mthod shas bkad/ /rin poche dang mchog sbyin phyag/ gshin rje mnan pa byad shar bsgom/ /shaM dang dge slud las bskyed pa'i/ /sha ba ri dkar phyag bzhim?/ /pan+te
219b6(rgyud 'grel): thad pa ? ?/ /gnod sbyin mnan pa shar bsgom/ /laM dang 'khor lo bskyed pa yi/ /tsaN lI sngon phyag bzhi ni/ rlung ras bod na thod pa dkar/ /srin po mnan pa lho nub bsgom/ /DaM dang rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /DoM baM? ni snga phyag bzhi ni/ /thod pa bshol dang ba dan dang//
219b7(rgyud 'grel): mdud rtsi gsum pa lha ma yin/ /mnan pa nub byang pad+mad bsgom/ /sgo bzhi dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM ba ho(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang/ /ral gri sngo zhing mngon byang las/ /rta gdod phag gdod khyi seng gdong/ /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi ro yi gdan/ /g.yas seng g.yon dmar dang po sngo//
220a1(rgyud 'grel): steng zhal rta gdong ljang gur gnas/ /phyag gnyis gling bu gzhan gnyis ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /g.yas sngo ba yon dmar dang po ser/ /steng zhal phag gdob dmar por gnas/ /phyag gnyis pi wang gzhan gnyis ni/ /rin po che dang zhags??
220a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas sngo g.yon dkar dbus ma dmar/ /steng zhal khyi gdang ser? po gnas/ /phyag gnyis rnga chen gzhan gnyis ni/ /pad+ma dang ni lcags sgrog 'dzin/ /g.yas sngo g.yon dkar dbus ma ?/ /steng zhal seng gdong dkar por gnas/ /phyag gnyis rdza ? de bzhin gnyis
220a3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri gsang ba 'dzin par mdzad/ /shar sgo la sogs rim par ni/ /pad+ma nyi ro'i steng du bsgom/ /thams cad spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum/ /dbus skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar/ /gcer bu rked la stag lpags bkri shis/ /rus pa'i phyag rgya lnga dang ldan/ /mgo bo skam
220a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i phreng ba 'phyang/ /g.yon brkyang sgeg dang 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /phyogs mtshams rang rang gdan la bzhugs/ /yi ge bzhugs gtso bo zhu/ /nyi ma'i steng na hUM dang uM/ /bde ba'i thig le dbyibs su gnas/ /de nas 'khor gyi lha mo rnams/ /rang ?
220a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo ma mthong nas/ /yid che cher gdungs rdo rje glus/ /bzhengs par bzheng nas gtso bo bskul/ /rje btsun du rje'i thugs kyis bzhengs/ /gdan la bde ba chen por sbyor/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas su/ /puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs/ /khyod mi bzhugs na
220a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'bum pas/ /thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad bzhengs/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin ci ste bzhugs/ /sha ba rI 'bras grub par mdzod/ /dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas/ /stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci/ /gtum mo bdag ni gsol 'debs na//
220a7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje rdo rje bzhe ?/ /bdag gi khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyi/ /mig 'khrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig/ DoM bi bdag ni dran mnyam par/ /snying rje chen po chad mdzad bzhengs/ /rmi lam lta bu sgra gsan nas/ /bcom ldan sngar bzhin dgyes
220b1(rgyud 'grel): rdor bzheng/ /sku mdog la sogs sngar bzhin bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor rnams la legs par blta/ /lha rnams thugs kar pad nyi zla/ /rang rang phyag mtshan sa bon bsgom/ /de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan
220b2(rgyud 'grel): drangs la/ /shar gyi dur khrod nam mkhar bzhugs/ /phyi nang gsang bas legs mchod la/ /gau rI la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa dgug gzhug bcing/ /dgyes pa bskyed nas gnyis med bsgom/ /mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug mngon shes bskyed phyir
220b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya/ /maM d+haM naM raM aM naM dag/ dkar nag ser dmar ljang khu nag/ pad zla sa bon gri gug las/ /gti mug zhe sdang ser sna rnams/ /'dod chags phrag dge bdag med ma/ /rdo rje'i ming canlha mo drug/ bskul sbyan byas nas lha mor bsgom/ /phyag rgya lnga dang gri gug
220b4(rgyud 'grel): thod/ /thams cad g.yon brkyang bsgom par bya/ /'tshog ma snying sa mgrin pa ru/ /oM dkar A(rgyud 'grel): dmar hUM nag las/ /kha dog gsum gyi gri gug las/ /bskul sbyangs sku gsum byin brlabs las/ /sa spyod mkha' spyod bdag med ma/ /dkar dmar nag po gri gug
220b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /phyag rgya lnga ldan ro yi gdan/ /g.yon brkyang skeg? dang bcas pa bsgom/ /yang ni rang snying sa bon las/ /'od zer lnga spros bskul sbyang byas/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams/ /khro bo rig pa'i lha mor bcas/ /mchod pa gsum gyi legs mchod la//
220b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/ mi bskyod la sogs sangs rgyas rnams/ /spyan ma la sogs sku las byung/ /bdud rtsi bum pa lha dbang bskur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ sgrib gnyis sbyangs
220b7(rgyud 'grel): nas rgyas gdab po/ /bdag dang po ? ?/ bcom ldan mi bskyod legs par bzhugs/ /sha ba rI da tsa rI ? rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin bzhugs/ /tsaN+Da ? dang bet+tA lI/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom par bya/ /DoM bi dang ni g+hasma rI/ /dbul snang ba mdza' 
221a1(rgyud 'grel): yas gzhugs/ /de nas bdud rtsi myar bar bya/ /shar lhor dur khrod nam mkha' la/ /sgom bzhi yi dbu stengs su/ rnam par snang mdzad rim bzhin bsgom?/ /yaM? raM? aM? gsum hAM?  na ga oM/ /mas yang rim pas bsgem par bya/ /tU brjod dang ?  hUM? 'od
221a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /hUM bskul ma drung dkyil 'khor dang/ /mgo po gsum dang pad+ma brgyad/ /sa bon bcas pa'i thod pa bsgom/ /de bzhin hUM 'od yab bsdul? bas/ /a yi 'od kyi sa bon rnams/ /gyur nas bdud rtsir gyur pa ni/ hUM bas rnam sprul bruM las dri/ /dzre las?
221a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po aM las dmar/ /kham las chur 'gyur phyogs kyi ri/ /naM? las mi sha haM las rta/ /naM las blang po ? nga las ni/ /lte sbyang gaM las pa lang sha hUM gi me sbar bdud rtsi bskol?/ /a yaM zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lhung/ /hUM nyid rdo rjer gyur nas ni/ /lan lngar 'bar
221a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing bkrug? byas nas/ /rdo rje hUM dang po'i? dngos?/ /de? shas bdud rtsi spyan drangs 'dres/ /? rnams ljags la hUM nyid las/ /rdo rje spu gus bdud rtsi myang/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mri te badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams/ /dkyil 'khor lha la rim
221a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mchod/ mchod pa'i go rims la sogs pas/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ rigs pa'i lha mo thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor lha la bstod pa mdzad / /lha mo dkyil 'khor bcom ldan
221a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /g.yo dang mig ro khyod kyi thugs/ /sems can kun gyi don mdzad rnams/ /bcom ldan mchog tu dgyes rdo rje/ /zhal gyi zhugs kyi dgongs pa grub/ /thugs dgyes mdzed? cing dgye rdo rje/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta stu ti badzra swa b+hA ba At+mA kohaM/ brtan par
221a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas 'khor lo bskor/ /lha rnams phyogs phyogs spro? bya ste/ /nam mkha' i mthar thug 'gro ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor lta bu gsal bar bsgom/ /bstan par gyur nas tshur bsdus la/ /rang nyid dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ /las kyi rgyal po'i 'khor
221b1(rgyud 'grel): lo mchog /de ni lha yi de nyidyin/ /bla ma la brnyas dang med sngags la rlom /glegs bam mthong bas khengs shing dbang bskur dman/ /de la sgra yi tshig kyang brjod mi bya/ /dang ldan de nyid bzhi thob gus par sgrub la rtson/ /bla ma'i lung thob drin dran bla ma la gus de dag ni/ /de ni ri
221b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang rtse las lhung gyur pa/ /ltung bar mi bya snyam yang ltung bar 'gyur/ sdig bral ye shes rim pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lta'i de kho na nyid kyi rim pa ste dang po'o/ /da ni ye shes kyi de kho na nyid bshad de/ thams cad rang gi sems yin te/ lha rnams rang la bsdus pa ni/ /ji
221b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar me 'ong? dkyil 'khor la/ /has btang rim pas 'du ba bzhin/ /rta gdong la sogs sgom bzhi/ /yan lag bzhi la bsdu bar bya/ /lha mo brgyad ni zhal la bsdu/ /zhal dang phyag rnams rim bzhin te/ /bdag yul zhal re phyag gnyis pa/ /gzhan nas bsten pa'i 'khor
221b4(rgyud 'grel): lo bzhi/ bsgoms nas 'og nas 'byung ba yi/ /rtags brgyad 'byung ba bsgom pa'am/ /mi dgag rgyud don man ngag yin/ /'dir ni bla ma'i man ngag gis/ /lha yi lung thob dang 'dra bar/ bar dor phyag rgya chen po 'thob/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma mtshan nyid dang/ /sems
221b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes 'dres gyur pa'i/ /mngon par byang chub rim pa dag /ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ /byang chub rim pa'i rdo rje can/ /gnas bzhi la ni yang dag brten/ yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan ma gnas nas ni/ /'dod chags la sogs
221b6(rgyud 'grel): rim sngags te/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos kun la/ /snying rje phan par bsams nas su/ /mnyam pa'i sems ni bskyed par bya /'og dang 'og min sgra yi mdza' / /de bzhin gsang ba'i pad+ma ste/ /cha dang mdog ni sna tshogs dang/ /debzhin du ni gdan dag ste/ /sku
221b7(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rol pa'o/ /bsdus te gong bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur/ /chu dang me yi khams dag ni/ /ro gcig 'gyur bas go 'phang mchog /shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba las/ /dbang po drug po sangs rgyas
222a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /yag dag bstan bcas de nyid shes/ /slob dpon lung gis rdzas 'gro zhing/ /gsang chen de nyid don bsgom pa/ /gcig nas rgyud de de nyid can/ /stong pa de nyid la sogs mtshan/ /thams cad sngon bzhin mchan byas nas/ /prin? pa ?
222a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lus kyis ni/ /mngon bar byang chub rim pas grol/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zer 'phros bas/ /kun da zla ltar dkar ba'i mdog /phyag gnyis sems dpar dkyil 'khor bcas/
222a3(rgyud 'grel): rkyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyun/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/ /nyid kyi thugs rkar bsdams par mdzad/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs ba yi/ /ye shes pad+ma'i gdan du bsam/ /snying ni chu shing me tog 'dra//
222a4(rgyud 'grel): lte ba nas ni 'phyangs te gnas/ /sngon bzhin pad+ma rgyas par brgyan/ /'dab ma brgyad kyis brgyan ba yi/ /ge sar dang ni zla ba bcas/ /sa bon yi ge dgod par bya/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar po'i mdog/ /dri chen dbus? su
222a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang/ /ye shes gnyis su med par bsgom/ /sngon du byams pa ldan pa yi/ /shar gyi 'dab mar mi bskyod pa/ /snying rje chen po lho sgo ru/ /rin chen de nyid sa bon no/ /dga' ba nub sgo'i 'dab ma la/ /'od dpag med kyi sa bon
222a6(rgyud 'grel): dgod/ /btang? snyoms byang gi 'dam ma/ /don yong gtso bo bsam par bya/ /dbyangs yi ge shar sogs sa bon ni/ /zla phyed thig ler ldan pa dag /gos dkar ldan pa'i rim bzhin dgod/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi ba ru/ /sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod?/ /
222a7(rgyud 'grel): de ni dbus su rang gi sems/ /yi ge nyid du bsgom par bya/ /stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las/ /ji ltar yi ge bsgom par bya/ /se ni ya mtshan skye bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ba ji ltar lags/ /de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /ji bzhin de nyid rdo
222b1(rgyud 'grel): rje nyon/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las/ /chu shing me tog bdud rtsi bzhin/ /snying po med pa'i snying por 'gyur/ /dbus kyi rnam shes ye shes te/ /ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med cing/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dri ma med? pa'i ye shes sku/ /dngos dang dngos med
222b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grol/ /kha dag gzugs dang yi ge med/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus dag tu/ /rnal 'byor can gyi de nyid gzung/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid ji bzhin bsgom par bya/ /de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/ /bla ma nyid kyi lung bzhin du/ /da ni myur du
222b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar 'gyur/ /rnam shes ye shes gzungs dag ni/ /bstan bcos las ni mtshan nyid bstan/ /de nyid kho na dpa' bos bshad/ /'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa dag /'di ni rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /sgeg pa lnga yi mchod rten la/ /bdud rtsi sa bon bsams nas ni/ /'od
222b4(rgyud 'grel): zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs/ /bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'dzag palas/ /snying ga'i pad+ma'i ge sar la/ /mthe bong tsam gyi zlum po la/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /A li kA li dag las btung/ /mdog dkar hA? ni? shin tu mdzes/ /zla ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro/ /de yi
222b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi sgo rnams las/ /thig le bsgom par rab tu grags/ /skra yi rtse mo brgya yi cha/ /dul phan gzugs su rtag tu gnas/ /rnam par shes pa'i dngos po yi/ /mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can/ /sems gyi mtshan nyid mi shes pas/ /thog leg gnas kyi go
222b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ang? bstas snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo dang ni/ /thig pa lam gyi sgo dag tu/ /bla ma'i lung las gus pa yis/ /rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya/ /phyi rol pa yi lam dag dang/ /bstan bcos las ni mi snyed cing/ /bstan pa yang ni rnyed slar te/ /de sbyor bas na rnyed par
222b7(rgyud 'grel): dka' / /bla? ma'i bsnyen bkur gus pa ye?/ /thabs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /bla ma'i zhal gyis lam gyis ni/ /mkhas pas 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /mnyam par bzhag ste dngos po bsdom/ /chos kyi sngon 'gro yid? yin te/ /yid kyis 'jug
223a1(rgyud 'grel): cing yid kyi bdag?/ yid kyi rgyal po'i dka' drin gyis/ /smra? ba dag ni byed? par byung/ /de bas thams cad yid rang bzhin/ /blo ldan yid las byung zhes bya/ /gal te bzla 'dod rnal 'byor pa/ /snying gi bsam dang bsgom pa ste/ /sngom dang rgyu'i? 'gyur
223a2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon ni/ /de nyid kho na gzugs? med ngo/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sa bon ni/ /ye shes de nyid mthong ba med/ /gzugs sogs srid pa'i 'dod spyed la/ /sa bon lnga ni bsgom bar bya/ /kun nas kun tu 'jug pa dang/ /'gro dang 'gro min yang dag dan?  pa?/ /tag tu sna?
223a3(rgyud 'grel): ba gzer? ba bya /ye shes rnam shes sa bon ni/ /nyi ga la'i sgra dang yang dag ldan/ /srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis/ dag gi yi ge spongs nas ni//yid kyi bzlas 'de? yang? dag ldan/ /rtag pa chos? kyi dbyings nyid kyi/ /mi? g.yo go 'phang rgyun? tu gnas//
223a4(rgyud 'grel): rtag du 'bang? gong? gos med pas/ ye shes las ni ? shes thim/ /rnam shes ye shes lter 'gyur? ?/ /byang chub rim pa mthong 'gyur zhes/ /mar me lta bu thams cad la/ /snad 'gyur mtshan ma dang po ste/ /srin du me byed? lta bu dang/ /rdul? mthong mtshan
223a5(rgyud 'grel): ma gnyis pa yin/ /nyon mongs 'joms? pa'i mtshan nyid bdags?/ /rdul dran dkar po'i rnam par ni/ /phyogs su de bzhin mthong 'gyur ba/ /rtag ni gsum pa yin par shes/ /'dod ba lha yi longs spyod rnams/ /sems kyis mthang ba bzhi pa ste//
223a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs gyi lha? mthong snga? pa yin/ /gzugs tshad? spyod 'grub ste/ /chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa bdun/ /sangs rgyas 'dras bu brgyad pa ste/ /rnal 'byor bas ni ma g.yengs bsgoms/ /snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rtse? gcig bsgom pas
223a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob 'gyur/ /ye shes bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gang du 'pho? ba'i man ngag ni/ /bla ma'i rgyud la yod la blang/ /'chi ba rnam rtog mkha' spyod 'gro/ /gang zhig dang med brtson med glun po shes rab med/ /bla ma'i skyan? blta nyas brjod g.yo
223b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrus bla ma bslus/? /tshogs su mi blta lkog? tu brnyas byed 'jum tshig sgra/ bu dang rgyal po dge slong rigs bzang yin yang spang/ /skyon rnams spangs pa'i gzugs spyos ma yin la/ /bla ma la gus snying rje gzhan phan shes rab thabs dang ldan/ /spyod lam rnam bzhir mi g.yongs
223b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom la brtson? zhing rim par ston?/ /de lta bu la sngags gyi de nyid legs bar bstan par bya/ ye shes kyi de nyid kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o// /de nas sngags kyi mtshan+nyid bshad/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams rtag tu bzla?/ sngags dang yi ge tha mi? dang?/ /gnyis
223b3(rgyud 'grel): med rtag tu bzla ba ni/ gal te bzla? 'dod? rnal 'byor pas/ /snying gis bsam dang bsgom pa ste/ /rdo rje rgyu gyur sa bon ni/ /de kho na nyid gzugs med do/ /rang gi snying gar sa bon gsal ba la/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi bskor la bzla/ /mo? de pa pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/
223b4(rgyud 'grel): snying po'o/ /oM? aSh+TaM? na nA ya/ yig? tu? ? ge sha bad+ha? mA ni/ tsa tu bi? sha ti nai ta ya/ Sho Dwa? shabU dzA ya/ gralNa? dzI? mU ta pa? pu Sha?/ ka pA la mA lA ne kaMd+ha ri NaM/ Arta? ta ku ra tsi? t+tA ya/ ?? Shtri? Ne/ oM mA ra ya mA ya ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gardza ya garba?  ya/ tardza ya tardza
223b5(rgyud 'grel): ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sapta sA ha rA na/ basta bard+ha?/ dA? gA Sh+Ta nyI? griN+Na griN+Na?/ sarba duSh+Ta? sha h+rUM< ha hA hi hI hu hU he he ho hau/ ha ha(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra gpu? dzu si ta pa ra ma oM ke shwo re ka pA la/ mA la ra d+ha ri Ni du d+hi ra pri ye na/ pa si hUM phaT swAhA
223b6(rgyud 'grel): bau DI'i? snying po'o/ /oM badzra tsa TE? shwa rI? kha TI ri ma hA bat+ta? ? pA le mA le ku ho/ /gU ga Da Dha ya/ sapa dl tring ya/ A karb+ha b+hu hUM phaT swAhA/ tsau rI ?O/ /oM badzra pe ? yI kha kha khA khI hI sarba duSh+TaM bi ka Ta/ be She ta ri ni bi ki tA laM ka ra b+hu ShaM ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa
223b7(rgyud 'grel): ba tsa/ ba laM ba sa ma nu sma ri/ pra sha ya ma b+ha la ma ta/ ? ta pa ya sarba hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ bet+tA li'i 'o/ /oM badzra ma he sh+ra ri ha ha ha ha ru lu b+hyo hUM phaT/ ba khra yi sarba duSh+Ta na naM nirma tha la hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ g+hasma rI'i'o/ /oM badzra ha b+ha ba ti badzra gu dza sha ra ba hUM/ bi tsi ta
224a1(rgyud 'grel): pi shi ta di ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta ? sa ma ya ma nu ma ra ha na ha na/ raM ga raM ga ya/ spu ra spu ra yA/ pa sha sarba b+hu ta ta/ na d+ha na d+ha sa ta ya/ ha ha ha ha hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ puk+kra? sI'i 'o/ /oM pI shA tsi par+Na sha ba rI sarba ma di raMpra? sha ma ni/ hUM hUM hUM mo su tra rit+ta? phaT
224a2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ ri? khrod mA'i'o/ /oM badzra su laM ni b+hinpa sarba duSh+TaM? tri da ya/ A karma ya/ A karma ya/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mirma tha ra ya bi laM pa/ sa ma ya ma nu smA ra hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ tsanda lA'i'o/ /oM badzra pa ra mag+hu je ka sa la bi b+hu Shi ta sarba duSh+TaM mo ha ni so ye/ hya? hI ga pa ti
224a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra b+hU dzai sa ri b+ha hUM/ baM baM ba sa pa ri ni sarba duSh+TaM/ tso ni ri hUM phaT/ DoM ni ni'i 'o/ /oM badzra pa ta ba mu khaM yo gi shwa ri/ hi hi hi hi dza:hUM phaT swAhA/ rta gdod mi'i 'o/ /ja? da pa ra/ oM badzra daM yu d+ha ra ta mu khI hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phag gdod ma'i'o/ /oM badzra sA?
224a4(rgyud 'grel): tU saM dze? la ni marta? yatA ni kA ni rU pa ni mahA pha la ya ni na te/ kA ma rU pa ti taM twad ho hUM phaT swAhA/ khyi gdod ma'i'o/ /oM tsan+d+ra sUrya hUM dra?sa ni si taM ba ga te/ saM ti ni taM taM taM baM baM hUM phaT swAhA/ seng ge gdod la sogs pa'i sngags so/ /oM aM swAhA/ bdag
224a5(rgyud 'grel): med ma'i'o/ /oM yi? swAhA/ aau rI'i'o/ /oM AM swAhA/ tsaM rI'i'o/ /oM AM swAhA/ /pet+tA lI'i'o/ /oM oM swAhA/ g+hasma rI'i'o/ /oM a'uM swAhA/ puk+ka sI'i'o/ /oM ri li swAhA/ tsa NA lI'i'o/ /oM laM swAhA/ DeM ji ni'i'o/ /rtsa ba'i 'o/ /oM ha ya gri ba hUM phaT swAhA/
224a6(rgyud 'grel): rba? gdong ma'i'o/ /oM badzra pu ra gri ba hUM phaT swAhA/ /phag dod? ma'i'o/ oM ku ku ru gri ba hUM phaT swAhA/ khyi gdod ma'i'o/ /moM ri swAhA/ sha pa rI'i'o/ /oM badzra sarba? gri ba hUM phaT swAhA/ seng gdong ma la doD pa'i snying po 'di bo'o/ rnal 'byor zlas la brtson pa yis/ /gnas la phyag 'tshal yi ge lnga/ /
224a7(rgyud 'grel): zha ba'i thig le dbyibs mdog brnyan/ /bde ba me rtog stong pa nyid/ /mi rtog ldong ba gnyis su med/ /bla ma'i man ngag sa la bzla/ bla ma tha ma la bar mthong dug sel bdud rtsi spod/ /rigs dang bsnyan bskur gyis khengs 'jig rten chos brgyad 'tshol/ /
224b1(rgyud 'grel): de 'dra'i slob ma'ong? ba snying rjes dge ba de yang gzung/ /dal 'jam brtson zhi bka' sgrub thos sam sgom pa pos/ /rigs gnas 'byor ba dgos kyang de ni gzung slar bya/ /dbang bskur rgyud bshad sngags dang gdams ngag bstan par 'os/ /? ? ?
224b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim ba ste gsum pa'o/ /da ni bdag gi de kho na nyid bshad/ /de nyid shes bas mnyam bzhag med/ /dngos po rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod/ /phyi nas de'i dbye ba yis/ /lha rnams rnam par dag par bya/ yi shes skyed g.yos
224b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams sbyangs nas/ /lus can phung po khams skye mched/ /rigs lnga yum lnga rdo rje ma/ /gcig gnyis gsum bzhi snga dang bcu/ /brgya stong khri 'bum bye bdag gangs med sru? yi gsang babsam mi khyab/ /gsung dang thugs kyi gnyis med bsam mi ?
224b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rnams la gan pa'i phyir/ /lus med rdo rje can da nyid/ /shas rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /khams gsum 'ang dag thams cad ni/ /rmi lam sgyu ma ji bzhin du/ /chos brgyad rtogs pa ding du dong/ /gnyis med mi rtog mi nges par bya/ /pha rol
224b5(rgyud 'grel): phyin drug spyod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /sems can mi rtog sgyu mas byas/ /chos kyi dbyings la bdag spyod pas/ /grog po med par gcig pur rgyu/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya/ /ji ltar
224b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi ? snying po blangs nas rtsigs ma 'dod/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga brnyed nas/ /rtog pa thams cad spangs nas su/ /sangs rgya thams cad bstan pa bzhin/ /rtog med cing 'dzin longs spyod bya/ /rgyud rnams kun nas rgyal bas bstan/ /rtog pas
224b7(rgyud 'grel): dmyal bar ? 'gyur zhing/ /'gro drag rgyu mcho? 'khor bar 'gro/ rtog pa med na grol bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su 'gro/ de bas rnal 'byor bdag nyid ni/ /de ni yang dag don rigs pas/ /snying rje 'gro don bsam pa can/ /dmigs pa med par brtan
225a1(rgyud 'grel): par dpyad/ /dogs med seng ge bzhin du rgyu/ /'on kyang slob dpon smad mi bya/ /rdo rje spun la mi dgu min/ /rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams/ /gtan med sgyu mas spang bya zhing/ /de nyid bcu shes bskyed rdzogs kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa
225a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po san tshogs ye shes rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su brgyan/ /la las nyon mongs zhi byed lam bzang lam can lus ngag lang sgrub 'bras bu ni/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong 'dra ting 'dzin dag la blo gnas pas/ /'dod chags la/
225a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs nad can ye shes sgyu ma'i sman gyis bdag gzhan gso bar bya/ /bdag byin rlabs pa man ngag dag /gang gi bla ma bsam bsgrubs/ /rtag dang chad pa la dmigs pa la/ /mi de phyir log gyur pa yin/ /mchod pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /bla ma mchod
225a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag brtsam/ /de mnyes? pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i/ /ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /bla med thob pa'i slob dpon ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchod byas pas/ /de yi msod nams ma byas shing/ /dga' thub ma bsnyen gang zhig yod/ /de nyid mi zang 'dod
225a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang/ /shar tu khyad par can de nyid/ /de dang de nyid bla mas byin/ /bla ma yis ni sdig pa 'phrog /slob dpon gyis ni 'jigs pa sel/ /slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal gyi/ /rgya mtsho 'jigs las pha rol sgrol/ /gang zhig nga rgyal
225a6(rgyud 'grel): byi 'khengs shing/ /yang dag min pa phun? 'byin dang/ /de nyid chos brnyas bcas pa la?/ /de pa de nyid bstan pa min/ /bla ma la gus bden bar smra/ /rnam par mkhas shing rgyud gcig la/ /dam tshig spyod par bsrung bdag /rim pa de la bstan par bya/ / 
225a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi de kho na nyid kyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nyid bzhi bsgom rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sgrib sbyang bar chad zhi ba dang/ /tshogs bsags mkha' spyod 'pho ba'i phyir/ /chos sbyong mkha' 'gro gtor ma byin/ /shar gyi dur khrod nam mkha' la/ /
225b1(rgyud 'grel): chos 'byung sum rtse bar ma ni/ /lte bar maM las sa yi lha/ /gser mdog bum pa 'dzin byed ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad zla'i gdan la legs bzhugs ma/ /mkha' yi yi dags chogs kyis bstor/ /shar la sogs ba'i phyogs dang mtshams/ /dur
225b2(rgyud 'grel): khrod bstan pa phyogs skyong 'khor/ /steng gi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /baM las tshangs pa gdong bzhi gser gyi mdog /g.yas na mi 'jigs 'phreng ba 'dzn/ /g.yon na spyi blugs rtse gsum 'dzin/ /gdrugs? khams lha yihs bskor nas bzhags/ /pi las pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /bu las
225b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po dkar/ /gdengs ka sprul zhags pad+ma 'dzin/ /phyogs mtshams klu chen brgyad po ni/ /dur khrod bstan ba lta bur bsgom/ /phyogs mtshams lha rnams sngon ltar bsgom/ /'dod pa'i lha yi 'khor gyi bkor/ /dza:hUM baM ho:rim brjod nus/ /go dI la sogs lha
225b4(rgyud 'grel): mo yis/ /dgug zhugs gnyis med gyur nas kyang/ /phyogs skyong 'khor bcas thugs kyi rigs/ /mi bskyod rang nyid dur khrod brgyan/ /mthing nag rdor bril yum dang bcas/ /zhal gcig g.yas brkyang bsgom par bya/ /lha rnams sku yi rigs yin te/ /dkar
225b5(rgyud 'grel): por dur khrod brgyad dang ldan/ /rdo rje dril bu yum dang bcas/ /zhal gcig g.yas brkyang bsgom par bya/ /klu brgyang gsung rabs dmar po ste/ 'od dpag rang bzhin nur khrod brgyad/ /mdog dmar rdor dril yum dang bcas/ /zhal gcig g.yas brkyang bsgom par bya//
225b6(rgyud 'grel): rang rang rgyan dang sku gsung thugs/ /lce? rnams rdo rje sdu gus myang/ /bdag nyid bdud rtsi myangs par blta/ /gtor ma gsum ni byin brlabs la/ /phyogs skyong rnams la dbul ba ni/ /oM inda dza ma dza la/ dza k+Sha b+hU ta bah+ri ba u rAk+Sha/ tsan+d+ra sUrya ma yu bapA? ta la la pA ta/
225b7(rgyud 'grel): laM ab+ha? sap+pa? swAhA/ aM daM baM bi g+huM? 226a1(rgyud 'grel): rokhA? tA? ting pa khadzdza yi b+ha DeM/ ma ya ca pidzdza yi a i/ ha liM kA li nyA ra pa Ni/ ya i/ du d+du ru padzdza a yi/ tsa yu sa ma nyAts+tshu? ri sihpA? kap+pA ra lA yi ya yi/ mA la a'in+d+ra Ni?/ sA li? ta hi rha du khA yaM a i/ de kha? ? khe ?/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha?
226a2(rgyud 'grel): mu ni ni a i/ ni raM ta la aM ge tsa DA thA? a i wita i?/ ma la ya dza kunda ru baTTa i/ TiNI ma ta ti tsa badzdza a i zhes bya'i rdo rje'i blus so/ /yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ phyi nang 'thong 'thung byin ma/ oM bid+hA?
226a3(rgyud 'grel): sa tra sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa ti Sh+Tha/ dri d+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo? me b+ha ba/ a nu rat+to? me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi mE pra yats+tsha/ sarba rdarma? su tsa me/ tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga ba na/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA
226a4(rgyud 'grel): me ? badzra? badzri b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwa a(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid ltar bsgoms lag gnyis kyis/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bskor bar bya/ /hUM hUM hUM gsum brjod dril bur bya'o/ /rdo ra dri pa thal mo cuags kar sbyar/ /snying rje chen po bskyed nas ni/ /rdo rje blu blangs smin? lam
226a5(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /mchog gsum ? dang phyir? med cing/ /'dod? chags la sogs skyon dang bral/ /gzung dang 'dzin dang rnam par spangs/ /de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshl/ /chos rnams sgra ma lta bur mdzes/ /gnyis sbros gnyis sbyang gnyis su med/ /lus lan? don
226a6(rgyud 'grel): du ? ma sbyang/ /dngos po bral bar? bdag? phyag 'tshal/ /sems can thams cad sdig med cing/ /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/ sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad gyur cig /laM? de ny+d nas zhugs nas kyang/ /ma brgal ba rnams bsgral pa dang/ /
226a7(rgyud 'grel): ma grol pa rnams brol? pa shog?/ rnal 'byor chos dang dam tshig la/ /da? lta nyid du gnas par shog /g.yon pa khu tshur spyi? dgar bzhag /phyag g.yas brkyang ste gshegs gsol ba/ /sarba g+ha Ta ni prih+Na prih+na hUM phaT/ /oM A:hUM ru:bsam gtan
226b1(rgyud 'grel): mi sbyong? nyal mi nus/ /thabs dang shes pa pha rol phyin/ /ljang tshe lha mo'i glus sdul zhing/ /langs nas khrus byed dbang bskur bsam/ /gtor ma maN+Dal mchod sogs rnams/ /?  bcas pas bya ba? yin/ /? ? ?/ /sbyor lam rnams? ni ?
226b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa/ /de nyid bzhi yi rin las spyad/ /rgyud dang bla ma'i man ngag la brten nas/ /dgyes rdo'i? rim pa bzhi yis sgrub thabs byas/ /'di las dri med dge pa gang bsags pas/ /'gro kun dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'grub par shog /slob dpon/ rba las? mdzad pa'i ?
226b3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i sgrub thabs/ /de kho na nyid bzhi'i rim pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta dang/ lo tsA ba bla? na d+harma blo gros kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /dpal rgyas rdo rje'i sgrags? pa? ?
226b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ /sh+rI nye badzre sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng pa can/ /nam mkha' khyab par gar mdzad cing/ /bdag med ma dang gnyis med gzugs/ /bde chen de
226b5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /de nyid rnyed dka' de bas kyang/ /bla ma'i bka 'don shin tu dka' / /bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul/ /'gro phan lam la brten par gyis/ /yon tan brgyad ldan sngags pa yis/ /bde ba'i stan? la nyer 'dug ste/ /sems nyid
226b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying? gar bsam/ /'od kyis bdag dang sems can gzung?/ de las? chos 'byung yangs la blta/ /mi 'gyur ba nyid yongs gyur las/ /dpal ldan rdo rje he ru ka/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis nag po che/ /gar gyi zhabs kyis nyi ma mnan/ /phyag rgya drug gis brgyad? pa
226b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rdo rje thod pa gangs g.yon 'chang/ /gri gug thod 'dzin pa yi/ /bdag med ma yis mgul nas 'khyud/ /spyan gsum dbus sgra gyen du 'bar/ /bde bas gang ba'i rang bzhin du/ /bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya/ /snying gang ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /
227a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis grub pa'i lta bkug ste/ /mchod pa la sogs byas pa'i mthar/ /bdag dang gnyis su med par bsam/ /de nas dbang bskur byin gyis brlab/ /yang na mchod pas mnyes bya ste/ /dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor ba yis/ /dang po sangs
227a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mchod par bya/ /bde chen dam pa de blangs nas/ /lte ba'i rtsa bar ngal bas? ste/ /bdud rtsi btung bar bya ba nyid/ /de yi lus ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /lta bar tsaN+Da li 'bar bar/ /bde bar gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te
227a3(rgyud 'grel): pa sregs bltam? las ri bong? 'dzag /thogs ma tha ma dbus med cing/ /'khor chan mya ngan 'das pa min/ /bdag dang gzhan yang yod min pa/ /'dri ni mchog tu bde chen bo/ /de lta bu dar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dang po nyid du bden pa'i byin brlabs
227a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod?/ /gnas dang yul du rgyu ba'o/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis rlbs shig ces brjod la/ /mthar yang ye shes 'od ni shin tu zag /rdo rje snying po mkha' dang mtshungs/ /rdul bral thar ster zhib ste/ /nga yi pha ni nga nyid do/ /'dir
227a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rigs skyes dam tshig ldan/ /rjes su chags par dgyes rdor 'chang/ /bla ma la bus snying rje can/ /skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig /lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol/ /zab mo'i chos 'di 'don pa dang/ /btsun mo'i khu bas mnyam zas can/ /skye zhing
227a6(rgyud 'grel): skye bar 'gyur bar shog /de nas gtor ma gtang nas su/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ /bde bar gshes pa'i sngags bzlas shing/ /lha yi sbyor bas rgyu bar bya/ rtag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing/ /rtag tu dam chos bshad par bya/ /sems
227a7(rgyud 'grel): can thams? cad rtag tu bskyang/ /he ru ka dpal rtag tu mchod/ /snga? tsha sbyin sreg mchod sbyin bya/ /chu sbyin rang gi sbyin pas bya/ /bla ma bde gshegs bdun par te/ /maN+Dal phyi der byas nas su/ /mchod cing bstod de gshegs gsol gyi/ /gling
227b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi nyi ma re re? bya/ /de bzhin thun mtshums gzhan yang/ /bdag la byin gyis brlabs par bya/ /skyil krung bcas nas mig brtan te/ /sne? rtsad bsam pa mi g.yo bas/ /brel kyang skad cig skabs bshol la/ /khyim pa yis kyang bsgom par bya/ /sbyong lam dag
227b2(rgyud 'grel): la bab na yang/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur bsbom/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i yid kyi nyal/ /sems can don la chags pas ldang/ /blo bur nyid du dran bya zhing/ /ble bur tshul du rnal 'byor spyod/ /mkha' la rgya ba'i bya bzhin du/ /sngags pas chags pa
227b3(rgyud 'grel): med par gnas/ /gzhan du g.yang bas chags sags dang/ /gnyid kyi zil gnon ma gyur cig/ sgrub ba'i thabs ni rin po che/ /rnal 'byor pa yang bskal pa bzang/ /bzang po nga yis mdor sdus pas/ /dge can gang yin rol par shog/ dpal he ru ka gzhal gcig
227b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang/ bod kyi lo tsa pa sman ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// / */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ha badzra
227b5(rgyud 'grel): sA d+ha:/ bod skad du/ dpal gyi rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ dpal kyi rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang/ /sgo bzhir gnas pa'i gto?  rI? sogs/ /mtshams kyi skul byed ma bzhil/ /sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ /rnal 'byor glo gzhan
227b6(rgyud 'grel): don? du ni/ /bdag? gis dgyes pa'i rdo rje yi/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgrub thabs 'di/ /mi nus bzhin du brtsam par bya/ /slob dpon de nyid thos pa dang/ /dbang rnams tshul bzhin mnos pa dang/ /bsgom dang chog mkhas pa dang/ /bka' yi gnang pa thob pa
227b7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /dngos grub 'dod pa'i sems kyis su/ /dur khrod dang ni lta rten dang/ /rang gi khyim dang chu 'bram du/ /'jigs pa'i sems med bsam gtan bya/ /dran thar rnam pa bdun dag gis/ /lus sogs bdun po dag nas ni/ /skad cig ma yi rnal 'byor mas/ /rdo
228a1(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' i lus byas te/ /snying gar pad+ma 'dab brgyad de bsgom/ /de steng nyi dkyil hUM bsams te/ /'bar ba me yis rab bsregs pas/ /ye shes mig dang ldan bya ste/ /sngon du dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang/ /lha mo brgyad dag mngon par mtho ba
228a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi dang nang dang bla med ba'i/ /mchod ba rnams gyis yang dag mchod/ /sngon 'gro rjes su phyag byas te/ /sngag pa byas pa bshags pa dang/ /phyis mi byed par sdom pa gzung/ /dge ba byas rjes yi rang bya/ /sangs rgyas dgyes ba'i rdo rje dang/ /de gsungs pa
228a3(rgyud 'grel): yi chos rnams dang/ /ma brgyad lha mo dge 'dun la/ /bdag ni dang bas skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag gis bskyed/ /theg ba chen po la gnas bgyi/ /kun gyi don ni bdag nyid 'bul/ /de yang rgya cher bsngo bar dgyi/ /dang po byams pa bsgom par
228a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gnyis pa snying rje bye brag bsgom/ /gsum pa dga' ba bsgom pa ste/ /kun gyi tha mar btad snyoms so/ /dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis ba la ni sa bon 'dus/ /gsum pa la ni gzugs rdzogs te/ /bzhi pa la ni yig 'byung? dang?/ /de 'og stong pa'i
228a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub ni/ /phyi dang nang med? sdod? smon? no/ /bsam nas de nyid kho na yi/ /lus su yang dag bsgom par bya/ /oM shUn+ya tAdzthA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma bo haM/ sngon gyi smon lam rjes dran na/ /de kho na nyih+d las bdas nas/ /'og phyogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /de stongs nyi
228a6(rgyud 'grel): na hUM? ? ?/ /haM? las rdo rje sa gzhir gyur/ /de kred? bgegs ? hu bsams pa'i/ /rak+Sha sgra dang ldan pa yis/ /tshogs gyi bgegs rnams sel bar byed/ /slar 'dus rdo rje bur du gyur/ bla re yang ni bsdom par bya/ /steng 'og phyogs med
228a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyibs/ /sgo yi dbyoms? 'dra nyang du bsgom// e gzugs bdag med ma 'dra bar/ /bsams te de las 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas de dbyibs ni/ /gru gsum gyen dkar yang dag ldan/ /de yi dbus su bcam? pa ni/ yaM dang raM dang baM
228b1(rgyud 'grel): dang? laM/ /de steng rang nyid rnam shes ni/ /aM baM nyid ni yang dag gnas/ /sgro dang bdu ba'i sbyor ba yi/ /gzhal yas khang du gyur ba ste// thol gcig pa ru bsam par bya/ /ngos bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /rnga babs bzhis kyang rnam par mdzes//
228b2(rgyud 'grel): dra ba dra byed kyis brgyan pa/ /lta mo brgyad kyi 'od kyis kyang/ /gsal bar lha yi rnam pas bya/ /de nas pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /kha dog dmar po nyi ma gnas/ /de steng bdud bzhi rnam par brgyan/ /tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag /shar sgo la sogs bzhir gnas pa/ /tshangs pa dang ni dbang
228b3(rgyud 'grel): bo dang/ /nye dbang dang ni drag po rim pa bzhin du gnas pa'o/ /mtshams bzhi por na shes bya ba/ /gshin rje dang ni nor bdag dang/ /bden bral dang ni thag bzangs ris/ /bug sI sogs gdan du btags/ /de ltar pho brang bye drag rdzogs/ /de bzhin gsh+gs pa 'byung
228b4(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /nga rgyal 'di yis bya ba ste/ /nga 'am rtag tu bsam par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ dbus kyi gzhi stengs A li ni/ /bcu drug rim pa gnyis shes bya/ /de 'gyur zla ba gnyis pa ni/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /de steng yang dag bsam
228b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ni/ /ka' li bzhi bcu nyid 'gyur las/ /rta bdun pa ru gyur pa ste/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de dbus hUM las 'byung ba ni/ /rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa/ /lte ba hUM gis mtshan pa ste/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /de la 'od 'phros sems can don/ /byas
228b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhi bo nyid la bstim?/ /'og? gi ga? dbur gyur ba ni/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes so/ /de las thig le brgyad chad de/ /gaM?  dang ci dang baM g+haM/ baM dang saM dang laM dang TaM/ /zla?  ba nyi mar yang? dag? ldan/ /sa bon brgyad las gyur pa ni/ /gri dang rde'u chung du? sral? sprul?/ /?
228b7(rgyud 'grel): she? dge slong? 'khor lo dang/ /rdo rje la sogs rim par skyes/ /garShi shar gyi sgo na gnas/ /tsau rI lho yi sgo na gnas/ /nub kyi sgo ru be tU lI/ /byang gi so ru g+hA? ? rI/ /puska? sI ni dbang ldan du/ /ri khrod ma ni byin za'i grwar/ /gtum mo bden bral la gnas te/ /g.yung
229a1(rgyud 'grel): mo 'di ru blung na gnas/ /lha mo bskyad pa rdzogs nas su/ /gtso bo 'od kyi go dbu la/ /lha mos bdag po ming?  mthong nas/ /god bu mchog la gsol ba gdab/ /snying rje yid kyis bcom ldan bzhengs/ /puk+ta? a'i ni bdag la skyobs/ /stong pa'i ting
229a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin slangs nas ni/ /bdag la 'dod pa'i bde ma mdzod/ /khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'bum pas/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin yongs spangs te/ /ri khrod ma dbras? grub par ni/ /ye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig /'jig rten phyir smon 'dod pa'i gtso/ /ci phyir stong pa nyid la
229a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /khyod mi bzhugs na phyogs mi khums/ /gtam mo bdag ni gsol ba 'debs/ /g.yung mo bangs? ni yid? rmongs pas/ /snying rje ? chad ma mdzad par/ /khyod kyi bdag ni thugs 'tshal gyis/ /mig 'phrul lta bur khyod bzhengs shig/ bskul pa'i
229a4(rgyud 'grel): glu'o/ /bskul bas sngon gyi byang chub ni/ /smon lam rjes su dran te bzhengs/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis nag po cha?/ /gcer bu spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs?/ /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor gnas/ /g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin/ /g.yon pa na ni
229a5(rgyud 'grel): thod pa 'dzin/ /zhabs kyi bdud bzhi rnam par mnan/ /brgyang bskum tshul du gnas pa'o/ /gau rI kha dog nag mo ste/ /tso rA kha dog btsong dang mtshungs/ /ro langs ma ni gser bsregs mdog /za phod ma? ni marka? ta mtshungs/ /spos mo'i mgo ni sngon mo'o/ /ri khrod
229a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ni zla nor khong/ /gtum? mo? nam mkha' ljang gu skye/ /g.yung mo sna tshogs pa ru 'dod/ /go rI g.yas na gri gug ste/ /g.yon na nya ni de bzhin no/ /chom rkun g.yas na Da ma ru/ /g.yon pa na ni phag pa'o/ /ro langs g.yas ni ru sbal te/ /g.yon pa non pad+ma'i snod/ /
229a7(rgyud 'grel): za phor? ma yid? yas? na sdul?/ /g.yon ba'i lag na thod pa'o/ /spos mo g.yas na seng ge ste/ /g.yon gyi phyag na dgra sta 'dzin/ /don? pa ma g.yas dge slong ste/ /g.yon pa na ni sil byed do/ /gdum mo g.yes na 'khor lo ste/ /g.yon pa na ni thod pa 'dzin/ /
229b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yung mo g.yas ni rdo rje ste/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no/ /skyel krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /go rIl?  sogs phyag gnyis shes/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du yin/ /phyag rgya lngas ni shin tu mdzes/ /tshangs pa la sogs gdan pa bzhugs/ /de ltar sku rnams
229b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa dang/ /rang gi snying gar? pad+ma bsam/ /de dbus nyi ma hUM las bsam/ /de las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /de las hUM gis mtshan pa ste/ /de 'gyur ye shes sems dpa' bsam/ /de nyid bar nyid hUM rdo rje/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs pa'o/ /de khyad? rin? la
229b3(rgyud 'grel): kun la yang/ /ji ltar nang du shes bar bya/ /de las 'od 'phros bde gshegs rnams/ /dza:hUM baM ho bka' lung? gis/ /gau rI la sogs rnams kyis ni/ /spyan drangs nas ni de stims nas/ /ye shes 'khor lo chen bo rang? gsang? rgyas? byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sgrubs? te bzhan na yod ma yin?/ /?
229b4(rgyud 'grel): ? ? ? rdo rje ma khaM? las zha sngar rdo rje ma/ /maM las sar? sna rdo rje ma/ /raM las 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /aM las phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /naM las bdag med rdo rje ma/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus yid rim bzhin de ltar dgod/ /phyag gnyis zhal gcig ngo la gdan/ /gri gug
229b5(rgyud 'grel): ? pa phyag na bsnams/ /i las mkha' sbyong mar shes bya/ /a las sa spyod ma ru 'dod/ /hUM las zhabs bskyed 'og nas bsam/ /de ltar sku gsung thugs de yang/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rigs gsum 'dod/ /rang snying sa bon khyad par sngo?/ /lcags?
229b6(rgyud 'grel): kyug? lcags? kyi ? ? gyis/ /sangs? rgyas spyan? drangs mdun du mchod/ /dbang bskur ba ni bslang ba ste/ /mgon po de bzhin gshegs thams cad/ /khyod kyis bdag la dbang bskur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa khro pa dang/ /lha rnams kyis ni mdud
229b7(rgyud 'grel): ? ?/ /du? ma? pas de la dbang bskur bas/ /? ?/ pi? pa? ka/ ba marta/ bi la skad cig bzhi pa'o/ /A nanpa/ par mA nanda dang/ bi ra mA nanda dang/ /sa ma dzA nanda'o/ /dga' ba bzhi'i? /rgod ba dang/ blta ba dang/ lag bcangs dang/ /'byung?  pa ni slob?
230a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon dang /gsang ba dang/ shes rab ye shes dang/ bde ba chen po de? kho na nyid do kha? ? dbang rnams 'bras bu ni/ /rtsa bar mi ? pas brgyan pa'o/ /sems dang phan pa rin chen dang/ /'od dpag med pas brgyan pa'o/ /de dA tsinda? bid+ha? lAM?/ /
230a2(rgyud 'grel): g+ha sA? rI rnams brgyan pa'o/ /mi bskyod sangs rgyas rin chen dang/ /tshe dpag med kyis brgyan pa ni/ /spos mo rdon mo gtum mo dang/ /g.yung mo la sogs brgyad pa'o/ /oM a b+hi ShI khyad tu mAM sarba ta thA ga ta ho/ /'bud dang 'bang dang thon pa dang/ /?
230a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang 'bras bu lnga/ /de 'gyur bdud rtsi ro myang ba/ /rdo rje nas gyi 'bru bsam ste/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje glag bo/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ o mraM? ta sa na badzra sA sb+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ lha mo brgyad rnams spros nas ni/ /mchod pa bgyad kyis sngon bzhin bya/ /dkyil
230a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gtso bo nyid la mchod/ /oM sarba ta tha ga ta pA dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha/ rnal 'byor ma rnams de dag gis/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo la bstad? la/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor brgyad kyis bskor/ /nyid kyi thugs kyi khyod dgongs 'grub/ /rgya dang mi rgyu
230a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba kun 'grub pa/ /snying rje thugs kyes sems can byang chub tu/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma'i sgrub pa'i yid dgyes mjod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu ti badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de yan chad bsnyen pa pa nye ba'i bsnyen pa bshad nas/ /sgrubs dang rang sgrub pa chen
230a6(rgyud 'grel): po bshad par bya ste/ dkyil? 'khor lha? rnams lus la bsdu/ /lte bar tsanDra rI wang? la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te/ /bsregs pas haM las ri bo 'byung/ /dang po sprin dang 'dra ba mthad?/ /gnyis su du ba
230a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dral mthong/ /gsung pa glog gi rnam pa ste/ /bzhi pa mar me 'dra ba dang/ /lnga pa thams cad snang ba ste/ /sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/ /byis ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtshungs/ /rmi lam rnam pa skang cig go /rang gi snying ga 'di nyid du/ /spros dang bsdu pa'i sbyor
230b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /spros med sgon pa'i sbyor ba ste/ /thog ma mdza' dbus med pa yis/ /'khor med mya ngan 'das pa mes/ /de ltar ma yin dmigsma yin/ /zhes mar ma'i rtse mo'i bar du'o/ /bar chod bgegs gyi ni tshugs phyir/ /gtong mu rgyan rtsa sbyin par bya/ /oM in+d+ra
230b2(rgyud 'grel): dzwa mdzal?/ yak+Sha b+hU ta/ patni? ba u/ rAk+Sha tsanda/ sU dzdza/ mA ta ?/ ha la pA tA la/ aTTha? sa p+pa/ i daM/ ba liM/ b+hUM dza/ dzaM g+ha puShpa/ d+hU pa/ hUM sa/ bi g+ha/ aM b+ha pap+pa/ ka? sA d+ha/ /ban+ti khu ni pheT gA da/ oM A ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmANA/ A dya nutpa n+na twAta/
230b3(rgyud 'grel): aM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ oM h+ri lokyA k+She ra hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swAhA/ snying po'o/ /bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor gang/ /de ni dag pa rjes su dran/ /snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po ste/ /yan lag nag po byams pa yin/ /phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas yin/ /khros pas
230b4(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'dul ba yin/ /spyan gsum kho na sku gsum mo/ /rul pa bden pa bzhi po'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po rdo rje ma/ /tshor? ba gsang ba'i go rI ma/ /'du shes phung po chu ma'o/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam par shas pa bdag med ma/ /don dam la ni
230b5(rgyud 'grel): phung po med/ /skye? mched? drug ni dag pa ni/ /mig ni gti mug rdo rje ma/ /rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ /sna la ser sna rdo rje ma/ /kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /sa ni puk+ka sI ru bshad/ /chu yi khams ni rjon pa ma/ /drod ni gtum mor shes par
230b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rlung ni gsung? mor rab tu brags/ /gzugs ni gau rA ri yang dag brjod/ /sgra ni chom rkun ma rab brjod/ /pri ni ro langs ma ru bshad/ /ro yi tshul ni tha? yod? ma/ /reg bya sa sbyong? ma zhes bya/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mkha' spyad ma/ /de ltar dag pas rjes dran bya//
230b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi sgrub thabs rim pa 'di/ /blo zhan don du bdag gis brtsams/ /de yi dge ba gang yin pas/ /sems can 'khor ba las sgrol shog /dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon chen po bde ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // 
231a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA tsan+d+ra rang/ lo tsa ba d+harmA tsan+d+ras rang bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// //zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ratna? dzwA? la sA d+ha da ni nA? ma/
231a2(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ rin chen 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtog pas brtags pa'i gnas don ji snyed la/ /khyab par bzhugs nas de dag sdud? mdzad pa/ /shes rab thabs gnyis dga' bzhi thig le bzhi/ /sku bzhi
231a3(rgyud 'grel): spros pas 'gro don mdzad la 'dud/ /ha cang rgyas dang ha cang bsdus pa yis/ /'jig pa bdag dang de 'dra rnams kyi phyir/ /kye yi rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i bam/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i zhes bya'i sgrub thabs brtsam/ /rnal 'byor ba gang nyan thos dang/ /byang chub ?
231a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod rim par gus?/ /ngal? zhing zab la rig kun mkhas/ /sngags rgyud sbyor bas bde byed cing/ /rdo rje dril bu ye shes dang/ /lha dang dkyil 'khor sbyin bsregs dang/ /sngags dang rdul chen gtor ma dang/ /dbang bskur de nyid bcu rigs pas/ /dur khro
231a5(rgyud 'grel): chu 'gram shing dang/ /ri dang chang? ching? bya skyibs sogs/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs brgyan par/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang dris byugs nas/ /sgrub pa'i sngon du bsnyen par bya/ /de med na ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /las kyi cho ga gang dag la/ /nye bar bsnyen pas 'grub ma 'gyur
231a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /dngos dang dngos brag kun pa bo/ /kyi yi rdo rje 'khor bcas la/ /mchod gtor ldan par thun bzhir bsdom/ /mthun mchims bzlas pa 'bum 'am khri/ /yang na mtshan bzang mthong pa ste/ /tshogs 'phel begs zhi don grub pa'o/ /dpal
231a7(rgyud 'grel): kye rdo rje bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las/ /bsregs? ? bya ba he dang po'o// //mkhas pas grong dang grong khyer dang/ /ri bo 'am sa phyogs nyams dga' ba'am/ me tog tshal dang dben gnas dang/ /rgyal sras khyim 'am dkyil 'khor sar/ /dkyil
231b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mchog 'di bri ba'i phyir/ /dang por sa ni legs par brtags/ /chu ni g.yas 'khor shar dang byang/ /dma' ba dkar sogs grwa bzhi sogs/ /brkos nas slar bkang lhag gyur pa/ /khru byed brkos nas chu yis dgang/ /gom pa brgyad ni 'gro bar bya/ /myur
231b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs de ltar nyid na bsngags/ /u dum+ba ra n+ya gro d+ha/ /bkul dang ardzu nar/ /bcas pa ru spal rgyab 'dra spang/ /rang bdag sbyor bas gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas sa ni bslang bar bya/ /sa phyogs 'dir bdag che ge mo/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po kyi rdo rje/ /bzhengs kyis 'don?
231b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i bgegs/ /'di nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis/ /dgun zlas sogs brtsams te ? ba gsum gsum lto 'phya'i mgo/ /lha dang nub dang byang dang shar/ /bltas te g.yon ba'i zur gyis nyal/ /pus? mo lte ba rkad tsam du/ /dngos grub rjes mthun lto nas brko/
231b4(rgyud 'grel): phub ma gseg ma rdo ba dang/ /shing bu sel ba la sogs dor/ /rin chen 'bru sman? nang du gzhug /de nas shin tu thas par brdung/ /gal te de ltar ma nus na/ /mkhar bsams lag mnan sngags 'di bzla/ /oM ha no ha na kro d+ha hI phaT/ oM b+h+ruM khaM hUM/ sa na ma
231b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhar byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /mchod dang gtor mar ldan par ni/ /rim bzhin bsgoms te mtshan ma brtag/ bkra mi shis na spong ba'am/ /drag po'i sbyin sreg zhi ba'ang bya/ /de nas bsrung pa'i 'khor lo yis/ /bgegs dgra tshar bcad bsrung bar bya/ /rdo
231b6(rgyud 'grel): rjer pa bla de gur/ /hUM las gsal bar? bsgom par bya/ /der ni hUM bcu'i sbyor ba las/ /khro bo bcu ni rim par dgod/ /gshin rje mthar byed shes rab mthar/ /pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/ /Tak+ki khro bo dbyug pa bzhin/ /stobs chen mi g.yo mgon
231b7(rgyud 'grel): po yang/ /gtsug? ? gdugs ni dkar po dang/ /rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje khro bo skyes bu che/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /snying gar g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub/ /g.yas na rang gi mtshon cha 'phyar/ /gshin rje gsod pa'i dbyig tho ste/ /
232a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi mi thub rdo rje dbyug /rta mgrin la ni dbang mchog dmar/ /mi bye ba bdud rtsi thal sbyar la'o?/ /? rgyal po lcags kyu ste/ /dbug sngon can la rang gi med?/ /stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa/ /mi g.yo mgon po rdo rje ste/ /tshe skyob dkar po rgyal po
232a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /gtun shing rdo rje rkang 'og la'o/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas so pa'o/ /dbang po sngon pa'i rnam pa ltar/ /mthar byed mthar byed bsgom par bya/ /gzhan gyi mi thub rdo rje ni/ /'jigs byed zla ba'i nor bu 'dra/ /pad+ma'i khro bo dmar
232a3(rgyud 'grel): po che/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag nyid gnas/ /mtshams kyi kho bo cher gnag cing/ /spyi sor rdo rje 'chang ba 'dzin ? gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis he/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbyig pa can/ /pad+ma'i khro bo rnam gzigs rjes/ /rdo rje sems dpas thal sbyor la'o/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor
232a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya/ /'og tu pad+ma'i gdan bsam nag/ khro bo bcu rnams bsgom par bya/ /bsrung? ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste/ /'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar/ /dpag tshad brgya yi ched tsam du/ /oM rak+Sha
232a5(rgyud 'grel): rakA hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ /dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las? sa'i cho ga'i bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// //blo ldan 'khor lo'i sa dbus su/ /legs? ldan sngon 'gro nas brtsams te/ /mchod bstong bar gyis sbyor ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams
232a6(rgyud 'grel): la gsol bab? dang?/ /ma lus phyogs bcu bzhugs pa yi/ /mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje 'chang chen ? mo/ /bdag ni kye yi rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di 'dri bar byed/ /bdag gi sgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir/ /mthu chen ldan ba khyed rnams
232a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'dzin la/ /glob ma'am 'khor sprul gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhig/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med ma yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad
232b1(rgyud 'grel): ? gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yi bdag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs/ /kun tu bzang po blu? yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhib chos mchog las gyur ba/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyor mdzad/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog
232b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /langs te mkha' bzhugs rgyal phyag bya/ /sangs rgyas kun sbyor nga rgyal bskyed/ /sangs rgyas
232b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' bdag/ rdo rje nyi ma'ang? bdag nyid de/ /don yod rdo rje chos bdag nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /de nas kye rdor khros bltas nas/ /'khor lo mkha' la gdegs par bya/ /yi ge ma Tas nyi zla'i mig/ phyogs dus thams cad sbar ba dang//
232b4(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan 'gro la bltas nas ni/ /'khor lo'i sa ni yongs su bskor/ /rkang 'og rdo rje 'bar ba dang/ /rdo rje gsor bar gshin tu brtson/ /rol ba'i rdo rje 'gros kyi gang/ /mche ba gtsigs bcas hUM sgrogs pas/ /me tog stim pa'i sbyor pas bya/ /? la yal
232b5(rgyud 'grel): ga'i? sbyor ba nyer/ /mar me mthe bong brtan par bya/ /byug pa de yi rnam pa yang/ /lag pas mig dang de bzhin rna/ /rka dang zur kyi g.yas phyogs su/ /pheg rdob pa yi sbyor bas bya/ /de bzhin du yang g.yon du bskor/ /rgyun gyis gar byas de 'og tu/ /bskyod pa'i
232b6(rgyud 'grel): gar byas de yi rjes ? bskor de ? byas te 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor par bya g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang pa dang/ mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang/ rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ sna tshogs thams cad dang/ ru sbal gyi rkeng stabs dang/ bung ba'i dra ba dang/
232b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho bskyor? pa dang/ ri bo'i? mchog dang/ mdzes pa'i gom ba dang/ /khro bo'i gom ba ste /rkang stabs kyi bkod pa'i/ /ral gri'i lugs dang/ 'khor lo'i tshul dang/ rin po che'i tshul dang/ pad+ma'i lag ba dang/ ral gri'i lag pa dang/ mdung? gi tshul dang/
233a1(rgyud 'grel): gshu'i? tshul dang/ dbyug pa'i tshul dang/ dbyug tho'i tshul dang/ gtun shing gi tshul dang/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang/ kha bcu pa'i tshul dang/ ral gri bu mo'i tshul dang/ sna tshogs dbyigs pa'i tshul dang/ ma dung gi tshul dang/ gong bu skyong
233a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul dang/ 'phan gnyis pa dang/ 'phan gsum pa dang/ me tog gi tshul dang/ bdug spos kyi tshul dang/ mar me'i tshul dang/ dri'i tshul dang/ lA sye'i lag pa dang/ phreng ba'i lag pa dang/ glu'i lag pa dang/ gar gyi lag pa dang/ gling bu'i lag
233a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ pi wang gi lag pa dang/ rdza rnga'i lag pa dang/ ku mu ta'i lag pa ste/ lag pa'i bkod pa'o/ /rdo rje'i pad+ma'i skyil krung dang/ pad+ma'i bdug stangs dang/ bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang/ skyil krung phyed pa dang/ bkra shis kyi bdug stangs te/ 'dug
233a4(rgyud 'grel): stangs kyi dgod pa'o/ /sgeg pa'i ro dang/ dpa' bo'i ro dang/ mi sdug pa'i ro dang rgod pa'i ro dang/ drag po'i ro dang/ 'jigs su rung ba'i ngo dang/ zhi ba'i ro dang/ rngam pa'i ro dang/ snying rje'i ro dang/ drug gis rjes su bskyed pa'i glu dang/ drang srong gi rjes kyi
233a5(rgyud 'grel): glu dang/ bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang/ /lnga pa'i rjes kyi glu dang/ blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang/ 'khor nyan pa'i glu'o/ /nyung du'i dbye ba dang/ sgrol ba'i dbye ba dang/ 'jigs pa'i dbye ba dang/ gang ba dang/ dbye ba phyed phyi ba dang/ rnam par 'dre ba
233a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'dod chags gnyis mtshungs par byed pa dang/ lkog ma nyed pa dang/ rkang ma nyed pa dang/ lce nyed pa dang/ so nyed pa ste/ glu'i dgod pa'o/ /sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su yang/ /dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul pa/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis
233a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /'di ni dam tshig rim pa mchog/ lus dag sems la gnas pa yi/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams thams cad nyon/ /nga ni snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba'o/ /rdo rje yis ni gsal ba'i lus/ /sku gsum las ni
233b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa spro/ /gal te la la 'da' byed na/ /'jig par 'di la the tshom med/ /lus srul po dang kha gcig gang/ /bde chen ye shes 'byung pa dang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin skyes/ /zur gcig bgegs ni chen po rnams/ /na ma:sa mand+ha? bud+d+he b+hyo na ma badzra kro
233b2(rgyud 'grel): d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai pa wA ya badzra sando ha darbA ya/ a mri ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT ces bya ba'am/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya bA kA tsipta? badzran ma/ na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA daMSh+To ta ka ra b+he ra ba ya/ a si mu sal/ parshu sha pri hi ha ha stwa? ya/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da ? kha kha
233b3(rgyud 'grel): khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gardza gardza/ bi spho Ta ya bi spho Ta ya/ sarba badzra big+hAM/ ba na ya kA na/ mahA ga Na pa ti/ ci pi tAn+ta ka rA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar sa ni yongs ? la/ /bgegs med phyir ni phur
233b4(rgyud 'grel): pu gdab/ /stod du bgegs 'joms khro bo la/ /smad du rtse gcig bsams nas gdab/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sumA? hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ grih+Na pa ya grih+Na pa ya hUM/ A na ya haM b+ha ga wAn/ bidyA rA dza hUM phaT/ oM g+ha g+hA?/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta phaT/ kI la ya sarba
233b5(rgyud 'grel): pA phaM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya phaT/ AdzlA? pa ya hi kA ya pta? k+tsit+ta? badzra na kI lA ya hUM phaT/ bgegs med sa ni phyogs bcings nas/ /de nas lhag par gnas par bya/ /mchod gtor rgya cher bshams nas kyang/ /dkyil 'khor dbum su dris? byugs
233b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /lha mo bskyed de mchod byas la/ /lhag par gnas te gshags su gsol/ /kye yi rdo rje khros mchod pa'i/ /ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /che she mo bdag dkyil 'khor 'dri/ /lha ya gnas su nges pa der/ /ba? yi
233b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang dri zham sogs/ /a byugs me tog tshom bu dgram/ /mkhas pas lha yi gnas de la/ /dkyil 'khor rang sngags yi ge sbrul/ /spyan drangs mchod bstod bar du bya/ /de nas slob ldan pus gtsugs te/ /lag par spos? thogs gsol ba gdab//
234a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan kye yi rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma rnams la bde ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje bdag nyid can rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor bdag ni 'dri bar bgyid/ /bcom ldan bdag ni dus
234a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /de ni gnang ba mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas ? 'khor bya don stsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang/ /gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu can dang/ /gang su lha'i
234a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan ma dang ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi pa yis/ /kye yi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /'gro ba dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /yo byad ci 'byor pas 'drin/ /de dang bdag slong mar bcas la
234a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs ni brtse bar dgengs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs pa kun/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /bum pa rtsa ba nag po med/ /mgrin pa 'di pa lto che ba/ /dkar pos byugs te mtshan
234a5(rgyud 'grel): mas gdab/ /kha rnams yal ga gos brgyan du/ /to le dang gro dang sran ma dang/ /nas dang 'bras ni 'bru lnga'o/ /ha sa de bag? pa ra/ /kri ta dzaM li bri ha pa la/ /kar ni ka ni sman lnga yin/ /gser dngul mu tig byu ru dang/ /nor bu rin chen rin chen lnga/ /mar dang 'o
234a6(rgyud 'grel): ma sbrang rtsi mngar?/ /lan tsha spos dang dri bzangs gzhug/ hUM bdun ? pa'i srad pu gang/ /me tog phreng btags rdo rje ni/ /dri chur bcug pa steng du gzhag/ bum par lha bskyed nas ni/ /phreng ba'i mgo nas lag gzung la/ /nyin de bzhin du thun gsum du/ /gtor
234a7(rgyud 'grel): ma byen zhing brlas? par bya/ /de nas bum pa so sor bzhag/ las kun byed pa byang shar du'o/ /slob ma yan lag kun rdzogs shing/ /shin tu dul dang spyod bzhi/ /chos gsum la ni mngon dga' zhing/ /theg pa che la dga' ba'i blo/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor
234b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /bzo sogs thams cad rtogs 'dod cing/ /sbyor dang bsam dga' ba dang/ /nyan dang klog la brtson pa dang/ /rtag tu bla ma gus 'dod dang/ /sbyin pa la sogs dge ba dga' / /de bzhin 'dod la mi dga' ba/ /longs spyod la ni mi gnas pa/ /nga rgyal khro ba
234b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa gzung/ /gang zhig tshul khrims 'chal pa dang/ /slob dpon dang ni rgan pa'i lha/ /sems can kun la smod pa dang/ /ngan pa'i bdag nyid gdug sems dang/ /rtag tu sdig pa'i blo don dang/ /tshig? kyal dag rtsub smra ba rnams/ /'di dag 'dra ba spang bar bya/ /gal te bde
234b3(rgyud 'grel): gsheD dgod pa ni/ /sgrub pa don gnyer brtson ldan na/ /gzugs ngan yon tan med pa'am/ /dman pa'am lhag gnas bya bar rigs/ /ston pas de la 'di skad brjod/ /tshe 'di'i 'bras bu gdod mi bya/ /tshe 'di 'dod par gyur pa la/ /'jig rten pha rol don mi 'gyur/ /'jig
234b4(rgyud 'grel): rten pha rol don gnyer skyes/ /'jig rten 'di yi 'bras bu rgyas/ /de phyir 'bras bu mchog 'dod bya/ /de skad brjod nas slob ma de/ /rtag par bsam la gsol pa gdab/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul
234b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bshad du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol?/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/
234b6(rgyud 'grel): de skad lan gsum brjod par bya/ /de nas dpa' bos slob ma yis/ /yon tan dmigs byas tshig 'di brjod/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
234b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'grol phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' pos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes//
235a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags spyad pa mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yin/ bdud sde shin tu mi zad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun ma byen thob pa'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di kyis shig/ bdag gis thog ma med dus nas/ /log
235a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog dbang gis sdig bgyis pas/ /thugs rje dpa' bdag khyed rnams kyi/ /spyan rdzas bshags kyi blan? chad sdom/ /rgyal dang de yi sras rnams dang/ /'gro ba'i bsod nams ya? na lus pa/ de la yag dag yi rang zhing/ /byang chub dam par bsngo bar bgyi/ /gang dang gang gis
235a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de dang de yi skur ston pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs nor ji lta bu'i/ /rdzogs sangs rgyasl skyabs su mchi//kun rtog ma lus dag gyur pa/ /rang rig yang dag ye shes bskyed/ /lhan cig skyes dga' i ngo bo nyid/ /dam pa'i chos la'ang skyabs su mchi/
235a4(rgyud 'grel): go rim ji bzhin dbang bslur? thob/ /ma log lam la nges gnas dang/ /sras mchog 'khor 'dus chogs mchog la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /yang dag ye shes me bo che/ /gti mug mun pa bsal pa dang/ /sgrib pa ma lus sbyang pa'i phyir/ /byang
235a5(rgyud 'grel): chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /rgyal sras dpa' bo rnams kyis lam/ /spyod pa dpag yas gang yin dang/ /ma bcos ji bzhin gnas lam la/ /da ni yang dag gnas par bgyi/ /de nas bla mas byang chub sems/ /ma skyes pa ni bskyed par bya/ /bskyed pa slar
235a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dran du gzhub/ las? kun byed pas bsrungs nas mi/ /snying ga lkog ma spyi bo ru/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dag/ hUM A:ao las der ga dgod/ /spos chu rdo rje khu tshur dag/ snying ga skol? ma spyi bor gtug/ de bzhin hUM A:aoM brjod bya/ /oM A:hUM brjod/ /me
235a7(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs rim bzhin byin?/ /spyi bo rim te'o? mdun? du spos?/ /mar me drin ni snying ga ru/ /kun byed bzlas nas ? pa yis/ /slob ma byams? la sbyin par bya/ /a shwa ta u dum+ba ra yi/ /? shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /ma yo mags srog chags med/ /rtse mo
235b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog bcas pa byin/ /shar ram byang du kha bltas bzhag/ bcas nas bltos pa med par ni/ /ba ke tsam du byug par dor/ /zhi la sogs pa'i dngos grub bstan/ /'thor 'thung skyes bu lan gsum blud/ /oM A ji hwa saM ba rad+ha ni hUM phaT/ so shing las bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /oM
235b2(rgyud 'grel): h+rI? bi shud+d+ha sarba pA baM ni tsA bye sho d+ha ya sarba bi kalpan a pa na ya hUM/ 'thor 'thung blud pa'i sngags so/ /bdud rtsil 'khyil? pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i /bsrung skud dpung pa g.yas par btags/ /ku sha'i snying po tsam nyams/ /d+hi las byung ba bsam par bya/ /dang por spyi bor gcig gzung
235b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gzhan dag sngas dang stan phyir byin/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum+ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang zhig mnyam med sems?
235b4(rgyud 'grel): can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bya ba du mar ni/ /sdig pa byas par gyur pa gang/ de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra par/ /mthong bas 'byang bar 'gyur ba ste/ /grags pa mdza' yas sngags brjod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /skyob pa
235b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba/ /de dag gi ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu 'chad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang
235b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyi ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams thams cad la/ /sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'o/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/
235b7(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams der ni dang bas na/ /rang 'byung bskal pa chen po la/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /don pa shad bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /ku sha'i stan la nyal du gzhug/ rmi lam gang dag ci mthong ba/ /de kun dang por 
236a1(rgyud 'grel): nga la smros/ /rmi lam bzang ngan dris nas ni/ /mi dge thal sbyor dag gis gzhom /dpal gyi rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa las sta gon bya ba ste gsum pa'o// //mkhas pa mnyam zhing yid ngo 'ong ba/ /ba yi lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga/ /?
236a2(rgyud 'grel): zhim chu yi legs byugs la/ /phyi yi rgya mi khru bdun pa/ /nang gi khru gsum mthe bong gsum/ /dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya/ /thig skud gsar ba ma jo sa par ldan/ /rigs ? sa bon de mdog byung/ /ye shes lnga ldan sra dgu gang/ /lnga phrag lnga ni rnam phyed?
236a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /nyi zla'i bar mig lcags kyus dgag /las kun byed pa'i phrad bu yang/ /gtsang mas legs bkal dri zhim dang/ /bdud rtsi spang shing yi ge gsum/ /thig 'dzin grogs dzdza yos btab zhing rang yang zlo/ /khu tshur g.yon pas lte par bzung/ /nub dang shar
236a4(rgyud 'grel): nas blo ldan gyis/ /mkha' dang 'og gi thig gdab bya/ /oM badzras ma ya sku tha ma tikra ma hUM/ nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams/ /byed kyis 'gro don mdzad dus lags/ /thig gis sgra yis bskul nas ni/ /de rnams 'dir ni gshegs su gsol//
236a5(rgyud 'grel): ltas ? gyis ni dngos mi 'grub/ /thig skud chang na slob dpon 'chi/ /ring 'phung khyer na nad kyi thebs/ /phyogs 'khrul ba yis slob ma dang/ /slob dpon la yang nyam par gsungs/ /slob dpon slob ma shar nub tu/ /bltas te tshangs pa'i thig gdab
236a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /'phel 'grib? med pa'i shing shun sogs/ /byed dang byed du dgos byas la/ /phyed kyi phyed na lho byang du/ /bya 'og rjes btsal tshang thig gdab/ /de nas dkyil 'khor phyed tshad kyis/ /g.yas dang g.yon du rgyu gram bya/ /shar nub phyogs dang lho phyogs thig/
236a7(rgyud 'grel): ? shar nub bltas pas gdab/ /med gnas rlung bltas bden bral nas/ /dpang ldan bltas te tshangs thig gdab/ /byed la phyed phyed phyed du ?/ tshangs thig nges der brgyad brgyad 'gyur/ /dang po phyed rgyab de nang phyed/ /lngar byas sgo 'khyud phyi nyid
236b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil/ /gnyis pa byed byed dang po la/ /phyed phyed byas pa logs shes bya/ /de rgyab me tog chun 'phyang ste/ /de rkyab rta babs ka ba yis/ /gsum pa'i phyed rgya pa de phyed nang/ /rdor phreng bzhi pa lha rnams yin/ /lnga pa'i phyed phyed dang po la/ /phyed phyed byas pa tshon lnga'i gnas/ /bur? gnyis
236b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod yon mthar lngar byas/ /sgo 'gram rin chen pha guAng de/ /drug pa'i byed nang mu tig phreng/ /de rgyab phyed nang phyed phyed byas/ /ya phub tha ma rdo rje gdung/ /bdun pa rta babs dag tu 'gyur/ /brgyad pa pad+ma 'khor lo gdugs/ /de rgyab nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ /sna tshogs
236b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rdo rje rwa/ /me 'od rim bzhin bskor par bya/ /de nas mkhas pas mtshon rnams la/ /buM aM dzriM khaM hUM rnams kyis/ /rdul tshon lha yi rnam par sbyor/ /'bar pa'i blta bya ye shes sbar/ /yang dag gzi bskyed sngags bzlas mchod/ /oM badzra tsitra pa ma ya hUM/ 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa
236b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /sems can khams ni dag par byed/ /kye yi rdo rje rgyal chen gyi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya/ /bla mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /dkar dang ser dang daM? bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid/ /mnyam zhing g.yas bskor rgyun
236b5(rgyud 'grel): ma bsam?/ /ma yo bar ni tshon ? gyi/ /sgo yi nyi shu cha ru ni/ /ri mo mnyam par dgye par bya/ /sgom por bkye bar nad kyis 'debs/ /phra mos nor ni rnam par 'jigs/ /yon pos rnam 'gras chad pa yis/ /bla ma dang ni slob ma 'chi/ /g.yas bskor min par dbye ba yis/ /tshon ni
236b6(rgyud 'grel): phur bus btab par 'gyur/ /dkar po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis pa gser las dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin rtse/ /de bzhin gzhan dag markat? yin/ /nag po nang du shes bya ste/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad/ /shar du dkar po chen po ste/ /lhor ni ser po yang
236b7(rgyud 'grel): dag ldan/ /nub kyi chal dmar po ste/ /byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyis gzhi cha dag ni/ /in+d+ra nI li'i 'od gsal bar/ /rtag par bdag nyid shes rab thabs/ /shin tu mnyam pa zhag legs par bri/ /ri mo bar ni nang ? ma reg par ni bri bar bya/ /kha sbyor gci
237a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sgo bzhi pa/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje thig gis rnam par brgyan/ /ri mo lnga dang nges par ldan/ /der ni bum pa brgyad bri bya/ /rin chen lnga phyed rang bzhin nam/ /yang na 'bras la sog pa'o /dur khrod so phag dag
237a2(rgyud 'grel): gis sam/ /de bzhin dur khrod sol bas so/ /de dbus pad+ma 'dab ma ni/ /brgyad pa ge sar ldan par bri/ /de dbus thod pa dkar po ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri/ /dbang ldan du ni seng ge ste/ /me yi mtshams ni dge slong ngo/ /bden bral du ni 'khor lo ste/ /rlung du rdo rje
237a3(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya/ /shar gyi ? ra ni gri gug bri/ /lhor ni cang te'u bri bar bya/ /nub tu du sbal bri bya ste/ /de bzhin sbrul ni byang du'o/ /lha mo'i kha dog dbye ba yis/ /phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grag/ bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs sogs/ /gla rgyan 'og rgyan bre bar bya//
237a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshong gtor rgya cher bshams bkram la/ /'bar mig la sogs gong lta bur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i snyems byas la/ /rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te/ /phyag gnyis kyi rdor rnal 'byor gyis/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya/ /lus bkrus gtsang sbra dri zhim
237a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /hUM hUM sgra yi nga rgyal byed/ /hi hi sgra yis 'jigs par byed/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor/ /ma dag mched skyon rnams bsal/ /de nas slob dpon rang lha yis/ /sbyor tshogs gtso bo'i bdag nyid kyi/ dkyil
237a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor skul pa rdul tshon dang/ /gnyis med mkhar gnas kyang der gzhug /byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur gyi/ /bar rdzogs byas nas 'chad pa yi/ /tshogs dkyil 'khor rab tu mchod/ /rang lces rdo rje bdud rtsi myang/ /phyi rol 'byung bo'i gtor ma sbyin/
237a7(rgyud 'grel): snga dro rgyal pa'i ? sreg bya/ /ma dag la sogs nyes pa rnams/ /rgyal ba rnams la bzod par gsol/ /dpal kye rdo rje'i bya pa'i rim pa'i lam las/ dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba'i rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas slob dpon rang lha yi/
237b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor nas dkyil 'khor legs bltas la/ /mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya/ /phyi nang sbyin sreg dag gis kyang/ /'khor lo mched de bdag nyid kyang/ /slob ma'i rim bzhin dbang blangs la/ /gzugs brnyan lta ba'i 'khor lo ru/ / slob ma gzhug phyir bden
237b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bsgrag?/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /kye yi rdo rje deng 'grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur
237b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis 'grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /
237b4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po rgya mchog gis/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sems can kun gyi yang khyab cing//
237b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi yid la bzhugs/ /sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid/ /'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o/ /bden pa bdag gis ye shes mchog/ shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa yis mgon bdag la ni/ /khyed kyi
237b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog de lta
237b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod cing phyag bgyis nas/ /'di ltar yang na gsol ba gdab/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi/ /sems can don du bdag gsol 'debs/ /bzod pa mdzad de dgongs su gsol/ /de nas slob mas slob dpon gyis//
238a1(rgyud 'grel): zhabs la gtugs la 'di skad brjod/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang

238a4(rgyud 'grel): kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sgom pa yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin ba rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /phyi dang gsang pa theg
