238a6(rgyud 'grel): las gzhan yang ? bzhi 'di/ /pas pham pas ni rab tu bshad/ /sbang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya/ /gang tshe nyams 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/
238a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis srog chags bsang mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo/ /'dod la log par mi spyad cing/ /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung grol kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad
238b1(rgyud 'grel): spang/ /dam pa nges par bsten bya zhing/ /rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par ni rjes su skyod/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/
238b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bdag kyang yod mi spang/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mchon cha dang/ /mtshan ma gom par mi bya'o/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad/ /rjes mthun sdom pa rgya cher ni/ /gsang
238b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /slob mas brjod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ /sangs rgyas chos
238b4(rgyud 'grel): dang tshogs mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer/ /byang chub spyod mchog yid
238b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od spyad par bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang/ /dpa' po rnal 'byor ma rnams kun/ /bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ /bdag mid 'di zhes bgyi pa ni/ /dus 'di nas ni gzung nas su/ /ji srid byang
238b6(rgyud 'grel): chub snying po'i bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges pa yi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni slab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag
238b7(rgyud 'grel): gis so sor brtan por gzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni/ /dad nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar
239a1(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rim mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la phyir? gsang ba thig
239a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni ma lus bzung/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan pa rin/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed ? ?

239a4(rgyud 'grel): pos/ /gdong g.yogs me tog phreng gzung lo/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil? pa'i bum pa'i chos/ /bsrung zhing sku gsung thugs sbyangs la/ /bu sngag khyod su ci la dga' / /slob dpon gyis ni gzhug phyir bri/ /sul? bzang bde chen bdag dga' o zhes/ /slob ma bo chen gyis smos/ /de
239a5(rgyud 'grel): nas byang chub sems bskyed phyir/ /? g.yo ga tsit+ta? ? mi/ /brjod nas de yi snying gar ni/ /rdo rje gzhag cing bsams nas kyang/ /su ra te sa ma ya stwaM lo:sid+d+hiM badzra ya thA su khi/ dang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur
239a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis ? bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar me byed gcig/ dad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la yang ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gau? la sogs rang sngags kyis/ /dam pa 'gug?
239a7(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhugs ?/ yi ge lnga yang de bzhin du/ /brjod do dam tshig mchog 'dzin gzhug/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rugs su thugs kyis/ /ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dngos grub thob nas dngos grub
239b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan lha smos kyang mi dgod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cag/ dam tshig nyams par gyur te re/ de'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM he ru ka dpal deng khyed kyis/ /snying la yang dag zhugs
239b2(rgyud 'grel): bar kyi/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs/ /pad nas yi ge gsum gyis sbar/ /mi 'chi lnga pa 'thung du gzhug /'di ni khyod kyis dmyal pa'i chu/ /dam tshig nyams na bsregs par 'gyur/ /dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje bdud ?
239b3(rgyud 'grel): chu 'thugs shig/ oM bdzrod ka Tha Tha Tha/ dam bcas brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ /'di skad brjod do/ /der phyin chad khyod kyi dpal he ru ka da yin gyis/ las 'di byos shig ces bgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis ngal brnyas par na byed cig/ mi bde ?
239b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung par gyur ta re zhes brjod la/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ /dpal he ru ka bdag la 'dab par gyur cig ces smros? shing ces bsgom? de dag brjod nas bde snying gar
239b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang chen dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa kha dog ser/ /laM las 'byung bar hUM bsgom bya/ /baM byung chu yi kha dog dkar/ /buM pas mtshan cing yongs su zlum/ /yaM las byung ba g.yo ba'i rlung/ /bdan ? pos mtshan gzhu'i dbyibs/ /de la sku gsung ha
239b6(rgyud 'grel): a bsgom/ /rkang 'og dzheM(rgyud 'grel): ni rab 'bar pa/ /rlung las raM byung gru gsum par/ /gnas par spar la slob ma dbab/ /de nas 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /rdo rje glu dang gang bya'o/ /a ba sha ya staM b+ha ya/ rar rar tsla la yatsla? la ya hUM a ha dzdzaiM(rgyud 'grel): lce la a ni dmar po zhig/
239b7(rgyud 'grel): bsams te babs la slar yang ?/ 'dod chags rdo rje de gnas pa/ /smros shig rdo rje dge mi dag /bsam pa de ni brtan bya ba/ /de la tiShDwa? badzra brjod/ /me tog phreng ba 'khor lo dor/ /pra tits+tsha badzra ho:zhes brjod do/ /de ni spyi bor bcing bar bya/ pra ti grinNa twaM i maM satwa
240a1(rgyud 'grel): mahA ba la blangs pa'am ma blangs pa gnyis ni/ /mtshan ma'am mtshan ma nye bar ni/ babs saM dang kyang de'i /mtshan ma 'am mtshan ma nye bar ni/ /babs saM dang kyang de'i sbyor ba/ /mig tu 'bar bcas oM bsams la/ /he ru ka dpal ded khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad
240a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byed par mdzad/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /de la bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la da lta nyid/ /dang pa'i shugs kyis blta bar bya/ /khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs las skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /sngon ma byung ba mthong pa'o//
240a3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma yon dang bcas pa yi/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te/ /de nas 'di skad brjod par bya/ /oM rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag bzhugs so/ /oM rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor bdag gis de ring mthong/ /oM gsang ba'i dkyil
240a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur/ /de nas gtso bo nas brtsams te/ /dkyil 'khor mdza' yi bar du bstan/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor phyed tshad tsam/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la khru ngo bar/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis
240a5(rgyud 'grel): bar slob mar bzhag/ mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs sbyin/ /bag chags sbyang ba'i cho ga bya/ /slob ma shis par bdud pa yis/ /bla mas bkra shis glu blang bya/ /phun sum tshogs 'dzin gser gyi ri bo lta bu'i mdog/ 'jig rten sum mgon di ma?
240a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum ni rab tu sdangs/ /sangs rgyas chu skyes sangs rgyas lta bu'i spyan mang ba ba/ /bkra shis de ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum du grags pa lha dang mis mchod pa/ /dam chos rab mchog skye
240a7(rgyud 'grel): dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /'jig rten bkra shis gnyis pa ding? 'dir khyod la shog/ dam pa'i chos dang ldan zhing thos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ dge 'dun lha dang lha ma yin dang mis mchod pa/ /ngo cha dpal gnas tshogs kyi nang na rang kyi mchog/ 'jig rten bkra shis
240b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum ba ding 'dir khyod long shog /dga' ldan lha yi gnas kyi dkyil nas 'gro don du/ sngon gyi dus su brgya byin lha dang bcas pa yi/ /'khor gyi tshogs bcas gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa'i/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ lum pa'i
240b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du mgon po sku ni khrungs gyur cing/ /srid mthar mdzad tshe me tog ge sar bcas pa dang/ rab 'bar 'bab pa lha mang gis mthong bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ mtshan
240b3(rgyud 'grel): phyed dka' thub tshul bu mngon par dgyes bcas pas/ /brgya byin lhar bcas rjes 'brangs gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des kyang ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /chu bo'i 'gram du yon chab mar mes yongs bskor te/ /zhi phyir ngo mtshar rab skyes ? bdag
240b4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ /lto 'phye'i rgyal pos legs par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ grong khyer rab mchog ser skya zhes ni bya ba der/ /lha chen khyab 'jug la sogs rnams kyis bstod byed pa/ /bde gshegs thog mdza' med
240b5(rgyud 'grel): par dge ba'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /sems can thams cad la ni phan phyir byang chub pa/ /rin chen chos mdzod thub pa las ni gang byung ba/ /sems can don grub nas pa rgyas pa'i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni ding
240b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ gser gyi 'od ltar shin tu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' ba/ /bi DUrya'i mdog 'dra ba'i rtswa bkram pa la bzhugs/ /skyil krung legs bcas mi g.yo'i sku mnga' i bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ sa dang mkha' 
240b7(rgyud 'grel): las sna tshogs dbye bas kun 'byung ba/ /byams pa'i stobs kyi bdud kyi sde las rnam par rgyal/ /shing gi rgyal po'i rtsa bar bcom ldan bkra shis pa/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /ba ra NA ser bzhugs nas bde bar gshegs bstod pas//
241a1(rgyud 'grel): sa dang mkha' la shin tu ngo mtshar gsal byung ba'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rab bskor bkra shis gang/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ bsod nams las byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bsten pa/ /bcom ldan shAkya
241a2(rgyud 'grel): seng gis ma lus gsungs pa yi/ /phan byed dam pa bzang po'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis nges ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje gsor/ /glu dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/ /gser la sogs pa'i stan gnas pa/ /der ni
241a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni dbang bskur bya/ /slob ma nges par byed du gzhug/ de bzhin de bzhin dbang bskur la/ /lha yi sbyor ba gang yin pa/ /de yi phyag rgyas 'phrag nas 'khyud/ /dang po chu yi dbang yin te/ /gnyis pa dbu rgyan dbang yin no/ /gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin no/ /bzhi pa rang
241a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag dbang yin te/ /yA ba ming gi dbang bskur bya/ /drug pa yang dag sangs rgyas brjod/ /bdun pa bum pa'i dbang yin te/ /brgyad pa gsang ba'i dbang nyid do/ /dgu pa shes rab dbang gis te?/ /de nyid rdo rje rab? sbyor bas/ /brtul zhugs dang ni lung bstan
241a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'di dag rim par snyin? bar ?/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus/ /bum? pa brgyad po thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje 'chang bsams dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje thugs su bsgoms pas so/ /oM badzra ma b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tA? /rdo rje nyi ma rnam bsams nas/ /de la dbu rgyan
241a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bar bya/ /oM badzra ratna ka badzra? sha'i ho/ /thams cad sdom bzhin bsgoms la/ /rdo rje'i tshigs bcad rab tu sbyor/ /rdo rje chen po rtsa dgu pa/ /rang gi lag pas snying gar bya/ /slob ma'i 'jig rten dbang ? gzugs/ /rdo rje sems zhes dbang bskur bya//
241a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang gis ni/ de rang khyod ? dbang bskur ngo/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /shin tu 'grub phyir rdo rje long/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka ad+hi ba ti twAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tha pI ra sa ma ya stwAM/ slob ma rta mchog bsam byas la/ /lha mo sgrol mas sku
241b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'khyud /rdo rje'i bdag pos dbang bskur ba?/ /lag pas rdo rje dril bu dkrol/ /oM badzra d+hi ba ti twAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma yastwaM/ slob ma rnam par mdzad bsam/ /ming gi dbang ni bskur bya/ /oM badzra satwa a b+hi Shi? mi badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje ?
241b2(rgyud 'grel): gang gang snang ba? kun rang/ /rang 'dod lha la sogs pa der /rang bzhin dag pa'i dri med chos/ /sangs rgyas ye shes blta bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na bsnams/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu brjod?/ /rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan
241b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA gate sid+d+hi? badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha sa ma ya stwaM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hi hUM/ /bdag gis bcom ldan tshigs bcad ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsdu bar bya/ /bde ba can na bcom ldan 'das/ /nyid kyi gang tshi chos bsan pa/ /de tshe gsang ba'i dbang pos zhus/ /mi rnams ji
241b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar dbang bskur bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rgod pa dag ba slob dpon te/ /de bzhin bltab gsang ba'i dbang/ /lag pas reg pa shes rab ste/ /de nyid gnyis gnyis 'khyad pa yi/ /dbang bskur ma 'ongs pa yin no/ /bla ma'i zhal nas
241b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal par 'gyer/ /'di ni dbang bsar drug yin no/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /phyar 'tshal nas ni mdun 'dug ste/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs bcad 'dis/ /slob mas bla ma la gsol gdab/ /mi sdog 'khor lo'i dbang stsol cig/ dkyil 'khor lha
241b6(rgyud 'grel): yi de nyid dang/ /slob dpon gyi ni lam rnams dag/ mgon pos bdag la bka' stsol cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa'i mchog rnams dang/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rang bzhi rtag tuslob dpon bo gyi/ /de ltar slob mas
241b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol btab nas/ /bla mas skad cig ting 'dzin la/ /gnas nas da dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog spro bya/ /he 'khor ba dan rgyal mtshan sogs/ /glu dang rnga sogs sa ru ni/ /gdugs dang bla res bras nas su?/ /bcug ste 'di ltar
242a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya/ /rin po che yi dbang 'di ni/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsum gyi ni/ /gnas las byung ba nga yis sbyin/ /dang po bum pa'i dbang yin te/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang yin no/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/
242a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /thams cad thabs kyi cho ga'o/ /bla med mchod pas mchod bar bya/ /de nas lag nas lag tu ni/ /slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin/ /sems dpa' theg ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje
242a3(rgyud 'grel): snyems ma'i bdag po bdag/ shes rab pha rol phyin ma las/ /byung ba'i bril buAng de la sbyin/ /thams cad kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rdo rje dril bu'i ming nyid/ /'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bstan/ /khyod kyis kyang mi rtag tu gzung//
242a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzro swAhA/ /'di'i don ni/ rdo rje che dang dril bu che/ /gzung cig rdo rje rab gnas pa/ /deng khyod rdo rje slob dpon te/ khyod kyi slob ma gzung bar gyis/ /mkha' 'gro lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /dam tshig lnga rnams yongs
242a5(rgyud 'grel): gang? ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs dang ldan/ /slob ma rdo rjes chang dbang bskur/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma zhes su brjod/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/ /gzhal med khang zhes bshad pa ste/ /sems ni gzhal yas khang brtsegs 'phags/ /de yi
242a6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gru bzhi ste/ /tshad ma mnyam por phyur ba'o/ /byams pa la sogs sems ni gang/ /thig skud bzhir ni brjod ba'o/ /thig gdab? yang dag gang bshad pa/ chos kyi dran ba'i rnal 'byor ro/ /lta ba thams cad rnam grol ba/ /ye shes thig skud dag tu brjod/
242a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan ni yang dag gang bshad pa/ /tshul khrims tshogs kyi sdom pa mchog /dad dbang la sogs sems gnyis ni/ /rab lngar ni byung ba nyid/ /gang zhig sgo zhes bshad pa ni/ /rnam thar bzhi yi dbye ba'o/ /rta babs ka ba bzhi po ni/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi zhes brjod//
242b1(rgyud 'grel): la phubs gzhi bo gang yin pa/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /sbyo khyud bzhi ni gang yin pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi zhes bya/ /me tog phreng bas brgyan byas pa/ /byang chub sems ni yan lag bdun/ /ka ba rnam pa brgyad po ni/ /'phags pa'i lam ni yan lag brgyad/
242b2(rgyud 'grel): rnga yab ces ni gang grags pa/ /lam gyi bye brag ye shes brjod do/ /dran par yang dag gang bshad pa/ /nyon mongs 'joms bas dra ba ste/ /yang dag 'gog pa'i rang bzhin gyi'o/ /'khor los bskor ba gang yin pa/ /tshogs gnyis kyi ni rnal 'byor ro/ /nyon mongs phyed
242b3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'joms pas na/ /dra ba phyed bar 'joms pa'o/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do/ /phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na/ /sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags/ /rdo rje skye mched nges par ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor mchog/ sa ni spyan zhes kun tu brjod//
242b4(rgyud 'grel): chu yi khams ni mA ma kI /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ni/ /drod dang rlung du rab tu grags/ /gti mug gti mug longs spyad pas/ /gti mug zad pa gshin rje gshed/ /des na phung po mthar byed dang/ /de bzhin shes rab mthar byed ba'o/ /nyes pas nyes pa longs spyod pa//
242b5(rgyud 'grel): nyes zad shes rab mthar byed de/ /des na sems ni mthar byed dang/ /des na nyon mongs mthar byed yin/ /'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas/ /pad+ma mthar byed 'dod chags zad/ /des na gsung gi mthar byed yin/ /de bzhin sbyor ba mthar byed do/ /nyon mongs
242b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zad ba dang/ /de bzhin las kun rbad? ba dang/ /sgrib pa kun zab ye shes ni/ /bgegs ni mthar byed ces brjod do/ /'di ni lha'i kho na nyid do/ /phyir mi ldog pa slob dpon gyi dbang ngo/ /de nas slob mas bla ma la/ /legs bslabs bzhin bzangs mig ?
242b7(rgyud 'grel): ring/ /gzugs dang lang chos brgyan byas ma/ /phul la 'di skad brjod par bya/ /bcom ldan zhi ba che bo kye/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor cig 'bad pa/ /mi phyed phyag rgya rab sgrub byed/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag 'byung/ /ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che/ /gtso bo bdag pa yang de
243a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshogs su ni/ /bying ba skyabs med bdag skyabs mdzod/ /mi bskyod sbyor ba btang byas te/ /rtag pa'i sbyor bas rjes dran bya/ /slob ma drung du bzhag byas la/ /de yi rjes su bla ma yis/ /gos la sogs pas mig bkab? nas/
243a2(rgyud 'grel): btags pa'i stan la bzhag par bya/ /shes rab ldan par rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas/ /rang 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /slob ma rtag par bsams byas la/ /'dzag pa'i rigs zhes bya ba ni/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /byang chub sems rnams
243a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ltar/ /nga yis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ /rgyun gyis khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /zad? med de ni zad dogs na/ /nya phyis? la sogs zhen ba spangs/ /dag pa'i lce yi rtse mo yis/ /gnyis ka las byung blang bar bya/ /'di ni de nyid bla na med/ /gnyis med ye shes
243a4(rgyud 'grel): brjed? mi nus/ /chos dbyings rnam pa lta bur ni/ /zhi ba'i bde bas yang dag myang/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin khu tshur gyis/ /snying gang chos gos grwa nas gzung/ /lag pas dril bu mgul du bsdam/ /bla ma rdo rje 'chamg ba yis/ /dbugs 'byung thams cad yang dag blangs//
243a5(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pa nyid gyur pas/ /slob ma chen po lung bstan byed/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas the tshom med/ sku dang rgas dang 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'jigs dang mya ngan nad mi 'gyur/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ bu khyod nga yiS? lung b? de? ltar lung? bstan khyad? ? ?
243a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton/ /kye rang 'dod lha de bzhin gshegs/ /sa blas 'og sa stengs 'grub/ /'di ni gsang ba'i dbang las lung bstan ba'o// //byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas kyis/ /chen po'i
243a7(rgyud 'grel): chen pos ji ltar byin/ /bdag kyang bsgral ba'i don du ni/ /nam mkha' i rdo rjes bdag la stsol/ /rigs pa dang po yang na gzhan/ /rgyud gzhan las gsungs rim pa yis /tshe dpag med kyi rnal 'byor sbyin/ /phyag rgya bzang mo rab brtag pa/ /lha mo thar
243b1(rgyud 'grel): byed dga' stong ma/ /sna tshogs gzugs can brtser ldan ma/ /zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che/ /gzung bar byas nas mchod mdzad kyi/ de nas chos dbyings rdo rje ma/ /dam tshig sdom pa 'di skad ston/ /nus sam khyod ci rdo rje can/ /dri chen dri chu bza' ?
243b2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /rak+ta mi? sa ga pur dang/ /bud med mos par dad zhus sam/ /b+ha ga 'o byed mi rtog gam/ /ltos shig rdo rje bde ba can/ /de nas de ni rdo rje can/ /rab tu rgod cing 'di skad sna/ /lha mo ci phyir bdag mi theg/ ga bur maM sa bdag 'tshal gyis/ /shes rab
243b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag dad bar bgyi/ /de nas lha mo gcer phyung nas/ /bdag nyid pad+ma ltar gzhug go/ rmad byung? nga? yi pad+ma yin/ /bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu rim bzhin 'di la spyod/ /'di dang nam yang mi 'bral lo/ /chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag sems can
243b4(rgyud 'grel): khams ni rnam par grol/ /bde chen rgyal po 'di nyid ni/ /rang bzhin thams cad la mdun nas/ /nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la/ /pad+ma la bzhugs par du gsungs/ /b+ha ga nang du nam mkha' bzhin/ /'byung po lnga po brgyan bzhin 'chang/ /lta ba la ni ge sar bcas//
243b5(rgyud 'grel): nga? dang ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /der gnas nas ni bsgom par bya/ /mi 'chi lha yi gzugs su ni/ /'di la rtag tu 'joms pa yin/ /shes rab kyi ni de ltar gsungs/ /badzra k+Sha ho:/ /de nas sngags pa rdo rje can/ /de yi rgya yi sa dbang la/ /b+ha ga'i nang
243b6(rgyud 'grel): gi rtsa las ni/ /'bad pa las ni rnyed pa la/ /bslab pa bla ma'i dam tshig gis/ /mdzub mos rab tu brung? nas ni/ /lce yis yang yang rol mo mdzad/ /des ni rab tu rgyas par 'ong/ /de ltar rol mo mdzad tsam na/ /de bas kyang ni shin tu rgyas/ /rtag pa'i bde ba rab tu byung/ /pha rol phyin
243b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu rdzoD pa? dang?/ /stobs rnams dang ni dbang rlabs? dang/ /sa bcu po ni las 'das pas/ /rdo rje? mchen mar de 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bcing ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /rdo rje sems ni nges phyung nas/ /rdo rje lce yis bza' bar bya/ /mnyam bar 'byung ba'i cho ga yis/ /dkyil dam ba bri bar bya//
244a1(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin las sbyin sreg ste/ /de nas dbugs 'byung sbyin par bya/ /gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor la/ /? bzhugs dam pa mthong ba yis/ /sdig pa kun las nges grol yang/ /deng? khyod yan dag gnas par 'gyr/ /bde chen ? ? lan
244a2(rgyud 'grel): phyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mi grub pa dang mi 'chib/ /sus kyang mi? tshugs dka' bar gyis/ srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /shin tu srid pa grub pa'i phyir/ /sten pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /'di ni khyod kyi
244a3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bsrangs/ /grub pa'i dam tshig sdom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyam par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i ? ? yin/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya zhing/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'gom mi bya/ /rdo rje spun la smad pa ni/ /nam yang sma ? mi bya'o/
244a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la byams dman min/ /skal mi nad kho na gtam min/ /skal ldan sems can spad mi bya/ /bdag gis lus ni mi smad cing/ /dam pa'i chos ni tshad mi gzung/ /gzhan gyi chos la brnyas mi bya/ /byang chub snying po'i mthar thug tu/ /
244a5(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu gzung bya zhing/ /dbu rgyan rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /rtag tu sbyin bsreg dgang bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor rtag tu bri ba ste/ /rtag tu bde gshegs rab gnas bya/ /'byung po
244a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i? ? sbyin/ /de la sogs pa ? dbyung? rgyas/ /shes rab kyi dbang la brjod par bya'o/ /ston pas gsung ba sems dpa' che/ /yang dag dam par dga' sa thob/ sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la/ /bde ba chen po gsung bar bya/ /de? thog
244a7(rgyud 'grel): ma dbus mdza' med/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das ?/ /'don dam pa'i bde chen te/ gzhan med bdag? rkyang bde pa sta/ /ye shes 'di ni chos ? ste/ /snying po rdo rje mkha' lta bu/ /rdul bral ? thad pa ste/ /khyod rang yang ni pha de'o/ /'di nyid ye shes chen po ste//
244b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /gnyis su med dang gnyis kyi gzugs/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso/ /g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ngas thob nas/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs dang mtshungs? par snang/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs gang gis/ /rtag tu nges par 'gyur
244b2(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi rjes yang skad brjod do/ /bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas ni/ /bzhi pa shes par bya ba yin/ /slob ma'i bya ba rdzogs rjes su/ /dkyil 'khor mchod bstod legs byas la/ /oM khyod kyi sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun
244b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos ? bstsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /brjod de lta yi 'khor lo gshegs/ /dman pa chu bo chen por dor/ /oM gaM yi gi li hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ rdul tshon bsdu ba dang dor ba'o sngags so/ /dpal kyi rdo rje'i bya
244b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rim pa las/ slob ma dbang bskur ba'i bya ba ste lnga pa'o// //de nas slob ldan rnal 'byor bas/ /bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas phyir/ /sa phyogs nyams dga' yid 'ong bar/ /dri zhim byug cing me tog dgram/ /bde ba'i stan la der
244b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas la/ /baM pad laM? skyes gzhom med las/ /lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od zer gyis/ /rgyal ba spyan drangs mkha' la bzhugs/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis/ /bla ma rdo rje mchod par bya/ /bshags dang yi rang bsngo ba dang/ /skyabs 'gro mchog
244b6(rgyud 'grel): ? ma lam gnas bya/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/ /gdol pa'i khang pa mes bsregs la/ /bram ze rgyal rigs sogs gnas bya/ /oM shU n+ya tAdz+nya na badzra swab+hA ba At+ma ko haM / nga M par re? gsal byad de
244b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje hUM de? las/ /? re dur? nang du/ /khro? bo bcus kyang bsrung bar bya/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ nam khar yaM raM baM laM las/ /rlung me chus dkyil 'khor du/ /b+h+ruM las 'khor lo de steng du/ /sred pa ba'i ming bag chags bsam/ /de dag las
245a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pho brang ni/ /zur bzhi sgo bzhi rtab bas bzhi/ /dra ba dra phyed ka ba brgyad/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /der ni mtsho skyes snang byed kyi/ /steng du bdud bzhi'i gdan bsam mo/ /oM sarba ta bA ga ta a la ya badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko ta/ A li zla ba med
245a2(rgyud 'grel): long dang/ /kA li nyi ma mnyam nyid ldan/ /aM hUM rdo rje gri gug dang/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/ /thams cad gcig gyur bya nan tan/ /gzugs brnyas rdzogs pa chos dbyings so/ /de las byung ba kun tu bzang/ /zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi bcu drug phyag/ rtsa zhal zla?
245a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra g.yas dang g.yon/ /sngon po dmar po lhag ma ban? grang po rta bod blang rnga mo/ skyes ba seng ge byis g.yas/ sa chu rlung me zla nyi dang/ /mdza' byed dor? sbyin g.yon na'o/ /lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis gnag/ gri gug thod pa g.yas g.yon na'o/ /oM pad+ma su kha b+har ma hA su baM dang
245a4(rgyud 'grel): ta tsa tu dA nanda b+ha ka bi swa hUM hUM hUM ka ryaM ku ru Shwa me/ oM badzra mahA dwe Sha tsa tu rA nanda da ya ka kha ga mu kha e ka ra so nA tha/ hUM hUM hUM ka rgyaM ku ru Sha me/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu da ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ gnyis gnyis sgras bskul sa bon las/ /gzugs smra dri?
245a5(rgyud 'grel): ro?? bzhin dang/ /sa chu me rlung rnam dag pa/ /lha mo brgyad rnams rim pas bkod/ /dbang po tshangs stengs go rI gnag/ phyag gnyis gri gug ro hi ha/ /gshin rjer rkun ma dbang po'i steng/ /dmar po cang te'u phag pa can/ /chu bdag nyer ? to langs
245a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /dma' ser du sbal thod pa bsnams/ /lus ngan drag por za phod mo/ /ljang gu sprul dang pang snod can/ /dbang ldan gshin rje puk+ka sA/ /dbang sngon sed g.yas ngag ste g.yon/ /byin zar ri khrod nor sbyin steng/ /dkar mo dge slong khar bsil 'dzin//
245a7(rgyud 'grel): bden bral de steng gtum mo sngo/ /g.yas na 'khor lo thod pa g.yon/ /rlung mtshams g.yung mo lho min steng/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub sna tshogs mdog /yang na sbyor sgras oM A:hUM/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dbugs nas sbyor ba yis/ /rig ma dang bcas zhu ba las/ /puk+ka
245b1(rgyud 'grel): sI sogs glu yis bskul/ /snying rje'i thugs kyi rjes tsun bzhengs/ /puk+ka sI dag skyabs mdzod cig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni/ /bdag la bde chen rnal 'byor mdzod/ /khyod dang bral na bdag 'gum mo/ /kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin
245b2(rgyud 'grel): spongs mdzod la/ /ri khrod mi ni bdag don bsgrubs/ /'jig rten mgron gnyer 'dod pa'i gtso/ /stong pa nyid la ci phyir bzhugs/ /gtum mo bdag ni zhu bar bgyid/ /khyod ma lags na phyogs ma 'tshal/ /bdag gis nyid kyi thugs 'tshal gyis/ /dbang po'i dre? ldan
245b3(rgyud 'grel): khyed bzhengs shig/ g.yung mo bdag ni dran nyams pas/ /thugs rje rgyan 'chad ma mdzad cig/ bskul bas smon lam rjes dran nas/ /hUM dang aM las rab bzhengs pa/ /rnam thar bsdu dngos stod rnams dag/ zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi bcu drug phyag/ g.yas
245b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing spyan/ /gsum gsum lhag ma bud pa mtshungs/ /nyi mar zhabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskums/ /lhag mar gar gyi tshul gyis bzhengs/ /g.yas par glang sogs nad rnams bsdud/ /g.yon par sa sogs dbang phyug brgyad

245b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams pas/ /ye shes sems dpa' bskyed par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub 'gyur bas/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang bya/ /gau rI la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /dgug gzhug bcing dang dgyes ba bskyed/ /oM badzra go rI A darSha ya:dza:aoM badzra hau? rI
245b7(rgyud 'grel): pra? be sha hUM/ oM badzra bet+ta lI sphoT ya baM/ oM badzra g+hasma rI ba shi ku ru ho(rgyud 'grel): mig dang rna ba sna lce lus/ /yid kyi skye mched rnam dag pa/ /gti mug zhe sdang ser sna dang/ /'dod chags phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /bdag med ma rnams rang gnas dgod/ /lus ngag 
246a1(rgyud 'grel): yid gsum rnam dag pa/ /mkha' sbyong sa sbyod sa 'og ma/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su'o/ /'od zer gyis bskul dpa' bo'i tshogs/ /mchod byas gsol btab dbang bskur mthar/ /rigs kyi bdag pos dbu la brgyan/ /zhe sdang gti mug ser
246a2(rgyud 'grel): sna dang/ /'dod chags rdo rje gau rI sogs/ /gnyis gnyis rim bzhin phyag rgyas gdab/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a gi'e? ka ha badzra swa b+hA pa Adma ko taM/ rlung me'i steng du thod par ni/ /bruM aM dzraM kha hUM dang ni/ /go kun ha na las ni/ /bdud rtsi rdo rje lce yis ?/ /oM sarba ta thA

246a4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /khyab par bzhugs nas he ru kas/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis bdud rtsir bsgyur/ /sman mchog dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /sarba ta thA ga ta stu ti badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de ltar bde bar gshegs drug gis/ /bsam gtan rab tu 'phad pas bya/ /bsam gtan

246a6(rgyud 'grel): Sho ? sha b+hu ? ya/ kriSh+Na ? mU ta ? p? 246b1(rgyud 'grel): spar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snga bsregs nas/ /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pas/ /bsregs pas haM las ri bong 'dzag/ sgong skyes gnas su chu skyes ni/ /'dab brgyad ge sar bcas de la/ /yab lnga yum bzhi kun gyi dngos /kun nas mi 'chi rgyun gyis
246b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /snying dbus zla bar gzhom med ni/ /sna tshogs 'od ldan de rdo rje/ /rdo rje bdag mkha' 'phro ma/ /tshogs bskul ba bsgom par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sna rtser yungs kar tsam/ /mchog dga' i tshul du thams cad bsdu/ /rang 'dod lha'i rim rdzogs nas/ /snying gi sa bon 'od zer las/ /A li kA

247a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de/ /sngags bzlas dka' thub sbyin sreg de/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor dang dkyil 'khor de/ /mdo ru bsdus na sems nyid de/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni/ /nye bar thog par gyur ba'i rtags/ /dang? sprid gyi rnam

248b1(rgyud 'grel): mig sogs gti mug? sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyis/ /rang snying gnas su ye shes bsam/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis/ /mchod ba'i rim par dbul bar bya/ /'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho ga yis/ /rgya cher rab tu

248b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsgrub dus gnas nang du/ /sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas te/ /las kun sgrub byed sbyin sreg bya/ /sngags pas byang du mngon bltas te/ /zhi ba'i las ni yang dag brtsam/ /shar du rgyas pa mngon spyod spyod ltor/ /dbang dang dgug pa nub tu'o ? zhi ? ka ?
248b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rgya? nad? bya ba yin/ /dbang dang dgug pa nyi phyed la/ /mtshan byed bsang dang zhe sdang ngo/ /phan pa gnyis kyis zhib ste/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyas pa'o/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang zhes bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i sems kyi zhib ba ste/
249a1(rgyud 'grel): nad la sogs bzhi bar bya/ /rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste/ /rin chen char sbrin rab bskor bya/ /rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dgug pa'i las ni yang dag brtsam/ /gdug pa'i sems kyis bsad pa ste/ /me yi? char sprin ba?
249a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po ste/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste/ /dbang ni zla ba phyed pa 'dra/ /dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs/ /bsang dang zhe sdang las la ni/ /nam mkha' i khams dang mtshungs pa'o/ /khru gang pa dang khru phyed par/ /rgya? dang thabs ni?
249a3(rgyud 'grel): zhib ste/ /khru do pa dang khru gang pa/ /rgya dang zabs ni rgyas pa yin/ /dbang dang dgug pa'ang khru gang ba/ /khru phyed rgya dang thabs? su bstan/ /sor mo nyi shu de yi phyed/ /rgya zabs bsad dang zhe sdang la'o/ /zhi ba'i kha khyer sor bzhi ste/ /rgyas pa la ni sor mo brgyad//
249a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang dgug la sor bzhi bzhi/ /bsad dang sdang la sor gsum gsum/ /phyed ma dkar pos zhi ba la/ /de bzhin rgyas pa ser po ste/ /dbang dang dgug la dmar po grags/ /gsod dang zhe sdang nag po'o/ /'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang/ /ral gri rdo rje ci rigs
249a5(rgyud 'grel): dgod/ /rang 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /las kun byed pa'i sbyin sreg ste/ /tshad dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang/ /zhi ba dang mthun shar blta'o/ /dgang gzar dbye ba bshad par bya/ /gser sogs nim pa mchod sbyin zhing/ /yu ba khru do mchu sod? brgyad//
249a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing thabs rdo rje ser bzhi pa/ /kha ni pad+ma'i rnam pa mtshungs/ /ska rags gru bzhin rdos? pa ste/ /'og tu pad+ma legs par bya/ /rin chen sor gnyis yu ba'i mgon/ /tha mar rdo rje sor drug pa/ /de ni dgang gzar mtshan nyid do/ /blug gzar yu ba khru gang
249a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /mchur ni sor ? zheng dang thabs/ /rdo rje sor gsum pad 'dab mtshungs/ /rin chen ser? gcig gsum rdo rje/ /gzhan yang dgar gzar blug gzar gyis/ /yu ba khru gang bya ba ste/ /'og tu rdo rje rin chen bya/ /de yi dgang gzang? rgyar sor bzhi/ /
249b1(rgyud 'grel): zabs? su or? bzhin de rdo rje/ /sor bzhi'i mthar ni rdo rje ste/ /bar du pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs/ /blugs gzar pad? dbyibs sor gnyis te/ /zabs su ser gcig nang rdo rje/ /? ? glug gzad kha rang gi/ /lha yi sa bon rab 'phar bsam/ /re ? 'did yi
249b2(rgyud 'grel): khang dgong bya/ /yang na sor mo lnga dang gsum/ /bcer? bas kyang ni bya bar gsungs/ /me tog bdug sbos mar me dang/ /de bzhin driyi dud sogs g.yas/ /g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod/ /mdun du snod ni gzhag par bya/ /mchos sbyin shing sogs
249b3(rgyud 'grel): yal ga las/ /rtse mo mchog ni ma nyams pa/ /bzang po lam? gnyis ldan pa/ /las kyi dbye bas dbye bar bya/ /rgyas pa la ni sor bcu bzhi/ /zhib sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /dbang la sor bcu sdang ba dang/ /gsang pa la yang sor mo brgyad/ /sha lnga dang ni
249b4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga/ /rgun 'brum a mra sbrul 'jigs dang/ /kha 'dzag skyes ma rtse ma ni/ 'bras bu rnams ni sbyin steg bya/ /tsam pa a shwa sa? dang glu/ /ka taM pa dang srid bskul nyid/ /ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas/ /me tog 'dis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /yid kyis mar
249b5(rgyud 'grel): khu bsam pa dang/ /'bras so chag med 'bras dang ni/ /'bru dang zho yi zan dang ni/ /til dang de bzhin mnyam pa shing/ /dur ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid/ /bsam gtan rdo rjes sbyin sreg bya/ /me tog la sogs rdzas rnams ni/ /las kyi dbye bas kha dog dbye//
249b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po zhi par? byed? par brjod/ /ser po rgyas pa sgrub thabs la/ /dbang dang dgug par dmar po che/ /tha ma'i las la nag po'o/ /til gyis zhi ba rgyas pa zho/ /tsher mas de bzhin bsang ba la/ /zhe sdang sogs la'ang tsher mar brjod/ /dbang dang dgug la
249b7(rgyud 'grel): utpa la'i/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil sngags yungs kar bzla/ /khu tshur gnyis kyis 'dod lha la/ /rang gi bskor bas rab bskor te/ /gnyis kyi bar du sbyor bar bya/ /cig car khu tshur gnyis dag gis/ /g.yas su bskor bar yang bya'o/ /sngon bzhin yungs kar ma snod
250a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sbyang bar bya phyir gzhug par bya/ /oM sarba paM da ha na badra yang ? sya sarba pA pa da ha swAhA sbyang ba'o/ /ye shes rnam shes nang bkug ste/ /snyim pas chu ni blang byas nas/ /bskor te sbyar phyir mi ru yang/ /nyungs kar bzhin du gzhug pa ?
250a2(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM ta Ta phaT nye rig go/ de nas yi shing la sogs rdzas/ /bsang la sbyang phyir sngags 'di gdon/ /oM sh+rA swAhA/ mar sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a swAhA/ rdzas bkru ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra swAhA/ 'bru sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ rdzas gzhan sbyar
250a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags so/ /oM a swA hA/ yaM shing sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /sbyin sreg yan lag las byung zhing/ /thab khung bas khung thab khung gzhug/ ting nge 'dzin gyis me sbar la/ /yid kyis mar kyis mar kyi sreg blugs sbyin/ /de ni so sor snang ba ste/ /bsam gtan las byung
250a4(rgyud 'grel): sku mnga' ba/ /de la zhabs bsil zhal bsil dang/ /mchod yon 'thor 'thud? ris bzhin dbul/ /ha cang ring min rtse ma nyams/ /g.yas bskor shar nas ku sha dgra ma/ /rtse mo phyogs gcig bstan bya ste/ /stegs bu'i steng du bzhag par bya/ /tsan dan a ka ru shing
250a5(rgyud 'grel): dam/ /gzhan yang dri yi shing dag gis/ /sbyin sreg bya phyir rlung yab kyis/ /me sbar gzi bskyed mtshan ma brtag/ kha dog dri dang rtse mo 'khyil/ /gzugs dang sgral sogs pa yi/ /dge dang mi dge bar gyur te/ /zhib kha dog dkar 'bar ba/ /rgyas pa ser
250a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i rnam pa ste/ /dbang dang mngon spyod dag la ni/ /dmar dang gnag pa'i me ni bsngags/ /brgya byin bzang po'i gzhu 'dra ste/ /g.yas su 'khyil pa'i mchog yin no/ /dang pa'i sgra ltar snyan pa dang/ /me lce snam zhing rtse mo can/ /sreg blugs bsres pas yon
250a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag phyir/ /me ni khong du chud phyir brtab/ /me rtog rnam 'phro dub mang/ /rim gyis 'bar zhing khad kyis 'phro/ /mdza' mar rang 'bar gzi byin can/ /tsha zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang/ /rtse gsum zhib ma 'dra nyid dang/ /de bzhin pa lang 'gro 'dra ba/ /de la sogs
250b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan dang pa/ /mi dge rnams kyang rtags par bya/ /me yi dbus su bsgom bya ba / /pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /spyan gsum zhal bzhi phyag bzhi'i lha/ /gsus chen ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin phreng pa ste/ /g.yon na dbyig pa spyi blugs so//
250b2(rgyud 'grel): las dang rjes mthun kha dog can/ /ra yi skye gnas las byung bsgom/ /tshur sbyon tshur sbyon 'byung po che/ /me lha drang srong bram ze mchog/ sreg blug zhal zas bzhes slad du/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /gzi brjid chen po mi yi lha/ /'dod pa thams cad
250b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po/ /thugs rjes sems can don mdzad pa/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /oM e hye hi mahA b+hu ta de ba ri Shi dwi dza satwa ma gri a tu ti a? har asmi san+ni hi to b+ha ba/ 'chad pa'i chogs mchod byas la/ /spos khang yongs su gzung byas te/ /'dod don dngos grub rtogs
250b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir/ /dam tshig yang dag brjod par bya/ /oM badzra a na la ma hA b+hu ta dzbla la ya saba d+hasmiM ku ru sarba duSh+Tho hUM phaT dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ /sa ma ya stwaM a haM/ dam tshig sbyin pa'o/ /dgang gzar blug gzar bzang po yi/ /rdo rje mtshan par sa bon bsgom/ /
250b5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yas pas gzung byas te/ /phus mo'i bar du gnas byas nas/ /ye shes bdud rtsir byin rlabs rdzas/ /me yi lha la sreg blugs dbul/ /oM agna ye swAhA/ mar gyi'o/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na ma hA badzra satwa sarba pA paM da ha swAhA/ /ti la nag gi'o//
250b6(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra buSh+Ta ye swAhA/ 'bras ma chag pa'i 'o/ /oM sarba saM ba de swAhA/ zho dang zas mchog gi'o/ /oM badzra bi dzA ya swAhA/ /oM badzra bi dzA bi dzA ya swAhA/ 'bras so ba'i'o/ /o M ma hA be gA ya swAhA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM mahA ba la ya swAhA/ mon sran gre'u'i'o/ oM badzra glasma rI swAhA/
250b7(rgyud 'grel): gro'i'o/ /oM badzra a ru She swAhA/ dur ba gzhon nu'i 'o/ /oM a pra hi ta ta badzrA ya swAhA/ ku sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra ba dzI ya swAhA/ u dum+ba ra'i 'o/ /oM bo Dhi brik+Sha ye swAhA/ byang chub kyi shing gi'o/ /oM badzra la hA ya swAhA/ pa lak+Sha'i'o/ /oM badzra ku be
251a1(rgyud 'grel): rA ya swAhA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o/ /o sA ha ka rA ya swAhA/ a mra'i 'o/ /mthar ni swAhA zhi ba ste/ rgyas pa'i dus su bo Sha Ta/ /mthar ni hUM phaT gsad pa la/ /dgug dang dpar lan?:dang h+ri(rgyud 'grel): ci 'byor mtshon? gnas mi? mi lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bstod
251a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal po Tak+ki? sa dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg/ 'dzin byed me lha nyid rnam par 'dud/ /tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal po drang
251a3(rgyud 'grel): srong mchog/ 'byung po longs su bskyad pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje dbang gis sku? sprul pa/ /rig dags? grubs pa'i drang srong tshul/ /nyon mongs bsreg pa'i shes rab 'od/ /bskal? pa'i mi bzhin gzi brjid 'bar/ /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan/ /thabs?
251a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis sprul pa'i theg pa bcings/ /rigs sngags gsung zhing bgrang 'phreng 'dzin/ /bdud rtsi? bcud? ldan gu ? bsnams/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la bsil/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par ?/ /'jig rten gnas kyang mya ngan 'das/ /zhi ba brnyes ? thugs
251a5(rgyud 'grel): rje che/ /dbang? bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa bzla/ /bsang gtor bya ste me lha yi/ /thugs kar rang lha bskyed byas la/ /spyan drangs? mchod bstod la sogs bya/ /dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pas khyab pa yi/ /chos sku nam mkha' lta bur dbyer
251a6(rgyud 'grel): med bya ba/ /thabs dang shes rab gzugs brnyan skur ston pa/ /bcom ldan 'khor bcas 'dir ni gshegs su gsol/ /ma lus sems can kun gyi don slad du/ /bdud sde dpung bcas ma lus 'joms mdzad cing/ /dngos rnams me lus ji bzhin
251a7(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen rgyur? pa/ bcom ldan 'khor bcas 'dir ni gshegs su gsol/ /oM e hye hi b+ha ga wAn+ni b+ha ga taM sa ma yen tsa arg+haM taM saM pra tits+tsha pU dzI? tsarya pra si dam?/ mchod yon phul te dgug sogs bya/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur legs rdzogs nas/ /mchod
251b1(rgyud 'grel): dang gtor ma nyer spyod sogs/ sngar bzhin phul nas ye shes me/ /mnyes byas 'dod pa'i don blangs te/ /yi ge brgya pas gshegs su gsol/ /lhag pa'i rdzas kyis dgang blugs kyis/ /me lha mchod de gshegs su gsol/ /bdag gi don dang gzhon gyi don/ /byi nang? khyod kyis
251b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs kyis gshegs/ /ji bzhin dus su slar gshegs te/ /bdag gi dngos grub thams cad bsgrubs/ /oM kritwA wa sarba satwa rtha? sid+d+hir dat+ta ya thA nu gA gats+tsha twa bud+d+ha bi Sha ya bu na ra ma n+ya mu(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim/ /tshim par gyur nas dngos
251b3(rgyud 'grel): grub ster/ /gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa/ /thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis skongs/ /de phyir rdo rje mkha' 'gro yis/ /sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad/ /'dis ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur/ /ye shes mo ni rab tu dgyes/ /rgyal ba phan pa gnyis pa
251b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang/ /? gar dbang mnyas pa dang/ /lcags mchog rgyal po mnyes pa dang/ /tshangs pa brgya byin dbang chen dang/ /khyab 'jug rlung dang mtshan dang/ /thob ldan nyid dang 'dod lha dang/ /zla gnyi ma gdon gzhan dang?/ /sa ni
251b5(rgyud 'grel): zhags? pas 'dzin pa dang/ /lus ngan de bzhin mtshams skyong dang/ /chos rgyal dang ni klu dang ni/ /dri za lha min mi'am ci/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha/ /'og man du ni gnas pa dang/ /gang zhig rgyal chen gnas pa dang/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid
251b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /'phrul dga' yin ni lha rnams dang/ /gang zhig dag pa'i gnas son dang/ /'od zer 'jig rten khams gnas dang/ /mi mjed khams su gnas pa dang/ /gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can dang/ /gang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang/ /snod ldan
251b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can 'jig rten dang/ /ltug? ma tshogs dang rtswa sogs dang/ /gang dag rab dga' i sar gnas dang/ /pha rol dri med gang phyir dang/ /'od zer can du gnas pa dang/ /mi g.yo'i gnas su byas pa dang/ /gang zhig chos sprin rjes son pa/ /gang zhig sbyang dkar song ba
252a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gang zhig ring song thob pa dang/ /khor byed du ni gnas pas te/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang/ /'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po dang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos nyid/ /rwa ni ral gri gzugs can dang/ /dmyal ba yi dwags byol
252a2(rgyud 'grel): song dang/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams ni/ /sbyin sreg cho gas dgyes pa nyid/ /dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las/ /sbyin sreg gi bya ba ste dgu pa'o// //sngags tshul rigs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /yid 'ong srog chags med pa'i
252a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /legs sbyang dri zhim chus byugs nas/ /dus dang sbyar te ro hoM brtsam/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzlas pa yis/ /dri zhim chu yis dang por bkru/ /de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rnam snang mdzad du de bsams nas/ /rdo rje sdom pa byin nas kyang/ /bum pa'i
252a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang ni sbyin par bya/ /mig la sogs la gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor bas/ /sbyin sreg rim pas sbyang bar bya/ /nyi ma dag ni gsum pa na/ /rus pa'i phreng ba bsdu bar bya/ /'o ma dri bzang bsang gtor nas//
252a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi mchod rten yang dag brtsam/ /dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las ro? hom gyi byas ste bcu ba'o// //blo dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa bos/ /rnal 'byor pe? me'i dkyil 'khor la/ /khyad par can gyi longs spyod kyis/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo
252a6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bskor/ /bsod nams 'dod pa'i sbyin bdag gis/ /dkyil 'khor dri dang me tog bcas/ /dri yi thig le'ang dbul bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /dam tshig gso ba 'am gzhan gyis kyang/ /zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul/ /snga bar
252a7(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun chos ston bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas yar? mnyes bya/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing/ /de yi rjes la tshogs kun la'o/ /gnas der tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dbyug sngon can la gsol btab nas/ /skal ldan skal min shes 'gyur bas
252b1(rgyud 'grel): dang por lus dang ngag gi brda/ /lung gi 'dir ni shes par bya/ /gang zhig skun? dang srid mo yang/ /the tshom med par rnam par shes/ /gang gis sor mo gcig ston pa/ /'ongs sam zhes ni 'dri pa yin/ /gnyis ni legs par 'ongs pa yin/ /mthe bong g.yon pa?
252b2(rgyud 'grel): bcang ba ni/ /bde ba'i phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /gang zhig ming med ston pa la/ /de yis mthe chung sbyin bar bya/ /gang zhig dbus ma ston pas/ /de yis mdzub mo sbyin par bya/ /gang zhig ming med ston pa la/ /de la mgrin pa rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig gos ni ston
252b3(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /de la rtse gsum rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig nu ma ston pa la/ /de la mtshams ni rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston pa la/ /de la 'khor lo rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la/ /gtsug pud 'grol bar mngon par brjod/ /gang zhig
252b4(rgyud 'grel): dgral ba ston pa la/ /de la rgyab ni rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la/ /pho long rtse bar rol par bye/ /phyag rgya so so'i phyag rgya'o/ /dam tshig la yang dbye par bya/ /de tshe rnal 'byor mas smras pa/ /e ma bu ni snying rje che/ /gal te phreng ba'i
252b5(rgyud 'grel): pag? ston na/ /'du bar bya zhes brjod pa yin/ /phreng bas mngon par gshegs byas la/ /dam tshig brtul? zhugs shin tu mnos/ /ma da na chang ba la sha/ ma la ya dza de bzhin du/ /'gro ba khe Ta ro sh+ra pa/ /rus pa'i rgyan ni ni rang shu/ /? kha na
252b6(rgyud 'grel): shog ces? rab? can/ /kri pra ti ni cang? te'u 'dod/ /du du ra ni skal med brjod/ /skal ldan ka ri laM dza ri 'dod/ /reg min?  di na ni maM zhes bya/ /thod pa pad+ma pany+dza nam/ /za na ni tri pi tri ka raM/ /tshod ma ma la ti daM naM/ /bshad ba tsa tu ra sa maM brjod/ /kastu ri na? gci par
252b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod/ /? dang 'byung shes par bya/ /ga pU? ra? dra? ni khu par shes/ /sha chen sha li dza zhes brjod/ /dbang po gnyis sbyor kundu ru/ /bo la rdo rje bshad pa ste/ /kak+ko la ni pad+mar shes/ /rigs kyi dbye ba'i dbye ba yis/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga zhes bshad//
253a1(rgyud 'grel): brda yi skad ni 'di dag la/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya rigs lnga yin/ /g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /gar ma pad+ma'i rigs su 'dod/ /rin chen rigs nyid rang? 'tshed ma?  skye? gnyis de bzhin gshed mar shes/ las kyi riD? nyid dang 'tshed ma/ /phyag rgya 'di dag dngos
253a2(rgyud 'grel): grub ster/ /de yi khu ba rdo rje yin/ /mchod byas brtul zhugs can gyis btung/ /rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che/ /khyod la nga yi bshad pa gang/ /rmad du byung ba brda yi tshig/ de dag thams cad dad pas gzung/ /kye rdo rje las dbang bskur gang/ /brda yi skad
253a3(rgyud 'grel): ni mi smra na/ /de yi dam tshig nyams par ni/ /'gyur ba bde? la the tshom med/ /yams dang 'tshe ba rkun ma dang/ /gdon dang rims dang dug rnams dang/ /brda yi skad ni mi smra ni/ /gal te sangs rgyas yin yang 'chi/ /rang gi dam tshig shes rnyed la/ /gal te
253a4(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'di mi snran?/ /de la gnas bzhir skyes pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ma ni khro bar byed/ /sgrub dus bkra shis dga' ston dang/ /dam tshig gso ba'i tshig sogs/ /yi dags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang/ /chos brgyad kyi ni dus dag la/ /dur khrod ri yi bya skyib dang/ /de bzhin mi ma
253a5(rgyud 'grel): yin gyi gnas/ /yang na dben pa 'am rgya mtsho'i mthar/ /ston mo 'di dag brtsam par bya/ /der ni rtag tu brtag par bya/ /dung chen dgu dang ro yi gzugs/ yang na stag gi pags pa dang/ /de bzhin dur khrod ras dbus su/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs nas/
253a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po brgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad 'byor pa'am dmigs nas ni/ /bems po'i gnas su sreg blugs bya/ /shar lho byang dang ngag phyogs su/ /phyogs gnas rnams ni dga' bar bye/ /phyogs bral rnams su lha mo rnams/ /dam pa'i tshe yi
253a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya/ /lcags kyu lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga/ /rgyal mtshan mtshon bsnun bdun 'khor dang/ /rgyal po sha li la sogs rdzas/ /ji bzhin byin rlabs rim pa ni/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs? bcas mchod par byas/ /der ni
253b1(rgyud 'grel): cha dang srid mo dang/ /srid mo'i bu mo sgyog? mo ste/ /de nas rgyas par mchod byas nas/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'grub par 'gyur/ /thod pa chen po cha gcig pa/ /chang ni bzang pos bkang byas te/ /bla ma la dbus skal ldan ma/ /phyag btsal nas ni bdag btung bya/ /pad+ma? lag
253b2(rgyud 'grel): pas blang bar bya?/ /lag pa de nyid kyis dbul/ /nas ni sgrub pa po yi phyag/ /yang dang yang du bya ba'o/ /klu gar dngos grub rgyur gsungs pas/ /de dag gis kyang mchod par bya/ /kak+ko lar gnas po la ste/ /mummu ni kye kak+ko la/ /kye khyod kri pi ta bzung? ba/ /snying rje ? che?
253b3(rgyud 'grel): mi byed do?/ /der ni ba la bza' bar bya/ /bsdams pas nad nang? chung? ngo/ /kye ka li dza ni gzhug par bya/ /du du ra ni spang bar bya/ /tsa u sa ma ka thu ri/ /ga pur sihlas byug par bya/ /shA li ma la ti daM naM/ /der ni rkang pa? bza' bar bya/ /phreng ba khan? dang? kha? ta byed//
253b4(rgyud 'grel): ngag dang ma dag mi bta'o/ /ni raM su yis yan lag brgyan/ /der ni? sh+ra? pa rnam par gzhugs/ /ma la dzi ni kundu? ru/ /diM? daM maM ni der mi spangs/ /he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gar/ /dran pa ma yengs rnal 'byor bya'o/ /bsgom pa zhen pa'i sems kyis bya/ /chags
253b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan zhing goms pa'i sems/ /rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas te/ /rnal 'byor ma'i ma ma yis/ /glu dang gar ni 'di dag ste/ /mchog tu glu blang gar bya'o/ /'di nyid kyis ni 'khor bsrung zhing/ /de bzhin bdag kyang bsrung ba ste/ /'di yis 'jig rten dbang du byed/
253b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid sngags kyi bzlas pa ste/ /gang du dang pas glu blang dang/ /gang du dad pas gar bya ba/ /tshogs kyi bdag pos sngon byas te/ /de la dri ni rtag par bya/ /dang por sgog? pa la sogs dri/ /de nas yang ni bya rgod dri/ /de rjes ga bur ma la dza/ /glu yi byin rlabs? mtshan ?
253b7(rgyud 'grel): dang pa'i skad dang bur ba'i skad/ /klu yi rjes su thos 'gyur te/ /lce sbyang gis ni skad dag dang/ /phyi rol tshad du brtag par bya/ /sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor mas/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i ston mo ni/ /gang du zos na dngos grub ni/ /'dod pa thams cad 'grub byed pa'o/ /?
254a1(rgyud 'grel): glu gar bkra shis dang/ /smon lam chog kun rdzogs nas/ /yan lag rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te/ /rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor legs ldan pas/ /phung?  dang lhag ma kun bsres la/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma btang/ /de
254a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes smyor ldan bde bar gnas/ /dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam? las/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa'i bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// //mkhas? pas? gnas dang dus kun tu/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed dang/ bgegs ni zad cing zhe bya'i phyir/ /blung?
254a3(rgyud 'grel): mthod pa la gnas pa/ /lcags kyu lnga dang bdud rtse lnga/ /'bar dang sprod pa la sogs sgrubs/ /de nas phyogs gnas rnams dang ni/ /'byung bo che la gtor ma sbyin/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gsor bya zhing/ /g.yon pa'i dril bu dkrol bya zhing/ /phyag rgya sgyur pa'i rig pas
254a4(rgyud 'grel): bskrod/ /lta stangs dag ni dgra bgegs skrod/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i stangs stabs kyis/ /shar gyi gnas ni mnan par bya/ /rim pa 'di nyid kyis ni gzhan sgo gnas dag gis byed ni mnan/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon dag gis rol dang gcas pas mdza' 
254a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs spro/ /cung zad spyod pa'i sdigs mig dang/ /bcas pas smin ma rnam par bskyod/ /'gro ba dbang du byed pa'i rgya/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang ba/ /g.yas bskum pa dang g.yon bskum pa'o/ /slob dpon gtso bo rdor 'chang gis/ /sbyor ba can sngaD
254a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya sde/ /dus stabs gtso bo nad? stabs? dang/ /bskor ba'i stabs? dang bzlog pa'i stabs/ /oM hUM phaT/ shar sgo'i 'o/ /bus reg stabs dang g.yon 'degs? stabs/ /bskor stabs seng ge'i mchongs stabs so/ /oM hUM A(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ lho sgo yi'o/ /?
254a7(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba dang g.yon brkang dang/ /ag? zlum po'i stabs stabs so/ /e? hUM aM?/ aM? e phaT?/ nub sgo yi'o/ /mthun pa'i stabs dang mi mthun stabs/ /gcig bsdus g.yon brkyang rkang stabs mchog oM ha na mA ra tuSh+TaM? g+hA ta ya/ /A:hUM hI?:hUM phaT/ byang
254b1(rgyud 'grel): ? sgo yi'o/ /dri yi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ /me tog dkar sogs mchod byas te/ /dri dang 'bras chan khar zho/ /sbrang rtsi mar ldan shar sgor sbyin/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar byas te/ /mthe chung lu gu rgyud? bcings nas/ /zhags pa'i tshul
254b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar mdzub gnyis sbrel/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya 'di/ /lha rnams dgug? par byed pa'o/ /oM pa Ta li mahA ba ta li hUM hUM hUM dza:swAhA/ /oM A rgyu ba dang ni rgyu chen mo/ /nyin dang ? dngos grub bzhin/ /rta rgyal mo dang zla rgyal mo/ /lha mo dbu ma gang gA dang/ /'dod pa'i
254b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i phyag rgya 'di/ /lha rnams dgug bar byed pa'o/ /gzugs mdzes skar ma 'dus pa dang/ /gza' tshogs kun dang chogs?  kyi gtso/ /kar ta ka dang dpal ldan mo/ /lha mo ri po can 'dzin ma/ /a ka la dang u pa gal?/ /lha min lha yi rgyal po rnams/ /sbos? mo dang ni
254b4(rgyud 'grel): spos chen mo/ /mchod pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/ /hUM he ho(rgyud 'grel): A karSha ya A karSha ya sa ma ya d+hi pe hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /dgug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de gnyis sdigs mdzub gnyis dkrol ba/ /tshim par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /se gol gsum brdabs
254b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis gtang/ /oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dzruM hUM phaT swAhA/ /de dag ni lha'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /nub tu dri yi dkyil 'khor la/ /me tog ser dang dkar pos mchod/ /'o ma khrag bsres mngar gsum dang/ /'o mas bkang ba'i gser snod dbul/ /'dod pa'i
254b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang/ /sngags 'di yis ni dgug par bya/ /oM ba ta li mahA ba ta? li hUM hUM hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /klu rgyal mdza' yas nor rgyas bu/ /'jog po dang ni stobs kyi rgyu/ /pad+ma pad+ma chen po dang/ /dung? skyong dang ni rigs ldan no/ /lha mo lha mo chen mo dang/ /zla ba'i
254b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil gtsug be? con? dang/ /be con? chen po cur len dang/ /dga' bo dang ni nyer dga' bo/ /rgya mtsho rgya mtsho chen po dang/ /tsha ba tsha ba chen po dang/ /dpal gyi 'od dang 'od chen po/ /rjes su 'od dang mdzes pa dang/ /mdzes chen po dang sbral bzangs dang/ /stobs po che dang tshi
255a1(rgyud 'grel): li dang/ /tshi li chen po pa rnams dag/ mchod pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/ /oM A gats+tsha pa mA gats+tsha ya ma hA nA gA d+hi pa ti sarba sturgA? phruM phu swAhA/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dam bcings te/ /mthe bong? mthe? chung bsgreng bar bya/ lag pa
255a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas ni bar phye ste/ /sprul gyi bdugs kyi tshul du sbyar/ /oM b+ha k+Sha ya b+ha k+Sha? ya sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dzruM hUM phaT swAhA/ /klu rnams dga' byed sngags phyag rgya/ /se gol gsum gtogs gtor bar bya/ de dag ni klu'i rnam gtong mi cho ga'o/ /byang du dkyil 'khor glu gsuM?
255a3(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dmar po la soD bya/ /me tog dmar sogs nye bar brgyan/ /? 255a4(rgyud 'grel): bu bzang dang pad+ma'i gtsug /dung gi gtsug bud gang dang ni/ /yar byed dang ni 'bigs byed ma/ /gcod byed ma dang rdzogs byed ma/ /nor dang nor kun nor bzang mo/ /'khrugs bzang rol dang rol chen mo/ /bzhad dang rtse dang rnam par bskyod/ /dpal bzang dang ni gzugS

255a6(rgyud 'grel): bu bzang dang gang ba bzab/ /nor sbyin bdag dang rnam thos sras/ /rgyal ba bzang po rol mo'i phreng/ /bzhin gyi dbang po 'gro ba'i dbang/ /de dag la sogs 'khor dang bcas/ /gtor ma sbyin pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs/ /gnod sbyin mo gnod sbyin mo spyan
255a7(rgyud 'grel): 'drang?/ /hUM he ho A karSha? ya A karSha ya sa ma ya ti me? hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /rdo rje bcings bskor snying gar bzhag /sngags 'dis mnyes bar byas la btang/ /oM da na ti ba ti ba ti li swAhA/ /de la gnod sbyin gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /rdo rje stobs kyi lhor gnas
255b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /tsan? dan dmar po la sogs pas/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya/ /der ni me tog dmar po dgram/ /nya? skam dang ni sha skam dang/ /sgog pa'i bi khu khag gi snod/ /til gyi tshwa? mig khu ba rnams/ /khyad par du ni bdud rtsi lnga/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba dang/ /sran
255b2(rgyud 'grel): ma lnga dang sran chan gyi/ /gang ba'i snod ni mdun du bzhag /'dod rgyal phyag rgya sngags 'dis dgug /oM ba ta li ma hA ba ta li/ hUM hUM hUM dza:swAhA/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang/ /ri dang brag dang phug gis/ /yul gyi 'dab dar? lam dang zhing/ /khyad par du ni khyim
255b3(rgyud 'grel): stong dang/ snod dang thang dang sa steng dang/ /khyad par gdol pa'i khyim gnas pa/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /ltas byin mnyam du bstan pa dang/ /nag po 'jigs byed 'jigs chen po/ /dga' ba las 'das bgegs rgyal po/ /rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang/ /'jigs byed ma
255b4(rgyud 'grel): dang dbu mar bstod/ /rgyal mo rnam par rgyal mo dang/ /thub med gzhan gyi mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbos ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang po dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag mo sdang ba laM ba kiSha brog? byed ma dang mar me ma?/ /'jiD byed yul gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag? mo'i gzuD chen

255b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen mo/ /rdul med sbyor ba skye med ma/ /rdo rje dbang phyug ma bka' yis/ /thams cad thams cad 'ong bar byos/ /oM kak+ka d+ha na babband+ha na/ khakh+khA? da na sarba duSh+Ta ma/ ha na ha na g+hA ta ya
255b7(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal rgya bcings te/ /mdzub gnyis lu gu rgyud byas la/ /oM tiSh+Ta hUM hUM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha phaT dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis bya/ /se gol gsum gyis btang bar bya'o/ /de dag ni 'byung po'i gtor
256a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i cho ga'o?/ /'byung bo chen po'i gtor ma ni/ /lung gi nam mkhar bshad par/ /nam pa'i khams kyi nang gnas pa/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya/ /shar gyi 'od? dmar? brgya byin bsam/ /lhor ni mthar byed dgod par bya/ /chu bdag nub kyi 'dab mar
256a2(rgyud 'grel): ?/ de bzhin byang du nod sbyin dgod/ /me yi mtshams la mtshon po/ /bden bral du ni srin po'o/ /nub byung mtshan ? su rlung? lha ste/ /dbang ldan mtshams su 'byung po'i bdag/ zla ba nyi mtshangs la sogs/ /dam pa tshangs ris rnams dang ni/ /tshams?  pa mdun

256b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod ba'i don kun sgo nas kyang/ /de nas dbyes byas gshegs pa sal ba/ /yi ge brgya ba bya ba ste/ /oM badzra sadwas ma ya/ /ma nu pa la ya/ badzra satwa twe no ba tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me d+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ ? ya me a tiSh+Tha?/ sarba sid+d+hi

256b7(rgyud 'grel): sho b+ha? si? hUM/ gnyis bzhi? ? chu? yin? ni/ /zhabs bsil?  dag ni dbul bar bya/ /oM ni ri ta hUM khaM/ gsum pa la ni rom? mngar/ /zhal bsil du ni dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra no bedya A:hUM swAhA/ /bzhi par mtheb mdzub gnyis kyis ni/ /me tog dag ni dbul

257b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byen? rnal 'byor ma kun la?/ /mthe bo thir? mas so sor dbul/ /de yi dbus nas blangs nas ni/ /rang gi bdud rtsi'i do myang bya/ /oM A:hUM oM sarba ta tha ga ta a mrita badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje su? tshur? gnyis bcings nas/ /rked pa'i mtshams su bzhag par bya//
257b2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo sgog? dang bzhad ba dang/ /lus ni dgug pa gsum star bzhag/ /me tog skyud? pa'i tshul gyis dang/ /sdong bus mar me mchod pa dang/ /byug pa'i lus kyis rjes su dris/ /sgeg mos lags bas sgeg mos te/ /phreng ba phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /glu? yas su? hUM gi dam

257b4(rgyud 'grel): ? ? dang ? re'i ? kyis breng dang/ bdan tshul gyis 'phyar ? gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgang ba dang/ cad te'u tshul gyis? dkrol ba dang/ 'khar rnga'i? tshul gyis drdung? ba dang/ /bzhang?  pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum? pa dang/ /khro ba'i tshul gyis? khro? ba dang/ /sgeg? pa'i tshul

257b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bya/ /bcom ldan yon tan rang brjod? pas/ /'di'ang? mchod ba'i yan? lag yin/ /mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod pas mchod/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur/ /sgra la rnam
258a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ? grags chen po/ /gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje rnam
258a2(rgyud 'grel): snang mnga' bdag nyid/ /dril rnam gsum shes bya nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/ /rin chen chen por rab tu brags/ /rol rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags
258a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs/ /de gal rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /don yod 'bras bu stsol ba'o/ /glu ni rdo rje can la dbul/ /gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la dbul/ /hir mchog la
258a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin dri/ /'jig rten mchog la bza' dang bca' / /gos kyi mchod pa rta mchog la/ /'di rnams mchod pa dam pa ste/ /rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yis/ /rdo rje can kunda? mnyes par byed/ /a ka ru nal kyi rdo rje/ /phan pa la ni tsan dan dkar/ /dmar po
258a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten rjel? dbul/ /gur gum rdo rje snang ba la/ /'dun gyi rgyal po thams cad de/ /hUM rdo rje las byung ba'i dri/ /'di rnams dri yis rab sbyor pas/ /dam sa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/ /kha dang tshwa ba? rdo rjer dbul/ /sgrub? pa rdo rje nyi ma la/ /de bzhin lan tsha
258a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang/ /rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam/ ? ba yang ni rab brtag bya/ /kye yi rdo rje rdor can gyi/ /me tog mdog nag rkang thung 'byung/ /mal+lika dang mal ti/ /kun da sangs rgyas rtag tu dbul/ /shing gi dbang mchog dri med mchog/ snang byed la ni
258a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bar byed/ /dbang mchog dmar po'i chu? skyes dang/ /?  dmar po la ta laM/ /pad+ma gar gyi dpa' la dbul/ /rta mchog rdo rje can la dbul/ /rdo rje theg pas mnyes byed pa/ /'di ni don dam mchod pa yin/ /gang gis rnam rtog rnam spangs te/ /byang chub
258b1(rgyud 'grel): sems ni rnam bsgoms shig /lus dang sems ni rnam dag pa/ /de yi mchod pa bla na med/ /sems can gang gis dbu ma yi/ /theg pa bsgoms pas bsgoms na/ /theg? pa dman la lhag mos pas/ /de yi mchod bdun rjo? pa yin/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' bzhin
258b2(rgyud 'grel): du/ /bzlas dang bsgom la mngon dga' zhing/ /rtag tu 'khor lo'i pha? rol 'gro/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pas/ /'bod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dpal kyi rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las/ mchod pa'i bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// //
258b3(rgyud 'grel): sa? gsum gang yin dri bcas de ga phyir/ /de las 'das pa dam pa'i yid brtan nas/ /shes rab thabs ldan rgyal ba'i lam gcig nyid/ /zab cing rgya che rtog ge'i yul ma yin/ /de phyir bla ma'i man ngag brgyud rim gyis/ /rgyal pa'i dbang po bdud rtsi bcud kyi mdzod//
258b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags tshul rgya mtsho'i lam ni mdor bsdus pa/ /kye'i rdo rje yi bya ba'i rim pa'i lam/ /gang zhig rten cing 'brel ba'i chos 'di dag /rgya rkyen tshogs las 'bras bu tha dad pa/ /chos nyid kyis thod nus pa bsam las 'das/ /de 'dra'i kun rdzob chud son mi byed cing//
258b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rgyun rkyen? las byung ba'i phyir/ /dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med? togs ba'i/ /shes rab nor gyis me 'pham de dag la/ /rin chen 'bar 'dis brgyan pa mdzes 'gyur gyi/ /gang zhig kun rdzob rgyu 'bras chud gson cing/ /don dam tshul la mi mkhas rmongs?
258b6(rgyud 'grel): ? pa/ /shes rab nor mang? dbul lo de dag ?/ /mdzes par mi 'gyur ming brgyan pa 'dra/ /mkhas pa bdag 'dzin zhen pa'i 'dud dkrol te/ /bdag gzhan bla med byang chub bsgral ba'i phyir/ /snying rje gol gos shes rab thabs ldan pas/ /lus ngag yid kyis mi bya
258b7(rgyud 'grel): yod pa yin/ /de phyir dam pa'i phyogs kyis gsol btab pas/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi lam srol rnying gnas/ /shes rab ? dang rig pa'i rkang pa yis/ /legs par brtags la nyes pa'i 'jigs bral 'di/ /byas la bsod nams thob pa gang yod de pa?/ /rin
259a1(rgyud 'grel): chen 'bar pa'i sgrubs thabs lam 'di nas/ /'gro kun 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho myur ? te/ /kye yi rdo rje'i go 'phang? myur thob shog /dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las rin chen 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /
259a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mkhas pa chen po pra dza ?? zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgyu gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ /dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing? zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ /sh+rI? he ?
259a3(rgyud 'grel): e ka ? ra ? naM/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ /thugs rje chen bo'i mnga' bdag 'phan? pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang goms ? ni myangs cen ?/ /srid pa yi mi 'ching pa 'di//
259a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu sdong pa'i yon tan rnams/ /'gugs byed he ru ka la 'dud/ /snga dro'i dus su mal ? ? te/ /snying gar ? las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltas te/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha? hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes lan gsum brjod de/ /bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor
259a5(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs? la/ bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs te/ oM badzra re bo hUM? zhes pas na? la der lag pa bzhag la/ /oM badzra me dI ni badzri b+ha ba band+ha hUM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po/ /oM A:hUM zhes brjod de dbus su me tog gtor ro/ /shar bu
259a6(rgyud 'grel): ?? pa zhes pas me tog gtor ro/ /lho ru tsa tsau? rI na sa?:zhes pas gtor ro/ /nub tu ? hA lI? na ma(rgyud 'grel): byang du ?  g+hasma rI na ma/ dbang ldan du baM puk+ka? sI? na ma:byin zar? shaM sha ba rI na ma(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du laM tsaN+Da lI na ma:rlung du Ti Ti pi
259a7(rgyud 'grel): ? ?:zhes bya ba de rnams kyi me tog gtor ro/ /de nas yang oM de ba'i tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod la/ /oM a A i a'i u a'u ri rI:?  li lI a i? aau aM swAhA/ zhes bya bas kyang mchod do/ /de
259b1(rgyud 'grel): nas rkang ba brgyad kyis kyang mchod de/ /a'oM aShDaM na nA ya nA ma:? oM pi? Sho? ke? sha warta ne na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM tsa turbi sha ti ni tA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM Sho TaSh bA? dzA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM kriSh+Na dzAM? nA ta? Tha? su She na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ka dA la mA lA ne ? d+hA ri Ne na sa(rgyud 'grel): oM AD? ta? grA? rA tsit+ta ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM yad+he?
259b2(rgyud 'grel): du? daM Shane na ma(rgyud 'grel): de nas yang/ /oM badzra pu shpe A hUM/ oM badzra d+hUShpe A hUM/ oM badzra dI? ba A:hUM/ oM badzra ? A:hUM/ oM badzra mai? ? dya A:hUM/ zhes pas mngon par bsngags ba'i me tog la sogs pas yang dag bar? mchod nas/ /gsum la
259b3(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su 'gri ba la sogs pa yan lag bdun pa lan? gsum brjod do/ /de nas phyag byas te gtor ma phul la/ /oM badzra mu:zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa bzhi cung zad bsgoms nas/ /chos thams cad ?
259b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs te/ so sor brtags nas rang bzhin med cing/ 'od gsal bar bsgoms la/ oM shU n+ya tA dzhA? na badzra sA? b+hA? ? At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po/ /de'i mthar raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ A:hUM gnyis bltas nas/ de'i 'od
259b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'jig rten gyi 'thas? dag 'byams mdza' gtugs ba na gnas 'di? sems can rnams byang chub la bkod de/ /de dag 'dres shing bkug nas sa bon gnyis la bstims te/ skad cig tsam gyis bcon ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das su
259b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom mo/ /zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa/ zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi'i steng na byed krung dang bcas pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya lnga mda'? pa'i phreng ba can/ /bskal ba'i ma ltar 'bar ba'i sku mdog khro ba dang bcas pa 'di dbus skra kham pa gyen du brdzes
259b7(rgyud 'grel): pas? skyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa/ phyag bcu drug pa/ lags g.yas kyi thod pa brgyad na/ glang po che dang/ ta dang/ bong bu? dang/ glang dang/ rnga mo dang/ seng ge dang/ mi dang/ byi la'o/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na/ sa dang/ chu dang/ me dang/ rlung dang/
260a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ gshin rje dang/ nor sbyin rnams so/ /spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin cing/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'phrog pa/ gri gug dang thod mi? bsnams pa'i lha mo bdag med mas? 'khyud bsgom mo/ /de'i 'og tu bdag nyid
260a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi snying gar nyi ma la hUM blta'o/ /bdag med ma'i snying gang zla ba la i pa lta'o/ /yang mgo por ni oM/ mgrin par ni A(rgyud 'grel): snying gar ci hUM(rgyud 'grel): mig la gti mug rdo rje ma/ rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ sna la ser sna rdo rje ma/ kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ lus la
260a3(rgyud 'grel): phrag dog rdo rje ma/ yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma rnams bkod la/ snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od rnams kyis sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/ oM pti Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba ta thA ga ta/ zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis me tog gi
260a4(rgyud 'grel): char bab? ste bkug pa dang/ lha mo brgyad kyis bstod pa dang/ mchod pa byed bar bsgom mo/ /bsgom pas dub? na? bkras? pa bya ste/ oM de pa'i tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ ldar ba na rang gi snying go'i sa bon la lha mo bsdus te/ lha'i gzugs kyis rgya bar bya'o//
260a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'i dus su thod? ma dang nyams? gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /de la yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng dur las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la/ der a las byung ba'i thod pa'i nang du/ go kud ha na dang/ bi mur shu'i sa bon las byung
260a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdzas dang/ oM gyi? byin gyis brlabs bya'o/ /de'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje bsgoms te/ rdo rje dang pad+ma sbyar ba'i me 'bar ba'i rnam pa bsgoms la/ de'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bltas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs?
260a7(rgyud 'grel): ka'i? mtshan las bdud rtsi bkug ste dang pa'i ? la/ oM A:hUM zhes pas byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni/ gtor ma dang khams? la sogs ba? sbyang? pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas skad cig tsam gyis/ /nam mkha' chos 'byung bar nud pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar bcom?
260b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor bsam/ dpa' bo gcig pu bltas la/ 'dab ma rnams la ni phyogs skyong rnams sngon po rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa so so'i btsun mos la byung cing/ g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar de'i steng du tshangs pa la sogs pa'i
260b2(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams mdog dkar po rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu brgyan can du bsam mo/ /'og tu ni sa'i 'og tu rgyu ba'i 'gro ba'i rnams mdog dmar po snang ba mdza' yas kyi dbu brgyan can du bsgom mo/ /thams cad kyi lce la bluM? dkar po bsam te/ rang gi snying ga'i sa bon
260b3(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i gau DI la soD pa'i lha mo? bdud rtsi bum pas tshim par bya'o/ /sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM inda dza ma dza la dza? b+hA ta bah+ni ba u dgra tsanda sudzdzi mA dA bap+pa? ta bA t+ta la aTA? sabba? swAhA(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba li b+hUM? dza dzI d+ha bul+la d+hU pa mAM sa pi d+ha am+b+ha sabba kadzdza sa twa kha? khuNi phe Ta
260b4(rgyud 'grel): glad/ /oM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NI A dya nu tban+na twa? ta oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ /zhes pa lan gsum brjod la zhal bsil dbul/ sngags ni oM h+ri? bi shudb+ha? na ya sarba bi ka wA na ya hUM zhes bya ba yin no/ /de nas yid las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod par bya ste/ oM
260b5(rgyud 'grel): badzra mu:sa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /kha zis kyi dus su snga ma ltar spangs? la bdag nyid kyi lce la rdo rje dkar po bsams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstims te/ ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon kyis me spar bar bya'o/ /chags pa spyod pa'i
260b6(rgyud 'grel): dus su ni/ shes rab ma bdag med mar bsgoms la/ de'i mgo bor ni oM/ lkor mang ni A:snying gar hUM/ pad+ma'i ge sar la a bsgoms/ /oM pad+ma sku kha d+ha ra ma hwa ? ge su khaM dat+ta tsa tu rA nan+ta d+ha ga bi shwa hUM hUM ka ryaM ku ru Sha me zhes bya ba 'dis pad+ma
260b7(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab bo/ /rdo rje hUM gi bskyed nas oM gyis nor bu byin gyis brlabs nas/ oM badzra ma hA dwe Sha tsa tu rA na nra? da ya ka ? mu khe ka ro sa nO ? hUM hUM hUM ka rya M ku du ShA me zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo/ /si si si/ ha ha ha zhes bya bas dga' ba brtsam par
261a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ bla ma'i man ngag gis de'i skad cig na rnams? mtshon par byas la/ de'i bdud rtsi drangs nas bdag tshim par bya'o/ /nyal ba'i dus su ni /chos thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du bsams la nyal bar bya'o/ /dpal gyis?
261a2(rgyud 'grel): ba rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpa' bo gcig pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po nag po pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs ste// //rgya gar gyis mkhan po nag po dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bges? lhas bcas kyis bsgyur zhing shus te gtan la phab
261a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ he badzra sA d+haM naM tat+tO tyot+ta? ka ra na ma/ bod skad du/ dpyas pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM? dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag
261a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /gcig dang du mas dpyad pa'i snying pos sprul pa'i rgyu ma'i dngos/ /'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin 'dra'i sku 'chang shes rab dam pas 'khrud?/ /rdo rje las byung dag pa'i de nyid kyis sprul lha mos bskor/ /snying rjes pros? pa'i gzugs can dgyes
261a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje rtag phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje 'chang pa gang zhig gis/ /'bras bu dpal ldan khrag 'thung thugs/ /de gsal byed ba'i bla ma ni/ /dam tshig rdo rje la phyag 'tshal/ /dang por re zhig sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnod par skyo bar gyur? pa'i
261a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi khams la dmigs la/ snying rjes phul du byung ba'i ros gang ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyis/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu goms par byas pas/ dag par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa/ dpal dgyes
261a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba thob pa/ dam tshig dang spyod pa la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ tho rangs yangs? la/ rung gi snying gar re pha las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du mchog dang po'i yi ge bsam zhing//
261b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod la sogs pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i gnas 'ga' zhig tu gnas nas/ bde ba'i stan la 'dug te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i yi ge hUM las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus/ bcom ldan 'das 'chad par 'gyur pa'i kha dog dang phyag dang mtshon? cha can
261b2(rgyud 'grel): bkug? la nam mkha' i phyogs su bltas te/ yid las byung ba'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i gau? DI la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis 'dad pa'i yon tan lnga yis mchod par bya'o/ /de la gau rI? di dags kyis mtshan? pa'i
261b3(rgyud 'grel): thod pa phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /tA rI ni rang byung gi me tog gis gang ba'i snod kyis? lag pa brel pa'i?/ /bet+tA? lI mi chu'i snod kyis lag pa gnyis brel par gyur pa'o/ /g+hastsa? rI shas gang pa'i snod kyi thogs pa'o/ /bAk+ka sA ni lag na tsan dan gyis gang ba'i snod thogs?
261b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sha pa rI ni ? nas sbrang rtsi ldug par byed pa'o/ /tsaNdra lI di cang te'u brdung zhing mchod par byed pa'o/ /Dompi mI med? du la nas 'khyad cing snyoms par 'jug par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'ds de nyid kyi mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas
261b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ bdag gis sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags pa ?O/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ so so'i skye? po thams cad kyi bsod nams rdo rjes su yi rang ngo/ /bdag? byang chub kyi snying po las chos kyis su? thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas sangs
261b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rdo rje 'chang dang/ theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang lha mo'i chogs kyi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /? bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs? pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ sems
261b7(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bsgrub pa yang?/ 'di dag ji srid du mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /'di lta ste/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i lam 'di nyid la yang brtan par bgyi'o/ /bdag
262a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbul? lo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /zhes brjod cing phyag 'tshl nas gtor ma byin la?/ yi ge brgya pa
262a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas mnyes bar yang bya ste/ oM sh+rI he? ru ka sa ma ya ma nu? pA la ya he ru ka twe no pa tiSh+Thi draDho me pA ba a nu rad+ho? me b+ha ba su toSh+yo? me b+ha ba/ sarba saM bd+himme? pra yats+tsha/ sarbba? karmA su tsa me tsid+haM? sh+ri?  ya:ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga ba na saNpa?
262a3(rgyud 'grel): dra thA ga ta badzra mA me nuny+tsa? badzrA? b+ha? ba ma hA sa maya sadwa A:badzra mu:zhes bya ba gshegs su gsol lo//de nas sems can thams cad bu gcig pa sdug pa ltar mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi byams pa dang/ de dag nyid sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal
262a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi? rgyu las bzlog par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi snying rje dang/ de dag nyid la lha'i bde ba sgrub cing bskyed pa la dga' ba'i dga' ba dang/ de nas de dag nyid la bla na med pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa'i lam sgrub bar 'dod pa'i rnam pa can gyi btang snyoms bsgom par
262a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /'gro ba ngo po nyid kyis stong/ /mtshan ma med cing rgyu med de/ /thams cad rnam par rtog bral pas/ /smon lam dag kyang rnam par pangs/ /ma lus de ltar shes bya zhing/ /bdag gi sgyu 'dra'i sems nyid de/ /rnam pa ma rig pa yis bskyed/ /de 'gags
262a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'gag par 'gyur/ /oM shU n+ya badzrE? na badzra swa b+hA ba AdmakohaM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas bsrung ba'i don du/ re pas nyi ma sngon du rnams bsgoms nas/ /nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de nyid kyis mi rab? dang/ /
262a7(rgyud 'grel): gur? bcang? pa yang rnam par bsgom bar bya/ /'di yi don ni 'di yin te/ /nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dag las spros pas zhu? zhing gcig tu gyur ba las rnam par spros? pas/ 'og tu rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi dang/ steng du rdo rje gung dang/ thang kar rdo rje ra ba dang/
262b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi phyi rol tu rdo rje me 'bar ba bsgom par bya zhing sngags kyis kyang bstan par bya zhing/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA /zhes bya'o/ /de'i dkyil du chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo ngo nyid ston ka'i zla ba ltar ba'i chos 'byung zhes bya ba gru gsum nam
262b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i khams bsgom bar bya'o/ /de'i dkyil du yi ge laM? las? byung ba'i rlung? gi dkyil'khor sngon pa gsung? dbyibs can g.yo ba'i bdan? gnyis kyis mtshon ba'o/ /de'i steng du re pha las me'i dkyil 'khor gru? gsum dmar po gru rnams su yi ge ras mtshon pa'o?/ /de'i
262b3(rgyud 'grel): steng du ngaM las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum bo kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du khi? las byung pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po zur rnams su rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nyid du bsgom? pa po de nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes
262b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi khyad par bye? dang nyi du nged? par gnas sa/ /de nas chos 'byung gi nang du 'byung ba chen ba bzhi yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i sna tshogs ? steng di sna tshogs rdo rje lte pa la thar pa chen po'i grong khyer? rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang? bzhin? gyi?
262b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas? khang? po/ /bru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /phreng ba rnga yab sna tshogs ldan/ /rdo rje thig gis rnam par brgyan/ /dan sna tshogs g.yo ba'i sna/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra dang ldan/ /'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yis/ /
262b6(rgyud 'grel): nye bar? sogs? rnam par brgyan?/ /do shal do shal byed pa dang/ /rta babs? bzhi yis mdzes par byas/ /rin po che dang sna ldan zhing/ /mnga' yab phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /gzungs kyi snam bur brgyad gnyis kyis/ /mchod pa'i lha mos mchod par byed//
