283b6(rgyud 'grel): pa phreng ba 'phang/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /des ni bcom ldan 'bras mi 'gyur/ /phreng ba de ni rgyan yin no/ /oM lus can kun la dam chos kyis/ /khyod kyi glu ni blang bar bya/ /de yi bde gshegs dngos grub ni/ /myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur//
283b7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid thal mo'igar gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad chags par byas/ /sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phrin las kyi/ /gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas l spos btul la/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim gyis/ /lus can
284a1(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs cha lugs su/ /ye shes kyis ni tshim par gyis/ /a(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dor/ /byang chub yan lag chogs 'gyur bas/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yis/ /bde gshegs sku ni thob par gyis/ /b+h+ruM/ chos kyi me ni legs
284a2(rgyud 'grel): sbar bas/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra ba ru/ /sems can ma rig ldong pa la/ /ye shes sgron mas snang bar gyis/ /phra/ rgyal ba rnams la dra? phul la/ /tshul khrims de bzhin shes rab dang/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yis/ /byang chub lus can rnams la bsgos/ /g+ha(rgyud 'grel): de'i
284a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu gser gyi thur ma la bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ /ji ltar mi mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra ni tra a pa ha ra ba Ta'i h+ri braM zhes bya
284a4(rgyud 'grel): bas mig la byugs te dag par bya'o/ /de nas me long bstan te/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur ni/ /gsal zhing dags rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa/ /de ltar chos rnams
284a5(rgyud 'grel): shes byas nas/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang ? pa'i sras su skye/ /de nas a las bskyed ba'i dril bu byin te/ thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /kun mchog
284a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid du bsam zhes bya bas dkrol bar bya'o/ /yang ho zhes bya bas mda' gzhu byin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rjes su chags par byos shig/ ces bsgo la/ /phyogs bzhir 'phang pa dang/ steng 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug
284a7(rgyud 'grel): go/ yang a badzra satwa zhes bya ba 'dis me long bstan la/ rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar/ /gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso/ /zhes bya ba dang/ gang yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po
284b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi ni 'di nyid yin par shes par gyis shig ces brjod do/ /badzra he tu zhes bya bas 'khor lo rkang pa'i par du bcug la/ oM badzra b+ha Sha? raM zhes bya bas lag pa g.yas bar dud? byin te/ g.yon par yi ge a las he badrIM? po hi byin la/ dril bu yang byin te dkrol zhing/
284b2(rgyud 'grel): deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa/ tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par/ /yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis su/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /dri med kun tu gang bar gyis/ /sngags kyi spyod tshul cho ga rnams/ /skye bo rnams
284b3(rgyud 'grel): la rtag tu shod/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dog sa drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang/ /khyod la rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad/ /de nas so so'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor byas la/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sems can kun la
284b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo btu bskor zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi mig bcug mchogs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang bar byin nas/ bdag nyid langs
284b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su dmigs la/ g.yon pa snying gar tshab gos ?? pa'i tshul du byas la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyar byas la/ rdo rje mig gi dbang bskur bas lung bstan no/ /'di ni khyod la ngas? lung bstan/ /rdo rje slob dpon
284b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs/ /srid ba shin tu dag pas na/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton?/ /kye che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa byur b+hu ba swAhA/ gang la 'dis lung bstan pa de la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
284b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu byang chub chen por lung ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya chen bo 'di dang sngags 'di'i mthu yin no zhes bya bas dang po bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de//
285a1(rgyud 'grel): de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod kyi nam yang mi bya'o/ /ma hA sa ma ya ha na hUM phaT/ de nas slob ma'i spyi bor gdugs gzung la/ /bskor ba ? nas thal mo sbyar te/ gdugs dang bcas par dkyil 'khor gyi sgo? drung du? lus la gtugs
285a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ sngags rnams 'dzin par gyur pa yin/ /slob manyid ni phul ba lags/ /de nas gdugs? gzhan du bzhag la/ slob ma'i snying la bab pa'i tshig 'di dag brjod do/ /di ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /sngags dang rgyud rnams 'dzin gyur par/ /sangs rgyas byang
285a3(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /sems can kun la rjes brtsabs/ /dkyil 'khor chog bzhin du bris/ /khyod kyis nan tan bskyed nas su/ /sgrub pa yo rnams sngags la sbyor/ /de nas slar ? ? bya ste/ mchog tu
285a4(rgyud 'grel): gsar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /btsud pa dang ni mthong ba yis/ /di ring sdig las rnam grol nas/ /di ring khyod rnams dge bar gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di ba ni/ /phyi nas 'chi ba yod min zhing/ /mi sgrub tshugs pa yod min pas/ /ces gtam mi 'jigs
285a5(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar gyi ? 'di pa shin tu dag bas na/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das so/ /byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya ste/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya/ /nam
285a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dor bar yo ba'i? rung/ /mi shes pa 'am? rmongs pa la/ /de nyid bstan par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu mi spang ste/ /slob dpon nam yang smad mi bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pa yi/ /rang bdag yongs su spang nas su/ /dka' thub gyis ? dang ? mi bya/ /
285a7(rgyud 'grel): ji ltangS? bde bar bde gzung na/ 'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ zhes bya bas dbugs dbyung ngo/ /slob mas phyag byas te/ gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi zhes khas blangs so/ /slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i ?
285b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ lha'i de kho na nyid lha'i rnam par dag pa dang/ slob dpon gyi phrin las dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs sngon du 'gro ba'i slob dpon 'jug pa'i las rnams te gsum po de dag bstan par bya'o//
285b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu sa phyogs dben par byas te/ yol bas par du bcad la/ rgyud las gsungs ba'i dam tshig can bla ma la phul nas/ bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kyi/ /rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung/ /mi phyed phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig zhes par/ /bdag nyid
285b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po khyed ji bzhin/ /gtso bos bdag ni mdzad du gsol/ /'khor ba'i 'dam gyis tshogs su ni/ /bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir gsol ba btab pa dang/ de nas dpal ldan slob dpon ni/ /rjes su brtse dang
285b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yis/ /? mar snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin par mdzad pa la/ /bza' dang btung ba yid 'ong dang/ /chang dang sha chen du ni bcas/ /me tog phreng dang bdug pa dang/ /rgyal mtshan dril bur bcas pa dang/ /byugs pa la sogs mchod pa yis/ /bla ma rdo
285b5(rgyud 'grel): rje can la mchod/ /de'i rjes la rgyad las gsungs pa'i chog bzhin snyoms par 'jug par bya ste/ ji srid du phyag rgya khu ba dang ldan pa de srid du bsten la/ /phyag rgya dang slob ma gdong g.yogs kyis bcings nas/ /bsten pa las gang byung ba de slob ma'i khar tshigs
285b6(rgyud 'grel): su bcad pa 'dis? dbab par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas rgyal ba yis/ /byang chub sras la dngar? bskur bzhin/ /bdag la gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ sems kyi rgyun gyis bkru ru gsol/ /des kyang a ho su kha zhes brjod do/ /longs spyod rdzogs par gzhug go/ shes
285b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gyis kyang de bzhin du slob ? sbyin par bya ste/ shes rab thabs kyi gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de'i rjes la yang slob mas sngar bstan pa'i gsol ba gdab pa'i tshigs gsol ba dang/ de'i spyod yul du byas te/ de yang gsungs pa/ ser sna med cing
286a1(rgyud 'grel): khro bral ba'i/ /slob ma bdag nyid chen po la/ /de nyid ni mnyam pa'i ro/ /slob ma'i sbyong yul dag tu bya zhes so/ /de nas lag pa de'i lag par byin la/ /mgo bor bag? pa bzhag ste/ dga' ster gnas te lha mo 'di/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid
286a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ong ma/ /zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che/ /gzung nas rab tu mchod par bya/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ /'gro ba gsum ni dag byed pa/ /de bas khyod kyis 'di dang ni/ /nam yang bral bar mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /riD
286a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba/ /de la mchog gi dngos grub med/ /ces bya bas sbyin no/ des kyang dri zhim po'i pad+ma kha phye ste/ /slob ma la bstan la/ 'di skad ces brjod do/ /bshad gci dag ni za ba dang/ /khrag dang khu ba de
286a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te/ /sha che bsten bar bu sgro 'am/ /bud med rnams la gus pa dang/ /b+ha ga'i pad+ma nga'o byed pa/ /bu khyod ji ltar bde bar smros/ /des kyang lan du/ lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro/ /khu khrag la sogs za ba dang/ /bud med rnams la bdag gus shing/ /b+ha
286a5(rgyud 'grel): ga'i pad+mar 'o bgyid do/ /zhes brjod do/ /des sgrub pa po la dgyes par gyur nas dngos su bltas te/ e ma 'o nga yi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan/ ci ste cho ga bzhin bsten na/ /de yi mdun dung 'dug ste/ /sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs pa'i
286a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba pad+mas ji bzhin byed/ /bde chen rgya por rang nyid ni/ /'di nyid du ni yang dag gnas/ /b+ha ny+dza mo k+Sha to(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la thabs ni dgyes ba'i rdo rjer dmigs/ shes rab ni bdag med mar dmigs te/ gnyis ka'i mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa
286a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs la/ hUM las bskyed pa'i rdo rje nor bu/ oM las bskyed la/ oM badzra ma hA de Sha tsa tu rA nanda da ya ka kha ga mu kha e ka rA so nA tha hUM hUM ka dyaM ku ru ShA me zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las pad+mar bskyed de/
286b1(rgyud 'grel): oM pad+ma su kha d+ha ra ma ? hO? ga su khaM dan+te? tsa tu rA nan+na/ b+ha ga bi shwa hUM hUM ka dyaM ku ru Sha me zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te/ rtsa ba'i dbye ba bstan pa dang/ skad cig ma'i rang bzhin rnams brjod la/ de la kur ba dang/ su pra ti sa ri ta/ la sogs pa'i ka ra na dang ldan
286b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pa'i yan lag gis sor mos pad+ma bskul zhing ston pa'i bka' bsgoms/ sing sing ha ha kundu ru ku sdu ru badzra d+h+rI ka zhes bya bas bskyed nas/ grol ba'i skabs su slob mas nyams su myong ba rnyed pa na brda bya ste/ bla mas ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra/ /rdo
286b3(rgyud 'grel): rje snying po mkha' dang mtshungs/ /dul med thar ster zhi ba nyid/ /khyod kyi pa ni khyod nyid do zhes bya bas bstan to/ /de nas slob mas lce yi bdud rtsi blangs nas langs te/ bla ba la bskor ba byas nas/ yan lag brgyad kyis phyag byas la/ khyod zhabs pad+ma'i
286b4(rgyud 'grel): bka' drin gyis/ /gtso bo dbang bskur rnam gsum thob/ /ding 'dir rnam pa bzhi pa yang/ /gtso bos bdag la bka' drin mnod zhes gsol ba btab la/ bzhi pa'i phyir ci 'byor pa'i yon yang dbul lo/ /de nas brtse ba dang bcas pa'i bla mas dam tshig gi sdom
286b5(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan par bya ste/ khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang/ dang po'i na dang po'i ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa bza' pa'i dam tshig brjod pa ni/ shes rab ye shes dang bcas pa'i dam tshig go/ bzhi pa
286b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bla ma'i khams shes par bya bas 'dir ma bstan to/ /dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg ma gtogs par/ /rab gnas 'dir ni bstan yod min zhes gsungs pas slob ma la phan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bya ste/ de las gzhi dkar
286b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i thab khung khru gang zlum po zabs su song bcu gnyis pa brkos pa'i dbus su/ rgyar sor drug 'phang du sor gsum pa'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i steng du thod pa la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje/ 'dab ma rnams la lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma bkod la rdo rje
287a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas bskor bar bya'o/ /thabs khung gi phyi rol tu ser bzhi dor la/ kha khyed rgya dang dpangs su de tsam pa rdo rjes bskor bar bya'o/ /stegs bu'i mtshams bzhir ni rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan la/ las dang mthun pa'i sas kun tu byugs nas/
287a2(rgyud 'grel): las dang mthun pa'i dris byug go/ me tog dkar po dus gsum du gtor bar bya ste/ zhi ba'i thabs khung ngo/ /rgyas pa la ni sa gzhi ser po la khru do gru bzhi pa/ zabs su de'i phyed du brkos la kha khyer snga ma las nyis 'gyur du byas te/ lhag ma ni sngon bzhin no/
287a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas sa ser po dang dri ser pos byugs la/ me tog ser po gtor bar bya'o/ /dbang lo ni sa gzhi dmar po la rgyar sor nyi shu/ /zabs su sor? bcu pa'i thab khung gru gsum du brkos la/ sor gsum pa'i kha khyer kyis bskor ro/ /lhag ma ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no//
287a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas sa dmar po dang dri dmar pos byugs la me tog dmar pos dus gsum du gtor ro/ /dgug pa dang bsad pa la yang de bzhin no/ /'di'i khyad par brjod par bya ste/ sa phyogs gnag cing snying po ma yin pa dang/ gas pa dang tsha sgo can du bya ste/
287a5(rgyud 'grel): sa nag po dang dur khrod kyi thal ba dang/ bong bu dang/ rnga mo'i thug? ba ci snyed pas byug cing dri mi zhim pa dang/ dri med pa'i me tog nag po dang/ dmar po dang/ phub mas gtor bar bya'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor ram/ lha gang gi shar phyogs su ni zhi ba
287a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang gi thabs khung bya'o/ /lho phyogs su ni rgyas pa'o/ /byang phyogs su ni mngon spyod kyi'o/ /nub tu ni dgug pa'o/ /yang na rdul tshon gyis kyang las dang rjes su mthun pa'i thab khung bya bar gnang ste/ thab khung gi cho ga'o/ /da ni dag? gzar dang
287a7(rgyud 'grel): blugs gzar bstan pa dang/ gsang dang zangs las byung ba'am/ mchod sbyin gyi shing las byas pa yang rung ste/ yu ba'i mthar sor drug pa'i rdo rje rin chen bya'o/ /dbyug pa ni sor bcu drug pa bya'o/ /dbyug pa'i steng gi char ni sor bzhi pa'i rdo rje'o/ /dkyus ni
287b1(rgyud 'grel): sor bzhi pa la/ zabs su sor gnyis pa/ dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa ste/ rtse mo la bcud 'jig? pa'i mchu mthe'u chung gi tshad 'di ni dgang gzar ro/ /blugs gzar ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs lta bu la/ rgyar sor gnyis zabs sor gcig pa/ dkyil du rdo rje rtse
287b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga pas mtshan pa ste/ lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /gnyis ka'i yu ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi gzung du rung ba ste/ de ltar na de dag khru re bar bstan to/ /ji snye dgang gzar dang blugs gzar med na/ dgang blugs kyi sbyin sreg ni sor mo lnga dang ldan pa'i lags pas bya la/

287b4(rgyud 'grel): cam kyi tshad la/ 'dab mar bcas pa 'o ma dang sbrang rtse dang/ mar la rtse mo gnyis spags? pa/ dri dkar po'i chus gtor ba'i yi shing 'dab ma gnyis dang bcas pa'i rtse mo gcig pa/ mthe bo dang srid lag gi gzung ste bsreg par bya'o/ /de la rul pa dang gas
287b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang chags pa dang/ shun pa med pa dang/ pho ba dang/ rtse mo gnyis pa dang/ thung ba dang/ ring ba dang/ srog chags kyis thos pa dang/ srog chags can ni spang bar bya'o/ /yang nas dang/ 'bras yos dang/ zho dang/ 'o ma dang/ til dang/ ku sha dang sar pa dang/

287b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsi las sngags pa'o/ /gzhan yang zas mchog sh+ri pha la dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ ge sa ra dang/ kar ni ka'i me tog dang/ 'bru rnams ni rgyas ba'i 'o/ /tsam pa ka dang/ a shwat+tha? dang/ pha? ku dang/ pri yang ku las byung ba'i yam shing sor lnga pa 'dab
288a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang bcas pa dang me tog dang/ 'bras bu sgyur po dang/ mngar po dang/ khyad par du yang utpal dmar po dgon dbang gi'o/ /dgug pa la ni dag dang/ cher ma lcags kyu lta bu dag/ mngon sbyong la ni ni ma ? dang/ /seng ldeng dang/ 'bi lo ta

288a5(rgyud 'grel): las bya'o/ /dpa' la ni pa'i sbyar? po rang/ me tog can rnams las bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni tsher ma lcags kyu can lta bu rnams las/ /mngon spyod la ni shing tsha ba dang/ tshor ma can dur khrod kyi shing dang/ bong? bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa rnams te bud shing
288a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o/ /de nas zhing ba'i las la khrus rang gtsang sbu byas te/ lus dri zhim pas byugs la/ po sa dang rgyan dkar pos brgyan te/ byams pa dang ldan pas kha nub tu bltas la stan nang tshangs can 'jam po'am/ pad+ma? la 'dug ste/ zhi ba'i yid
288a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis yar ngo'i chos gcig gi tho rangs nas brtsams te bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni me tog gi phreng ba ser po dang/ rgyan ser pos brgyan te/ stan bzang po la 'dug ste/ rangs pa'i yid kyis kha byang du bltas pa nya'i nyi ma snga dro nas brtsams te bya'o/ /dbang
288b1(rgyud 'grel): la ni gos dang rgyan la sogs pa dmar pos brgyan te/ chags pa'i yid kyis stan mthon po la rdo rje skyil krung gi kha shar du bltas la bya'o/ /dgug pa la yang de bzhin te/ khyad par du steng du blta la bya'o/ /mngon spyod pa ni khro ba'i sems kyis gos dang ? ? dang

288b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas mig bzlog ste/ mar ngo'i tshes gnyis po 'am gzhan yang rung ste/ 'gro ba nyid brtsam par byas la/ bsgrub bya bsdigs pa las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir/ nyin phyed dam mtshan phyed na/ hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje lcags kyus bsgrub bya'i bsrung ba
288b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas la bya'o/ /sgrub pa po bstan pa'o/ zhi ba'i arga'i snod ni gser ram dngul lam/ thabs sam rdo dang sa dang/ dung dang nya phyis la sogs pa dang/ shing la kyong ba yang rung ste/ nas dang 'o ma dang/ dri dkar po dang ldan pa'i chus blugs la/ rang gi lha'i sphags?
288b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis mthar swAhA dang ldan pa la lan bdun bzlas bar bya'o/ /rgyas pa yang de bzhin te/ khyad par du dri ser pa'i chu dang/ til dang zho dang ldan pa ste/ oM gyi mdza' dang ldan pas bzlas so/ /dbang la ni dri dmar po'i chu ste/ ho'i mdza' dung ldan pa bzlas so mngon skyod

289a1(rgyud 'grel): de la zhing ya? ni shing 'o ma can gtsugs pa las byung ba'i me dang/ bram ze'i sbyin bsreg gis mig bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni dge 'dun gyi sro gang gi me 'am/ rgyal rigs dang rje rigs kyi khyim gyis med bya'o/ /dbang la ni rje ? 'das pa ?
289a2(rgyud 'grel): khyim gyis mes bya'o/ /dgug pa la gar mkhan dang kun tu rgyu ? lam du bus pa'i ? bya'o/ /drag po la ni dur khrod kyi shing dang/ rdo gcungs pa las byung ba dang/ shan ba'i khyim gyis mas bya'o/ /de nas hUM ? pa'i ku? sha'i ? glang pa/

289a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams shing shin tu ring ba ma yin pa rtse mo shar du bstan te/ thabs khung gi phyi rol tu g.yogs la/ yi ge hAM gis thad khung bskyed de/ de'i nang du raM las me lha las dang rjes su mthun pa'i mdog dang/ rgyan ? bred ?/ phyag gnyis ?

289a6(rgyud 'grel): bya bkug la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM haM/ zhes pas de nyid du bgug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ oM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): khaM ? zhes bya bas arg+ha dbul lo/ /oM ni ri ho hUM ? zhes bya bas zhabs gsil phul te/ mig la sogs pa byin gyis bslab pa dang dbang bskur
289a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar du byas la bya dang nang gi mched pas mchod de/ oM db+haM? d+hwaM zhes bya ba lha bshos dbul lo/ /de nas de'i lce la hUM gis rdo rje bsams la zhal cung zad gdangs te gzar du gnyis thogs pa'i gru mo bus mo gnyis kyi nang du bcug la/ oM agna
289b1(rgyud 'grel): ye swAhA zhes bya bas gang ba'i sbyin sreg sbyin no/ /drag po la ni zhal shin tu gdangs te gdug pa dang bcas pa'i tsha ba'i mar nag sbyin no/ /de nas me'i mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtags par bya ste/ 'ja' tshon dang/ sa tik dang/ rnga ma dang/ 'dam bu chu shel lta bu'i mdog ni
289b2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i las la shis so/ /gzhan yang dri med cing sgra zab pa dang/ rtse mo gcig tu 'bar ba ni shis pa ste de nas zhi pa la khyad par mdog dkar ba'o/ /rgyas pa la ser po'i mdog/ rjes su chags pa la dmar ba ste/ sngo dang nag po mngon spyod la/ de la bgegs
289b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i me ni du ba che zhing me 'phro ba dal bus 'bar zhing zhan pa dang/ me lce 'chad pa dang/ 'od med cing mdog sngo ba dang/ mdud rtse lta bu dang/ zhi ba ma lta bu dang/ ba lang gi gdod pa lta bu'i dbyibs dang/ mi ro'i dri dang/ dri med pa'am/ /
289b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na drag tu 'bar ba'o/ /de ltar bgegs dang bcas par shes nas snga ma bzhin bsang gtor byas la/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs te/ gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gsum 'am bdun dbul lo/ /de nas yang yam shing la sogs pa so so'i sngags kyi ji
289b5(rgyud 'grel): snyed 'dod pa bsregs la/ bsang gtor dang 'thod thud la sogs pa phul te/ me lha me 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur par blta'o/ /de nas bsgrubs thabs las byung ba'i cho ga las dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i lha der bskyed la/ ye shes
289b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' spyan drangs nas arg+ha la sogs pa phul t+te/ dam tshig sems dpa' la bstims la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs te/ ljags la rdo rje bsams la zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ dgug bas ni zhal cung zad tsam dbye/
289b7(rgyud 'grel): drag ? ni shin tu gdangs par phye la bsreg go /de la agna ye swAhA zhes bya ba mar gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bA paM da ha na badzra la a mu ke sarba bA bi da ha swAhA til gyi'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta? ye swAhA 'bras kyi'o/ /oM badzra ba dzA ya swAhA hA'o ma'i 'o// oM mahA be
290a1(rgyud 'grel): ? swahA nas kyi'o/ /oM ma hA ba lA ? swahA sran phre'u'i 'o/ /oM badzra b+ha sma rI ya swahA gro'i 'o/ /oM badzra a ? ? swAhA dur ba'i 'o/ /oM a pri ta ta da badzra swAhA ku sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra A dz+nyA ya dz+nyA ya swAhA u dumda ? 'o/ /oM bo d+hi b+h+rik+Sha ye
290a2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA a shwatwa'i'o/ /oM badzra la ha ye swAhA lak+Sha'i'o?/ /oM badzra ?? sa swAhA/ n+ya gro d+ha ?/ /oM sA ha ka rA ya swAhA a mra'i'o/ /de ltar ci 'byor pas bsregs nas bsang gtor 'thor thung la sogs pa phul te yang dag par mchod nas/ ma
290a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ba dang nyams pa dang/ /gang yang bdag rmongs blo yis ni/ /bgyis pa dang ni bgyid bstsal ba/ /de kun mgon pos bzod par mdzod/ /ces bya bas bzod par gsol la/ slar yang 'dod pa'i ? la dnos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab nas yi ge
290a4(rgyud 'grel): brgya pa'i mthar yi ge nu(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas yang thabs kyi nang du ? lha bsams la/ sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma'i rdzas las byin sred ?te/ slob ma'i dang bcas pas mthar gang ba'i sbyin sreg phul nas/ dngos grub kyi phyir gsol
290a5(rgyud 'grel): ba btab ste/ me lha 'byod kyi rang gzhan don/ sgrub pa tshul bzhin byas zin gyis/ /dam tshig gnas la mnos mdzod la/ /rang gnas dge par gshes su gsol/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams ni/ /bsgrub te sbyin sreg gsol la bzhad/ /slar yang
290a6(rgyud 'grel): dus bzhin gshegs nas su/ /bdag gi stags kyi dngos grub mdzad/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o/ /skyob pa rnams kyi rang bzhin no/ /mi gnas myang ngan 'das yin te/ /skye dang ldan pa'i skye bo la/ /sngags pas nor ni rnyed pa dang/ /skye bo rab tu dang pa
290a7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /byed pa dga' spel ba'i phyir/ rab gnas bstan bcos las gsungs pa/ /tha snyad tsam du byas pa yin/ /dang por nyi ma bzang po la phyi nang gi khrus byas zhing dri ? chos byugs nas rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te gtsug tor bcings nas mchog
290b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yo byad rnams bsogs ?/ phyag gnyis pa'i te ru ka'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa/ rdo rje dang dril du 'chang bas stegs du g? bzhi khru bzhi pa/ dbang su khru ngo par byas pa'i steng du slob dpon bdag nyid 'dug nas/ yang de nyid du lugs sku dang po ? la sogs pa ? gnas
290b2(rgyud 'grel): bya gar? 'os pa bzhugs su gsol la/ /steng du bla re bre ba dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdan la sogs pa bres te/ /me tog phreng bra dang sil ma spungs la/ glu dang gang dang rol mos brgyan nas/ phyi dro'i dus su rim pa 'dis khrus bya'o/ /dang por
290b3(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs na bza' ser po gsol la/ yungs kar la hUM yongs su bzlas te/ khru tshur g.yas g.yon gyis gzung rnal lan gnyis su bskor te/ kham por gyi mer blugs pa'i bskor ba lan tshum byas la/ de bzhin du oM bzlas pa'i chu yi shes pa'i bskod pa yang
290b4(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum du bya'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang/ ba'i rnam pa lnga yang rung pa'i ? gyis bskus la/ phyugs par bya'o/ /ras ris dang 'bur sku la sogs pa rnams kyi ni me long gi gzugs brnyan la byug go/ de nas dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la/ oM sarba ta thA
290b5(rgyud 'grel): ga ta bi sha d+ha ni badzra swAhA/ zhes bya ba yongs su bzlas dri zhim po'i man ngag byugs la/ pa twA dang u dum+ba ra la sogs pa'i shing shun gyi lnga gus byugs te mar nag phyi'o/ /de nas sgyu ru ra'i bdag chal gyis byugs la/ sngar bshad pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs
290b6(rgyud 'grel): su bcad pas khrus gsol? ba byas te/ sangs rgyas dang rig pa'i tshogs rnams kyis sngar bstan ma ltar khrus byed bzhin par bsgoms la bdag nyid kyis kyang rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa la sogs pas phyi'i khrus byas nas chu'i thig pa sku las gos 'jam
290b7(rgyud 'grel): bas blang ? bya'i/ /de nas oM ? badzra gand+he hUM swAhA zhes bya ba'i dri zhim po byugs la/ de bzhin du hUM las bskyed pa'i me tog la sogs ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad phul ste/ snying ga dang mgrin pa dang/ mgo bo dang/ dpung pa dang/ spyi gtsug rnams su rdo rje dang
291a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i lag pa g.yas par spos thogs te/ pus mo swa la gtsugs nas/ ? rdo rje dbyas? pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje che ge? mo/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mgron? po ? rje'i bdag nyid ? nang par 'gyed ?
291a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni ? la/ /bka' drin dag ni mdzad par 'os/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo don mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgos ? gsol/ /byang chub sems
291a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' gra? bcom? dang/ /gsang sngags lta? gzhan gang bcad? pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /'byung po sangs rgyas kyis bstan dang/ /gang yang bstan la mngon dga' ba'i/ /sems can rdo rje'i mig can rnams/ /che ge? mo bdag rdo rje ches/ /rig pa'i
291a4(rgyud 'grel): ?/ /rab gnas yo byad ci 'byor pas/ /'gro ba'i phyir ? 'tshal/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs rje? nye bar dgongs nas kyang/ /rab tu gnas pa thams cad la/ /thugs rjer ldan pas byin brlabs mdzad/ /ces bya bar 'dis
291a5(rgyud 'grel): ? snyan? gsan? phab ma/ lugs ma la sogs pa'i sku gzugs rnams sngon du bdag med par bsgoms la/ zla ba rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim pa'am/ skad cig tsam gyis rang gi lhar bskyed do/ /po til ni yi ge rnams gsung rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las byung pos
291a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bskyed do/ /lha? khang? dang mchod rten la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur ba las byung? bar bsams la/ phyogs bcu rnams nas ye shes sems dpa' bzug ste/ sngar bstan pa'i sngags kyis arg+haM dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul nas/
291a7(rgyud 'grel): sngar bstan pa'i tshul kyis sku gzugs kyi thugs kar bcug la de bzhin du dbang bskur te/ sbyor bo ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgyas btab la/ me tog dang gdug pa la sogs pa'i phyi nang gi mchod pas yang dag par mchod de /rab gnas kyi lha gang yin pa'i snga
291b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid med? du badzras? nas yi ge brgya pa'i mthar mu:? brjod nas/ ? gshegs su gso? mkha' ron lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas nang la? sngags slob dpon dang gi ster rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ mchod pa'i ? byad thams cad ? nas/ /bcom ldan
291b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo? ? zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa nang par zhes bya ba'i gnas su da ni zhes pa bcug pa brjod de/ lha bskul la lhag par gnas pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad bya ste/ gshegs su gsol ba ma gtogs pa'i yi ge brgya pas
291b3(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bya'o/ /gang dag lhag par gnas pa ma 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang de ltar bya'o/ /de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin ? ? nas mthar slob mar g.yon phyogs su bzhag pa la/ bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags bzlas pa'i chus bsam gtan byas nas/ gsal? pa'i
291b4(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong? gang yod pas gzung ste/ blugs gzar gyis mar gyi sbyin sreg ci 'byor lha la phul nas/ til la sogs pa yang bsregs la/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i me tog gi phred ba de'i lag par btags/ sngar bstan pa'i chus bsang
291b5(rgyud 'grel): gtong byas? te/ oM ru ru sbu du dzwa la teSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo can/ sarba arga? sA d+ha ni swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags de'i snying gar bsams la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis yon bslang bar bya'o/ /bla ma yongs su mnyes pa'i/ /las kyi dngos grub thob 'gyur bas/ /tha na
291b6(rgyud 'grel): bkur? lta tsam gyis kyang/ /bla ma yongs su mnyes par bya zhes so/ /de nas ? de nyid du mar gyi lhag ma dang/ 'o ma la tsA du btsos la sbyin sreg phul te/ oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Sha bi sho d+ha na badzra swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags dang/ gser gyi thur
291b7(rgyud 'grel): mas sku gzugs kyi spyan phye la/ oM di bya agne sa man di d+ha na bri ? swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis tsA pu ri dung lhag dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag dang slob ma shi ba dang rgyas par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /oM badzra buShpe swAhA/ oM badzra buSh+Ta? ye swAhA/ zhes
292a1(rgyud 'grel): bya pas sbyin sreg byas la/ bla mas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol pa yis/ /lhag ma sdig pa sbyang phyir ? zhes bya bas/ tsU ru'i lhag ma slob ma zar? gzhug go/ de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags bzla zhing khu tshur g.yas las gzung ba'i
292a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse mos sku gzugs kyi sku slad dang par dang dbu la lan gsum gsum bskor la brtan par byas nas/ sku gzugs kyi sum tsha'o tshod kyi stegs bu'i steng du/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swAhA/ zhes bya bas bzhugs su gsol la/ slob mas sku gzugs
292a3(rgyud 'grel): la bskor ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa rnams byas la/ slob dpon la mchod pa'i yo byas rnams sbyar te dbul lo/ /slob dpon gyis kyang phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma phul te/ sku gzugs yun ring du bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir dang/
292a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang slob ma zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs skyong la gsol pa gdab ste/ bzod gsol bya'o/ /ji ste ras res dang sku gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi rab gnas mdog bsdus te bya bar 'dod na/ rang nyid rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la/ sku
292a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa khrus byas nas/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bshams te/ bdag med ma'i bsam gtan sngon du 'gro bas/ skad cig tsam gyis lhor bsgoms la/ mig dang sku la sogs par byin gyis brlabs te/ ye shes sems dpa' 
292a6(rgyud 'grel): bstams nas/ phyi nang gi mchod par yang dag pa mchod la de nyid kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /rigs pa dang bgrang phred gi rab gnas ni yig 'bru las gsung rdo rjer bskyed de/ de yongs su gyur pa'i ri lung blta'o/ /dad pa chung ba dang/ ku shA li
292a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'tsha ba'i don gyi rnal 'byor pa pho mo rnams kyi bgrang phreng la sogs pa ni/ sngags bzlas pas byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas mchod pa bya ste/ sngags brgya cu brgyad de bzlas nas rdo rje dril bu bsil la thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
292b1(rgyud 'grel): la bzod bar gsol lo/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga ni/ /byas pas bdag gis dge thob pa/ /das ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed shog/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dang/ sbyin sreg dang rab gnas kyi cho ga slob dpon
292b2(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i zhal snga nas ? dang rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po'i zhal snga nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ho ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/
292b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig dus chu 'dzin zhal brgyad pa/ /bsdu dngos bzhi yis zhabs ldan 'khyud/ /stong pa bcu drug phyag dang ldan/ /gang mdzad de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /shi ba rnams la phan don du/ rgyud 'dir
292b4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga mi snang yang/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /brtse bas bdag gis bri bar bya/ /slob dpon phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pas dang por do khrus byas la/ bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i dris byugs ma/ ro'i snying gar rang gi lha yi snying po gdags/ lha med na snang ba mdza' 
292b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas? ma/ /lha mo gtum mo'i snying po gdags/ spyi bor rtsa ba'i sngags pa dags/ mgrin bar snying po/ snying gar nye ba'i snying bo/ spyi bor oM/ mgrin par a /snying gar hUM/ lte bar su?/ rkang pa gnyis la hA gdags bar bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung byin rlabs
292b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga gdags/ /rang gi lha 'am gzhan yang rung/ /snying po snying gar gdags/ /khrus kyi dag bya bdud gyis byugs ces gsungs so/ /de nas ro'i snying gar gzungs ngag btags la/ sgra ma du bcug la/ bdag nyid lha'i dkyil 'khor du bskyed la/ gzungs thag nas gzungs
292b7(rgyud 'grel): ? blas pa bya/ skabs su bdud rtsis byug? rtsa ba'i sngags dang ming du spel la til gyi sbyin sreg bya/ bzlas pas skyon mchod bstd bya/ /tha mar gshegs su gsol/ sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas phyogs yid du 'ong sangs? sbyangs ba dang/ sa gzungs pa dang/ gtor ma gtang
293a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ sa'i lha mo mchod pa dang/ bstod pa la sogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las shes bar bya'o/ /sa gzung ba'o/ /sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas nas/ lha lhag par gnas pa'i bar dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang 'dra'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg lhag
293a2(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa dang/ gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/ /ro lhag bar gnas pa ni khrus bya/ dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi lngas byugs la/ rnam shes dgug pa sngon 'gro pas rang gi lhar bskyed la/ sdig pa bshags pa byas nas sems bskyed pa'i bar du bya'o/ /de nas dkyil
293a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha la mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ snyad bsan dbab? pa dang/ smon lam gdab pa dang/ bzod pa gsol/ sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg la/ bdud rtsi lnga yis byugs la/ /thig gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du thig gdab
293a4(rgyud 'grel): tshon gyi cho ga byas la bri bar bya ste/ thabs kyi dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bri/ pad+ma'i lte ba la thod pa dang gri gug bri'o// 'dab ma rnams la lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o/ /kha khyed la rdo rje rab bya'o/ /kha khyer gyi phyi rol tu gru tshad btang bar
293a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas sgo dang rta babs la sogs pa ci rig par bri bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bskyed /steng gi lha dang bsres la mchod bstod smon lam gdab po// de nas thams cad pa'i chu las ku sha'i chun pos shing la gtor la bgegs bsal/ shing
293a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsigs pa ni ci rigs par shes par bya'o/ /thabs kyi nang du snyan? bting ste? ro dang /rnam par shes pa dgug pa sngon du 'gro bas lhar bskyed la/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya/ gtor ma btang /de nas rlung yab kyi me sbar la/ gson cig dgongs
293a7(rgyud 'grel): shig rigs kyi bu/ /phung po lnga yis bud shing la/ /rgyal ba rigs lnga'i me sbar? ro// nyon mongs lnga yi bud shing la/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi me sbor?/ /rnam shes lnga yi bud shing la/ /ye shes bzhi yis me sbar ro/ /'byung ba bzhi yi bud shing la/ /
293b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bzhi yi me ? ro/ zhes me spar la/ sreg blugs gsum me la blugs/ me bsangs la me lha raM las bskyed/ de nas ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs te/ tshur gshegs tshur spyon me lha'i mchog/ drang srong bram ze spyan gsum pa/ sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes
293b2(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ zhes brjod la/ oM e hye hi ma hA b+h+rU? ta de ba ri Shi agna ye hUM:dza:hUM baM ho:zhes spyan drang sla 'thor 'thung 'phul te/ gnyis su med par bsres la mchod pa lnga dang nang gi mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod/ de nas dgang gzar
293b3(rgyud 'grel): blugs gzar dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya/ dgang blugs gsum me la phul la/ de nas rim bzhin du phul te/ oM badzra agna ye swAhA/ zhes bya bas yam shing 'od la dbu'o/ /oM agna ye swAhA/ mar khu zhal du dbul lo/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ til dang
293b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs kar phyag du'o/ /oM sarba sam+ba de sAhA/ zho dang 'bras can phyag du'o/ /oM a pra ti ha da badzrA ya swAhA/ ku sha dbu'i gtsug tu'?/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ dur ba dbu'i gtsug tu'o/ /oM ma hA be gA ya swAhA/ nas zhal du'o/ /oM ma hA g+hasma ri swAhA/ gro zhal du'o/
293b5(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra bi dzA ya swAhA/ nas so ba zhal du'o/ /oM ma ma hA pra lA ya swAhA/ sran me ma sha zhal du'o/ /oM badzra puSha ye swAhA/ 'bras so ba zhal du'o/ /oM ma hA sri la a pyi to swAhA/ zhes bya ba dza ti pha la dang ta ra ka dang bil ba rnams zhal du dbul lo/ /zhu ba'i
293b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzas dang srog rdzas lhag ma rnams ni me lha rang gi sngags kyis bsregs par bya'o/ /zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad zhal du'o/ /u dum+bar la sogs pa'i shing thams cad ni oM dang swAhA zhes bya ba'i bar du rang rang gi ming bcug la bsreg par bya'o/ /de la dri ni thugs
293b7(rgyud 'grel): khar ro/ /me tog ni dbul la'o/ /spos ni 'od 'bar ba la'o/ /mar me ni mdun du'o/ /bshos ni zhal du'o/ /zhal bsil ni zhal du'o/ /mchod yod dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag du dbl bar bya'o/ /yang na bsreg rdzas thams cad ni spyi'i sngags 'dis dbul/ /oM badzra
294a1(rgyud 'grel): a na la ma hA stu? ta dzwa la sarba d+ha smiM? ku ru sarba bi kwaM hUM phaT che ge mo shIn+ti ku ru swAhA/ de nas me lha la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la bstod de/ 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal po Tik+kas dang ba bskur ba/
294a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsregs/ /'jigs byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzi brid chen po mi yi lha/ /'dod pa thams cad rab gsol ba/ /bdag gzhan don brtson sa la bzhugs// tshangs sras mchog la
294a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal ?/ /ces bstod la/ de nas phrin las bcos te /drang srong chen po me lta? yi ba/ /sngon gyi dam bcas mnas bor ba/ /lha rnams zhal ni me yin te/ /sbyin sreg de ni me lha gnas zhes phrin las bcol la/ me sbar ba'i rnam par bstim mo//
294a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod de/ de nyid lnga pas bstod de/ gnyis su med par bsres la/ mchod de bstod nas de nas bzlas pa bya'o//
294a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la tshogs kyi byin gyis brlabs la/ lta rnams la yang dbul lo/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams? snying ga'i hUM la bsreg par bya ste/ 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg go/ de nas sbyin sreg rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dbul lo/ /de'i rjes la rang gi lha'i snying po 'am/ rtsa
294a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags nyid kyi sdig ba spyad do/ /yang na oM A:hUM sarba bA yaM da ha na badzra ya che ge mo shAn+ti ku ru swAhA zhes pa brgya 'am stod dam khri 'am ji srid nus kyi bar du bya'o/ /lhag par gnas par mi byed pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/
294a7(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams? ni snga ma bzhin n+ya bya'o?/ /gal te gshin po lha ru mi byed na 'di ltar byas te/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'di nyid las/ /bza' ba thams cad sha ru dbul zhes 'byung bas/ mgo bo dang/ snying dang/ dbang po rnams ni he ru ka la dbul lo//
294b1(rgyud 'grel): glang pa gau rI la'o/ /mcher pa dang mchin pa ni gtso bo rI ma la'o/ /dri chu dang lgang pa dang g.yon gyi rtsa ni bet+tA lI la'o/ /bshad pa dang grong pa dang gnye ma ni lhasma rI la'o// sha ni puk+ka sI la'o/ /khrag dang g.yas kyi rtsa ni sha ba rI la'o/ /khu ba dang gzhungs pa dang/ dbus gyi rtsa ni
294b2(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da lI la'o/ /rkang rmar dang tshil bu ni Dom+bi nI la'o/ /pags pa byang chub kyi yan lag bla rer ro/ /rus pa ni bden pa bzhi ste/ bud shing yam shing du'o/ /glo ba dang rgyu ma dang mkhal ma rnams ni spyan gzigs dang rgyan du dbul bar bya'o/ /yang na dri chu ni zhal bsil dang
294b3(rgyud 'grel): 'thor 'thung du'o/ /khrag ni yon chab tu'o/ /dri chen ni spos su'o/ /nang rol dang dbang po rnams ni/ me tog tu'o/ /glang pa dang gzhungs pa ni dbyug pa ro/ /tshil chen ni snang ba ro/ /sha ni zhal zas su'o/ /pags pa ni bla rer ro/ /rkang brgyad ni gring bu la sogs rol mo ro/ /rus pa
294b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni phyag rgya lnga ro/ /skra dang spu la sogs pa ni gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du ? zho?/ de nas thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags ma/ rang rang gi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la dbul bar bya'o/ /de yang gsungs pa/ mchod pa'i lha gzugs sam rnam dag ni/ /rang
294b5(rgyud 'grel): rang ngo bor dbul bar bya zhes gsungs so/ /de nas phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod/ /bstod pa rnams kyis bstod la lam sbyang ste/ tshogs lam smig rgyu lta bu ste/ gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o/ /gsum ba glog tu khyod kyis mthong/ /bzhi pa mar me lta bu ste/ lnga pa thams cad
294b6(rgyud 'grel): stong? pa ni/ /sangs rgyas sa ni bde nyid do/ /srid pa bar dor 'di nyid du/ /khyod kyis lam lnga mthong phyin shog /ces spyangs la/ lam bstan pa ni/ khyad kyis lam lnga mthar phyin pas/ /phung po lnga nyid sangs rgyas lnga/ /nyon mongs lnga ni mkha' 'gro lnga/ /rnam shes
294b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ni ye shes bzhi/ /'byung ba bzhi ni lha mo bzhi// srid pa'i 'khor lo rgyud bcad nas// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs bskor te/ /'khor ba bya ba'i ming yang med ces lam bstan no// smon lam ni bdag gis dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa la/ ci
295a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ba'i mchod ba dang/ sbyin sreg rnams kyis mchod bas/ bdag dang yon bdag? dang tshe 'das pa dang sems can thams cad sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis byung/ chags gnyis rdzogs te/ 'di nyid du bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par gyur cig
295a2(rgyud 'grel): ces smon lam btab la/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po/ /dpal dgyes pa rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa la phrin las su gsol ba ni bdag cag dang ring ? kye bdag po rnams la nag kyi rigs su gyur pa rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ pad kan dang/ 'dus pa
295a3(rgyud 'grel): las kyu rang thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig/ gdon gyi rigs su gyur pa gdon stong phrag brgyad cu las thar bar mdzod cig/ 'phral gyis rkyen las gyur pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas ? pa gsol te/ bdag dus snyigs ma'i sems can
295a4(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pas yo byad mtshogs pa dang/ bdag las dang po par/ ? bas sems la dbang ma thob ste/ /byid ba dang rgod pa'i dbang ma thob ste/ /bying ba dang rgod pa'i dbang gis mi gsal ba dang /cho ga nyams shing lhag chad du gyur pa thams cad bzod pa chen por mdzad du gsol lo//
295a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas me lha la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa dang/ sreg rdzas lhag ma rnams phul te/ 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pas bstod la/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ drang srong chen po khyod la bdag gis ci 'byor ba'i
295a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang/ sbyin sreg thams? kyis mchod pas bdag cag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs nad kyi rigs su gyur ba dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ 'phral gyi rkyen thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol lo/ /'jig rten 'di'i tshe ring ba dang/ bsod nams dang/ dpal dang
295a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa dang gzi brjid rnams ni zla ba yang kyi ro bzhin 'phel bar mdzad du gsol lo/ /bzod par gsol te/ bdag gi pho byad ma 'byor ba dang/ chog nyams shing 'khrul ba ci? mchis pa rnams ni bzod pa chen po mdzad du gsol lo zhes
295b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod la gshegs su gsol lo/ /dkyil 'khor phyags la chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas rus pa bsdus nas tsha tsha gdab par bya'o/ /de nas rus pa 'am gos sam ming byang la/ tsha tsha gdab cing dbang bskur bya/ zhes 'byung bas tsha tsha'i? cho ga ji lta ba bzhin
295b2(rgyud 'grel): btab la dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur te/ rnam par shes pa dgug pa sngon du 'gro bas/ rang gi lhar byas la sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te/ rig pa'i dbang lnga brtul zhugs dang drug bskur ro/ /sdom pa 'bogs par mi bya ste/ shes pa bkug
295b3(rgyud 'grel): tu zin kyang dbang po med pa'i phyir ro/ /ro sreg cho ga bdag gis ni/ /byas pas dge ba gang bsags pa/ /des ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /dri med ye shes thob par shog/ re sreg pa'i cho ga slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po
295b4(rgyud 'grel): nag po dang/ 'gos lhas btsas gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ he badzra ho ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang/ /bdag med ma la phyag
295b5(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya/ /bdag gzhan phan par 'dod pa yis/ /rnam rtog nga rgyal sogs spangs te/ /chos phyigs 'brang ba'i blo yis ni/ /sbyin sreg cho ga mnyan par gyis/ /bla med nang dang phyi yi ste/ /sbyin
295b6(rgyud 'grel): sreg dbye ba rnam pa gsum/ /ye shes me la phung po sogs/ /bud shing bsreg pa bla med yin/ /kha zas bza' sogs nang gir bshad/ /phyi yi sreg rdzas sbyin sreg ste/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni lhag gnas dang/ /sgrub pa'i dus su sbyin sreg bya/ /gsang
295b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub la/ /sbyin sreg ma byas 'bras mi 'byin/ /las rnams thams cad la bsgrub phyir/ /brtson pas sbyin sreg las rnams bya/ /sdig pa gzhig phyir zhi pa ste/ /bsod nams yongs su spel rgyas yin/ /chags pa bsgom phyir dbang gyur te// 
296a1(rgyud 'grel): rtog pas phyir mngon spyod yin/ /nyon mongs sdig pa zhi byed cing/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas byed phyir/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor pas? bdag /ci 'dod par ni sems kyis bya/ /de phyir thams cad bshad bya ste/ /thab dang rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang/ /sgrub pa po dang lha dag dang/ /sgrub pa'i
296a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang rnam pa lnga/ /de la sbyin sreg spyi yi phab bshad pa/ /sems can dbye bas mdza' yas pas/ /las kyi dbye bas bzhi ru 'gyur/ /rigs kyi dbye bas lnga ru dbye/ /zhe ba kha dog dkar po ste/ /rgyas pa gser gyi mdog tu'o/ /dbang la kha dog dmar po'o/ /mngon spyod la ni nag?
296a3(rgyud 'grel): bo'o/ /dgug dang skrad la nag po'o/ /zhi ba la ni zlum po ste/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi bya// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mo/ /lhag ma der ni bsgrub par bya/ /rgya ru khru gang zabs su ni/ /mtho gdang? ni zhi ba yin/ /rgya ru khru do zabs su ni/ /khru gang pa ni rgyas pa'o/ /rgya ru sor mo nyi shu la/ /zabs su
296a4(rgyud 'grel): sor bcu mngon spyod do/ /dbang dang dgug pa de dang 'dra/ /zhi ba kha khyer sor bzhis bskor/ /rgyas pa la ni sor brgyad do/ /mngon sbyong la ni sor gsum mo/ /dbang dang dgug la de bzhin no/ /zhi ba'i thabs khung dbus su ni/ /rdo rje dang ni gri gug bri/ /kha khyer la yang rdo rjes bskor//
296a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i thabs la rin po che/ /kha khyer rin bo che yis bskor/ /mngon spyod thabs la ral gri ste/ /kha khyer la yang ral gris bskor/ /dbang dang dgug la lcags kyu'o/ /kha khyed la yang lcags kyus bskor/ /de 'dra'i thab khung kun la yang/ /kha dog mthun pa'i dri? yis
296a6(rgyud 'grel): byugs/ /zhi ba shar gyi phyogs su bya/ /rgyas pa byang gi phyogs su bya/ /lho yi phyogs su mngon spyod do/ /nub kyi phyogs su dbang dang dgug/ zhi bas gzhi dkar po ste/ /rgyas pas gzhi ser po'o/ /dbang ni sa gzhi dmar po la/ /mngon spyod sa gzhi nag po'o/ /zhig phal cher
296a7(rgyud 'grel): srod la bya/ /rgyas pa snga dro bya bar ?/ /dbang ni dgongs ka'i dus ?/ /mngon spyod nam byed nyi phyed bya/ /tshon gyis rjes mthun bri ba 'am/ /yang na me tog dag kyang rung/ /thag khung dag ni de ltar bya/ /rdzas rnams 'di ltar shes par bya/ /zhib mar gyi til gyis so//
296b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ? ni zho dang zan/ /dbang dang dgug la utpa la/ /mngon spyod la ni tsher mas so/ /bskrad pa la yang tsher mas so/ /kun la mthun par de dag ste/ /bsang gtor dri dang byug pa dang/ /me tog mar me lha bshos dang/ /yam shing ku sha'i myu gu dang/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi dur ba dang/ /gla gor zhog/ dza
296b2(rgyud 'grel): ti sogs/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /gzhan yang zhu ba'i rdzas rnams dang/ /ma grug 'bras dang gro dang 'bru/ /nas thug dang ni gro thug dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang 'o ma dang/ /mchod yon dang ni zhabs bsil dang/ /mngon spyod la ni bsgrub bya'i sa/ /rkang rjes sa dang bshad pa
296b3(rgyud 'grel): gci/ /khrag pa mi rus phye ma dang/ /dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa dang/ /dpa' ? lnga dang khwa yi sha/ gzhan dag dgang gzar blugs gzar ro/ /mchod yon la sogs snod rnams so/ /yal ga'i rtse mo'i cha las byung/ /bud shing zhi ba'i las la 'dod/ /yal ga'i dbus kyi cha las byung/ /bud shing mngon
296b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod las la 'dod/ /mchod sbyin la sogs shing las byung/ /yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /des ni zhi ba'i las la shis/ /rgyas pa la ni khru gang ngo/ /dbang dang dgug ni zhi dang 'dra/ /mngon spyod la ni sor bcu'o/ /zhi ba la ni dkon me dang/ /bram ze thams pa yi me/ /rgyas pa
296b5(rgyud 'grel): la ni rgyal rigs sam/ /rje rigs las byung me yis bya/ /dbang dang dgud la smad pa dang/ /lam du byung ba'i me yis bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni gdol pa'am/ /rdo las byung ba'i me yis bya'o/ /dgang gzar blugs gzar yu ba khru/ /'og tu rdo rje rin chen bya/ /de stengs dga' gzar
296b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyar? sor bzhi/ /mchu ni pad+ma 'dab ma'i dbyibs/ /blugs gzar pad+ma'i dbyibs sor gnyis/ /kha la rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /kha dog khyad par las kyi rim/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dbul bar bya'o/ /slob dpon dag gam sgrub pa po/ /mtshan nyid ma chad yang dag ldan/ /sbyin sreg las
296b7(rgyud 'grel): la mkhas pa yis/ /brtse bas sbyin sreg las rnams bya/ /'di ni lha ni rnam gsum ste/ /sreg bya len dang las byed dang/ /mchod par bya ba'i me lha ste/ /mtshan nyid 'og nas shes par bya/ /thab ni 'di ltar shes par bya/ /de nas sgrub pa po de yis/ /khrus la sogs pa
297a1(rgyud 'grel): lngar byas te/ /sbyin sreg khang par legs 'dug la/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa yis/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /de nas bsang gtor snod la ni/ /gsang sngags 'di dag brjod par bya/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT/ /'di yis rdzas rnams bsang par
297a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de nas mchod yon la sogs la/ /rang rang gsang sngags bzlas pa'am/ /yang na bde dag bzlas brjod? bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /thams cad dag par mos byas te/ /'og nas bshad pa'i me blangs la/ /de la dkras? bsang gtor bya/ /thag byang bsang zhing me bcug la//
297a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung yab kyis ni spar bar bya/ /oM a he ru ka badzra dzwa la dzwa la hUM/ de nas bgegs ni bcing pa'i phyir/ /sngags ni 'di dag brjod nas su/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang/ /de bcings steng du 'ang bcing bar bya/ /oM sarbba bag+h+nin hUM phaT/ stong pa nyid du byed pa yis/ /rgyal pa'i
297a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis brjod par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA ? At+mako haM/ stong bar raM skyes hUM dngos las/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsam bya zhing/ /'gro ba'i bdud rnams zhi byed pa'i/ /hUM las 'od gzer spro bar bya/ /gsang sngags 'di dag brjod par bya/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha
297a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM phaT/ de las rdo rjes bskor pa'i gung/ /rab? yang na bskor bar bya/ /rdo rjes dang nam mkha' i dbyibs/ /yaM raM baM laM/ 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ni/ /b+h+ruM gi 'khor lo las byung ba'i/ /gzhal yas khang ni bsam par bya/ /de dbus hUM las byung ba yi//
297a6(rgyud 'grel): thag? bung dag ni bsam par bya/ /der ni raM las byung ba yi/ /me ni gru gsum 'bar pa'o/ /der ni paM las pad+ma bsam/ /mngon par byang chub lnga yis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' yongs gyur bas
297a7(rgyud 'grel): raM las byung ba'i me lha bsam/ /zhi ba'i me lha b+ha ga me/ /rgyas pa la ni dbang chen mo/ /dbang dang dgug la 'dod pa'i me/ /mngon spyod la ni gsod pa'i tshe/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa la/ /dang pos rig ma yang dag 'khyud/ /kha dog phyag rgya las kyi rigs/ /ji
297b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'bang? pa bsam par bya/ /de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes me lha spyan drangs nas/ /dam tshig me lhar bstim par bya/ /gau rI la sogs bzhi po yis/ dgug gzhug bcings la dbang du bya/ /mig dang sku sogs byin gyis brlabs/ /thugs ka'i sa bon 'od zer
297b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ phyogs bcu mgon po bskul nas ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni blang bar bya/ /zhi ba'i me lha rnam snang mdzad/ /rgyas pa la ni rin chen 'byung/ /dbang dang dgug la 'od dpag med/ /mngon spyod la ni mi bskyod pa/ /dbu rgyan la ni bsam gtan yin/ /mchod yon bsang gtor
297b3(rgyud 'grel): zhabs bsil dbul/ /de nas me lha'i lce dang ni/ /dgang gzar blugs gzar nang du ni/ /yi ge ri ni rnam dgod do/ /dbang blugs bdun nam gsum 'am gcig/ me lha'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /de nas legs par me de la/ /'bar ba'i mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /ngan pa
297b4(rgyud 'grel): spang par bya ba'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i yan lag kun tu bsang gtor gyis ni bsang byas nas/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM/ bsang gtor gyis sngags so/ /oM A:badzra ra le hUM/ mchod yon gyis gso/ /oM A:ni ri ti hUM/ zhabs
297b5(rgyud 'grel): bsil gyi sngags so/ /oM A:badzra d+hU po hUM/ 'dug pa'i'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra puSh+Ta? hUM swAhA/ /me tog gi'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra A lo ge hUM swAhA/ mar me'o'o/ /oM A:badzra gand+he hUM swAhA/ dri'i'i/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbba d+harma NI A dyA nu Tpana tA ta oM A:hUM phaT swA hA/ bshes kyi'o//
297b6(rgyud 'grel): oM sarbba pA paM ha na da ha ? 'di zhes bya ba'i sarbba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ /til gyi'o/ /oM sarbba saM bde swAhA/ zho zan gyi'o/ oM badzra yAdz+nyA na ya swAhA/ yaM shing gi'o/ /oM b+ha d+hi brik+ShA ya swAhA/ /byang chub kyi shing gi'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ 'bras kyi'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma? ri swAhA
297b7(rgyud 'grel): grong phul/ /oM ma hA be gA ya swAhA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM badzra bi dza ya swAhA/ /'bru dbu'i/ /oM badzra A yu Sha swAhA/ dur ba'i'o/ /oM a pra ti ta ta badzra ya swAhA/ ku sha'i'o/ /oM ma hA Sha d+ha ye swAhA/ starga dang/ gla gor zhe sha dang/ dza te pha la
298a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi'o/ /gzhan yang zhu ba'i rdzas rnams ni lha'i sngags kyi dbul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra A nal ma hA b+hU ta dz+nya la ya sarbba b+hasmi ku ru dri sh+ya ho dza:hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma yastwi a haM/ mthar yang mar gyi dgang blugs dbul/ bsang gtor zhabs
298a2(rgyud 'grel): bsil phul nas kyang/ /bstod pa 'di yis bstod par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi phrag lha'i rgyal po Tik+kas dbang bskur ba'i/ /shes rab mchog gi nyon mongs thams cad bsregs/ /'jigs byed me lha nyid la rnam par 'dud/ /oM sarba ta thA ga
298a3(rgyud 'grel): tastu ti badzra swa b+hA ba At+mako haM/ de nas bdud rtsi dbul bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga a pri ta satwa ni badzra swa b+hA pa At+makohaM/ de nas me lha'i thugs kar ni/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams bsam par bya/ /de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan
298a4(rgyud 'grel): drangs la/ go rA la sogs bzhi po yis/ dgug gzhug bcings la dbang du bya/ /de nas sngags dang bsrung ba bya/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul bar bya/ /mig dang sku sogs byin brlabs la/ /dbang bskur ba ni blangs par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ab+haM
298a5(rgyud 'grel): She ka badzrae sa b+ha pa At+ma ki haM/ de rnams gsang bya ste/ mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /khyad par gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /ji ltar nus rjes dbul bar bya/ /las rnams yang dag bsgrub pa'i ph yir/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag/ sngags kyi
298a6(rgyud 'grel): mjug pa 'di gdags so/ /shAN+Ti ku ru swA hA/ dzuSh+Ta ku ru oM/ ba shi ku ru ho/ mA ra ya phaT/ lha rnams gzi byin bskyed pa'i phyir/ /mar gyi gang ba'i dgang blugs dbul/ /mchod yon bsang gtor phul nas ni/ /bstod pa dag ni 'di dag bya/ /de nas bdud rtsi
298a7(rgyud 'grel): n+ya bya ste/ /bzod bar gsol te gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig lha rnams thugs kar bsdu/ /de nas bar chad zhi bya'i phyir/ /phyogs spyod la thogs mgron rnams ?/ oM akA ro mu pa sarbba d+harmA NA/ AdyA nu tpanatwna? oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ sngags 'di yis
298b1(rgyud 'grel): ? byin? gyis brlabs/ /rang rang sngags kyi gtor ma dbul/ /de nas ye shes me lha la/ /mchod pa dbul zhing bstod pa bya/ /gshegs dang bdud rtsi myang ba bya/ /bsang gtor 'thor 'thur phul nas ni/ /bzed pa gsol te gshegs su gsol/ /bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi
298b2(rgyud 'grel): don/ /byas zin byin za gshegs su gsol/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas kyang/ /slar yang gshegs par mthar du gsol/ /dam tshig me lha 'bar bar bstim/ /dge ba'i rtsal bsngo bya ste/ /rang lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ /ji ltar ba ni gnas par bya'o/ /mkha' la char
298b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bab pa yis/ /rdo yi steng du rtsa skye ltar/ /bla ma rnams kyis byin brlabs kyis/ /rtog ge bdag 'dra? bshad par mos/ /bdag ni shes rab mi bsam zhing/ /rgyud sogs don la mnan par 'gyur/ /bzhung rgyas rjes su mi mthun pa/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis bzod
298b4(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod/ /bcom ldan dgyes pa rdo rje yi// sbyin sreg tshig bshad pa 'de'i/ /dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa/ /des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /dgyes pa rdo rje myur thob shog/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
298b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+har dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA la 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // * / /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rab gnas kyi cho ga'i tshul zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas rang byang chub
298b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nges pa'i tshig dang rnam par dbye ba dang/ /chog rim par phye ste rab gnas bshad/ /de la dang por nges pa'i tshig? ni praka? sha Ne nA ri pra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha zhes bya ste/ mchog tu gnas pas rab gnas zhes bya'o/ /de yang yun ring? bas
298b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang/ /khyad par du gyur pas mchog go /de la yun ring bzhin chog thams cad do/ /khyad par du gyur pa ni mchog gnas thams cad de/ ye shes sems dpa' rang bzhin du byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par dbye ba la gnyis te/ gzhis rnam par dbye ba dang/ chog
299a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dbye ba'o/ /de la gzhis rnam par dbye ba la gsum ste/ /sku'i bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba dang/ gsung gi bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba dang thug kyi bdag nyid du gnas bya pa'o/ /de la sku'i bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba ni mchod rten dang/ gtsug 'gag? bdag /rdo rje?
299a2(rgyud 'grel): dang shing ljon pa dang/ khron pa dang/ chu mig dang/ steng ka dang/ rta babs dang/ shing rings rnams so/ /gsung gi bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba ni phreng ba dang/ 'jig rten ba'i glegs bam dang/ 'jig rten lal 'das pa'i glegs bam rnams so/ /rigs so
299a3(rgyud 'grel): so'i bdag nyid du rab gnas bya ba ni/ sku gzugs rnams rang rang gi sku gang yin pa de nyid du rab gnas bya'o/ /cho ga rnam par dbye ba ni cho ga rgyas pa dang/ mdor bsdus pa nyid do/ /da ni tshe ga rim par bye ste bshad par bya'o/ /de la rab gnas byed pa'i
299a4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis/ zla ba dang/ tshes grangs dang/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar? shis pa la bya ste/ de yang zla ba drug dang/ gza' bzhi dang/ rgyu skar bcu bzhi gang yin pa dang/ chos grangs bdun gyi grags? nyid la/ rgyal pa'i rab gnas la sogs pa nyid ces
299a5(rgyud 'grel): pas so/ /dus de dag la gnas yid du 'ong bar /bla bre dang yol ba dang ? la sogs pas brgyan cing me tog bkram ste/ dri zhim par byas la/ gnas der stegs bu khrod pa/ rgya khru bzhi pa /gru bzhi pa lham pa mdzes pa/ 'jam bzung bzhi
299a6(rgyud 'grel): yu yo med pa gcig byas te/ de yang rdo'am/ so phag dang/ phag gu las byas pa/ rdo thal gyis dkar por byug ge /stegs bu de'i steng du/ rab gnas bya ba'i lha 'khrus bsol pa dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de la cho ga'i rim ba ni/ /dang por
299a7(rgyud 'grel): stegs? bu'i steng du sku gzug ? shar du bltas pa bzhugs pa la/ ras ser po sprul gsol te/ oM badzra paSh+Ta hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyi go/ de nas hUM zhes bzlas pa'i phungs kar chu'i shis pa ste/ lan gsum du g.yas g.yon du bskor te/
299b1(rgyud 'grel): me du dor te nges par sbyang ngo/ /de nas ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i kham phor gzhag la/ dur bzhi? pa'i? gyis slar zhing lnga gas 'dis dkru'o/ /oM sarba ba phA ga ta kla ye be sho d+ha ni swAhA/ de nas dag par gyur pa na/ til mar gyi bzhim pos bsgos pa
299b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar? ba'i snod du gzhag la /dur ba'i bir gyis blar zhing /sngags bzlas pas sku khyab par legs par byugs te /oM hUM ? h+rI:?/ ba zhes pas so/ /de nas til mar bsal pa'i phyir/ shun pags lnga po'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'i chus bkru'o/ /de nas yang a ma ka la
299b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i bdag chal gyi sde? gus byugs la bum pa chu gtsang ma bdud rtsi dang sbyar bas dbang bskur ba'i khrus gsol te /bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing dril bu bsil te/ glu gar dang rol mo sil snyan du ma sgrogs shing chu bum pas blugs so/ /de'i
299b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis nam mkha' la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ grub pa'i rigs 'dzin dang /lha dang lha mo mang pos kyang bdud rtsi'i chu blug par bsams la/ tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas pas sngags 'di brjod cing dbab bskur te/ khrus bya'o/ /de ltar
299b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan? pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de ltar bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a g+haM She ka sa ma ya sh+rI hUM A(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ de nas ras dmar pos sku la chags pa'i chu legs par phyis te/
299b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni khrus kyi cho ga'o /de nas tsan dan gnyis dang gur gum dpal du dang kAnde? ka te/ dri'i lde gus lha'i thugs gang byugs te/ sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM badzra gande yA swAhA/ de nas me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri chab dang/ lha bshos rnams rang rang
299b7(rgyud 'grel): gi sngags kyis phul la/ thugs kar dang/ mgur dang/ spyi bo dang/ drag pa rnams su rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pas lan gsum reg la/ lag par bdug spos thogs pa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs la/ lce hUM las rdo rjer byas te/ sta gon la
300a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mo/ /rigs pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal? bstod/ /slob ma rnams la rtse ba dang/ /khyad rnams la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid
300a2(rgyud 'grel): can/ /sangs ni rab gnas bgyid pa lags// gus pas bdag dang dam pa ni //bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad par rigs/ /'gro la 'khor lo'i mdzad don sbyin/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /gang yang
300a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi lha gzhan dang/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ bstan pa la ni mngon dga' zhing/ /byang chub sems la rten byun ba/ /rdo rje'i can ldan sems can gzhan/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag /rigs pa'i rgyal po 'di yin ni/ /ji ltar nus pa'i mchod? pa
300a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'gro ba zhi phyir rab gnas bgyid/ /slob ma mchog dang bdag la ni/ /khyod kyis thugs brtses nyer bzung nas/ /rab gnas 'di la thams cad kyis/ /thugs brtsas ldan pas gnad par mdzod/ /de skad ces brjod pas phyogs bcu'i sangs
300a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la sogs pa thams cad/ /rab gnas kyi gnas da'i nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo/ /de nas rab gnas bya ba'i phyir gzhi de stong pa nyid du bsgoms la pad+ma dang zla ba'i rim gyis sam/ yang na yig 'bru las yud tsam gyis lhar bskyed/ /de nas rang gi snying
300a6(rgyud 'grel): kha'i? 'od zer byung bas/ ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste/ /mdun du byon par bsams la/ oM pra tIts+tsha arg+haM hUM swAhA/ zhes pas yon chab dbul te/ oM ni ri te khaM zhal bsaM la? dbul lo/ /oM sarbba saM bo? d+ha ni hUM phaT ces pas zhags bsm la? dbul
300a7(rgyud 'grel): yang me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri dang /bshos dang/ dril bu'i sgra dag phul la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas dam tshig sems dpa' la bstims te dbang bskur la rgyas gdab ste/ yang me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri dang/ bshos ?
300b1(rgyud 'grel): sil snyan rnams phul la/ lha de'i sngags mang du bzlas te /de nas yi ge brgya pa mu(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /'di ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas nang par stegs bu'i gnas der mchod pa ci 'byor pa dang/ gser gyi thur ma a dza na dang bcas pa bshams
300b2(rgyud 'grel): la rab tu gnas par bya ste/ de yang dang po slob dpon gyi lag tu spos thogs la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs te/ lce hUM las rdo rjer byas te/ bcom ldan zhes pa nas/ thugs brtser ldan zhes pa nas/ /gnang bar mdzod ces pa'i bar du brjod nas/ lha rnams
300b3(rgyud 'grel): bskul te/ de yang sang ni zhes pa'i skabs su de ring zhes pa sbyar la/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ yon chab dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i chogs phul la lha thams cad kyi sku gzugs la bstims te/ yang mchod pa byas la/ oM badzra a pa
300b4(rgyud 'grel): ra na? bu sha ne swAhA/ shes pas rgyan ci 'byor pa yang dbul lo/ /de nas bstod pa yang bya ste/ gser gyi zhur ma a dza na byugs pas spyan phye ste/ sngags 'dis so/ /oM tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Sha bi sho d+ha ni badzra swAhA zhes zlos shing/ de nas di bya aM bye sa mA d+hi d+hya na pri Na ni swAhA zhes brjod cing/
300b5(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba bzang po cung zad cig zangs gur? skur la gsol/ de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas shing/ /sku'i zhabs dang/ rked du dbul/ lag pa g.yas pa bcus pas/ rdo rje lan gsum bskor te brtan par byas la/ stegs bu'i steng du sku'i cha gsum pa'i khri la/ ha cang
300b6(rgyud 'grel): yang ma btud pa dang/ ma gyen pa dang/ ma 'khor ci mdzes sum? tiSh+Tha badzra swAhA/ zhes brjod la bzhag go/ de nas slob ma la brjod pa ri/ khyod kyis dag gsol btab pa'i/ /sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa'i/ /de ni ngas kyang byas
300b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ /khyod kyis de ni rab rdzogs pas/ /ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis/ /slob mas kyang bskul ci 'byor ? phul ba bstod pa yang bya ste/ lan du mang bskor ba bya ba'i/ /de nas slob dpon gyis gtor ma byin pa/ sku gzugs byin che zhing bkra shis pa dang/ yun ring du bzhugs 
301a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ chos skyong ba'i srung ma? la gsol ba gdab bo/ /'byor? bde yod na zangs? bur zas? phul? pa'i rjes la rgyas pa'i spyin sreg bya'o/ /'di ni rab gnas rgyas pa'o/ /rab gnas mdong bsdus pa ni sta gon la gnas pa mi bya bar nyin gcig ba gsum pa sogs?
301a2(rgyud 'grel): pa sngar smos pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la glegs? bam? dang/ bris sku dang/ lder sol sogs pa ni me long la khrus bya'o/ /lugs ma la sogs pa ni dngos su khrus bya'o/ /lha khang ni lha'i sku ji snyed pa de snyed pa khrus bya'o/ /spyir dril te bya ba ma yin no/ /mchod rten dang/ dza? ris?
301a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rta ba pas dang/ shing ljon ba dang/ gtsug bag? khang ni rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub po/ /chu mig dang khron pa la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad du rab gnas byas la/ mjug de gyur pa las chu mig la sogs par rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /brlas? pa'i phred ba
301a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ glegs? bam? dag ni 'od dpag med du bya'o/ /rab gnas kyi chad du dkyil 'khor 'dri ni rab gnas byed pa'i lha de gtso bor bya'o/ /lha khang dam sku mang du bzhugs pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /gal te dbu? gnas? pa ma
301a5(rgyud 'grel): byas par gyur na/ nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na/ sku gzugs rab gnas ma byas pas/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byed pa/ /sngags med pas ni thal ba la/ spyan sreg byas bzhin 'bras bu med ces pa ste ma byas pa'i nyes pa'o/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i tshul zab mo//
301a6(rgyud 'grel): ? chen po nag po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ga na tsakra pU dzakra ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i rim pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs rnams pa? sogs par?
301a7(rgyud 'grel): bya pa dang/ /bgegs rnams nye bar zhi bya'i phyir/ /bsod nams mthar thug tshogs 'khor lo/ /lung dang man ngag ji bzhin bri/ /de la re zhig dang por lugs dang mthun pa'i tshogs kyi khad bu tsan dan la sogs pa'i dris bsgos pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas
301b1(rgyud 'grel): su/ /las thams cad pa'i skyes bu lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas chag chag gdab pa dang/ maN+Dal bya ba dang/ me tog dgram pa dang/ mchod pa bsham pa dang/ phyogs skyong gi gtor ma rgya chen po bsham mo/ /de nas slob dpon spyan drangs la/ ji ltar rigs pa dang
301b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas par bzhugs su gsol la/ las thams cad pa'i bum pa rgyan dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs/ mchod pa'i bum pa yang ci rigs par bsham mo/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa pho mo/ /'du bar 'os pa kun ba sogs la/ /de dag gis dang la gsol ba gdab ste/ khro bo
301b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon po mdzes pa ste/ khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong/ /nor bu rin chen gces bcings pa'i/ /dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste/ /bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/ /dpa' bos gnang gis gtang du gsol/ /rnal 'byor ma yis tshogs dbus su/ /bzang po'i sgo
301b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di phye ste mthong zhes gsol ba btab nas/ nang du bkug ste/ las kyi bum pa'i chus gtor zhing/ skyor chu blung do/ /de nas gral rims bzhin du bkod nas rdo rje slob dpon la me tog phul la gsol ba gdab/ rnal 'byor pa pho mo la yang me tog gter la bskul
301b5(rgyud 'grel): bar yang bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms te mos pa tsam gyis lce lag byin gyis brlab/ mngon par rtogs pa brjod de/ hUM thogs mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun dag
301b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i gtso/ /oM ma hA badzra hUM/ a srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyi gdod? nas dag /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed/ /mahA badzra gtaN+Da ho:de nas mchod pa'i khyad par thams
301b7(rgyud 'grel): cad 'dru gsum gyis byin gyis brlab/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis/ /bla ma dam pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa'i lha rnams nam mkha' la bltas la/ yon chab dang zhabs bsil dang zhabs khrus phul/ me tog dang sgra snyan gyi bar du rim pas mchod/
302a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas de nyid lnga pa'am/ gzhung gang yin pas bstod/ /yan lag bdun pa bsdus rgyas gang yang rung bas mchod pa dang/ smon lam yan chad bya/ /yi ge brgya bas bzod gsol byas la gshegs su gsol/ /de nas shUn+ya'i sngags kyis stong par
302a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas/ yi ge hUM gi snang bas dra ba dang rang dang sa gzhir bsgoms la/ de'i 'og tu 'byung ba rim brtsegs ri rab rin po che bsgoms la/ de'i steng du sna tshogs pa? lte pa la/ sna tshogs rdo rje bsam te/ de'i lta? ba la?/ ? las gzhal yas khang
302a3(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang bcas pa bskyod pa? khang rung gi ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dbyer med par bstim mo/ /de nas char? bsrung? ba dang byin gyis brlab pa gzhung bzhin du bya'o/ /yi ge ha dmar po las kha dog sbyangs la/ ho:dkar giS dri gsal te/ /h+rI:mthing khas nus
302a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bcom nas/ bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la/ de nyid kyis 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi yang bkug ste bstim?/ /de nas rts ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lhag so so'i ming nas brjod cing mchod/ de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i srin lag gi maN+Dal gru
302a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum bris la/ der bdud rtsi gtor bas zla ba'i gdan phyogs mtshams su gyur par bsam/ der ye shes kyi 'khor lor mos pa tsam gyis/ bsams la bdud rtsis mchod/ de nas bdag nyid la mchod de/ mthe ba srin gyi lte rtse dang/ smin phrag dang/ spyi
302a6(rgyud 'grel): bor gtor de nas de dag mi dmigs par bsams? la/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la yon chab la soD ba'i mchod pa'i ? byang? khyad par kun gyis mchod do/ /de nyid lnga pa'am/ gang yin pa'i gzhung du bstod pa byas la gshegs su mi gsol/ de nas zhing skyong rnams la
302a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma rgya chen po gtang ste/ yi ge gsum gyis sbyangs pa dang/ 'bar ba dang/ rtogs par byas la/ maN+Dal thog bzhi btab pas/ le cho dgur byas te/ dbus ma la ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsams la/ phyogs mtshams la zhing skyod brgyad ma mo sum cu
302b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa spyan drangs mchod de/ oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang/ ri bong dang ni ri sul dug /grong dang bzhi mdo dag dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang/ /gdol pa gnod dang thang dang ni/ khyed par du ni chu la gnas/ /drag po drag po drag chen po/ /brgya byin mnyam
302b2(rgyud 'grel): bsten pa dang/ /nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug dang/ /dga' las 'dras pa'i log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byang ma dang drag mo dang/ /mi sdug ma dang u ma dang/ /rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang/ /mi thub gzhan gyi mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ nags tsam? dang rnal
302b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ khrag du sdang dpa' 'phyang ba mo/ /'phrog ma dang ni mar me ma/ /'jigs byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thong chen ma/ /thong phreng can dang khwa gdong ma/ /sbrul chen? ? gri dgra?
302b4(rgyud 'grel): sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma/ /de bzhin chen po mkha' 'gro lnga/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' yis na/ /thams cad ma lus 'dud?
302b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus shig /oM kak+ka b+ha na/ pa? na/ khakh+khA? da na/ sarba duSh+Ta naM/ ha na ha ne/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a mo g+ha sa hUM dza:zhes pas bkug la pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas par bsam la/ mchod pa lngar byin gyis brlabs la de dbul te/ so sor lce hUM las rdo rje bsams? ba'i
302b6(rgyud 'grel): sbu gu'i 'od kyis drangs te/ mchod par bsams la/ de nas chos bshad de/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la zhes ba la sogs pa brjod/ de nas smon lam gang ba ste/ sems can thams cad sdig dang? cing/ /sems can thams cad bde
302b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /gang gis tha ma nas 'gro ba yi/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog ma ? pa rnams bsgral pa dang/ ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ de ltar nyid du rjes brtse bas/ rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la dgod ces bya bas bsngor? byas la gshegs su
303a1(rgyud 'grel): mi gsol/ /de nas rnal 'byor pho mo kun bltas la/ /dang la dri yis mchod/ /de nas me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar mes tshul bzhin mchod la/ de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i chang gi mchod de pad pa g.yas par chang bzung nas/ g.yon
303a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rtse gsum par byas la/ tshigs su bcang ba 'dis sbyin te/ /ltos shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos/ /'di la the tshom yod ma yin/ /bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum/ /rang bzhin gcig tu rtoD? bas ? zhes ? drong/ /len pa pos brjod pa/ 'dod chags dri ma bral
303a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /rin thang med pas legs 'ongs chos/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal/ zhes pad+ma bskor ba dang bcas pas blang ngo/ /'og ma rnams la drang ba ni 'di skad brjod do/ /sbyor pa'i dngos grub don du ni/ /spong kun de nyid ji
303a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor bas kun tu spyang/ /ji ltar de bas spyad par bya zhes brjod la brim mo/ /de'i 'og tu zha khu dang mar gyis mchod/ /de nas lha bshos so sor bgrangs la/ de kun gyis phung bsrus nas/ /slob dpon gyis cha gnyis su bgos te/ chog? cig g.yan gyi phyogs su
303a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la/ byin gyis brlabs la dkyil 'khor gyi lnga la dbul/ cha gcig g.yas su bzhag la/ byin gyis brlabs la/ chos skyong gi gtor ma dbul te/ oM a ka ro mu khaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mchod/ /de nas ci bder rol zhing spyad/ /skabs der bkra shis bgyi//
303a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas lta dang phyogs skyong? la snang ? ba dang/ bzod gsol byas te gshegs su gsol lo/ /ye shes lha la yi ge brgya pas bzod gsol byas la badzra mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /dam tshig gi lha snying gar bsdus la/ oM A ta ma di shi hUM zhes bsnga'o/ /de
303a7(rgyud 'grel): nas oM sarba du lhan grah+Na? gats+tsha hUM zhes pas phyi rol gyi lha gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas lhag ma bsdus te/ de la gnyis te/ rnal 'byor pho mo'i lhag ma ni phyi rol gyi sha za la sogs pa mi ma yin pa rnams la gtang ste/ phyi sger btom la btang/ /khyim pa'i? lhag
303b1(rgyud 'grel): ma ni khyim de nyid kyi mi ma yin la bsngo'o/ /lhag ma de lta bu'i skal ba med pa la/ slob dpon gyi kha nas bdud rtsi sbyin no/ /de nas yon bdag la bkra shis dang smon lam gdab bo/ /de nas gtor ma skyel ba log pa dang/ tshogs kyi khang bsgor/ /me long dang/ dung 'bung pa
303b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dkrol ba dang/ chu can gyi zho zan gyis mchod/ /de nas nang du phog nas rnal 'byor po mo la de bzhin mchod par bya'o/ /ma 'ongs skye pho gang dag chags? rnams bsags par 'dod pa dang/ /bslab pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis/ /don
303b3(rgyud 'grel): du dri med lung dang bla ma'i man ngag ltar/ /ma nor gzung ste bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir bris pa yin/ /tshigs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriShta? paN+Ti tas mdzad cing/ de nyid dpal
303b4(rgyud 'grel): tsA ba 'gos ltas btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o/ //rgya gar skad du/ stu pa bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ mchod rten gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye rdo rje yi rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don du mchod rten? bya bar 'dod na/ dang
303b5(rgyud 'grel): por sa la rin po che dang spos chu la sogs pas 'jim pa byas la/ rang gi mdun du bzhag ste/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gsal bar byas la/ tshad med pa bzhis bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA
303b6(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas 'jim pa mi dmigs par bsgoms la chog gsum las kye rdo rje yab yum gyi snang byed do/ /de nas snying ga'i h+rI:Am hUM gi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mdza' dag bkug la/ kye rdo rje yab yum snyoms
303b7(rgyud 'grel): par zhugs pa 'od du zhu ste/ byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa las/ gye rdo rje'i snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig gi phyin gyis brlabs te/ oM da ba pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'am/ oM A:h+rI hUM zhes pa'i sngags de dag gis gdab par bya'o/ /mchod rten re re
304a1(rgyud 'grel): yang? kye rdo rje re re bsam la de re re la yang kye rdo rje du ma 'phro ba dang/ 'du byas pa las bdag dang gzhan gyis don rdzogs par bsam mo/ /de nas rten 'brel gyi snying po rab tu gnas pa dang mjug bsdu bar bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi cho ga? zhes bya ba slob dpon ? rin? can?
304a2(rgyud 'grel): nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs lho?// /? pa chen po rgyal ba'i snyan bzang po las mnyan te/ lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang chen por logs par bsgyur ba'o// //
304a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mri thu? wi? d+hi TA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zag gang phyir sha 'phos te/ khye? rdo rje'i lugs kyis bdun tshigs byed par 'dod na/ /gos la sogs pa'i rtags gcig la rten bya ba'am?/ yang na ming
304a4(rgyud 'grel): shog bu la bri'o/ /maN+Dal dang mchod pa dang gtor ma yang gzhung lhar ba sham mo/ /de nas rang lhag pa'i ltar bsgoms? la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /mchod pa'i khyad par gyis mchod la/ bstod pas bstod de/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams la
304a5(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma bsngos la 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyis/ che 'phos pa'i sems yi ge ya? thung gi gzugs su 'od zer lcags kyus bkug nas/ rten gang yin pa la bstim mo/ /rnam smin gyi lus gang
304a6(rgyud 'grel): yin? pa der bsams la/ rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te/ bsgrab bya'i snying gar thim par las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs te/ lus shal lta bur bsam mo/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
304a7(rgyud 'grel): ngang rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis phyag na bsnams pa'i bum pa bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi dbang bkur te/ bkrus pas/ bsgrub bya'i sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad byang bar bsam mo/ /de nas bzlas pa byas te/ bdag gi snying ga'i yi ge las bzlas pa'i yi ge'i
304b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba sprul 'khyil ba'i tshul du bskor bar bsams la/ de'i phreng sngags gang yin pa bzlas pas sngags kyis phreng ba lab? 'od zer 'phros pas/ bsgrub bya'i snying gar thim pas/ lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad byang bar bsam zhing bzlas par
304b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas smon lam gdab cing dge ba'i rtsa bar bsgyur ro/ /de nas sgrub? bya'i shes pa a thung du de/ yi ge rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi btag nas nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i gtso bo'i thugs gar thim par bsams te/ gnas stong pa'o/ /gal te rtan med par gyur na/
304b3(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa'i rnam smin gyi lus de nyid mngon gsum dang 'phra bar bsams la mngon rtogs sngar bzhin bya'o/ /de ltar zhag bdun pa thams cad la bya'o/ /gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
304b4(rgyud 'grel): paN Ti ta chen po rgyal ba'i snyan las legs pas gnyan te/ lo tsA pa shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur ba'o// //sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar rgyur? cig? //dpal he ru ? ? gyi cho ga bzhus?
304b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he ru ka b+ha ta nA ma maN+Dal no paM kA/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhabs ni yongs su bskyod ba'i shin tu bzlog par dka' ba'i dba' rlabs yongs su bgrod pa
304b6(rgyud 'grel): de zhin/ /phyag rnams rnam par bskyod pa'i rnam rgyas rlabs kyis gang ni shin tu dag pa'i rlabs/ /phyag gi glang po la sogs chu na rgyu ba bzhin te gyen gyi dbu skra me dang mtshungs dbu'i phreng ltar bzhad cing chu gter dri med khrag? 'thung khyed gyis skus ni srung gyur cig /dpal
304b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan khrag 'thung kun mkhyen rigs par bcas/ /snying rje gcig cing skyon rnams ma lus spangs/ /lhan cig skyes dngos spyi bos btud byas te/ de yis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i las ni ma gtogs par/ /dngos grub bla med mchog
305a1(rgyud 'grel): ni? mi rigs te/ /dbang dang rab gnas bzlas dang sgrub pa go nas/ /de bas 'dod pas chog la brtson bya/ /dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags dang ni/ /bya ba gang dang bzlas pa sbyin sreg dang/ /mchod pa la su ldan pa bsdus pa ste/ /de nyid dag ni rnam pa bcu
305a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /slob dpon de nyid bcu rnams shes/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba rig /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /bstan bcos kun ni kun rig cing/ /dbang rnams kun gyis dbang bskur cing/ /bla ma'i bka' thob yon tan ldan/ /dam tshig ldan zhing sdom par ldan/ /brtan
305a3(rgyud 'grel): dir theg pa gsum ldan rig/ 'jig rten chos kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ /bzod ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /bzlas ba la brtson ser sna bral/ /dad dang? byams la yang dag gzhol/ /cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor bya ba rtsam pa ste/ /bsod nams la sogs
