398a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ 'bras bu'i lam 'di la btsud nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud do/ /de la 'di ltar 'byung ste/ mtshan nyid gsum ldan sbyin sreg ste/ /gnas skabs rnam pa gsum dang ldan/ /las kyi bya ba gsum ldan na/ /de
398a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa sbyin sreg yin/ mtshan nyid mi ldan rtsom byed dang/ /gnas skabs mi shes sbyin sreg byed/ /sngags dang ye shes spangs pa'i phyir/ /rmongs chen de la 'bras bu med/ /ji ltar gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang
398a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas las rtsam par byed nas de'i dngos grub thams cad myur bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dngos grub shin tu myur bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'di ltar mo mor sbyin sreg ma rdzogs kyi bar du rtse gcig tu bsam par bya'o/ /thab khung dang ku sha dang me
398a7(rgyud 'grel): tog dang yon chab la sogs pa dang /dbang bzad dang blugs gzar dang/ dung shing dang me lta dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang mchod pa la sogs pa dang/ bdag nyid dang ji ltar 'byung ba thams cad sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis nyon mongs pa dang shes
398b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'i grib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed nas/ chos kyi dbyings rtog par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi rtse gcig tu bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sreg rjes so so 'bras bu bstan/ /ji ltar bdag gis ma bstan pa/ /bla ma'i
398b2(rgyud 'grel): lung las shes par bya/ /zhing khams dag par 'jug pa'i phyir/ /sa gzhi yongs su gzung ba yin/ /thab kyi gzhal yas khang thob 'gyur/ /mar gyis 'bras bu sman par byed/ /yam shing gis gzi brjid bskyed/ /zhung shing dpa' bo chen po ste/
398b3(rgyud 'grel): ku shas thams cad srung bar byed/ /yungs kar dkar pos zhi bar spyad/ /ma grug 'bras kyis rgyas par 'gyur/ /til gyis sdig pa thams cad bsreg /so bas dmigs pa'i dngos grub nye/ /ma shas stobs chen skyed par byed/ /nas kyis rkang mgyogs
398b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'gyur/ /dur pas tshe 'di sring bar byed/ /gro yis nang rnams zhi bar gyur/ /sgrang bcas 'o mas shes rab 'phel/ /zho zar gyis ni kun ster? 'gyur/ /me yis dngos grub brgyad po dang/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub spyir/ /yi dam gyis ni
398b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi/ /mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /lhag mas las kyi bye brag shes/ /zhi ba la sogs dngos grub yin/ /dgang gzar shes rab rang bzhin te/ /blugs gzar thabs su yang dag bshad/ /kha sbyar gcig med ye shes yin/
398b6(rgyud 'grel): de las gnyis nas? bcud mchag? pa/ /ye shes chen po'i bdud rtsir 'dod/ /sbyor ba de yis me lha mchod/ /bdag kyang de yi sbyor bas bshad/ /de ltar sbyin sreg rtsom byed na/ /de yis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim pa'o//
398b7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sbyin sreg gi mchod pa rje ? pa dang slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa brtsam par bya'o/ /de la sngags pas lha'i 'khor lo mngon sum du bltas la/ mngon gyi rim pa bzhin du mchod pas yang da par mchod de bstong nas bdud rtsi myang ba la
399a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba la sogs yongs su gzung bar bya'i don du /slob dpon bdag nyid slob ma dkyil 'khor du gtsug pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor du zhags shing rim pa ltar de bzhin pa yongs su
399a2(rgyud 'grel): blangs te/ slob dpon gyi las kyi gnad pa thob par byas la slob ma dkyil 'khor du smin par bya ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid gnyis su med pa ye shes kyi lus dkyil
399a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du dran par byas la/ de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /nam mkha' lus byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje
399a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyag chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtags pa'ang khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa//
399a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chen po dga' chen po/ bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dga' ba kun gyi mchog /gdod nas 'gro ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub
399a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po kun gyi rgyal/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal mchog gis/ /grub pa'i rdo rje tshar bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems ?/ bdag? mdzed cig /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing/ /sems can kun gyi snyin+ng la bzhugs/ /sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid/
399a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'i/ /bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog/ shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag la/ /khyod kyis 'dod pa dang rdzogs mdzad/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing
399b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzugs ? med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las yas kun tu byung/ /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan bsal bar slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shig /de nas slob dpon
399b2(rgyud 'grel): yol ba'i phyi rol du byung ste /slob ma mchog gis maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas yon gyi mchog phul la/ /zhabs la spyi bas phyag 'tshal te/ /slob dpon gyi dbang thob dang 'dod pas gsol pa gdab par bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i dbang/ /de bzhin
399b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa bdag la stsol/ /lha rnams dag pa'i khor lo ni/ /las kyi slob dpon bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dam tshig ni/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa yang dag pa/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag nyid rtag tu slob dpon bgyid zhes lan
399b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsol pa gdab dang bya'o/ /de nas gsol ba btab pa'i slob dpon gis dkyil 'khor lha la gsol gdab ste/ /sems kyis rjes su gnang ba thob par bya'o/ /bdag med 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /byang chub sems mchog bzung bya ste/ /gsang ba'i
399b5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa rab ldan nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen bor zhugs par 'tshal/ /zhes slob dpon gyis brjod nas/ /kye bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnam dag gsang pa chen po'i rigs/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i pho brang du/ /de ring khyed ni 'jug 'dod dam
399b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pa dang /slob mas kyang bka' drin chen po 'tshal zhes gsol to/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la khrus byas te/ dri zhim pos yan lag byugs la/ so rtsi la sogs pas zhal dri zhim pos bskos nas /me tog dang ras dmar pos cod
399b7(rgyud 'grel): pa na? byas la/ rab dmar pos byin gyis brlabs? la gdong g.yogs bya ste/ yon gyi mchog dang ldan pa /A khaM bI ra hUM ga sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs ba'i me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la/ /las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chu sngags de nyid kyis bsang
400a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor byas nas rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bltas la/ /sku dang spyan la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i don du yol ba'i phyi rol du dri bar bya'o/ /bde ba 'dod pa gang rin zhes dri/ /des 'di ltar gsungs
400a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ dga' ba chen po khyod la bdag bstod pas/ mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal zhes gsol nas/ me tog la sogs pas bla ma'i zhabs la mchod nas/ hUM gis drangs nas bskor ba gsum dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyis shar sgor bzhag
400a3(rgyud 'grel): nas snying gar rdo rje bzhag ste/ /oM badzra tsit+ta utpal ra ya ma zhes pas/ /rnal 'byor sems ni rab tu bskyed/ /oM su ra ta sa ma yastuM? ho(rgyud 'grel): si d+ha badzra ya ThA su kha/ zhes pas me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag la/ de nas 'di ltar brjod de/
400a4(rgyud 'grel): der khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mdzod pa rnams la sma bar ma byed cing/ /dad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la yan ma
400a5(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags sam/ Tak+kI sngags kyis slob ma bkug ste/ /A khaM bI rI sngags kyis yol ba'i nang du bcug nas/ slob mas slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad
400a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye gnas su dag gi lus dbul bar bgyi na/ /gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ /oM rdo rje slob gyi nye gnas su bdag gi lus dbul bar bgyin gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ /oM
400a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don du bdag gi lus dbul bar bgyi na/ /gzhan dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ /de ltar slob mas gsol ba dang/ de nas slob dpon gyis dam tshig gsum bsgrag pa bya'o/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyi rigs su
400?1(rgyud 'grel): par bya yis/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthod pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig /dam tshig rnams par 'gyur te re/ hUM de nas slob ma'i spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la/ 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /khyod kyi spyi bor rab bzhag pas/ /gal te tshul 'di smran ni/ /mgo bo
400?2(rgyud 'grel): tshal pa brgya ru 'gas/ /rnam par 'dzig 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag bzhugs par gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral? nas gshegs/ /de ltar
400?3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bskugs nas ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chu/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs nas/ /? podmo'i snod dang ldan pa la/ /oM badzra u da ka Tha(rgyud 'grel): Tha(rgyud 'grel): Tha(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan bdun gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ /'thung zhing khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig
400?4(rgyud 'grel): 'das na bsreg par byed/ /dam tshig gsung na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /oM badra u ra ka Tha(rgyud 'grel): Tha(rgyud 'grel): Tha(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do/ /slob dpon dam tshig bsten par bya/ /dam bcas brtan phyir 'di skad brjod/ /der phyin chad khyod kyi phyag
400?5(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje ngo yin gyis/ khas byos shig ces bya ba gang yin pa yang bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas bar ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod mi 'dra ba'i nad kyis dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur te re zhes smras la/ de nas slob mas
400?6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon la yon gyi mchog phul te gsol pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par bya mdzod cig ces brjod nas/ /de'i snying gar lo las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gru
401a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la?/ kha dog ser po gru bzhir rdo rje rtse gsum bas mtshan pa/ dbus su hUM gis byin gyis brlabs te bsgom mo/ /mgrin par chu'i dkyil 'khor baM las bskyed pa /dkar po zlum bo bum pas mtshan pa ? byin gyis brlabs
401a2(rgyud 'grel): ba bsgo so?/ /de nas spyi bor rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam las bskyed pa kha dog sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra ba bdan gyis mtshan ba/ dbus su has byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o/ /rkang pa'i 'og tu d+ha(rgyud 'grel): yi ge 'bar ba'i bdag nyid can pa'i
401a3(rgyud 'grel): steng du rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng dur ma dmar po las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa 'bar ba'i bdag nyid can bsams te /de'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang/ dril bu'i sgra sgrog? cing? dbang? par? phyog?
401a4(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): be sha ya /stam+b+hA ya ra ra ra tsa la ya hUM ha a hA? sngags 'dis bskal nas ji snyed ma phebs kyi bar du dbab par bya'o/ /yang na slob ma'i rkang ba'i 'og tu gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis thugs kar bsdul? te dbab pa bya ba'am/
401a5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gyi yi ge la dmigs te dbab par gsungs so/ /de nyid kyi des su shin tu lha'i nga rgyal gyi stobs kyis dril bu la sogs pa'i sgra dang ldan pas gar gyi rol mo byas la/ oM le le le le hUM A zhes brten cing ji srid ma ?
401a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi? bar du dbab bar bya'o/ /phebs par blta ba na 'dod chags rdo rje'i gzugs su bsams pa /de'i lce la a dmar po bsgom par bya'o/ /'dod chags rdo rje re gnas pa/ /? shig rdo rjer de m?/ /de'i rjes su nyams su myong ba dris la/ ye shes ? bas
401a7(rgyud 'grel): de la brtan pa'i chog bya'o/ /oM badzra taSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya pra ti pA li te tU hUM ho ho swAhA/ sngags 'dis ye shes brtan par gyur nas sems dpa' byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni/ de ring bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /nga yis slob ma
401b1(rgyud 'grel): bkug? byas te/ ji ltar bsod nams de bzhin lha/ /rigs kyi rim ba 'di la'o/ /rigs gang nang na 'di bzang po/ /de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor 'di la phog /de nas slob ma'i mig lam du kha dog gi rnam pa dri bar bya ste dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po'i 'od
401b2(rgyud 'grel): zer gyi rnam ba ji ltar yid la byung ba bzhin du zhi ba dang/ rgyas ba dang/ dbang dang/ drag bo'i las brtan par bya'o/ /de nas sngon du gzung ba me tog gi phreng ba hUM gi stobs dang/ /pra tIts+tsha badzra ho zhes brjod la dor bar bya ste /me tog babs ba'i tshul gyis na/
401b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub dang 'bring brtag par bya'o/ /gang zhig lha'i khyad par gyis/ /? dngos grub khyad par brtag/ babs pas sangs rgyas dbu gtsug tor/ /phyag rgya chen bo'i dngos grub ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /spyan nam zhal gyi thad kar la/ /
401b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags bzlam pa'i dngos grub grub?/ /sku yi stod du babs pa ni/ /de yi dngos grub mchog tu bshad/ /gang zhig sku smad me tog bab /dngos grub 'brid zhes thub bar gsungs/ /mchog gis sangs rgyas thob pa yin/ /'brid gis dbang phyag
401b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dang/ /yang na gter gyi dngos grub 'grub/ /rim pa 'di yis dngos grub ni/ /bdag med ma la'ang de ltar brtag/ 'khor lo'i lha rnams thams cad la/ /mngon sum du ni shes par bya/ /me tog dor ba brgya zhig la/ /gzugs las ring bar
401b6(rgyud 'grel): ? bsam ni/ /dus ? gis ni dngos grub 'grub /me tog nye na dngos grub kyang/ /dus 'di nye ba nyid du gsungs/ /gang zhig lta yi rigs rnams la/ /bab bas de yi sngags sbyor ba/ /skal ldan bdag po yin pas na/ /rigs mthun ming ni bdag
401b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dor bas lha yi mtshams su ni/ /bab? nag kha nye ba yi/ /de ni bdag po'i lha ru shes/ /me tog dor ba brgya zhig la/ /'khor lo sbabs? nas lhung ba dang/ /de la dngos grub bskal ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi yod ma yin/ /bred par ba'i mtshams su ni//
402a1(rgyud 'grel): lhung na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg la/ /sdig bsregs sbyor ba sngon 'gro bas/ /me tog dor ba bskyar par bya/ /the chos za zhing ma dad na/ /me tog dor du mi gzhug ste/ /dngos grub skal ba med pa'i phyir/ /mtshams su mnyam par lhung ba dang/ /dkyil
402a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi ni phyi rol tu/ /'phar nas lhung bar gyur pa la/ /shis pa sngon du byas nas ni/ /blo ldan gyis ni bsbyar bar bya/ /me tog dor ba thams cad du/ /pho brang dkyil du phog pa ni/ /skal dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir/ /rab 'bring bye brag nam pa ni/ /thig gi
402a3(rgyud 'grel): cha yis rab tu phye/ de lta bu yi rim pas ni/ /yang dag bab par ma gyur pas/ /lan gsum bskyar bsam phog na/ /de la gzhug pa'i skal ba med/ /me tog dor ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas me tog bab? pa'i rim pas lha'i bdag nyid shes par byas la/ me
402a4(rgyud 'grel): tog phreng ba gzung nas sngags 'di brjod de spyi bor btags la/ pra te g+hi na ha sa mi maM swa twa ma hA ba ya/ de ni me tog gi phreng ba'i dbang ngo/ /de nas stong ma'i mig la oM 'od zer dang ldan pa'i sgoms te/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng? khyod kyis/ /mig
402a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad phye mdzad de/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ ces brjod la gdong g.yogs dgrol te/ /dgyes ba rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni/ che ge mo kye dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor legs par ltos shig
402a6(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod la lha'i mtshan dang sku mdog la sogs pa rim pas bstan par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon dgyes par gyur nas slob ma la 'di skad brjod do/ /kye dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin brlabs
402a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /ma byung khyad par mthong ba'i phyir/ /bla ma la yang gus pa dang/ /dam tshig thams cad bskyed ba dang/ /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /'on kyang rdugs kyi sras su skyes/ /de nas slob mas bla
402b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal st+t/ /'di skrad brjod do/ /oM rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tu bdag bzhugs so/ /oM rnal 'byor chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po de ring mthong/ /oM g.yas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /
402b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur/ /'di ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i rim ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyi slob ma shis par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi shar skor maN+Dal gyi thog du bzhag la/ bkra shis pa'i glu 'di brjod par bya'o/ /phun sum tshogs
402b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni skyes bu rnams la zhi byed dang po'o/ /de yis nye par bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig
402b4(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skyed gu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/ /dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis chus/ /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i
402b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o/ /de nas slob ma me tog dang ldan pas gsul ba gdab par bya'o/ /byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod chen gsol
402b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /bdag kyang rab tu ? pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la rtsol/ /zhes gsol ba btab nas/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du slob ma bzhag la/ mi bskyod par dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa rdo rje'i gzugs su
402b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas/ /rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis bkang ba'i rig pa'i tshogs kyis gzung ste/ slob ma la dbang bskur bar dmigs te/ rdo rje chen por dbang bskur par/ /khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
403a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba gsum las byung nas ni/ /deng khyod la ni dbang bskur re/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis bum pa gzung ste/ dbang bskur ba/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod la 'khor lo sa ? dbang bskur ro/ /rim pa 'di ltar rnam par rgyas ba'i bum pa'o//
403a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pas ni gau? ril sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi dang/ puk+ka si la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi bum pas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni chu'i dbang ngo/ /de la slob ma rin chen rgyal por dmigs te/ de'i spyi bor gsar? la sogs
403a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbu rgyan gyis de'i rigs kyi ltar dmigs nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /gong gi sngags dang tshig gis dbang bskur zhing phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug nas dbu rgyan la bstim? mo/ /'di ni mnyam pa nyid gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin de ?
403a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyi dbang ngo/ /de nas slob ma snang ba mdza' yas kyi gzugs su dmigs so/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa la snang ba mdza' yas bskyed la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /mi phyed rdo rje 'od gsal ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi/ /dam tshig 'gyur? gnas skor
403a5(rgyud 'grel): byung pa/ /rdo rje 'di ni gzung bar gyis/ zhes pa dang/ spyi bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying ga dang/ rgyab tu gtugs nas lag tu rdo rje byin te/ sngon bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /des so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rdo rje'i dbang ngo/ /de nas slob mngon yod
403a6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i gzugs su dmigs la dril bu don yod grub par bskyed de/ lag ba g.yon par byin pa dang/ rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa'i lag pas kun nas 'khyud de/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa d+hi twaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod la/ sngon bzhin dbang
403a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bya ba thub pa'i ye shes te dril bu'i dbang ngo/ /rdo rje dang dril bu yongs su dkrol nas bdag po'i dbang bskur te/ slob ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs la/ rdo rje dang dril bu spyi bor gzung ste/ oM badzra satwa stwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra nA ma b+hi
403b1(rgyud 'grel): She ke Ta zhes brjod nas dbang bskur te kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ming gi dbang bskur bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ming 'di zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'char du 'gyur ro/ /de ni chos kyi dbyibs kyi ? kyi rang bzhin gyi dbang ro/ /dbang de dag gis sngags
403b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyud rtan pa dang/ bsgrub par bya ba'i cho ga thams cad gnang ba dang/ sgrub thabs la sogs pa thams cad bshad par gnang ngo/ /de dag gis ni sgrub pa po'i dbang ste/ rig pa'i dbang lnga'o/ /rig pa ni ma rig pa spangs shing ye shes lnga thob pas na rig pa'i
403b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang ngo?/ /gang dang gang dag snang ba ni/ /rang bzhin gtso bo he ru ka /chos ni so sor dag ba ste/ sangs rgyas ye shes de ltar blta/ /rig dbang thun mong byang chub ste/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /khyad par byang chub thob mi 'gyur/ /de la ma 'ongs pa'i
403b4(rgyud 'grel): dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod pas slob dpon gyi? dbang blang bar bya ste/ thun mong gi sdom pa dang ldan pas/ khyad par gyi slob dpon gyi sdom pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste/ lung bstan pa dang rjes su gnang ba ni ma
403b5(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang gang zag gi khyad par gyi mos pa'i snga nas lung bstan pa dang dbugs dbyung ba yang ji ltar rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su lung bstan pa dang dbugs dbyung ba tsam
403b6(rgyud 'grel): ? zhing ? nam yin no/ /zhes slob dpon kha gcig gis de ltar gsungs/ /gzhan yang slob dpon kha cig gi ni mos pa gtso bor byas te rjes su gnang ba yang sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad lngas sbyin par gsungs so/ /
403b7(rgyud 'grel): don/ /?? rang rang gi lnga'i phyag rgya la bslab st+te/ ? ba'i sngags sam snying po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la slob ma ? gnang ba sbyin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid 'gyur ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di la bdag gis ni/ /? khyod yan dag gzhug
404a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pa'i chogs/ /khyod la rjes su gnang ba sbyin/ /de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang gi thugs/ /rig pa 'di ni bdag gis bzung/ /zhes brjod pa dang /rjes su gnang ba'i
404a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags la bzlas ba brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ slob dpon gyis slob ma la bsgo ba/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dang ye shes dang bdag gi de kho na nyid mi shes pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid mi shes pa dang/ dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba la ston par ?
404a3(rgyud 'grel): cig/ khyod dang gang la bstan pa de nyid chags sdang gis zhugs shing bstan pa yin pas nad myal bar nges par ltung bar 'gyur ro/ zhes slob ma la bsgo bar bya'o/ /rig pa'i dbang gi yan lag gi cho ga'o/ /de nas slob mas rig pa'i dbung thob pa dang slob
404a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon kyi sdom pa ga drung? nas/ bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas yon phyi mchog phul te gsol ba gdab bar bya'o/ /byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar gsol ba ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu bskyab? pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la
404a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsal/ zhes gsol ba yan lag gsum du btab nas/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar sgor pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris pa'i steng du khyad par gyi khri bshams nas/ der slob ma bzhag la/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal
404a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dang ldan pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer nam mkha' i khams su spros te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad nye ru ka'i skur bsgoms te/ mchod pa'i khyad par rnams dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sgra sna tshogs dang/
404a7(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis kyi glu sna tshogs brjod pa dang ldan pas spyan drangs te/ de dag gis rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis bkang ba thogs nas dbang bskur bar dmigs la/ tshig 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rang
404b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi/ /gsang ba gsum ldan dbang mchog 'di/ /khyod la yang ni sbyin par bya'o/ zhes brjod nas pad+ma'i snor ? la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas
404b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar slob ma la dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang/ lta'i de kho na nyid dang/ /slob dpon gyi las dang bya ba bstan par bya'o/ /snying po rnam par dag pa len pa dang/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su gzung ba dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir dkyil
404b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ro/ /sems kyi snang ba rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir gzhal yas khang ngo// //sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyir gru bzhi'o/ /byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyi rnam par dag pas thag bzhi'o/ /chos
404b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran pas thig go/ /bden pa'i sku log par blta ba dang/ dman pa'i log par blta ba dang/ tshul khrims la 'jug pa log par blta ba dang/ /nga? dag pa las log par blta ba spangs pa'i phyir/ ma bran gyi thig rnams so/ /sdom pa dang sems can gyi don byed pa dang
404b5(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i chos skur pa ste/ de dag gi tshogs kyi rnam par dag pa ni rgyan sna tshogs pa'o/ /dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi sems kha dog lnga'o/ mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa spong ba ni shar phyogs kyi rtabs? so/ /mi dge
404b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ma skyes pa mi ? pa ni lho phyogs kyi rta babs so/ /dge pa'i chos mi skyes bskyed pa ni nub phyogs kyi rta babs so/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa bsrung ba ni byang phyogs kyi rta babs so/ /lus dang/ tshor ba dang sems dang chos dran ba nye bar gzhag pa'i rnam par dag
404b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni 'dod yon gyi snam? bu'o/ /bzod pa dang chos dang don dang sngags yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam par dag pas ni/ lha mas? la gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshigs gru ma gar ma'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa ni shar gyi sgo'o/ /mtshan ma med ba'i rnam par thar
405a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni lho'i sgo'o/ /smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni nub kyi sgo'o/ /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni byang gi sgo'o/ /spyod ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba ni shar phyogs kyi rin po che'i ga rten gnyis so/ /brtson 'grus dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
405a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni lho phyogs kyi rin po che'i ka rten gnyis so/ /sems dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni nub phyogs kyi rin po che'i ka rten gnyis so/ /'dun pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni byang phyogs kyi rin po che'i ka rten gnyis so/ /kun la snyoms par brtse ba dang bsod nams dang ye shes
405a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i phyir bum pa gang ba'o/ /dran pa dang chos rnam par 'byed pa dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang btang po nas rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa
405a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ting nge 'dzin pa/ shes rab yongs su rtogs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam gyi ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa ni rlung yab po/ /nyon mongs pa'i sa bon bcom pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa dang bral te dra ba'o/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcom zhing bral ba ste dra ba phyed ba'o
405a5(rgyud 'grel): me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs ba'i rnam par dag ba ni me long ngo/ /'gro ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bor dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir dang/ /'khor ba'i skyon gnyis ma gos pa'i phyir pad+ma'o/ /sems can thams cad las 'byung ba'i so so yang dag par ma skyes
405a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam par dag pa ni ? ba'o/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i shes rab ye shes ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par lam du khyer ba'i phyir dang/ gzugs la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa spangs
405a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir na 'dod yon kyi snam bu'o/ /chos kyi dbyings shin? tu rnam par dag ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa yin pa'i phyir mchod pa'i khyad par ro/ /bag yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa'i phyir/ sna tshogs ba'i ral gris brgyan pa'o/ /'dul bas khyad par du byas ba'i chos
405b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mdo sde dang dbyang su sbyan pa'i sde dang/ lung du bstan pa'i sde dan/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dagn/ ched du brjod pa'i sde dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang/ skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang/ de ltar gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par
405b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa ni rlung gis bskyed pa'i bden la dril bu'i sgra sgrog pa'o/ /sha'i spyan dang/ lha'i sbyin dang/ shes rab kyi spyan dang/ chos kyi spyan dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi rnam par dag pa ni pany+tsa ra kha'o/ /de ltar bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi de khon nyid kyang
405b3(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /gzhan yang khyad par 'di yod de/ yan dag pa'i lte ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i dga' ba dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' o ? dag pa'i 'tshe bdag yang dag ba'i rtsal ? yang dag pa'idran pa dag yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ?
405b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ba'i lag yan lag brgyad kyis rnam par dag pa ni ka brgyad do/ /thams cad du bcing ba lnga rnam par grol ba'i phyir dang/ rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje lta bu'i lam gyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskyor ba'i phyir ka ba brgyad kyi steng du rdo rje'i
405b5(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bdag med par mtshon pa'i phyir dur khrod chen po brgyad do/ /dkyil 'khor kyi de kho h+na nyid do/ /gzugs kyi skye mched dang ? rang bzhin so so'i rnam par dag pa ni gau rI'o/ /sgra'iskye mched dang thugs kyi orang
405b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin so so'i rnam par dag pa'i?/ ?skye mched dang gsung gi rang bzhin so so'i rnam par dag pa ni ro langs ma'o/ /ro'i skye mched dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin so so'i rnampar dag pa ni g+ha sma rI'o/ /sa'i khams dang sku'i de khon nyid kyi ye shes kyi
405b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa ni puk+ka sI'o/ /chu'i khams dang gsung gi de khon nyid kyi ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa ni sha ba rI'o/ /me'i khams dang thugs kyi de khon nyid kyi ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa ni tsoN+Da lA'i'o/ /rlung gi khams dang de khon nyid kyi ye shes kyis 
406a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa ni DoM pi tsI'o/ /ci ltar gsungs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i bras bu dang/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bdag nyid dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o/ /bdag med pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni reg
406a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skye mched dang/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin ni sa sbyong ma'o/ /chos kyi skye mched dang dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab kyi stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni mkhas spyod ma'o/ /dang pa'i
406a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i rang bzhin ni gau rI'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin tso? rI'o/ /dran pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin ni bet+tA lI'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'i rang bzhin g+hasma rI'o/ /rab tu dga' ba dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ 'od byed pa'i rang bzhin ni puk+ka
406a4(rgyud 'grel): sI'o/ 'od 'phro ba dang/ sbyar? dka' ba dang mngon du gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis ni sha ba rI'o/ /ring du song ba dang mi g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gyis ni tsaN+DA lI'o/ /legs pa'i blo gros dang chos kyi sprin gyi rang bzhin ni Do bi nI'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po
406a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mig gi skye mched dang gti mug chen po rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rdo rje ma'o/ /tshor ba'i phung po dang/ sna'i skye mched dang nga rgyal chen po dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni
406a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i gau rI ma'o/ /'du shes kyi phung po dang lce'i dbang po dang/ /'dod chags chen po rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni chu'i rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'du byed kyi phung po dang lus kyi skye mched dang phra dog
406a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bya ba grub? pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang/ yid kyi skye mched dang zhe sdang chen po dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni bdag med ma'o
406b1(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni lha'i de kho na nyid do/ /phyi dang nang gis yongs sbyang ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon gyis las dang bya ba'o/ /de nas dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa ni rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi snod du rung ba yin te/ rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags
406b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ ye shes lnga ldan rdo rje ni/ /khyod la yang dag sbyin par bya/ /hUM gis thugs kar yang dag gzung/ /gsung rnams sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ /rtog pa med pas sna tshogs sgra/ /brjod ba'i yul las rnam par 'das/ /dril bu gsung gi rang bzhin te/ /da? ni khyod kyis
406b3(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar gyis/ /'di ni gsung gi dam tshig pas/ yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): yis yang dag gzung/ thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud/ /mi phyed rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid/ /'khyud pa phyag rgya chen po ste/ /'di ni sku yi dam tshig yin/ /yi ge oM byis yang dag gzung/ /de
406b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar dam tshig gsum ldan na/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya/ /yi ge hUM las skyes pa yi/ /rgyu 'bras rdo rje sems rang bzhin/ /chog tshang nas slob ma sbyin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i lag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu
406b5(rgyud 'grel): 'char/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i brtul shugs brtan/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ khyod kyis rtag tu char bar gyis/ /'di dag brjod nas
406b6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i lag tu sbyin par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya e Sha twAM d+har ya mi/ /hi hi hi hi hUM/ 'dis rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug ste/ rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan pa'o/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab sgra yi rjes 'grod bshad//
406b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis kyang ne rtog tu bcad/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed/ /chos kyi sgra ni khyod kyis bsgrogs/ /srid pa rang bzhin gyis dge phyir/ /ngo bo med pa dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag la sems dpa' rnams/ /dam ba'i srid pa byed par shog/ de dag gis
407a1(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin te/ dril bu'i de kho na nyid 'dzin du bcug la ? khar bya'o/ /de nas lhag pa'i lha'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la/ gzugs sogs su yi dam tshig gis/ /gsang sngags
407a2(rgyud 'grel): Fmtshang med par bzla/ /rang gi rig pa'i ngo bo ste/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum bzhugs pa yi/ /khyod kyis oM gyis gzung bar kyis/ /de ltar khon nyid gsum bstan to/ /de nas phyag rgya drug gis dbang bskur la/ lung bstan ba'o/ /bdag nyid gtso bo?
407a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal du byas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing mngon sum du byas la/ lag pa g.yon ba'i khu tshur gyis chos gos kyi tha ma snying gar gzung ste/ lag pa g.yas pa skyabs sbyin du byas la/ shar la sogs pa'i go rims kyis lung bstan par?
407a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ oM rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ /mgrin pa gcig tu lung bstan to/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i mdza' nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid
407a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ngan 'gro rnams las 'gros/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa che ge? mo zhes bya ba 'di/ /ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha b+hur b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar rigs bzhi'i rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang las kyi bdag nyid du lung bstan to/ /de yi dbang bskur gyur pa yi//
407a6(rgyud 'grel): grags? pa 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid la/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu/ /bde gshegs kyis kyang lung bstan mdzod/ /de la 'di ltar bstan te/ sngags dang phyag rgya yis rdo rje 'chad gi go 'phang du gyur pa'i phyir//
407a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya ba'i lung bstan ba'o/ /de nas dam tshig gsum dang ldan par? dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ gsang mchog dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur bas/ /sdig pa kun las nges par grol/ /khyed rnams de nyid legs par gnas
407b1(rgyud 'grel): bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba la sogs med/ /mi tshugs pa dang mchog 'bras bu/ /cis kyang mi tshugs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /dam pa'i srid pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sngon pa'i
407b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i/ /byang
407b3(rgyud 'grel): chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa/ /dam pa'i chos ni mi spang zhing/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa la/ /tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub kyis ni ma gdungs shing//
407b4(rgyud 'grel): ci bde bar ni gzung bar bya/ /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su mi dor zhing/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas tshul mtshungs bla ma yi/ /slob dpon la ni gang smod pa
407b5(rgyud 'grel): de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nang/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi chad pa dang/ /gnod dang log 'dren gtum po yas/ /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar lhung/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/
407b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon blo ? che/ /dge ba rab tu mi sbyoms pa/ /nam yang smod bar mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni bus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod kyis dbul bar bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rang gi dam
407b7(rgyud 'grel): tshig bsrung?/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de phul sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu phul ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de phul bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog thob
408a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyod nye bar 'bras bur gnas/ /dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par/ /deng khyod 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis deng? khyon
408a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal chen po/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ grong khyer mchog tu rab tu bzhugs/ /khyod rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid thob par the tshom med/ /de ltar yang ni
408a3(rgyud 'grel): rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde chen bsten par gyis/ /dong 'dir 'gro ba myur te rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dam tshig bcu bzhi bstan/ /de ltar slob ma mnyes
408a4(rgyud 'grel): shin pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /gtso bos 'di ltar bka' stsal ba'i/ /gsung gi re? bzhin bka' bgyid do/ /zhes pa ni dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa'o/ /de nas rjes su gnang pa sbyin pa ni/ /de nas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
408a5(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi thur ma lang sngags te/ bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer dang mtshungs par ye shes kyi mig sman gyis mig dbye bar brtsam par bya'o/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /mig gis rab rib nyes pa rnams/ /ji ltar sman mkhan rgyal po ltar/ /de
408a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /sbyor bar ? bsal bar bya/ /oM badzra nai ta ya a ba ha ra pha Ta la h+rA(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i mig gnyis la mchog gi yi ge bsams la/ thur ma dang 'od zer gyis bsal bar bya'o/ /oM badzra sa twa zhes pas de nas me long
408a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan la/ /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas
408b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ /'di ltar chos rnams thams cad shes /rang bzhin med cing gzhi med pas/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /skyob pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de nas dril bu dkrol zhing me long gi gzugs brnyan bstan la/ /chos thams cad kyi de kho na
408b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'di ltar shes par gyis shig /ces bka' bsgol tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor phyir/ /kun gyi mchog ni mnyam nyid gsal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
408b3(rgyud 'grel): me long ltod/ /dag cing gsal ba dri ma med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di yin par shes par gyis shig/ ces brjod
408b4(rgyud 'grel): la me long snying gar gtug go/ de nas ho las skyes pa'i gzhu lag tu byin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su bsgrubs shig/ bdud bzhi rnam par 'dul bar gyis shig/ ces mgo la phyogs bzhir gzhir gzhu bzhi dgang bar bya'o/ /steng dang
408b5(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu yang ngo/ /de nas oM badzra he ru kra mi zhes pas 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du bzhag la oM badzra b+ha Sha rAM zhes pas dud lag pa g.yas su sbyin/ dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po las glegs bam dang/ dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las dril
408b6(rgyud 'grel): bur gyur ba las lag pa g.yon du byin la 'di skad brjod do/ /'di nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor par gyi shig/ de ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ /skyobs pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor/
408b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dud? ni bla med pa/ /kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis mchog/ 'jig rten 'di la rab tu bsgrogs/ /de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la/ /phan
409a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang/ /kun tu khyod la srung bar byed/ /gzhan yang go rims ji lta ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i spyod pa dang ldan par byas la/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /'jig rten khams?
409a2(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad du/ /ji ltar ji ltar 'dul 'byur ba'i/ /de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang/ /rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ /'phrin las 'khor lo rnams go rims/ /tshigs bshad 'di yi rim pa las/ /shlo ka ni lnga po yis/ /rjes su
409a3(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba sbyin pa'o/ /de la brtul zhugs pa la sogs pa'i rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'i bar du dbang bzhi pa rdzogs nas sbyin zer ba yang yod do/ /de la skabs 'dir ni bzhi ba'i rim pa'i sngon du 'gro zhes gsungs so/ /de nas slob ma la bsang gtor la sogs pa byas
409a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ slob dpon rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs byas la/ /slob ma'i lag pa g.yas bar ni/ /phyag gdub sngags kyi bsrung pa gdags/ /steng du gdugs ni gzung bya ste/ /rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor bskor ba gsum byas la//
409a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya drug gis dbang bskur la/ /de ring 'di ltar slob ma yis/ /rgyud kyi don rnams 'dzin 'gyur te/ /gdugs bsal nas ni slob ma la/ /gzer? bstod? phyir ni 'di skad brjod/ /da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur//
409a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chog bzhin/ /nan tan skyed de bri bar bye sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/ /de nas rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas
409a7(rgyud 'grel): nas sngags 'di khyod la sbyin/ /sngags 'di rgyal ba kun la nye/ /zhes brjod la sbyin bar bya'o/ /slon mas kyang bcom ldan bdag gis legs par gzung/ /sngags kyi dngos sgrub nye bar 'gyur/ /sngags? gzung? ste bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma phyag rgya bzhi bstan
409b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyir/ /'di skad brjod do/ /khyed kyi dus 'di nas gzung ste/ phyag rgya bzhi mi shes pa 'am/ phyag rgya gcig mi shes pa la/ /phyag rgya gcig kyang bstan par ma byed cig ces bsgo'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /sems can dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba dang dkyil 'khor dang
409b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyal rjes su ma zhugs pa'i phyir/ /yob? ba'i 'bras bu la the tshom du gyur pa yin pas de dag la bstan par mi bya'o/ /gal te bstan par byas na sgro 'dogs dang skur ba'i rang bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir/ /mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ba yin pas na/ de lta bu?
409b3(rgyud 'grel): la ston par ma kyang? cig ces bsgo'o/ /'di dag ni thun mong gi slob dpon gyi dbang ngo/ /khyad par gyi lag pa rdo rje dril ldan pas shes rab dril bu de nyid ni/ bcu drug lon pa'i shes rab tu/ /dmigs te lag bas legs 'khyud nas/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs
409b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa/ /de ni slob dpon yin par bshad/ /de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa slob dpon gyi dbang ngo/ /slob dpon gyi dbang de nyid ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes kyang bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang zhes kyang bya'o/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i slob dpon
409b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbang zhes bya'o/ /de la rig pa'i dbang dang slob dpon gyi dbang gis ni bum pa'i dbang zhes bya ste/ dbang thams cad kyi dus su khyad par dang thun mong gi bum pas dbang bskur ba'i phyir bum pa'i dbang zhes bya'o/ /des ni lus kyi sgrib pa dag cing/ sku'i dbang thob pa dang/ sprul ba'i
409b6(rgyud 'grel): sku'i rang bzhin yin pas bum pa'i dbang zhes bya'o/ /slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug gis/ /slob dpon dbang bskur tshar nas ni/ /gsang dbang skal ldan gang zhig la/ /de la dam tshig sbyin bya ste/ /mchog gi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug/ mi la sogs pa'i sha lnga dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga nyid
409b7(rgyud 'grel): bsten byas na/ /dkyil pa rdo rje'i dngos grub thob/ /gzhan gyis srog kyang bcad par bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bya zhing/ /ma byin bar yang blang bya ste/ /gzhan gyi bud med rta ba tu bsten/ /sems ni rtse gcig brtan bya ste/ /ma rig las 'byung sems 'khrul bsad/ /dngos
410a1(rgyud 'grel): kun rang bzhin med pa'ang/ /'jig rten sgrol phyir brdzun du smra/ /rang gi bde ba mi spod zhing/ /rtogs dka' i ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ /ma byin pa nyid blang ba yin/ /spros? bral ma skyes btsun mo ni/ /rtogs pas gzhan gyi bud med bsten/ /yang dag rdzogs
410a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /de dag dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /bzang po mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /dam tshig de dag legs par gzung/ /da nas mtshad pa rnam lnga yis/ /khyad par kun dang ldan byas la/ /dngos grub sdom pa ldan ba'i phyir/ /slob dpon gyis ni slob ma mchod//
410a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dam tshig sbyin pa yin/ /de nas slob mas slob dpon la/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo phul nas no/ /slob mas rig pa brgyad po 'di/ /ma bdang srid mo nyid dang ni/ /bu mo dang ni tsha mo dang/ /de bzhin zhing po'i chung ma dang/ /ma yi spun zla sgyug mo dang/ /de bzhin pha yi s? mo nyid
410a4(rgyud 'grel): rig ma brgyad du rab tu grags/ /lha mo brgyad kyi rang bzhin te/ /bsgrubs na dngos grub 'byin pa'o/ /de nas rig ma brgyad po de dag dang mi ldan na/ rigs lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur ba'i rig ma rdo rjes la sogs pa gang dang ldan pa dbul bar bya'o/ /gar ma chos ma ? mo
410a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gtum mo dang ni bram ze mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las skyes/ /rig pa ltar ni rab tu bshad/ /de dag rnal 'byor pas mchod bya/ /dam du 'khyud dang lo byas te/ /de la chags pa'i rol pa bya/ /rdo rje padmo sbyor ba yis/ /der ni chag ni?  bya ste/ /sha dang? sha
410a6(rgyud 'grel): chen bza' bar bya/ /de la btung ba'i ston mo sbyin/ /de nas yang ni mchod par bya/ /de nas thun tshad gnyis pa la/ /slob ma nang du gzhug par bya/ /rang? kyis mig ni dag pa byas la/ /sbyis ni dkyil 'khor bstan byas te/ /sa lu skyes mchod sbyar ba dang/ /chang gis rnal 'byor
410a7(rgyud 'grel): ma mchod bya/ /bde chen dum bu gcig par na/ /bdud rtsi dang bcas chang gis bkang/ /skal ldan chen pos slob dpon dang/ /sngon pa nyid la mchod byas te/ /bdag kyid? dgyes pa chen po yis/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni btung bar bya/ /sbyin dang len pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad+ma lta bu gyi
410b1(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal yin/ /ma dang tsha mo sgyug mo dang/ /zhang po'i chung ma dag la ni/ /mchod na dngos grub myur du thob/ /sems la rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i tshogs la spyod de/ rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor
410b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tshogs thams cad 'dod pa'i rol bas yongs su spyod de/ mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad dang ldan pas rdo rje'i glu la sogs pa'i dgyes pa'i sbyong pa thams cad rdzogs na bar byas nas/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bsdus te/ de nas yol ba la sogs pas sa
410b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dpen par byas la/ bla re dang rlung yab kyis phyogs bzhir brgyan par byas la/ bde zhing 'jam pa'i stan bting ste/ sa phyogs de dri zhim po'i spos dang mar me phyogs bzhir bltam par bya'o/ /de lta bur slob dpon dang las kyi phyag rgya bzhugs te/ rig med
410b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'am/ slob dpon gang la dang ba ni skra 'jam zhing 'khyil ba dang/ zhal mdzes shing dri zhim por byugs pa dang mig dkyus ring ba dang/ mdog sngo bas? su gyur pa nu pa'i mtshams 'brel ba dang/ ro stod che zhing rked skabs 'phra ba dang
410b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan pa dang/ rigs mtho zhing snying rje dang ldan pa dang brtan zhing dbang dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bdag nyid dang mi 'bral ba/ sna tshogs pa'i gis dan rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ si hA? dang ga pur byugs la/ yang na ji ltar rnyed
410b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rig mgo bcu gnyis lon pa 'am/ lo bcu drug pa'am/ slob mas slob dpon la phul la de lta bu'i rigs yongs sugyur ste/ khyad par gyi ras dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan zhing/ khyad par gyi phyug pa yid 'phrog pas las la byugs te/ bde ba bsgrub
410b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don du 'gyur par byas la/ de nas rig pa dang ldan pa'i slob dpon mthong mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang/ 'dugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dang khril bu dang/ sna tshogs pa'i ras dang/ rgyan sna tshogs dang/ chang dang/ sha la sogs ba de lta bu'i mchod pa sna 
411a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi khyad par gyis mchod nas bstod pa bya ste/ kye kye gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ /zhi ba chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor mchog 'gyur te/ /phyag rgya che dang gnyis med pa'i/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bdag las skyes/ /yang dag
411a2(rgyud 'grel): don mchog khyod lta bus/ /bdag kyang gtso bo'i bka' drin phyis/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'dam nas ni/ /'dren pa khyod kyis bskyab bar mdzod/ /ces gsol te/ de nas slob dpon gyis/ rig ma la tshems kyis ma mchu bzhib par byas te/ nu ma gnyis lag
411a3(rgyud 'grel): bas gzung nas pad+ma'i nang du lag pas reg la/ rkang pa gnyis phrag gong du bzhag ste/ 'dod pa mthar phyin par spyod cing bde ba rgyas par bya'o/ /ji srid bde ba ma 'phel gyi bar du kundu ru'i 'debs bsgrub par bya'o/ /de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid rtogs par
411a4(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ bde ba skye ba'i dus su/ kye? bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod nas/ /lha'i rnal 'byor mngon du byas la/ shes rab ma dang slob ma'i gdong bcings nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu bas gang ba/ /zla ba lta bur rgyas pa/
411a5(rgyud 'grel): kunda? ru'i sbyor bas rdo rje nor bu'i nang du phyin pa dang/ rgad po dang ming med kyis gzung nas slob ma'i khang dbab par bya'o/ /de nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ bde ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /byang chub
411a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' sras bcas la/ /dam pa'i don du dbang bskur sbyin/ /de bzhin bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang/ /bskur ba bzhin du legs par gzung/ /de nas slob mas legs par brtags te/ thob pa dang/ oM haM su khaM a ho su khaM zhes brjod par
411a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas lce'i lam nas ci lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log? pas thob par bya'o/ /rig ma yang gcer bur gnas te /rdo rje dang pad+ma las byung ba'i slob ma la kundu rus sbyin pa'i rim pas sbyin par bya'o/ /des ni dag gnyis bdag cing gsung gi dbang thob
411b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i rang bzhin yin pa la/ gsang pa'i dbang gi rim pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi slob ma shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ rig ma de nyid dam/ gzhan dag la byas nas/ ji ltar sngon bzhin kundu ru'i sbyor ba dang ldan par byas la/ slob
411b2(rgyud 'grel): ma yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon langs te/ slob ma chen po'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang/ khro ba dang phrag dog spangs par bltas la rig ma sbyin bar bya'o/ /mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /slob
411b3(rgyud 'grel): ma rjes su gnang ba sbyin/ /khyod ni snying rje snying brtser ldan/ /sems chen ldan pa 'di zung zhig /kundu ru sbyor dag ldan pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mchog dang gnas chen sbyin lha mo/ /sna tshogs gzugs te yid 'grog ma/ /zung zhig zung
411b4(rgyud 'grel): zhig sems chen mo/ /zung ste mchod pa de nyid sbyor/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i lag tu rig ma gtad la/ /de la dga' ba skye ba ste/ /skad cig dbye bas dbye bar hUM/ /skad cig shes pas bde ba shes/ /e baM rnam pas rab tu gnas/ /dang por
411b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba tsam yin te/ /dam par dga' ba gnyis pa yin/ /dga' bral dga' ba gsum par shes/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes de bzhin/ /cung zad dga' ba bde ba ste/ /dam par dga' bde bas lhag /dga' bral dga' ba chags bral yin/ /lhan cig
411b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa kun dang bral/ /dang por reg par 'dod pa ste/ /gnyis pa bde ba 'dod pa'o/ /gsum pa 'dod chags 'joms pa nyid/ /de nas bzhi pa bsgom par bya/ /dang por dga' ba srid par brjod/ /'dod chags bral phyir mya ngan 'das/ /bar ma dga' ba tsam
411b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid de/ /de dag rnam sbyangs lhan cig skyes/ /sna tshogs ba dang rnam par sbyin/ /de bzhin rnam nyid mtshan nyid bral/ /skad cig bzhi la brten nas ni/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes kyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du mar brjod/ /'khyud dang 'o byad la sogs pa'o/ /rnam
412a1(rgyud 'grel): pad smin pa de las gzhan/ /bde ba za ba'i ye shes so/ /rnam par nyid la rtog pa ste/ /bdag gi bde ba bden pa'o/ /mtshan nyid bral ba de las gzhan/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /dang por dga' ba rnam sna tshogs/ /dam pa'i dga' 
412a2(rgyud 'grel): ba rnam par smin/ /dga' bral dga' ba rnam par nyid/ /lhan cig skyes dga' mtshan nyid bral/ /chags pa ma yin chabs bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa/ /gsum po spangs pa'i bdag nyid na/ /lhan cig skyes pa yin par bshad/ /dga' bral pa
412a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs rab brtags te/ dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid kyang/ /dga' bral dang ni mchog dga' dbus/ /lhan cig skyes pa der gnas te/ /stong dang stong min he ru ka/ 'di dag bgrang ba'i rim pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul gyis dga' bral gyi dbus su lhan cig
412a4(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa brtag par bya'o/ /de nas rig ma khyad par can gyis sgrub pa po la bltas te/ 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /dri tshan dri chu zab 'di/ /bu khyod kyis ni nus sam ci/ /su ba khrag dang de bzhin du/ /rtag tu bu med gus pa dang/ /bdag gi pad+ma pa ni bzhig /ji
412a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar bde ba bu khyod smos/ /sgrub pa pos kyang 'di skad brjod/ /lha mo bdag gis cis mi nus/ /khu ba khrag sogs bza' ba dang/ /rtag tu bud med gus bgyid dang/ /lha ga la ni 'o bgyid do/ /de nas dga' ba chen po thob par gyur te/ /gos dang phra? la/ gur
412a6(rgyud 'grel): gum dang gla rtsi dang tsandan la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos bsdus te/ dri rim pos me tog gi phreng bcod pan du byas te/ ji ltar chu skyes dri mas ma gos pa ltar/ nang gi chu skyes kha phye ba ltar bstan la/ shes rab mas 'di brjod de/ e ma ho(rgyud 'grel): bde ba thams cad dang
412a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ /bdag gi pad+ma rmad byung la/ /gang zhig cho gas mnyes byed pa/ /de yi mdun du bdag ni 'dug /yang dag sangs rgyas mnyes byed phyir/ /ji ltar pad+ma'i don gyis shig /de nyid bde chen rgyal po 'di/ /'di yi gnas na rtag tu bzhugs/ /bde chen dmar
412b1(rgyud 'grel): thig bsnyen par gyis/ /kha yi chu skyes kyis ni'o/ /b+hany+tsa mok+Sha ho/ /de nas sgrub pa pos man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon dang phyag mtshan gyi sbyor bas bdag med ma'i gzugs su bsam mo/ /de'i snying ga dang /mgrin pa dang/ spyi bor hUM A:aoM rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsam par
412b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dang pad+ma dag par bya'o/ /oM pad+ma su khA d+ha ra/ ma hA dad su khaM/ d+ha ra tsa tu rA nan+ta/ b+ha gI swA hUM hUM karyaM shwa me/ oM badzra mahA dwe kha/ tsa turA nanda ya ka khag mu khi? ka ro so TA tha hUM hUM ka rwaM ku ru Shwa me/ 'di dag gis dag par bya ste/ shin tu bde ba mtshan
412b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing bskyed pa'i don du blta ba dang/ rgod pa dang/ lag changs dang 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan par byas la/ bdag med ma'i pad+ma'i dbus su rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid lce'am lag pa'i sbyor bas btsal bar bya ste/ ji srid bde ba ma rgyas kyi bar du bsgrub bas bya'o/ /de
412b4(rgyud 'grel): la blta ba la sogs pa ni tshogs dang/ sbyor lam dang/ mthong ba dang/ bsgom pa dang khyad par mthar phyin pa'i lam gyi bar du bar mchad par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur pa ni bla ma'i man ngag rgyud pa'i rim pa las shes par bya'o/ /nor
412b5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i rtse mor phyin pa'i byang chub kyi sems de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dbang po thams cad kyis rnam par grol ba yul med pa'i dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir don dam pa'i lhan cig skyes pa mtshon par byed pa ste/ dpe'i lhan cig skyes
412b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs/ /bla ma'i man ngag dang goms pa dang/ mnan pa'i sbyor ba dang/ rlung gi rnam par rgyal ba dang phyi rol gyi gzungs ma la rlung kha sbyong du bya ste/ bsten par byas nas don dam pa lhan cig skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gzungs ma dang mi ldan
412b7(rgyud 'grel): na long spyod rdzogs pa'i brlabs pa? sbyong bas bzhi pa bskur par bya'o/ /yang 'di ltar gsungs te/ ji srid rnal 'byor pa dag gis/ /byang chub sems ni ma 'ongs par/ /de thob par chad med pa ste/ ci zhig dga' ba bde chen yin/ /byang chub sems ni 'phos pa na//
413a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thams cad dag gi gnas/ /phung po rnam shes nyams 'gyur te/ /de yi dngos grub sdug bsngal yin/ /de yi rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ yang dag ga bur spang mi bya/ /lag dang dung dang nya phyis kyis/ /blang bar ? ba ma
413a2(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi lce yis blang/ /des ni stobs dang bde bskyed des/ /de nas blo ldan langs nas ni/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /ston pas gsungs pa sems dpa' che/ /yang dag dam pa dga' thob par/ /sna tshogs rten spangs skad cig
413a3(rgyud 'grel): pa?/ bde ba chen po gzung bar bya/ /ji srid byang chub mthar thug tu/ /sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhi ba rgyas pa la sogs pas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dbang po gnyis sbyor las lnga 'byung/ /'byung pa lnga yi rang bzhin//
413a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba chen po gcig nyid ?/ /dbye ba lngar mi 'gyur ba ste/ /rdo rje pad+mar rab sbyor gyis/ /reg pas sra ba'i bag chags so/ /sra ba gti mug chos yin phyir/ /gti mug rnam par snang mdzad do/ /gang phyir byang chub sems gsher? bas/ /gsher
413a5(rgyud 'grel): ba chu yi khams su 'dod/ /? bskyod rang bzhin phyir/ /zhe sdang la ni mi bskyod bdag /gnyi ga yang dag rab sbyor bas/ /drod ni rtag tu skye ba yin/ /drod las 'dod chags 'byung ba ste/ /'dod chags rdo rje 'od dpag med/ /pad+ma la gnas
413a6(rgyud 'grel): sems ni gang/ /gang yin ? ni rlung gi tshul/ /phrag dog don yod grub pa yin/ /don yod rlung? las yang dag 'byung/ /bde ba 'dod chags khrag min te/ /khrag ni nam mkha' i mtshan nyid do/ /nam mkha' ser sna'i mtshan nyid do/ /ser sna rdo rje nam mkha' nyid/
413a7(rgyud 'grel): sems chen po ni gcig nyid la/ /lnga yi gzugs su brtag pa'o/ /rigs ni lnga las 'byung ba ni/ /de la stong phrag du ma'i'o/ /de phyir 'di ni rang bzhin gcig /rtag tu bde chen dam pa'o/ /'di nyid ye shes chen po ste/ /thams cad lus la rnam par
413b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /gnyis su med dang gnyis su gnas/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /chags dang chags bral 'dres 'gyur te/ /'di nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /de nyid yi ge dam pa ste/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo nges thob
413b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sgyu ma'i gzugs su mtshungs par snang/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs gang gis/ /rtag tu nges par 'gyur pa yin/ /yang na thams cad de nyid bdag /yang na thams cad spangs pa yin/ /dga' bral la sogs brtags pa yin/ /dga' ba gsum po
413b3(rgyud 'grel): spangs ba yi/ /ye shes chen po 'di nyid phra/ /rdo rje snying po nam mkha' bzhin/ /dri med thar pa zhi pa nyid/ /khyod ni pha ste skyed byed yin/ /de dag gis ni yid kyi sgrib pa dag cing thugs kyi dbang thob pa ste/ chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo/ /de dag gis
413b4(rgyud 'grel): ni ci gsungs par gyur na/ /slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang/ /bzhi pa yang ni de bzhin no/ /dbang bskur bzhi pa'i grangs kyis ni/ /dga' ba la sogs rim shes bya/ /de la dbang bzhi pa ji ltar bstan zhe na /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud las ni dbang gsum kho na? gsungs te/
413b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa slar yang de bzhin nyid/ ces bya pa 'byung ba ni chu dang me tog phreng ba la sogs par bzhi pa de kho na nyid gsungs pa ni de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi dgongs pa gsungs pa yin no/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i rigs kyi le'ur gsungs pa'i bzhi pa ni gang dang shes
413b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ de las? gzhan yang bzhi pa'i ? dab ye shes kyi dbang kho nar rig par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'di ltar gsungs te/ rgod pa dag la slob dpon te/ /lta ba de bzhin gsang ba'o/ /lag pa bcings pa shes rab ste/ /de yang gnyis gnyis 'khyud rgyud do/ /
413b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i don ni 'di yin te/ de la shes rab ma brjod? pa dang snying brtse ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i gzugs kyis ni slob dpon gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /slob dpon gyi dbang ngo/ /de la shes rab ma la nye bar brtsebs chu skyes la blta ba ni
414a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba la nye ba'i phyir gsang ba'i dbang ngo/ /shes rab ma'i lus la nye bar reg pa ni shes rab dang nye bar ldan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi dbang ngo/ /de la gnyis gnyis 'khyud rgyud las 'byung ba'i dam pa'i don gyi kho na nyid mtshon par byed pas/
414a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /rgyu'i 'bras bu bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya'o/ /la la dag gis bzhi pa'i dbang gsum pa las tha dad par gsungs te/ le'u dang por dbang bzhi ka so sor gsungs pa'i phyir/ bzhi pa ni tha dad du yod do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'thad par gyur
414a3(rgyud 'grel): nas gtso bo gang yin ma des pas bsgom pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ de'i phyir thugs kyi dbang la gnyis kyi bye brag gis bzhi pa shes par bya'o/ /de la gnyid ni shes rab kyi lus dang lhan cig ldan na/ lhan cig skyes pa bde ba chen por bstan par bya'o/ /zhes pa'i mtshan nyid
414a4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis shes rab kyi lus dang nye bar ldan nas 'byung ba yin zhes pa'i phyir shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo/ /de nyid la brtan par byas pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po ci ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i stobs kyis bde bas lus thams cad la so sor khyab cing//
414a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po sna tshogs la khyab cing dngos po thams cad la khyab nas bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid du dbyer med bar byas te/ shes rab ye shes lta bur gnyis su med pa rtog pa thams cad spangs pa/ bde ba chen po tsam nyid la mos shing de nyid kyi zhen pa spangs pa ni bzhi pa de kho
414a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi dbang ngo/ /de'i phyir yang bzhi pa slar yang de bzhin nyid ces gsungs pa yin no/ /de dag gis sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i sku'i rang bzhin ni dbang bzhi pa'o/ /nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rab tu
414a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yin/ /chos dang de bzhin bde gshegs rdo rje dril bu la rab gnas bya'o/ /skyob pa rnams kyi don dam 'jig rten pa yis yongs su mi shes pa/ /'jig rten rnams la brtse phyir ci ltar rab tu gnas par bya ba/ /lugs sku mchod rten lha khang dang/ /mchod kyi
414b1(rgyud 'grel): bris sku glegs bam ni/ /grangs dang tshad ni gzung byas la/ /tshar dang mtshan rdzogs the tshom med/ /blo gros de nyid shes pa yi/ /rab tu gnas pa brtsam par bya/ /gang zhig bsod nams 'phel bya'i phyir/ /rjes su mchod pa'i rten du bya/ /sku sogs legs par tshar ba la/ /yun
414b2(rgyud 'grel): rings bsnyen pa ma byas dang/ /de yi tshogs pa mi ldan pas/ /rab gnas grub par mi 'gyur te/ /de la skyes bu gang zhig ni/ /yon tan mtshan nyid mi ldan pas/ /'gro bas de la mi mchod cing/ /de yi gzugs ni dman par 'gyur/ /rab gnas ma byas gang zhig la/ de la mchod dang
414b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag byed ni/ /sngags med sbyin sreg byed pa la/ /bsregs pas thal bar 'gyur ba tsam/ /de la 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gong du gsungs bzhin sngags med na/ /chos byed yin zhing mchod sogs yang/ /de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /skye ba kun la mchod skal med/ /de nas yang
414b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma bzang? po dang gza' rlung rgyu skar shis pa la/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis khrus byas la/ dri zhim por byugs te/ gtsang ma'i gos gyon nas las kyi rdo rje dang ldan par byas te/ mchod pa la sogs pa tshogs par byas la/ /rdo rje dang dril du gzung bar byas nas/ bde ba'i stan mthon
414b5(rgyud 'grel): po la 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas lugs sku dang thang ka dang/ glegs bam la sogs la rab tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ dngos po thams cad gdod nas ma skyes pa'i ngo bor bstas la/ rjes su thun pa'i gzugs su blta ba ni
414b6(rgyud 'grel): rten dang brtan gyi dkyil 'khor sa bon dang phyag mtshan las yongs su rdzogs par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i dbu rgyan dang ldan par ltas te/ dam tshig sems dpa' i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa dang/ ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha' i khams su bltas la/
414b7(rgyud 'grel): bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las spros pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis mchod de/ bstod nas bdud rtsi myang bar byas nas/ de nas sngags pas me tog dri zhim po thal mos gzung ste/ lus 'dud bar byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa la li? ta
415a1(rgyud 'grel): pi la byan? mi ten na mi b+hi ka ban+taM/ dzaM(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): pra tIts+tsha ku su mAny+dza linA tha ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sam pha stwaM/ sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod nas snyim pa'i me tog gtor la/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha ras la gtsugs nas/ lag ?  dri zhim?
415a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i spos kyi sna tshogs la/ gtso bo'am gzhan la rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /bcom ldan khro bo rdo rje can/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nyid brtse bar gyur nas ni/ /rab tu gnas par bya ba dang/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ khyed
415a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis/ /rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /ci ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dga' ldan du ni rab tu bzhugs/ /sgyu ma'i lha mo lhums zhugs la/ /de ltar sku 'di la ni zhugs
415a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni rtag tu zhugs par 'gyur/ /brtse bas rjes su gzung ba dang/ /byang chub sems ni rab 'phel phyir/ rab tu gnas pa mdzad du gsol/ zhes lan gsum du gsol ba btab nas/ me tog dang spos la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas phyir byung? nas
415a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyod la sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin par byas nas nang du zhugs te/ lam thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas nas/ bsrung skud mdud ma gsum dang ldan par byas nas slob ma'i dbung pa g.yas pa la btags nas las thams cad pa'i tshul bsngags
415a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ bsam gtor kyis? bsrung? bar bya'o/ /cho ga thabs cad ni slob ma'am las kyi rdo rje dang ldan par bsgrub par bya'o/ /slob ma 'am 'on gyi bdag po la 'di ltar bsgo ste/ sngags pas cung zad ci bsgos pa/ /cho ga mchod pa la sogs ni/ g.yo sgyu?
415a7(rgyud 'grel): med pas 'grub? par gyis/ /des ni 'bras bu chen po thob/ /ces bsgos la bar chad thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas la nyal bar bya'o/ /de dag ni lha ste don la gnas ba'o/ /de nas nang par gyi dus su sngags pas ji ltar gsungs
415b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pas zhi ba'i gtor ma gtang la lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i tshad dang ldan pa spangs su khru do yod par byas la/ sku gzugs la sogs pa shar du zhal bltas par bzhugs su gsol la/ na bza' sor pos
415b2(rgyud 'grel): sku la gsol te/ sngon du gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid kyis dngos po thams cad ma skyes pa'i dang las skyes pa'i tshul du bskyed la/ snying ga dang?/ mgrin pa dang/ spyi bor oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis byin gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /ni many+tsa nas shis pa'i cho ga bya ste/
415b3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi khyor bas nyungs kar gzungs la/ g.yas bskor dang g.yon bskor du byas nas /thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis nyes pa bsal te/ /oM sarba pA pa da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ zhes pas lan gsum du mer bsreg go /de nas sngags de nyid kyis chu khyod?
415b4(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum gong gi tshul bzhin du gdab par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ sngags 'di lan gsum du bzlas te/ dri zhim po'i mar khu dur ba'i chun po?/ legs par byugs la mkhar zhong gi nang du bzhag ste/ /ba Ta dang/ u dum par dang
415b5(rgyud 'grel): shi ri dang a shwat+tha dang pa la shas nyes pa dang mar khu bsal ba'i phyir/ shun pa lnga sa bon lngas byin gyis brlabs la/ de nyid btags pas 'dag chal du sbyar la khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /rgyal po dbang bskur ba'i sbyor bas gdugs dkar po 'dzin
415b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bkra shis gyi tshigs su bcad pa las bstod pa dang/ dung dang zangs dud dang rnga bo che la sogs pa'i sgra dang/ mchod pa'i lha mo gar gyi tshogs dang/ rdo rje'i glu shin tu ngal bas blangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsol pa'i tshul du bum pa dpag
415b7(rgyud 'grel): tu med pa gzung nas/ khrus kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing rje btsun mchod rten rab gnas ni/ gzhal yas khang du bskyed pa la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /gnas dang rten du bsgom par bya/ /ma lus sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /rig pa
416a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags lha rnams ni/ /dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcad pa dang/ dgyes par byas la/ bsang gtor la sogs pa byin la/ mchod de bstod nas bdud rtsi myang bar byas la/ oM su pra tiSh? badzre swAhA/ sngags 'dis
416a2(rgyud 'grel): brtan par rigs so so'i rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /lhag ma ni sngon bzhin no/ /po ti yang de ltar rab tu gnas te/ dzri yongs su byung pa las po ti snang ba mdza' yas kyi rang bzhin du bltas la /der cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs nas yongs su gyur ba las/ gsungs
416a3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid du bsam mo/ /oM hUM h+ri:d+hUM? gyis gsung gi rang bzhin du rgyas gdab po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsams la/ lhag ma ni sngon bzhin no/ /lha khang la ni
416a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rten yin pas na/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed par bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bor dmigs te/ oM hUM h+ri:zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /sta gon la gnas
416a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang/ gtor ma la sogs pa bya'o/ /oM su pratiSh+Tha badzre swAhA/ oM hUM h+ri:b+hu khaM/ badzra b+ha ba driTTa tiSh+Tha b+huM khaM gaM sngags kyis rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i?
416a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i rang bzhin du gnas par bsgoms la/ bum pa thams cad kyi chus lha khang khyab par gtong nas/ oM badzra ud kA b+hi Shiny+tsa ces bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas blo dang ldan pas nag po chen po gug? la/ cho gar byas te
416a7(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing pa dang dbang du byas te/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bka' bsgo bar bya'o/ /lha khang 'di ji srid gnas kyi bar du khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bsrung
416b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis shig /gzhan yang dge 'dun rnams kyi ji ltar bka' bsgo ba bzhin du/ khyod kyis dgos pa bsgrub par gyis shig /ces pa dang/ ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga brtan par gyis shig /de nas bla mas slob ma 'am/ yon gyi bdag po la 'dir
416b2(rgyud 'grel): shog la nyan par gyis shig ces bsgo la/ khyod kyis gsol ba btab pa bzhin/ /sdig spangs rab tu gnas pa ni/ /cho ga tshul bzhin rdzogs par byas/ /khyod kyis rtag tu mchod par gyis/ /de nas sngags kyis dag par byas pa'i tsA ru sbyin no/ /de bzhin gshegs
416b3(rgyud 'grel): pa la mchod pas ni/ sdig pa thams cad spang pa'i phyir lhag ma ni nyung du nyung du sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yi/ /de bzhin bdag
416b4(rgyud 'grel): gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye A:hUM/ thad ka dang pu ti la sogs pa'i khrus ni me long la gong gi cho ga dang ldan pas khrus bya'o/ /de'i skabs su bdag gam gzhan gyis phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba bkra shis kyi tshigs su
416b5(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa brjod par bya ste/ de ltar sku khrus gsol nas shin tu 'jam zhing dri ma med pa'i gos kyis chu phyi bar bya'o/ /yang na lag pas so/ /gung bum gyi mdog dang mtshungs pa'i ras kyi yul dums na bza' gsol te/ oM dI be bstra ye swAhA zhes pa'i
416b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis na bzab? gsol bar bya'o/ /oM badzra gand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi sngags brjod la/ ga pur dang/ gla rtsi dang gur gum dang tsandan la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos sku la khyab par byug par bya'o/ /oM badzra a bar Na bi shud+d+ha ni swAhA /zhes pa'i sngags kyis snyan cha dang
416b7(rgyud 'grel): ma bur chu dang/ sku rags la sogs pa'i rgyan phul te gdags par bya'o/ /oM badzra ratna traM zhes pa'i sngags kyis dbu rgyan dbu la bzhag par bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa A(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyis sam me long bstan la/ gser gyi thung ma dngul gzhod dang ldan pas
417a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi sman gyi byugs te/ oM tsak+Shu tsuk+Shu/ ma man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis spyan la byugs te dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas go re ci nas mdzod?  spung thig le byas la/ me tog dang spos dang mar mdang so shing la sogs
417a2(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod par bya'o/ /las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas hUM gis sku gzugs la sogs pa bteg la/ Tak+ki'i sngags sam yi ge lngas dkyil 'khor du btsug la/ dbus su bzhag par byas la/ de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho
417a3(rgyud 'grel): gas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs te/ bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas/ aN+Tha? na 'am/ hUM gi sgras de dang lhan cig tu byin pa'i bgegs bsgrad par bya'o/ /dza:hUM baM ho:I sngags kyi ye shes kyi 'khor lo sku gzugs la sogs pa la/ dgug?
417a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ gyes par byas nas/ spyan dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de yang bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa so so'i sngags dang ldan pas mchod
417a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de la sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas me tog stim par gzung la/ nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ zhes pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi tshig 'di brjod do/ /yi ge brgya pa yang lan bdun du bzlas shing bskor bar bya'o/ /de ltar brtan
417a6(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas sems can thams cad kyi don du gsol ba gdab pa ni/ 'di ltar bde gshegs skyob pa yis/ /thams cad du ni sems can don/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin 'gyur nas/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa snang
417a7(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod/ /de nas sngon bzhin du phyir byung ste/ gtor ma rgya chen po shams la /phyogs skyong pa rnams bdud rtsis tshim par byas nas mchod de rang rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs la/ bsgor ba gsum byas
417b1(rgyud 'grel): nas phyag 'tshal te/ dman pa dang lhag pa'i las kyi kha bskang bar bya ba'i phyir /rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg brtsam par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi dus su bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ slob ma'i mthe bong g.yas pa nas gzung ste/ dgang blugs
417b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas bla ma slob ma la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i yon bslang bar bya ste/ slob ma dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pas rang gi 'byor ba'i sems dang sbyar te/ rgyan thams cad kyi rab tu brgyan pa'i btsun mo dang/
417b3(rgyud 'grel): glang po che dang /rta dang/ shing rta dang/ ba lang dang/ ma he la sogs pa'i dkor dang/ gser dang dngul dang zangs dang rin po che dang mu tig la sogs pa nor bu'i khyad bar rnams dang/ 'bru dang bcos pa'i gzhi dang/ sa gzhi dang/ skyes shing ra ba dang khang pa
417b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa ci yod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /slob dpon mnyes par gyur pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes bar 'gyur te/ mnyes pas mchog gi dngos rub 'thob /de nas tsA ra bsgrub bar bya ste/ snod legs par bkrus la/ dbang blugs kyi lhag
417b5(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ sbrang dang 'o ma dang kha ra la sogs pa mchog gi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te/ gtso bo'i sngags kyang bzlas par bya'o/ /oM di bya ni sa mA d+hi d+ha nu/ sri Na ni swAhA'i sngags kyis gser la sogs pa'i rin po che'i snod du blugs la/ de
417b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas lha khang dang/ mchod rten lha khang dang khyams su lugs sku la sogs pa la/ legs par byas pa'i khri'am/ sa stegs las byas pa'i steng du bzhugs su gsol ba ni dgye pa dang/ sku ba dang/ yo ba ma yin
417b7(rgyud 'grel): par oM su bra tiSh+Tha badzre swAhA/ zhes brjod la bzhag /de ltar ma byas na skyon du 'gyur ro/ /de la sngon bzhin du bsang gtor la sogs ba sbyin nas yongs su mchod de /bstod nas bdud rtsi myang bar byas nas/ yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brgya phrag gcig gi brjod de/ bzod par

418a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ zhi ba bkra shis thams cad ni/ /yon bdag 'di la tshogs mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ ci ltar gzugs sku rab gnas pas/ /bskal ba brgya phrag du ma du/ /lha rnams
418a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis srung byed cing/ /me dang chu dang rlung dangs/ /'byung ba'i lha rnams thams cad kyis/ /nang gi 'byung po'i chung? po la/ /legs par bsrung te cho gar gyis/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa dang/ /bu dang tsha mo 'khor bcas dang/ /de?  ngag bsrung bar
418a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /gzhan yang khyad par 'di dag gsungs/ /ri mor bris dang 'brul sku la/ /gong gi rim pas rab gnas la/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas /lha rnams la yang mchod par byas te /rol mo'i tshogs dang ldan pas

418a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas mchod ston rgya chen po bya'o/ /slob dpon 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ gtsug lag khang gi mkhan mo dang/ gnyer byed la sogs pa spyan drangs la mchod ston dang dbul brgya chen po byas te/ dgyes par byas nas bzod gsol bya'o//

419a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal kye'i rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub bcas bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ he badzra dwi b+hudza sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs/ /rje btsun thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khrag 'thur 'jig rten

419a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gnyis 'dam skyes mnga' / /rgyud 'dir bsgom pa la dbang bar bya ba'i rnal 'byor bas/ nang par snga bar mal nas langs te/ rang gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM bltas la/ de'i 'od zer gyis dpal he ru ka snang bar byas te/ me tog la

419a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i byams pa dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar sel ba'i rnam pa'i snying rje dang/ bde ba de dag rgyun mi 'chad par nges ba'i rnam pa'i dga' ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi btang
419a6(rgyud 'grel): snyoms bsgom mo/ /de nas tshes dang gang zag la sogs pa'i dri mas ma gos pa'i ngo bo/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la/ /oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM zhes bya bas byin

419b1(rgyud 'grel): byin 'gro ba mi lus pa'i don byas pa de nyid du gzhug go/ de yongs su gyur pa pas dpal he ru ka sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas pa'i ro'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon na

419b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung? gi bdag nyid mgur chu/ phyag la rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid gdu bu 'chang ba/ rked pa la don yod grub pa'i bdag nyid ska rags dang ldan pa/ skra'i mchod phyir thogs dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ zhabs gdub dang ldan pa/ dbu skra dmar

419b6(rgyud 'grel): du oM yig steng du bltas pa'o/ /snying gar 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du thur du phyogs pa'i hUM yig go/ lte bar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i steng du phyogs pa'i oM yig bsam mo/ /de nas dam tshig sems dpa' dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems

420a1(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung ba'i 'od zer de rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ce ru ka spyan drangs te/ mchod pa byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab

420a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyi mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs chen po/ /rgyu? ma'i me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /sha chen po dag gsel mdzad pa/ he ru ka dpal bdag phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba 'des bstod do/ /de nas nam mkha' la hUM yongs su

420a5(rgyud 'grel): mi dbang ba dang/ de'i rdzas rnams bsdus pa dang/ smin nas khu bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa'i ye shes kyi nyi mar byed de/ ye shes gyi sa bon de'i 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

421b1(rgyud 'grel): cad sngon bzhin sbyin par bya/ /slob ma'i 'jig rten dbang cha byad/ /rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad lha ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje dbang gis dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni/ /di ring khyod ni dbang bskur te/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//
421b2(rgyud 'grel): rab bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje gzung/ /slob ma rta yi mchog bsgoms te/ /sgrol ma lhan cig kha ni sbyar/ /rdo rje'i bdag pos dbang bskur ta/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi bdag/ dril bus khyod ni dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra a d+hi ba ti tiSh+Thu?
421b3(rgyud 'grel): badzras sa ma? ya stwaM/ slong ma rnam sna ba mther bsgoms la/ /stan dang lhan cig kha ni sbyar/ /rdo rje dril bu mgor bzhag ste/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra satwaM twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsi mi ba nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ /kye khyod rdo rje che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /nga dang gang
421b4(rgyud 'grel): snang de thams cad/ /de kun sems kyi sprul pa yin/ /ches rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes tshul 'di dang/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu brung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i
421b5(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ye ti Sh+Tha sa ma ya staM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hUM/ sgrub pa kun gyi cho ga dang/ /bla na med pa kun gyis mchod/ /de nas rdo rje lag gis lag/ rdo rje brtul zhugs khyod la sbyin/ /thog mdza' med pa'i seMs
