443b5(rgyud 'grel): tu gnas pa'i gzhan nyid ma yin pa'i yi ge bltas nas/ /lnga'i 'byung gnas kyi mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas/ de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las/ go rI la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma brgyad ji ltar gsungs pa'i kha dog can/
443b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang tshon ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed kyi phung po dang sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin can zhal gcig pa/ dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gis/ gri gug dang/
443b7(rgyud 'grel): cang te'u dang/ ru sbal dang/ sprul dang/ seng ge dang/ dge slong dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje rnams te/ dngos po la sogs pa'i rnam par rtogs pa gcod pa dang/ gsung rab dang/ phrag dog dang/ zhe sdang dang/ nga rgyal dang/ byang chub kyi sems
444a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mi shes pa gcod pa dang/ ye shes rnams rnam par dag pa'i rnam 'phrul lo/ /g.yon na ro hi ta dang/ phag dang/ thod pa dang/ rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang/ dgu? sta dang/ 'khang? gsil? dang/ thong gshol dang/
444a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags? mdzub can te/ ser sna dang gti mug dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ chags pa'i tshogs la sogs pa gcod pa dang/ 'di rnams kyi dran pa gso ba dang/ bgegs 'byin pa dang/ chos gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i rnam par 'phrul
444a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa'i snying gar zla ba rnams la skyil krung phyed pa'i gang gyis gnas pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin ma/ mgo bo blon pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'gyur pa'i zhal can/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ phyogs
444a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gos can du bsgom bar bya'o/ /thams cad rnams kyi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i dang rang gi phyag mtshan rnams su zla ba la gnas pa'i rang dang gi sa bon bsams shing/ rkyen gyis spros bsdus sngon du 'gro ba'i don dam te/ de'i rjes su snying
444a5(rgyud 'grel): ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis bkug pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo spros? pI gau ris/ oM gau rI A karSha ya dza:zhes pas bkug/ oM tso rI pra de? sha ya hUM zhes pas tsau? rI sa bcug/ /oM bet+ta lI ban+ta? ya boM? zhes pet+ta lis bcings?/ oM g+hasma rI to
444a6(rgyud 'grel): la yang? ngo? bzhes dbang du byas te/ de nas dbang bskur ba'i mthar/ phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la gnas pa'i gau rI la sogs pa rnams la/ mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ 'od dpag med rnams kyis so//
444a7(rgyud 'grel): puk+ka ? la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang gau rI la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyi rjes su rim pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyad rnam par dag pa ni brtag pa gnyis pa bzhin no/ /de nas go cha la sogs pa thams cad sngon nyid do/ /bdud rtsi
444b1(rgyud 'grel): myang ba ni/ cho ga ji lta ba bzhin bcom ldan 'das nyid la rang gi shes rab mas dbul te 'khor gyi gau rI la sogs pas ni lce rdo rje'i sbyor bas myang bar bya'o/ /slar yang 'dir khang pa brtsegs pa ni rtag pas so/ /dbang bskur ba de bzhin
444b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa mi bskyod pa/ bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med kyi/ bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan/ mchod pa don yod grub par bshad cing/ rjes su chags pa rdo rje sems dpar rtag tu bsams te/ 'di ni dngos grub kyi yan lag drug tu nye bar
444b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /'di rnams kyang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum la yang blta bar bya'o/ /'od gsal du gzhug pa ni/ 'jig rten gsum dus gcig tu dur khrod la dur khrod khang pa brtsegs pa la/ khang? pa brtsegs pa gau
444b4(rgyud 'grel): rI la sogs pa rnams la/ gau rI la sogs pa rang rang gi phyogs kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu khung bu rnams su ste/ lhag ma ni sngar bzhin no/ /de nas bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags su 'gyur ba/ oM aM swAhA/ bdag med ma'i
444b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i sngags so/ /oM lI swA hA gau rI yi'o/ /oM eM swAhA/ tsheM rkun mI'o/ /oM e swAhA ro langs mI'o/ /oM oM swAhA g+hasma rI yi ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /oM a'uM swAhA puk+ka sA yi'o/ /oM ? swAhA sha pa ri yi'o/ /oM laM
444b6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ g.yung mo yi'o/ /'dir gang gi tshe dam tshig gi bzlas pa byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ snying ga'i sa bon las snying po'i sngags dang nye ba'i snying po'i sngags 'chad par 'gyur ba dag brjod pa'i tshe/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i
444b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yang dag par spros/ 'gro ba'i don byas nas sngags dang lhan cig pa nyid kyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis bkug ste/ rlung 'jug pa de'i tsho de nyid snying ga'i sa bon la gzhugs par bya zhing/ lha rnams kyi sngags so sor brjod
445a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yongs su rdzogs pa na/ re re nas sgro zhing bsdus par bya'o zhes pa dam tshig gi bzlas pa'o/ /gang yang brtags gyis par gsungs pa/ rdo rje ma dang/ dkar mo dang/ chu ma dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang/ bdag
445a2(rgyud 'grel): med ma dang/ mkha' spyod ma? dang/ sa spyod ma'i rnal 'byor las rengs pa dpyad pa la sogs pa brtul bzhugs can gyi byed do zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ 'dir yang bla ma dang phan tshun dbyer med par 'grog ? pa'i man ngag las/
445a3(rgyud 'grel): las rab tu rgyas 'phri? par bya ste/ a'oM phi? sa bon las skyes pa'i rdo rje ma ser mo g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis thod pa dang kha Twi ga g.yas pa'i phyag dag gis rdo rje dang gri? gug 'dzin pa can gyi snying gang sa bon? hUM ser po rnam par bsgomS?
445a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM hUM swA hA ces sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas pa'i mthar/ 'chad par 'gyur pa'i spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis cho ga ji ltar lta bar sbyin sreg bya ste/ 'di la? yang las phyin? mthar so ma btad pa'i/ ? phor gnyis su thod pa?
445a5(rgyud 'grel): ? ser pas bus pas mtshan pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ oM hUM badzra che ge mo lham b+ha ya hUM swAhA zhes pa'i rig ba bris nas/ gcig dur khrod kyi thal bas bkab ste/ kha por gzhan gyis kha'o?
445a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar byas pa'i steng du/ dbang chen dkyil 'khor zung la phyogs su rdo rje la nye bar mtshan pa bris nas sa 'og tu bzhag nas/ bud med rkang pa g.yon dang/ skyes pa rkang pa g.yas kyis mnan pa'i ting 'dzin gyi gnas pa'i mthar
445a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas par bya ste/ steng gis bsgrub bya dangs? par byed do/ /oM las rdzogs pa'i dkar mo gur gum gyi mdog can zhags pa dang/ kha TwAM ka dang/ lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje 'dzin dang/ snying gar son pa'i oM yig dmar po'i ?
445b1(rgyud 'grel): bcan bsams nas/ oM aM swAhA zhes sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ sbel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis chog ji lta bar sbyin sreg bya ste/ 'di yi las kyi mthar yang/ bsgrub bla dmar po skra grol ba mnan nas/ mgrin bzhags byas bcings/ lcags kyus sgo nas phug nas bkug ste/ rkang
445b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'og tu bgyes bar da? sems nas/ de'i skye gnas su aM yig dmar po de las me 'bar zhing rnam par 'bar ba bsam par bya'o/ /skyes pa yin de bzhin kho nar snying gar ro/ /oM aM? go rI a mu k+Shi? me ba sha ma nA ya swAhA zhas bzlas pas nges
445b3(rgyud 'grel): bar de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /i ge sa bon las skyes pa'i chu ma sngon mo thod pa dang/ tho ba dang/ rdo rje dang/ sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa/ snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa khaM yig sngon po can bltas nas/ oM kham swAhA zhes 'bum bzlas pa byas te/ spel
445b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis ji ltar sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'di'i yang las kyi mthar bsgrub bya ? grol ba mnan pa rlung la gnas pa/ rnga mo sngon po la zhon pa kha lhor phyogs shing khros pas tho bas bsbun? bzhin pa bsams par byas
445b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ oM khoM pa ri yo ga Ti? a mu kaM uts+tsha Ta ya ? hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA zhes bzlas te/ mtshon mo bdun gyis skrod par byed do/ /uM yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro mtshum? lta bu'i snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i dzrI yig sngon po can
445b6(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas/ oM dzAM swAhA zhes 'bum bzlas te/ spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags kyi las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ 'di'i yang las mdza' bya ba/ bsgrub bya dag rta dang ma ha? la zhon pa pha rol dang pha rol dag rtsod par byed
445b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pa bsam par bya ste/ oM dzrI badzra ? shi nI che ge dang che ge dag bi dwe ShaM ku ru swAhA/ dzrI hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA zhes bzlas pas rnam par sdang bar byed do/ /oM gi sa bon las skyes pa'i bdag med ma sngon mo/ /rnam par 'gyur pa'i
446a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can mthong pa dang/ /pa? DhaM? ga dang/ rdo rje dang/ gri gug 'dzin pa'i snying gang nyi ma ? yig sngon po can bsams te/ oM buM? swAhA ces 'bum bzlas pa bya ste/ spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags? kyis cho ga ji ltar bar sbyin
446a2(rgyud 'grel): sreg bya'o/ /'di'i yang las kyi mthar/ bram ze'i thod pa dug dang/ ske tshe dang/ sdigs mdzub kyi khrag gis 'khor lo zur drug pa zung rnams hUM dang ldan zhing/ dbus su oM buM? nor? Atn+ya? a mu ka dzA ra ya buM hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pa'i/ nye bar
446a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe ba mdza' dag spel te bris nas bzlas te/ phub ma'i me bdag gdung bar bya ste/ rigs kyis 'debs par byed do/ /oM las skyes pa'i nam mkha' spyod? ma/ dkar mo lta bu'i snying gar hUM yig dmar po'i sa bon can bsam par byas nas/ oM
446a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA zhes 'bum bzlas pa byas te/ spel tshig? dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis ? ji lta bar sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'da' i yang las la bsgrub bya rlung dang mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rnam par 'bar par bsams te/ pad gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi
446a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyi lcags kyu sna bu g.yon nas nges par song ste/ bsgrub? bya rnams kyi sna? g.yas pa'i bu gnas bdag?/ snying ga dang skye nas ?/ sla? g.yon nas 'thon te/ rang gi sna g.yas nas snying ga'i sa bon la gzhug par bya zhing/ dbugS
446a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rlung gis dgug par bya ste/ /oM hUM ? ces chu kI nA A karSha? ? hA swAhA zhes bzlas pas bkugs par byed/ /oM yig las skyes pa'i sa spyod ma bdag med ma dang 'dra ba'i snying gar sku:yig sngon po can bsgom par bya ste/ oM kshu?(rgyud 'grel): swAhA
446a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bsnyen? pa 'byung? byas te/ spel chos dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis sngon bzhin sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'dri'i yang las la b+hu(rgyud 'grel): yig las skyes ba'i 'bar pa'i rdo rje/ bsgrub bya'i 'og sgo nas rked pa tsam du zug par bsam par bya ste/ oM
446b1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ru(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ru tsa ri a mu kaM mA ra ya g+hu(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT? swAhA zhes bzlas pas gsod par byed do/ /rgyud du gsungs pa'i sngags kyi rim pa las 'digs? spyod ma dang/ mkha' spyod ma dag rim pa las 'das pa'o/ /rdo rje ma la sogs pa bdun po 'di rnams kyang nyi ma
446b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ral gar stabs kyis gnas pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa/ mgo skyes dmar po gyen du brdzes pa'o zhes so/ /de nas rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyi snying po'i sngags su 'gyur pa ni/ oM oM swAhA/ /oM a swAhA/ oM a'i swAhA/
446b3(rgyud 'grel): oM u swAhA/ oM a'u swAhA/ oM aM? swAhA/ oM aau swAhA/ /ji ltar bsdus pa ni rgyas pa la bltos pa las gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir phyag gnyis ba kho na la dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i sgrub thabs 'di brjod do/ /de bzhin du phyag bzhi pa la sogs pa
446b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi yang rig par bya'o/ /'di dag gi khyad par ni dzwa la dzwa la ni bdud bzhi las nges par rgyal ba dag pas phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa ngang cig shos kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag? gis/ /rdo rje dang bdud kyis brag gis gang pa'i thod pa 'dzin pa/
446b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag lhag ma gnyis kyi bdag med ma dang mtshungs pa'i rdo rje phag mo la mnyam par 'khyud ba/ gzhan ni sngon bzhin no/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM dzwa? la dzra? la b+hyo hu huM huM phaT swAhA/ 'di'i yang hUM yig gsum thung bar bshad do/ /ki Ti ki Ti badzra na
446b6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ rtsa gsum dag pas zhal gsum pa/ dang po'i zhal nag po/ g.yas pa dkar po/ g.yon pa dmar po'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag pas phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi rtse ba'i phyag
446b7(rgyud 'grel): gis rdo rje g.yon gyis ? pa gsum gyi nyon mongs pa 'joms pa dag pas te? gsum/ gzhan gyi gri gug/ cig shos kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pas dril bu rnam par 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis bdag med ma dang/
447a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra pa'i rdo rje lu gu brgyud ma la kun tu 'byung pa/ sngon bzhin du gnas pa'o/ /'khor ni thams cad la ldan par gsungs pa nyid do/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ hUM yig gsum ring por gsungs so//
447a2(rgyud 'grel): bri tsu badzra naM slar yang hUM yig las skyes pa'i thod par gnas pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa li hUM yig lag 'khrungs pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas zhal brgyad pa/ de'i rtsa ba'i zhal nag po/ /g.yas dkar po/ g.yon pa dmar?
447a3(rgyud 'grel): po cher 'jigs pa/ /steng gi zhal dud ka rnam par gtsigs la/ lhag ma yud pa'i mdog can zhal re re zhing spyan gsum pa/ stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pas phyag bcu drug pa/ g.yas kyi phyag brgyad kyi mthil gyi thod pa rnams
447a4(rgyud 'grel): bu steng nas rim pas/ lud pa dang/ dbugs dang/ smyo ba dang/ zad pa ste/ bod skam dang/ mdze dang/ rkang ba dang/ mchin pa dang/ mcher pa rnams kyi nad 'joms pa dag pas/ glang po dang/ rta dang/ bung du dang/ ba lang dang/ rnga mo dang/ mi dang
447a5(rgyud 'grel): sha ra b+ha dag pho de bzhin du g.yon gyi phyag tu gnas pa'i thod pa rnams su/ zhi ba las gsal ba la sogs pa'i dbang phyug gi dngos grub sems kun la stsol ba dag pas/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang me dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ mthar

447b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhigs rnams kyis rol pa dang ldan pa'o zhes kha? cig go/ 'khor gyi cho ga ni sngon bzhin no/ /'od gsal du gzhug pa ni/ 'di'i dbye bas gau rI la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma brkyang zhal brgyad rnams su rab tu gzhug cing/ zhal bdud ni rtsa ba'i zhal la'o//
447b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag bcu bzhi mtshan ma dang bcas pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis la/ zhabs gnyis rtsa ba'i zhabs gnyis la'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma la sogs pa bsdu ba ni sngon bzhin te/ gzhan dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de'i snying po'i sngags ni oM de ba bi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM
447b3(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ 'di'i yang hUM yig gsum ring por gsungs so/ /oM badzra kartA ri he badzrA a hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po ste 'di thams cad kyi yang nye ba'i snying po'i zhes par 'gyur ro/ /oM aSh+Ta na nA ya/ pidphortha? ka sha bardma? ne/ tsa tu rba yi? she ta? no trA ya/
447b4(rgyud 'grel): Sho Da sha b+hu dzA ya/ kriSh+na dzAM sU ta ba pu She ka pA la mA lA ne ka d+ha ra NaM/ Ard+ha ta krur tsit+ta ya/ ardzaM? ndaM? daMSh+Ti Ne/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gadzdza ya gadzdza ya/ ta dzdza ya tadzdza ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sad+ha ? ga dA na/ baind+ha? band+ha/ nA gA Sh+T? ni/ grih+Na

447b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i rdo rje bur rgya che ba ker? po sdug bsngal ba dang/ skun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam dang/ zad pa dang/ mi skye ba dang/ chos dang/ rjes su rtogs pa dang/ kun rdzob dang/ yongs su skye ba shes pa'i shes pa bcu rnam dag pas rtsi bas
447b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu 'khor ba'i dbus su gnas po'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma?/ /? sbyar ba'i dbus su son pa'i hUM yig sngon po bsams nas lnga'i 'byung gnas kyi mngon par byang chub pa'i
448a1(rgyud 'grel): rim pas/ de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las/ dbang po sngon po'i mdog can zhal gcig pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis/ rang bzhin rig ma la kun nas 'khyud pa/
448a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang gis zhabs kyis 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan can mnan pa/ rnam par ? ba'i na bza' dang rgyan gyis brgyan ba'i rdo rje hUM mdzad du bdag nyid du rnal par bsgoms naS/ rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor bas khro bo bcu rjes su spros
448a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ de la shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su rim pas/ shin rje mthar byed dang/ shes rab mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed rnams dang/ nag po dkar po dmar po sngon po'i mdog can/ rdo rje thob dang/ dbyug  
448a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dkar po dang/ chu skyes dmar po dang/ kyes pa'i rdo rje rnams 'dzin pa/ ne'u? thung gsum khyim che zhing khro ba klu chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra? dmar? ser gyen? du brdzes? pa/ dmar pa zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa/ rnam par snang
448a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ 'od dpa' mong dang/ mi bskyod pa rnams kyi cod pan can/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'dzin pa rnams so/ /me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug sngon can dang

448a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rin po ? dag go/ dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che dag gshin rje mthar byed bzhin rnam par 'gyur bdag go/ 'og gi rtsibs su gnod mdzes nag? ? shing 'dzin pa/ mi bskyod pas mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod
448b1(rgyud 'grel): pa na can no/ /steng gi rtsibs su gtsug tor ser po 'khor lo 'dzin pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan can/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa bzhin mi bskyod pa'i cod? pan no/ /khro bo bcu po 'di rnams sna tshogs chu
448b2(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang nyi ma la g.yon brkyang gi zhabs kyi gnas pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag rnams kyi snying ga'i phyogs su khu tshur gyi sdigs mdzub gis klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa blta bar bya'o/ /de ltar gyur ba'i 'brung ba'i 'khor lo rnams par bsgoms
448b3(rgyud 'grel): nas de'i dbus su rdo rje hUM mdzad yongs su gyur pa las/ chos kyi 'byung gnas sngar brjod pa'i gzugs can du rnam par bsams te /gzhan thams cad du gsungs pa'i rim las sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa

448b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis/ /? zhugs can gyi spros pa bsgom/ /spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas/ /spros pa nyid ni spros med byed/ /ji ltar sgyu? ma rmi lam dang/ /ji ltar par ma'i srid yin par/ /rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor nyid ni
448b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'dod/ /de'i phyir 'phral dus bcu'i dbang phyug bden pa gnyis gcig pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sa bdud 'joms pa zhes so/ /bsgom pa gzhan gyis kyang rnal 'byor pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'phel pa'i ched dang/

449a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas ji lta bar phyag dang la sogs pa bya ste/ sa'i cha shas rnams la lag pa reg ste/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ zhes pas sa bzhi byin gyis brlabS po/ /ded bdud rtsi lnga dang dri bzang po la sogs pas byugs te/ de dang de'i sa gzhir

449a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me tog la sogs ? badzra ya badzra buSh+de? hUM swAhA/ zhes pas dang por bcom ldan 'das la me tog gcig dbul lo/ /phyi nas snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dag gis/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): nai ra At+ma? ye badzra buShpe aM hUM swAhA/ zhes pas mchod
449a7(rgyud 'grel): pa byas nas oM aM/ /swAhA/ oM aM A i A a'u a'u ri rI li lI e i o aau aM swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags dag gis mchod par bya'o/ /gnyis ka'i spyi bar oM A(rgyud 'grel): ak+Sha b+hA la badzra puShpe hUM hUM swAhA/ shar la sogs ba'i phyogs kyi 'dab
449b1(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams su /oM a:gau ryaM badzra puShpe gaM hUM swAhA/ oM gau rAM hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ de ltar yi ge gsum gyis rang rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge dang rnam par ? ba'i ci? ri la sogs pa lhag par mchod par bya ste/ phyi nas oM yig dang lhan cig bod pa'i tshig gis
449b2(rgyud 'grel): phul nas hUM hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge dang swAhA mdza' can gyis mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar buShpe'i gnas su d+hU pa la sogs rnams kyi so so'i ming bcug ste dbul bar bya zhing/ de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta su la yaM ta/ na mi tai ra na mA mi/ /b+ha ga ban+taM/ sh+rI he ru ka
449b3(rgyud 'grel): nA dzaM dza:hUM baM hi:pra tits+tsha maM/ gu su ma any+dza li nA thA ho:ces pas me tog snyim pas phul nas bdud par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bU dza me b+ha pra sar sa mu ha sbar hI maM ga ga na khaM hUM sa man+ta swAhA/ mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de nas bdud
449b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi skyu ma rab 'joms cing/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i rang bzhin sku/ /kye'i rdo rje khyod la 'dud ces pas phyag byas nas ji ltar nus pa'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te rigs su skyes dang dam tshig can

449b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig lhag chad kha bskang ba'i don du yi ge brgya pa'i sngags? brjod de/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya man pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ driDho me b+ha ba/ su ho Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su paSh+ye ne b+ha ga a nu rak+to me b+hag sarba sid+d+hi sme swa yats+tsha/ sarba karma suts+tshe me/ tsit+taM sh+re ya:
449b7(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga ban sarbba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me many+tsa badzrI b+ha ba ma hAs ma ? A:zhes dang/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /'di ltar rjes mthun dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang 'byon par
450a1(rgyud 'grel): dzad du gsol/ /oM badzra mu:zhes gshegs su gsol/ /de ltar phyag bzhi pa dang/ phyag drug pa dang/ phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang mchungs par bya ste/ dang par yi ge gsum gyis mched par bsams
450a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rang gi sngags kyis mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje phag mo la'ang bdag med ma yis dbul lo/ /phyag bcu drug pa la ni rkang pa brgyad pa'i mched pa'i sngags kyis kyang mchod par bya ste/
450a3(rgyud 'grel): oM aSh+Ta na nA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM pid+g+hod+d+ha? ke sha ? hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA oM tsa tu rbidsha? ti ne trA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM Sho Da sha b+hu tsA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM kraSh+Na dzI mu ta ba pu She hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ e ka pA la mA la oM na ka d+hi?
450a4(rgyud 'grel): ra Ne hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM Ad+ha? ta krA ra tsit+tA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM aNhendu? daMSh+Ti ni hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod par byas nas smon lam la sogs pa sngar bzhin byas te gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas  
450a5(rgyud 'grel): kha zas kyi bya ba brjod par bya steng?/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang por bza' ba dang thug pa la sogs pa la/ cho ga bzhin bdud rtsir byas pa'i chang g.yon pa'i srin mdzub kyis gtong zhing/ chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su
450a6(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i ? 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs pa'am/ /snying ga'i sa bon las 'phros pa yang rung ste/ sngar brjod pa'i sngags rnams la zas kyi dngos po'i ming spel ba rnams kyi dbul bar bya'o/ /phyi nas gshegs
450a7(rgyud 'grel): su gsol la dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyis kha cung zad dag par byas te/ 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i rnam pas gtor ma phul nas/ lte ba'i thab khung gi mes reg pas kha zas rnams zhu zhing babs nas/ snying gar gnas pa'i dam tshig
450b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' 'am/ lte ba'i pad+ma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba can gyi aM yig la thim pas tshim par bya'o/ /zhes pa phyi'i dngos po rnams kyi nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o/ /de nas mthar
450b2(rgyud 'grel): oM uts+tsha Sh+Ta? badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha i ma bi laM grih+Na g+h+rih+Na hUM hUM hUM phaT zhes pas lhag ma'i gtor ma byin nas zas dor bar bya'o/ /phyi'i dngos po la bltos pa med pa'i slar yang nang gi sbyin sreg ni sngar bzhin rlung gi sbar te/ rtog pa mdza' dag gi
450b3(rgyud 'grel): mun pa dang sgrib par byed pa rnams/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thabs tu shin tu gtum pa'i gtum mes bsregs shing/ byang chub kyi sems kyi zas kyi sbyin sreg gis sbyin sreg bya ste/ shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dang/ nyi ma dang zla ba bo?
450b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam bar gyur pa shin tu 'bar bas gang bar gyur pa'o/ /gnyis pa 'di yang/ 'jig rten pa'i mngon par mtho ba'i ser gyur pa bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg ste/ skad cig so sor goms pas 'thob bo/ /da ni gtor ma brjod par bya ste/ dri dang me
450b5(rgyud 'grel): rtog la sogs pa g.yas su dang/ mdun du sha ka Ta dang/ b+hA ra la sogs pa'i snod du nya sha dang/ dzam bu Di ka la sogs pa dang/ zas bzang po dang/ chu khyor ba gsum yang ldan par bya zhing/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyang
450b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan par byas te bzhag la/ sngar bzhin bltas te/ bdud rtsi myung ba'i cho ga'i rim pas bdud rtsir byas te/ de kho na nyid gsum gyi chos kyi 'byung gnas dkar po dmar po nag po gsum gyi khung bur gnas pa'i pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad
450b7(rgyud 'grel): pa can steng nas steng du blta bar bya'o/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i gau rIs/ oM gau rI an+d+ri? A dI na sa pa ri bA rAM pra be sha ya ho akarSha ya dza:zhes pas bkug/ aau tsau rI in+d+ra a dI na sa pa ri bA rA na pra pe sha ya hUM zhes tsau rIs
451a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rnams bcug /oM bet+tA? li indA A dI na sa bA ra bA dan band+ha? ya bi zhes bet+ta lI spros bas bcing bas bcings o g+hasma ri in+t+ra? A di nas pa ri bA rA na phra be sha ya ho:zhes pas dbang du byas te/
451a2(rgyud 'grel): de la chos kyi 'byung gnas dbus ma la gnas pa'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ thog mar dbang bo/ mig stong ldan pa dkar po rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub can gyi phyag gnyis pa/ blang po chos srungs kyi bu dkar po la zhon pa/
451a3(rgyud 'grel): lho'i 'dab ma la/ gshin rje nag po/ dbyug pa dang sdigs mdzub can gyi phyag gnyis pa/ ma he la zhon pa/ nub kyi 'dab mar chu lha dkar po chu srin la zhen la/ sprul gyi gdengs ka 'dbun dang ldan pa/ zhags pa dang su?
451a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ byang gi 'dab ma la lus ngan ser po lus dar ba/ gter la gnas pa pI dza pU ra dang/ /de'u le'i phyag can/ de rnams thams cad rin po che'i rgyan dang rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan pa/ gshin rje nyi
451a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gdan ? nyi ma'i 'od can no/ /dbang ldan gyi 'dab nar? dbang phyug chen po dkar po/ /spyan gsum pa ral pa'i cod ban dang ldan pa/ rtse gsum dang thod pa'i phyag can/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ khyu mchog la
451a6(rgyud 'grel): zhon pa/ go ri? la mnyam par 'khyud? pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can no/ /me'i 'dab mar me lha shin tu dmar ba lto pa 'phyang ba/ ral zhon pa/ smin ma dang ral pa dmar ser can/ bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs gyi phyig? can/ nyi ma'i
451a7(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang 'od can no/ /bden bral gyi 'dab mar srin po'i bdag po sngon po rol zhon ba/ skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas ba /gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa zhes kha cig go
451b1(rgyud 'grel): bden 'bral gyi 'dab mar rlung lha sngon po rlung lab 'dzin pa/ ri dags la zhon pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ zla ba'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyan 'chang nga'o/ /ze 'brul sa'i lha mo ser mo rin po che'i ges dang rgyan dang ldan
451b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ g.yon du bum pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pas dam bcas pa sngon du nye bar 'gro ba'i phyag can zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can yid dags dang mun pa can gyis bskor te gnas pa'o/ /steng du gnas pa'i chos kyi 'gyur gnas kyis pad+ma'i?
451b3(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi 'dab mar/ zla ba dkar po/ rta dkar po dang ldan pa'i ku mu ta'i shing rta la gnas pa/ phyag gnyis kyis zla bas mtshan ma'i ku mu ta 'dzin pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can no/ /lhor nyi ma nyi mas mtshan pa'i par 'dzin pa/ rta ljang gu'i ?
451b4(rgyud 'grel): ? gnas pa/ rang gi gdan dang 'od can no/ /nub la sor? rang? dbang ldan ba? sogs ba'i mchos kyi 'dab ma rnams su rim pas sa skyes dmar por la zhon ba/ mdud thud? 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas na chu gri dang g.yon bas mi mgo gra? ba'i tshul gyis 'tshin gzhes?
451b5(rgyud 'grel): kha cig go? /lhag pa ljang gu mnga' dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ pad+ma la gnas pa/ phur bu ser po bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa ste/ rin po che'i pa Ta dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa ces kha cig go /sbal pa la zhon
451b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /pa? sangs dkar po de grang? phreng dang ril ba spyi rlags 'dzin pa/ pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /sben pa nag po bgrad phreng dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa ru spal la zhon pa'o/ /sgra gcan dmar nag shing rta la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan can/
451b7(rgyud 'grel): skra dang smar dmar ser 'bar ba rnam par 'joms pa'i mche ba bzhi pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i phyag can no/ /der de bzhin du rtog dung kha/ ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa/ ats+tsha bri ta'i 'bras bu dang/ ka ka Ti tra 'dzin pa'o zhes kha cig go/
452a1(rgyud 'grel): ze 'grub? tshangs pa ser po zhal bzhi rgyas pa/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa'i phyag gis bgrang? phreng 'dzin pa/ gzhan gyis mi 'jigs pa'i tshul can/ g.yon gyis dbyug gu gsum pa dang/ ril pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa?
452a2(rgyud 'grel): dang pa la zhon pa ral pa can mchog phyir thogs dang ldan pa/ tshangs pas yongs su bskor ba mtsho ma dang dga' ldan pa la sogs pa dang/ tshangs ris dang mtshangs pa mdun na 'don la sogs pa rnams dang/ la thams cad?
452a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas par blta'o/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og ma la gnas pa'i pad+ma'i shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams su rim pas stobs kyi rgyu dang/ dung skyong dang/ mdza' yas dang nor? rgyas rnams ljang gu dang ser po dang sngon po dang
452a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po rnams so/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma rnams su 'jog po dang/ rigs ldan dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/ pad+ma rnams/ dbang po dang/ sna tshogs dang/ dkar po dang/ dkar po rnams te/ nor rgyas dmar po dang/
452a5(rgyud 'grel): 'thog po dang rig ldan ser po'o zhes kha cig ? de rnams gdengs kha bdun dang ldan bze 'brul lhag ma can dkar po de rnams thams cad kyi lus phyed ma'i la rin po che'i cod pan dang/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lhag ma can
452a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor te gnas pa go cha dang bcas shing? ral gri 'dzin pa'i lha ma yin dang dmyal ba pa'i sems can blta bar bya'o/ /dbus dang steng dang 'og gi pad+ma yi gnas pa rnams rang rang gi gzugs yongs su spangs te/ thugs dang sku dang gsung
452a7(rgyud 'grel): gi? rang bzhin hUM oM A:I yi ge las skyes pa rnams nag po dkar po dmar po'i mdag can zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ rang bzhin gyi rig ma la 'byung pa/ g.yas brkyang gi stan la gnas pa
452b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la he ru ka'i gzugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur te/ mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'od dpag tu med pa rnams kyis rgyas btab par blta bar byas nas/ /gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams su byin gyis brlabs te/ de
452b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bar mchad par oM pra ba ra satwa? ra? arg+haM pa tIts+tsha swAhA zhes pa'i sngags kyi dung chos kyi phyag rgyas mdun du de rnams la mchod yon phul nas/ /dung chos kyi phyag rgyas zhabs
452b3(rgyud 'grel): dag la zhabs bsil dbul bar bya ste/ de nas in+d+ra dza ma rnga? la dzakA? b+hU da bAh+ni? ba u rak+kha? tsanda sudzdza mA dpa' ? pa ta la pA tA le/ aTTha sap+pa swAhA zhes pa 'dis pos te sgeg be? dang bcas shing dril bu'i sgra byas la/ sngar bzhin bdud rtsir byas pa'i gnying?
452b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i zas rnams bdag nyid kyi lce rdo rje'i sbyor bas zos shing bza' bar bya ste de rnams kyang de bzhin kho nar ? myang par byed pa'o/ /ces bsams te/ i daM ba li b+huny+dza dzi g+ha phul larhU? pamOM? sa ping+gA? am+b+ha? kadzdza sabba sA d+ha khandi khU ti pheD g+ha dang zhes pas zhal
452b5(rgyud 'grel): zas su byas nas dril bu gnas gsum rnams su dkrol bar byas te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NOM A dya nut+than+na? twAta oM A:hUM phaT swAhA zhes pa 'dis tshim par byas nas/ dril bu'i sgra byas te/ kol+la aM? reTThi? a po la mu mnu? NaM? ra kak+ko lA/ b+ha na kraM pi Da ho badzdza
452b6(rgyud 'grel): aM? ka ru Ne? kaM a i/ ni ro lA/ ta hi pa la khAdzdza i g+ha d+hima a NA pidzdza? i/ ha le ka liny+dza ra pa Ni a a du rdu ru ta hiM? na badzdza? a i?/ tsa u sa ma kA thu ri sihma kap+pu ra lA i a i/ mA la ya a'ind+ha Na sA li dza taM hiM b+ha ru kha i a i/ pheM kha Na/ khe?
452b7(rgyud 'grel): ? ? shud+d+ha shud+hU? na mu hi? a i ni raM ? a? tsa tA pa? a i ta haM dza sa rA ba pa Na a i/ ma la a dza kun tu ra pA Ta i DiN+Di ma ta hi na badzdza a i/ phyi nas bsang gtor phul nas yang dag par mchod de/ oM A:badzra puShpe swAhA/ zhes pa
453a1(rgyud 'grel): bde nyid dang d+hU? sogs pas phul nas rang gi bye brag ma phyed ba dang/ cho ga dman pa dang lhag pa sbyar ba'i don du sngon bzhin yi ge brgya ba ? nas gshegs su gsol lo/ zhes so/ rim ba'i bar mchod par
453a2(rgyud 'grel): yang gtor ma brjod de/ kyai rdo rje'i gzugs kyi thugs ka'i hUM yig gi 'od zer byis khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar gnas pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du gzhal yas khang rgya che ba la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor
453a3(rgyud 'grel): dag bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi phyogs la sogs pa rnams su dbang po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can dpag tu med pa bkug pa rnams 'od gsal du bcug nas/ slar yang shes rab dang bcas pa'i he ru ka'i
453a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su sems par byed pa la sogs pa dang/ zhal zas dbul ba la sogs pa sngon bzhin te/ thogs mar gtor ma spangs te/ oM te lo kya A k+She? pa e maM ba li phra? ? a muka sya rak+Sha shAn+ti rAk+Sha lA? ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pa'i
453a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas dbul lo/ /oM dzwa la badzra la sogs pa rnams kyis yang so so la bod pa'i dam tshig byin nas rang rang gi sngags kyis zhal zas dbul par bya'o/ /a? A der?  AtA? ces ba la sogs
453a6(rgyud 'grel): bas bod par byas la/ de'i sa bon yang bklags te/ a mu ka sya shAn+ti rak+Shany+tsa ku ru hUM swAhA/ oM hUM zhes ba 'dis bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams la'o/ /na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+he b+hyo/ na mo badzra mung+ga ra hastA ya tsaN+Da maN+Da lAk+She ba ka rA
453a7(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM phaT/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+he? b+hyo la hA ? d+ha ra bi bi dA? su ra a su ra/ merd+ha na g+hA? tAn+na rma thA hUM phaT/ na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+he b+hyo/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mri tI ku ru ma hA be ShA Ni hUM phaT /na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+he b+hyo/ na ma badzra kro
453b1(rgyud 'grel): d+ha? ya mahA Sh+Totka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ badzra sando? ha darbA? ya?/ oM a mri ta kuNda li dak+Sha ma ma ku ru hUM phaT/ na ma:sa pan+ta? bud+d+he? b+hyo/ na mo a tsa la kA NOo?/ tseTTa tseTTa moTTa? moTTa/ tuTTa tuTTa/ g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA? ta ya/ hUM phaT na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+he Dhyo?:Tik+ki hUM dza:na ma sa maha bud+ha?
453b2(rgyud 'grel): b+hyoM/? oM ya ma daN+twA? ya/ nI? lA ya/ nUM? la daNA?  ya/ tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sarbba duSh+TA mA ra ya mA ra?  ya hUM phaT/ na ma:ma man+ta bud+d+hi ?/ na ma:mahA ba lI ya utsUSh+ma krod+ha rSha dzA ya/ parba nA gAnAM/ tri da yoM/ tri da yoM/ tA Da ya hUM phaT/ na mA:sa marthA? bud+d+ha nAM/ na ma:
453b3(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta d+harma NlaM?/ na ma:sa man+ta sI g+ha nA/ oM si tI ta pa tre/ oM ba ma la /oM shadka ra/ oM pra tya dgi ra/ oM badzra u ShI Sha tsakra bartI?/ sarba yan+ta martA/ mu la katna banda? ni?/ tA pA nAM kI la naM bA ma ma kri ta/ ye she na tsit+ti taM ta/ sarban+tu ts+tshinda ts+tshanda/ b+hi nI b+hinda/ tsi ri tsi ri/
453b4(rgyud 'grel): gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM sum+b+ha? na sum+b+ha hUM/ prinyNa grah+Na hUM/ grih+Na pa a grih+Na pa la hUM/ te A na ya he b+ha ga pAn biphya tsA hUM phaT/ zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du gsungs pa'i sngags brgyas shang la sogs pa'i
453b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnams dang dpal ldan la sogs pa rnams su yang g.yas bskor gyis dang/ steng dang 'og tu yang gshin rje'i jo bo la sogs ba'i khro bo bcu po rnams la'o/ /oM inda dza ma dza la zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang po la sogs pa brnams
453b6(rgyud 'grel): la yang sngon bzhin sin? par byas te/ de rnams kyi yang sngon bzhin bdud rtsi myungs pas mchog gi bde ba chen po thob par sgyur nas sgrub ba bo'i mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'o zhes bsams te/ smon lam la sogs pa byas nas sngon bzhin gshegs su
453b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol zhes pa'o/ 'di yang bskyed pa'i rin? pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim par na shes rab? thabs rjes su g.yos pa'i khu? bas zas tsam gyi ro myang bras/ shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo rnams la dang/ de bzhin du rang ji ltar 'dod pa'i
454a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po la sogs pa'i lha dang phan pa dang bcas pa'i dbang po la sogs pa rnams la ye shes kyi ro dang dbyer med pa'i gtor mas nye bar mchod pa ni gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /cho ga ji lta bar sbyang bar
454a2(rgyud 'grel): byas ba'i bgrang phreng tshad ldan rnams kyis spags bzlas pas myur bar dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes pas/ de'i cho gas cung zad brjod par bya ste/ mig ni lha la lhag par mos pa'i tshul bab? bzhin gyis shes pa'o/ /de gsal bar
454a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i phyir srad bu'i mig can te/ ak+Sha su tra 'oD yi ge rnams kyi srad bu yin pa'i phyir dang/ grangs su byed pa'i phyir a kA su tra ste/ bgrang? phreng ngo?/ /i las brjod pa ma yin pa'i zhes pas re pha dbyi'o/ /de la mu tig dang shel
454a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rus pa la sogs pa rnams la zlum po mdzes par byas pa'i ril bu rnams kyis zhes dang/ dngul? la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas pa dang/ tsandan dmar po dang/ byu ru la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang dang/ du ? dang/ lung tang dang ma

454a6(rgyud 'grel): pas skrong? pa nyid/ /braM ze'i dus pas dgug pa la/ /glang po'i rus pas chang dbab pa zhes so/ /ril? bu brgya rnams kyis shi ba dang/ brgyad lhag pas rgyas pa dang/ nyi shu rtsa lngas dban du bya ba dang/ drug cus mgon? skyed? la dang brgyas las
454a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la'o/ /'jam dpal gyi rgyud du gsungs pa/ brgya dang brgyad dam nyi shu lnga/ /lnga bcu de bzhin bar ma'o/ /de'i tshad kyi phred rnams ni/ /kun phan sngags pas thags par brgyu/ /stong phrag brgyad kyang de bzhin bya/ /phreng ba rnams
454b1(rgyud 'grel): ni mthe bong tsam/ /de ltar phreng ba rnam pa bzhi/ 'dir ni sngags pas brgya bar bya zhes so/ /de la gzhon nu mas byas pa'i srad du rnams pad+ma'i phyag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad rnam par dag par phyogs dang phyogs bral ma rnams su brgyad dang/
454b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su kun nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par dag pas gcig go zhes te/ dgu'i yon tan gyi srad bu bsgril bar byas nas/ rim pas ril bu thag pa la brgyus te/ srad bu'i gdong gnyis 'dud pa byas pa'i?
454b3(rgyud 'grel): steng du/ ril bu ste/ kun tu bsten pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang po'i chos kyi sku nyid do/ /de'i steng du ril bu gzhan ni chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid do/ /de nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog gis
454b4(rgyud 'grel): ril bu tsandan la sogs pa rnams gyis bsgo par bya'o/ /gye rdo rje la sogs pa'i sngags bzla bas ni bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga yis sbyangs te/ myur bar lag pa g.yas kyi ser? mo rnams rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i ngo bor bsgoms nas/ a yig ?  sgyes
454b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyi mas de byin gyis brlab po/ /g.yon pa'i sor mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par gsal pa la/ dang po pa'i dbyangs yongs su gyur pa las ri degs mtshan pa ste/ des byin gyis brlab cing/ so sor shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin de dag
454b6(rgyud 'grel): gi dbus su/ bgrong 'phreng gzung nas/ bye'i? rdo rje'i gzugs kyis bar ma chad par mngon par 'dod pa'i lha'i ngo bor dam/ thams cad ril bur bsgom par bya'o/ /ak+Sha ru kA ra N+ya? tu a so hi a man+ta pi sA ru/ ga Ni a si ? li sidzdza i?
454b7(rgyud 'grel): ta tu? pi sa ru oM pa de pa de ma hA dza na sarba bud+d+ha ma hAn+na? be ta hUM hUM hUM ho:ho:ho(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): swA?hA zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la/ brgyad lhag pa'i brgyar bsgyur ba'i sngags bzlas pas kyang byin gyis brlab po zhes pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de'i
455a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su stong pa nyid par snying rje dag dbyer med par lhag par mos pas/ g.yas pa'i lag pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi las rnams la/ grangs ji lta bar sdigs mdzub dang/ gung mo dang/ ming med?
455a2(rgyud 'grel): dang?/ mthe'u nang rnams su bgrang phreng gi phreng ba bzhag pa yang/ /mthe bong gi rtse mo rdo rje lcags kyu'i ngo bor bsgoms te/ lha dgug pa'i bsam pas drang bar byas nas sngags pa bzlas par bya ste/ myur
455a3(rgyud 'grel): du 'grub par byed do/ /dam tshig dag ni bsten pa dang/ /rnal 'byor bsgom par byed pa dang/ /sngags bzlas ba la? sogs pa yis/ /myur du 'bras bu ldan par 'gyur zhes bas/ dam tshig 'ga' zhig brjod par bya ste/ sems can rnamS
455a4(rgyud 'grel): la snying brtse ba dor bar mi bya ba dang/ gzhan la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa med par gleng par mi bya ba dang/ mngon spyod kyi las mi bya ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang zhum pa dang khro ba la sogs pa yongs su spang ba dang/ rnyed pa dang
455a5(rgyud 'grel): bkur sti la sogs pa'i don du bdag gi yon tan bsgrags par mi bya ba dang/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang sngags rnams rang gi rtog pa tsam? gyis mi bya ba dang/ bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i sna tshogs sa'i sngags dang lha
455a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang dbye ba med par gzung bar bya zhing/ yul gang du/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa? ? las dang? chos dang cho ga thob bar bya ba dang/ bza' bya dang bza' bya ma yin pa la sogs pa
455a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par mos par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten la gnod pa rnams rjes su bsrung ba la 'jug par goms par bya ba dang/ bya ba ngan par spyod pa rnams drangs te/ bdag gi nang gi nang du thob bar bya ba dang/ sgom
455b1(rgyud 'grel): pa po bdag rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i bdag nyid du the tshom za ba de rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur pa'i don spong ba dang/? brda? rnam la bdag goms bya ba dang/ ji ltar tshoD pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga de bzhin gsheD pa lnga dag pas sten? par bya ba dang/ ? med? rnams
455b2(rgyud 'grel): gdung bar mi bya zhing khyad bar du phyag rgya'i gzungs ma la tshig bzhin mi bya ba dang/ mtshan ma'i rnam pa dang/ bza' pa rnams la 'gom par mi bya ba dang/ chom rkun ba'i grogs spang par bya ba dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga nag po'i tshes
455b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ril bur byas nas grib ma la skams te/ thod pa'i snod kha sbyor du gzhag cing ji lta bar bdud rtsir byas nas nyi ma so sor bsten par bya ba dang/ rtsa ba'i lhung ba bcu bzhi dang sbom po'i lhang ba brgyad rnams 'bad pas
455b4(rgyud 'grel): spang bar bya ste/ de rnams ni rab tu grags pa nyid yin pas ma bris so/ /de rnams dang gzhan yan dam tshig gi khyad par rmad du byung ba rnam pa mang po de dang de rnams bcom ldan das kyi rgyud rnams su gsungs par rnams grub pa rnams kyis kyangs?
455b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu spros so/ /de ltar rtogs par byas nas 'gom bar mi bya zhing/ dam tshig smra bar yang mi bya'o zhes pa'i/ /brtag pa gnyis pa la sogs rgyud rnams su/ de yi thabs ni rnams pa du ma zhig/ mthong nas rnam pa sna tshogs mngon rtogs dang//
455b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs rnams gzhan yang 'bar bar byas/ /srog dang 'dra ba'i bla med bla ma dang/ /don du gnyer ba'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang/ /cung zad dag ni bskul bar gyur pa las/ /'di ni bdag gis rab tu bkod pa yin/ rang nyid gzugs
455b7(rgyud 'grel): brnyan 'dra yang bskul ba las/ thub pa'i dgongs la cung zad 'chad pa gang/ /de ni ngan pa'i spyod pa nyid yin te bltung ba dang bcas dmyal pa rnams su 'gyur/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i thig le 'di byas la/ /bdag gis dge ba nye bar bsgrub pa gang 
456a1(rgyud 'grel): de yis myur du dpal ldan gyi rdo rje'i/ /rnal 'byor snod du bdag dang 'jig rten gyur/ /rnam par grags pa'i mkhas pa gnas brtan shAkya bsrung pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i/ dpal kye rdo rje'i mngon par rtogs
456a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thig le 'di rdzogs so// //lung rigs kyi dbang phyug skad gnyis smra? pa'i gtsug gi nor bu/ dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i bka' drin las/ brda spod? pa'i tshul la blo'i snang ba cung zad thob pa shAkya'i
456a3(rgyud 'grel): btsun pa skyob ba dpal bzang po zhes bya bas bsgyur ba'o// //rgyud rgyal rin chen 'byung gnas bsrubs pa las/ /'byung ba'i nor bu rim gnyis 'od dkar can/ gang 'dis bod yul gdul bya'i ku mud
456a4(rgyud 'grel): tshal/ /rgyas par bya phyir skyob pa dpal bzang pos/ /bsgyur las byung ba'i dge ba rab dkar ba/ /de yis 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /paN+Di ta la ma gtugs pa dang/ rgya dpe gnyis pa'ang ma rnyed bas nongs pa'i cha mchis
456a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams so/ mkhas? rnams kyis bzod par mdzad nas slar bcos shing nyes pa'i cha rnams 'dod bar zhu'o/ /dpal dgyes pa rdo rje lta bu tshal? lo/ /'di'i lam du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dang por lhan cig skyes pa'i bde
456a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dang du nyal nas/ nang par tho rangs kar tshad med pa'i lha mo bzhi yis tshad med pa'i glus bskul nas/ langs te khrus byas nas nang du gnas te/ bdud rtsi dang ba'i rnam lngas sems dang bas maN+Dal legs par byas te
456a7(rgyud 'grel): byug pa bya zhing/ dag tu badzra re be/ hUM zhes byas pas sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs nas/ de nas me tog gcig maN+Dal gyi dbus su bzhag /bsrung pa'i phur? bu stong khro bo smad phur pa gcig tu bsams la bsrung ngo/ /me tog gcig
456b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi mgor bzhag nas lus bsrung ba dang/ de nas lag pa bkrus nas/ oM de pha pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pas me tog gcig dbus su bzhag pas gtso bo yab yum du bskyed/ shar du go rI na ma:zhes pas me tog gcig bzhag/
456b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang shar lha lho nub nub byang dang byang shar mtshams su rim pa bzhin du/ tsa? ri na ma:belta? lE na ma:g+hasma rI na ma:puk+ka sI na ma:sha ba rI na ma:/ tsaN+Da lI na ma:Dom+bi? nI na ma:/ zhes pas me tog dgram pa dang/ de
456b3(rgyud 'grel): lta mo re re mos pa tsam gyis bskyed de/ mchod pas rim pa bzhin du bshams nas/ bris sku la sogs pa legs par brkram nas/ snyan bde pa la sogs par 'dug sde/ rang nyid mos pa'i lhar bsams pa'i snying gar/ paM las pad+ma dang ri las
456b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i steng du hUM sngon po bsems la/ lus gyis rdo rje dril bu gzung/ dag tu oM haM badzra a tiSh+Tha na rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes brjod pas sems kyis hUM las 'od zer 'phros bas thams cad rdo rje'i sa bzhi dang/ grub dang daM? dang/ gur
456b5(rgyud 'grel): du bsams la oM he badzra la gong gi sngags rak+Sha la sogs pa sbyar/ bsams pas lus thams cad rdo rje'i rnam par bya ba dang/ oM badzra badzra la dzi h+ra? la sogs pa sbyor bas dag rdo rjer bsams pa dang/ oM hwe badzra yog rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA
456b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas/ sems rdo rje'i rnam par song bar bsam pa ni sems srung pa'o/ /de nas mchod pa thams cad la dmigs nas/ oM badzra puShpe A:hUM zhes pa la sogs pa gang du brjod cing me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri chab dang lha bshos
456b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams so so'i rdzas bsnams par byin gyis brlabs la/ mchod yon la dza:hUM baM ha:swAhA/ zhabs bo sil la ni ri ti kham swAhA/ zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs nas tshogs kyi lha spyan drangs pa ni/ /lus kyi rdo rje dril bu gzung nas
457a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag tu byed? ni rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor/ rdo rje mi phyed? ci bzhed pa/ /mchog tu dgyes par gshegs nas kyang/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ zhes brjod la bsam pas snying ga'i pad+ma'i hUM
457a2(rgyud 'grel): las 'od zer 'phros pas/ 'od kyis bla ma dang kye rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ de la mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang/ gdan rnams bul la maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas dang po bla ma'i smin mtshams su shes pa
457a3(rgyud 'grel): gtad la bla ma la phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa bya ba'o/ /de nas yid kyis gtso bo'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs la lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa dag par bsam pa dang/ lus kyis phyag bya gsungs/ tshig brjod cing phyag pa'o/ /de nas mchod
457a4(rgyud 'grel): par dbul ba ni/ /dang po ma'i mchod pa rdzas rim par bshams pa yod na de dbul/ med na rang gi snying ga nas phyi'i mchod pa'i lha mo sprul la dbul/ ngag tu brjod pa ni/ /chu ngad? thang las skyes pa yi/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i me tog 'di/ /gus
457a5(rgyud 'grel): pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM hUM/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i bdug spos 'di/ /gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM hUM/ gdon rnams rabs?
457a6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms? shis pa yis/ /dge zhing mun sel mar me 'di ka? gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM hUM/ nags tshal chu ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /dri zhim sbyar ba'i lha yi chu/ /gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ci
457a7(rgyud 'grel): bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM hUM/ sman rnams bcud ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /sngags kyi zhal zas bshos 'di dag/ gus pas? mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ne wi dye pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na
457b1(rgyud 'grel): sa me ye hUM zhes pas mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /da ni nang gi mchod pa ni de nas rang gi snying ga nas/ lha mo brgyad spro ba ni/ gau rI byang chub sems dkar po thogs pa/ tsa? rI byang chub sems dmar po thogs pa/ bet+ta le dri? chu thogs pa g+hasna? rI? sha lnga 'dzin gi?
457b2(rgyud 'grel): caN+Da lI cang te'u brdung ba spros la mchod pa bya'o/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa ni rang gi snying ga nas lha mo Dom+bi spros nas/ yum bdag med ma dang gnyis med du bstims la mchod do/ /de'i dus su ngag tu 'di skad brjod do/ /gau rI ma ni/ ri? bod?  'dzin/ /tso rI ma no nyi ma?
457b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /bet+ta lI naM? rdo rje chu/ /g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing/ /spos mo tsandan sdong po 'dzin/ /ri khrod ma ni sbrang rtsi 'dzin/ /gsum mo cang te'u skra brdung cing/ /g.yung mo mgul pa dag la 'khyud/ /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa/ /skyes pu bzhin du byin? ?
457b4(rgyud 'grel): par shog /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum/ /'di dag gsum gyis gtso bo mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swAhA hUM/ de nas sdig pa bshags pa ni/ /bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang ? ?
457b5(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'dir/ /thams cad ma lus so sor bshags/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang/ /'phags pa rang rgyal nyin thos dang/ /so so skyo bo'i tshogs rnams la/ /gus pas rjes su yi rang ngo/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
457b6(rgyud 'grel): rkang gnyis mchog /de yis gsungs pa'i dam chos dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun la/ /byang chub thang? du skyabs su mchi bdag gi sbyin? pa la sogs pa/ /pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs ba/ /rdo rje'i theg pa bla med pa'i/ /lam ni yang dag bsten par
457b7(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /bdag gi dge ba 'di dag kun/ /bya med byang chub byang dag rdzogs/ /sems can kun don phan pa'i phyir/ /mi gnas? mya ngan 'das la dgod?/ /bdag ni dge ba 'di? dag kun/ /yongs su rdzoD par gyur ma? ni/ /sems can kun? dang thun mong du/ /yongs su
458a1(rgyud 'grel): smin cing rdzogs par shog /ces brjod la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i lha chogs 'khor dang bcas pa la/ bdag nyid lus 'bul gyis/ bdag dus thams cad dang rnam pa thams
458a2(rgyud 'grel): cad du zhes su gsol/ /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis/ /dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas sdom? pa gzung nas bstod pa nyi shu pas bstod la/ bzod par gsol ba ni/ g.yang bdag blo gti? mug?
458a3(rgyud 'grel): pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod nas smon lam gdab pa mi rigs su skye zhing dam tshigs can/ /sno? med? kyi yi rdo rje ston/ /bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur par shog /lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol/ /zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang/ /btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /de nas gshegs su gsol ba ni/ /oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul
458a4(rgyud 'grel): du gshegs nas kyang/ slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes brjod la ha? badzra maN+Dal mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /mdor bsdus pa'i bya ba rdzogs so// //sA? cha bya pa'i rim pa yang/ /sa la 'jim pa ?
458a5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /'jim pa rin chen sna lngar bsam/ /de nas sems can thams cad la/ /byams dang snying rje bskyed bya zhing/ /rigs gsum lha yang dran par byas/ /chos sku'i gzugs brnyan? bzhes pa dang/ /de yang sems
458a6(rgyud 'grel): can don du'o/ /de nas 'jim pa ngag la ni/ /sngags ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ be ro tsa Na/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te/ saM mya? sa bud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM suk+Sh+me suk+ShE sa me sa ma ye/ shAn+te dan+te/ ? ? ? a na la gA ta raM be? ya sho pa tim
458b1(rgyud 'grel): hA te dza ni raku? le ni nA? Ne/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA rten 'brel ngag gi sngags ngag gis/ /rab tu gnas pa bya ba yin rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid ye shes rgyus skyes
458b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku phyag 'tshal nas/ /shin tu bsdus par gyur pa yi/ /bung pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /dang po kho nar khams gsum thams cad sems tsam du shes par byas la/ de nas bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i gzugs chu skyes dmar
458b3(rgyud 'grel): po dang 'dra ba skad cig gis rdzogs par byas te/ rang gi snying gar bcu drug byed kyi pad+ma shin tu dmar ba bsams la/ de'i lte ba la A li yang dag par bsdus pa'i gzugs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rjes su chags pa'i yi ge A:dang hUM
458b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par yid kyis bris te/ de nas hUM dang a las byung ba shin tu dmar ba'i 'od? zer yid bzo bar byed pa spros te// //gur gum lta bu'i 'od zer de phyogs thams cad khyab ste/ sems can
458b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang gi gzugs su byas la/ de'i sku gsung thugs lhan cig tu bkug ste/ hUM dang/ oM gnyis kyi thig le le gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas hUM yongs su gyur pa las/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin bung ba'i gzugs/ rin po che lta
458b6(rgyud 'grel): bu'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin me tog gi ngo? 'thungs pas brgyal ba/ hUM gaM ngo bo'i sgra rtag ring du sgrog pa/ /bdag med ma dang he ru ka'i rang bzhin bsgom bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i snying gar mtshon dmar po/ ko ba'i chu lta bu'i thig le phra mo aM?
458b7(rgyud 'grel): dang hUM gi yi ge bltas te/ de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi bung ba srog gi rlung la zhin te sna'i bu ga nas phyung la/ khams gsum na gnas pa sems can gyi lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dgu par byas te bsdu'o/ /yang dpugs kyi rlung
459a1(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas ji lta bar bya ste/ rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma'i lte ba la rab tu rnam par dag pa la gzhug par bya ste/ gzhan gyi sku gsung thugs dang/ rang gi sku gsung thugs gcig tu mnyam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar yang
459a2(rgyud 'grel): dang yang du ji srid skad cig gis ma mthong gi bar du/ dbugs la brten pa'i gzugs bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar goms pa'i rting la skyes pa dang bud med kyi skad cig pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam la/ nga'i? ngo bud bsrog
459a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rtsol ba la brten nas snga ma bzhin du byung ste/ bdag nyid gyi snying gi me tog gi lte ba la gzhug par bya ste/ skyes pa'i sna'i bu gar zhugs te/ lus ngag yid gsum gyi gzugs/ snying ga'i pad+ma lte pa la 'dug ste/ de'i snying ga'i pad+ma'i
459a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma la lus kyis rang bzhin gyi? la yong pa bdag nyid kyi lus bsgom/ ngag gi rang bzhin pad+ma 'thung/ sems kyi rang bzhin pad+ma'i snying po zos te/ de nas sgrub pa pos rang gi dbugs kyi rlung bkug ste/ skyes pa'i sna'i bu'i ga nas
459a5(rgyud 'grel): phyung la/ bdag nyid sna'i bu ga nas seng? gi pad+ma'i ge? sar la gzhug go /de ltar lus ? der lus kyang rang bzhin gyi chu skyes kyi rdul gnyis gcig tu byas/ ngag gi rang bzhin gyi me tog gi khu ba gnyis gcig tu byas/ semS
459a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin pad+ma'i snying po gnyis gcig tu byas par bsam par bya'o/ /de yang de ltar sgros? pa dang/ de ltar gzhug pa dang/ de ltar bstims te/ yang dag par bsam par bya'o/ /de yang dang yang du ji srid du rjes su chags kyi bar
459a7(rgyud 'grel): du bya'o/ /rjes su chags ba mthong ba dang/ ji ltar bsgom pa bzhin du shes nas byed de/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa grub par byed do/ /'dir bsgom pa 'di byas na/ bud med dga' ba'i sems kyis chags par byed pa dang/ 'dod pas
459b1(rgyud 'grel): ? brgyal ba'i lus kyis/ sgrub pa po'i sems bde bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nyes ba yong par mthong na/ ji ltar bsten par mi bya'o/ /gal te byas na chen po'i sdig par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sngon du yul dang yul ma yin pa shes par
459b2(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ de shes ba dang/ ji ltar bstan pa bsgom par bya'o/ /bud bas 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /rnams par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /'di na 'khor ba'i skye bo rnams/ /dpal gyi snying rje thob par shog /rdzogs so// //
459b3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa brnyes pa'i rata? na tsan dras mdzad pa/ o tsa ba khu dngos grub bo// //rgya gar skad du/ bA li ta ta twa soM gra ha/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa/ ye shes ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas las la bzhugs pa yi/
459b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dang/ /grub thob rnams la phyag 'tshal te/ /gtor ma'i de nyid bshad par bya/ /bskyed rim lha yi dran pa bskyed/ /mdun du nam mkha' i dbus gnas par/ /chos 'byung e yi dbyibs 'dra ba/ /pad+ma 'dab
459b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bsam pa ni/ /steng 'og dbus kyi lha yi gdan/ /ji ltar rigs par rim pa gsum/ /kha dog dbye ba so so yi/ /steng 'og phyogs skyong brgyad nyid do/ /spyi bo snying ga mgrin pa ru/ /yi ge gsum ni so sor dgod/ /de las 'di ni dkar
459b6(rgyud 'grel): po 'byung/ /gzugs med srid pa'i lha sogs nas// //rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams ni/ /'od kyis bsdus nas gcig tu byas/ /de la yi ge nyid du 'gyur/ /yi ge las ni mtshan mar ro/ /de nyid yongs su gyur pa
459b7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /sku yi rdo rje ngo bo nyid/ /sku mdog dkar zhing g.yas brkyang ba'i/ /g.yas na rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /lha mo spyan dang bzhugs pa'o/ /sngar gyi thugs ka'i yi ge las/ /sngags kyi yi ge phyung nas ni/ /phyogs skyong bcu dang pha ma
460a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ bsdus te 'od kyi gong bung ro/ /de las rang gi sa bon nyid/ /mtshan mar yang dag blta ba'o/ /de nyid las ni lha yi gzugs/ /thugs kyi rdo rje sku mdog sde?/ /phyag mtshan sku yi rdo rje mtshungs/ /g.yas brkyang?
460a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i gdan la ni/ /A ma kI dang lhan cig bzhugs/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba'o/ /sa steng mi dang sa 'og klu/ /byol song yi dags dmyal ba rnaMs/ a las 'od zer byang na mi? gcig tu gyur pas chos 'byung bas can sku mdog dmar po phyag bzhi pa/ /phyag mtshan
460a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra gaN+ta? bsams/ /gos dkar me dang gnyis med spror/ /pad gar dbang bsgom pa'o/ /de ltar sems can thams cad ni/ chos 'byung nang du rigs gsum dngos/ /bsams la bdag gi mgrin sogs nas/ /yi ge hUM sogs so so
460a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dza:hUM baM ho:sa lcags kyu la/ /sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po yis/ /rtag pa la sogs rigs gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas bkug ste gzugs brnyan la/ /bstims pas chu la chu blugs bzhin/ /tha dad med de gcig tu gyur? ba? dang
460a5(rgyud 'grel): snying sa bon 'od zer la/ /lha mo byung ste de rnaMs las/ /spyir por bum pas dbang bskur bas/ /steng gi lha rnams dkar po la/ /rtag pa yis ni dbu brgyan byas/ /dbus kyi lha la thugs phyag rgya/ /'og gi lha la gsung phyag rgya/ /de ltar
460a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs gsum dngos bsams la/ /rang nyid sa bon khyad bar las/ /'od zer las ni lha yi cho gas/ /phyung? ste zhabs bsil zhal bsil dbul/ /de 'og mchod pa rnam lngas mchod/ /steng 'og dbus su rang gi rigs/ /der rdzas gtor
460a7(rgyud 'grel): ma byin rlabs la/ /in da'i? sngags kyis lha rnams mchod/ /oM inda/ dza ma dza la dza kA b+hu ta ba ha ni pA u rak+ka tsan sA dzA mA da pAp+pa ta la pA tA laM aTTa? sap+pa swAhA/ bUny+dza/ dzaM g+haM phul+la dU? p+pa mi saM paM? ga ahha?  sabba kadzA sA tU/ phan+ti khu ni phaT
460b1(rgyud 'grel): gang/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM/ A dyA nutpan+na twA ta oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ blo dman rnams kyis go bya'i phyir/ gtor ma'i de nyid bsdus pa 'di/ /bdag gis gsal bar byas pa 'dis/ /bde bas yid dger bder gyur cig /slob dpon d+harmA pa gas?
460b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shal saM ga ba d+hi bod skad du/ ro bsreg cho ga dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bar chen po/ /dri med yid kyis btang byas te/ /rdo rje gur gyi rgyud la
460b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /brten te dgyes pa rdo rje yis/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ro bsreg cho ga bshes par bya/ /dur khrod dam ni chu bo'i 'gram/ /nags tshal 'bab chu bgon pa ru/ /rdo rje slob dpon mtshan ldan ni/ /brtan zhing zab mo'i chos
460b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /rig pa'i gnas rnams kun la mkhas/ /rtsa ba'i ltung? ba rab 'joms pa/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i sngags/ /sgrub pa po la 'grub po kye/ /de la dang por bsnyen pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du shes byas te/ /lha dang ro yi dbye ba yis//
460b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gnyis su sbyar bar bya/ /de la lha yi cho ga yang/ bla ma rdo rje can mchod cing/ /bdun ba rnam par dag par bya/ /byang chub du ni sems bskyed de/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par bsgom/ /de la sangs rgyas gnas bsam te/ /byang chub
460b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam lnga bsgom par bya/ /dang po skyes bu bsam de nas/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /dri za rab tu zhugs pa ni/ /ltung ste zhu ba rjes dran pa/ /mtshams kyi lha mos bskal bar bya/ /bskul nas 'bras bu bzhengs ba la/ /mig siD
460b7(rgyud 'grel): gti mug rdo rje sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgong/ /ye shes dngos po rab bcug la/ /rig ma brgyad kyi dbang bskur bya/ /bdud rtsi yang ni myang bya zhing/ /lha mo brgyad rnams kyis mchod dang/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pa la 
461a1(rgyud 'grel): bstong bya/ /de ltar yan lag drug po ni/ /sngags drug gis ni nga rgyal bya/ /de nas kyang ni yud tsam bsam/ /de la mtshan ma mtshon? par bya/ /de nas ro yi cho ga yang/ /slob dpon 'das pa'i dus na ni/ /rmongs pa
461a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni gshi zhes zer/ shi ba zhes pa rnam rtog ste/ /dag pa'i gnas su gshegs pa'o/ /yang na bde ba can du 'am/ /dag pa'i gnas su skye 'gyur pa/ /ro pa sreg 'di yis rnam par 'byed/ /lus mdza' nas ni lus mthar? skyel//
461a3(rgyud 'grel): dman pa'i sems can thams cad kyang/ /pang? 'gro nas ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /de la cho ga dang por ni/ /chu gtsang dri zhim sbyar bas bkra/ sna tshogs dri yis byugs pa dang/ /tshul bzhin rgyan gyis gnas byas te/ /bgegs bskrar? lhar
461a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed cho ga dang/ /skye mchad? gnas gsum byin rlabs te/ /rnam shes a yi gzugs kyis gzhug/ rtsa ba'i sngags sogs tshul bzhin du/ /bzlas pas sdig sgrib thams cad bcom/ /byang chub sems su zhu byas la//
461a5(rgyud 'grel): slar yang bskyed cing tshul bzhin ldang/ /gtor dang mchod pa rgya chen bya/ /smon lam gdab cing bsrung la gnas/ /yi ge brgya pa ci mang du/ /bzlas brjod bya ba sngags pa yin/ /de ltar thun gsum bar du ni/ /bzlas brjod 'du?
461a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi tshar? du bya/ /de ni ston? gyi cho ga'o/ /de rjes sa yi cho ga sogs/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga tshul bzhin sbyar/ /rdo rje slob dpon dag la ni/ /rdo rje dril bu lag par sbyin/ /mgo bor dbu rgyan bskor bas bya/ /rdo rje sdom pa rnams byin te/
461a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du 'jug tshul bzhin bya/ /bum pa'i dbang bskur rnams byin la/ /rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor? gyis/ /'du byed rab tu bya bar bstan/ /sgrub pa po yang de? ltar bya/ /sems can phal pa thams cad kyi/ /'jug cing dbang
461b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur spang bar bya/ /sbyin sreg cho ga 'ba' zhig gis/ /sbyang ba dag ni rab tu bya/ /de la sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs gcig tu sreg khang brtsig par bya ste/ /ji tsam lcogs pa'i maN+Dal byas la/ de yi dbus su zhi pa'i thab
461b2(rgyud 'grel): khung zlum po khru gang par bya'o/ /khru phyed thar du brko sor bzhi phyir bskyed/ kha khyer sor bzhi bskor de'i phyi rims kyi sor bzhi bor la/ pad ma'i phreng ba bri/ thab khung gi nang du gtso po'i phyag mtshan gzhag pa ni dbus su rdo rje/ shar du 'khor
461b3(rgyud 'grel): lo/ lhor rin chen/ nub tu pad+ma/ byang du ral gri/ zheng sor brgyad par bya'o/ /kha dog dkar pos byugS pa der/ shing khang ji ltar rigs par brtsigs te/ ro de dkyil 'khor la kha mngon du phyogs par gzhug go/ mchod rdzas dang? ?
461b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas bzhag pa'i rim pa ni/ sngags mkhan gyi g.yon du yon chab kyi snod gser la sogs pa chab kyis bkang pa dang/ zhabs bsil gyi snod bzhag g.yas phyogs su zangs? gzhong gcig gi nang du dris bkang la/ ku sha ? pa
461b5(rgyud 'grel): prok+Sha Na'i snod gzhag/ de bzhin du me tog dang/ bdug spos? dang/ dri'i dung la sogs pa'i snod bzhag go/ mdun gyi maN+Dal la gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i bzer zhal bzhag par bya ste/ de ltar me tog/ bdug spos/ dri? yi
461b6(rgyud 'grel): dud sogs g.yas gnas te/ /g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod/ /mdun du bzed snod bzhag byas la/ /zhabs bsil sngon du 'gro bas dbul/ /me tog spos sogs go rims bzhin/ /sgeg sogs mchod bas mchod byas nas//
461b7(rgyud 'grel): ? ba chen por gyur pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang sreg rdzas bzhag pa'i rim pa yid/ mdun du dgang gzar dang/ blugs gzar dang/ khyad par gyis rdzas til dang/ thun mong gi rdzas kyi gtso bo mar bzhag par bya'o/ /rdzas
462a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan g.yas phyogs su maN+Dal la ji ltar 'byor bar gzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar yang dgang gzar blugs gzar khyad par rdzas/ thun mong rdzas kyi gtso bo rnams/ /sngags mkhan mdun du bzhag byas la/ /rdzas
462a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan g.yas su ci 'byor ba// go rims bzhin du bzhags par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bdag nyid khrus byas la rgyan gyis brgyan te/ mchod pa la sogs pa kun hUM gis bsangs la/ lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje gzung la
462a3(rgyud 'grel): snod kun gyi steng du gtug cing/ oM A:hUM zhes bsngags pas 'jig rten pa'i rtog pa kun bsal nas/ rdzas de nyid bzang zhing dri ma med par bsam mo/ /yam shing dang bud shing yang zhi ba la ji ltar bsngags pa ltar gzung? po/
462a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob dpon gyis yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs par bya/ sngar gyi gsal na ma byas kyang rung/ de nas gtsubs pa la sogs pa'i me blangs te/ rlung g.yab kyis me sbar? ro/ /oM dzwa la dzwa la hUM phaT ma sbar

462a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la/ /de nyid 'dod chags chen po dngul chu bzhin du zhu nas gnas pa la/ yi ge raM bsgril mar gyur nas/ yi ge gnyis gyur pa las me lha yab yum zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ gsum khyim che ba/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan
462a7(rgyud 'grel): can mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yas na gund+he? dang mchod pa'i phyir thogs/ g.yon na bum pa dang bgrang phreng sku mdog dkar por bsams la/ thugs kar sna
462b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad ma'i steng du me gru gsum/ lce la raM bsam mo/ /de ltar raM zhu ba las dam tshig sems dpa' i me lha bsgom pa ste/ de yang rang gi lhag? pa'i lhar dmigs te/ bzang po'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /me lha phun tshogs kun dmiD
462b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ /lho pa'i gnas su sreg blugs bya/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsang gtor dang/ yon chab dang/ phyag byas la/ oM agna ye ma hA te dzA/ sarba karma sA d+ha ka/

462b4(rgyud 'grel): du dbul/ sngags ni/ oM agna ye hUM/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya badzra satwa sya sarba pA paM? da hA swAhA/ oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ oM sarba saM pa de swAhA/ oM badzra bi dza ya swAhA/ oM mahA be ga ye swAhA/ e? ma hA bA la ye swAhA/ oM badzra g+hasma
462b5(rgyud 'grel): ri swAhA/ oM badzra A yu? she swAhA/ oM badzra a pra hi ha ha badzra dzya dzA ya swAhA/ oM badzra dzya dzA ya swAhA/ oM badzra bro? d+haM bak+Sha yA swAhA/ oM pa hA ya swAhA/ oM ku pa rA ya swahA/ oM sarba ka ra ya swAhA/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya sarba pA paM da ha swAhA
462b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis sreg rdzas rnams gong bzhin dbul lo/ /de nas mar gyi dgang blugs brgya'am stong dbul bar bya'o/ /yang bsang gtor byas nas/ oM dza:hUM baM ho:khaM raM zhes pas arg+ha dbul lo/ /oM ni ri ha hUM zhes zhal
462b7(rgyud 'grel): bsil dbul/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa dang/ skeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod la/ oM badzra g+haN+De a:zhes bas dril bu dbul/ oM mahA badzra hUM zhes bya bas rdo rje gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas me lha la bstod pa
463a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ don chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas thab khung lan gsum du bsams/ me lha'i thugs kar so so'i snying po las dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' ci?
463a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs par spyan drangs la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /yang bsang gtor la sogs pa byas la/ gnas khang du ba'i lci bas byugs la maN+Dal gru bzhi pa'i stegs bu brtsigs te/ re khA? dkar pos gru bzhi nyis rim du byas la/ dbus
463a3(rgyud 'grel): su gtor ma cha gcig bzhag/ /mchod? pa lnga yang bsham/ tshogs kyi kha zas sor chen po gcig tu spyi spungs su bzhag/ chang yang snod? chen po gcig bkang/ da mi 'degs? par bzhag nas/ de nas mar gzar bu nyi shu rtsa gcig
463a4(rgyud 'grel): tu dbul par bya'o/ /de nas rdzas lhag ma rnams rang gi sngags sam/ lha'i sngags kyis rim bzhin du phul la/ tha mar yang mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du dbul/ yang bsang ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa rdzogs par

463a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa rang lha sdig byed ni/ gzuD kyis gzugs ni gzugs su bsgoms la/ sbyang ba'i cho ga'i man ngag ste/ brgyud pa'i thabs kyis shes par bya/ de nas gar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag byas la/ oM A:hUM mu:sa
463a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol zhing smon lam gdab bo/ /yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas nas rdzas kyi lhag ma ci 'byor bas me lha mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas bsangs la/ mchod pa dang/ bstod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas
463b1(rgyud 'grel): yang bsangs la gshegs su gsol ba ni/ /bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don/ /bsgrubs kyis byin za khyed gshegs shag/ de ltar dus bzhin slar gshegs nas/ /bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod/ /ces gshegs su gsol lo//
463b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gis mi dmigs par bsam mo/ /de nas rus bu bsdus la/ shi ba la phan mchod rten bya'o/ /de ltar nyi ma gsum ni lon pa dang/ /dus pa'i phreng ba bsdus byas la/ /dri dang 'o mas bran nas ni/ /de yis mchod rten du bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so//
463b3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan brjod kyis mi lang ba'i/ /sbyin sreg cho ga 'di byas pas/ kha dog gi? bsod nams phung po 'dis/ /nyams thag rnams ni rgyal gyur shog /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po/ /ye shes snying po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ do? bsreg pa'i
463b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang du bya ba rdzogs so// // */ /dpa' po gcig pa dpal he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ oM ka pI ra sh+rI he ru ka Sho Da sha b+hu dza sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpa' bo gcig pa dpal he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub? pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por rang nyid thun mong dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas bgeD dang 'che pa la sogs pa med par rjes mthun pa'i gnas su zhugs te/ bya ba'i rim
463b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni maN+Dal ngas? ris? la sogs pa dgod pa dang/ mchod pa nye bar bshams te/ khrus sngon du song bas lhar mos shing/ stan bde? ba la 'dug nas/ oM badzra buShpe oM A hUM zhes pa la sogs pa mchod pa lnga byin gyis brlab
463b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ mchod pa gzhan dag kyang oM A:hUM zhes so/ /de nas rang gi snying gar raM yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma la hUM bsams te/ de'i 'od zer dag gnas pa'i khang pa la phog pas rdo rje sa btam? par mos shing/ /oM he badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha?
464a1(rgyud 'grel): sta ta na ra rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pas gnas bsrung? pa dang/ de bzhin du bdag srog dang rnal 'byor bsrung pa la yang sbyar te/ oM A ta ma dzo? pa yi ge zhes pa dag gis so/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las 'od
464a2(rgyud 'grel): zer 'phros pas/ bsod nams tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ mngon sum lta bur gsal bar dmigs te/ chu dang thar la skyes pa yi/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i me tog 'di/ /gus pas mchog gis bdag dbul na/ /ci bde bar
464a3(rgyud 'grel): ni bzhes su gsol/ oM badzra puShpe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM /de la sogs pa thun mong gi mchod pa byas la/ /yang rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las lha mo brgyad byung ste mchod do/ /de yang gau rI ma ni ri bong 'dzin/ /tso?
464a4(rgyud 'grel): rI? ma? nyi ma'o/ /ro langs ma ni 'bab chu 'dzin/ /g+hasma? rI ni stobs 'dzin pa'o/ /spos mo tsan dan sdong bu 'dzin/ /ri khrod ma ni sprang rtsi'o/ /gtum cang te'u sgra brdung zhing/ /g.yung mo mgul pa la stong? pa'o/ /skyes bu bzhin du byed

464a6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems rnams dang/? /'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang/ /so so skye bo'i bsod nams de/ /kun la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /de nas sngo ba bya ste/ /bdag gi dge ba 'di dag kun/ /bla med byang chub yang dag rdzogs/ /sems can kun dang
464a7(rgyud 'grel): thun mong du/ /yongs su smin cing rdzogs par bgyi/ /de nas skyabs su gsol te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ de yis gsungs pa'i dam chos dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /
464b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas smon lam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /bdag gi bla med byang chub tu/ /yang dag rdzogs par gyur nas ni/ /sems can kun don phan pa'i phyir/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas 'jug pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/

464b3(rgyud 'grel): 'brel lta bur gsal bar dmigs nas/ tshad med pa bzhi brtse gdung gi rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang bral bar bya ba dang/ thabs thob pas dga' ba dang/ mi rtog pa la 'jug pa btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la

464b5(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes pa nges ni stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yi/ /rang bzhin nga 'am bdag yin no/ /zhes ba de la gnas par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /ye shes dang ldan lha ru mos pa re/ /de yi mdun ni nam mkha' 
464b6(rgyud 'grel): re pa las/ /gyur ba nyi ma'i steng du hUM las ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ye shes lnga ldan bsam/ /de yi lte bar hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas/ /bgegs bsregs ra ba dang ni gur yang bsam/ /de yi nang du pad+ma nyi ma la/ /rang gi sems nyid
464b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rnam pa yis ? hUM gi de nyid yongs su gyur pa las/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i lte bar yi ge hUM/ /yang ni de yi 'od zer gyis ni khams gsum gyi/ /sems can rnam par sbyangs te 'od zer bsdu/ /de rjes rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las/ /he ru ka
465a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal zla ba chu shel 'od/ /zhal brgyad nyi shu rtsa bzhi spyan gyis tshe/ /bcu drug phyag ldan zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi mnan/ /rang sang mos pa tsam ste dngos su min/ /mche ba cung zad gcigs shing ral pa dang
465a2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'i dbu rgyan thod pa'i phreng ba dang/ /spyi gtsug 'khor lo la sogs phyag rgya lnga/ /brkyang bskum spyil krung phyed pa gar mos bya/ /de tshe rang gi snying gar nyi ma la/ /hUM gi rnam pa bdud rtsi thig le dang cas/ /srog dang rtsol ba

465a7(rgyud 'grel): ? stu de badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA? ga ta a mri ta su ta na badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko haM/ da ni rdzogs rim la 'jug pa/ /shes bya'i gtso mo gtum mo sbar/ /yang ?ni srog dang rtsol sbyar bas/ /ye shes rlung dang me sbar bas/ /haM
465b1(rgyud 'grel): las bdud rtsi'i thig le bag/ ngal so dbugs dbyung dbyer med 'gyur/ /de la sems brtan rtse gcig bya/ /nyams chen gtso bo'i rnam pa ni/ /dga' dang skad cig rig pa gsum las/ /mtshan nyid bral ba'i lhan skyes bsgom/ /sems brtan
465b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi mtshan ma ni/ /gzung 'dzin bral zhing ye shes rnyed/ /rtags ni smig rgyu du ba dang/ /mar me sprin med nam mkha' 'dra/ /nges par chos nyid mngon du byed/ de lta ci nus bsgom bya ste/ /skyob par gyur na sngags bzlas bya/ /bdag
465b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid rim gnyis tshogs pa gcig/ bskyed rim 'bras bu he ru ka/ mig sman? chag pa lta bur mos/ /phyag mtshan zhal sogs sngar bzhin no/ /rdzogs rims bde la mi rtag cing mi dmigs pa ru mos pas bzlas/ /? ba lta bu'i
465b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan dang/ /chu zla lta bu'i rnam pa ste?/ /brag? cha lta bu'i bzlas pa ni/ /oM aSh+Tha? na ya/ ping+ga urd+ha? ke sha/ warta ma na ye tsa turbi? sha ti ne ta ya/ Sho? Da sha b+hu dza ya kri ? dzaM? mU? ta wa? du She/ ka pA la mA ? rde ka d+hu ra raM Na?/ Ad+ha? ta kru
465b5(rgyud 'grel): ra? dzid+hA? ya/ a? indu? daMSh+Ta?/ /oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ri ya/ gardza ya bardza? ya/ tardza la tardza ya/ she Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sapta sA ga ga rA na/ band+ha band+ha/ a wa? na ga kA na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ sarba sha truM naM/ ha hA hi hI hu hU he? hai ho hau haM ha:hUM
465b6(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA?/ zhes pa bdag ni bzlas byas nas/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma 'am/ mtshan phyed yin na tshogs 'khor bya/ /de nas cung zad mchog byas la/ /oM A:hUM mu:yis ni/ /ye shes bdag po gshegs su gsol/ dam tshig rang
465b7(rgyud 'grel): gi thugs dkar bsdu/ /spyod lam lhag par mos pa yis/ /bskyed rim lha yi nga rgyal dang/ /rdzogs rim gnyis su med par mos// //gang zhig thar pa'i lam ni 'dod pa nges/ /bla med mchog gi theg par zhugs 
466a1(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdam ngag la brten nas/ /tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po bsgrub/ /de ltar bdag la 'di ni rim par 'byung/ /rjes su 'brangs pas 'di bzhin bsgrub par bya/ /dge ba gang thob des
466a2(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad kyang/ /'phral la yid ches mngon du byed gyur cig/ dpa' bo gcig pa dpal he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i bsgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pra ti sta bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ spyan dbye ba'i cho ga
466a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi rab tu gnas pa'i lam bya ba'i phyir/ cho ga gang gis gang la rab tu gnas pa de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o/ /de yang thams cad la 'thad cing dgon pa ma yin te/ skye
466a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa la gang zhig rab tu gnas par bya/ /kun rdzob gtso bor spyod pas kyang/ /de nyid byin rlabs yin shes na/ /rab gnas cho ga mi 'thad do/ /sems can dang po'i las can gyis/ /rgyud rnams yang dag smin phyir byas/ /de yang
466a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mthu thob pa dang/ 'thob pa'i bye brag gis cho ga bsdus pa dang/ rgyas pa'i bye brag gis ci rigs par bla ma'i man ngag la brten pa rnams kyis shes par bya'o/ /de la cho ga rgyas pa ni dang po bsnyen pa gtso bo'i 'bum
466a6(rgyud 'grel): 'am 'khor gyi khrig de ltar grangs sam/ mtshan ma'i bsten pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga dag tshul bzhin du byas la/ khrus sa'i stegs bu brtsigs la/ bum pa rnams bkod la/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ge ni rang gi yi dam
466a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha'i sbyor bas mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa las/ thams cad chu las kham por du/ /cung zad blugs te rnam rgyal gyi/ /bum ba pa las skyes pa yi/ /rin po che yi steng du bzhag/ der ni dkyil 'khor bskyed bya ste/ /dam tshig
466b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rdzogs pa dang/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /zhal bsil la sogs rim par dbul/ /dam tshig lhan cig bcug byas te/ /mchod pa rnams kyis tshim byas la/ /me tog spos sogs rol mo yis/ /'bad pa yis gyur mchod
466b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dril bu dag ni dkrol ba dang/ /bstod pa gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis bkru bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA la a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI hUM/ /'di ni khrus sngags so/ /ras? sogs
466b3(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gsang sngags kyis/ /mnyam par bzhag pas dngul bar bya/ /yang na rang gi sngags kyis dbul/ /bzlas te phyag 'tshal gtso bo la /oM badzra pA sa se swAhA/ me tog la sogs pa'i sngags su yeng 'gyur ro/ /gser la sogs
466b4(rgyud 'grel): pas snod byas te/ /sprang rtsi mar ser byugs pa yi/ /gser gyi thur ma yis ni mig/ dbye ba 'am yang na bsam gtan gyis/ /oM tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu ba sho d+ha na swA? ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /dga' ldan yang dag
466b5(rgyud 'grel): rab bzhugs nas ji ltar lha mo ? 'phrul ?/ /de bzhin 'dir gnas bzhugs byas la/ /'dir ni rgyun du zhuD? gyur nas/ /mgon po me tog la sogs 'di/ /byang chub sems kyis bsdus pa'i phyir/ /che ge mo yi don du bzhes/ /lha rnamS
466b6(rgyud 'grel): brten par 'dod pa yis/ /mgo bo snying ga lkog nas su/ /rdo rje yis ni bskor byas nas/ /lan gsum bskor te rab gnas bya/ chad pa 'a ni lhag pas kyang/ /bdag gis brjod nas gang bgyid pa/ /gang phyir lus can skyabs mdzad pa//
466b7(rgyud 'grel): mgon po khyod kyis dkrod? par mdzod/ /mchad? pa dang ma shes ba/ /ma lus par yang bzod par mdzod/ /nyungs pa 'am bzhan du bgyis pa gang/ /de dag bzod par mdzad par rigs/ /zhes pas bzod par gsol la smon lam gdab//
467a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten glegs bam la sogs la/ /kye yi rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /rab tu gnas pa bya ba ste/ /rnam pa dag ni ci rigs par/ /de nas slob ma rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la/ ci bde bar ni mchod
467a2(rgyud 'grel): par gyis zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas gtor ma dang sbyin sreg gi las byas te/ de rnams kyi cho ga ni gzhan du shes par bya'o/ /mchod pa dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas/ ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de ni cho ga
467a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon nus dang ldan pas ni nyin gcig gis rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rdzogs par bya ste/ rang gi lha bskyed pa'i rim pa byas la/ rang gi lha'i sngags brgya 'am stong du bzlas brjod byas te/ rab tu gnas pa'i rten
467a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyang ba dang/ brten pa'i ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa byas la/ yid kyi mchod pas mchod la bzlas brjod ci rigs pa bya'o/ rdzogs so// //sA tsha bya ba'i rim pa yang/ /sa la 'jim? pa byas nas ni/ /rang gi lha yi
467a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyis/ /'thim pa rin chen par lngar bsam/ /de nas sems can thams cad la/ byams dang snying rje bskyed bya ste/ /rigs gsum lha yang dran par bya/ /chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs pa dang/ /de yang sems can don du'o/ /de
467a6(rgyud 'grel): nas 'dzin ? dag pa ni/ sngags ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gad ba/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ pai ro tsa ra/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ? ha te/ saM myaka saM burn+na ya/ tadya thA/ oM suk+Sha me suk+Sh+Tha? sa ma sa ma ye/ shAn+te dan+te/ a sa ma ro be a na
467a7(rgyud 'grel): lam+ba/ ta pa ba dang shes ? me hA te dza ni mgu le ni rgaNa/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hi Sh+Thi ta swAhA/ rten 'brel dag gi sngags dpag gis/ /rab tu gnas par bya ba yin/ rdzogs so/ gtor ma'i cho ga /rgya gar skad du/ bi
467b1(rgyud 'grel): liM bid+hi?/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro la/ /btud de dang bas phyag 'tshal nas/ /sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /gtor ma'i cho ga bri bar bya/ /dkon mchog gsum
467b2(rgyud 'grel): ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /skad cig tsam gyis stong par bsgom sA la/ da nas hUM zhes brjod de/ hUM las skad cig tsam phyis rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang/ ra ba dang dra ba'i nang du khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa la lha'i ?
467b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du bskyed la/ bdag nyid kyang de'i mdun du he ru ka'i gzugs su bsams la/ yi ge 'bru drug dang/ 'bru gsum dang/ cod pan gyi lha dran pas bsung bar bya'o/ /de nas 'og tu yaM raM las rlung dang me bskyed la/ a las ? pa bskyed/
