467b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bsam/ de'i steng gi bar snang la hUM las zla ba'i steng du rdo rje bskyed/ rlung gis me sbar mes bdud rtsi bsgol ba'i 'od kyis bzla ba dang rdo rje yang thim nas lha'i bdud rtsir gyur te/ de'i steng du oM bsam/ de'i
467b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste bstims la/ yi ge 'bru gsum gyi sngags lan gsum bzlas pas byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyis lta spyan drangs la/ oM sh+rI te? bu ka ma hA
467b6(rgyud 'grel): badzra A gzugs? g+had+ha? oM/ pra be sha ya pra bo sha ya/ ban+d+ra ya band+ha la/ to Sha la to Sha ya/ sarbba badzra DA ki nI naM hi da ya hUM hUM phaT phaT zhes brjod la/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la bstims la/ /yang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa
467b7(rgyud 'grel): thams kyis mchod do/ /de nas ? rnams ? khrod brgyad kyi bdag po rnams kyis lce hUM las rdo rje nas 'bru tsam bsams la/ de'i rtse mor hUM bsgoms te/ de'i 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi drangs nas gsol bas gnyis su med
468a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes thob par bsam mo/ /sngags ni oM sh+rI he ru ka badzra pra tIts+tsha maM pa liM hUM phaT /oM bud+d+ha DA ki ni pra tIts+tsha i maM pa liM oM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki ni pra tIts+tsha maM ba liM hUM phaT/ oM ratna ? kI? nI pra tIts+tsha ?
468a2(rgyud 'grel): li traM phaT/ oM bi shwa DA ki nI pra tIts+tsha maM liM a phaT/ oM sarba DA ki ni pra tI tsam ba yi rtU? te phaT/ oM sarbba yo gi nI pra tIts+tsha mi ba laM hUM hA ha ha ho:/ de nas de nyid lnga pas stod pa ni/ mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings na mkha' chen po/
468a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag/ rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba chen/ /rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal mchog/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal po
468a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /dngos nyid dag pa gos pa med/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mi 'chi 'dod chags che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa bsnyes/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro
468a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dag pa gdon mi ?/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyeg pa med
468a6(rgyud 'grel): gzung du med ring brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las la kun du 'byung/ /ngo bo nyid kyi gnas pa med/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas kyang/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras bu skye/ /oM A:hUM yul che ge mo
468a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i k+Sha tra pa la i daM ba li grah+Na grah+Na ma ma sa pa ri wA ra na sarg+ha? sadwany+tsa pA paM bya ti pi g+ha nAM shAn+tiM ku ru d+ha na d+ha na/ A yug ? a A di puSh+TiM ku ru sarbba pra yats+tsha rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru swAhA/ /sems can thams cad
468b1(rgyud 'grel): nad med cing/ /sems can thams cad bde gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad gyur pa'i/ /lam de nyid la 'bro bar shog/ ma grol ba rnams grol ba dang/ /ma brgal ba rnams sgrel byed cing/ /rnal 'byor bsen chos gnas pa ni/ /de lta nyid du
468b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas par shog/ de'i 'ug tu yi ge 'bru gsum gyis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bcol lo/ /de nas oM A:hUM badzra mu zhes brjod/ sa gol lan gsum brdabs te gshegs su gsol/ rdogs so// //dkon mchog gsuM
468b3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po thod pa'am snod gang rung ba'i nang du/ gtor ma'i bud bkros la/ gsang nan dang bcas po blugs la de nas bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la/ gtor ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la hUM? mthing?
468b4(rgyud 'grel): kha cig bsam/ de zhu ste gtor ma la thim pas/ gtor ma'i rdzas kyi dngos po sbyangs par bsam mo/ /de nas yang pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng/ a dmar po gcig bsam/ de'i 'di du zhu ste thim pas/ kha dog dmar la ba/ dang
468b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing dag la dri ma med pa/ ngo mchog dang ldan par bsgom/ de nas yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ oM dkar po gcig bsgom/ de'i 'od du zhu ste thim pas/ dkar la gdang ba ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur
468b6(rgyud 'grel): par bsam mo/ /de nas bdud rtsi las 'od 'phros par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang/ lha yul na yod pa'i bdud rtsi bkug ste/ de la thim par bsam/ de nas bdud rtsi de nyid las yang 'od 'phros bas
468b7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ phyi nang gi chas skyong mkha' 'gro ma bcas pa nam mkha' la bkug la/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbba d+harmA? rAM? /Ad+hA nutA? ? twat/ oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes brjod pas
469a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma las 'od 'bros pas so so'i lce la reg pas/ bdud rtsi'i bde ba chen po'i ro bstar zhing myong bar bsam mo/ /de nas chos bshad par bya ste/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu sti/ zhes pa la sogs
469a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bya/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams la ci 'dod pa'i las bcol lo/ /? gsol byas la gshegs su gsol rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he badzre ba la bo d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes
469a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can/ /yi ge gnyis las yang dag 'byung/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug gtso/ /he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ?
469a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrin sreg dang/ mchod pa dang/ sgrub pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa'i phyir 'di brtsams so/ /de la gtor ma'i dgos pa yang gang zhig ce na/ gzhung las/ bgegs rnam pa zhi bar bya ba ?/ lha
469a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dgong par bya/ ba dang/ /dam tshig nyams pa bskar ba'i phyir/ /gtor ma'i las ni ci nus brtsam/ zhes 'byung ngo/ /yang rgyud las/ 'byung po kun la gtor ma 'di dag gis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mchod pa leD?
469a6(rgyud 'grel): bsams?/ /dus kun rnyed pa bde bar d+har pa dang/ /lha rnams dga' zhing 'gro ba 'byor par 'gyur/ /gal te 'byung po tshogs la gtor ma gcig byin na/ /dbang dang mngon spyod dgra yi sde 'joms shing/ /dgar dang
469a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal dang thugs par byed pa dang/ /zhi zhing bde bar rgyas par byed pa yin/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ /yang slob dpon kha cig gis 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub cho ga thams cad la/ /dpal ldan rdo rjoD?
469b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /gtor ma'i las ni shin tu bsngags/ /zhes 'byung bas/ gtor ma'i las? 'di shin tu phan yon che'o/ /de la tho mar sngags pas 'byung po nyi shu rtsa bzhi la gtor ma sbyin dgos te/ lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/ /?
469b2(rgyud 'grel): chen brgyad dang phyogs skyong brgyad/ /'khor du gtogs pa brgyad rnams la/ /rgyun du 'am yang na zla ba 'am/ /de bzhin lo gcig khyud khyor dang/ /dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bzlas pa dang/ /de bzhin gnod pa byung dus su/ /ji ltar 'os shing
469b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa dang/ /rang gi ci 'byor rjes mthun par/ /nan tan du ni gtor ma sbyin// zhes 'byung ngo/ /de la gtor ma'i rdzas kyang gang zhe na/ /me tog bdug spos mar me byug pa dang/ /smin rnams dang ni dri dang lha bshos dang/ /char sbyor 'bru dang sna tshogs
469b4(rgyud 'grel): chad la sogs/ /u lo pi dpal du khur ba dang/ /zan dron dang ni drug cu par byas pa/ /phye la sogs pa dang bcas bsres nas ni/ /'bras chen 'bras kyi phye ma 'bru bdun dang/ /khrag dang sha 'dres nya la sogs/ /bcos dang rjen dang snying del bcas pa
469b5(rgyud 'grel): rnaMs/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres nas ni/ /de dag kun gyis snod ni bkad nas kyang/ /bum ? chus bkang ba yi steng du gzhag/ /dbung? ba 'am zas ngan mar me steng du bltam/ /mtshan mo dus su de dag la yang dbul/ /zhes 'byung bas de dag gi
469b6(rgyud 'grel): steng du zhi ba'i gtor ma ni zho dang/ bu ram dang/ 'o thug la sogs pa bsre'o/ /drag po la ni sgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan steng du bzhag go/ de la rigs kyi bu dag tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang/ /nad nyung bar 'dod pa dang/ gnod pa zhi bar 'dod pa dang/
469b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang grags pa 'phel par 'dod pa dang/ bu lon lan chags bral bar 'dod pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog par 'dod pa dang/ longs spyod 'byor pa 'phel bar 'dod pa dang/ phas kyi rkol ba tshar gcod par 'dod pa dang/
470a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob par 'dod pa'i mkhas pas gtor ma'i las la brtson par bya'o/ /de la bdag nyid sku phyag rgya chen po gsal bar bsgoms la/ /thog mar nam mkha' lta bu
470a2(rgyud 'grel): la yi? las rlung gi dkyil 'khor yaM? gyis mtshan pa/ ri las me'i dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa/ /de las a/ a las thod pa'i nang du lcags kyu lnga dang/ sa bon lnga las bdud rtsi lngar bskyed do
470a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM las rdo rje a las zla ba de'i steng du /oM gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsir sbyang/ A:sa gzi byin bskyed/ hUM gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang/ dam tshig gi bdud rtsi gnyis su med par bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te 'di
470a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod do/ /bdag gis bsod nams stobs dang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dang/ /gsang sngags rig sngags mthu dag dang/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyis su/ /sems can kun la phan 'dod pas/ /don rnams yang
470a5(rgyud 'grel): dag bsams pa kun/ /sems can/ pams? ci ma lus par/ /de dag thams cad ci rigs par/ /thogs pa med par 'byung 'gyur cig/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+hArmA? NAM Adya nupta n+na twa tA oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ lan gsum 'am bdun
470a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod do/ /de lta'i byed ? brlabs nas/ gtor ma'i mgron spyan drangs pa'i phyir/ he ru ka'i phyag rgyas yab yum bcings te sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM a ra li ha:dza:hUM baM ho:badzra DA ki ni sa me yastwaM dri sh+ya ho:aoM A:hUM zhes lan
470a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum brjod pa 'byung? po nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa 'khor sngo brgyad mdun du bsams te/ mchod pa lnga yang dbul/ lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/ /'jig rten skyod pa brgyad po dang//
470b1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /srin po'i tshoD rnaMs ma lus dang/ 'byung po 'tshoD rnams ma lus dang/ yi dagS tshoD rnaMs ma lus dang/ sha za'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /smo byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /rjed byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang//
470b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro'i tshogs ma lus dang/ /de la sogs pa 'byung po'i tshogs/ /ma lus ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di stoms? la/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dang/ /nad med
470b3(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang dbang phyugs rnams/ /dpal dang grags dang skal pa bzang/ /longs sprod rgya chen kun thob cing/ /zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi/ /las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol dam tshig can gyi bdag la gsungs/ /dngos grub kun gyi stong grogs
470b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /dus ma ni 'chi dang nad rnams dang/ /gdon dang bgegs rnams zhi por mdzod/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /bya byed ngan pa med par mdzod/ /'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang/ /'bru rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par shog/
470b5(rgyud 'grel): bde legs thams cad 'grub pa dang/ /yid la 'dod pa kun grub shog/ de nas pad+ma'i lag pa gyen du ? phye ste/ gtor ma lo gtad de/ sngags 'dis bsngo'o/ /oMM in+d+ra/ dza ma dza la/ dzak+kha b+hu ta ba ha ni/ pA u/ rak+kha? tsanda/ su dzdza ma ta/
470b6(rgyud 'grel): dza ? ta la/ dA tA la/ /?/ sap+pa? swAhA/ /dgra bgegs ma dA ya phaT/ yi daM la liM b+huny+dza dzi g+ha/ phul+la/ d+hAp+pa/ ? baM g+ha/ aM b+ha/ sa? kadzdza A d+ha kha ni khu ni phe Da ga ta/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM AryA? nutpan+na twata oM AM?:hUM phaT
470b7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pa brjod do/ /rigs lde la bstod pa dya/ yi ge abrg+ha? pa bzlas/ phrin las gzhol/ /smon lam gdag lan gdags pa'i gtor ma la/ /sngags pa gang zhig dgra dang bgegs la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i
471a1(rgyud 'grel): las byed pa rnams kyis gong du smos pa'i gtor ma'i rdzas mdun du bzhag ste/ dgra bgegs? gang yin pa'i sha ra? pa ya gtor ma'i nang du dmigs la/ 'byung po nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa spyad drangs la/ gtor ma
471a2(rgyud 'grel): gtang bas gzhol pa ni/ lha chen brgyad po ces pa las/ /mkha' 'gro tshogs rnams ma lus kun/ /de la sogs pa gnod sbyin tshogs/ /drag cing gtub? pa'i 'byung po skyon/ /ma rungs sems can 'di dag la/ /drag cing snying rje med
471a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ma dang pa? mo dang/ /mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin sha za dang/ /lto 'phye dang ni srin po dang/ /gzhan yang sha za khag? za ba'i/ /khyi dang khra dang kang ka? dang/ /'ol ba bya rgod la sogs pa'i/ /gzugs can thams cad 'dir sbyor
471a4(rgyud 'grel): cig /bdag chid 'di zhes bya ba la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs kyi/ chung ma nor dang srog dang ni/ /gnod pa rnams ni phrogs par mdzod/ /rang gi yul nas dbyung ba dang/ /dgar ba dang ni bkrad par gyis/ /bdag gi dpung ni stobs?
471a5(rgyud 'grel): med la/ /dgra bgegs stobs ldan kho na ste/ /'di ni khyod kyis bza' ba'i phyir/ /sha dang khrag dang zhag dang rkang/ /bza' ba btung dang bca' bar mdzod/ /gnod byed gsol la de mdangs phrogs/ /rang gi rnal 'byor ci rigs par/ /lang?
471a6(rgyud 'grel): la bza' de nyid du gyis/ /thams cad tshim par bzhes par mdzod/ /gang gis bdag la mi tshugs shing/ /dgra bgegs thaMs cad choms par mdzod/ /bdag la las kyi dngos grub ni/ /rgya chen yongs su stsal nas kyang/ /nyid kya gnas
471a7(rgyud 'grel): dang yul du gshegs/ /chi? nus 'byor pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la/ /bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /pus mo'i lhangs la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyod la gsol ba ni/ /btsun mo dang ni sras dang g.yeg? du
471b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /gsan zhing 'dir gshegs bdag la bka' drin skyobs/ /yang gtor ma'i sngags brjod/ /de nas dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag dang/ snying la sogs pa dang/ gtor ma'i zas rnams gcig tu bsdus nas/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa mi
471b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug pa'i gzugs can grangs med pas zos shing 'thungs par bsams la gtang/ gtong ba'i dus su rol mo dang dril bu dang rnge? chung gi sgra dkrol zhing gtang ngo/ /de nas nang du zhugs la rang ci 'dod pa'i bzlas pa bya/ gtor ma
471b3(rgyud 'grel): gtong ba'i dus su rang gang 'dod pa'i bskul tshig dang/ dmod bcol dang/ 'o dor bod su ba bya?/ mA ra ya dang btsas gtor ma gtang/ /dpal kye'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ he
471b4(rgyud 'grel): badzra ba liM ta bi d+ha? nA ma/ bod skad du/ kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro rnams la rab tu 'dud/ /de dang de yi bya ba ni/ /gtor ma'i cho ga cung zhig bshad/ /de
471b5(rgyud 'grel): la gtor ma rnams? gsum ste?/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams dang/ /de sprul mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang/ /mgron 'gyur phyogs skyong rnams la'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i gA lha? ni/ /re zhig byin gyis brlabs pa yang/ /bdag nyid
471b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i lhar? nyos? pas/ /snod dag mchog tu gyur ba ru/ /gtor ma'i rdzas ni bdud rtsir bsam/ /de bstan de nyid gsum sngags brjod/ /yang na 'dod yon lngar gyur pa'i/ /bsam zhing byin gyis brlab sngags brjod/ /de rjes
471b7(rgyud 'grel): mdun du dkyil 'khor ba'i/ /lha rnams skad cig rdor 'dzin bsam/ /de rnams dbul ba'i rim pa ni/ /oM ma hA b+hU ta khA hi grih+na grih+na b+huny+dza kha kha khA hi i daM ba liM ta khA hi a mi ta rA sA/ /bA hi kA mgu Ni sa mA ra sa khA hi khA hi zhes glu blangs
472a1(rgyud 'grel): so so'i mtshan dang sbyar pa ni/ oM he badzra na ra ut+ma ta i daM ma hA ba li ta khA hi/ de bzhin du oM badzra go mi daM ma tA? pa liM ta khA hi/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /de ltar tshim zhing mnyes gyur nas/ /bdag nyid
472a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub ba rkyen sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gtor ma ni/ /re zhig byin brlabs sngags dang mtshungs/ /dbul? thabs bdag nyid 'dod? lta yi/ /mdun du dam tshig rjes dran nas/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams skad cig gis/ /tha snyad tshul
472a3(rgyud 'grel): du re ba gyur nas/ /gtor ma'i longs spyod bya phyir dang/ /las dang grub la ngag bskul? la/ /de rnams dbul ba'i rim pa ni/ /lhag ma bsdus pa'i rim pa las sngags 'di glu ru bcas pa brjod/ /oM u tsiSh+Ta ba la ta badzra DA ki nI so
472a4(rgyud 'grel): pan+ni/ /badzra Da ka nI/ ratna DA ki nI/ pad+ma DO ki nA/ bi shwa DA ki nI/ i daM u tsiSh+Ta ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ grih+na grih+na b+huny+dza b+huny+dza pratIts+tsha khA hi karma sid+d+hi saM pan+ni swAhA/ /de nas las dang dngos grub stsol/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i 'phrin las
472a5(rgyud 'grel): btsal/ /mgron 'gyur 'byung pa'i gtor ma ni/ /mdun du chos 'byung gru gsum las/ /steng dang 'og dang bar dag tu/ /chu skyes 'dab brgyad rim bzhin bsam/ /steng du sa bon oM gyur las/ /zla nyi nas gzung tshangs sogs par
472a6(rgyud 'grel): Fmdog dkar rdo rje'i kho 'dzin pa/ /dbu la sku yi mtshan ma dag/ rang 'dra'i tshogs pa brgyad du bsam/ /bar gyi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /ma yi lhar gyur phyogs skyong brgyad/ /sa bon brgyad gyur mdog sngon po/ /rdo rje dril 'chang dang
472a7(rgyud 'grel): 'drar ldan/ /dbu la thugs kyis mtshan par bsam/ /'og tu klu brgyad sa las byung/ /mdog dmar rdo rje dril 'dzin cing/ /dbu la gsung gi rdo rjes mtshan/ /rang 'dra dang ni ldan par bsgom/ /de nas re shig byin brlabs ba/ /dam
472b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig bdud rtsi'i snod bcas pa/ /rlung dang me sogs smin byed pa/ /de rjes bdud rtsi dang bsres la/ /gong du brjod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /'od zer spu gu lha rnams cig/ /longs spyod pas ni tshim par byed/ /de tshe ze'u 'bru rnam gsum la/ /tshangs dang 'dod lha
472b2(rgyud 'grel): sa yi lha/ /rim pa bzhin du bsam par bya/ /de yi sngags brjod bskul bcas pa/ /rdo rje dril bu gsil gsor bya/ oM in+d+ra dza ma dza la dzak+kha? b+hu ta bAh+na ba u rak+Sha/ tsinda sudzdza/ ma ta bap+pa ta la pA tA la/ a Tra? sap+pa swAhA/ i daM ba ling tab+huny+dza
472b3(rgyud 'grel): dziM g+ha phul+la d+hU p+pa mAM sa/ bid+ga? amA sarbba kadzA? swAhA/ khan+ti khu ni phe Ta ga ta/ oM akA ro mu khaM sarbba d+harma NAM AdyA nu tAn+na? twA ta/ oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ phan? yon sngon du bsngo ba ni/ /res 'ga' gtor ma gtang ba dang/ /rgyun tu gtang ba'i phan
472b4(rgyud 'grel): yon ni/ /rgyun du gsungs pa bzhin brjod do/ /bla ma dam pa'i rjes 'brangs yid brtan zhing/ /'phral la mngon du byed cing byin rlab pa/ /dam pa 'ga' yis gsol btab nas/ /man ngag gzhung bzhin mthun par bris ba yin/ /bcom ldan
472b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi la? rdo rje zhes bya'i gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das kye'i? rdo rje la phyag 'tshal/ /gye yi rdo rje bdag med ldan/ /mkha' gro brgyad kyis yongs bskor la/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni phyag
472b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rnams/ /bsnams pa'i phan yon rim bzhin brjod/ /glang po la sogs bsnams pa ni/ nad rnams zhi bar mdzad pa ste/ /glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin smo?/ /khrag skyug mdze? nad 'brum bu dang/ /mtsher? ba mchin pa'i rang bzhin no
472b7(rgyud 'grel): glang po la sogs rim zhes grags/ /sa la sogs pa brgyad bsnams pa/ /phyug po thams cad 'grub pa'o/ /nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug bo/ /gcod phyir gri gug g.yas pas te/ /dngos dang dngos med rtog pa la/ /g.yon pa
473a1(rgyud 'grel): na ni pad snod do/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho drug cu las/ /nya 'dra'i 'gro ba 'don phyir ram/ /bkra shis 'dzin pa ro hi ta/ /nyon mongs rgya 'dra gri gug g.yas/ /gti mug gis ni rab rmongs la/ /phag dang 'dra ba'i sems can
473a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /gti mug gnyid la bslang ba'i phyir/ /g.yas na cang te sgra sgrogs pa/ /'dod chags kyis gdungs du spal? ni/ /'gro ba'i nad rnams bsal phyir dang/ /chags chen bdud rtsis tshim bya'i phyir/ /rus spal? dang ni pad snod bsnos?
473a3(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang dgra yis bam byas pa/ /sprul dang 'dra ba'i sems can rnams/ /zhe sdang chen bos tshim bya'i phyir/ /phyag na spal? dang thod pa'o/ /ngan rtog pa yi ri dags rnams/ /skrags? par bya phyir seng ge 'am/ /seng? 'drang? rgyal gzhom phyir ram/ /seng
473a4(rgyud 'grel): ge dang ni dgra sta bsnams/ /bdag tu lta bas sogs pa yi/ /lta ba po yi gnyis pa'o/ /bdag tu lta ba'i mdud pa dang/ /ser sna dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dge slong dang ni mkhar gsil? lo/ /dper na thod pa lta bu yi/ chos ni 'khor lo bskor
473a5(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /nyon mongs tha ba rlog pa'i phyir/ /'khor? lo dang ni thod pa bsnams/ /rnam par rtog pa'i ri bsnyil cing/ /gdug pa tshar gcad bya ba'i phyir/ /g.yas pa sdigs mdzub bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan dpal chen he ru ka /ma mo'i chogs kyis
473a6(rgyud 'grel): yongs bskor ba'i/ phyag mtshan bsnams pa'i yon tan? rnams/ /ci nus brjid? thob yon tan rnams/ /thabs dang shes rab gus chen dang/ /brten nas mdza' yas sems can rnams/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal te/ /thar pa'i skam ser gnas
473a7(rgyud 'grel): par shog /phyag mtshan gyi phan yon rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA ti la ka kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ thig le chen po'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin gnyis bral gser 'dra yon
473b1(rgyud 'grel): tan 'phungs pa'i gzhi/ /'jug bar bya ba'i rgyud nyid rang gi mngon du byed/ /rang nyams dpa' bo'i dpa' po brtan g.yo'i skad cig bdag /mdza' gnas nam mkha' rtog bral bya ba ma lus rdzogs/ /rgya mtsho mtshon cha tshig gis mya ngan yi? nas
473b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /rang nyams shugs kyis dbang sgyur de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /'byed sogs gsum gnyis thabs kyi rjes ma 'brangs/ /bya ba mdzub ma don gdon mi byed bas/ /skal mang nges med don ston 'dir dang gang/ /nyi 'od gsal
473b3(rgyud 'grel): byed de phyir thabs man ngag /de bas sreg me ? chu ma rgyud la/ /sla med rang gis 'phrel pa'i skyes du la/ /chu bos mtshon pa'i ming chogs cung zad pa/ /rmongs pa bdag 'dra'i don phyir dbye bar bya/ /bstan bcos dang po'i rang bzhin
473b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /sa gser lta bur gdod nas dag /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ /rang bzhin ma skyes stong ba'ang min/ /rmi lam 'dod pa tshim bzhin du/ /'khrul pas rang don grub par byed/ /gzhi med snang ba dang gser? shing bzhin/ /mi 'gog
473b5(rgyud 'grel): de don shes bya ba/ /gzugs phur rdo rje ma yin te/ /tshor ba de nyid dkar mor brjod/ /'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam shes bdag med ngo bo bas/ /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das shes bya/ /gdugs? dkar
473b6(rgyud 'grel): sgral chom? rkun ma/ /dra? ro ro langs bya? ?/ /? mkha' spyod sa spyod pa/ /rtag par chos su rang gnas pas/ /longs spyod mya ngan 'das pa rdzogs/ /mi bskyod chu ste rnam snang bshad/ /nyi ma'i 'byung ldan mdza' yas sems/ /don
473b7(rgyud 'grel): yod nas mi gtso bo lnga/ /gti mug mig sogs dbang po lnga/ /rang bzhin yi nas ma byas pa/ /rnam dag dang gis 'ching ba med/ /de nas rang bzhin sngon pa dang/ /nang gi sa bcu rim shes bya/ /gnas dang nye gnas zhing de bzhin//
474a1(rgyud 'grel): dur drong? tshan ngo 'du ba sogs/ /bdag nyid chen po rgyal ba'i sku/ /phyi rol de bzhin nang de bzhin/ /de bzhin gsang bar shes par bya/ /rkang ba bskyod pa mdor drod shes/ /'du ba rtag tu chung bstan pas/ stod du dbyibs kyis
474a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhir? shes bya/ /'khor lo bde ba de bzhin gnas/ /b+ha ga nam mkha' yin pa'o/ /bshang lam drag gtum dur khrod che/ /gsang gnas dbyibs can de bzhin du/ /rna brgong dang g.yer khar brjod/ /kha na ching ching 'bang bsnang/ /mi brad? dmyal?
474a3(rgyud 'grel): tshigs mig du bstan/ /shi ri shing gi dngos po ste/ /me tog 'bras bu dbang por bcas/ /ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan/ /bdag me? he ru ka bde ba/ /thabs dang shes rab ye nas 'brel/ /nyi zla g.yas dang g.yon gyi steng//
474a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med 'brel? pa rtag tu phra/ /mtshogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /mi phyed pa mo rdo rje ma/ /dkar mo g.yon pa brtse ba ma/ /thud du ru sbal? chung shes bya/ /bsgom dbang rdo rje mkha' 'gror bstan/ /skyon ldan? 'jug ma puk+ka sI?/ /ri khrod ma
474a5(rgyud 'grel): mi? mtshan ma yin/ /tsha dang gsil la gdol pa mo/ /g.yung mi gzhol dang rengs byed ma/ /dkar mo sgo? skyong gzugs spyi nyid?/ /rgya spyin? sbyor bral chom rkun ma/ /sdug gu grub? ma ro langs ma/ /yid ba zangs tshang ma g+hasma? rA? gsum sgor 'dod
474a6(rgyud 'grel): mas spyod ma/ /mkha' spyod khyim ma gtum mor bstan/ /mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor byas pa med/ /sku dang phyag rgya yum gyi tshogs/ /'bras bu bod bskad cig dag /rang bzhin nyid du brtag bar bya/ /bzhi gnyis nas brtsams drug cu'i
474a7(rgyud 'grel): bar/ /de? sogs stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/ /de las rgyas par brjod mi lang/ /rang bzhin sprul bar rgyas pas gsungs/ /gsang pa'ang de bzhin shes par bya/ /'byung ba rim bstan b+ha gar gnas/ /bu gu 'dus pas sa nyid? re?
474b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba mang bos mar shes bya/ /sku gsum rang bzhin gdod nas ldan/ /rang bzhin rnam dag 'jig rten na/ /gang yang bcings pa yong ma yin/ /dman pa'i bsal bya ji snyed pa/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis de lta'o/ /dpal thig le chen po'i rim
474b2(rgyud 'grel): ba las rang bzhin gyis gnas ba'i rim pa ste dang po'o// //'jug byed pa skyed par shes bya ba/ /thabs dang bcas pas dman pa'i don lha ngag sgra? don las byung ba/ yang dag sdom pa'ang der shes bya/ /'khor
474b3(rgyud 'grel): lo dag la rnam sbyong zhing/ /rang gi bde bas rang za bas/ /rnam rtog las grol sa bcu sbyong/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dgur shes bya/ /kun rdzob brjod pa ma yin te/ /ste ba mdza' zang? shes rab la/ /thabs ni ze 'gru'i rtser shes bya//
474b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa? bar 'dab ma drug cu bzhi/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi mdza' stong pa/ /ma skyes pa yi snying bo can/ /der ni bus kyi gdan shes bya/ 'bar g.yo las su? rnam brtags pas/ /las kyi dang por shes par bya/ /sa dbus chos su bstan pa ste/ /sngon las brgyad
474b5(rgyud 'grel): cha gcig yod pa/ /rtsa bzhin dag mi mo bzhi/ /gzhan dag rgyud las nges par gsungs/ /bcung? ni phung po 'byung par bshad/ /rtag par chos su 'di bstan te/ /snying po chos kyi skur shes bya/ /de nyid ye shes snying po yin/ /'di ni 'khor
474b6(rgyud 'grel): lo? nam mkha' i khams/ /thams cad kun la khyab chen po/ /de gnyis stong du longs spyod de/ /'byung ba bar bzhi stong pa bas/ /ye shes lnga yi snying po can/ /chags pas rtag tu rang 'ching ba/ /log lta rtag tu grol par dka' / /'byung 'jug
474b7(rgyud 'grel): blogs med thar ? 'gyur/ /pad+ma mtshan ldan bde ba che/ /rtag par gzhom? med dbyangs mdza' can/ /rang bzhin chos skur yongs shes bya/ 'di la sgo drug yod shes bya/ /ting 'dzin goms pa'i ye shes kyis/ /sa gnas kun tu bde ba
475a1(rgyud 'grel): che/ ye shes skye ba ngas pa med/ /dkyil 'khor yan lag bcas spral? ba de nyid bde bas bde byas te/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa kye rdo rje/ /las kyi las lam gzhan bzhin? zhags/ /oM tra gnad kyi sgo? phye dang/ /phyogs kyi ye shes
475a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis byas/ /? 'dzin dang po'i sgor zhugs te/ /bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i lam? dbus su/ /ting 'dzin ? gyis drang por byed/ /rleng? nas longs spyod mya ngan 'das/ sku? gsum bzhi yang ma dmigs te/ /sems nyid bde la gang gnas
475a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /goms las 'od 'gyur mi dmigs shing/ /skra yi rtse mo brgya shan kyang/ /mthar ni dmigs par mi byed na/ /bde ba yid kyis mi myong zhing/ /mdza' rnams ci la mi gnas te/ /stong las longs spyod der shes bya/ /'gro don ? ?
475a4(rgyud 'grel): sku gnyis bya/ /? yi tshul las thog pa med/ /rang bzhin sang ba ye shes ni/ /snang stong gnyis su ma yin bas/ /rtag tu thig le chen por gsungs/ /dpal chen po'i rim pa las/ /ye shes chen po la 'jug pa'i rim pa gnyis
475a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //rang nyams gnas 'dod blo ldan bsaM?/ /yul du shes bya dkar ba ni/ /rang rig 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma can/ /brgya dang bcu dang drug gnyis dang/ /dkar nag phyed dang dkar nag min/ /sgra nag mig red ste ba nas?
475a6(rgyud 'grel): ? sdom ring thung gnyis spangs pa/ /sna? drung nang dra? snang ? che?/ /'dab mtshe zhing nad grub pa/ /? nang nyar ga pu ra mang/ si la rab tu ldan pa dang/ /phyi nang ? lus? rlung? dri zhim/ /'jam ngas dang ldan mi g.yo ba/ /lha'i rigs kyang brtag
475a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /tang? nas brtan 'dos? rim par skyen ? rgyal po'i bu yi chos shes bya/ /dam tshig? rim dang zas sogs pa/ /rtog pa med par de shes nas/ /khu ba legs bar sbyin byas te/ /rnam bzhi rlung yang shes par bya/ /mtshan dang mtsham gnyis?
475b1(rgyud 'grel): rab bskul pas/ kho brang bde ba skyong bar byed/ /gnas dang rim par shes bya ba/ /sprel? pa chos dang bde ba che/ /dga' bde gnas par shes par bya dgar? chog bral lhan cig skyes?/ /bstan bcos ngo bor ye? shes bya/ /skad cig de skad thang? cig yud?/ /rlung?
475b2(rgyud 'grel): gi las kyis go phye ba'o/ /sna tshogs nyid ngang nyin mtshan dral/ /las kyi rim ba nyid du gsungs/ /snang pa mchang dang thob pa dang/ /yang dag dri med 'od las byung/ /nyin mtshan bar ngang gnyi ga? min/ /dngos po rnam gnyis phrad pa'i
475b3(rgyud 'grel): ming/ /sde ba phyag rgya 'byung pa'i yum/ /mchog la sogs pa'ang skabs mir? gsung/ /rkyang ma ro ma kun ngar? ma/ /rigs gsum gnas pa'ang bde ba'i lam/ /nyi zla thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /rang gi dgos pa'ang nges len te/ /kun rdzob
475b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang gnyis su snang/ /yongs grags srog nang de bdag nyid/ /mdud pa'i mtshan nyid nang du ste/ /dga' ba char yang ston pas gsungs/ /rtse mo sor mo bcu gnyis thig /de zhabs longs spyod shes par byas/ brgyad brgyad rim ba ngo bor
475b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ /de ni rang bzhin don du bstan/ /snang bas bde ba dga' ba yin/ /phyi rol reg bya gnyis par gsungs/ /phrad? pas bde ba bral ba ste/ /gnas su lhan cig skyes pa 'byung/ /thun mong rim par de shes bya/ /'khor lo rim par rim gnam pa//
475b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol don de nang yang yin/ /ba gim nang du 'bru gsum gnyis/ /rtse mor bar med de bzhin rim/ /nor bu'i nang du de shes nas/ /de ni ze 'bru'i rim bcu drug /bdag gi thig le mthar gnas pa'o/ /blo yi yul du nge shes nas/ /gnas
475b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs nang gis shes bya/ /gsang ba'i sa rim dga' ba mthar/ /thabs dang shes rab sangs rgyas sa pa shang mthar phyin rdo rje 'dzin/ /snang ba gnyis las rnam par 'das/ /de ltar sa las rim shes nas/ /dper na me yis tshig pa'i lus
476a1(rgyud 'grel): me nyid kyis? ni gdung bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa/ /chags pa nyid kyis rab tu sel/ /skye bo mi bzad pa yis las/ /gang dang gang gi 'ching 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/ /srid
476a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/ /log lta nyan thos skal med skur/ /nges na thar ba ring par gsungs/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas/ /sra bas sprul pa sa ru bshad/ /gsher ba'i grangs chos mA ma kI/ bskyod pas gos dkar longs spyod
476a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs/ /'gugs pa sgrol ma bde ba che/ hUM phaT rang gi rlung mthu yis/ /mchog gi mdza' nas brtag par bya/ /dngos po 'dus par gang shes pa/ /'dus pa ma yin bral ba'ang min/ /nyi zla'i sems dang bcas pa'i dngos/ /dngos
476a4(rgyud 'grel): po lhan cig skyes par brjod/ /ltang ba med par gang 'dres pa/ /de bde thabs las thams cad rig /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes bya/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dga' yin phyir/ /dgyes pa chen por de brjod do/ /chos thams cad kyi sdom
476a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig pas/ /sdom pa'ang thig le chen por brjod/ /sdom pa che ba su gnas pa/ /bsrung ba med de 'da' pa'ang med/ /thabs dang shes rab yod min pas/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu ma'ang dmigs par mi
476a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ /yo gi saM pu na yar bshad/ gtan tshigs zhib par gsal byed pa/ /de nyid rang gi sems rtog yin/ /bla ma'i dus thabs byag rgya dang/ /rang gi bsod nams las shes 'gyur/ /sngon gyi ye shes de rnyed nas/ /las kyi lus
476a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid? ? thabs? las dngos po 'dres par 'gyur/ /skad cig gcig gi rdzogs byang chub/ /'di las rim pa yong ma yin/ /gal te dag par mi 'gyur yang/ /a nu yo ba'i dmigs pa yis/ /rtag tu rang nyams 'jug par
476b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /brtul zhugs zad par mi dgos na/ /mi gang mun sel rnyed pa bzhin/ /bzhi yi phyag rgya spangs kyang rung/ /bde ba nyams par yongs mi 'gyur/ /mthar phyin bya ba med par 'grub/ /yon tan spros pa brjod mi lang/ /dpal thig le
476b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i rim pa las rang nyams ye shes chen po'i rim bste? gsuM pa'o// //ye shes mthar phyin rnal 'byor pa/ /rang bzhin ye shes de rnyed pas/ /rang bzhin du ma gcig mthar bral/ /yod med dbus las 'das pa'i sku/ /bdag med gzhan med der shes
476b3(rgyud 'grel): med/ /dman pa 'bring dang mchog dag dang/ /gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams kyang/ /bdag tu ro mnyam gcig tu shes/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes las/ /brtan g.yo'i rang bzhin gzhan mi mthong/ /ji ltar byas pa de nyid yin
476b4(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dbyibs dang stong bsgoms bas/ /don 'di nam yang rnyed mi nus/ /las kyi rim par gsungs pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya chen po rgyu dang bral/ rang rig gsal ba'i ye shes ni/ /cis kyang stong pa ma yin pas/ /bsgrub bya'i rnam grangs ci
476b5(rgyud 'grel): rnyed pa/ /rang bzhin lhun gyis grub ces gsungs/ /nor bu rin chen yon tan bzhin/ /rtag tu cir yang 'gag pa med/ /yul du snang ba ma yin pa/ /dus gsum ma 'gags ye shes mchog /spyin sreg slob sogs las grol ba/ /rang
476b6(rgyud 'grel): nyams rig la gnas par rnyed/ /de nyid ston pas yang gsungs pa/ /rig pa skyes bu grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa de ni thams cad spangs shing thams cad du gnas pa yin/ /bya ba thams cad spangs pa/ byed pa gang yang mi 'gog pa/ ci yang ma
476b7(rgyud 'grel): yin pa/ yon tan gang yang mtshungs med pa gang du yang mi 'gro/ gang yang mi gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma la sogs pa rnam par spangs pa/ bsnyen pa'i yan lag gsum du snang ba/ thams cad du gshegs pa/ thams cad du mkhyen ba
477a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad pa/ thams cad kyi don/ thams cad kyi sems la gnas pa ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ yon tan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog dang dbyings thams cad pa/ thams cad la
477a2(rgyud 'grel): phan pa/ dge ba mtshungs pa med pa/ lan cig ma yin par 'byung ba/ mgon po/ /skyab ba/ kun tu rtogs pa spangs pa/ kha dog dang dbyibs thams cad dang bral ba/ zab pa'i phyir skye bo'i yul ma yin pa/ thams cad kyi bdag po'i phyir
477a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po/ /dbye bar dka' ba'i phyir rdo rje/ nyon mongs pa'i nye bar gdung ba las grol ba'i phyir zal/ /thams cad snang ba'i phyir nyi ma/ dogs pa med pa'i phyir seng ge /gting dbag? dka' ba'i phyir chu'i phung po chen po/ /thams cad kyi
477a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi'i phyir nam mkha' thams cad/ lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so/ /dpal thig le chen po'i rim pa las mthar phyin pa'i don la gnas pa'i rim pa ste bzhi pa'o/ /kye'i rdo rje'i
477a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho rgyud chen las/ /rang bzhin 'jug nyams 'bras bu la thug bzhin/ /mdza' 'khob rgyal bdra? gzu? lums don mdzad pa/ /dang pa'i chu bzhi phreng bas mthar phyin shog /dpal thig le chen po'i rim pa zhes bya ba rdzogs
477a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bA hi? badzra swA d+ha na ma g+hi sa ma ya gra mArtha pra sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo?
477a7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal/ /gang gi ye shes me lta bus/ /rnam rtog ma lus bsreg mdzad cing/ /snying rje chu yis?
477b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdud mdzad pa/ /kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ /bdag pas blo dman rnams don du/ /sgrub thabs don rab gsal pa tsam/ /de la rnal 'byor pas dang po dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong bar stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ bdag
477b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kye'i rdo rjer gsal ba'i snying gar paM las pad+ma/ de'i steng du raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du hUM sngon po bsams la/ de las 'od 'bros pas sna bug g.yas nas byung bas kye'i rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa spyan
477b3(rgyud 'grel): drangs te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la phyi'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas gau rI byang chub kyi sems kyi snod can dang/ chom rkun ma rang khyung? gi me tog gi snod can dang/ ro langs ma dri chu'i snod can dang/ za phod
477b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dri chen gyi snod can dang/ puk+ka sI sha sna tshogs kyi snod can dang/ ri khrod ma chang gi snod can dang/ gtum mo cang te'u brdung ba dang/ g.yung mo 'khyud pa dang ldan pas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshaD pa la sogs pa bya ste/
477b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba thog ma med dus nas/ /log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yis/ /lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa gang/ /so sor bshags bgyid slan chad sdom/ /'gro ba gang gis thar pa'i phyir/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags pa/ /de la
477b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag yi rang nyid/ /de dag byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /thams cad rang bzhin kye'i rdor dang/ /de yis bstan pa'i lam mchog dang/ /tshogs mchog de yis 'khor 'dus las/ /bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /skyon rnams ma lus
477b7(rgyud 'grel): sel byed cing/ /yon tan thams cad rgyas byed pa/ /yid bzhin nor la sogs mtshung pa/ //byang chub sems mchog bskyed par bgyis/ /ding nas kun mkhyen ma thob par/ /bdag gi lus ni bdar? gshegs dang/ /de sras rnams
478a1(rgyud 'grel): la dbul? bar ? ? dam? bzhi? lam la gnas par bgyi/ de nas byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' bA dang/ btang snyoms sgoms? par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu stong pa nyid bsgoms la/ oM shU n+ya tA dzA ? badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko nye
478a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod par bya'o/ de ltar stong par bsgoms pa la sna? ? ? sna tshogs par de'i steng du raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ dre'i steng du hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje/ de'i ste ba la hUM/ de las 'od 'phros pa las rdo rje'i re ba dang bla rang gyur pa
478a3(rgyud 'grel): la oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ de'i nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas dkar po gyen? kher gnas pa bsam/ de'i nang du ya las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs la ba dan gyis mtshon pa
478a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du raM las ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gu? gsum pa rdo rjes mtshan pa/ de'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pas mtshan pa/ de'i steng du lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa/ de'i
478a5(rgyud 'grel): steng du hUM las 'khor lo/ /de'i bdag nyid sding? pa bar ma'i bag chags bsam par bya'o/ /de rnams 'od du zhu ba las gzhal yas khang ngos bzhi dang/ sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhis brgyan pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed sla brgyan pa/ ka ba brgyad
478a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o/ /de'i dbyil? du ba las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dmar po/ /de'i steng du ri? las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du bdud bzhi'i gzugs bsnol ba bsgom par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhin tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang nye dbang
478a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ drag po bzhi dgod par bya'o/ /mtshoms bzhir gshin rje dang nor sbyin dang bden bral dang thags bzangs rigs rnams bkod la/ 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a la yaM badzra swa b+hA:a'at+ma ko haM/ /de nas bdud
478b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i snying gar a A i a'i u a'u ri rI li lI e i o aau aM a:rnams las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te me khong lta bu'i ye shes so/ /de'i steng du ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Tha Da Dha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ /ya ra la wa/ sha Sha
478b2(rgyud 'grel): sa ha k+Sha tsu? dang d+ha ya ra rnams las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ /mnyam pa nying kyi ye shes so/ /zla ba dang nyi ma'i bar du hUM dang/ a las rdo rje gri gug ste/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /de dag chu dang 'o ma la shur 'dres pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes
478b3(rgyud 'grel): so/ /de las oM dang hUM ngo/ /de gnyis rdo rje dang gri gug go /de las bzhengs pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa/ zhabs bzhi dang ldan pa/ dbu la thod pa'i phreng bas bskor/ bdag med mas mgul nas 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang
478b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa sku mdog dkar po g.yas sngo ba g.yon dmar ba ltag pa'i zhal gnag pa'o/ /phyag g.yas kyi thod pa brgyad na rim par glang po che dang rta dang bung bu dang glang dang rnga mo dang seng ge dang byi la rnams 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon gyi thod pa
478b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad na sa'i lha dang chu'i lha dang rlung gi lha dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa kha dog gnag pa skra ser po gyen du bgreng pa phyag g.yas na gri gug g.yon na thod pa 'dzin
478b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ de ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so/ /de nas lha mo'i gnas gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dbul? bar oM/ thugs kar hUM/ gsang ba'i gnas su A:pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni/ oM pad+ma su kha b+ha ra
478b7(rgyud 'grel): ma hA rI ga su khaM dang ce tu rA nanda b+ha ga bi swa hUM hUM hUM karyaM? ku ru Shwa me/ rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzra ma hA dE Sha tsa tu rA nanda da ya ka kha ga mu khe ka rA sho nA tha hUM hUM hUM karyi ku ru Sha me/ de nas yab yum chags pa chen po'i
479a1(rgyud 'grel): rol pa las de'i sgras bskul bas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge buM a dzriM khaM hUM rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam par yab kyi zhal nas rdo rje lam nas byang ste thig le brgyad du gyur nas
479a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'phro ba'i dus su sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ thig le brgyad las/ gaM tsaM baM? paM g+haM laM shaM TaM sa bon de dag las phyag g.yas kyi phyag mtshan brgyad du gyur/ de dag las
479a3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo brgyad du gyur te/ gau rI nag mo g.yas na gri gug g.yon ni nya bsnams pa/ shar phyogs su tshang pa'i steng du gdon par bya ste/ de bzhin du lho phyogs su choms rkun ma bcod kyi kha dog can phyag g.yas na cang te'u g.yon na
479a4(rgyud 'grel): phag pa can dban po'i ste du'o/ /ro langs ma dmar ser bsres pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas na ru spal g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa/ nub phyogs su nya? dbang gi steng du'o/ /za phor? mo kha dog ljang gu phyag g.yas na sbrul g.yon na
479a5(rgyud 'grel): thod pa bsnams pa/ byang phyogs su drag po'i steng du'o/ /puk+ka sI kha dog sngon po phyag g.yas na ser ge g.yon na dgra sta bsnams pa/ byang shar gyi mtshams na gshin rje'i steng du'o/ /ri khrod ma sku mdog dkar mo phyag g.yas na dge slong
479a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na gsil byed bsnams pa shar lho'i mtshams nor sbyin gyi steng du'o/ /gtum mo nam mkha' i kha dog can phyag g.yas na 'khor lo/ g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa lho nub kyi mtshams su bden bral gyi steng du'o/ /g.yung mo
479a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas na rdo rje g.yon na sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa nub byang mtshams su thags bzangs rigs kyi steng du gdon par bya'o/ /lha mo de dag skyil krung phyed pa gar gyis gnas pa/ spyan gsum pa phyag rgya
479b1(rgyud 'grel): lngas brgyan pa'o/ de nas yab yum gyi rol pa'i sgras bskul bas srid pa bar ma'i bag chags kyis yi ge lnga po ho oM A:hUM ho:rnams zhal nas zhugs te/ pad+mar phyin pa tsam gyis yab yum gnyis 'od kyi gor bur gyur pa la/ mtshams
479b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha mo rnams kyis glus? bskul bar byed de/ /snying rje'i thugs kyis rje btsun bzhengs/ /puk+ka sI ni bdag skyab mdzod/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni/ /bdag la bde chen rnal 'byor sbyor/ /khyod dang bral na bdag 'grum pas?/ /kye yi rdo rje byed
479b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs shig /stong pa'i rang bzhin spongs mdzod la/ /ri khrod ma ni bdag don sgrub/ /'jig rten mgron gnyer 'dod pa'i gtso/ /stong pa nyid la ci phyir bzhugs/ /gtum mo bdag ni zhu ba bgyid/ /khyod ma langs na phyogs ma 'tshal/ /bdag gis
479b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi thugs 'tshal gyi/ /dbang po'i dran ldan khyod bzhengs shig /g.yung mo bdag ni dran nyams bas/ /thugs rjes rgyan chad ma mdzad cig /de ltar bskul bas sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran nas khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs pa ni gang du
479b5(rgyud 'grel): ? pa lta bu la/ sku? mdog gnas pa g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar pa'o/ /zhabs phyed krung du bzhugs pa/ mgo ba'i phreng ba'i ngo shal can/ sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas snying gar paM las pad+ma/ de'i steng du raM las nyi ma'i
479b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du hUM las rdo rje/ de las rang dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' / de'i thugs kar yang pad+ma dang nyi ma dang hUM las rdo rje/ de'i lte ba la hUM bsam par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra gau ri A karSha ya dza:zhes brjd pas ye
479b7(rgyud 'grel): shes dkyil 'khor mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod bas mchod la/ /oM badzra tso? rI pra be sha ya hUM zhes brjod pas gzhug par bya'o/ oM badzra bedyA lI sbo? ta ya baM zhes brjod pas bcings bar bya'o/ /oM badzra
480a1(rgyud 'grel): g+hasma rI wa shi ku ru ho:zhes brjod pas dgyes pa bskyed? par bya'o/ /de ltar ye shes kyis bstims pa la skye mched byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ /gti mug rdo rjes dang/ 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang 'phre?/ dog rdo rje?
480a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ bdag med rnal 'byo ma rnams mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid? la ming gi yi ge dang po maM daM maM raM saM naM rnams las bskyad par bya ste/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sna tshogs mdog can phyag g.yas na gri? gug
480a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na thod pa ro'i gdan can no/ /oM A? hUM gsum las mkha' sbyar ma dang sa spyod ma dang sa 'od ma gsum dkar pa dang dmar ba dang gnag pa'o/ /lha mo sku'i rigs las byang/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' spyod ma/ /de dag
480a4(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs gnas su byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza ri badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ lha mo thugs kyi rigs las byung/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sa? 'og mas?/ /deng bdag byin brlab mdzad du? gsol/ /oM sarbA?
480a5(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta pit+ta li badzra swa b+hA ba At+mako haM/ de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer lcags kyu lte bus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod la dbang bskur? ba
480a6(rgyud 'grel): blas? bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ mgon pos bdag la dbang bskur cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag he ru ka'i gzugs su bya ste bdud rtsi lngar bkar ba'i bum bas dbang bskur bas/ gtso bo?
480a7(rgyud 'grel): dang gau rI dang/ puk+ka? sI rnams kyi dbu brgyan la mi bkyod ba'o/ /chos rkun ma dang ri khrod ma la rnam gar snang mdzad do/ /ro langs ma dang gtum na rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /za 'od mo dang g.yung mo la snang ba mdza' yas bsam par
480b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta ya g+hi She ka ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas yaM las rlung dang raM las ma'i steng du a las thod pa'o/ /de'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil du hUM las rdo rje de'i lte ba la hUM zla ba'i bar du b+h+rUM? aM ji khaM hUM rnams las sangs
480b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas lnga bskyed/ go ku da ta ma rnams las sems can lnga bskyed de me sgar ba de dag 'od du zhu ba la rdo rje'i lta ba'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i bdud rtsi bkug nas thim par gyur pa la// oM A:hUM gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te/
480b3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kyi lte ba la rdo rje nas kyi 'bras bu tsam bsams la bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /aM sarbba ta thA ga ta a mri ta sA d+ha na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas lha mo brgyad 'phros pa las byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa gong? du? brjod pa lta
480b4(rgyud 'grel): bur brgyus? te gtso bo nas? pa? rnams? te dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas lha mo de dag gis bstod pa/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su bskor/ nyid kyi thugs kyis ? ? pa
480b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub g.yo dang mi? g.yo 'khor bkun bsgrubs khyod/ /snying ? thugs kyis byang chub bsgrub/ /sma? ma spros pa'i thugs ni sgrub mdzad pa/ /rdo je ce ru ka dpal dgyes pa'i thugs/ /oM sarbba ga ta thA ga ta swAhA ba At+ma ko haM/ de ltar
480b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa las dang po ? lta bu dang/ gsum pa glog? gi rnam pa lta bu dang/ bzhi pa mar? me lta bu dang/ lnga pa thams cad gsal ? mad pa'i nammkha' lta bu ste/ gya? spyi? ma dang/ rmi? lam dang mtshung spa'i 'gyur ro/ /da nas ?
480b7(rgyud 'grel): lo bzhi la gnas par bya'o?/ ? ?gtum spar ba yis?/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsrags te/ /spyan? la sogs pa yang bsregs pas/ /bsregs p+pataM? las ri bong 'jig/ de ni bla ma'i zhal las nas par bya'o/ /de nas dag pa 
481a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran par bya ste/ spyan dmar ba ni snying rje'o/ /yan lag gnag pa ni byams? mgon? pa bzhi'i ? ba'i dgongs pa? bzhi'o gon? brgyad ni d+harama mthar pa brgyad do/ /phyag bcu drug ni snod pa nyid bcu drug go/ /'khor lo dang sna? cha dang mgur
481a2(rgyud 'grel): chu dang gdu bu dang ska rags ni/ mi skyod pa dang snang ba mdza' yas dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang rnam par snang mdzad dang don yod grub pa rnams go rim bzhin no/ /khro bo ni gdug pa 'dul ba'o/ /spyan gsum ni sku gsum ma
481a3(rgyud 'grel): rus pa ni bden pa bzhi'o/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje ma dang/ gsang ba'i gau rI dang chu ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang bdag med ma'o/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni puk+ka yI dang ri
481a4(rgyud 'grel): khrod ma dang gtum mo rang g.yung mo'o/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos ni gau rI dang choms rkun ma dang za phod mo dangs spyod ma dang mkha' spyod ma'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi thod pa brgyad 'dzin pa ni yo byad phun sum tshogs par
481a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /phug g.yas kyi thod pa na glang po la sogs pa 'dzin pa ni blo nang dang dbugs mi bde dang smyo ba dang khrag skyug pa dang mgron? dang 'brum pa dang mtshor pa'i nang dang mchin pa'i nang rnams zhi bar byed pa'o/ /bsam btan gyis dbun
481a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ste/ oM aSha? nan ya/ /ping+ga u rnga ke sha wa ? ta ma ni/ tsa turbi sha ti ne tra ya/ Sho Da sha b+hu dzA ya/ kriSh+Na dzI mA? ta wa pu She/ ka pA la mA ya? ne ka d+ha ri Ne/ At+ma? ta krSha? ra tsit+ta ya/ a d+d+hendu diSh+TiM? Ne/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA
481a7(rgyud 'grel): ra ya/ garna? ya gardza? ya ? ya ta? ma/ sho? ? me ya/ sa ? sa ga rA na/ band+ha band+ha/ nA gASh+Ta? kA na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ sha trUM naM/ ha hA ha hA hu hU he hai ho hau haM ha:phaT swAhA/ yang na oM daM ba pe tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes rgyun du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de?
481b1(rgyud 'grel): nas gtor ma btang bar bya ste/ gtor ma gong ma ltar bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs ba/ /mdun gyi nam mkha' la chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad sum rtseg tu dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po la oM dad hUM dang A:rnams las lha
481b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang/ phyogs skyod brgyad dang klu brgyad pa 'od la de la ye shes kyi lha bstim pa dang sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs la/ lce la rdo rje bsams te sngags 'dis btang ngo/ /oM aMnda? dza ma dza la dza k+kha b+hu ta/ bi ha na u rak+Sha tsanda sudzdza ma da/? ? ?
481b3(rgyud 'grel): ? ta la pA da ? aTTha sabba i raM? ba li b+huMny+dza dzi g+ha phul+la d+ha? swa mAM sa biM g+ha/ amha sap+pa kadzdza sA d+ha khan+ti khu ni phe Ta gA da/ oM akA ro mu khaM sarbba d+harma nuM/? AdyA nu t+than+na? twatA oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ /bsgom pa'i mthar smon lam ni/ rims bzang skye par
481b4(rgyud 'grel): smyo min pa/ dam tshig ldan zhing kye rdor 'chang/ /bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje ldan/ /bdag ni skye zhing skye gyur cig/ lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol/ /zab mo'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang ? btsun mo'i khu ba yang dag za/ /bdag ni skye zhing skye gyur cig/ bdag ni
481b5(rgyud 'grel): shing? la ldan pa ma yin yang/ /'du byed rgya mtshos g.yangs dang blo bur yang/ /phan par bsams nas sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas/ /'gro kun kye yi rdo rje myur thob shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mchod
481b6(rgyud 'grel): par rtogs pa'i rim pa don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shI he badzra sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrubs thabs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun nas dang bas rje btsun gyi/ /zhabs
481b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi pad+mar gus btud? de/ blo dman rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs ? 'dir rten gyi khyad par thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sdom pa dang ldan pas/ /gnas dur khrod la sogs par/ nam gyi brkyang cha la langs te/ khrus dang/ chu
482a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin byas nas maN+Dal phul te de nas mched pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa bshams la/ stan nang tshangs can la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ te badzra zhes brjod pas skad cig gis rang nyid he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis
482a2(rgyud 'grel): par/ sgoms pa'i rjes su? /rang gi snying gar re ba bsgom/ de las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ der na hUM gi rnam pa nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can/ /de yang ? 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje ste? ba snying rje che
482a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyun rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yis/ /lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod/ /dkar mo ri dwags mtshan ma 'dzin/ /chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod/ /ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/ /g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing/ /puk+ka sI ni rdo rje'i lag de bzhin ri khrod ma
482a4(rgyud 'grel): ? 'dzin/ /gdol bu mo ni cang te'u brdung/ /'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /'dod chags chen po rjes chags nas/ /g.yung mo skul 'byung pa nyid/ /de lta bu'i cho/ kun? blos mngon sum lta bur dmigs la/ phyag bcal ba dang/ phyi nang gsang ba
482a5(rgyud 'grel): ? de kho na'i mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ /skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ lam ston pa dang/ kun rdzob dang don dam gyi bdag nyid kyi sems bskyed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsdos la tshogs rten rnams la
482a6(rgyud 'grel): zlos? btang ba 'am/ gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas dang po byams pa bsgoms par bya/ /gnyis par snying rje rnams bsgoms zhing/ /gsum par dga' ba bskyom? pa dang/ /kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms so/ /yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste/ /de yang sbo?
482a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdu sngon du 'gro bas/ oM ? rAdz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /zhes brjod la/ chos thams cad sgyu ma tsam du bsgom mo/ /de pas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas/ nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ rdo rje de nyid kyi ni rab dang/ gur bcing pa ? rnam par ?
482b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ de yi nang du ? las byung ba yi/ /phyir log 'khor lo lta bu yi/ /'khor lo rtsibs bcu rgya che zhing/ /kha? stong mi g.yo 'khor ba'i sgom/ /nam mkha' i khams su b+ha ga bsam/ /dbus su rnam par bsgom pa ni/ /'khor lo'i sngon du ci rigs par/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid//
482b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngon/ /ji ltar rig par byin za dang/ /lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang/ /de steng b+h+ruM las 'khor lo dang/ /thig ler gyur pas gzhal yas khang/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'phar ma gcig/ ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar
482b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang/ /dur khrod brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /phyi nang rdo rje'i thig gis spras/ /lte bar ro ni rnam bsgom pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin brjod/ /'dab ma brgyad la bsam pa ni/ /tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag/ gshin rje dang
482b4(rgyud 'grel): ni nor bdag dang/ /bden bral dang ni thags bzangs rigs/ /gau ri la sogs rnams kyi gdan/ /nyi mar bcas pa'i ro dgu bsam/ /A li zla ba kA li nyi/ /dgung gnyis rnal 'byor ma/ yis bsgom/ /dbus kyi nyi zla kha sbyar bar/ /nA da ltung pas hUM du?
482b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /hUM las gaM sogs spro bar bya/ /gaM tsi baM g+haM baM shaM laM DaM gau rI la sogs pa'o/ /de las spros shing bsdus pa las/ /dbus kyi gtso bo'i phyag mtshan ni/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ste/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas
482b6(rgyud 'grel): par/ /yang ni hUM gi ? bsgom/ /'khor rnams gri gugS rdo tshung dang/ /ru sbal sprul ni phyogs su'o/ /seng ge dang ni dge slong dang/ /'khor lo rdo rje mtshams su'o/ /rang rang sa bon dag gis mtshan/ /yang ni spro bsdus sa bon bsdus/ /de las lnga pa
482b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan rdzogs lta bu? ni rnam pa gyur bltas nas/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje skye ba nag po che/ /'dab skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog/ /yang na sngo dang nyi ma'i mdog/ dad pas nges par rnam par bsgom/ /spo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog
483a1(rgyud 'grel): bandu dmar po'i spyan dang ldan/ /skya ser gyen du 'khyil ba dang/ phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo rna? cha gang ba dang/ /lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag la/ /'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags
483a2(rgyud 'grel): sdang? mig brgyad gnyis lon pa'i tshul/ /g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang/ g.yon par nas kyang kha TwA ga/ g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid/ /hUM gi yi ge 'don pa'i bdag/ rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas/ dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /dbang
483a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar gshin rje chom rkun ma/ /chu bdag phyogs su rol pa mo/ /lus ngan phong ni g+hasma ri/ /dbang ldan du ni puka si/ /ming ni de bzhin ri khrod ma/ /bden bral gdol pa mo bzhag cing/ /rlung du g.yung me rnam par bzhag/ /dkar mo g.yas na gri
483a4(rgyud 'grel): gug ste/ /de bzhin g.yon na do hi ta/ /che ma rkun ma g.yas cang te'u/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid/ /ro langs ma g.yas ru sbal te/ /g.yon pa yis ni pad+ma'i snod/ /g+hasma rI ni g.yos na spurl/ /g.yon par rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid//
483a5(rgyud 'grel): puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste/ /g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no/ /de khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste/ /g.yon na gsil byed de bzhin te/ /gdol pa mo g.yas 'khor lo ste/ /g.yon nas mthong ba de bzhin no/ /g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje ste//
483a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon no sdigs mdzub de bzhin no/ skyil krung phyed pa'i gang gyis gnas/ /dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gau ri kha dog nag par gyur/ /tshom rkun ma ni
483a7(rgyud 'grel): bcod dang mtshungs/ /ro langs ma ni gser bcos? bzhin/ /g+hasma rI ni marka ta mtshungs/ /puk+ka sE ni dbang sngon mtshungs/ /ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od/ /gtum mo nam mkha' i sngo bsangs ma/ /g.yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod/ /de nas zhi Shi?
483b1(rgyud 'grel): yig 'bru dgod/ /mig la gti mug rdo rje ma/ /rnam par zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ /sna la ser snam zhes bshad/ /kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag don rdo rje ma/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang po rnams ni dag pa'i phyir/ /'dis chos ? sems
483b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' cha/ de nas gnas gsum byin gyis brlab/ /spyi bor sa spyod mgrin par mkha' / /snying gang bdag med rnal 'byor pa'o/ /spro bsdu sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsdu/ ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ /mchod bstod dgug ? dbang du bya rigs ?
483b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs spyan drangs te/ /mchod cing gsol gdab dbang bskor bas/ /zhe sdang phyag rgya gtso bo?/ /zhe sdang phyag rgyas puk+ka sI/ /gti mug phyag rgyas ri khrod ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol pa mo/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid/ /yang ni
483b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo zhi sbrang rgyas/ gti mug phyag rgyas chom kun ma/ /ster sna'i phyag rgyas ro 'das ma/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas g+hasma rI/ /kha TwAM ga dang rjes chags bya'o/ /bdag gi byin brlabs sogs rdzogs rim bsgoms/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad pa/
483b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka'i hUM las bsdu byas la/ /de yi nang gi rgyas gdab bsgom/ /de rjes dag pa rjes ngan bya/ /bzlas thabs bzhi yi rim pa yis/ /dag gi sgrib sbyang gsang sngags bzlas/ /oM tre lo gya AkA? pa hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags
483b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis bzlas ? lo/ /gtor ma de nyid bzhi ldan btang/ /smon lam btab la spyod lam bya'o/ /rgyun du thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor bsgom/ /cho ga'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba'i rnam par dag pa ste/
483b7(rgyud 'grel): gang du brjod pa'i gzugs dang sku mdog dang hUM las byung ba'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang po ni skyes pa'i thob pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis dgang ba/ de bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje dang/ phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis shes rab ma la
484a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud gshes rab ma rdo rje phag mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can no/ /de'i sngags ni oM dzwa la dza la b+hyo hUM hUM hUM ? swAhA/ phyag drug pa zhal gsum pa/ g.yon dmar pa/ g.yas pa zla ba dang/ nyi ma lta bu/ dang po
484a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po gcer bu grong dud gsungs pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can no/ /phyag rnams rwa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ phyag g.yon gyi dang po ni rtse gsum pa/ g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ g.yon gyi gnyis pa ni dril bu phyag g.yas
484a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi gnyis phan gri gug/ /phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis yum lu gu rgyud ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'khyud pa'o/ /de yang bcom ldan ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab ma ste g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na gri gug dang thod pa
484a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM ki TaM khi? Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ dpal ldan 'bum lnga la brten rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ bla ma'i gsung gis gsal bar byas nas rnam spras
484a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /de dgos 'gro ba 'di kun srid mtsho brgal gyur nas/ /bde mdza' gtsig pu dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid gyur nas/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i gtso bo sems dpa' gsum gyi sgrub thabs rje na ro pa'i zhal gyi lung sbyar ba rdzogs so// /
484a6(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid kyi snang ba bzhugs?/ //rgya gar ? du/ tatwa ? ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid kyi sbyang ba zhes bya ba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /keng rus mdza' ni 'khor byed sprin tshogs 'dral zhing dri
484a7(rgyud 'grel): med nam mkha' lam yin pa/ /rdo rje'i 'od zer spros byed seng ge dbang po tshangs pa skrag 'gyur bstod 'os pa/ /bskal mdza' chu sbyin sgra bzhin sgra nyan 'jam 'gyur hUM gi yi ge sgrar 'gyur pa/ /'jigs pas bdung bzhi sgrag cing sring
484b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis ni phyag byas he ru ka yi gar khyod skyong gyur cig/ nag 'grubs? 'jur dad 'dra 'jam pa'i dzan na dzan sgrar 'gyur pa'i pus mo'i zung dgod dang/ /dgung par 'jigs pa'i spyan gsum gyi ni lta bas lha rnams skrag par mdzad pa
484b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spros 'gyur rengs? pa'i khro gnyer 'joms pa bstan te zhal ni mi bzad pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro utpal snge 'dra rang skus lus can skye ba gyur cig/ rdo rje sems dpa' gnas pa yis/ /snying rjes sems can rnams la ni/ /de
484b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid snang pa zhes bya ba/ /de ni bdag gis bri bar bya/ /'dul bar dka' bar gyur pa yi/ /sems ni lam la gzhug pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis nan tan byed pa la/ /de nyid rigs mkhan bzod par mdzod/ /rgyu ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje byung sogs
484b4(rgyud 'grel): snying ?/ /khang gshegs kyis bstan nan rten gyis ni gzung nas su/ /sna tshogs skyed byed bstan bcos de nyid snang ba ni/ /'gro la phan thogs phyir ni bdag gis bstan par bya/ /dang por de zhig slob mas bla ma'i phyogs su blta zhing
484b5(rgyud 'grel): mjal? phyi cho ga byas la/ de nas sems can rnams skyo bar 'gyur pa'i phyir/ /'gri la phan thogs don du sangs rgyas 'gyur par shog zhes bya ba ste/ dam bca' bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid bla ma la dbus bya te bya ba ni sngon pa'o//
484b6(rgyud 'grel): ? min pa'i ? sen sa 'drag par 'byung pa las sngag? pa zhes bya pa'i tshul khrims so/ /lus dang dag dang sems 'byung pa zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'o/ /sngon gyi dam bca' ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i grub pa'i zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus so//
484b7(rgyud 'grel): sems rtse gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan no/ /'di dag thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis nges par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de shes rab kyi ming thob pa'o/ /de bas na shes rab dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa la sogs
485a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lngas ming thab par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brten par byed cing mi dge ba'i las bcu yongs su spangs par bya'o/ /de
485a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang lus dang ngag dang sems la brten par gyur pa'o/ /lus ni ngag la brten pa dang/ ngag ni sems la brten pa dang/ sems ni nam mkha' la brten pa ste/ nam mkha' ni ? la yang brten par ma gyur pa'o/ /de bas na 'bad pa thams
485a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis/ /gsum po 'di nyid dri ma med par byas la/ /slar yang gsum po 'di la rnam par bshad par brjod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste lus ni gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'o/ /ngag ni sgra brnyan bzhin du'o/ /sems ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste//
485a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa de ni shes rab dang ldan pas rnam par dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o/ /de lta bas na mi dge ba bcu gnod par mi byed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sngon du las rjes su dran par spyod par bya zhes bya ba ni yin la/ /las dang po pa'i dum
485a5(rgyud 'grel): pu ste dang po'o// //de nas sngags bstan pa'i rgyud rnam pa bzhi las sngags kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa la sogs pa ni/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i thams cad/ ngan song du gnas pa'i sems can rnams bkug
485a6(rgyud 'grel): nas dam pa'i lam la dgod pa'i phyir bstan to/ /bstan pa yang tha ma dang 'bring dang rab dang sems can gyi bsam pa rab tu dbye nges sna tshogs par 'gyur te/ dper na gcig min par 'gyur ba bzhin du'o//
485a7(rgyud 'grel): ci ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dper na chu gang bar gyur pa'i chu snod rnams la zla ba gcig yin yang gzugs brnyan du ma gyur pa bzhin du zhes bya ba'o/ /de bas na thig pa thams cad las de kho na nyid gcig pu yin gyi gzhan ma ni
485b1(rgyud 'grel): ma yin par rtogs par gyis zhes bya ba'o/ /de ltar gtan la phebs nas sngon gyi dam bca' ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ skye ba 'di las nyin mtshan du byang chub bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gal te bsgrub par ma nus na de lta na ni/ /bsod nams
485b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod par bya ste/ bsod nams kyi mthu des ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gzhan la byang chub bsgrub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o/ /khro ba dang ser sna dang nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang chang dang sha la sogs pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba gang rnams kyis bstan
485b3(rgyud 'grel): pa so so ru go bar byed pa de rnams kyis des par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid bsten par mi nus te/ longs spyod kyi don du de rnams kyis slob ma bzung bar byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos 'tshong pa
485b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ log par 'tsho bar byed pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang bral bas dmyal bar ltung par 'gyur ba dang/ don med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas 'byung ba lnga dang khams lnga la sogs pa gang ba yin pa de rnams sems kyi phun sum
485b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa yin gyi gzhan ma ni ma yin no/ /dper na rmi lam du bdag dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i gyur pa rnams gang skyes pa dang/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las 'das par byung pa'i zla ba'i gzugs brtan dang 'dra ba dang/ smra brnyan dang 'dra ba dang/ drI za'i grong khyer bzhin
485b6(rgyud 'grel): du rtogs par bya'o/ /sems kyang skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang song ba dang 'ongs pa las 'das pa dang/ thog ma dang bar dang tha ma las rnam par grol ba yin la/ gnas pa gang las kyang thob par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab dang ldan par
485b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa 'di nyid 'di ni srid la gsum la rol bar mdzad pa de/ dper na rdzu 'phrul mkhan skyes bu gang zhig gis/ skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i tshul gyi smi rnams la ngo mtshar bar ston par byed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems kyang shes 
486a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de lta brjod? par gyur pa'i thabs rnal 'byor pas rig na/ sems kyis la gnod par mi 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor pas sems shes par gyur na chags pa dang bral bar nam mkha' bzhin du 'byung te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu
486a2(rgyud 'grel): rin po che bzhin du spro ba dang bsdu pa'i bdag nyid 'chi bar gyur na yang rung skad cig gis 'tsho bar gyur na yang rung ste/ dus kyi mi 'chi ba la smos ci dgos/ de ltar nyams su na myong bar thos pa tsam gyis don med de/ /dper na sman spyad pa glags pa
486a3(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis nad pa la nang zhi bar sri? 'gyur ba bzhin du'o/ /de bas na nyams su myong ba'i sbyor pas 'bras bu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ /n+ya de'i phyir sems rtogs par gyur na thams cad skye par 'gyur ro/ /shes
486a4(rgyud 'grel): rab dang sems kyi mtshan nyid ni dbang dang bla ma'i drin gyis shes par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o/ /spyi'i gleng gzhi'i dum bu ste gnyis pa'o/ /de nas slob ma rnams la dbang yang dag par sbyin par bya ste/ rdul chen? dgyel? zhes pa
486a5(rgyud 'grel): la rdul zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i don gyis shes rab yin la/ /'gro ba thams cad mtshon par phyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de la dgyes ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pas nar dza ba da'o/ /de nyid lha'i dkyil 'khor yin gyi/ lha rnams la spyan 'dren pa
486a6(rgyud 'grel): ? gsol ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no/ /chi'i phyir zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan byon pa dang gshegs pa mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /dper na rmi lam na skye pa dang gnas pa dang 'gog pa bzhin du'o/ /rgyu de'i phyir lha rnams ma
486a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin 'dres ? gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa mi bya ste/ dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan gyis 'khor pa'i 'chib pa las grol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /med pa'i dngos po la smos ci 'gos zhes bya ba'o/ /de bas na dngos po thams?
486b1(rgyud 'grel): cad la mi dmigs pas thams cad bya'o/ /dngos po dang dngos po min pa las grol bar gyur pa'i goms ni sangs rgyas zhes bya bar brjod do/ /thabs dang shes rab kyis bdag nyid gtso bo de lta bu las sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs? pas mchod par bya'o/ /ji ltar
486b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bgyi zhe na dag pa dang ma dag pa'i sems gcig tu bya ba ni sngags so/ /de bzhin du skye dgu rnams kyi skye ba ni bzlas pa yin la 'jig rten gsum po rgyas gdab par byed pas na phyag rgya yin la de shes rab tu brjod
486b3(rgyud 'grel): de/ shes rab kyi maN+Dal ? mdun du byas nas/ /slob ma rnams la dbang sna tshogs ba sbyin par bya'o/ /dbang las ma gtogs par dngos grub med de/ /de bas na sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu 'dod pa las dbang sbyin par bya'o//
486b4(rgyud 'grel): slob mas kyang zhu ba 'di ltar bya ste/ 'khor bar 'dam du bying gyur pa/ /mi bzang sdig po byas pas g.yogs/ /de ltar bdag ni 'byung ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pas ? par mdzod ces bya'o/ /de nas slob ma la bla mas
486b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bdun po sbyin par bya ste chu'i dbang sbyin pa dang cod pan gyi dbang dang/ rdo rje'i dbang dang bdag po'i dbang dang med gi dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang dang/ shes rab ye shes kyi ?/ /dang por zhig me long lta bu'i
486b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnam por snang mdzad yin la chags pa med par gyur pas na rnam par snang mdzad do/ /de dbang bskur ba zhes bya ste chu'i dbang ngo/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid
486b7(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa ste/ bstod? par mi ? bsam mi 'gyur bskyod pa yin la de mgo po la gzung bar bya ste/ cod pan gyi dbang ngo/ /de nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid rin chen 'byung ldan yin la/ gnyis po ma lus pa'i
487a1(rgyud 'grel): chags pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur bas? na rin chen 'byung ldan te/ des dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo/ /de nas so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis bdag nyid snang ba mdza' yas yin la/ mdza' yas ni tshang med pa ste/ snang ba ni 'od zer
487a2(rgyud 'grel): gang la yod pa de snang ba mdza' yas so/ /des dbang bskur bas ni bdag po'i dbang zhes bya'o/ /de nas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid don yod grub pa yin te/ don yod grub zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i grub pa yin la/ nges ? gi
487a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba yin la ming zhes bya ba ste/ ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba ni/ mi phyed pa'i stong pa nyid yin la/ sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni srid pa gsum gyi gcig pa nyid snying rje ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /gsang
487a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnyis po ma lus pa srid par byed pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i gtan la 'bebs pa yin la/ des dbang bskur ba ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo/ /shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ nam mkha' i khams yin la/ ye
487a5(rgyud 'grel): shes ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las 'das pa ste/ nges dbang bskur ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo/ /stong nyid shes rab brjod pa dang/ /snying rje gsal ba thabs yin no/ /gnyis ka gcig tu sbyor ba las/ /bdud rtsi'i mchog ni 'dzag
487a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o/ /dbang gzhan ma gang rnams yod pa de rnams de nyid du shes par bya'o/ /lan ci phyi 'am nang du de rnams kyi don ni yang dag par sbyin ba btang ba las 'phel bar bya zhes bya ba'o/ /dbang gi dum bu ste gsum pa'o/ /
487a7(rgyud 'grel): da ni de'i don gtan la 'bebs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /rtsa gsum gyi dbye ba bri bar bya ste/ la la nA ni g.yon nas 'bab par byed pa A li'i rang bzhin thabs so/ /ra sa nA ni g.yas nas 'bab par byed pa kA li'i rang bzhin shes rab po/ /gnyis
487b1(rgyud 'grel): ka gcig par nyid kyi dbus su a ba d+hU tI li la la nA chos dang /ra sa nA longs spyod rdzogs pa dang/ a ba d+hU tI la sprul pa'i sku ste/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dbye pas so/ /rtse gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi la gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bde ba chen po'o//
487b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po 'di rnams las sprul pa la byams pa'o/ /chos la snying rje'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa la dga' ba'o/ /bde ba chen po la btang snyoms so/ /de bzhin du skud cig bzhis skye bar 'gyur te /rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ rnam par smin pa dang/
487b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par nyed? pa dang/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /bden pa bzhi ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ kun 'byung ba dang 'geg pa dang/ lam mo/ /de kho na nyid bzhi ste/ bdag gi de kho na nyid dang/ sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang/ lha'i de kho na nyid dang/ ye shes kyi de
487b4(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid do/ /dga' ba bzhi ste/ dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ sna tshogs dga' ba dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /sde pa bzhi ste/ gnas brtan pa dang /thams cad yod par smra ba dang/ mang pos bkur ba dang/ phal chen no//
487b5(rgyud 'grel): byams pa la sogs pa 'di rnams ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ thams cad tu ro mnyam pa nyid kyi gang blo gnas par 'gyur pa de byams pa'o/ /sngon gyi smon lam gyi bdag nyid gang sems yin pa de snying rje'o/ /'di dag la gcig pa de nyid gang
487b6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa de dga' ba'o/ /thams cad la bltos pa med pa'i blo gang yin pa de btang snyoms so/ /sprul pa la sogs ji lta bu yin zhe na/ sems can ma lus pa rnams ni/ /gang du skye bar ? pa ste/ /de ru sprul pa'i sku yin te /de ni sprul par brjod
487b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /yang na spro bar byed pas na sprul pa'o/ /chos ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir sems kyi mtshan nyid do/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa ni mngar ba la sogs pa ro drug la spyod pa'i phyir ro/ /sku gsum gyi dbye bas 'di rnams su 'gyur
488a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ de rnams yongs su shes par byed pas bde ba chen po'o/ /'khor lo 'di rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i skad cig rnams shes par bya'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'khyud
488a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang tsum pa na la sogs pa sna tshogs bar byed pas na sna tshogs pa'o/ /ye shes kyi bde ba la spyod bas ni rnam par smin pa'o/ /thams cad mnyes par byed pas na rnam pa med pa ste rang bzhin med pa nyid do/ /chags pa dang
488a3(rgyud 'grel): bral bar gyur pas ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /skad cig 'di rnams las dga' ba la sogs bskye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par sna tshogs la dga' ba'o/ /rnam par smin pa la mchog dga' o/ /rnam par nyid pa la khyad dga' o/ /mtshan
488a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang bral ba la lhan cig skyes ba'i dga' ba'o/ /dga' bas bde ba cung zad bskyed par 'gyur te/ /mchog gi dga' bas de las lhag par 'gyur ba'i bde ba'o/ /sna tshogs dga' bag chags pa sna tshogs
488a5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid do/ /thams cad kyi lhag ma ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /sngon mas ni reg bya la 'dod pa dang/ gnyis pas bde ba la chags pa dang/ gsum pas chags pa nyams pa dang/ bzhi pas mchog
488a6(rgyud 'grel): tu bde ba'o/ mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i bar du ni lhan cig skyes ba ste gsum po 'di dag dang bral ba yin la gang gis kyang bstan par mi nus te /gang las kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /bla ma la ni brten ba dang/ /rang gi bsod nams kyis
488a7(rgyud 'grel): shes te zhes bya ba'o/ /dga' ba 'di rnams la sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa bzhi shes par bya'o/ /de rnams kyang ji ltar shes she na/ sngon du skye ba la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'o/ /mchog tu 'byung ba la kun 'byung gi bden
488b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rnam par nyid pa la rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis 'gog pa'i bden pa'o/ /de bas na lhan cig skyes pa nyid kyis lam gyi bden pa'o/ /de nas de kho na nyid bzhi ni/ dga' ba skyes pa'i phyir bdag gi de kho na nyid do/ /gsang bar smra bar byed pas na
488b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog la sngags kyi de kho na nyid/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs par byed bas na rnam par nyid ba la lha'i de kho na nyid do/ /lhan cig skyes pa 'char par rnam par bsgoms pa nyid kyis ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do/ /de nas sde pa bzhi ni/ dga' ba
488b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po la gnas brtan pa'o/ /dga' ba gnyis pa la thams cad yod par smra ba'o/ /sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid mang pos bkur ba'o/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin phal? chen zhes bya ba ste/ de dag thams cad dga' ba rnams las bskyed par 'gyur
488b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de rnams kyang sprul ba dang/ longs pyod rdzogs pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid dang/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnams la shes par bya'o/ /sprul pa dang/ chos dang longs? spyod rdzogs pa ni la la nA dang ras? nA dang a pa d+hU tI'o/ /'di dag thams cad
488b5(rgyud 'grel): ro mnyam pa nyid kyis bde ba chen po'i/ /de yang phyi dang nan du sems kyi rgyal po'i rnam par rol par shes par bya'o/ /bla mas mdzes pa'i ye shes ni/ /slob ma la ni bstan bar bya/ /don dam ba yi dbye bas ni/ /rtsa gnyis po yi bar du'o/ /ma bcom
488b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mi rtag min/ /dngos dang dngos med zag med dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa las 'das ba// gang la khams gsum skye ba dang/ /khams gsum po la phan thogs pas/ /tshig tu brjod pa kun las 'das/ /dbang ni thob par gyur pa yi/ /skyes
488b7(rgyud 'grel): bus ye shes shes par bya/ zhe nas de nyid rtog pa'i phyir/ /rab tu sbyor ba brjod par bya/ /shes rab rang bzhin phyag rgya las/ /chags pa gang sems la bde ba 'byung ba de dga' ba dang por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag las khyad par dbang po
489a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams gcig tu gyur na lhag par gyur pa mchog gi dga' ba'o/ /thams cad mnyes par gyur ba'i rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid dang bral ba ni sna tshogs dga' ba'o/ /gsum po 'di dag las
489a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das bar gyur pa lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i dga' ba ste/ de yang de bzhin nyid kyi gnas skabs su rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o/ /de nas dbang po rtul por gyur pa rnams sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ phyi rol gyi shes rab sbyor pas ye
489a3(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi mtshan nyid ni bla mas bstan par bya'o/ /yang na steng la 'bar tsaN+Da sI/ /bder gshegs lnga na sreg par byed/ /spyan ma la sogs bsregs nas ni/ /haM bsregs ri bong can 'dzag byed ces bya ba la tsaN+Da zhes bya ba ni shes rab yin
489a4(rgyud 'grel): la A li zhes bya ba ni thabs te/ A li dang k+Sha li'i rang bzhin la la nA dang ras nA'i? bdag nyid do/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid 'di dag ni tsanda lI 'o/ /lte ba la zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la yin la gnyis ka'i dbus su a ba d+hU tI la
489a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i don do/ de 'bar bar gyur na 'dir gshegs lnga zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga yin pa sreg par byed ces bya ba'o/ /de nas spyan ma la sogs zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba lnga bsregs nas rnam par med par 'gyur te/ haM bsregs
489a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni bdag gis bsregs nas so/ /de ltar gyur pas ri bong can zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems yin la /sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzag par byed de/ /de yang rang gis nye bar thob par 'gyur ro/ /dper na me tog gi ni smas?
489a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa tsam gyis 'dzin kyang gang du yang mi mthong zhing rnam pa gang gis kyang nye bar thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /'o na ci yin zhe na/ rang rig par 'gyur pa ji lta ba de bzhin du /lhan cig skyes pa yang de bzhin du bstan zhes bya'o/
489b1(rgyud 'grel): de lta bur gyur pa'i lhan cig skyes pa la gnas pa'i sems ni/ dri za'i grong khyer bzhin dang /sgyu ma dang 'phrul dang 'dra ba dang/ me long dang gzugs brnyan bzhin dang/ sgra brnyan bzhin du spro ba dang/ bsdu ba rnam pa sna tshogs ? sogs pa
489b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan par byed ces bya ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i sbyin pa'i dum bu ste bzhi pa'o// //da ni shes rab ma rnams sbyin par bya ste rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis rnam par dbye ba bstan par byed pas na srid mo ste mig la'o/ /ma reg pa'i phyir man?
489b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ste rna ba la'o/ /rmi lam la skyes pa'i 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gro ba skyed bar byed pas na ma yin te sna la'o/ /dngos po thams cad 'joms par byed pas na bu mo ste lce la'o/ /sra ba'i sems myug ma bzhin du gyur par byed pas na myug ma mkhan
489b4(rgyud 'grel): te reg bya la'o/ /bde ba bsnyen par byed pas na chung ma ste phra ma la'o/ /rdo rje chos le sgrib pa med par byed pas na ko mkhan ma ste phrag dog la'o/ /kaM zhes bya ba na nam mkha' yin la 'di la skyong bar byed pa'i tshul khrims yod pas na ka pA la'i stengs
489b5(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa'i mdza' gos su byas nas 'khor bar byed pas na ri khrod ma ste chu la'o/ /tsaN+Da zhes bya ba ni shes rab ste A li zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin pa/ tsaN+Da la'i zhes bya ba ste me la'o//
489b6(rgyud 'grel): mi rig pa'i phyir rig pa ngan ma ste rlung la'o/ /? phyi ri mo bzhin du 'gro ba gsum pa gtan la 'bebs par spyod pas na rol mo? mkhan ma ste nam mkha' la'o/ /'gro ba sna tshogs brdzun du byed pas na ri mo mkhas ma ste gzugs
489b7(rgyud 'grel): la'o nyon mongs pa ma lus por ? par byed pas na 'dreg mkhan ma ? tshor ba la'o/ /glang po che'i sems kyi so la rgyun du byed pas na so mkhan te 'du shes la'o/ /dmigs pa med pa'i gdugs kyis 'gro ba bka' ? par byed pas na ?
490a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhan ma ste 'du byed la'o/ /ma rig pa gsod par byed pas ni shan mkhan ma ste rnam par shes pa la'o/ mda' zhes bya ba ni dbang po lnga yin la/ /de rnams gcig pa nyid du byed pas mnga' mkhan ma ste? ?
490a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rtogs? ma lus pa kum? par byed pas tshul khrims 'di la yod pas na ku tsa? ni ste tshul khrims la'o/ /dga' bar byed bsan nan 'di lta ste bzod pa'o/ /gnyis po ma lus par byed pas na cha mo brtson 'grus la'o//
490a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan bzhin du sna tshogs pa ston par byed pas na gar mkhan ma ste bsam gtan la'o/ /rang bzhin med pa'i dra bas spro ba'o/ /rnam par rtog pa'i yid 'chang bar byed pas na nyi pa ma ste/ shes rab la'o/ /bden pa'i chos rnam
