490a4(rgyud 'grel): la rgyas gdab par byed pas na ma'i ? mo ste byams pa la'o/ /dmigs pa med pa'i skud pa la sna tshogs pa'i me tog 'ching bar byed pas na phred mkhan ma ste snying rje la'o/ /rnam par rtog pa'i shing gcod par byed pa na shing mkhan
490a5(rgyud 'grel): ma ste dga' ba la'o/ /ma lus pa'i sgrib pa med par byed pas na lhag ma ? mkhan ma ste btang snyoms la'o/ /phyogs gnyis kyi bsrung shing gis gzung bar byed pas ? rdzi mkhan ma ste lus la'o /rang gi ros 'gro ba ston pa pa byed
490a6(rgyud 'grel): pas mchad ? ma ste? dag la'o/ /bram ze de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes te shes par byed pas ni bram ze mo ste sems la'o zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di rtsams kyi bdag/ nyid mkha' 'gro ma rnams su 'gyur te de rnams bris bar bya'o/ /gzugs
490a7(rgyud 'grel): ? sgra chos dun pa'o? ? ro la g+hasma? rI'o/ reg bya las spyod ma'o/ /yid la mkha' spyod ma'o/ /sa las sregs ma'o/ /chu lar khrod ma'o/ /me la tsaN+Da lI'o/ /rlung la rigs ngan ma'o/ /nam mkha' la bdag med pa'o/ /'dir
490b1(rgyud 'grel): chags la ro langs ma'o/ /zhe sdang la rdo rje can ma'o/ /gti mug la rdo rje ma'o/ /brag pa la gsar ba'i dag mo'o/ /phrag dog la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /gzugs la rdo rje ma'o/ /tshor ba la chom rkun ma'o/ /'du shes la chu'i rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'du byed
490b2(rgyud 'grel): la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /rnam par shes pa la bdag med ma'o/ /sbyin pa la dkar mo'o/ /tshul khrims la chom rkun ma'o/ /bzod pa la ? ngas ma'o/ /brtson 'grus la b+hasma ma rI'o/ /bsam gtan las sbyor mo'o/ /shes rab la
490b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' spyod ma'o/ /byams pa la spyan ma'o/ /snying rje la mA ma kI'o/ /dga' ba la gos dkar mo'o/ /btang snyoms la sgrol ma'o/ /lus la sa spyod ma'o/ /dag la mkha' sbyor ma'o/ /sems la bdag med ma ste zhes bya ba ste/ lha mo 'di rnams la
490b4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' spyod ma sna tshogs pa'i rigs bstan nas de rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams brjod par bya'o/ /gzugs la sogs pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ rin
490b5(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /sa la sogs rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o/ /'dod chags la sogs pa la sdang? pa mdza' yas dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ don yongs grub
490b6(rgyud 'grel): gdang?/ gzugs dang /tsher? ba la sogs pa la/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yi bskyod pa'o/ /sbyin pa la sogs pa la rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi
490b7(rgyud 'grel): dpyod pa dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang /don yong grub pa dang /rin chen 'byung ldan dang /rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /byams ba la sogs pa la /rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa'o/ /lus la sogs 
491a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dag? mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba'o/ /da ni mkha' 'gro rnams la rgyas gdab ba brjod par bya ste /gau dI dang ro bsregs ma la mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab pa'o/ /ri khrod ma dang?
491a2(rgyud 'grel): chab? kun ma la rnam par snang mdzad kyis so/ /ro langs ma dang tsaN+Da rdza ? rin chen 'byung ldan gyi so/ /g+ha sma rI dang rigs ngan ma la snang ba mdza' yas kyi ? don yod dang rin chen dbang la snang ba mdza' yas kyis rgyas gdab pa'i
491a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad dang snang ba mdza' yas la mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab pa'o/ /de la rdo rje sems dpas rgyas gdab pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor bas mtshan du rgyas gdab po/ /de nas bdag med ma
491a4(rgyud 'grel): ni rang bzhin gyis rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'o/ /'di dag dngos po gcig pa nyid ni/ /dpal ldan dpa' bo he ru ka 'byung ba chen po lnga'i gzugs can/ 'dod chags la sogs pa gzugs kyi bdag nyid de bzhin/
491a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa lnga phyag rgya 'dzin pa yul drug la khyab pa'o/ /yul drug gi rang bzhin du gyur pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa /stong pa nyid bcu drug gis yongs su bskor ba /dge ba bcu drug rgyan du 'gyur ba/ bdud
491a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mnan pa mdzad pa/ bden pa bzhi bstan par mdzad ba/ sku bzhi'i bdag nyid du gyur pa/ de kho na nyid bzhin dbus su zhugs pa/ dga' ba gzhi rnam par snang mdzad pa /skad cig bzhi'i rang bzhi'i rang bzhin du gyur/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi
491a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa /bdag med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan ba'i mnga' bdag srid pa gsum pa rol par mdzad ces bya ba'o/ /thabs dang shes rab gtan la 'bebs pa'i dum bu? sde lnga pa'o// //da ni bdag med pa'i 'khor lo la bskyed
491b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa bri bar bya ste/ raM las nyi ma mdun du bsgoms nas su/ /nyi der hUM skyes sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang/ /dbab? cing ni rnam par bsgom par bya/ /dang po de zhig chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid do bsgoms la/ de nas
491b2(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /me'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa kha sbyor du gyur pa chos kyi 'byung gnas las skyes pa'i 'khor lo ste /de'i dbus su gdan bco lnga'i bdag nyid gyur par ro bsgom bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du dbyangs dang po las
491b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ de'i steng du re pha las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o/ /'od dag ni me long lta bu dang /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid dag go/
491b4(rgyud 'grel): ? 'di dag yang dag par sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpa' i gdon yin no/ /dkyil 'khor de la rim pa de nyid kyi yi ge hUM las skyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhal gcig pa la phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje dang phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje dang phyag g.yon pan thod pa ste /mgo po'i phreng bas
491b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan par gyur ba /sku mdog chu shes dang 'dra bar /bdag med ma'i sku la 'khyud par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas sngon bzhin du zla ba nyi ma 'byung ba'i rim pas /yi ge a la sogs pa'i yi ge 'bru bco lnga bdag med ma la sogs par gyur
491b6(rgyud 'grel): te /dbus su bdag med ma'o/ /shar du rdo rje ma'o/ /gshin rjer dkar mo'o/ /chu du ro langs ma'o/ /gnod sbyin du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /phyi rol gyi shar gyi sgo? la dkar mo'o/ /lho ru chom rkun ma'o/ /nub tu ro langs ma'o/ /byang du g+hasma rI'o/ dbang
491b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan du ro bsreg ma'o/ /me ru ? khrod ma'o/ /bden bral du tsaN+Da lI 'o/ /rlung du rigs ngan ma'o/ /steng du mkha' spyod ma'o/ /'og tu sa spyod ma ste lha mo 'di rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog nag po mi zad pa/ spyan dmar ba phyag rgya lnga
492a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa phyag g.yas pa na gri gug dang /g.yon pa mthod pa dang kha TwAM ga'o/ /stag gi lpags pa go su mdzad pa/ /skra ser la gyen du gyur par bsgoms par bya'o/ /bdud la sogs pa'i skyon rnams gcod par byed pa'i gri gug go /sgom pa ?
492a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyams par byed pa ni thod pa ste /bdud bzhi za bar byed pa ni khrag gis gang ba'o/ /kha TwAM ga ni stong pa nyid yin la/ /ra ni thabs so/ /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang la sogs pa'i bdag nyid 'gro ba gsum po za ? byed
492a3(rgyud 'grel): pas na stag ste de'i pags pa go su? mdzad pa'o/ /de lta bur gyur pa'i 'khor la rnal 'byor pa gang gis bsgom pa don myur bar dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o/ /lha mo de thams cad ji ltar brjod par rim pas rdzogs nas
492a4(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la thim nas de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de nyid cha bco lnga'i bdag nyid zla ba ste byang chub kyi sems yin la/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bdag nyid byang chub sems de mi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
492a5(rgyud 'grel): lo la sogs pa'i thabs dang/ byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas skye bar 'gyur/ /de'i tshe? bco lngas rnal 'byor ma bco lngar dag par 'dod do/ /de rnams ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /bya ba byed pa'i phyir zla ba ni byang chub sems te/ A li'i gzugs
492a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bde ba chen por brjod do/ /phebs ma lha mo re re ni thabs shes rab kyi bdag nyid bskyed pa'o/ /kun rdzob pa ni 'dus pa ste/ de nas kun nga dang 'dra zhes ni thabs kyi gnas pa'o/ /don dam par spyod pa ste/ bde ba'i gzugs shes rab ma
492a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par brjod zhes bya ba'i bdag med ma'i dum bu ste drug pa'o/ //de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid tu gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu drug pa'i bsgrub pa brjod par bya ste phyag rnams na stong pa nyid bcu
492b1(rgyud 'grel): drug tu bstan te /de rnams gang yin zhe na /nang stong pa nyid dang phye stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
492b2(rgyud 'grel): dang /mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo? nyid stong
492b3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ stong pa nyid bcu drug ni phyag bcu drug tu brjod do/ /yang dag par bsdu ba bzhi ni zhabs bzhi yin la de/ rnams gang yin zhe na sbyin ba dang tshigs snyan pa dang don spyod pa dang/
492b4(rgyud 'grel): don mthun pa ste/ de rnams ni zhabs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni pags pa ste /de rnams gang yin zhe na /dran pa dang brtson 'grus dang /dga' ba dang /shin tu spangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang /btang snyoms dang /chos rnams par
492b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byed pa ste /de rnams ni pags pa'o/ /sha la ro bsreg ma dang/ khrag la ri khrod ma dang/ shukra la tsaN+Da lI dang /rkang dang /glang pa la ri ? ma ste /de rnams ni sha ? khrag dang shukra? dang /rkang dang glad par brtags so/ /rus pa rnams ni bden
492b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi ste /sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam ni dus pa rnams su 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thad pa brgyad ni zhal brgyad de/ /de rnams gang yin zhe na/ gzugs stong par mthong ba dang/ nang gi gzugs stong par mthong ba dang /dge
492b7(rgyud 'grel): dang mi dge ba'i stabs byas pa'i stong par mthob pa dang nam par mdza' yas kyi skye mched stong par mthong ba dang /rnam shes mdza' yas kyi skye mched stong par mthong ba dang /ci yang med pa'i skye mched stong par mthong ba dag 'du shes med
493a1(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes med min stong par mthong ba dang /'du shes kyi 'gog pa stong par mthong ba dang zhes bya ba ste/ rnam par thar la brgyad ni zhal brgyad no/ /'dod chags chen po las byung ba'i zhal g.yon pa dmar
493a2(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /gti mug chen po'i bdag nyid g.yas pa ste dkar po'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir zhe sdang chen po las byung ba'i nub kyi zhal ni mche ba gtsigs pa ste /bdud bzhi nyams pa'i don du'o/ /zhe sdang
493a3(rgyud 'grel): chen bo dang gti mug chen po dang /'dod chags chen po las byung ba'i gar gyi ? 'bab par byed pa rtsa ba'i zhal shes par bya'o/ /steng gi zhal ni mi bzang pa'i 'jigs su rung pa'o/ /zhal gzhan ma rnams ni/ shin tu mi bzad ba
493a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jigs par mdzad pa'o/ /gar gyi ro dgu ni rol pa dang /dpa' ba dang /gshe ba dang rgod pa dang /mi bzad pa dang /'jigs byed dang /gshin rje dang/ ngo mtshar? ba dang/ zhi ba ste gar gyi lo dgu dang ldan pa'o/ /leg par lta
493a5(rgyud 'grel): ba nyams par byed pa'i phyir /mche ba gtsigs pa'o/ /spyan ni sdang bar mdza' las /log pa'i lta ba nyams pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par thar pa gsum ni spyan gsum ste /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa mang po'o/ /de ni?
493a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di? nyid kyis zhal brgyad la spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams la snying rje'i phyir de rnams dmar po'o/ /phyag rgya rnam pa lnga sangs rgyas lngar 'gyur te /dbu la 'khor lo'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa'i/ /phyag
493a7(rgyud 'grel): la phyag gdub kyis gzugs kyi rnam par snang mdzad do/ /snyan? cha'i bdag nyid snyan la mdza' yas so/ /mgur la mgul nor gyis rang bzhin gyis rin dbang ngo/ /ska rags kyi yon tan gyis rkang pa don yod grub pa'o/ /zhes
493b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ sangs rgyas lnga ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis bdag nyid phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /bdud bzhi ni phung po'i bdud dang /nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang/ 'chi bdag gi ? bar/ lha'i bu'i bdud de /'di rnams zhabs kyis mnan ?
493b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad de /tshangs pa dang /grag po dang/ khyab 'jug dang /'dod pa'i lha yin la/ gti mug dang /phrag dog dang zhe sdang dang /'dod chags zhes bya ba'i don to/ /mi dge ba bcu mgo bo'i phreng ba mdzod de /de rnams gang yin zhe na /srog gcod pa
493b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pas log par g.yem? pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /tshig byal? ba dang /phra ma dang /tshig rtsub pa dang /gnod sems dang /mnar sems dang /log la blta ba zhes bya ba ste/ de rnams kyis phreng ba mdzad de 'bul?
493b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis dpung rgyan du mdzad de/ /bdun pa dang /brtson 'grus dang sems dang/ dpyod pa'o/ /zhabs la zhabs gdub ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phung po lnga ste/ tshul khrims dang /bsam gtan dang/ shes
493b5(rgyud 'grel): rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o/ /log pa'i 'dod chags nyams par byed pa'i phyir /rnal 'byor ma'i dra ba nye bar bstan ho/ /skrag pa nyams par byed pa'i phyir skul thal ba byugs par
493b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa 'khor ba rang bzhin med pa'i sgom pa nyid kyis /gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas 'khyud pa'o/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis thod pa rnams yongs su brjod do/ /thong pa de rnams kyi nang nas g.yas pa'i khrod pa
493b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la glang po che dang /rta dang /bong? bu dang/ ba lang? dang/ rnga mo dang/ mi dang/ sha ra b+ha dang /byi la'o/ /de bzhin du g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad la /sa dang chu dang /me dang rlung dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang/ /gshin rje dang gnod sbyin no/ /'di
494a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ phra ma dang/ phrag dog dang/ ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ ser snar brjod/ /gang gis ye shes bla na med pa ni/ /thams cad dbang gis thod pa ste ? de yig ?
494a2(rgyud 'grel): ban mi bskyod ba/ /bla ma dam pas 'dzin pa yin/ /ye shes snang bar gyur pa'i phyir/ /'od zer 'bar bas brtags pa'o/ /theg chen lo la zhon pa ste/ /yin pa dang min pa'i rtag pa thams cad phyogs las 'das pa'i phyir?
494a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po de pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyis gang yin zhe na/ /rin pa dang tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab po/ /'di rnams kyi gnas pa med pa'i sbyor bas?/ thams
494a4(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzhugs te/ zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po nyid la bzhugs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu drug pa'i dum bu ste bdun pa'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rim ba brjod par ba ste/
494a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid ni/ zur bzhi pos? ni yang dag 'joms/ /? zhi pa rang 'od zer che /dra ba dra ba byed kyis brgyan/ /phreng pa sna tshogs tha? med ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /mar me sdos dang de bzhin dro/ /phreng
494a6(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs lha mos bskor/ /mgron pa la ni mgul bcings dang/ rin po che ni sna ldang gong/ /brgyan gyis ni brgyan pa ste/ /bum pa brgyad kyis yang dag ldan/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes gyur pa/ /rgyal mtshan tshogs bar ldan
494a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /bla re sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa/ /dkyil 'khor de ni gru bzhi pa/ /phyi rol dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /ci'i phyir dkyil 'khor zhe na lus dang ngag dang sems bden par byed pas na dkyil 'khor du brjod
494b1(rgyud 'grel): bden ba bzhi'i rnam pa yis/ /gru bzhi pa ni rnam par brtags/ /bdud bzhi po la 'jigs byed phyir /dri ma med pa'i sgo bzhi pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi pa'i phyir/ zung bzhi pa ni yangs su brtags/ /rnam shes brgyad ni rtog pa'i phyir/ /?
494b2(rgyud 'grel): ni bshad pa yin/ /phyi rol tu ni dkyil 'khor te /cho gas gru bzhi pa ru bshad/ /rnam par shes pa brgyad gang yin zhe na /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/
494b3(rgyud 'grel): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang lus kyi rnam par shes dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam shes dang /kun 'byung ba can gyi rnam par shes pa'o /rong? pa brgyad ni gzugs can brgyad de/ /de rnams gang yin zhe na? /sa dang chu? dang/ /me dang
494b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung gzugs dang ? ba ro dang rab bya'o/ /ba brgyan ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste?/ /de rnams gang yin zhe na/ yang dag pa'i dkyil 'khor? dang? dad pa'i ste/ bdud ? yang dag pa'i dag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' dang /yang dag pa'i tshe ba dang /yang dag
494b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i brtson 'grus dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /rin po che sna lnga? dgod pa'i bum pa rnams so// rin po che sna lnga ni stobs lnga ? dpa' i stobs dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs dang /bsam gtan
494b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs so/ /nyon mongs pa bzhi bcom par mdzad pas na ha ra ste/ nyin mongs pa bzhi ni /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nga rgyal lo /ha ra phyed ni nyon mongs pa phyed zad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba mi dra ba dang dra ba phyed
494b7(rgyud 'grel): pa?/ bla dres rgyas par byed pa'i sems/ /gang phyir dngos po kun la'o/ /de nas bla bre sems yin par /don dam bden pas bshad pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag ni ting nge 'dzin gsum ste dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang /thig le'i rnal 'byor
495a1(rgyud 'grel): de phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gsum po 'di la yan lag re re ni /? nye ba'i sgrub pa dang /sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po ste /ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag ni rta babs rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
495a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa ni sya? ma rnams su bshad do/ /khyams pa la sogs pa yi sems/ /chos kyi dran pa sbyor ba ste/ /bder gshegs ye shes smra ba ste/ /rdo rje thig skud brjod pa yin/ /chos kyi sbyin pa bzhi ste/ chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang/
495a3(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang /chos thams cad bdag med pa dang/ zhi? ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ste /chos kyi sbyin pa bzhi'o/ /phyi rol tu ni me tog dang /spos dang mar me dang /dri 'gyur zhes bya ba'o
495a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni phyi dang nang du shes par bya'o /de ltar shes rab ma dang /lhan cig tu bde ? rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis su med par 'gyur te /bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bstan par mdzad de/
495a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag med lhan cig sbyor? ba yis/ /gnyis ? bde ba thob 'gyur te /sos? nyid med pa'i bde thob nas/ /som nyi med pa'i gzugs can yin/ /lha dang lha mo grong khyer du /rgyan mi 'chad par bde bas rol/ /shar phyogs shar gyi
495a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo la ni/ dkar mo phyed nas gnas pa yin/ /sgrub shing bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba las/ /de nas chom rkun ma ni phyung/ /phyung nas lho yi sgo la ni/ /chom rkun mas ni smo srungs byad/ /bo la ? sbyor yis/ /de nas ro langs ma ni dbyung/ /phyung nas
495a7(rgyud 'grel): chung kyi sgo la ni/ /drag mo'i gzugs can ma gnas pa'o/ /srubs cing bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba yin/ /bdud 'joms ma ni gnas pa yin/ /gnyis med snyoms par zhugs pa las/ /phyi nas g+hasma rI phyung ste /phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni/ /mi
495b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang gzugs can ma gnas so/ /snying ga snyed pa'i sbyor ba las/ /phyi nas ro bsreg ma phyung ste/ /phyung nas dbang ldan mtshams ni/ /drag mo'i gzugs can ma gnas pa'o/ /srung cing bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin med la ri khrod ma'o/ /srin po?
495b2(rgyud 'grel): la ni tsa Na Da la/ rlung gi mchams? la rigs ngan mo'o/ /brdzun gyi rnam par rtog pa gcod par byed pa'o/ /dkar mo phyag g.yas pa'i gri gug tu brjod do/ /phyag g.yon pa la 'khor lo'i bag chags 'joms pa'i ? hi hang 'dod do/ /sdom
495b3(rgyud 'grel): rkun ma'i g.yas na thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gtan ? 'bebs par byed pa'i cad te'u ste/ g.yon pa la gti mug gi bdag nyid phag go /ro langs ma'i g.yas pa la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du sbal? pa ste/ /g.yon pa'i snying
495b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdag nyid pad+ma'i snod do/ /g+hasma? rI'i? g.yas pa ni zhe sdang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa sprul te /g.yon pa la thabs dang shes rab nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyi snod/ /ro sreg ma'i g.yas pa ni ma lus bdud kyi ste glang po che'i snas 'dral ? byed
495b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /seng ge yongs su brjod/ /g.yon pa rtog pa ma lus pa gcod par byed pas na dgra? sta'o/ /ri khrod ma'i g.yas pa la rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin nyid kyi dge slong? ste/ /g.yon pa la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rtogs par byed
495b6(rgyud 'grel): pas na khar sil du brjod/ /tsaN lI'i g.yas pa na log pa'i lta ba gcod par byed pas na 'khor lo ste /mi shes pa dbyung bar byed pas na thob shol lo/ /rigs ngan ma'i g.yas pa ni mi phyed pa'i rnam pas ye shes rtog par byed pas
495b7(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje g.yon pa gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par byed pas na sdigs mdzub du brjod do/ /lha mo thams cad spyan gsum pa /phyag gnyis pa gang byed kyi bzhugs stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ skra gyan du gyur pa/ phyag rgya lnga sar? mdzes par 
496a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur ba'o/ /rim pa ji lta bas lha mo dkar mo// la sogs pa'i sku mdog ni nag po dang/ btsod dang 'dra ba dang/ gser khun? ma bzhin dang/ dmar po dang /in+d+ra nI la dang /chu shel dang /sngon po dang /kha dog bsres ?
496a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'o/ /'di rnams kyi gdan ni/ tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang /nye ba'i dbang po dang/ drag po dang /gshin rje dang /gnod sbyin dang /bden bral dang rlung ngo/ /'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus? gsum mthong? ba'i
496a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir spyan gsum pa'o/ /gzugs med pa gnyis sbyar pa'i phyir rnal 'byor ma rnams la phyag gnyis so/ /gzugs med pa gnyis gang yin zhe na /nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa ste/ de dag ni phyag gnyis so/ /'dod chags dang zhe sdang
496a4(rgyud 'grel): dang gti mug dang /phra ma dang tshig rtsub pa dang/ phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /ngar 'dzin ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gdan rnams so/ phyag rgya lnga ni lta ba lnga ste/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /log pa'i lta ba dang /mthar 'dzin par
496a5(rgyud 'grel): lte ba dang/ lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba ste/ phyag rgya lngar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa'i sems nyams par byed pa'i phyir 'jigs su rung pa dang sna? gyen du gyur pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma
496a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams kyis yongs su bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i dum bu ste? brgyad pa'o// //da ni dur khrod rnams brjod par bya ste
496a7(rgyud 'grel): shar sgo la gtum byed zhes bya ba ni dur khrod/ /brgya byin ni zhing skyong ngo/ /klu nor rgyas kyi bu'o/ /shing ni shing ri Sha 'o/ /sprin ni sgra sgrogs byed pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su dur khrod ni a ta ta'i gang mo'o/ zhing skyong ni me'o/ /klu ni
496b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma chen bo'o/ shing ni karny+dza'o/ /sprin? ni mthug pa'o/ /lho bu dur khrod ni keng rus 'jigs byed pa'o/ /zhing skyong ni gshin rje'o/ /klu pad+ma'o/ /shing ni tsu ta'o/ /sprin ni 'khor byed do/ /bden bral du dur khrod ni kI li kI li'i sgra'o/ /zhing skyong ni srin po'i dbang po'o/ /?
496b2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas so/ /shing ni pad+ma te'o/ sprin ni gong byed do/ /zhug? du dur khrod ni 'bar bas bskor ba'o/ /zhing skyong ni chu lha'o /klu ni stobs kyi rgyu'o/ /shing ni a shwa? ka'o/ /sprin ni mi bzad pa'o/ /rlung du dur khrod mun pa mi bzang ba'o/ /zhing skyong ni rlung ngo/ klu?
496b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs ldan no/ /shing any+dza ka'o/ /sprin ni chu 'dzag pa'o /gnod sbyin la dur khrod ni tshang tshing ngo/ /zhing skyong ni gnang sbyin no/ /klu 'jog po'o/ /shing a shwat+tha'o/ /sprin rgyal gyur pa'o/ /dbang ldan du dur khrod ni dpal 'phel pa'o/ /zhing skyong
496b4(rgyud 'grel): ni dbang phyug go/ klu dung? skyong ngo/ /shing ni 'bab ta'o/ /sprin ni gtum byed gdug par gnas pa'o/ /dur khrod ni 'jigs byed 'jigs su rung ba ste/ nyal ba dang gar byed pa la sogs pa'i 'dre dang ro'i tshigs kyis bskyor ba dang /shing dang shing
496b5(rgyud 'grel): tog rnams kyis mdzas par gyur pa'o/ /brgya byin la sogs pa'i zhing skyong rnams kyi kha dog ni ser po dang /dmar po dang sngon po dang /nag po dang /dkar po dang /ljang gu dang/ kha dog dkar ser du gyur pa'o/ /glang po che dang sprin dang
496b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang ma he? dang lug dang 'og pa dang chu srin dang/ shal dang/ mi dang /glang gi gdong pa rnams te/ lus po ni me'i rnam pa bzhin du yin la /de rnams shing rnams kyi steng du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /klu nor rgyas kyi bul? sogs pa'i kha
496b7(rgyud 'grel): dog ni dkar po dang /sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang/ bsres pa dang /sngon po dang /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin kha dog sngon po'o/ /sprin sna tshogs par shes par bya'o/ /'di rnams ni 'khor lo'i phyi rol tu rdo rje gur gyi mthar?
497a1(rgyud 'grel): bri ba 'am/ bsgom par bya'o /dur khrod brgyan po 'di rnams la mi bzad pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa grangs med pa sna tshogs pa gang gyi ro? dgu dang ldan pa kha dog sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa dang rnams pa sna
497a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bsgom bar bya'o/ /dur khrod ces bya ba ni lus po ste /dbus su byung bas na dur khrod yin la so'o/ /de nas zhing skyong bar byed pas na zhing skyong ste rlung ste/ bsreg pa'i bdag nyid klu ste me'o/ /khyab par byed pas na shing ste nam mkha' i
497a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid do/ /chu'i bdag nyid sprin no/ /de ltar dur khrod brgyad la zhing skyong dang klu dang /shing dang sprin rnams su 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni dbus su mchog gi dga' ba snang bar mdzad pa dga' pa dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i cho gas
497a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskong ba rol pa la sogs pa'i gar gyi ro dgu dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro bzhugs par shes par bya'o/ /rang gi ming gi yi ge las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba bcom ldan 'das
497a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya zhes pa'o/ /dur khrod kyi dum bu ste dgu pa'o// //phyi dang nang gi gzugs can pa'i/ /sems kyi de dag thams cad yin/ /rnam rtog sbyor ba bral ba'i phyir/ /srid pa gsum la ral ba
497a6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /phyag rgya'i rgya ni bral ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor pas ni snying rje bsgom/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //byang chub sems shes dran pa'o/ /'jig rten khams ni gang zhig dang/ /gzhan du sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ /sems
497a7(rgyud 'grel): snying rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /gzhan du sangs rgyas ma bstan te/ /gdol ba smyug mkhan la sogs gang/ /bsod pa'i don phyir bsam pas so/ /dgyes rdor de rnams kyis thos nas/ /'grub 'gyur de la the tsom med /lam 'di
497b1(rgyud 'grel): dag ni ma shes par/ /byis ba mi shis pas g.yogs te/ /'gro drug 'khor pa'i btson khang du/ /rmongs pa de rnams 'khyams par 'gyur/ /tshig tu brjod pa las 'das pa'i/ /dbang po kun la sbyor yul min/ /yid kyi rnam shes sbyor yul ?/ /ye
497b2(rgyud 'grel): shes 'di ni rang rig ba'o/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa 'di/ /kun mkhyen ye shes bdag nyid yin/ /mtho ris me dang sa 'og tu/ /skad cig gis ni rnam gcig 'gyur/ /rang bzhin dbye ba'i rtog pa ni/ /gnod par byed pa mi nus te/
497b3(rgyud 'grel): lha min dbang po dang 'dra gang/ /nges par drang du gnas gyur na/ /de lam 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /seng ge'i tshul bzhin spyad par bya'o/ /chu klung gis ni rgyu ba bzhin/ /mar me'i 'od zer bzhin du ste/ /de nyid sbyor bar rtag tu ni?/ /nyin dang
497b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan du bzhag par bya/ /sems can thams cad rgyu ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu snying rje btung bar bya/ sbyor btung dga' bya rnal 'byor pas/ /btung gzhan la ni chags mi bya zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas dgongs pa'i skad bri bar bya ste/ ? ?
497b5(rgyud 'grel): snyoms bde stobs ni sha/ /de bzhin 'dus pa mnga' ya dza/ /'gro ba khyi? dang 'dzag pa'o/ /rdul med bstus pa'i rgyun yin te/ /'ongs pa bri? mkhan brjod pa'o/ /cang te'u gri'u ci ltar ? skal ba mi ldan ? ?
497b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /DiN+Da? ma ni? mi reg? brjod/ /pad+ma'i ? ni thod pa'o/ /zan ni 'da' phyed shes par bya/ /tshad ma ma la tidwhe'o/? /dri chen gzhi mnyam brjod pa dang /dri chu gla rtsi brjod pa'o/ /rang 'byung si? hA lar zhes bya/ sa bon ga pur 'dod pa dang/ /sha chen
497b7(rgyud 'grel): sna? lu las ? brjod/ /dbang po gnyis gyur kun tu ru/ /rdo rje po lang brjod par bya/ /pad+ma kak+ko 'dod pa'o/ /rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba yis/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /dgongs pa'i skad ni 'di yin te /rigs can sangs rgyas lta
498a1(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /rdo rje rigs can rigs ngan brjod/ /de bzhin gar mkhan ma yi rigs/ /rin chen rigs can tsaN+Da lI/ /de bzhin rigs can gnyis skyes ma'o/ /las kyi rigs can chos mkhan ma'o/ /phyag rgya de rnams grub bzang
498a2(rgyud 'grel): ster/ /rdo rje mchod byas brtul zhugs can/ de rnams kyi ni shu kra btung/ /de nas don la dpyad par bya/ /mngan? zhes bya ba ni/ /gsum ka rmongs par gyur pa dang/ /dbang po lnga 'di dag cing 'gyur ba'o/ /stobs ni 'dod chags la sogs
498a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sde'o// sha ni bsam rlag pa'i sems ngan no/ /ma la ya dza ni thabs dang shes rab gcig pa nyid du byed pa yin pa la de nyid 'dus pa'o/ /khyi 'di rang bzhin med pa'i lam la 'jug pa'o/ /ro ni sems yin la 'dzag pa ni shes
498a4(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi bsam pas 'dzag ces bya ba'o/ /rus pa'i rgyan ni rnam par mdzes pa'o/ /rdul med ni bag chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i sems so/ /'od pa ni dngos dang dngos med las 'das pa'o/ /phreng ba na dang cang te'u ni rang bzhin med pa
498a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis thabs dang shes rab gtan la 'bebs pa cang te'u 'dod do/ /skal pa mi ldan ni 'dul ba dkar pa'i sems yin la/ /du du rang brjod do/ /skal ldan ni 'od gsal ba'i sems so/ kra li dza ni shes rab yin la sems ? gang la
498a6(rgyud 'grel): chags par gyur pa ? ? pa ni thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ / ? ma ni sgra'i rdo rje dang ldan pa'o/ /khyim dza ma ni dri ma dang bral ba'o/ /ma la/ tin+ta na ni shes rab kyi bdag nyid yin la sems kyi dri ma bsreg pa'o// zan mi tshul khrims
498a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems la snying pa'o/ /'drangs? bar byed pa shes rab?/ /kA? ba zhes bya ba la ge zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' sbyor bar byed pa'o/ /pad+ma'i snod ni shes rab la snod du gyur pa'o/ /dri chen ni byams pa la sogs pa bzhi ro mnyam pa nyid du byed pa'i
498b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir bzhi mnyam pa'o/ /dri chu ni snying rje'o/ /gla rtsi ni rang byung ba'o/ /si hla ni dga' ba'o/ shukra ni btang stobs so/ /ga pur ni sha chen no/ /swa lu las skyes pa ni gnyis ka'i yan lag gi cha shas kyi rtog pa gang du med de sgrib pa med pa'o/ /dpa' po gnyis kyi
498b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje yang dag par sbyor ba'o/ /kundu ru ni mi phyed pa'i chul gyis phye ba'o/ /bo la ka la ni shes rab rnyed pa'i ? pad+ma'i nam mkha' i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i si hla'o/ /kak+ko? lA ni bde la mchog tu sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /? ti ni nye bar
498b3(rgyud 'grel): bo sdud pa ste/ a ba zhes bya ba ni de skyed bar byed pa ste /san rgya ba sha zhes bya ba'o/ /de ltar bdag gis snying rje mchog gi spong? ba de nyid snang ba ni/ sna tshogs la ni phan thogs byed pa'i bstan bcos legs par brjod nas su/ bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid ?
498b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa sang? thob de yis 'gro gsum pa skad cig byed kyis dgyes rdor go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur bar shog /dgongs pa'i dum bu ste bcu pa'o/ /snying rjes thugs ni brlan gyur pa'i/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /sna tshogs la
498b5(rgyud 'grel): ni phan pa'i phyir/ /de nyid snang bar mdzad pa yin/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /de kho na nyid kyi snang ba rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA thas bsgyur te gtan la phag pa'o/ //le'u ston rgya nag gis nan gyis zhus pa'o// //dgyes pa
498b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i lag tu blang ba'i rim pa bzhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du /he badzra swa ha sha bya ba'i kra ma nA ma bod skad du /dgyes pa rdo rje'i lag tu blang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por bdag nyid ? blo phun
498b7(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs shing /chos thams cad bdag gi med par mos te/ phyi'i khrus dang /nang bdud rtsi'i khrus bya'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pa'i yo byad ba sogs pa dang /maN+Dal bya ba dang /ras ris dgram? pa?
499a1(rgyud 'grel): dri chab la 'thong 'thung dang nye reg byas shing/ oM he badzra a ti? na ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA zhes brjod pas bdag la sogs pa bsrung? par 'gyur ro/ /de nas stan bzang po?
499a2(rgyud 'grel): bdug ste/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams byin gyis brlab pa dang/ oM badzra puShpe? oM A:hUM /oM ba dza d+hU be oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra gand+he oM A:hUM/ oM badzra? ni be dye oM A:hUM zhes pas
499a3(rgyud 'grel): so mchod rdzas gzhan dag ni oM A:hUM zhes pa bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis so/ /de nas rang gi snying ge'i hUM gi 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ hUM khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams
499a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor// /rdo rje mi phyed cig bzhed pa/ /mchog tu dgyes pas gshegs nas kyang/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /oM badzra go rI dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra tsa? mI? hUM /oM badzra bet+tA? yI bo/ oM bad+d+hO? ? ?
499a5(rgyud 'grel): ? ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa brjod bas mngon sum du gsal bar bltas la mchod par bya'o/ /chu dang thab las skyes pa yi/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i me tog 'di/ /gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni/
499a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta puShpe pU dza me g+ha? mu da spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar pa yi/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i bdug spos 'di/ /gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na /ci bde bar ni
499a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu? la pU dza me lha la mu dzra spha ra Nas ma ye hUM /gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis? dge zhing mun sel mar me 'od/ /gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes? su gsol
499b1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ko pU dza me g+ha sa mu pra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM /nags tshal bcud ni yid du 'ong/ /dri zhim sbyar ba lha yi chu/ /gus bas mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gand+ha pA dza me g+ha sa mu
499b2(rgyud 'grel): dra sbar? na sa ma ye hUM /sman rnams bcud ni yid du 'ong/ /sngags kyi zhal zas bshos 'di dag/ gus pa mchog gi bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni be dye lA dza me g+ha sa mu dra ? ri Na sa ma ye hUM/
499b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha mo brgyad kyi mchod de/ /gau rI ma ni ri bong 'dzin// tsau rI ma ni nyi ma 'dzin/ /bet+ta lI ni rdo rje chu/ g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing/ /spos mo tsan dan sdong bu 'dzin/ /de? khrod ma ni sbrang rtsi 'dzin/ /gtum cing te'u'i sgra sgrogs shing/ /'dod chags
499b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i rjes chags pas/ /g.yung mos mgul pa nas 'khyud pa/ /skyes bu bzhin du byed par bshad/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang/ /'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu t+ta ra pU dza ma g+has mu dra spha ra Nas ma
499b5(rgyud 'grel): ye hUM/ /de nas bshags pa bya ste/ bdag gi sdig pa bgyis pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang bgyid stsal gang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar ni/ /thams cad ma lus so sor bshags/ /de nas rjes su yi rang ba byas ste /sangs rgyas byang chub
499b6(rgyud 'grel): sems rnams dang/ /'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang/ /so so'i skye bo'i bsod nams de/ kun la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /de nas sngo ba bya ste/ /bdag gi dge ba 'di dag kun/ /bla med byang chub yang dag rdzogs/ /sems can kun dang thun
499b7(rgyud 'grel): mong du/ /yongs su smin cing rdzogs par bgyi/ /de nas skyabs su gsol te rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /de yis gsungs pa'i dam chos dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /de nas smon pa
500a1(rgyud 'grel): */ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /bdag gis bla med byang chub tu/ /yang dag rdzogs bar gyur nas ni/ /sems can kun don phan bya'i phyir/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas 'jug pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/
500a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis sbyin pa la sogs pa/ /pha rol byin pa kun rdzogs bas/ /rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i/ /lam ni yang dag bsten par bya'o/ /de nas chad med pa bzhi rim pa bzhin du bsgoms la/ /ye shes kyi tshogs stong po'i byang chub du bsams te/
500a3(rgyud 'grel): rab dang gur la sogs pa'i nang du 'byung bzhi yongs su gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo khyud dang ldan pa'i nang du so so'i gdan dbus su 'dud bzhi/ shar phyogs su tshangs pa /lho phyogs su dbang bo/ /nub phyogs nye dbang /byang phyogs drag po//
500a4(rgyud 'grel): byang shar du shin rje/ shar lhor nor byin /lho rung du bden bral/ nub byang du thag zangs ris kyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta? a pa ya badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko haM zhes brjod do/ /de nas de'i dbus su mngon par byang
500a5(rgyud 'grel): chub pa rnam ba lnga/ /zla ba me khong yi shes ldan/ /bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan/ /rang lha'i sa bon la? phyag mtshan ni /so sor rtog pa nyid du brjod/ /thams cad gcig gyur bya nan tan/ /rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa'o/ zhes pas rgyu'i rdo rje
500a6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang sku mdog dkar po rig ma sngon mo dang bcas pa/ zhal phyag bcu drug pa phyag rgya lnga dang thal chen? gyi lus la brgyan pa bskyed la /gsang ba'i gnas pad+ma su kha d+ha ra zhe pa la sogs pa dang /oM badzra ma hA dwe Sha la sogs pas byin gyis
500a7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs la /mi? zhes pa la sogs pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung nges? bskyod la /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes pas rjes su chags ba'i zhu ba las rjes su mthun ba'i mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas lha mo'i
500b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo spro bar bya'o/ /de la gau rI ma ni shar gyi gdan gyi steng du sngar? gyi bsod nams dang ye shes las A li kA lir snang la/ de dag gyur pa las zla ba dang nyi ma ste mngon par byang chub pa gnyis pa'o/ /de dag gi nang du zhu bar gyur pa'i b+haM/
500b2(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa gri gug tu gyur /de la g+haM gis mtshan pa zla nyi'i steng du gnas pa ni byang chub pa gsum ba'o/ /de nas sa bon g+haM las 'od zer rnal 'byor ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs su byung ste /sems can thams cad kyi don byas nas slar bsdus
500b3(rgyud 'grel): pas nyi zla la sogs pa zhu ba ni byang chub pa bzhi pa'o/ /de la gau rI gzugs su mdog nag mo drag chen mo la sogs pa rdzogs pa ni byang chub pa lnga pa'o/ /de bzhin du tso rI la sogs pa gzhan dag la yang sbyor ro/ /de ltar 'khor bskyed? pa'i bya ba
500b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa dang /de'i dbus su gtso bo rgyus 'gyur ba ni srid pa bar? yi ge oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): dmar po gnyis kyi bar du bcug pa srid pa bar do dri za nye bar 'khor gyi tshul du gnas pa ste /dga' ldan de'i zhal du zhugs pas pad+ma'i mdza' ru chags zhing
500b5(rgyud 'grel): zhu bas dran pa dang ldan bar gyur te /de nyid kyi tshe gtso bo rig ma dang bcas pa yang zhu bar gyur to/ /de ltar rgyu rdzogs nas rkyen glus bskul ba ni/ /grwa bzhin gnas pa'i lha mo bzhis bskul pa'i las byed pas na /byams pa la sogs pa'i glu bzhi
500b6(rgyud 'grel): blang bar bya ste /bzhengs shig rje btsun snying rje'i ming/ /puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /bdag la bde chen sbyor ba zhing mdzod /khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs cig/ stong
500b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod/ /dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas/ /stong ba nyid la bzhugs sam ci/ /khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas/ /gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid/ /bdag gis khyod kyi 
501a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs 'tshal gyis/ /mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhangs shing/ g.yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas/ /snying rje'i rgyun chad ma mdzad cig zhes pa'i rkyen gyis bskal bas/ /'bras bu'i he ru ka yung tsam gyis mngon par byang chub pa ldas?
501a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzus skyes dang chos mthun par bskyed par bya ste/ de yang zhu? de gong bu gnyis su gyur te/ gong bu gcig ni steng 'og gi nyi zla gnyis dang/ bar du sa bon tAM las rdo rjer gyur/ de las sa bon gyis mtshan/ de las 'od zer rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs
501a3(rgyud 'grel): sngo? bsdus pa las gcig tu gyur pa las sgu mdog nag po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur to/ /de bzhin du bdag med ma la yang oM dang gri gug laM? sogs pa byang chub pa lnga las gyur to/ /de ma thag tu zhabs rnams kyi stangs? stabs la
501a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa gyur pa'i rjes la/ dbus kyi gnas su dkyil 'khor gyi bdag por gyur to/ /de nas mang? 'khor rnams kyi sku mdog dang/ mtshan ma la sogs pa gsal bar byas pa dang/ sems dpa' sum brtsegs bya ste/ de la dpa' bo'i thugs kar
501a5(rgyud 'grel): paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang/ raM las nyi ma'i steng du hUM las rdo rje'o/ /de las hUM gis mtshan par gyur pa las bskyed pa'i mi shes pa rang dang 'dra ba'o/ /de'i yang thugs? gar pad+ma dang nyi ma la hUM yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje la hUM gis mtshan
501a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de bzhin du gzhan? dag la yang hUM dang rdo rje sems dpa' sum brtsegs bya ba nyid do/ /de nas gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' las ye shes kyi 'khor lo mdun gyi nam mkha' spyan drangs te gsol bde la sa bon las byung ba'i yid kyi
501a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas mchod nas oM sa ba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra pA dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje glu dang phyag rgyar bcas pas/ oM badzra go rI badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra tsau? rI badzra phA sha hUM /oM badzra botA? li badzra sphoT?
501b1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra g+hasma rI badzra g+haN+Da ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang kha cing ba dang/ dbang byed cing/ dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang dbyer med du gyur to/ /de nas dam tshig la ye shes kyi 'khor brtan zhing nus pa bskyed pa'i dor du lta kun? gyis skya
501b2(rgyud 'grel): mched byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sku gsung thugs so/ /de la gtso bo'i mig la maM gi sa bon no/ de yang yongs su gyur pa las gti mug rdo rje ma gsal bar bsam zhing/ /ma mo ha badzri oM A:hUM zhes brjod do/ /rna bar sa bon DaM las zhe
501b3(rgyud 'grel): sngar rdo rje ma bsam zhing/ /daM dwe Sha badzri a A:hUM zhes brjod do// ? sna la paM yongs su gyur pa las ser sna rdo rje ma bsam zhing/ paM paM shu nu badzri oM A:hUM zhes brjod do/ /kha la daM yongs
501b4(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pa las/ /'dod chags rdo rje ma bsam zhing/ ? ga badzra? oM A:hUM zhes brjod do/ /lus la oM yongs su gyur pa las phrag dog rdo rje ma bsam zhing/ aM i ra sha badzra oM A:hUM zhes brjod do/ /snying gar yid la yang
501b5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon ni yongs su gyur pa las bdag med par bsam zhing/ /naM ner At+ma badzri oM A:hUM zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin du gtso bo'i snying ga dang/ lkog ma dang/ spyir bor oM A:hUM gi sa bon las/ mkha' spyod sku'i rdo rje ma/ sa spyor? gsung
501b6(rgyud 'grel): gi rdo rje ma?/ /zhabs 'og gnas pa thugs? kyi rdo rje mar gal bar bskyed cing/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta She tsa'i badzra swabtA? ba/ /ta ko haM oM sarba ta thA ga tA? tsa ri badzra swe? b+hA ba AhmakaM haM/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA tA la wa si na badzra swab+hA
501b7(rgyud 'grel): ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin lha kun la yang rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de nas gtso bo'i thugs ka nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis mdun gyi nam mkhar byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs la/ yang 'od zer gyis/
502a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes brjod pas mnyes par gyur pa de las/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a g+hi Shiny+dza tu mAM? zhes gsol ba btab pas sangs rgyas dang
502a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dpal he ru ka zhel brgyad phyag bcu drug par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga zhu ba'i bum pas lha kun dbang bskur nas/ /so sor rigs kyi bdag po dbu la bskyed cing/ me tog gi chab? la sogs pa byung?
502a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka badzra swA hA ba At+ma ko saM zhes brjod do/ /de nas yang rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshigs? sa nas bdag nyid gtso bo dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo la mchod de/ /oM sarba ta
502a4(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA la A tA ko haM? zhes brjod/ /de nas thams cad dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa'am khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su bskor zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor gyis gtso bo la bstod par bsam zhing/
502a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyi ? ?/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra swA to badzra swa d+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes brjod do/ /de nas bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga bya ste/ bdag nyid gtso bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi ye shes kyi snang?  pa las byung?
502a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yan bas? na ? ? dang par? nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas rang gi mdun du 'jig rten pa'i g.yos? byed pa'i tshul ? du yongs su gyur pa las thod pa gsum dang/ yaM las rlung ngo/ /de nas raM yongs su gyur pa'i thod steng du/ a yongs su gyur pa'i thod pa'o/ /nang du
502a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i ? ri? luAm? phye ma myom byed dang sbyar ba la/ /ri? pa shu ma mu dang/ go ku da ha na las bdud rtsi lnga dang/ sgron pa lnga'i ngo bor gyur to/ /de'i steng du hUM yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rgya gram kha chod lta bur bsam mo/ /de nas rlung gis me bskyod pas thod par
502b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi dang sgron ma 'dres shing khol bas blangs pa lta bu'i 'od zer byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste/ /de rdo rje la thim pas zhu nas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi la thim zhing 'dres par gyur to/ /oM A:hUM
502b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan mdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pas/ byin gyis brlab par bya ste de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha kun rang gi gtso bor gsal ba'i thugs kar bskyed cing dmigs pa 'am/ yang na rang nyid las gyur pa'i 'od zer lta bu'i snang bar bsams te/ rang gi
502b3(rgyud 'grel): lce la hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje nas 'bru tsam bsam mo/ /de'i 'od zer spu gus bdud rtsi'i ro myang zhing/ oM? sarba ta thA ga ta a mri ta su satba? na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM zhes brjod do/ /de ltar yan lag drug po dag/ 'khor los sgyur ba drug rnams su/ /mos dang ldan
502b4(rgyud 'grel): pas bsgoms gyur na/ /myang du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de yi rtags ni 'di yin te/ /dang po sprin dang 'dra ba? ni/ /sprin med nam mkha' i bar du'o/ /de nas rdzogs rims de kho na nyid/ /gtum mo sbar ba la sogs bya/ /rnal 'byor de yis ngal gyur nas/ /de nyid rjes
502b5(rgyud 'grel): su dran pa dang/ /sngags bzlas gtor ma btang ba dang/ spyod lam lhag bar mos pa bya/ /de dag gi don ni 'di yin te/ yan lag drug po zhes pa ni/ gzhi dang rjes su chags pa dang/ /dbang bskur mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang/ /'khor los sgyur drug ces pa
502b6(rgyud 'grel): ni?/ /? rdo rje 'chang ba dang/ /mi bskyod don yod rin chen 'byung/ /'od? dpag med pa 'am ye shes rnams/ /chos ldan bsgom pa zhes pa ni/ /rnam pa de dag bsgom pa'i tshe/ /mos pa sangs rgyas rang bzhin no/ /myur du byang chub 'thob ces pa ni/ /mchog tu
502b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i rten 'brel mthu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mkhyen phyir/ /de'i rtags zhes pa ni/ sems brtan de nyid la 'jug dang/ dngos grub 'grub pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /dang po sprin dang 'dra zhes pa ni/ dbang stobs lhan skyes bu mo 'am/ /las kyi phyag rgya mngon du
503a1(rgyud 'grel): snang/ /sprin med nam mkha' i bar du'o zhes pa ni/ bsgom dang spyod dang 'bras bu'i stobs/ /phyag rgya la sogs rim bzhin sbyar/ /rdzogs rim de kho na zhes pa ni/ rim gnyis tshogs pa gcig pa 'am/ /rten te byin gyis brlab phyir ro?/ /
503a2(rgyud 'grel): gtum sbar ba la sogs zhes pa ni/ mtshan ma rnam rtog 'joms pa yis/ /yi ge aM ma thig? le las/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer byung bas so/ /sogs pa rdzogs rim gzhan yang bsgom/ /rnal 'byor de yis dal zhes pa ni/ rim pa gnyis kyis ral?
503a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur na/ /dbugs? dbyung ba ni rnam pa gsum/ /de nyid rjes su dran zhes pa ni/ bdag nyid lha yi phung po dang/ /skye mched la sogs lha mor dran?/ /he ru ka yi cha byad ni/ /pha rol phyin pa'i rnam dag dran/ /sngags bzlas shes pa ni/ de la sngags kyi bzlas pa'i
503a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe?/ /bdag nyid rim pa gnyis po dag /tshogs pa gcig tu snang byas nas/ /bdag nyid nam mkha' i ngos gnas pa'i/ /zla ba lta bu'i bsam gtan mos/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i bdag nyid ni/ /chu zla lta bur gyur pa'o/ /de la sngags kyi
503a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa yang/ /bdag nyid tshogs pa gcig gyur pas/ /sgra rangs? gsal ba khri 'bum bzlas/ /de tshe dkyil 'khor pa dag kyang/ /sgra brnyan brag cha'i tshul du zlos/ /gtor ma btab? zhes pa ni/ /de la gtor ma'i bya ba ste/ /bshad rgyud
503a6(rgyud 'grel): lung dang man ngag go /bdag nyid tshogs pa gcig gyur bas/ /mdun gyi chos 'byung gru gsum du/ /steng 'og pad+ma rim gsum bya/ /steng du tshangs pa la sogs lha/ /oM skyes na dog dkar rtag pas mtshan? rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yi'ang? ? thog? pa dang
503a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o/ /bar gyi pad+ma hUM las byung/ /mdog sngo mi bskyod pa yis mtshan/ /rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yis/ /rang mtshungs rigs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /'og gi pad+mar a las byung/ /mdog dmar 'od dpag med pas mtshan/ /rdo rje'i dril bu
503b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa yis/ /rang mtshungs rigs? pa dang ldan pa'o/ /yaM las rlung dang raM las me/ /a? las thod par bdud rtsi bsam/ /bdud rtsi sgron ma'i sa bon las/ /rim bzhin bskol bas 'od zer byung/ /de yis ye shes bkug byas te/ /de nyid gsum gyi sngags
503b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis brtan/ /del sngar gyi mgron rnams kyi/ /lce yi 'od zer sbu gu yis/ /bdud rtsi ro du gsol bar byed/ /oM inda dza ma dza la dzagkha/? b+ha ta bahi ba u rak+Sha tsanda sudzdza ma ta bap+pa ta la bA tA aTTha? sa p+pa swAhA/ /i daM ba liM?  b+huny+dza dzi? g+ha phul+la d+hU pa mAM sa
503b3(rgyud 'grel): bi g+ha/ am+b+ha kadzdza sarba sA d+ha kha na ti khun? ni pheT gA da /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmu NA/ Adya nutpan+na? twAta oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ gal te mtshan phyad? tshogs 'khor lo/ /byed na dbugs dbyung bzhi pa ste/ gnyis 'og gtor ma'i sngon du bya/ /dang por
503b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi khrus la 'jug /bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim byug /gos bzang rus sogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /so so'i mgo la me tog gzhag/ /yang na me tog phreng bas bcing/ /thig gdab le chor?  bya ba dang/ /rang rang
503b5(rgyud 'grel): stan? la bde bar 'dug /kun gyi rnal 'byor gsal ba ru/ /phyogs dang mtshams su lha ru gsal/ /de nas karma badzra yis me tog la sogs mchod pa lnga/ rnal 'byor kun la rim bzhin bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams la/ ba liM? chen po'i
503b6(rgyud 'grel): btor? ma bstang/ /bza' dang btung ba'i phud bsdus la/ /lag tu thogs nas 'di skad brjod/ /oM badzra gau rI ga na tsakra a d+hiSh+Tha na zhes pa'i glu ni drug 'gyur du/ lha mo brgyad po rim bzhin du/ /de ltar byin gyis brlab byas la/ /karma badzra sa phud de rnams
503b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor chen bskyed gsum ldan par ni/ /ra mgo lug mgo me mgo can/ /'phan dbab ngan brgyan pas dbul/ /oM he badzrA d+hiSh+dzI? na/ mahA ba liM ta pri tAtsA ho/ /kha kha khA hi khA hi/ grih+Na grih+Na/ b+huny+dza b+huny+dza dra bIts+tsha? ho:zhes pas glu blang zhing/ oM badzra nai ?
504a1(rgyud 'grel): At+ma oM badzra gau rI zhes pa'i ming kun dang sbyar zhing dbul lo/ /de nas rkarma badzra yis/ /rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa/ /kun gyi mdun du maN+Dal bya/ /rdo rje lag bskor gar bya zhing/ /rdo rje gla yis 'di skad brjod/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor
504a2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa mchog /bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba/ /de yi rkyen du dbul lags gyis/ /dgyes pa'i mdangs kyis bzhes su gsol/ /de nas bza' dang bca' la sogs/ /khyad par dang ni thun mong du/ /so sor tshim par gyur nas kyang/ /rdo rje gang bu glu
504a3(rgyud 'grel): blangs te/ /tshogs kyi bdag pos sngar byas pa'o/ /yang na gzhan dag gis kyang ngo/ /oM badzra gau rI hUM/ badzra pU dza nut+ta ra zhes pa rgang pa gsum gyis glus lha mo brgyad cang la sbyar bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang skad cig dga' ba'i glu /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi/ /laM
504a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig ma/ /dga' ba'i longs spyod rab tu dbul/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi/ /sgeg dang dpa' la sogs pa rnams/ /rnam par smin pa'i sgad cig ma/ /mchog dga' i longs spyod rab tu 'bul/ /rnam pa sna
504a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs du ma yi/ /bde ba'i ston mo la ? pa'o?/ /rnam pa med pa'i skad cig ma/ /dga' bral longs spyod rab tu 'bul/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du me yi/ /bde mcho chen po la sogs pa/ /mtshan nyid bral ba'i skad cig ma/ /lhan sgyes longs spyod rab
504a6(rgyud 'grel): tu 'bul/ /'jig rten ma lus thams cad kyang/ /nam mkha' kun gyis rnal 'byor gyis/ /nam mkha' i dam tshig la zhugs te/ thams cad nam bar longs spyod pa'o/ /zhes pa yis ni glu blangs la/ /gal te slob ma 'jug 'dod la/ /tshigs
504a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo sngon nyid du cung zad bzlas pa'i rjes la bya/ /de yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /las su bya ba 'di yin te/ /sngon du grangs dang mtshan ma'o/ /dus kyi bsnyen pas sbyang bar bya/ /'bum dang khri yis gtso 'khor lo/ /de bzhin zla drug goms?
504b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /sngags kyi rab mthong pa rol son/ /gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /der ni bsnyen pas mthu bsteng? na/ /sa yi cho ga brtag pa ni/ /phyi dang nang du shes par bya/ /phyi ni tsha sgo can la sogs/ /? pa'i skyon ngag spang byas nas/ /grong khyer byad ngas?
504b2(rgyud 'grel): thar du gzhol/ /mnyam la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan/ /nang ni mtshan ma rmi lam sogs/ /rnal 'byor nus pas rab tu brtag/ sbyang ba de bzhin phyi dang nang/ phyi ni 'dom gang lte ba dang/ /pus nub? tsam du brko byas te/ /'byor ba rab 'bring tha ma
504b3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /jo dang gyo mo sol dum bsal/ /de nas nang gi spang ba ni/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas so/ /de nas byin gyis brlab bya ste/ /'og gzhi ri rab rtse mo 'am/ /sh+rI d+ha na la sogs pa yi/ /bla re ba can gyi gnas su bsam/ /der gnas pa ?
504b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ni/ /lan lag drug po sngar bzhin bya/ /de nas? sa yi lha mo ni/ /bskyed cing spyan drangs bzhugs pa la/ /ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin/ /zhes sogs tshig gi dbang por gsol/ /der rjes rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /slob dpon la ni grog?
504b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis/ /phyog sbzhi nas bstong gsol ba gdab/ de yi ngor byas langs te bsrung?/ /rdo rje lta stangs rdo rje 'gros/ /dengs shig pa dang stang stabs sogs/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga'i gzhung bzhin bya/ /de yi mtshan mo lta? gon ni/ /lha dang bum pa
504b6(rgyud 'grel): slob pa'o/ /de la lha yi bya ba ni/ /dang por karma badzra yis/ bya ba la ni 'jug pa dang/ /tshogs bsags pa dang rnal 'byor ni/ /yan lag drug po sngar bzhin bya/ /de nas bdag nyid phun sum tshogs/ /ldan pa bla ma la na 'pho /de tshe? dra yi thig le
504b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma/ me mad? dgu sogs phun tshogs bya/ /de nas bla ma'i rnal 'byor ni/ /gzugs brnyan? me tog tshom bu la/ /ting 'dzin sa bon dag gis bskyed/ /ye shes bkug la sum bsres bya/ /de yang rang gi snying ga yi/ /sa bon 'od zer lcags kyu yis/
505a1(rgyud 'grel): mdun du ye shes 'khrolo bsngu/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pa yis/ /ci rigs mchog cing sngags 'di brjod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra pA dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas gau rI la sogs pa'i/ /dza:hUM ba ha(rgyud 'grel): 'i
505a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang ni/ /glur bcas pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /dgug sogs thim bas lo shes 'bar/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sgrub te gzhan la yang ma yin/ /skye mched drug dang sku gsung thugs/ /byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur ba//
505a3(rgyud 'grel): star bzhin byas te mchod pa'i tshogs/ /'dir ni rab tu rgyas par bya/ /bstod dang bdud rtsi myang ba dang/ /sngags dang bcas pa sngar bzhin bya/ /de nas yang na 'di skad brjod/ /gnyis med ye shes las byung ba'i/ /khyab bdag dngos grub bdag
505a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid can/ /ston pa gtso bo khrag 'thung dpal/ /bdag med ma dang yang dag ldan/ /phyogs mtshams rnams kyi mkha' 'gro dang/ /rig pa'i lha mo sgyu 'phrul dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgong su gsol
505a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la yang phan pa dang/ /byed rnams? la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje can dag 'di zhes pas/ /nang par dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /rje su brtsa bar nyer dgongs ta/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes pas lha la
505a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje yis/ /bum pa'i bya ba bar du brtsam/ /de yang rgya dang mtshan nyid dang/ /sbyang dang byin brlabs bya ba lnga/ /de sbom pa yi tshig yin no/ /de la rgyu zhes pa ni/ gser dngul zangs ma la
505a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i/ /rin chen las sam 'jim pa'ang rung/ /mtshan nyid ces pa ni/ lho tsha mgrin pa ring ba dang/ /mchu 'chang nag sogs ra ri med/ /sbyang zhes pa ni legs par bkru zhing dkar pos byug/ sa bon yang na mtshan ma
505b1(rgyud 'grel): dgong/ /yungs kar brdeg dang spos kyis bdug/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrung/ /rab bzang mdul? chings kha rgyan la/ /gzungs thags btags pa'i rdo rje bzhag /de yi nang du chu bzang po/ /'o ma ldan pa gzhug par bya/ /sman
505b2(rgyud 'grel): lba? las de ba dang/ /ngan ta utpa la kaN+Da gar?/ /sha ta bri ha a par tsing/ byang chub lnga ni rtan tu gzhug/ 'bru lnga 'byas? dang me? sha sran/ /nas dang gro dan te pa dkar nag/ lha rnams kyi ni rang bzhin no/ /rin chen lnga ni gser dang dngul/ /mu tig
505b3(rgyud 'grel): gam ni mun men te/ byu ru g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dung/ lha rnams che ba'i bdag nyid do/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi sgron ma dang/ /snying po lnga yang nang du gzhug/ de nyid gsum dang ming? spel? pa'i/ /sngags kyi so so'i rdzas la gdab/ /oM kalpa brika? A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM pany+dza?
505b4(rgyud 'grel): a na tsa A:hUM/ oM pa ny+dza? A be sha Ayyasa? pany+dza garpA A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /oM pany+dza? maM sa A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM pany+dza a mri ta A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa ste/ gzhan la yang de nyid gsum tsam brjod/ /byin labs zhes pa ni/ /bdag nyid lhar gsal snying ga yi/ /'od zer
505b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phre? 'dus bum pa sbang?/ /de nas ye ge b+hU? du gyur/ /de las gzhal yas khang du gyur/ /khaM gi yi ge? dkar po las/ /bum pa'i nang ni stong par bsam/ /de nas paM yig dmar po? las/ /lha snam pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /re pas nyi ma'i gdan
505b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam bya/ /dbus su hUM las gtso bo ni/ /rig mar bcas pa gsal par bskyed/ /gaM tsaM baM g+haM bzhi las ni/ /gau rI la so phyogs su ? saM laM DaM? bzhi po ni/ /yongs su gyur mtshams su spes? mo sogs/ /de nas ye shes 'khor lo yang/ /bdag
505b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid gtso bo'i thugs gnas/ /'od zer gyi ni mdun du dgong/ /de la mchod yon mchod par bya/ zung zad sngags dang bcas par brjod/ /de nas gau rI la sogs pa/ /dbyed med bstim par bya ba dang/ /mchod cing bstod pa sngar bzhin bya
506a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi myang ba 'dir mi dgos/ /bya ba zhes pa ni/ de nas bzlas pa bya ba ste/ /dang po lha mo bzhi yi sngags/ /ru ru spha ru la sogs pas/ /bum nang chu la sogs pa'i rdzas/ /'byung ba bzhi yis bsdus ba kun/ /lha mo bzhi
506a2(rgyud 'grel): du byin gyis brlag?/ de nas lha yi bzlas pa yang/ /brgya 'am stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /de tshe bdag gis bsam rgyud ni/ /snying gar gzung pa'i skud pa nas/ /yi ge hUM la lag pa sbyor/ /de yi 'od kyis pad+ma nas/ /byang sems gyen du drangs
506a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ /skad pa'i sgrubs? kyis rdo rjer thim/ /rdo rje bum nang lha la thim/ /lha kun zhu bas bum pa gang/ /de nas rol mor bcas pa yi/ /ngas bzang me tog cal bkra? pa'o/ /steng du byin gyis brlab la bzhag/ de ltar rnam rgyal bum pa
506a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /bum pa gzhan la'ang lha rang zhu/ /ci rigs pa yi cho gas bya/ /de nas bla ma slob dpon gyis/ /slob ma lhag par gnas par bya/ /sdom ni mtshan nyid bya ba dang/ /cho ga smin pa rnam bzhi'o/ /de la mtshan ces pa ni/ /nga rgyal med
506a5(rgyud 'grel): cing dbang po dul/ /rigs bzang dge ba bcu dang ldan/ /rgyal po lam rang gi bu min pa/ /de nas mtshan nyid ldan pa gzhug/ bya ba zhes pa ni snga par khras dang maN+Dal? bya/ /de la sems bskyed sdom pa sbyin/ /de yi nyin par slob ma ni/ /bsam
506a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzang po ldan bzhin du/ /rdzas 'di dag ni nyer bsag? bya/ /bum pa'i sman la sogs pa dang/ /ku sha srung skud la sogs dang/ /gzhan yang mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dang/ /tshogs kyi longs spyod la sogs pa'o/ /cho ga zhes pa ni/
506a7(rgyud 'grel): dang por las kyi rdo rje yis/ /tshogs bsags pa dang yan lag drug/ bdag nyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs/ /sngar bzhin byas nas bla ma pa/ /chos pa'i dbang gis 'pho byas la/ /de nas bla ma mos ldan la slob mas maN+Dal phyag la sogs//
506b1(rgyud 'grel): byas te gsol pa gdab par bya/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /mgon po chen po tshul bstan pa/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la
506b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi/ /bu tshur dag pa chen po yi/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
506b3(rgyud 'grel): gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar phung? pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpal pos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams
506b4(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan ma bsnyes/ /gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med de/ /skyob pa dpal ldan he ru kas/ /bdud sde shin tu ? ma bzad rnams/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yi blo gros ?
506b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis shig/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyes su ?/ /rnal 'byor gsang sngags mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor lor bzhugs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /kun la'ang rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' po dpa' mo dpang lha mo/ /byang
506b6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' bdag nyid chen/ khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung dpa' bo dang/ /rnal 'byor ma dang rnam snang sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpag med pa/ /thams cad bdag la
506b7(rgyud 'grel): dgongs su gsol/ /che ge dus 'di nas bzung ste/ /ji srid bdag med par gnas pa/ /de yi tshangs spyod gnyis med par/ /bdag nyid sdom pa legs par gzung/ /de nas bshags pa la sogs pa/ /gzhan las byung bzhin tshig
507a1(rgyud 'grel): tu yang/ /slob ma dag ni brjod du gzhug /de nas bdag gis tshigs bcad 'di/ /rna ru 'bab pa dbyungs su brjod/ /bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang/ /bgyi du stsal dang yi rang ?/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis
507a2(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyi/ /bsgom dang bzlas brjod bsod nams tshogs/ /de la bdag ni yi rang ngo/ /sems bskyed mngon
507a3(rgyud 'grel): par sangs rgyas dang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs mchog la/ /de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ci lta bar/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub sems ni
507a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa ltar/ /'di nyid du ni sems bskyed do/ de nas ? las 'di skad brjod/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /slob dpon dbang
507a5(rgyud 'grel): du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol pa la byung ba'i/ /mi ldog pa yi 'khor lor sbyor/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par mdzad/ /de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas kyang
507a6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pa nyon/ /brjes pas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te
507a7(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ ? pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /blo chan khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/ /byang chub sems gang rdo rje de/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon
507b1(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang gzung bar gyis/ /'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin//
507b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /phyi nad gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/ las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyis/ /mchod pa'i las kyang
507b3(rgyud 'grel): ci nus gyis/ /gzhan yang bcu pa ni 'di dag ni/ /pas pham bar ni rab tu bshad/ /rtsa pa'i ltung ba zhes bshad de/ /kha na ma tho stem? por 'gyur/ /khyod kyis srog chags bsad mi bya/ ma byin par yang mi blang ngo/ /'dod pa log par mi
507b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod cing/ /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung ? kun gyi rtsar gyur pa'i/ chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spangs/ /dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing/ /rnal 'byhor pa rnams bkur
507b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ? lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang dag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par ni rjes su spongs/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /'gro ba'i don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang mi spang zhing//
507b6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu ? ngan? mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /khyod kyis brnyes par mi bya zhing/ /phyag rgya gzhon pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par gsung/ /khyod kyis kyang ni bsrung par gyis//
507b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob mas 'dir da brjod/ /mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /ma lus bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dus 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas par/ /bla med bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po nas/ /sems
508a1(rgyud 'grel): can mya ngan 'das dgod par/ /lan gsum du ni brjod par bya/ /de ltar phyi tshul byin brlabs nas/ /man ngag gi ni nang byin rlabs/ /de yang slob mas 'di skad brjod/ /bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig
508a2(rgyud 'grel): rten mi ring sangs rgyas myur bsgrubs nas/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/ /bla med byang chub tu ni bsgal bar bgyi/ /yang na 'di skad brjod du gzhug/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje
508a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' kun gyi mchog/ 'dren pa bdag la byin gyis rlobs/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su brjod/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag spang/ /kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas mchog/ 'dren pa bdag la byin gyis rlobs/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mchog
508a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ ye shes sbyor pa rnam par sbyong/ /kun tu rdo rje gsum 'byung ba/ /'dren pa bdag la byin gyis rlobs/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ rang bzhin dag pa'i dri ma med/ /rnam par snang mdzad cher 'byung ba/ /'dren pa bdag la byin gyis rlobs/
508a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag glung bcas sngags 'di brjod/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM te/? sarba ta thA ga tA la yaM/ /badzra satwa sa mu d+d+hab? haM/ ma ma a d+hi taSh+nyi na ya kaM/ sarba ba lak+Sha si pur ? lak+Sha na bi bar tsi ta/ sa man+ta b+ha dra bud+d+ha pa haM/ ma ma a d+hi twiSh+Tha? na ya kaM/ shan+ta haM
508a6(rgyud 'grel): saM bud+d+ha d+hA na ? ki badzra ngal si mu ta b+ha taM/ ma ma a d+hi tirSha? Sha na yaM kaM/ sarba satwa mahI? de/ shud+d+ha pra kri ti ni maM la/ ? hA bai ro tsa Na bu paM ma ma A d+hi tiSh+Tha na ya kaM/ de skad brjod cing smod snga gtug/ brkyang phyag btsal te zhus pa rang/
508a7(rgyud 'grel): bla mas rang snang rig pa dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /slob ma'i sgo gsum dag par sbyang/ /slob ma bur bya ba'i phyir/ /de nas gsang ba'i gnas su bzhug ci rigs dbang yang bskur bya ste/ /? 'byung lus 'dud spyan sngar ni/
508b1(rgyud 'grel): de la las kyi rdo rje yis/ /dri chab rak+Sha'i sngags kyis bsrung /spos su ldan pa'i lan pa yis/ /spyi bor reg nas gnas gsum du/ /de nyid gsum gyi gnas kyis brjod/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta utpa de ya mi/ /de ni sngar gyi nyun por la'o/ /oM yo gci lta uptal
508b2(rgyud 'grel): ya mi/ /su rastwaM/ ya thA su khaM/ slob ma kun la de bzhin bya/ /de ltar sems bskyed dang po dang/ /khyad par rdo rje 'chang ba'i rigs/ /ji ltar bde las gyur pa de/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang sangs rgyas sras de bzhin gsheD pa kun gyi ye ge de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras/ bde
508b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs sras kyi ? bo'o/ /bde gshegs bka' bzhin byed pa sogs/ /sems bskyed yon tan brjod pa'o/ /yon tan ldan bde dag la/ /mgo la me tog sbyin par bya/ /mdun du spos sbyin mar me dang/ /dri yin chod pa snying kar sbyin/ /de bzhin
508b4(rgyud 'grel): bshos gtsang la sogs pa/ /ci rigs sngags dang phyag rgyas 'bul/ /de nas so shing yid du 'ong/ /u du mA ra a shwot?/ /b+ha bat sogs shing bcang pos/ /mi yom chags 'bus mo gros/ /pa rnyings srog chags spangs pa ni/ /song ni bcu gnyis
508b5(rgyud 'grel): chang du bya/ /rtse mor me tog ldan bcings la/ /lci ba la sogs pa byung lngas/ /sa gzhi byug pa pa? ko tsom/ maN+Dal de yi drung du ni/ /slob ma langs te 'dug byas nas/ /langs te kha thon dag byas nas/ /bltos pa med par thal sbyar gzung//
508b6(rgyud 'grel): shar bltas mi dma'? lus mi ye/ phan tshun mi dor mdun dang por/ /dor ba de la mtshan ma brtag/ de yang bla mi'i gdam dag gis/ /dngos grub phyir las bar tshod gsum/ /dang so grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum/ /dngos grub rab ni shad
508b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dang/ /rang la bltas pa las shes bya/ /'bring po gzhan dag tha ma yang/ /'og bltas 'dam la me tog zug/ de bzhin gnyis po bla ma yi/ zhal gyi gdams ngag las shes bya'o/ /de nas kha ya nyis bsal ba/ /dri chu la
509a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khyod mor sbyin/ /oM de bi sho d+ha na d+harmA/ sarba pA pa ni tsa saM sho d+ha ya/ sarba bri ? pa ni/ oM pa na ya hUM zhes pa'i sngags brjod hub gsum btung/ /de rjes slob mas sems spungs bskyed/ /zab cing rgya che ba yi chos
509a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad cing bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /me tog u dum+ba ra bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' 'byung/ /de srid phrad dka' 'byung ba yi/ /gnyis ma de theb?
509a3(rgyud 'grel): mo'i spyod tshul 'di/ /sems can sangs rgyas byed pa yi/ /bskal pa grangs med mang por ni/ /sngon du byas pa'i rnam smin gang/ /de kun zad par gyur pa ni/ /zab mo'i dkyil 'khor mthong pas so/ /de bzhin gzhan las gsungs pa
509a4(rgyud 'grel): 'ang brjod/ /de nas a'oM A:hUM zhes pas/ su? sha byin ? kyis ? rlabs byas la/ /sngas dang stan du bya ba'o/ /de nas srung skud? gdags pa ni/ /srung skur dkar po 'am dmar po la/ /rak+Sha'i sngags brjod mdud pa drug/ dpung pa g.yos sam g.yon
509a5(rgyud 'grel): du bcing/ /de nas me yi mchod sbyin te/ /sbyin srog cho ga'i rim pa ni/ /bla ma'i gdam ngag la brten pa'i/ /yi ger bris pa gzhan du blta'o/ /de nas tshogs mchod sngar bzhin bya'o/ /ba liM chen po'i de bzhin no/ /gdol pa khyi rang
509a6(rgyud 'grel): bram ze sogs/ /mnyam por bsil? ba'i lhag ma bsdu/ /phud dang bsres la mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor tshim par bya/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon pad+ma 'am/ /'khor lo lta bur bcings byas la/ /rkang pas mnan
509a7(rgyud 'grel): cing steng du blta/ /gyen du phem gyi sgra sgrogs ? shing/ /spyan drangs dbyangs dang sngags kyis so/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang/ /ri bo dang ni ri sul dang/ /grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang/ /sems can gnod
509b1(rgyud 'grel): dang thang dang ni/ /khyad par du ni chu la gnas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang/ /nag po 'jigs dang 'jigs byed pa/ /bka' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang/ /'jigs byed ma dang u ma dang/ /rgyal
509b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam par rgyal ma dang/ mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /nag mo bzang mo drag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag mo sdang mo za ba mo/ /sum cu'i dbang mo 'phrog byed mo/ /mar me 'dzin byed rnal 'byor ma/ dag mo'i
509b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang gzugs can mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thong chen ma/ /thod pa'i phreng can kha TwaM ma/ /sprul chen ral gri dgra stam/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma/ /de nyid chen no mkha' 'gro ma/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/
509b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad kun nas 'dir spron cig/ oM kak+ka d+ha na/ ba bpand+ha? na/ khang+gA? da na/ sarba duShu? na ha na ha na g+ha g+ha g+ha ta
509b5(rgyud 'grel): ya g+hA ha ya a/ mu ka ? ku ru hUM hUM hUM/ phaT badzra swAhA/ de naS ha ho h+rI:zhes brjod/ /ha yig mdangs dang kha dog 'phrog/ ho yis dri ni zhim pa bsdud/ /hi:yis pha rol nus pa 'joms/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs/ /las
509b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod gal rtson par gyis/ /bdag la bde lags sdud pa dang/ /tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /phan dang yid la bde ba dang/ /grong dang yul 'khor shis par gyis/ /bu dang tsha bo rnams 'phel te//
509b7(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gnas su lags par bsdud/ /gzhan yang pha rol rgol ba dag/ zhi zhing dbang du bya ba 'am/ /dgug dang dbye dang bskrad pa dang/ /bsad pa tshar bcad la sogs pa/ tsi rigs pa yis tshar gcod brjod/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 
510a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma'i tshogs/ /dus ni myur ba nyid du brjod/ /oM badzra DA ki ni/ a ka lo ba si mas/ tra yo ratna A ba ka ri No/ /sarba sha truM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ /ha na ha na hUM/ mA ra Na mA ra Na phaT/ he he badzra? ?
510a2(rgyud 'grel): duSh+Tan/ kha kha khA hi khA hi zhes pas mngon sbyor byas nas bsdu/ sngags 'dis gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra DI ki nI baM la ta par tAtstsi? ba ? khA ha khA hI b+huM dza ho:b+h+ruM dza ho:de bzhin gzhan yang de bzhin sbyar bar bya'o/ /phyogs
510a3(rgyud 'grel): skyong gtor ma sngar bzhin du/ btang te smon lam gdab par bya/ /dge 'dis sems can thams cad sdig med cing/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad 'gyur ba'i/ /lam de nyid nas zhugs nas kyang/ ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang//
510a4(rgyud 'grel): ma grol ba rnams grol bar bzhog?/ rnal 'byor btsug lag dam tshig la/ /da lta nyid du gnas par shog/ de bzhin gzhan la 'di skad brjod/ /dge ba gang thob de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas kun don thams cad ni/ /rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang
510a5(rgyud 'grel): de/ /sems can kun gyis ? shog/ byang chub rdo rje bsngags pa yang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems spyod dang/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyor pa dang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa gang/ /bdag ni de gnyis thod par shog/ gang
510a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gang du ste ba ? ma nyams kyi yi rdo rje ston/ bla ma mchog la gus pa dang/ /zla ba'i rigs la dga' ba dang/ de dang der ni skye gyur cig/ ye shes 'khor lo gshegs gsol bo/ /oM dz+nya na maN+Dal mu:zhes ba lan gsum brjod
510a7(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing/ /khu tshur g.yon pa snying khar bzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa sa la brkyang/ /? gol lan gsum brda bas ba yis/ /? lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ /de nas dam tshig bdag la bsdu/ brten pa'i 'khor lo gzhal
510b1(rgyud 'grel): yas khang/ 'byung bzhi de la nam mkha' thim/ /lha mo brgyad ni snying ga'i hUM/ /thim nas lha yis nga rgyal gnas/ /de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor gyi/ /nang du zhugs la lha rnams mchod/ /phyogs skyod rnams la gtor ma sbyin slob ma rnams
510b2(rgyud 'grel): la lta gon gyi/ /gnas de 'am nyal khang gzhan yang rung/ /seng ge'i nyal stabs mi lam brtag/ /smra brjod gzhan dag mi bya bar/ /dgyes rdor yid la byas te nyal/ /de nas sngar langs maN+Dal bya/ bla mas dri zhing slob mas brjod/ ?
510b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bring? tha ma ni/ /bla mas shes par byas pa ste/ ngan na rtog pa zhi thabs bya/ /bzang na yid dga' spro bskyed de/ /de dag ni lhag par gnas pa sta go ni gyi cho ga'o/ /de nas nub gsum pa la 'jug/ 'jug pa'i yan lag 'jug ?
510b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /yan lag dang po thig gdab bo/ /slob mar bcas pas slar yangs te/ /zhi ba 'am rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /de yang slob dpon mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag de'i de nyid shes/ /kho? ba med cing skyo ba bzod/ /rig bcas phyag rgyar ldan pa
510b5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /lha rnams mdun du nam mkha' la/ /zla ba kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ dbyangs yig bcu drug rgya yis gdab/ /de ltar bar gyi mtshams sbyar nas/ /thig gdab pa yi las brtsam bya/ /rin la ma brtsegs ras bal gzung//
510b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rang mtshan dang ldan pas bkal/ /'jud mdud med cing grog rkyed spang/ /ring thung dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la/ /sboms su sgo yi nyi shu cha/ /srang bu rkyang pa so sor bsog/ pad snod dri zhim nang du bzhag /de nas dang por srad bu ni
510b7(rgyud 'grel): so so rang bzhin med par sgom/ /de la bruM kham la sogs pa/ yig 'bru lngar gyur de dag la/ /rigs lnga'i rgyu 'am ngo bor bsam/ /de nas rnal 'byor nyi zla'i mig/ 'bar ba'i lcags kyu'i 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes lha yi thugs ka nas
511a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes skud pa gnas pa rnams/ /gtso bo dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang/ /lha rnams sngags dang gnyis med bzhugs/ /spyan drangs thim pa thig skud bskyed/ /bruM pa la sogs sa bon lnga/ /oM hUM sogs kyi sngags brjod la//
511a2(rgyud 'grel): lag par phyag rgya dang bcas pas/ /oM A n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta pa ra sbar? d+harmA/ /a n+yo n+ya a nu ga tA pra biSh+Ta sarba d+ha ra/ /a Tyan+ta? a nud+ha ra sarba d+harma zhes pa brjod cing bsgril bar bya'o/ /de nas thig skud mdza' gnyis dbus//
511a3(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): huM gsum bkod pa yis byin brlabs nas ni sngags 'di brjod/ /oM badzra? sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hA zhes pa'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad/ /gung mo gnyis sbyar gzung ste bzlas/ /de ltar thig skud bskyed
511a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /de nas bla mas gtso bor bsam/ grogs mchog de yi thugs gnas/ /gau rI 'am rig ma yum du sprul/ /de nas bla mas thig skud ni// dzra(rgyud 'grel): dzdza:? zhes brjod de la gtad/ /des kyang dzdza(rgyud 'grel): brjod blang bar? bya/ /de nas gnam
511a5(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab par bya/ /steng nas bzung zhing gyen du bzlog /tshangs thig dang po zur thig sogs/ ci rigs pa ru gang ba par bya/ /de tshe dag du sdur gyi sngags/ /brjod pa 'am yang na tshig bcad 'di'o/ /'jig rten khams
511a6(rgyud 'grel): ni ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sas dang bcas la sogs/ /'gro ba'i don du rnam par sprul/ /khyed rnams kyi ni thugs nyid yin/ /zhes pa brjod nas sa thig gdab/ /de rjes dkar pos gcal bya ste/ /tshangs thig dang por
511a7(rgyud 'grel): gdab? pa yang/ /slob dpon shar bltas slob ma nub/ /bltas te tshangs thig dang po gdab/ /slob dpon byad bltas tshangs thig gnyis/ /slob dpon shar lho'i mtshams su gnas/ /slob ma byang shing? shing ngos gang/ /de bzhin
511b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma byang nub gnas/ /slob ma lho nub nub ngos gdab/ /bla ma rlung mtshams de nyid gnas/ /slob ma byang shar bya ngos gdab/ /de bzhin skor phyogs rim gyis gdab/ /bla ma shar lho slo/ ma srin gnas la lho yi ngos thig gdab/ de bzhin

511b3(rgyud 'grel): thig rkang las ni ri'u mig go/ sgo khyud thig gi nang rol tu/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad por bcas/ /lha yi snam bus ci rigs bskor/ /cha re rdo rjer ba dang/ /ma 'od lan bskor ba'o/ /de yi nang du rta babs dang/ /'dod yon snam bu la sogs
511b4(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /ci rigs par ni bri bar bya/ /de ltar thig zin thig skud mchod/ /'bar ba'i blta bas sdo dbye zhing/ /lha rnams bcas pa gshegs su gsol/ /de dag ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas tshon ni rab 'drid? tha/ /rin chen lnga 'am 'bras
511b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs/ /tshon sgyur? dur khrod so phag gam/ /sol ba rus pa'i phye ma sogs/ /buM khaM sogs pa'i yig 'phro lnga/ /yongs byung tshon ci lnga ru bsam/ /de nas 'bar ba'i blta ba yis/ /dgyes pa rdo rje 'khor bcas la/ /spyan drangs mchod
511b6(rgyud 'grel): pa thim par bya/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes pa'ang mang du bzlas pas tshon/ /byin gyis brlabs la mchod pa dbul/ /shis par bya phyir dbang ldan mtshams/ /bla mas re khA mdzub gang dang/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang/
511b7(rgyud 'grel): sngon po nang du mnyam zhing drang/ /de mtshod? me tog sil mu ting?/ /de tshe bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni sgrol mdzad pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
512a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnas gzhes so/ /de ltar bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /gzhung las 'di skad 'byung ba ste/ /nyes pa kun las rnam grol bas/ /tshon gyi las ni yang dag brtsam/ /slob dpon gyis ni dang pa'i ?/ /phyi nas kun nas
512a2(rgyud 'grel): slob mas so/ /zhes pas/ /re khA drang ba'i rim pa yang/ /mnyam dang drang dang mchod sogs/ /de bzhin rigs pas shes par bya'o/ /de 'ang lung las 'di skad du/ /bar chad thams cad rab 'joms pa zhes pa dang/ /gzhan
512a3(rgyud 'grel): yang mthe bong dang ni ma the'u chung dbangs/ /drang la mtho bar yang dag bri/ /gal tA ri mo mi mnyam na/ /yo zhing dma' dang bcas pa dang/ /ri mo dma' bas mi 'grub cing/ /yon pos sdug bsngal skye byed la/ /chang? pas

512a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dkyil 'khor bri ? nas/ /'jug pa'i rten du phyag mtshan dgong/ /di yang dang por slob dpon gyis/ /? mo'i dus su 'chags sar 'gro/ /slar log khrus dang phyug pa dang/ /gos dang rgyan dang lha mos bskyed/ /rol ?
512a7(rgyud 'grel): mo'i sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /sta gon zla ba sbyar yi?/ /dbyangs yig rgya bkral? nam mkha' nas/ /sngags ni so so'i sngags brjod cing/ /de la ?sus kyi gdan ste da du /skyes pa'i thod pa'i rgya gram gri/ /sgo bzhir pad+ma 'dab ma la/ /gri
512b1(rgyud 'grel): gug cang te'u ru sbal sbul/ /sngo dang dmar ser ljang go rims/ /mtshams bzhi'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma ru/ /seng ge dge slong 'khor lo rdo rje ni/ /sdo dkar ldad khra rim bzhin dgod //de tshe kun la sngags brjod cing/ /bkod pas dkyil 'khor ?
512b2(rgyud 'grel): bsres 'gyur/ /de nas bla re rgyal mtshan gdugs kha dan rgyan sogs 'phan rnams bri/ /phyi rol mtshams dang rol mo brdung/ /spos dang bcas pas bum pa rnams/ /sta gon gnas nas spyan drangs te/ /chu dang rin chen sman la sogs/ /bsam pa
512b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug cing ting 'dzin bskyed/ /rol mor bcas pas dkyil 'khor la/ /lag tu sogs te lan gsum bskor/ /rnam rgyal bum pa gtso bo'i mdun/ /shar sgo'i g.yas su las thams cad/ /gzhan dag sgo dang mtshams bzhir dgod/ /de nas bskor ba
