512b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon thams cad dgod/ /rtag tu bla ma la gsal gdab/ /de? nas bla mas nye rag dang/ bdud rtsi ri lu kha ru gzhug/ ston der 'dug nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub/ /rig dang bcas pas yan lag drug/ bsam rgyud ting 'dzin gsal
512b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ las kyi rdo rjes star bzhin du /rak+Shas bsrung ba nas gzung nas/ /mchod stong bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar/ /bdag nyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs/ /bla mas kyang ni sngar bzhin du/ /mos pas 'pho dang ting 'dzin ni/ /gzugs brnyan la brten sa

513a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par gsol/ /zhes pas slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog/ /snying po'i
513b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug bar bgyi/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la lus dag yid gsum gyi sgo nas phyag bya ste/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): te hUM/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): mi hUM/ oM na mo na(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba dang/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya
513b2(rgyud 'grel): bAk+tsi? t+ta pra Na me na badzra ba na da na kaM ro mi zhes pas kyang/ /? gsum gus bas phyag byas la/ /de nas sngar bzhin slob ma yis/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/ /thub pa nyi ma la sogs brjod/ /de bzhin sdom pa dam tshig
513b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sta gan gnas ba sngar bzhin bya/ /denas bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /dang khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang du zhugs kyis /ngas khyod la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
513b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyan ci dgos/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ dam
513b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig nyams par gyur ta re /he ru ka dpal ded khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag gzhug pa ni/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas ka pA la'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pas dam tshig gi chu blud pa ni kye'i
513b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i gzi mdangs dang ldan pas 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig nyams na srag par byed/ /dam tshig srungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis grub/ /oM sarba badzra pany+tsa a mraM tA u da
513b7(rgyud 'grel): ka hUM/ dang nas brtsams nas khyod kyi dpal h+r ru ka nga yin gyi gang des? 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya dgos te/ /da khyod nga la brnyas pa'i las ma byed cig khyas na khyod kyi mi bde ba ma slangs pas/ tsha'i dus
514a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re /de nas 'di skad brjod de /dang khyod de? bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyang 'grub par dka' ba ma lags na /dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes
514a2(rgyud 'grel): pas yol ba'i nang du drangs te/ ye shes dbab pa bla ma'i man ngag bzhin bya'o/ /de nas mthong ba dri dang me tog gi phreng ba thogs te pratIts+tsha badzra hUM zhes brjod cing phreng ba dor ba dang /mig dbye bar bya ste/ /oM rdo rje sems
514a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed pa ni brtson pa ste/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad pas/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /he badzra ba sh+ya de nyid sngags su brjod pa ni oM badzra satwa swa yand+he ya/ tsa gat+ta ya ud+ga ta ya ta ?/ badzra tsaksha rA nut+ta ra te/ he badzra pra
514a4(rgyud 'grel): pe sha/ de nas gdong g.yogs phud cing 'di skad brjod do/ /da ni dad pa rab tu? bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor mi rig skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// 'phro ba'i phun sum tshogs kun dang/ /dngos
514a5(rgyud 'grel): grub thams cad mngon du gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang// gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis zhes brjod pa dang/ me tog gang la ltung ba'i lha ngo bstan cing lhag pa'i lha dbog/ sngags bslab cing de kho na nyid bshad par
514a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o //de la gzhal yas khang gru bzhir byang ba ni tshad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /sgo bzhin dran pa nye bar bzhag ba bzhi yis rnam bar dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /rta babs bzhin ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par
514a7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /dra ba ni nyin mongs pa chen po rnam par dag pa'o/ /dra ba byed pa ni nyon mongs pa chung du rnam par dag pa'o/ /ka ba brgyad ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnam par dag ba'o/ /dar gyi pa ti la sogs
514b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o rgyan rnams ni tshul khrims rnam par dag ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnamsni gzugs dang sbra la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /rdo rjer ba ni zab mo'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtag go/ /me 'od ni phyi rol gyi bgegs
514b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas mi? tshugs pa'i rtags so// bum pa brgyad ni che ba'i yon tan gyis rgyas shing thugs rje chen po'i ros yongs su gang pa'i rtags so/ /de nas lta'i de kho nanyid bstan te/ de la bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa'i
514b3(rgyud 'grel): phung po dang zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /go ni ni zhi spang dang gzugs rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /chom rkun ma ni gti mug dang sgra rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ro langs ma ni nga rgyal dang dri rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no/
514b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hasma rI ci 'dod chags dang po? rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /pukla? si ni zhe sdang dang sa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ri khrod ma ni gti mug dang chu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /gtum mo ni nga? rgyal dang me rnam par dag pa'i rang
514b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /g.yung mo ni 'dod cha? dang rlung rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma ni yab dang mthun no/ /de ltar de kho na? nyid bshad nas slob mas maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas bla ma'i zhabs la gtug cing yon
514b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog phul nas dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol par gdab par bya'o/ /de yang thun mong gi dbang nod pa yin na/ 'di skad brjod do/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du/ /nam
514b7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i rdo rje bdag la gsol/ /'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu/ /bying ba skyabs? med bdag la skyabs /mgon po khyod kyis bka' drin gyis/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur bdag la gsol/ /zhes pa dang/ khyad par slob dpon gyi dbang
515a1(rgyud 'grel): yin na 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba/ /'gro ba bskyab phyir gzi brjid can/ /ci ltar yon tan 'byung gns sogs/ /de bzhin bdag la de gsol cig/ dp'bo chen po mi ldog pa'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag pa
515a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid/ /ces pa'o/ /don? mthun mongs dang khyad par gyi slob ma rnams tha mal gyi stan dang /khyad par gyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'am/ /pad+mas mtshan pa bzhag par bya'o/ /gdugs
515a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po gser gyi yu ba can phub nas/ slob dpon gyis yang lha rnams ci rigs par mchod nas/ bdud rtsi dang dri'i chu dan nyungs kar duthogs nas bdag nyid nga rgyal dang bcas pas 'di skad brjod/ /nyin cig bar chad bgegs kyi tshogs//
515a4(rgyud 'grel): da ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i bdag/ gdug pa ma lus 'joms par byed/ /dngos shig bar chad bgegs kyi tshogs/ /nga yis bka' las 'da' ma byed/ /ci sta bka' las 'das gyur na/ /rdul phran bzhin du ?
515a5(rgyud 'grel): par byed ces dang/ bdg nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags dang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bskrad pa'am/ rak+Sha la sogs pa'i sngags brjod cing rab dan gur la sogs pas bsrung ba'o/ /de nas slob mas khrus byas shing/ /stod g.yogs la sogs
515a6(rgyud 'grel): gos bzangs ldan/ /drug pa rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang/ nor phyir snyim ba me tog gis/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi ge tso la dbul/ /oM pra hIts+tsha badzra ho zhes pa'i sngags kyis brjod pas so/ /de rjes bla mas me tog blangs/ /slob ma'i mgo la bcing byas la/
515a7(rgyud 'grel): oM d+harmA kuN+Da a b+hi Shany+tsha? zhes brjod pas ni/ /chos kun bsdus? shing 'khyil bas ni/ /lhag ba'i lha yin pas de skad du/ phreng ba yid dam rgyal ba'i dbang/ /sgom phyir dbang bskur dam tshig ldan/ /de rjes las kyi rdo rje yis/ /bum pa'i chu rnams
515b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas ni/ /bzang po rnams la bum par bsdu/ /de rjes dun chos nyid du'o/ /de nas rnam rgyal chu rgyun gyis/ /dril bu'i sga dar dbyangs bcas pas/ /dbang bskur ba ni 'di skad brjod/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba'o/ /khams gsum ?
515b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chu yi dbang/ /ding 'dir khyod la sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun na ri? sgrub phyir/ /chu dbang dam pa khyed kyis long/ /oM sarba ta thA ga te u da ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra swa ba At+ma ko haM/ /des ni rnam par
515b3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa dang/ /nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'bru bar byed/ /de nas gser la sogs pa'i rin po che dang shing dang pos la sogs pa'i 'bur mar ? pa 'am/ /thang ka'i ri mo 'am dbu rgyan du byas te/ traM las rin chen 'byung ldan du bsam
515b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pas ye shes sems dpa' bstim la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa dagn sngags bzlas pa byas la 'di ? brjod do/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /khams gsum pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /sangs
515b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan dbang/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis sngags pa yi/ /rin chen dag gis dbu rgyan dang/ /der dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra pa rA ha ka badzra a ri li ho(rgyud 'grel): de nas yan rdo rje a las
515b6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba? mdza' yas su bskyed la 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po dang/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi rnams kyi dbang mchog ni/ /di ring khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti stwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tza? bir sa
515b7(rgyud 'grel): ma yi sti/ /de nas de nyid brjod pa ni/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ zhes pa ste/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i lag pa g.yas
516a1(rgyud 'grel): par sbyin no/ /de nas dril bu kham las don yod grub par bskyed la 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi ? 'gro bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal zas?
516a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhed/ /de yi de nyid bshad pa ni/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyi bdag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /de bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /srid pa'i dam bya byed par 'gyur/ badzra satwa stwaM a b+hibi ny+tsa ma/ /zhes pas lag pa g.yon par
516a3(rgyud 'grel): dang byin la/ /de nas ming gi dba' bskur bar bya ste/ bu las rnam par snang mdzad du bsam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ming gi dbang zhes pa la sogs pa brjed la/ /oM badzra? shI he ru ka d+hi pa ti stwaM a b+ha Shiny+tsi mi sh+rI he ru ka nA ma a b+hiShe? ka
516a4(rgyud 'grel): ta zhes brjod cing rdo rje dril bu mgo'i thad kar sbyin no/ /de nas brtul zhugs kyis brtan par bya'o/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /he ru ka dpal phyag na bsnams/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs ?
516a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rtse mo nas slob ma 'dzin ? bcug la sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ /e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi hUM swA hA ha ha hi hi zhes brjod la lag par rdo rje rgya gram sbyin no/ /de nas he ru ku dpal gzugs/ /?
516a6(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor chogs sim?/ rdo rje slob dpon go 'phang thob/ /he ru ka dpal kha TwAM ga/ rnal 'byor ma ni Da ma ru rdo rje ? rdo rjer? bcas/ /dril bu sil sil sgra sgro las shing/ /tshangs pa'i skud thogs rnal 'byor bdag/ /gri gug ?
516a7(rgyud 'grel): ni ka pA la/ /dpa' bo chen pas blang ? gyis zhes brjod la/ slob ma de g.yas brkyang g.yon bsnyam pas gnas la/ rdo rje gri gug g.yas su sbyin zhing/ /dril bu dang Da ma ru dang ka pa?  la g.yon du sbyin zhing/ kha TwAM ga g.yas su brten
516b1(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyin bar bya ste/ de lta bu'i che ba'i bdag nyid deg dag dang ldan par brjod de/ /'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang rjes su gnang ba dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ dbugs dbyung ba dang ldan zhing phrin las kyang rdzogs par 'gyur te/ zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/
516b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang/ drag po dang rangs pa dang/ bsgrad pa dang/ myos par bya ba dang/ gsad pa la sogs pa dang/ de rnams la thogs pa med par 'grub par bslab par byos shig/ dngos grub 'di dag rdzogs par 'gyur te /mchil lha ma ba gol dang/
516b3(rgyud 'grel): char dbab ba dang/ nyi zla gzung ba la sogs pa 'jig rten ba'i dngos grub dang/ 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i dngos grub dang/ 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub bar byos shig ces rje gnad sbyin no/ /de dag ni ?
516b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang dam/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang rdzogs pa ste/ lus kyi dri ma dag par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs kyi lam mthar phyin pa dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbang bskur ba gnyis pa ni dag gi dri ma dag par byed
516b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sbyor ba'i lam gyi nus pa 'jog/ dbang bskur gsum pa las sems kyi dri ma dag cing mthong lam gyi nus pa 'jog dbang bskur ba bzhi pas ni nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag sgom ba'i lam dang khyad par gyi lam
516b6(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i nus pa 'dog/ dbang bskur ba de dag gis dbang bskur ba'i rim pa ni bla ma'i zhal la bstos par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas kyang dgongs pa sbas pa yin la/ /de bas ni dgongs don nyams pa spangs pa'i phyir bdag
516b7(rgyud 'grel): gis kyang 'dir yi ger bkod pa ma yin snyam du dgongs so/ /de dag gis dbang bstan nas/ gang gi tshe rab tu gnas par byed par 'dod na de'i don kyang 'di yin te/ sdom ni shes par bya dang nyams su blang/ /'bras bu dang ni rnam pa gsum/ /de la
517a1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ rab tu gnas pa thung mong dang/ khyad par du shes par bya'o/ /mnga' dbul lha ltar mchod pa dang/ slob ma lta bur dbang bskur ba/ skyan dbye thun mong gser ? gyis/ /tshigs bcad sngags dang bcas bar
517a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /khyad par spyan ni dbye ba'o/ /zhal bsro ba ni sbyin sreg gis/ slob ma shis par ? phyir dang/ /lha rnams tshim pa'i don du'o/ /de'i rjes la nyams su blang ba ni 'di yin te/ /sngar bzhin bla mar 'os pa la/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan ?
517a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab pa dang/ bsnyen pa dang/ sa chog dang sngar bzhin byas la/ dkyil 'khor me long gi ? ltar mnyam pa'i steng du lam/ /stegs bu gru bzhi'i steng du'o/ /sto gan yo byang thams cad nye bar sogs la/ de la slob dpon du 'os pa? ni
517a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ brtan zhing dul pa blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor bshes/ /dkyil 'khor bri pa'i las la mkhas/ /de nyid bcu ni legs par shes/ /'di ni slob dpon yin zhes bya/ /de yi bstan pa'i
517a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rnams/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med ces pa ni/ des kyang chos chad ba med par phun sum tshogs par bya ste/ 'di skad du/ cho ga nyams par mi bya ste/ /re ba gnas rtag tu smad pa dang/ /cha 'di'i sdug bsngal
517a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang/ /'jig rten gzhan du 'jigs chen 'byung/ /de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /bdag nyid kyis ni ci nus las/ /de bzhin tsha gang gsungs tshul du/ /kun nas rab tu de bya zhes pa dang/ de nas dang po slob ma 'am/

517b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang phun sum tshogs no sa pa 'phro ba dang ldan pas rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog bzhin du ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa dang/ rang bzhin spyan drangs pa gnyis bsres sam gsum bsres byas la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myad ba'i bar
517b2(rgyud 'grel): du sngar bzhin byas nas sku gzugs la sogs dag kyang byi dor byas la sngar gyi gnas su gzhag go/ de nas me dang chu nang du/ /yungs kar blugs shing sngags 'di bzlas/ /lan gsum bskor zhing gtor bar bya/ /sbyang zhing bsrung pa dag tu bya/
517b3(rgyud 'grel): oM te? badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha na sarba pA paM da ha na te badzra ya hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas 'bru mar la dur pa'i pir gyis byug cing/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sA ya pi shod+ha ni swAhA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas shun pags lnga yis dril phyes dang/ ? la
517b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa byas kyang rung/ ma byas kyang sngar gyi de dag gis rten sbyad ba'o/ /bdug spos thogs shing rol mo dbyangs dang bcas pas sangs rgyas thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor lha'i rnam par bsdus la 'di skad brjod do//
517b5(rgyud 'grel): dgyes? mdzad rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la byag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma la yang brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rang gnas/ /mgon po bdag ni bgyid bar 'tshal/ /bcom
517b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan bdag tsi? pa la/ /de bas gnad pa mdzad par rigs/ bdag gi ming brjod 'di zhes pas/ rig pa'i rgyal bo 'di zhes bya/ /yo byad ci 'byar pa yis ni/ /nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas
517b7(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /thugs ? bar ni nyed dgongs nas/ /tshogs pa thams cad rab gnas la/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du? gsol/ /zhes pa dang/ yang na phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grags dang zhes
518a1(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pas gsol ba gdab cing snyim pa'i me tog gtor zhing 'di skad do/ /nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /me tog bzang por rin chen chang/ /sku la rab tu 'bab 'gyur bas/ /kye kye so sor
518a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsal/ /oM pa ra ma su kha sha ya su la laM ta bi la sa mi te/ na ma mi b+ha ga bAny+dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): hi hi hi hi/ pra tIts+tsha badzra ku su ma any+dza li nA tha ho/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dga' ldan na ni bzhugs pa las/ /lha mo skye
518a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar/ /de bzhin gzugs 'dir khyod bzhugs mdzod/ /'dir zhugs rtag tu mgon po ni/ /gyur nas me tog la sogs 'di/ /byang chub sems ni 'phel pa'i phyir/ /bdag cag don du bzhes su gsol
518a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de/ /de yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang nod pa yin na/ sngar bzhin du lha sta gon du gnas pa nyid bya/ ma yin na mgon po bsdu ba dag tsam gyis bya'o/ /de bzhin du dbang yin na slob ma lhag gnas la star bzhin du bya
518a5(rgyud 'grel): ba yin la/ ma yin na 'di tsam gyis slob ma lhag par gnas par bya ste/ deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru/ /'byung bar bdag nyid the tshom mang/ /byang chub
518a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dang sems gtsog las/ mi ldeg par ni bdag 'gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ deng? bdag skye bar thom med/ /dang bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gis mchod sbyin bla na med/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus
518a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog yin no/ /zhes brjod do/ de nas gal te rdul tshon ma dris pa'i lhag gnas yin na shin tu snga bar thig dang tshon la sogs pa sngar bzhin du byas la/ /nyi ma bzang po la rab gnas 'di ltar bya ste/ yang slob dpon grogs dang
518b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas cho ga nyams par mi bya ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pas yo byad thams cad bsog cing bstar ba dang/ rgyan thams cad bre ba dang/ yang rang nyid grogs dang bcas pas khrus dang byug pa nas gzung ste/ bdud rtsi myang?
518b2(rgyud 'grel): ? du bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs pa sngar bzhin du bya zhing/ sku gzugs la sogs byi dor bya ba nas/ shun pags lnga ste/ dzam+bu ka dang/ ka ta dang/ bilba dang/ a mra dang/ pi tsu pu ri las byung ba'i dril phyis bya ba dang/ de bzhin du sngar gyi
518b3(rgyud 'grel): ? gsu bcad pa dang/ /di ring rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal/ /zhes pa bcug la/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ zhes pa'i bar du'o/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas ba yungs rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa'i chu la/ oM bi shud+d+he/ badzra ?
518b4(rgyud 'grel): d+ha hUM oM buM dzaM/ baM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pas mngon par bzlas pa'i chus ? bya zhig pha rol mi dbyangs dang bcas pas 'di brjod par bya'o/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams gyis ni khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi ju ni dag pa yis
518b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bdag dis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye swAhA/ gzhan yang spyan la sogs pa'i sngags/ oM ru ru spu ru la sogs pa'i yang brjod cing/ bkra shis tshigs su bcang pa gang yang rung ba gcig gis
518b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas ras kyis sku phyi bar bya ste/ bde gshegs sku gzugs dpe dang bral kyis kyang/ /'gro pa'i don du sku gzugs cir yang gda' / /rin chen dbyig ltar nyes pa'i skyon bral? zhing/ /'jig rten bsnyen bkur ri mo'i
518b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul du ni/ /dri med rgyal ba rnams kyis rab sngags pa'i/ /ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku phyis pas/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa ma lus kun byang nas/ /sku gsum dang du bdag cag grub par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra wa stwaM ye swAhA
519a1(rgyud 'grel): oM tsitra gand+he swAhA/ oM badzra ab+hi Shiny+tsa ni swAhA/ de rab tu gnas pa'i dngos gzhi nyid yin te/ de yang sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus? dang/ /rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid/ /zhes pa dang/ sku gzugs snying ? ?
519a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhug/ ces pa dang/ bsdu ba'i tshig 'dis shes par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes byin rlabs dang/ /dbang bskur ba yi rab gnas bzang/ /de sa dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ sku gzugs sa bon phyag mtshan nam/ /skad cig sogs kyi lha ?
519a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lha rnams lugs bzhin skyed/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha' bsdus la mchod cing bstim/ /de nas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /skye mched drug dang sku gsung thugs/ /byin gyis brlab pa sngar bzhin bya/ /de nas dbang ?
519a4(rgyud 'grel): ba mi/ chu dang dbu rgyan nas gzung ste/ /rjes su gnang ba'i bdud sbyin/ /gzhan yang rin chen bdun la sogs/ /ci rigs par yang dbang bskur bya/ /mnga' dbul ba yang dbang der gtigs/ /de nas spyan dbye ba'i chog bya ste/ gser gyi thur ma la?
519a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mar dang sbrang ? la bsres te/ stan? dbye zhing 'di ces brjod do/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ming? tog bsal ba ltar/ /khyod kyis kyang ni mi shes ba'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal zhes pa dang/ /oM sarba ta thA
519a6(rgyud 'grel): ga ta tsak+Sha tsak+Shu? sa man+dza tsak+Sha tsak+Sha ? sho d+ha yo swAhA/ /khyad par du spyan? dbye ba ni/ slob ma la ye shes 'bebs pa ltar 'dir bya'o/ /de nas mda''bul bar bya ste/ dang por gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dbul bar bya ste/ 'di skad do/ bde bar gshegs
519a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku gsung? thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzugs ?? gdugs du ?  bde ? gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa ni zhes gro zhing byin che 'gro ba skyob pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin phyi bdag po la sogs pa khams
519b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gdung ba sel bcing 'gro ba skyob pa'i skal pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la// gdugs mdzes gser gyi lu bar ldan//
519b2(rgyud 'grel): phul bde bzhin bdag 'dul gyis/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ta ga tsat+taM sh+ri sa ma ye hUM zhes gsum mam bdun gyi bar du brjod do/ /de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang bsgre zhing sbyar bar bya'o/ /rgyal mtshan
519b3(rgyud 'grel): yang sngar bzhin mdzad nas ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas la/ /bar chod 'dud las rgyal ba'i rtags/ /phul ba de bzhin bdag 'bul gyis/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+ha dza ke tu sh+rI sa ma ye hUM/ de nas

519b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bla de la sogs pa la yang ngo/ /yang khrus byas te mchod pa rnam pa lnga 'bul lo/ /de nas zhal zas 'bul lo/ /de nas mchod pa'i tshig sngar bzhin sbyar la/ sems can thams cad bkres skom dang/ mu ge la sogs
519b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bskal pa las thar par gyur cig/ oM sarba tha thA ga ta A ha ra bruM ji nyi sa ma ye hUM/ de nas na bza' dbul te/ /sems can thams cad gos dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral te/ lha'i na
519b7(rgyud 'grel): bza' ? lag? reg na bde? dang gyon pa'i skal pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma? nA(rgyud 'grel): sten nA wastra sh+rI sa ma ye hUM/ de nas zhal bsro bya ste/ de yang sbyin sreg gis bya'o/ /slob ma shis par bya phyir
520a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lha rnams tshim pa'i don tu ste/ /de yang sngar ? mchog ltar/ /de nas khyad par du yang nang gi sku gzugs la chogs kyi mchod pa dang tsA ru'i ston mo yang bya'o/ de'i rjes la mchod gnas su gtad pa ni/ khyod kyis
520a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la gsol btab pa/ /sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du/ /ci skad gsungs pa bzhin rab gnas pa/ /de ni nges bya/? byang du bcug/ khyad kyis de ni kun rdzogs par/ /ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis/ /de nas srung na bsgo ba ni/ /bdag nyid lus?
520a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /nag po chen po dgug pa dang/ /gzhug dang bcing dang dbang du bya/ /de la mchod dang gtod ma sbyin/ /de la bka' lung bsgo bya ba/ /yis? rab gnas byas pa yis/ /gtsug lag khang? ? sogs pa 'di/ /ji srid
520a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa de srid du/ /bsrung zhing khyod kyis legs par skyongs/ /dkon mchog 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi/ bka' gsal khyod kyis bsrung ba dang/ /ston pa'i bka' dang slob dpon gyi/ /bka' lung bsgo ba legs par bsrungs/ de
520a5(rgyud 'grel): nas bzod gsol bya ste/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang/ de sras tshang sogs lha tshogs kun/ gang ni ? cho ga byas pa na/ /nongs gyur de dag bzod mdzad rigs/ /de nas gshegs gsol byed 'dod na/ /'di tsam brjod skad
520a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ste sbyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang/ bde legs chen po kun mdzad par/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'gro ba'i don la gshegs/ de nas byin rlabs bstan pa brjod/ /gang 'di sku gzugs bskal ba
520a7(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ //bskal pa brgya las lhag gnas shing/ /sa dang me dang chu dang ni rlung las lha rnams kun gyis srung/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa dang/ bu dang cha bo rnams 'phel te/ /rab?  dga' yid bde gyur nas
520b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rab gnas bzang por dag tu bzhugs/ /rab gnas spyi yi shes byas na /gal te glegs pam ras ris sogs/ /yin na gzhan las gsungs pa bzhin/ /yig 'brur sgyur dang khrus la sogs/ /sngags la sogs pa ci rigs bya/ /bzhud
520b2(rgyud 'grel): mangs dogs nas 'dir ma brjod/ /de rjes ?/ gzhung rdzogs tshigs bcad brjod/ /gang gis 'di rtsom pa yang dag ming ni/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis thub dka' mi bskyod pa/ /mdza' na rdo rje ldan pas btsas pa'i mig
520b3(rgyud 'grel): ma bcas grags pa bsod nams kun la khyab/ /mdza' na rgyal mtshan ldan pas snyam pa'i gsung/ /gang brtsams gzhung de rab tu grub pa yang/ /sgrub pa po yi lag tu bya ba yang/ /mdza' ru bla ? ldan pas don kun rdzogs/ /tshigs bcad rkyang pa
520b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams spras rim pa la mdza' na zhes bya ldan pas grags chen po/ /gang ltar don de rab tu rdzogs pa yang/ /mngon rtogs sgrub thabs dbang dang rang gnas yin/ /sgrub thabs dang mthun bla ma'i mngon rtogs la/ /mdza' du sgra dang ldan
520b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor cho ga rdzogs/ /dri ma dag cing nus 'jog dbang la yang/ /mdza' ru rab gnas ldan pas gzhan don rdzogs/ gang phyir sbyin pa'i 'bras bus 'grub po yang/ /phrin las dngos grub rang gzhan don du yin/ /di las cung zhig go
520b6(rgyud 'grel): dog? ba'i shes bya/ /bsnyer pa mngon rtogs rim pa rang don las/ /mdza' ru rab gnas ldan pas gzan don rdzogs/ gang phyir sbyin pa'i 'byas? bus 'grub ? yang/ /phrin las dngos grub rang gzhan ngon du yin/ /de las cung zhi go
520b7(rgyud 'grel): nams rgyal mtshan gyis/ /gzhung dag las ni gsungs pa yin mod kyang/ /bla mas rang la rang gis gzhan la ste/ mdzad pa'i rim pa bsdus shing legs par bsgyur ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ ba laM bi d+hi/
521a1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ gtor ma'i chog /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs rnams 'tshe ba zhi bya dang/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /'byung po thams cad gtor
521a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dag/ sbyin pa'i cho ga yang dag bri/ /de la dang po rnal 'byor pa stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ oM su b+hA? ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba Shu d+ho h+raM zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di lan gsum du yongs su bzlas te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su
521a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa la lhag par bya'o/ /oM dbu? n+ya tA dz+nya na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod de/ khams gsum po thog ma nas ma skyes shing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par mi rtog pa/ gnyis med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang gi
521a4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi snang ba tsam du dmigs la/ nam mkha' i khams rgya chen po'i dbus su/ chos 'byung gi phyag gyen du gnas pa rnam par bsgom zhing/ de'i 'og tu de'i dbus na sna tshogs pad+ma rgya chen po dang/ zla ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
521a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi steng du rang gi yi dam gyi lha'i rnal 'byor bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/ 'gro ba ma lus pa snang bar byas pa sngon du can gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag bo gzugs nA spyod
521a6(rgyud 'grel): pa tshangs pa la sogs pa dag dbang sbyar? gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa dang/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang nye dbang la sogs 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dang/ thags bzang ris dang sa'i lha
521a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa dang klu la sogs pa sems can yang dag par drangs te/ chos 'byung gi dbus su rnam par bsam mo/ /de la dang por steng gi phyogs kyi gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa'i lha/ ral pa cod pan dag dang dkar/ /ting nge
521b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyi phyag rgyu dang/ /'od zer dkar po phreng bar ldan/ /'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yi/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug sogs/ /lha rnams rin chen cod pan 'chang/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang 'od ldan pa'o/ /steng gi nyi bzla? soD de bzhin/
521b2(rgyud 'grel): rang rang phyogs kyis phyogs bdag po/ /rang rang mdog dang phyag mtshan sogs/ /lhun pa go rims bzhin du bsgom/ /thags bzangs ris dang sa la sogs/ /klu yi bdag po brgyad rnams kyang/ /rang gi ye shes sems snying ga'i/ /sa bon
521b3(rgyud 'grel): las byung rigs gsum gyis/ /ye shes rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /gzugs su rim gyis bsgrub par bya/ /de la da ni sems can thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ste/ rang gi ye shes sems dpa' i thug ka'i sa bon
521b4(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa'i yi ge oM mdog dkar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ 'od kun nas 'phro ba mgo bo'i steng du rnam par bsams la/ de'i 'od zer gyis tshangs pa la sogs pa gzugs ni spyod pa'i lha
521b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rang gi ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i sa bon de nyid las rnal 'byor pa'i yi ge hUM nod bu mthon ka'i mdog can la nor bu mthon ka'i 'od 'phro ba/ zla
521b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /de la 'od 'phros rnam bsams te/ /'od zer sprin des bkug nas ni/ /'dod na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba sbyang? byas te/ /sangs rgyas mi bskyod gzugs dag tu//
521b7(rgyud 'grel): grub par yongs su bsgom par bya /de ma thag tu rang gi ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka de nyid las yi ge a dmar po 'od zer dmar ba'i tshogs rab tu 'phro ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ kun nas spros pa
522a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'od zer dmar po spros pas thags zangs ris dang/ sa'i lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po brgyad yongs su sbyangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam par bsgrub par bya'o//
522a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rang gi rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su bsgrubs pa de la gzugs na spyod pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis
522a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs so/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs so/ /thags zangs ris la sogs pa rnams ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs so/ /de bas na gzugs na spyod pa la sogs
522a4(rgyud 'grel): pa nas klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi bar de dag rang rang gi rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su bsgrubs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /mgo po la
522a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgyar byas la/ de dag gi lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas de rnams kyi mdun du bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i dngos po ci 'byor ba btsal la/ dang por
522a6(rgyud 'grel): yi yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi? dkyil 'khor gzhu'i? dbyibs lta bu /rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan pa rnam par bsam la/ de'i steng du raM dmar po yongs su gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum rab tu 'bas?
522a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs can dang/ de'i steng du yi ge a(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa'i ka pA la yongs su bsgoms la/ ka pA la de'i dbus su bdud rtsi lnga/ buM aM dziM khaM hUM zhes de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon byin gyis brlabs pa
522b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ /de'i 'og tu sbar bas?/ dros pa la sogs pa'i cho gas yang dag par bsgrubs la/ /yi ge oM gyis byin gyis brlabs par blta'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge hUM las grub pa'i rdo rje bsams la/ de nas yi ge oM gyi 'od ger? gyis
522b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs nas/ bdud rtsi lnga po de'i steng du rab tu bstims la/ dam thag tu 'bar ba dang/ dres pa dang/ yi ge oM? dang rdo rje de nyid du zhu bar gyur par bsam la/ arba la sogs pa
522b3(rgyud 'grel): dbul zhing/ de ltar bsgrubs ba'i bdud rtsi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi ljags? rdo rje las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyi sku gus rab tu drangs pas tshim par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dang dril bu yang dag par blangs te/
522b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung? po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags kyis/ dngos po de dag lan bdun gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas de rnams la dbul te /rdo rje myur du gsor byas nas/ /rdo rje sbyor bas kun brtags kyis/ ri bo thams cad nges bsal
522b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de nas dril bu gsil byas la/ /rgyal bas stong nyid rtogs 'gyur ba'i/ /mchog tu dgyes ba'i sgra yis ni/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni lan gsum brjod/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas rang bzhin dag pa'i
522b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa'i mchog ni sgrub par byed/ /de la gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ /AdyA nutpan+na twAta/ oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ de bon? nyid kyi? sngags 'di lan gsum
522b7(rgyud 'grel): 'u? bdun brjod do/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dag ni/ /rjes bran gtor ma byin gyis brlab/ /ji ltar bdud rtsi ro dag gis/ /de ltar thams cad chim? pa bya/ /yang dag 'thor 'thung byin nas na// bzod bya gshegs su gsol bar bya /de la
523a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du
523a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol/ /oM A:hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): skye ba med dang 'gag pa med/ /thog ma nas ni rang bzhin dag/ 'gro kun 'di dag mthong nas ni//
523a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs chen 'di ni bya ba yin/ /gtor sbyin cho ga legs bris nas/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang nyer bsags/ /des ni 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub snod
523a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur shog /b+haM g+ha lar? skyes dge slong ni/ /mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis/ /bla ma mnyes las thob gyur pa/ /gtor ma 'di nyid rab tu bshad/ /'byung po
523a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i chog/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// mang+ga laM?// //
